meta.description: Ndaghaano Mpyaka na bimui haa bitabo byꞌomu Ndaghaano Nkulu mu Lubwisi
meta.license: Copyrighted; Permission to distribute granted to eBible.org

Genesis: Mu ntandiko, Luhanga akahanga eghulu na nsi.
Nsi ekaba eli kwonkaha, etalimu kantu. Mweli̱ma ghukaba ghu̱swi̱ki̱i̱ye nanja kandi Mwoyo wa Luhanga aakalagha naabunga eegu̱u̱li̱ ya maasi.
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aaghila ati, “Kyeleeli̱ kibʼo”
kandi kyeleeli̱ kyabʼo.
Luhanga aabona kyeleeli̱ eki kisemeeye, du̱mbi̱ aaghabani̱ja kyeleeli̱ na mweli̱ma.
Luhanga aaluka kyeleeli̱ “Ntangaali̱” kandi aaluka mweli̱ma “Mukilo.” Du̱mbi̱ haabʼo lwagholo na nkyambisi, kyaba kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha.
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aaghila ati, “Haabʼo kintu haagati kibaghani̱je maasi aghali eegu̱u̱li̱ yakiyo na hansi yakiyo.”
Kandi niikuwo kyakabaaye. Luhanga aatʼo kintu kyabaghani̱ja maasi aghali hansi yakiyo na aghali eegu̱u̱li̱ yakiyo.
Luhanga aaluka kintu eki “Mwanya.” Haabʼo lwagholo na nkyambisi, kyaba kilo kyakabili.
Luhanga aaghila ati, “Maasi aghali hansi ya mwanya gheekumaani̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kimui kandi haabʼo etaka lyomi̱ye.” Kandi niikuwo kyakabaaye.
Luhanga aaluka etaka lyomi̱ye “Nsi,” aaluka maasi “Nanja.” Luhanga aabona eki kisemeeye.

Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aaghila ati, “Etaka lituwʼo bi̱si̱ngo: bilimuwa ebikwanaghʼo bi̱ghu̱ma, hamui na biti ebikwanaghʼo bi̱ghu̱ma ebili na nsigho kusighikila haa mulingo ghwabiyo.” Kandi niikuwo kyakabaaye.
Etaka lyatuwʼo bi̱si̱ngo, na biti ebikwanamu bi̱ghu̱ma ebilimu nsigho, bu̱li̱ kimui mu kusighikila haa mulingo ghwakiyo. Luhanga aabona eki kisemeeye.
Haabʼo lwagholo na nkyambisi, kyaba kilo kyakasatu.
Luhanga aaghila ati, “Haabʼo byeleeli̱ mu mwanya kubaghani̱ja ntangaali̱ na mukilo kandi byoleke bilo, bwile, na myaka.
Oleke bibe mu mwanya kubhaki̱yagha hansi.” Kandi niikuwo kyakabaaye.
Luhanga aahanga byeleeli̱ bibili byamaani̱, kyeleeli̱ kimui kyamaani̱ kulema ntangaali̱, kyeleeli̱ kinji kikee kulema mukilo. Aahanga dhee nsooli̱ya.
Kandi Luhanga aasita mu mwanya ku̱bbeni̱ya hansi,
kulema ntangaali̱ na mukilo kandi kubaghani̱ja kyeleeli̱ na mweli̱ma. Luhanga aabona eki kisemeeye.
Haabʼo lwagholo na nkyambisi, kyaba kilo kyakanaa.
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aaghila ati, “Oleke maasi ghaasulemu bihanguwa bwomi̱i̱li̱ kandi oleke noni̱ sihalale eghulu ya nsi mu mwanya.”

Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aahanga bisolo biinamu̱li̱to byʼomu nanja na bihanguwa byona byomi̱i̱li̱ ebikuukalagha mu maasi, bu̱li̱ kimui kusighikila haa mulingo ghwakiyo, na bu̱li̱ noni̱ eghi eli na mapapa, kusighikila haa mulingo ghwayo. Luhanga aabona eki kisemeeye.
Luhanga aabiha mu̱gi̱sa, naaghila ati, “Mu̱byale kandi mukanile kimui, mu̱u̱su̱li̱ye nanja kandi oleke noni̱ sikanile kimui munsi.”
Haabʼo lwagholo na nkyambisi, kyaba kilo kyakataano.

Luhanga aaghila ati, “Oleke etaka li̱byale bihanguwa ebili na bwomi̱i̱li̱, kusighikila haa milingo yabiyo: bisolo bya mu maka, ebikwekuluulilagha haa etaka, bisolo bya mu kisaka, bu̱li̱ kimui kusighikila haa mulingo ghwakiyo.” Kandi niikuwo kyakabaaye.

Luhanga aakola bisolo bya mu kisaka kusighikila haa mulingo ghwabiyo, bisolo bya mu maka kusighikila haa mulingo ghwabiyo, na bihanguwa ebikwekuluulilagha haa etaka kusighikila haa mulingo ghwabiyo. Kandi niikuwo kyakabaaye.

Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aaghila ati, “Oleke tuhange muntu mu kususa kwatu kandi oghu atu̱su̱si̱ye, niikuwo aleme nsu̱i̱ sya mu nanja, noni̱ sya mu mwanya, bisolo bya mu maka byona munsi yoona, na bihanguwa byona ebikwekuluulilagha haa etaka.”
Nahabweki Luhanga aahanga muntu amu̱su̱si̱ye kandi mu kisasani̱ kiye eenini, niimuwo aahangi̱ye musaasa na mukali̱.

Luhanga aabaha mu̱gi̱sa, aaghila ati, “Mu̱byale kandi mukanile kimui, mu̱u̱su̱li̱ye nsi kandi mughileme. Muleme nsu̱i̱ sya mu nanja, noni̱ sya mu mwanya, na bu̱li̱ kihanguwa kyona kyomi̱i̱li̱ ekikughendelagha hʼetaka.”
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aaghila ati, “Naakuhaaye bu̱li̱ kilimuwa kyona ekikwanaghamu nsigho munsi eni yoona, na bu̱li̱ kiti ekikwanaghamu bi̱ghu̱ma. Byona bilabaagha byokuliya byawe.

Kandi bisolo byona bya munsi, na noni̱ sya mu mwanya syona, na bihanguwa byona ebikwekuluulilagha hʼetaka ebili na lwoha lwa bwomi̱i̱li̱, naabihaaye bi̱si̱ngo bibisi kuba byokuliya byabiyo.” Kandi niikuwo kyakabaaye.
Luhanga aabona byona ebi aahangi̱ye, bisemeleeye kimui. Haabʼo lwagholo na nkyambisi, kyaba kilo kyamukaagha.
Nahabweki eghulu na nsi na bu̱li̱ kintu kyona byahuwa kuhanguwa.
Haa kilo kyamusanju̱, Luhanga akaba naamali̱ye mulimo oghu aakolagha, du̱mbi̱ haa kilo kyamusanju̱ aahuumula milimo yee yoona.
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aaha mu̱gi̱sa kilo kyamusanju̱ eki, aakifoola kilo kyeli̱ye, nanga niikiyo aahuumuliiyemu milimo yoona ya kuhanga eghi aakoli̱ye.
Eghi niiyo nsoboolola ya kuhanguwa kwa eghulu na nsi.
Obu
Luhanga aahangi̱ye eghulu na nsi,
hakaba hatalimu bi̱si̱ngo kedha bilimuwa.
Luhanga akaba atakatooneei̱ye mbu̱la hansi kandi akaba ataliyo muntu oghu akukola haa etaka eli,
bhaatu maasi ghaalu̱ghagha mu etaka ghaamalakaka etaka lyona.
Luhanga aakola muntu mu etaka, aamuhuuha mu mihuli lwoha lwa bwomi̱i̱li̱, du̱mbi̱ muntu aaba mwomi̱i̱li̱.
Luhanga aatʼo musili bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, mu Edeni̱, eghi niiyo aataaye muntu oghu aahangi̱ye.

Luhanga aatwesi̱ya mu musili oghu biti bya milingo yoona, biti bisemeeye mu maaso ghaa muntu kandi ebili na bi̱ghu̱ma bisemeeye kuliya. Haagati ya musili oghu, hakaba halimu kiti kya bwomi̱i̱li̱ na kiti kya kumanya kilungi kandi kibhi.
Musili Edeni̱ oghu ghwalu̱ghaghamu maasi aghaaseesekagha mu musili oghu, gheebaghani̱jamu bi̱twi̱ke bbinaa bya maasi.
Li̱i̱na lya kyʼoku̱du̱bha baakighilaghamu Pi̱sooni̱, kikaba kikwamiiye mu kyalo kyona eki baaghilaghamu Havila, hambali feeja eli.
Feeja ya mu kyalo eki ekaba esemeleeye kimui, halimu dhee malaasi ghasasiiye kimui na ebaale lya muhendo baaghilaghamu bbedolaki̱.
Li̱i̱na lya ki̱twi̱ke kyakabili baakighilaghamu Gi̱hooni̱. Ki̱twi̱ke eki kikaba kikwamiiye mu kyalo kyona kya Ku̱u̱si̱.
Li̱i̱na lya ki̱twi̱ke kyakasatu baakighilaghamu Ti̱gu̱li̱i̱si̱. Ki̱twi̱ke eki kyasendagha nkighenda bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Asi̱li̱ya. Ki̱twi̱ke kyakanaa baakighilaghamu Efulaati̱.
Luhanga aatwala muntu, aamuta mu musili ghwa Edeni̱ kukolaghamu na kughuloleelela.
Luhanga aalaghila muntu ati, “Oli na bughabe kuliya bi̱ghu̱ma byona bya bu̱li̱ kiti ekili mu musili muni,
bhaatu okulaghiluwa kutaliya haa bi̱ghu̱ma bya kiti kya kumanya kilungi kandi kibhi, nanga kilo eki olikiliyʼo, majima kuwo oli̱ku̱wa.”
Luhanga aaghila ati, “Takili kilungi musaasa kuukala ali enkaha. Nkumukolela mu̱kooneli̱ oghu amusemeleeye.”
Bwile obu

Luhanga akaba amali̱ye kuhanga ku̱lu̱gha mu etaka bisolo byona, na noni̱ sya mu mwanya. Aabileetela muntu kulola mali̱i̱na akubiluka, ti̱ li̱i̱na eli muntu aalu̱ki̱ye kihanguwa kyona, niiliyo li̱i̱na lyakiyo.
Muntu aaluka mali̱i̱na bisolo, noni̱ sya mu mwanya, na binyama byona bya mu kisaka.
Bhaatu mu ebi byona, taabaayemu mu̱kooneli̱ oghu asemeleeye Adamu.
Nahabweki
Luhanga aaghwesaghi̱li̱ya musaasa mpongo syamaani̱. Ti̱ obu aabaabaagha anaghwesaghiiye, aamuuyamu lubalu̱ lumui, aaghalila kihulu eki na nyama.
Luhanga aakola mukali̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu lubalu̱ olu aai̱ye mu musaasa, du̱mbi̱ aamuleetela musaasa.
Musaasa aaghila ati,
“Lini niiliyo eku̱wa eli̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu maku̱wa ghanje
kandi nyama eghi elu̱ghi̱ye mu nyama yanje,
balamughilaghamu ‘mukali̱,’
nanga bakamuuya mu musaasa.”
Eki niikiyo kilalekagha musaasa alekaghe ese wee na ni̱na wee, eebohelʼo mukali̱ wee, ti̱ babe muntu omui.
Musaasa na mukali̱ wee bakaba bali muhina kandi tabakwatuwagha nsoni̱.
Bwile obu, njoka ekaba eli na magheji kusaali̱ya binyama byona bya mu kisaka ebi
Luhanga aahangi̱ye. Kilo kimui yaasa hambali mukali̱ ali, yaamughila eti, “Majima Luhanga akaghila ati, ‘Mutaliliya ki̱ghu̱ma kyona kya kiti kya mu musili ghuni’?”
Mukali̱ aaghila njoka ati, “Tukugubha kuliya bi̱ghu̱ma bya biti bya mu musili ghuni,
bhaatu Luhanga akaghila ati, ‘Mutaliliya haa ki̱ghu̱ma kya kiti ekili haagati ya musili ghuni kedha ku̱ki̱ku̱mʼo. Nimwakoli̱ye kuwo, mu̱ku̱ku̱wa.’ ”
Njoka yaaghila mukali̱ eti, “Majima tamu̱ku̱ku̱wa bbaa.
Luhanga akimani̱ye kwonini ati nimwanaliiye haa ki̱ghu̱ma eki, maaso ghaanu ghakuughulika kandi mukuba nga Luhanga, mukumanya kilungi kandi kibhi.”

Obu mukali̱ aaboone ngoku bi̱ghu̱ma bya mu kiti eki bi̱nu̱li̱ye kubiliya, bisemeeye mu maaso ghe kandi mbyetaaghisibuwa mu kuha magheji, aakobha bimui haa bi̱ghu̱ma ebi, aabiliya. Aaha bali̱i̱ wee bimui haa bi̱ghu̱ma ebi, naye aaliya.
Du̱mbi̱ baamanya ngoku bali muhina, nahabweki baaboheesani̱ya mababi ghaa bi̱si̱ngo baabyeswi̱ki̱la.
Lwagholo kilo eki, musaasa na mukali̱ wee baaghu̱wa elaka lya
Luhanga naalubhantangila mu musili, du̱mbi̱ baamwebi̱si̱i̱li̱la mu biti bya mu musili oghu.
Bhaatu
Luhanga aabilikila musaasa ati, “Oli haa?”
Musaasa aamukuukamu ati, “Naaghu̱u̱ye maki̱nde ghaawe mu musili, noobaha, nanga ndi muhina, du̱mbi̱ neebi̱sa.”
Luhanga aamukuukamu ati, “Ni ani̱ aakughambiiye ati oli muhina? Waliiye haa bi̱ghu̱ma bya kiti eki naakulaghiiye kutaliya?”
Musaasa aamukuukamu ati, “Mukali̱ oghu wampaaye kuukala naye hani, niiye ampaaye haa bi̱ghu̱ma bya kiti eki, nanje naabiliya.”
Niibuwo
Luhanga aaghi̱li̱ye mukali̱ ati, “Mbiki waakoli̱ye ebi?”
Mukali̱ aaghila ati, “Njoka niiyo yandimaagi̱ye kandi nanje naabiliya.”
Nahabweki
Luhanga aaghila njoka ati,
“Haabwa eki waakoli̱ye,
waaki̱i̱nu̱u̱we kusaali̱ya bihanguwa byona
na binyama bya mu kisaka byona!
Olaghendeesi̱yagha mpanda
kandi olaliyagha tu̱u̱tu̱
bilo byona bya bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe.
Kandi nkuta bu̱ghi̱ghu̱
haagati yaawe na mukali̱
kandi haagati ya baasukulu baawe na baasukulu be.
Muusukulu wee alikuhuula mutuwe
kandi naawe omukonde kali̱ghi̱so.”
Aaghila mukali̱ ati,
“Nkukani̱li̱ya kimui busaali̱ji̱ bwawe mu ku̱byala,
mu busaali̱ji̱ bwamaani̱ niimuwo olabyalilagha baana.
Kweghomba kwawe kulaakalagha haa bali̱i̱ waawe
kandi alakulemagha.”
Aaghila Adamu ati,
“Nanga uwe waaghu̱u̱ye bya mukali̱ waawe
kandi waaliya haa bi̱ghu̱ma bya kiti naakulaghiiye nti, ‘Otaliliyʼo,’
Etaka lyaki̱i̱nu̱u̱we haabwa eki waakoli̱ye eki,
olakolagha na maani̱ mu busaali̱ji̱ niikuwo otunge byokuliya
bilo byona bya bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe.
Etaka li̱ku̱ku̱tweseli̱ya bi̱si̱ngo na mahuwa
kandi olaliyagha ebi okoli̱ye mu musili.
Olakolagha na maani̱,
otu̱ngu̱tane niikuwo otunge byokuliya
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya oku̱u̱ki̱ye mu etaka
hambali waalu̱ghi̱ye,
nanga okalu̱gha mu etaka
kandi olikuuka mu etaka.”
Adamu aaluka mukali̱ wee li̱i̱na Eeva, nanga niiye aaghendagha kufooka ni̱na boona abaakaaye.
Luhanga aakolela Adamu na mukali̱ wee byaku̱lu̱wala ku̱lu̱gha mu mpu kandi aabalu̱wi̱ka.

Luhanga aaghila ati, “Endindi muntu aafooki̱ye omui nga etu̱we, aamani̱ye kilungi kandi kibhi. Nahabweki takili kilungi eye kwi̱dha mukono kukobha ki̱ghu̱ma kya kiti kya bwomi̱i̱li̱ kukiliya kandi abe mwomi̱i̱li̱ bilo nʼebilo.”
Nahabweki
Luhanga aabhinga musaasa mu musili ghwa Edeni̱ kughenda kukola haa etaka hambali aakoleeu̱we.
Haanu̱ma ya kumubhingamu, aata bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa musili ghwa Edeni̱ bakelu̱bbi̱ abaakalagha bakwete bihiyo bikwaka enu̱ma nʼomu maaso kulinda kihanda eki̱ghendi̱ye haa kiti kya bwomi̱i̱li̱.
Adamu aalangaala na mukali̱ wee Eeva, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱li̱ya etundu, aabyala Kai̱ni̱. Eeva aaghila ati, “Haabwa bu̱kooneli̱ bwa
, naaleeti̱ye muntu munsi.”
Haanu̱ma, aatodha aabyala Abbeli̱.
Abbeli̱ aaba mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya wa ntaama, Kai̱ni̱ aaba mu̱li̱mi̱.
Bwile bwahi̱ka Kai̱ni̱ aaleeta bimui haa bintu ebi ali aheli̱ye mu etaka kubihongela
Bhaatu Abbeli̱ aaleeta mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa ntaama siye eghi enoneeye kimui.
aadheedhuwa haabwa kihonguwa kya Abbeli̱,
bhaatu ataadheedhuwa na Kai̱ni̱ hamui na kihonguwa kiye. Du̱mbi̱ Kai̱ni̱ aasaaliluwa, haali̱i̱so yee eekunaku̱na.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Kai̱ni̱ ati, “Osaaluuwe nangaaki? Eki̱leki̱ye haali̱i̱so akwekunaku̱ni̱ye nkiki?
Nuwaakoli̱ye eki̱hi̱ki̱ye, buuye tabaku̱ku̱si̱i̱ma? Bhaatu nuwaasaaghu̱u̱we kukola eki̱hi̱ki̱ye, kibhi kikuba kikuli haai-haai, nkibbala kukutwali̱li̱ja, bhaatu okulaghiluwa kukilema.”
Niibuwo Kai̱ni̱ aaghi̱li̱ye waani̱na wee Abbeli̱ ati, “Tughende mu musili.” Banali mu musili eghi, Kai̱ni̱ aaghwilikiilila waani̱na wee Abbeli̱, aamwita.
aaghila Kai̱ni̱ ati, “Wanjoko waawe Abbeli̱ ali haa?”
Kai̱ni̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Tanimani̱ye bbaa. Buuye ni̱i̱si̱ye mu̱li̱ndi̱ wa mwana wamaaha?”
aamughila ati, “Waakoli̱ye kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kitiyo nangaaki? Otegheeleli̱ye! Saghama ya wanjoko waawe niibuwo yandiliilila ku̱lu̱gha mu etaka niikuwo nkufubile.
Endindi naaku̱ki̱i̱ni̱ye kandi waabhi̱ngu̱u̱we haa etaka lini, eli waaseesi̱yʼo saghama ya wanjoko waawe oghu waati̱ye.
Noobu olakolagha haa etaka lini, talilakweleli̱yagha bilimuwa kandi okumala bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe bwona munsi noolalanga kitiyo-kitiyo.”
Kai̱ni̱ aakuukamu
ati, “Kifubilo kyanje kyahingulaane, tankukigubha.
Obwalo olimambhinga hani kandi na mu maaso ghaawe, nkutandika kulalanga kitiyo-kitiyo munsi, ti̱ weena oghu akaakumbona akunjita.”
Bhaatu
aamughila ati, “Taaniikuwo kikuba bbaa, muntu weena oghu alikwita, akubona-bona ku̱ku̱saali̱ya milundi musanju̱.” Du̱mbi̱
aatʼo Kai̱ni̱ kaakulolelʼo, niikuwo muntu naanamusangaane, atamwita.
Kai̱ni̱ aalu̱gha mu maaso ghaa
, aaghenda aakala mu kyalo kya Noodi̱,
bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa musili ghwa Edeni̱.
Kai̱ni̱ aalangaala na mukali̱ wee, aaku̱li̱ya, aabyala mwana baamuluka li̱i̱na Enoka. Bwile obu Kai̱ni̱ aakwelagha kibugha, aakiluka li̱i̱na lya mutabani̱ wee Enoka.
Enoka aabyala Ilaadi̱, Ilaadi̱ aabyala Mekuyaali̱, Mekuyaali̱ aabyala Metu̱sayeeli̱, Metu̱sayeeli̱ aabyala Lameeki̱.
Lameeki̱ aaswela bakali̱ babili, omui li̱i̱na liye Aada, nʼonji li̱i̱na liye Jiila.
Aada aabyala Yabbaali̱, oghu akaba taata wa abaakalagha mu weema, bali bali̱i̱si̱ya baa bisolo.
Li̱i̱na lya waani̱na wee niiye akaba ali Yubbaali̱. Yubbaali̱ niiye akaba ali taata wa boona abaabaagha bateeli̱ baa maali̱kembe na ndele.
Jiila mukali̱ wee onji aabyala mwana wabusaasa, baamuluka li̱i̱na Tubbaali̱-kai̱ni̱. Tubbaali̱-kai̱ni̱ niiye aawiisagha bintu ku̱lu̱gha mu byoma. Mwani̱na Tubbaali̱-kai̱ni̱ baamughilaghamu Naama.
Kilo kimui Lameeki̱ aaghila bakali̱ be Aada na Jiila ati,
“Mu̱tegheeleli̱ye enu̱we bakali̱ banje,
mu̱u̱ghu̱we bighambo byanje.
Naati̱ye musaasa haabwa kumputaali̱ya,
mutabhana oghu amputaai̱ye.
Oghu akwita Kai̱ni̱ alaba naafubiluwa milundi musanju̱,
oghu aliita Lameeki̱ alifubiluwa milundi nsanju̱ na musanju̱.”

Adamu aatodha aalangaala na mukali̱ wee, aabyala mwana wabusaasa kandi Eeva aamuluka li̱i̱na Seeji̱, elikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu, “Luhanga aatodhi̱ye kumpa mwana onji mu ki̱i̱kalo kya Abbeli̱, oghu Kai̱ni̱ aati̱ye.”
Seeji̱ naye aabyala mwana wabusaasa, baamuluka li̱i̱na Enosi̱. Bwile obu niibuwo bantu baatandikiiyemu kulami̱ya
Eni niiyo nsoboolola ya baasukulu baa Adamu. Obu Luhanga aahangi̱ye muntu, akamuhanga mu kusasaana kuwe eenini.
Aahanga musaasa na mukali̱ kandi aabaha mu̱gi̱sa. Obu aabahangi̱ye aabaghilamu “muntu.”
Obu Adamu aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 130, aabyala mwana amu̱su̱si̱ye kandi mu kususa kuwe kwonini, aamuluka li̱i̱na liye Seeji̱.
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱byala Seeji̱, Adamu aatodha aamala myaka 800 munsi kandi aabyala batabani̱ na bahala be banji.
Adamu aamala munsi myaka 930, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
Obu Seeji̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 105, aabyala Enosi̱.
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱byala Enosi̱, Seeji̱ aatodha aamala munsi myaka 807 kandi aabyala batabani̱ na bahala be banji.
Seeji̱ aamala munsi myaka 912, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
Obu Enosi̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 90, aabyala Kenaani̱.
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱byala Kenaani̱, Enosi̱ aatodha aamala myaka 815 kandi aabyala batabani̱ na bahala be banji.
Enosi̱ aamala munsi myaka 905, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
Obu Kenaani̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 70, aabyala Mahalaleeli̱.
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱byala Mahalaleeli̱, Kenaani̱ aatodha aamala munsi myaka 840 kandi aabyala batabani̱ na bahala be banji.
Kenaani̱ aamala myaka 910 munsi, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
Obu Mahalaleeli̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 65, aabyala Yaledi̱.
Aamali̱ye ku̱byala Yaledi̱, Mahalaleeli̱ aatodha aamala myaka 830 kandi aabyala batabani̱ na bahala be banji.
Mahalaleeli̱ aamala munsi myaka 895, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
Obu Yaledi̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 162, aabyala Enoka.
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱byala Enoka, Yaledi̱ aatodha aamala myaka 800 munsi kandi aabyala batabani̱ na bahala be banji.
Yaledi̱ aamala munsi myaka 962, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
Obu Enoka aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 65, aabyala Metu̱seela.
Obu aamali̱ye ku̱byala Metu̱seela, Enoka aaheeleli̱ya Luhanga kumala myaka 300 kandi aabyala batabani̱ na bahala be banji.
Enoka aamala munsi myaka 365.
Enoka aaheeleli̱ya Luhanga, nahabweki taatodhi̱ye aboneka, nanga Luhanga akamutwala.
Obu Metu̱seela aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 187, aabyala Lameeki̱.
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱byala Lameeki̱, Metu̱seela aatodha aamala munsi myaka 782 kandi aabyala batabani̱ na bahala be banji.
Metu̱seela aamala munsi myaka 969, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
Obu Lameeki̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 182, aabyala mwana wabusaasa,
aamuluka li̱i̱na Nuha, du̱mbi̱ aamughila ati, “Aku̱tu̱hu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya mu kukola kandi mu kusaaliluwa kwa kukola na mikono yaatu ekikuleetelejebuwa etaka eli
aaki̱i̱ni̱ye.”
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱byala Nuha, Lameeki̱ aamala munsi myaka 595 kandi aabyala batabani̱ na bahala be banji.
Lameeki̱ aamala munsi myaka 777, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
Obu Nuha aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 500, aabyala Seemu, Haamu, na Yafeesi̱.
Obu bantu beeyongeeye kukana munsi kandi mbaabyala baana baabukali̱ bakani̱ye,
baana baa Luhanga
baabona bahala baa bantu aba basemeeye, baatandika kuswela oghu abadheedhi̱ye.
Du̱mbi̱
aaghila ati, “Mwoyo ghwanje oghukuhaagha bantu aba bwomi̱i̱li̱ taghukubaakalamu bilo byona bbaa. Ku̱lu̱gha endindi taaliyo oghu akuba mwomi̱i̱li̱ kusaali̱ya haa myaka 120.”

Obu batabani̱ baa Luhanga baasweye bahala baa bantu, baatandika kubabyalʼo baana abaafooki̱ye bantu baamaani̱ munsi omu. Bantu baamaani̱ aba baabaghilaghamu Banefi̱li̱, bakabʼo bwile obu kandi na haanu̱ma ya bwile obu, ti̱ bakaba bamanu̱u̱we munu.
aabona ngoku bubhi bwa bantu bwahingulaane munsi kandi ngoku bakuukalagha bwile bwona mbeeli̱li̱kanʼo bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye mu mitima yabo.
aasaaliluwa ekyaleki̱ye aakola muntu kumuta munsi kandi aasaaliluwa munu mu mutima ghuwe.
Nahabweki

aaghila ati, “Nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya munsi bantu boona aba naahangi̱ye, nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu boona, bisolo byona, bihanguwa byona ebikwekuluulilagha hansi, na noni̱ syomu mwanya, nanga nasaaluuwe ekyaleki̱ye naabihanga.”
Bhaatu
aaghilila Nuha ngughuma.
Bini niibiyo ebikwetʼo Nuha.
Nuha akaba ali musaasa ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, akaba atali na kabhi koona mu bantu baa bwile obu kandi aaheeleli̱yagha Luhanga.
Nuha akaba ali na batabani̱ be basatu: Seemu, Haamu, na Yafeesi̱.
Bwile obu bantu bakaba babhiihiiye kimui mu maaso ghaa Luhanga kandi nsi ekaba eesuliiyemu kimui bubhi.
Luhanga aabona ngoku nsi yoona yaabhiihiiye kimui, nanga bantu baa munsi boona bakaba baasuliiye kimui bubhi mu milingo ekani̱ye.
Niibuwo Luhanga aaghi̱li̱ye Nuha ati, “Nkughenda kumalʼo bantu boona, nanga nsi yaabhiihiiye kimui haabwabo. Majima kuwo nkughenda kumalʼo nsi yoona na bantu abaghilimu.
Nahabweki weekolele bwati̱ bwa mbaau si̱gu̱mi̱ye, otemu bisiika kandi obusiighe kuluudu hanja na mukati ku̱bu̱gu̱mi̱ya.
Ghuni niighuwo mulingo obhonganuuwe kubukolelamu: Kujamba kwabuwo kube fu̱u̱ti̱ 450, kugbaatikana kube fu̱u̱ti̱ 75 kandi kukangama kube fu̱u̱ti̱ 45.
Obutʼo lusui, oti̱ghʼo mwanya ghwa i̱nci̱ 18 haagati ya lusui olu hamui na bwati̱ obu. Ote mulyango mu maakpengbu̱ ghaabuwo, obufoole bwa kai̱na esatu kukangama.
Ndimaghenda ku̱tu̱ngeeli̱ya maasi munsi yoona ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bu̱li̱ kantu akalimu. Nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bu̱li̱ kihanguwa kyomi̱i̱li̱ munsi. Bu̱li̱ kintu kyona ekili munsi kikuhwelekeelela.
Bhaatu ndimakola ndaghaano naawe nti okutaaha mu bwati̱ omu na mukali̱ waawe, baana baawe, hamui na bagholi baawe kandi nkubalinda kusemeeye.
Okutaaha mu bwati̱ obu na bihanguwa byona byomi̱i̱li̱ bibili bibili, kyabusaasa na kyabukali̱, niikuwo bibe byomi̱i̱li̱ hamui naawe.
Otemu bibili haa bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa noni̱, bisolo, hamui na byona ebikwekuluulilagha hansi, niikuwo bibe byomi̱i̱li̱ hamui naawe.
Otemu bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa byokuliya byona ebikuliibuwagha haaliibiyo enu̱we nabiyo mwaliyagha.”
Nuha aakola bu̱li̱ kintu kulungi kusighikila ngoku Luhanga aamulaghiiye.
aaghila Nuha ati, “Otaahe mu bwati̱, uwe na ka yaawe yoona, nanga nuuwe naaboone ohi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu mujo ghwa bantu ghuni.
Otwale bisolo musanju̱ byabusaasa na musanju̱ byabukali̱ haa bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa bisolo byeli̱ye.
Kandi otwale kisolo kimui kyabusaasa na kimui kyabukali̱ haa bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa bisolo bitasemeeye.
Otemu noni̱ musanju̱ syabusaasa na musanju̱ syabukali̱ haa bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa noni̱, niikuwo biikale binali byomi̱i̱li̱ munsi.
Bilo musanju̱ ku̱lu̱gha endindi, nkusindika mbu̱la munsi kumala bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa, mukilo na ntangaali̱ kandi nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bu̱li̱ kintu eki naahangi̱ye ekili hansi.”
Nuha aakola byona ebi
aamulaghiiye.
Bwile obu maasi agha ghaatungeeye munsi, Nuha akaba ali na myaka 600 ya bukulu.
Nuha na mukali̱ wee, baana be, hamui na bagholi be boona baataaha mu bwati̱ obu kuuluka maasi agha.
Bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa bisolo byeli̱ye na bi̱teeli̱ye, noni̱ kandi na bihanguwa ebikwekuluulilagha hansi,
byabukali̱ na byabusaasa, byasa hambali Nuha ali kandi byataaha mu bwati̱ kusighikila ngoku Luhanga aalaghiiye Nuha.
Haanu̱ma ya bilo musanju̱, du̱mbi̱ maasi ghaatungeela munsi.
Mu mwaka ghwa 600 ghwa bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa Nuha, byokweli̱ eku̱mi̱ na musanju̱, kweli̱ kwakabili, kilo eki mwanya ghwona ghwaghulika nga maadi̱li̱sa.
Mbu̱la yaatandika kutoona munsi kumala bilo 40 mukilo na ntangaali̱.
Kilo eki kyonini, Nuha na mukali̱ wee, batabani̱ be Seemu, Haamu na Yafeesi̱, na bagholi be baataaha mu bwati̱ omu.
Baataahamu na bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa bisolo bya mu kisaka, na bya mu maka. Bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa bisolo ebikwekuluulilagha hansi, bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa noni̱, na byona ebili na mapapa.
Bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwa bihanguwa byomi̱i̱li̱ byasa hambali Nuha ali, byataaha mu bwati̱ omu.
Bisolo bya bu̱li̱ mulingo ebyataahaghamu, bikaba bili kyabusaasa na kyabukali̱, kusighikila ngoku Luhanga aalaghiiye Nuha. Du̱mbi̱
aabaghaalilamu.
Mbu̱la yaatoona kumala bilo 40, obu maasi gheeyongeeye kutungeela, ghaatandika kwi̱dha bwati̱ obu hansi.
Maasi gheeyongeleela kimui, ghaasula nsi yoona, bwati̱ obu bwatandika kughendela haagu̱u̱li̱ ya maasi agha.
Maasi ghaakanila kimui munsi, myena ekangamiiye kimui ya munsi yoona yaameluwa.
Maasi ghaakanila kimui ghaamela myena yoona kusaali̱ya fu̱u̱ti̱ 20.
Bu̱li̱ kintu kyona ekyabungilagha hansi kyahwelekeelela: noni̱, bisolo, binyama, bisolo byona ebikwekuluulilagha hansi, na bantu.
Bu̱li̱ kintu kyona haa etaka lyomi̱ye ekyabaagha kyomi̱i̱li̱ kyaku̱wa.

Bu̱li̱ kintu kyona hansi kyahwelekeelela: bantu kandi bisolo, bihanguwa byona ebyekuluulilagha haa etaka, hamui na noni̱ syomu mwanya, byona byahwelekeelela munsi. Nuha enkaha, na abaabaagha naye mu bwati̱, niibo baati̱ghaayʼo.
Maasi ghaatungeela munsi kumala bilo 150.

Luhanga aakala anaasu̱ki̱ye Nuha hamui na bisolo byona bya mu kisaka na bya mu maka ebi aabaabaagha nabiyo mu bwati̱. Nahabweki Luhanga aaleeta mwegha kuhunga munsi, du̱mbi̱ maasi agha ghaatandika kukeeha.
Luhanga aaghalila bihulu mu etaka hambali maasi ghaalu̱ghagha kwisa munsi. Aatodha aaghalila mwanya, mbu̱la yaaleka kutoona.
Maasi agha ghaamala bilo 150 nganakeeha bukee-buke.
Byokweli̱ eku̱mi̱ na musanju̱, kweli̱ kwamusanju̱ kwa mwaka oghu, niibuwo bwati̱ obu bwasu̱ndu̱ki̱ye bwaki̱dha haa mwena ya Alalaati̱.
Maasi agha ghaakala nganakeeha ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kibanja kweli̱ kweku̱mi̱ kwa mwaka oghu, du̱mbi̱ busonga bwa mwena nabuwo bwatandika kuboneka.
Haanu̱ma ya bilo 40, Nuha aaghula di̱li̱sa eli aabaabaagha ataaye haa bwati̱ haala,
du̱mbi̱ aatwesi̱ya mu bwati̱ obu kinamungoogha, kyakala nki̱neeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya eghulu ya maasi agha ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ghaahoneeye kimui hansi.
Aatodha aatumayo ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo kughenda kulola maasi ghalakaba ngoomi̱ye.

Bhaatu ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo eki obu kyatooye hanja, takyagu̱bhi̱ye kutunga hambali kikwemilila, nanga kyalo kyona kikaba kili maasi ghonkaha, du̱mbi̱ kyakuuka haa bwati̱ hambali Nuha ali. Nuha aakwata ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo eki, aaki̱ku̱u̱ki̱ya mu bwati̱.
Nuha aalindʼo haabwa bilo musanju̱, du̱mbi̱ aatodha aatwesi̱ya ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo eki mu bwati̱.
Kyakuuka lwagholo, ki̱neni̱ye mu kanu̱wa kibabi kyakisika kibisi kya kiti oli̱va. Nuha aamanya ngoku maasi ghakwete kukeeha.
Aatodha aalindʼo bilo binji musanju̱, aatodha aatumayo ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo eki, dhelu obu kitaakuuka.

Obu Nuha aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 601 ya bukulu, kibanja kya kweli̱ kwokubanja kwa mwaka ghuyaaka oghu, maasi ghoona ghakaba ngoomi̱ye haa etaka. Niibuwo Nuha aabbu̱u̱ku̱u̱ye ekyabaagha haa lusui lwa bwati̱ obu, aabona ngoku maasi ghaamali̱ye kwoma haa etaka.
Byokweli̱ abili na musanju̱, kweli̱ kwakabili kwa mwaka oghu, etaka lyona likaba limali̱ye kwomela kimui.
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aaghila Nuha ati,
“Olu̱ghe mu bwati̱ omu na mukali̱ waawe, baana baawe, hamui na bagholi baawe.
Otwesi̱yemu bu̱li̱ kihanguwa kyona kyomi̱i̱li̱ ekilimu naawe: noni̱, bisolo, na bihanguwa byona ebikwekuluulilagha hansi, niikuwo bibyalukane munsi kandi bikanilemu kimui.”
Nahabweki Nuha aatuwamu na mukali̱ wee, baana be, hamui na bagholi be.
Bisolo na bihanguwa byona ebikwekuluulilagha hansi, hamui na noni̱, byona byatuwa mu bwati̱ omu bu̱li̱ ki̱bbu̱la kusighikila mu mulingo ghwakiyo.
Du̱mbi̱ Nuha aakwela kyakuhongelʼo
, aatwala bimui haa bisolo na noni̱ byeli̱ye, aabihongelʼo nga bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye.
Kusasa kwa bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye ebi kwadheedha
kandi aaghila ati, “Tanditodha kukiina etaka haabwa muntu, nankabha mutima ghuwe ghubhiihiiye kimui ku̱lu̱gha mu bwana. Tanditodha ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bihanguwa byomi̱i̱li̱ byona ngoku naakoli̱ye.
“Ngoku nsi enaliyo,
bwile bwa kuhela na kukesa,
bwa kituumo na bwa mpeu,
bwa musana na bwa mbu̱la,
mukilo na ntangaali̱, tabilihuwʼo.”
Niibuwo Luhanga aahaaye Nuha na batabani̱ be mu̱gi̱sa, naaghila ati, “Mu̱byale, mukane kandi mu̱u̱su̱li̱ye nsi yoona.
Bisolo byona, noni̱ syona, bisolo byona ebikwekuluulilagha hansi kandi na nsu̱i̱ syona bikuboobaha. Naabahaaye bu̱li̱ kihanguwa kuba hansi ya bu̱toki̱ bwanu.
Bu̱li̱ kintu kyona kyomi̱i̱li̱ kandi ekikubungagha kikuba byokuliya byanu. Ngoku naabahaaye bilimuwa bya ki̱si̱ka kibisi kubiliya, endindi ndimabaha bu̱li̱ kintu kyona.
“Bhaatu mutaliyagha nyama eghi enalimu saghama, nanga bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa kisolo buli mu saghama yakiyo.
Kandi ndifubila muntu weena oghu aliita muunakiye. Ti̱ kinyama kya mu kisaka nkyati̱ye muntu, kikulaghiluwa nakiyo bakiite. Kandi muntu weena oghu akwita muunakiye naye bamwite.
“Weena oghu akwita muntu muunakiye,
naye aliitibuwa muntu onji,
nanga muntu akahanguwa
mu kususa kwa Luhanga.
Bhaatu enu̱we, mu̱byalukane kandi mukane, mukanile kimui munsi kandi mughikanemu.”
Niibuwo Luhanga aaghi̱li̱ye Nuha na batabani̱ be ati,
“Ndimakola endindi ndaghaano naanu kandi na baasukulu baanu haanu̱ma yaanu,
hamui na bihanguwa byona byomi̱i̱li̱: noni̱, bisolo bya mu maka, binyama byona byʼomu kisaka, bu̱li̱ kintu kyomi̱i̱li̱ ekyalu̱ghi̱ye mu bwati̱, ekili naanu munsi.
Ndimakola ndaghaano naanu: Tanditodha ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bwomi̱i̱li̱ ni̱nkoleesi̱ya maasi kandi taalitodha kubʼo maasi ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya nsi.”
Luhanga aaghila ati, “Kani niiko kaakulolelʼo kaa ndaghaano eghi ndimakola haagati yaanu kandi nanje na bu̱li̱ kihanguwa kyona ekili naanu, ndaghaano ya mijo yoona eghi ekubʼo.
Naataaye kiikilima kyanje mu bicu kandi niikiyo kakuba kaakulolelʼo kaa ndaghaano haagati yanje na bihanguwa byomi̱i̱li̱ munsi.
Ndakaleetagha bicu eghulu kandi kiikilima nkyabonekamu,
ndaasukagha ndaghaano haagati yanje kandi naanu hamui na bihanguwa bya bu̱li̱ mulingo. Taalitodha kubʼo maasi kutungeela munsi ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bwomi̱i̱li̱.
Kiikilima kilakabonekagha mu bicu, ndakibonagha niisukaghe ndaghaano eni eghi etalihuwʼo haagati yanje Luhanga na bihanguwa byona ebili hansi.”
Niibuwo Luhanga aaghi̱li̱ye Nuha ati, “Kiikilima eki niikiyo kaakulolelʼo kaa ndaghaano naakoli̱ye haagati yanje na bihanguwa byona byomi̱i̱li̱ ebili hansi.”
Batabani̱ baa Nuha abaalu̱ghi̱ye mu bwati̱ niibo Seemu, Haamu na Yafeesi̱. (Haamu niiye akaba ese wa Kanaani̱.)
Aba niibo baabaagha batabani̱ basatu baa Nuha kandi bantu boona abali munsi ni baasukulu baabo.
Nuha akaba ali mu̱li̱mi̱, aahela musili ghwa mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱.
Kilo kimui aanuwa haa vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi ekalu̱ghamu, aatamiila du̱mbi̱ aalangaala mu weema yee ali muhina.
Obu Haamu, ese wa Kanaani̱, aataahi̱yemu naabona muhina ghwa ese wee, aatuwa, aaghenda aaghambila baghenji̱ be.
Bhaatu Seemu na Yafeesi̱ baata kyaku̱mu̱swi̱ka haa mabegha ghaabo, baataahamu ki̱neenu̱-nu̱ma, baaki̱swi̱ka esebo. Baakala banaloli̱ye luhande lunji niikuwo batabona muhina ghwa esebo.
Obu Nuha aasu̱su̱mu̱ki̱ye, naamanya eki mwana wee wʼobuto aakoli̱ye,
aaghila ati,
“Kanaani̱ akiinuwe!
Akuba mu̱syana asembi̱yeyo
wa baanakiye.”
Aatodha aaghila ati,
“Asi̱i̱mu̱we
, Luhanga wa Seemu!
Kanaani̱ aabe mu̱syana wa Seemu.
Luhanga ahe Yafeesi̱ kyalo kikani̱ye,
Yafeesi̱ aakalaghe mu weema sya Seemu
kandi Kanaani̱ aabe mu̱syana wee.”
Haanu̱ma ya maasi kutungeela munsi, Nuha aatodha aamala myaka 350.
Nuha aamala myaka yoona 950, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
Bani niibo baasukulu baa Nuha, aba batabani̱ be Seemu, Haamu, na Yafeesi̱ baabyaye haanu̱ma ya maasi kutungeela munsi.
Batabani̱ baa Yafeesi̱ niibo bani:
Bani niibo baabaagha baataata baa bantu abaakalagha haa myalo hamui na bi̱i̱kalo bya mu maasi. Baabaghani̱jamu bu̱li̱ katu̱la mu mahanga ghaabo, kusighikila haa mi̱bu̱ghe yabo.
Ku̱u̱si̱ akaba ali dhee ese Ni̱mu̱loodi̱. Ni̱mu̱loodi̱ oghu akaba ali mulwani̱ wamaani̱.
aamubonagha ali mu̱hi̱i̱ghi̱ wamaani̱, niikiyo kyaleki̱ye baaghila bati, “Nga Ni̱mu̱loodi̱ mu̱hi̱i̱ghi̱ wamaani̱ wa
munsi.”
Akadu̱bha kulema bi̱i̱kalo mu Bbabbeeli̱, Eleki̱, Akadi̱, na Kalene mu ehanga lya Bbabbu̱looni̱ya.
Ku̱lu̱gha mu kyalo eki aaghenda mu Asi̱li̱ya, aakwelayo Ni̱neeva, Lehobboti̱-I̱la, Kala,
na Leseeni̱, eghi ekaba eli haagati ya Ni̱neeva na kibugha kiinamu̱li̱to Kala.
Mi̱si̱li̱ akaba ali taata wa  Balu̱di̱mu̱, Banami̱mu̱, Balehabbi̱mu̱, Banafu̱tu̱hi̱mu̱,
Bapasu̱lu̱si̱mu̱, Bakafu̱toli̱mu̱, na Bakasu̱lu̱hi̱mu̱. Kandi mu Bakasu̱lu̱hi̱mu̱ aba niimuwo aalu̱ghi̱ye Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱.
Kanaani̱ akaba ali ese wa  Si̱dooni̱ mu̱li̱ghaaso ghuwe. Kanaani̱ akaba ali dhee taata wa Bahi̱ti̱,
Bayebu̱si̱, Bamooli̱, Bagi̱li̱gasi̱,
Bahi̱vi̱, Baaleki̱, Basi̱i̱ni̱,
Baalivaadi̱, Bajemaali̱, na Bahamaati.  Haanu̱ma, Banakanaani̱ boona beehanjaaga.
Mitaano yabo yaatandikila Si̱dooni̱ kughendela kimui Gelaali̱, Gaja, Sodomu, Gomola, Adama, Jebbohi̱mu̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya Lasa.
Aba niibo baasukulu baa Haamu kusighikila haa bu̱tu̱la bwabo, mi̱bu̱ghe yabo, maka ghaabo, na mahanga ghaabo.
Seemu, mukulu wa Yafeesi̱, niiye akaba ali taata wa baasukulu baa Ebbeli̱ boona.
Yokitaani̱ niiye akaba ali taata wa  Alimodaadi̱, Seleefu, Hajali̱maave, Yeela,
Hadolaamu, Ujaali̱, Dikila,
Obbali̱, Abbi̱meeli̱, Sebba,
Ofi̱li̱, Havila, na Yobbaabbu. Bani boona bakaba bali baana baa Yokitaani̱.
Ki̱i̱kalo eki baakalaghamu kikaba kitandikiiye Meesa kughendela kimui Sefala mu kyalo kya bwena ekili bu̱lu̱gha ejooba.
Aba niibo batabani̱ baa Seemu kusighikila haa bu̱tu̱la bwabo, mi̱bu̱ghe yabo, nsi syabo, na mahanga ghaabo.
Aba niibo batabani̱ baa Nuha kusighikila mu ku̱byaluwa kwa baasukulu mu bantu baabo. Ku̱lu̱gha mu ebo, bantu baakanila kimui munsi haanu̱ma ya kutungeela kwa maasi munsi.
Haaku̱du̱bha munsi yoona hakaba halimu mu̱bu̱ghe ghumui ghwonkaha.
Obu bantu aba baaku̱lu̱ki̱ye kughenda bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, baaki̱dha mu kiigbete kyʼomu kyalo kya Bbabbu̱looni̱ya
baaghoonamu.

Baaghambilangana bati, “Muleke tubumbe matafaali kandi tu̱ghooki̱ye kusemeeye.” Nanga bwile obu baakoleesi̱ya matafaali mu ki̱i̱kalo kya mabaale kandi baatabula kuluudu egu̱mi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kya bulongo.
Kandi baaghambilangana bati, “Muleke twekwelele kibugha kandi tukwelemu ngbaali ekangamiiye kimui ku̱hi̱ka mu mwanya eghulu, niikuwo bantu batusinde kandi tuleke kuukala tuhanjikaane munsi.”
Bhaatu
aasu̱ndu̱ka, aasa kulola munsi kandi aabona kibugha eki hamui na ngbaali eghi bantu aba bakwete kukwela.
Aaghila ati, “Bantu bani ngoku baku̱bu̱ghagha mu̱bu̱ghe ghumui, kyona eki balahanuulagha kukola, balakikolagha.
Nahabweki muleke tughende munsi tutambulani̱yemu mu̱bu̱ghe ghwabo oghu mu mi̱bu̱ghe ekani̱ye, niikuwo baleke kukengangana.”
Du̱mbi̱
aasa aatambulani̱yamu mu̱bu̱ghe oghu aabahanjaaga munsi yoona, baaleka kukengangana kandi baaleka kukwela kibugha eki. Eki niikiyo kikulekagha kibugha eki bakighilaghilamu Bbabbeeli̱
nanga niiyo
aatambulani̱i̱yemu mu̱bu̱ghe ghwa bantu munsi yoona. Ti̱ ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu,
aabahanjaaga munsi yoona.
Du̱mbi̱
aasa aatambulani̱yamu mu̱bu̱ghe oghu aabahanjaaga munsi yoona, baaleka kukengangana kandi baaleka kukwela kibugha eki. Eki niikiyo kikulekagha kibugha eki bakighilaghilamu Bbabbeeli̱
nanga niiyo
aatambulani̱i̱yemu mu̱bu̱ghe ghwa bantu munsi yoona. Ti̱ ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu,
aabahanjaaga munsi yoona.
Bani niibo baasukulu baa Seemu. Haanu̱ma ya myaka ebili maasi ghaatungeeye kyalo kyona, obu Seemu aabaabaagha naahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 100 ya bukulu, aabyala Apakisaadi̱.
Seemu aamala myaka enji 500, mu myaka eghi aabyalilamu baana banji baabusaasa na baabukali̱.
Obu Apakisaadi̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 35 ya bukulu, aabyala Seela.
Apakisaadi̱ aamala myaka enji 403, mu myaka eghi aabyalilamu baana banji baabusaasa na baabukali̱.
Obu Seela aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 30 ya bukulu, aabyala Ebbeli̱.
Seela aamala myaka enji 430, mu myaka eghi aabyalilamu baana banji baabusaasa na baabukali̱.
Obu Ebbeli̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 34 ya bukulu, aabyala Peleegi̱.
Ebbeli̱ aamala myaka enji 430, mu myaka eghi aabyalilamu baana banji baabusaasa na baabukali̱.
Obu Peleegi̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 30 ya bukulu, aabyala Leeu.
Peleegi̱ aamala myaka enji 209, mu myaka eghi aabyalilamu baana banji baabusaasa na baabukali̱.
Obu Leeu aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 32 ya bukulu, aabyala Selu̱gi̱.
Leeu aamala myaka enji 207, mu myaka eghi aabyalilamu baana banji baabusaasa na baabukali̱.
Obu Selu̱gi̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 30 ya bukulu, aabyala Naholi̱.
Selu̱gi̱ aamala myaka enji 200, mu myaka eghi aabyalilamu baana banji baabusaasa na baabukali̱.
Obu Naholi̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 29 ya bukulu, aabyala Teela.
Naholi̱ aamala myaka enji 119, mu myaka eghi aabyalilamu baana banji baabusaasa na baabukali̱.
Obu Teela aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 70 ya bukulu, aabyala Ebbulaamu, Naholi̱, na Halaani̱.
Baasukulu baa Teela niibo bani: Teela aabyala Ebbulaamu, Naholi̱, na Halaani̱. Halaani̱ aabyala Looti̱.
Halaani̱ aadu̱bha ku̱kwi̱la ese wee Teela. Aakwi̱la mu kibugha kya Ula mu kyalo kya Bakaladi̱ya hambali baamu̱byaliiye.
Ebbulaamu na Naholi̱ bombi baaswela. Mukali̱ wa Ebbulaamu baamughilaghamu Salaai̱ kandi mukali̱ wa Naholi̱ baamughilaghamu Milika. Milika na muto wee I̱si̱ka bakaba bali bahala baa Halaani̱.
Salaai̱ akaba atali na mwana, nanga akaba ali ngumba.

Teela aatu̱wamu ku̱lu̱gha mu kibugha kya Ula kughenda kuukala mu kyalo kya Bakaladi̱ya. Aatwala mutabani̱ wee Ebbulaamu, muusukulu wee Looti̱ mutabani̱ wa Halaani̱. Aatwala mugholi wee Salaai̱ mukaa mutabani̱ wee Ebbulaamu oghu. Boona baalu̱gha mu kibugha kya Ula mu kyalo kya Bakaladi̱ya, baatandika kughenda mu nsi ya Kanaani̱. Bhaatu obu baaki̱dhi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Halaani̱, baaghoonamu.
Mu tau̱ni̱ ya Halaani̱ eghi, niiyo Teela aakwi̱li̱i̱ye naahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 205 ya bukulu.
aaghila Ebbulaamu ati, “Olu̱ghe mu ehanga lya ewaanu, mu nganda syawe kandi na mu ka ya so waawe, oghende mu nsi eghi nkukwoleka.
Nkukuha baasukulu bakaniiye kimui, nkufoole ehanga lyamaani̱, nkukuha mu̱gi̱sa kandi ndeke bantu bakani̱ye bakumanye kandi haabwawe batunge mu̱gi̱sa.
Boona abakukukola kulungi nanje nkubaha mu̱gi̱sa. Bhaatu nkukiina boona abakukukola kubhi. Kandi haabwawe nkuha bantu boona baa munsi mu̱gi̱sa.”
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulaamu aalu̱ghayo, ngoku
aamughambiiye, na Looti̱ aaghenda hamui naye. Ebbulaamu obu aalu̱ghagha Halaani̱, akaba ali na myaka 75.
Aatwala mukali̱ wee Salaai̱, muuhuwa wee Looti̱, etungo lyabo, hamui na bantu boona aba baatungiiye Halaani̱, baaghenda Kanaani̱.
Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye e Kanaani̱, baakwamila mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, baaki̱dha Sekeemu hambali kiti ki̱i̱looku̱ kya Moole kyabaagha, baakalayo. Bwile obu Banakanaani̱ nabo dhee bakaba baakaaye mu kyalo eki.
aabonekela Ebbulaamu kandi aamughila ati, “Lini niiliyo ehanga eli nkuha baasukulu baawe.” Nahabweki Ebbulaamu aakwela hambali
aamubonekeeye haala kyakuhongelʼo
bihonguwa.

Haanu̱ma yʼebi, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aahona mu kyalo kya eku̱wa kyʼomu kyalo kya bwena bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa kibugha kya Bbeeseeli̱ kandi aakwela weema siye mu kyalo eki. Bbeteeli̱ yaabaagha bughuwa ejooba bwakiyo kandi na kibugha kya Aai̱ kili bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwakiyo. Mu kyalo eki aakwelamu dhee kyakuhongelʼo
bihonguwa kandi aalami̱ya
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulaamu aamu̱ki̱ya kughenda Negeebbu.
Njala yamaani̱ yaaghuwa mu kyalo Kanaani̱ eki, nahabweki Ebbulaamu aaghenda eku̱wa mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ kuukalayo haabwa bwile bukee.
Obu aabaabaagha ali haai ku̱ki̱dha mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ eli, aaghila mukali̱ wee Salaai̱ ati, “Nkimani̱ye ngoku oli mukali̱ asemeeye kwonini.
Banami̱si̱li̱ mbanakuboone, bakughila bati oli mukali̱ wanje. Du̱mbi̱ bakunjita bhaatu uwe bakukuleka ookalʼo.
Mbanaku̱bu̱u̱i̱ye, oghile oti oli mwani̱naasi̱ye, ti̱ uwe okuleka batanjita kandi bankole kusemeeye.”
Obu Ebbulaamu aaki̱dhi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱, bantu baayo baabona mukali̱ wee asemeeye kwonini.
Obu bamui mu bakulu baa mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Falaaho
baamuboone, baaghenda baamughambila ngoku mukali̱ oghu asemeeye kwonini. Du̱mbi̱ baatwala Salaai̱ mu kikaali kiye.
Haabwa Salaai̱ oghu, Falaaho aakola kulungi Ebbulaamu, aamuha ntaama, mbu̱li̱, nte, ndogooi̱ kandi na ngamila sikani̱ye. Aamuha dhee na basyana bakani̱ye.
Bhaatu
aaleka Falaaho na ka yee yoona baalwala ndwala sya kabhi munu haabwa Salaai̱, mukali̱ wa Ebbulaamu.
Niibuwo Falaaho oghu aabilikiiye Ebbulaamu, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Wankoli̱ye otiyo nangaaki? Nkiki kyaleki̱ye otangambila ngoku Salaai̱ ali mukali̱ waawe?
Nkiki kyaleki̱ye waaghila oti ni mwanjoko waawe kuleka niimuswela? Nahabweki mukali̱ waawe ngughu, omutwale kandi mughende.”
Du̱mbi̱ Falaaho aalaghila baasilikale be baahelekeeleli̱ya Ebbulaamu na mukali̱ wee Salaai̱, na ebi baabaagha nabiyo byona, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya baabatweseei̱ye mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Ebbulaamu na mukali̱ wee Salaai̱ baalu̱gha Mi̱si̱li̱ na byona ebi baabaagha nabiyo, baaghenda hamui na Looti̱ mu elungu lya Negeebbu.
Ebbulaamu akaba atungiiye kimui, ali na bisolo bikaniiye kimui kandi na sente
sikaniiye kimui.

Obu Ebbulaamu aalu̱ghi̱ye Negeebbu, aaghenda naanaghoona mu bi̱i̱kalo bya mbaghani̱ja ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu aaki̱dhi̱ye Bbeeseeli̱. Aaghoona mu ki̱i̱kalo ekili haagati ya tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeteeli̱ na ya Aai̱ hambali aabaabaagha adu̱bhi̱ye kughoona,
kandi hambali aadu̱bhi̱ye kukwela kyakuhongelʼo
bihonguwa. Du̱mbi̱ aalami̱li̱yʼo
Na Looti̱, oghu aaghendagha hamui na Ebbulaamu oghu, naye akaba ali na ntaama, mbu̱li̱, nte, hamui na maaweema.
Bhaatu ki̱i̱kalo eki takyagu̱bhi̱ye kubamala bombi, nanga bisolo byabo bikaba bikaniiye kimui kandi eki kitaabagu̱bhi̱i̱si̱ya kuukala hamui.
Bali̱i̱si̱ya baa bisolo bya Ebbulaamu baakala kutongana na bali̱i̱si̱ya baa bisolo bya Looti̱. Ti̱ bwile obu Banakanaani̱ na Bapeleeji̱ nabo bakaba baakaaye mu kyalo eki dhee.
Niibuwo Ebbulaamu aaghi̱li̱ye Looti̱ ati, “Tuleke kutongana kandi na bali̱i̱si̱ya baatu nabo baleke kutongana, nanga etu̱we boona tuli baani̱na emui.
Oleke tughabane kyalo kini etu̱we bombi, nuwaatwete luhande lwabumesu, si̱ye nkutwala lwabuliyo. Nuwaatwete lwabuliyo, si̱ye nkutwala lwabumesu.”
Looti̱ aalola aabona kyalo kyona kya kiigbete kya Yolodaani̱ kiisuuyemu maasi kandi kili nga musili ghwa
Edeni̱ kandi ki̱su̱si̱ye kyalo kya Mi̱si̱li̱, ekili haai na tau̱ni̱ ya Joola. (Eki kikabʼo
atakahwelekeleei̱ye bibugha kya Sodomu na Gomola.)
Baatambulanamu, Looti̱ aaghenda bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, aatwala kighona kya maasi Yolodaani̱ kyona.
Ebbulaamu aakala mu kyalo kya Kanaani̱, Looti̱ eye aakala mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaa mu kiigbete kya Yolodaani̱ kandi aakwela weema siye haai na kibugha kya Sodomu.
Ti̱ bantu baa Sodomu bakaba bali babhi munu, baakolagha bintu bibhiihiiye kimui mu maaso ghaa
Haanu̱ma ya Looti̱ kughenda,
aaghila Ebbulaamu ati, “Olole kyalo eki kyona ku̱lu̱gha hambali oli haala, olole eku̱wa na elughulu, bu̱lu̱gha ejooba na bughuwa ejooba bwakiyo.
Nkukuha kyalo eki kyona, uwe na baasukulu baawe bilo nʼebilo.
Nkukuha baasukulu bakaniiye kimui kandi nankabha muntu agubha kubala muhendo ghwa tu̱u̱tu̱ eghi eli hansi, ebo taakugubha kubabala bbaa.
Oghende, obungile mu kyalo eki kyona haa bu̱li̱ luhande lwakiyo, nanga nkughenda kukuha kiyo kyona.”
Nahabweki Ebbulaamu aaku̱lu̱ki̱ya weema siye, aaghenda aakala haai na tau̱ni̱ ya Hebbu̱looni̱ haai na biti bi̱i̱looku̱ bya musaasa li̱i̱na liye Mami̱le. Aakwelʼo kyakuhongelʼo
bihonguwa.
Bwile obu, Amulafeeli̱ mukama wa Sinala, Ali̱yoki̱ mukama wa Elasaali̱, Kadolamooli̱ mukama wa Elaamu, na Tidaali̱ mukama wa Gohi̱mu̱,
baaghenda kulwana na Bbeela mukama wa Sodomu, Bbelu̱sa wa Gomola, Sinaabbu wa Adama, Semebeeli̱ wa Jebbohi̱mu̱, hamui na mukama wa Bbeela. (Eghi baaghilaghamu Joola.)
Bakama aba boona beelungani̱ya hamui mu kighona kya Si̱di̱i̱mu̱, (haa maasi agha baaghilaghamu Nanja ya Kisula.)
Bakama aba bakaba bali hansi ya bu̱toki̱ bwa Mukama Kadolamooli̱ kumala myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼebili, bhaatu mu mwaka ghwa eku̱mi̱ nʼesatu boona baamujeemela.

Mu mwaka ghwa eku̱mi̱ nʼenaa, Kadolamooli̱ hamui na bakama banji abaabaagha bamu̱sembi̱ye baasa na baasilikale baabo baaghenda baalwana. Baasi̱ngu̱la Balefahi̱mu̱ mu Asi̱telosi̱ Kalanahi̱mu̱, na Baji̱ji̱mu̱ bʼomu Haamu, na Beemi̱mu̱ bʼomu Sava-ki̱li̱yasai̱mu̱,
na Bahooli̱ bʼomu kyalo kya bwena kya Seyi̱li̱. Baahumila kimui bantu aba baabahi̱ki̱ya Elipalaani̱ haai na elungu.
Du̱mbi̱ baakuuka, baasi̱ngu̱la kandi baalema bantu bʼomu Nemi̱si̱paati̱ (eghi baaghilaghamu Kadesi̱), baalema kyalo kyona kya Bamaleeki̱ na Bamooli̱ abaabaagha baakaaye Hajajooni̱ Tamala.
Niibuwo bakama wa Sodomu, wa Gomola, wa Adama, wa Jebbohi̱mu̱ hamui na wa Bbeela (eghi baaghilaghamu Joola) baaghendi̱ye mu kighona kya Si̱di̱i̱mu̱.
Baaghenda kulwana na Mukama Kadolamooli̱ wa Elaamu, Tidaali̱ wa Gohi̱mu̱, na Amulafeeli̱ wa Sinala, na Ali̱yoki̱ wa Elasaali̱. Bakama bbanaa bani baalwana na bakama bataano.
Kighona kya Si̱di̱i̱mu̱ kikaba kilimu bi̱i̱na ebyabaaghamu biisi bya bisaabo. Obu baasilikale baa bakama wa Sodomu na Gomola baalukagha baabyegengakakamu, abaati̱ghaayʼo baalukila mu myena.
Abaasi̱ngu̱u̱ye baatwala bintu byona ebyabaagha mu bibugha kya Sodomu na Gomola, hamui na byokuliya byabo byona, baaghenda nabiyo.
Baatwala Looti̱, muuhuwa wa Ebbulaamu, na etungo liye lyona, nanga naye akaba aakaaye mu kibugha kya Sodomu.

Bhaatu muntu omui oghu akaaluka haa bulemo haala, aaghenda aaghambila Ebbulaamu Muhebbulaayo oghu akaba aakaaye haai na biti bi̱i̱looku̱ bya musaasa li̱i̱na liye Mami̱le wʼomu ntu̱la ya Bamooli̱. Mami̱le akaba ali mwana waani̱na Esi̱kooli̱ na Anele. Banaani̱na emui basatu aba bakaba balaghaane na Ebbulaamu kukoonelangana naabaayʼo bulemo bwona.
Obu Ebbulaamu aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku baatwete muuhuwa wee Looti̱, aabilikila basaasa be 318 abamani̱ye kulwana, baalabha bakama bbanaa aba, baaki̱dhi̱la kimui mu tau̱ni̱ baaghilaghamu Daani̱.

Obu bwile bwali̱ye, Ebbulaamu aatambulani̱yamu basaasa be aba mu bi̱bbu̱la-bi̱bbu̱la, baatandika kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syabo esi mbalu̱gha mu mpande syona sya tau̱ni̱ eghi kandi baasi̱ngu̱la ngi̱ghu̱ syabo esi. Baabahumila kimui, baabahi̱ki̱ya Hobba elughulu ya kibugha kya Damasiko.
Ebbulaamu aayayo byona ebi baabaagha batwete. Aayayo dhee muuhuwa wee Looti̱, na etungo liye lyona, bakali̱, na bantu banji boona aba ngi̱ghu̱ syabo esi baabaagha batwete.

Obu Ebbulaamu aakuukagha ewe e ka haanu̱ma ya ku̱si̱ngu̱la ngi̱ghu̱ syabo baasilikale baa mukama Kadolamooli̱ na bakama banji abaabaagha naye, mukama wa Sodomu aaghenda kumusangaana mu kighona kya Sava (eki baaghilaghamu kighona kya mukama.)
Meli̱ki̱jedeki̱ mukama wa Saleemu kandi mu̱hongi̱ wa Luhanga wa Eghulu Munu, aaleetela Ebbulaamu mugaati̱ na vi̱i̱ni̱.
Aaha Ebbulaamu mu̱gi̱sa naaghila ati,
“Luhanga wa Eghulu Munu,
oghu akahanga eghulu na nsi, ahe Ebbulaamu oni mu̱gi̱sa.
Kandi bantu basinde Luhanga wa Eghulu Munu,
oghu aaleki̱ye waagubha ku̱si̱ngu̱la ngi̱ghu̱ syawe syona.”
Kandi Ebbulaamu aaha Meli̱ki̱jedeki̱ kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya bintu byona ebi aahi̱ye haa bulemo.
Niibuwo mukama wa Sodomu aaghi̱li̱ye Ebbulaamu ati, “Ompe bantu aba waahi̱ye mu kibugha kya ewanje Sodomu, bhaatu bintu binji byona, obitwale.”
Bhaatu Ebbulaamu aamukuukamu ati, “Ndimalahila mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga wa Eghulu Munu kandi oghu akahanga eghulu na nsi
nti, tankutwala kantu koona nankabha kahu̱u̱ji̱ kedha kaghuwo ka nkai̱to syawe. Nanga ninaakoli̱ye kuwo okughila oti nuuwe waaleki̱ye naaba muguudha.

Tandi na kantu koona aka si̱ye nkutwala haabwanje bbaa. Ebi nku̱si̱i̱ma nti naatwete ni ebi basaasa banje baaliiye. Bhaatu baanakyanje aba Anele, Esi̱kooli̱, na Mami̱le aba twaghendi̱ye nabo kulwana, oleke batwale ebi baahi̱yeyo ku̱lu̱gha mu ngi̱ghu̱ syatu.”
Haanu̱ma yʼebi,
aabonekela Ebbulaamu mu ndooti̱, aamughila ati,
“Ebbulaamu otoobaha,
ni̱i̱si̱ye ngabo yaawe
kandi nkukuha mpeela ekani̱ye kwonini.”
Ebbulaamu aaghila ati, “Ai̱
Luhanga, buuye mpeela okumpa ekunkoonela kantu koona? Bbaa, nanga tandi na mwana, ti̱ oghu aligwetuwa ebyanje ni Eli̱yeeja oghu alu̱ghi̱ye Damasiko.
Tawampaaye mwana, ti̱ oghu aligwetuwa ebyanje ni mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje Eli̱yeeja.”
Niibuwo
aatodhi̱ye aamughila ati, “Mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe Eli̱yeeja oghu taaniiye akugwetuwa ebyawe bbaa. Mwana waawe eenini niiye akugwetuwa ebyawe.”
aatwesi̱ya Ebbulaamu enja, aamughila ati, “Olole eghulu kandi olengʼo kubala muhendo ghwa nsooli̱ya esi, niikuwo okuba na baasukulu bakaniiye kimui batiyo.”
Ebbulaamu aahi̱ki̱li̱ja
, ti̱ Luhanga aamubala kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Niibuwo
aatodhi̱ye aamughila ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye
waawe oghu akakuuya mu kibugha kya Ula mu kyalo Kyabakaladi̱ya naakuha kyalo kini kuba kyawe.”
Bhaatu Ebbulaamu aaghila ati, “
Luhanga, si̱ye buuye nkumanya nti̱ya ngoku nkutwala kyalo kini kyona?”

aamughila ati, “Oghende ondeetele nte eghi eli na myaka esatu, bhughuma ya mbu̱li̱ eghi eli na myaka esatu, na ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi eli na myaka esatu. Ondeetele ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo hamui na kaana kaa kaapi̱i̱so.”
Ebbulaamu aaleetela bintu ebi byona, aata bisolo ebi kandi aabyati̱yamu bu̱li̱ kimui bihande bibili, aapanga hansi haa mpande ebili, bhaatu noni̱ siyo ataasyati̱yamu bihande bibili bbaa.
Bi̱noni̱ ebikuliyagha nyama byasu̱ndu̱kagha hansi kuliya nyama esi, Ebbulaamu aabibhingʼo.
Hambali musana ghwakotelagha haala, Ebbulaamu aaghwesaghiilila kimui, mweli̱ma ghwa kabhi ghwakwata hambali aabaabaagha, ti̱ oobahila kimui.

Luhanga aamughila ati, “Baasukulu baawe balitwaluwa mu ehanga litali lyabo, hambali bakuba baku̱lu̱ki̱. Baliba basyana baa bantu bʼomu ehanga eli kandi balitwalikani̱ya kubhi baasukulu baawe aba kumala myaka 400.
Bhaatu ndifubila bantu bʼomu ehanga abakufoola baasukulu baawe basyana kandi bali̱lu̱gha mu ehanga eli na buguudha bwamaani̱.
Uwe oliikalʼo okaakulile kimui, oku̱we onali mu bu̱si̱nge kandi bakujiike mu mulingo ghusemeeye.
Nahabweki mujo ghwa baasukulu baawe ghwakanaa niibo balikuuka mu kyalo kini, nanga bwile obu bubhi bwa Bamooli̱ buliba buhingulaane kandi bahi̱ki̱ye haa si̱ye kubafubila.”
Obu musana ghwakoti̱ye mweli̱ma ngwakwata, munagha ghukwete kucuukamu mwi̱ka na toci̱ yaaki̱ye byaboneka kandi byasaalila haagati ya bihande bya bisolo ebi.
Haa kilo eki
aakola ndaghaano na Ebbulaamu naaghila ati, “Naalaghaana kuha baasukulu baawe kyalo kini kyona ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la haa mutaano ghwa ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa maasi ghaanamu̱li̱to Efulaati̱,
kyalo kyona eki Banakeeni̱, Bakeneeji̱, Bakadu̱mooni̱,
Bahi̱ti̱, Bapeleeji̱, Balefahi̱mu̱,
Bamooli̱, Banakanaani̱, Bagi̱li̱gasi̱, hamui na Bayebu̱si̱ baakaayemu.”
Bwile obu, Salaai̱ mukali̱ wa Ebbulaamu akaba atamu̱byaliiye mwana nʼomui. Bhaatu akaba ali na mu̱syana wee alu̱ghi̱ye naye Mi̱si̱li̱, li̱i̱na liye Hagali̱.
Niibuwo Salaai̱ aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Si̱ye
taasi̱i̱mi̱ye ati nku̱byalile mwana. Oghende olangaale na mu̱syana wanje oghu, kedha eye angu̱byala mwana abe wanje.”
Ebbulaamu aasi̱i̱ma kukola eki mukali̱ wee Salaai̱ aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Nahabweki Salaai̱ aaha Ebbulaamu Hagali̱ Munami̱si̱li̱ kuba nga mukali̱ wee. Eki kikabʼo haanu̱ma ya Ebbulaamu kumala myaka eku̱mi̱ mu ehanga lya Kanaani̱.
Ebbulaamu aalangaala na Hagali̱ kandi Hagali̱ oghu aaku̱li̱ya. Obu aamani̱ye ngoku aku̱li̱i̱ye, aatandika kwepanka kandi kughaya mukama wee Salaai̱.

Niibuwo Salaai̱ aaghi̱li̱ye Ebbulaamu ati, “Hagali̱ kungaya atiyo ni musango ghwawe, nanga si̱ye neenini ni̱i̱si̱ye nkakuhaye, ti̱ ku̱lu̱gha aamani̱ye ngoku aku̱li̱i̱ye, aatandi̱ki̱ye kungaya. Ti̱ oleke
aliiye aatu̱twi̱lamu si̱ye naawe oghu aakoli̱ye eki̱hi̱ki̱ye.”

Ebbulaamu aamughila ati, “Oghu ni mu̱syana waawe kandi omuliyo bu̱toki̱, omukole ngoku obbali̱ye.” Du̱mbi̱ Salaai̱ aatandika kubona-boni̱ya mu̱syana wee Hagali̱ oghu, nahabweki Hagali̱ oghu aaluka kughenda.
Malai̱ka wa
aasanga Hagali̱ haa nsulo eghi ekaba eli mu elungu haakpengbu̱ ya luguudhe olwaghendagha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Suula.
Malai̱ka aamughila ati, “Hagali̱, mu̱syana wa Salaai̱, oku̱lu̱gha haa kandi okughenda haa?”
Hagali̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Niibuwo naaluka ku̱lu̱gha ewaa mukama wanje Salaai̱.”
Malai̱ka wa
aamughila ati, “Okuuke ewaa mukama waawe kandi omudhootele.”
Malai̱ka wa
aatodha aamughila ati, “Nkukuha baasukulu bakaniiye kimui kandi taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kubabala.”
Malai̱ka wa
eeyongela kughila Hagali̱ ati,
“Etundu eli oku̱li̱i̱ye eli
oku̱byalamu mwana wabusaasa.
Okumuluka li̱i̱na liye Sumai̱li̱
nanga
aaghu̱u̱ye
ngoku okwete kubona-bona.
“Mwana oghu akuba nga nguwe
kandi alahakani̱yagha bu̱li̱ muntu weena
kandi bantu bakani̱ye balamuhakani̱yagha
kandi akuukala hambali
aselaane na baghenji̱ be.”
Hagali̱ eebu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Kitimbiikaane si̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja nti naaboone
oghu akuukalagha amboone.” Nahabweki aaghilamu
oghu akabu̱gha li̱i̱na ati, “Luhanga oghu akubonagha byona.”
Niikiyo kikulekagha bantu baghilamu nsulo eghi eli haagati ya Kadesi̱ na Bbeledi̱ bati, “Nsulo ya Luhanga Mwomi̱i̱li̱ Oghu Amboone.”
Hagali̱ aabyala mwana wabusaasa, Ebbulaamu aamuluka li̱i̱na ati niiye Sumai̱li̱.
Bwile obu Ebbulaamu akaba ali na myaka 86 ya bukulu.
Obu Ebbulaamu aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 99 ya bukulu,
aamubonekela kandi aamughila ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni Luhanga wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona. Ompu̱ti̱ye kandi okolaghe ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye.
Nku̱gu̱mi̱ya ndaghaano yanje kandi nkuhe baasukulu bakaniiye kimui.”
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulaamu aateeli̱ya kandi eetu̱li̱ka haali̱i̱so yee haaku̱ma hansi. Luhanga aatodha aamughila ati,
“Ni̱i̱si̱ye ndimakola ndaghaano naawe nti okuba na baasukulu bakaniiye kimui abakukughilamu taata wabo.
Ti̱ ku̱lu̱gha obwalo, li̱i̱na lyawe lyaleki̱ye kuba Ebbulaamu, bhaatu balakughilaghamu Ebbulahi̱mu̱, nanga nkukufoola ese wa bantu bʼomu mahanga ghakani̱ye.”
“Oku̱byala kandi obe na baasukulu bakaniiye kimui kandi bakufooka mahanga ghakani̱ye. Bamui mu baasukulu baawe aba bakuba bakama.
Ndaghaano yanje hamui na baasukulu baawe ekuukalʼo bilo nʼebilo, nanga si̱ye ndi Luhanga waawe kandi Luhanga wabo.
Nkuha uwe na baasukulu baawe kyalo eki olimu endindi nga munamahanga, ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ya kimui e Kanaani̱. Kyalo eki kyona kikuba kya baasukulu baawe bilo nʼebilo kandi nkuba Luhanga wabo.”
Niibuwo Luhanga aaghi̱li̱ye Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, “Uwe na baasukulu baawe kandi na mijo yoona eghi ekulabha baasukulu baawe aba mukulaghiluwa kukwata ndaghaano yanje.
Eni niiyo ndaghaano ndimakola naawe kandi na baasukulu baawe kandi eki mukulaghiluwa kukwata niikiyo kini: Bu̱li̱ mwana wabusaasa weena oghu mulakabyalagha bamusalaghe.
Naawe Ebbulahi̱mu̱ okulaghiluwa kukusala nga kaakulolelʼo kwoleka ngoku waasi̱i̱mi̱ye ndaghaano yanje hamui naawe.

Mu bu̱li̱ mijo yoona eghi ekubʼo haanu̱ma yaawe, bu̱li̱ mwana wabusaasa weena oghu alabyaluwagha kandi naahi̱ki̱ya bilo munaanaa alalaghiluwagha bamusale. Basalaghe baana boona baabusaasa ababyahuwe mu baasukulu baawe kedha aba baghu̱li̱ye na sente ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu abatali nganda syawe kwisa mu baasukulu baawe.
Boona aba baasukulu baawe babyaye kedha aba baghu̱li̱ye na sente, balalaghiluwagha kubasala. Niikuwo ndaghaano yanje eekale eli ya bilo nʼebilo mu mibili yaanu.
Ti̱ mwana wabusaasa weena oghu batasali̱ye, balamubhingagha mu ntu̱la yaanu haabwa kubhenga ndaghaano yanje eghi.”
Luhanga aaghila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, “Ku̱lu̱gha obwalo otatodha kughila mukali̱ waawe oti Salaai̱, li̱i̱na liye lyabaaye Saala.

Nkumuha mu̱gi̱sa kandi aku̱ku̱byalila mwana wabusaasa. Nkuha Saala oghu mu̱gi̱sa kandi nimufoole ni̱na wa bantu bʼomu mahanga ghakani̱ye kandi mu lu̱byalo luwe aku̱lu̱ghamu na bantu banji abakuba bakama.”

Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aateeli̱ya kandi eetu̱li̱ka haali̱i̱so yee haaku̱ma hansi, naaneebu̱u̱li̱ya mu mutima ghuwe ati, “Muntu oghu nkaakuuye nganje oghu ndi na myaka 100, nkugubha nti̱ya ku̱byala mwana? Kandi na mukali̱ wanje Saala ali na myaka 90 ya bukulu, ti̱ akugubha ati̱ya ku̱byala mwana?”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaghila Luhanga ati, “Haabwaki otaaleki̱ye Sumai̱li̱ aaliiye aaba mugwetuwa wa eki wandaghiisani̱i̱ye eki?”

Bhaatu Luhanga aamukuukamu ati, “Uwe na mukali̱ waawe Saala mu̱ku̱byala mwana wabusaasa kandi okumuluka li̱i̱na I̱saka. Nkweyongela kuukali̱yʼo ndaghaano yanje hamui naye kandi ekuba ya bilo nʼebilo kandi ekuba ya baasukulu be abakubʼo haanu̱ma yee.

Ngoku waakansabi̱ye, na Sumai̱li̱ nkumuha mu̱gi̱sa, naye aku̱byala kandi aabe na baasukulu bakani̱ye. Kandi aku̱byala baana eku̱mi̱ na babili, ti̱ bu̱li̱ omui akulema ntu̱la emui haa ntu̱la eku̱mi̱ na ebili. Ntu̱la esi nkusifoola ehanga lyamaani̱.
Bhaatu nku̱gu̱mi̱ya ndaghaano yanje na I̱saka oghu Saala aku̱byala mu bwile nga buni bwonini mu mwaka ghukwisa.”
Obu Luhanga aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha na Ebbulahi̱mu̱, aalu̱ghʼo aaghenda.

Kilo eki kyonini, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aatwala mutabani̱ wee Sumai̱li̱ kandi bu̱li̱ muntu weena wabusaasa oghu akaba ali mu ka yee, otaayemu na baana baabusaasa baa basyana be aabaabaagha aghu̱li̱ye na sente, boona baabasala ngoku Luhanga aamulaghiiye.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ naye eenini baamusala, bwile obu akaba ali na myaka 99 ya bukulu.
Kandi Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aasala Sumai̱li̱, Sumai̱li̱ bwile obu akaba ali na myaka 13 ya bukulu.
Kilo eki kyonini Ebbulahi̱mu̱ na mutabani̱ wee Sumai̱li̱ baabasala.
Kandi na bu̱li̱ muntu weena wabusaasa oghu akaba ali mu ka yee, oghu baabaagha babyaliiyemu kandi nʼaba baabaagha baghu̱li̱ye na sente ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu banji, boona baabasala kilo eki.
Kilo kimui Ebbulahi̱mu̱ akaba asitami̱ye haa mulyango ghwa weema yee, musana ghutweleeye kimui.
aatodha aamubonekela, haai na biti bi̱i̱looku̱ bya musaasa li̱i̱na liye Mami̱le.

Obu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaloli̱ye, aabona basaasa basatu baamiliiye nga haala haai-haai naye. Obu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aababoone, aaghenda bwangu-bwangu, aabeebinga. Obu aahi̱ki̱ye hambali bali, aahi̱ka aateeli̱ya aagomba, haali̱i̱so yee haaku̱ma hansi.
Aabaghila ati, “Bakama banje, munkwatiluwe ngughuma, mutansaala.
Muhumule mu ki̱i̱ku̱dhu̱ kya nti̱na ya kiti kiinamu̱li̱to kini, muleke hakili baheeleli̱ya banje baleete maasi babanaabi̱ye mu maghulu.
Ngoku mwasi̱i̱mi̱ye kundolʼo, muleke mbahe kaakuliya niikuwo mugubhe kutunga maani̱ ghaa kweyongela mu lughendo lwanu.”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Kale, okole ngoku waabu̱ghi̱ye.”
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aataaha bwangu mu weema, aaghila mukali̱ wee Saala ati, “Opi̱i̱me bwangu biikopo bisatu bya ngano, obikande, oteekemu migaati̱.”
Aaghenda bwangu mu kigho kiye kya nte, aayamu nte eghi enoni̱ye, aaghiha mu̱koli̱ aaghitwala baaghisala bwangu-bwangu.
Obu byokuliya byahiiye, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaleetela basaasa bani magita ghaa nte, mata, hamui na nyama syokeei̱ye.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakala anabalindiliiye mu ki̱i̱ku̱dhu̱ mbanaliya.
Niibuwo basaasa aba baabu̱u̱i̱ye Ebbulahi̱mu̱ bati, “Mukali̱ waawe Saala ali haa?”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aabakuukamu ati, “Ali mu weema omu.”
aaghila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, “Mwaka oghukwisa nkutodha kukuuka hani bwile nga buni bwonini, ti̱ bwile obu mukali̱ waawe Saala akuba abyaye mwana wabusaasa.”
Bwile obu Saala akaba aamiliiye haakpengbu̱ ya mulyango ghwa weema eghi mu numba enu̱ma syabo abategheleei̱ye.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ na Saala bombi bakaba bamali̱ye kukaakulila kimui kandi Saala naasaaye haa myaka ya ku̱byala.
Du̱mbi̱ Saala aatandika kusekela haa mutima ghuwe naaneeli̱li̱kana ati, “Si̱ye naamali̱ye kukaakula kandi na mukama wanje naye akaakuuye, ti̱ tukugubha tu̱ti̱ya kutodha kweghonja haa bulili?”
aabu̱u̱li̱ya Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, “Nkiki kikuleka Saala naaseka kandi naaghila ati eye akaakuuye taakugubha ku̱byala mwana?
Haliyo kyona ekikusaagha si̱ye
? Nkukuuka hani mwaka ghukwisa bwile nga buni bwonini kandi mukali̱ waawe Saala akuba abyaye mwana wabusaasa.”
Saala oobaha, du̱mbi̱ aabu̱gha naaha bisubha ati, “Tanaaseki̱ye bbaa.”
Bhaatu
aamughila ati, “Oleke kwehakana, waaseki̱ye.”
Obu basaasa aba baanamu̱ki̱yagha kughenda, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ anabahelekeleei̱ye, baaloleei̱ye mu kibugha kya Sodomu.
aaghila ati, “Tambbali̱ye ku̱bi̱sa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ eki ndi haai kukola.
Majima baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ bakuba baamaani̱ kandi ehanga lyamaani̱ kandi mahanga ghoona ghaa munsi ghakutunga mu̱gi̱sa haabuwe.
Naakomi̱yemu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ oghu, niikuwo agubhe kwegheesi̱ya baana be na maka ghaabo haanu̱ma yee ku̱hu̱ti̱ya
kandi kukolagha ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye kandi ebi mbbali̱ye bilo nʼebilo. Eki kikuleka ngubhe kuha Ebbulahi̱mu̱ baasukulu bakani̱ye ngoku naamulaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.”
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Naaghu̱u̱ye ngoku bantu baa Sodomu na Gomola bakwete kukola bikoluwa bibhiihiiye kimui kandi bibhi byabo byahingulaane.
Nahabweki nkughendayo kwelolela neenini niikuwo nimanye ghalakaba ghali majima kedha bbaa.”
Basaasa babili ebo beegaali̱ya, baatandika kughenda baloleei̱ye Sodomu, bhaatu
aati̱ghala na Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ eebinga
, aamughila ati, “Buuye obu oku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu babhi abali mu kibugha eki, na bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye abalimu okubahwelekeeleli̱ya dhee?
Ti̱ buuye mu kibugha eki naabaaye halimu bantu maku̱mi̱ ataano abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, buuye oku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu boona abali mu kibugha eki?
Majima
wanje, otakola otiyo ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mahwelekeeleli̱ya bantu babhi aba. Nuuwe oku̱twi̱lagha bantu boona abali munsi musango mu bwengani̱ja.”
aamukuukamu ati, “Ninaasangi̱yemu bantu maku̱mi̱ ataano abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, tanku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya abali mu kibugha eki bbaa.”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aatodha aaghila ati, “
wanje, onganile haabwa bighambo naabu̱ghi̱ye, nanga si̱ye tanibhonganuuwe ku̱bu̱gha bighambo bikani̱ye ngʼebi bbaa.
Ti̱ nuwasangi̱ye mu kibugha kya Sodomu eki bantu maku̱mi̱ anaa na bataano bonkaha abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nabuwo dhee oku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kibugha eki haabwa bataano kubulʼo ku̱hi̱ka maku̱mi̱ ataano?”
aakuukamu ati, “Ninaasangi̱yemu bantu maku̱mi̱ anaa na bataano bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, tanku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kibugha eki bbaa.”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aatodha aaghila
ati, “Ti̱ buuye mbanabaaye maku̱mi̱ anaa bonkaha abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye?”
aamukuukamu ati, “Haabwa bantu maku̱mi̱ anaa bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aba, tanku̱ki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya.”
Niibuwo Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Gutu
wanje, otakwatuwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha haabwa ku̱ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya nti, buuye nuwasangi̱yemu bantu maku̱mi̱ asatu abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye?”
aamukuukamu ati, “Ninaanasangi̱yemu bantu maku̱mi̱ asatu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye tanku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kibugha eki bbaa.”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aatodha aaghila ati, “
wanje, onganile, tandi na bu̱toki̱ bwa kuukala ni̱nku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya, bhaatu buuye okukola oti̱ya nuwaanasangi̱yemu bantu maku̱mi̱ abili bonkaha abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye?”
aamukuukamu ati, “Haabwa bantu maku̱mi̱ abili bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aba, tanku̱ki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya.”
Niibuwo Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “
wanje, otankwatiluwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha kutodha ku̱ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya mulundi ghumui ghwonkaha. Ti̱ buuye nuwasangi̱yemu bantu eku̱mi̱ bonkaha abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye?”
aamukuukamu ati, “Kutabbala kwitilamu bantu eku̱mi̱ abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aba, tanku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kibugha eki bbaa.”
obu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha na Ebbulahi̱mu̱, aamu̱lu̱ghʼo, aaghenda. Ebbulahi̱mu̱ naye du̱mbi̱ aakuuka ewe e ka.

Baamalai̱ka babili aba, baaki̱dha mu kibugha kya Sodomu lwagholo. Baasanga Looti̱ asitami̱ye hʼelembo lya kibugha eki. Obu aababoone, aamuka aaghenda kubasangaana, aahi̱ka aateeli̱ya, aagomba, haali̱i̱so yee haaku̱ma hansi kubeebali̱ya.
Aabaghila ati, “Bakama banje, gutu hakili mwise ewanje, mutunge maasi ghaa kunaaba, niikuwo munkiya nkyambisi mweyongela kughenda mu lughendo lwanu.”
Baamughila bati, “Bbaa, tukughenda kulaala hanja mu tau̱ni̱.”
Bhaatu Looti̱ aabaakaliilila ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu baasi̱i̱mi̱ye baaghenda naye ewe e ka. Du̱mbi̱ Looti̱ aateeka migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, aateekani̱li̱ya basaasa aba kiihulo, baaliya.
Looti̱ na baghenu̱ be batakaghendi̱ye kulangaala, basaasa boona bʼomu kibugha kya Sodomu eki, batabhana na bantu bakulu, baasa beemilila hanja ya numba ya Looti̱.
Baatandika kubilikila nʼelaka lyamaani̱ bati, “Basaasa abaasi̱ye kulaala mwawe muni bali haa? Obatwesi̱ye hanja hani, tubabone niikuwo tulangaale nabo.”
Du̱mbi̱ Looti̱ aatuwa hanja, aaghala lwighi baghenu̱ be aba banali mu numba.
Aaghila basaasa bʼomu kibugha kya Sodomu aba ati, “Baghenji̱ banje mbeesengeleei̱ye, gutu mutakola kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kitiyo!

Ndi na bahala banje babili abatamani̱ye basaasa. Muleke aliibo naabaha mukole nabo byona ebi mukubbala. Bhaatu mutakola kintu kyona haa basaasa aba nanga ni baghenu̱ banje kandi ndi na kubalinda kulungi.”

Basaasa aba baamughila bati, “Otu̱lu̱ghʼo, oli munamahanga. Ti̱ nuuwe ani̱ kutulaghila eki tubhonganuuwe kukola! Ki̱i̱seeni̱ tukukukola kubhi kusaali̱ya ebo.” Du̱mbi̱ bantu aba baalu̱mbi̱la kimui Looti̱, mbanabbala bati bahende lwighi.
Bhaatu basaasa babili aba baabhakila Looti̱, baamukuba mu numba, du̱mbi̱ baaghala lwighi.
Du̱mbi̱ basaasa aba baaghala bantu abaabaagha haa mulyango ghwa numba ya Looti̱ oghu maaso, bantu aba baaleka kubona lwighi olu.

Niibuwo basaasa aba baaghi̱li̱ye Looti̱ bati, “Buuye nganda syawe syona oli nasiyo hani? Baa nkyame syawe, batabani̱ baawe, bahala baawe kedha lughanda lwawe oghu ali mu kibugha kini, obaayemu bwangu mu̱ki̱lu̱ghemu.
Ni̱i̱tu̱we
aatu̱mi̱ye kwisa ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kibugha kini, nanga aaboone bubhi bwa bantu bʼomu kibugha kini bwahingulaane kandi aatu̱tu̱mi̱ye ku̱ki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya.”
Du̱mbi̱ Looti̱ aaghenda aaghambila bankyame siye, abaali balu̱ghi̱ye bahala be mbabbala kubaswela. Aabaghila ati, “Mwanguwe bwangu, mu̱lu̱ghe mu kibugha kini, nanga
alimaghenda ku̱ki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya!” Bhaatu baa nkyame siye aba ebo baamanya bati niibuwo aasandaala kwonkaha.
Obu bwile bwali buli haai kukiya, baamalai̱ka aba baaghila Looti̱ bati, “Uwe na mukali̱ waawe na bahala baawe babili aba oli nabo hani, mu̱lu̱ghe bwangu mu kibugha kini. Mutaalu̱ghi̱yemu,
ngoku alimahwelekeeleli̱ya kibugha kini, naanu mu̱ku̱kwi̱lamu.”
Bhaatu Looti̱ eye aakala anaamiliiye hanja haala. Haabwa
kumughilila kisa, aalaghila baamalai̱ka aba, baakwata Looti̱, bahala be babili, hamui na mukali̱ wee haa mukono baabatwesi̱ya mu kibugha eki.

Makabatwesi̱yamu bati, omui mu baamalai̱ka aba aabaghila ati, “Mu̱li̱gi̱ti̱le kimui niikuwo mutaku̱wa. Mutalola enu̱ma kandi muteemilila mu kiigbete eki! Mughendele kimui mu mwena, nanga naanu mu̱ku̱wa!”
Bhaatu Looti̱ aamughila ati, “Gutu! Bbaa, bakama banje, mutaghila muti ngende mu myena eghi.
Ngoku mwakangiliiye ngughuma kandi kisa kyamaani̱ ku̱ki̱li̱ya bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanje, mutaghila muti niilukile mu mwena, nkubona-bonela eghi kandi nkwi̱leyo.
Haliyo hani kaatau̱ni̱ kaanabwana haai-haai aka nanguulukilamu, hakili muleke haaliiko naaghenda kuukalamu niikuwo niikale ndi kulungi.”
Malai̱ka oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Eki kisemeeye. Oghende ookale mu kaatau̱ni̱ aka, ti̱ haabwawe tanku̱kahwelekeleeli̱ya bbaa.

Bhaatu oli̱gi̱te, oghende mu kaatau̱ni̱ aka bwangu, nanga tankukola kintu kyona otakaki̱dhi̱ye mu kaatau̱ni̱ aka bbaa.” Niikiyo kyaleki̱ye haanu̱ma kaatau̱ni̱ aka baakaghilamu Joola. Ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya kaanabwana, nanga Looti̱ akaghila ati nkaanabwana.
Nkyambisi hambali musana ghutwela haala Looti̱ akaba naaki̱dhi̱ye mu kaatau̱ni̱ aka.
Du̱mbi̱
aasindika mulilo ku̱lu̱gha mu eghulu ghwaghuwa mu kibugha kya Sodomu na kya Gomola nga mbu̱la ekutoonamu.
Aahwelekeeleli̱ya bibugha byʼomu kiigbete ebi byombi, bantu boona hamui na biti na bi̱si̱ngo ebyabaagha mu bibugha ebi byona byahiya.
Bhaatu mukaa Looti̱ aalola enu̱ma, du̱mbi̱ aafooka mpaghi ya kisula.
Nkyambisi ya kilo eki kyonini, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakeelela hambali aabaabaagha aamiliiye mu maaso ghaa
Aalola eku̱wa mu kighona mu kibugha kya Sodomu na kya Gomola, aabona mwi̱ka ghwamaani̱ ngucuukila mu kyalo eki, nga mwi̱ka ghwa kikoome kyamaani̱ kya mulilo.

Obu Luhanga aahwelekeeleli̱yagha bibugha byʼomu kiigbete ebi, aakala anaasu̱ki̱ye eki aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱je Ebbulahi̱mu̱. Kyaleka aaya Looti̱ mu kabhi kaa kuhwelekeelela obu aahwelekeeleli̱yagha bibugha hambali Looti̱ aabaagha aakaaye.
Looti̱ na bahala be babili, boobaha kuukala mu kaatau̱ni̱ kaa Joola, baalu̱ghamu baaghenda kuukala mu mwena mu ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale.

Kilo kimui, muhala wa Looti̱ wʼobukulu aaghila muto wee ati, “Eseetu̱we aakaakuuye. Kandi mu kyalo kini kyona eki tulimu, taaliyo musaasa nʼomui oghu angutuswela, naawe omani̱ye munsi eni ngoku mukali̱ ali na kusweluwa.
Oleke tuhe eseetu̱we oghu vi̱i̱ni̱ aghinuwe atamiile, niikuwo alangaale naatu, atu̱byalʼo baana, ntu̱la yaatu etahuwʼo.”

Mukilo ya kilo eki baaleetela esebo vi̱i̱ni̱, aaghinuwa, aatamiila. Muhala wee wʼobukulu aataha, aalangaala naye. Looti̱ oghu aalangaala na muhala wee oghu. Haabwa kutamiila, esebo ataamanya ngoku aalangaaye na muhala wee oghu.

Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo muhala wee wa bukulu aaghila muto wee ati, “Eso naalangaaye na eseetu̱we. Oleke obwalo mukilo tutodhe tumuhe vi̱i̱ni̱ aghinuwe atamiile. Naawe oghende olangaale naye, niikuwo tu̱byale baana ku̱lu̱gha mwa eseetu̱we, ntu̱la yaatu etahuwʼo.”
Nahabweki mukilo eghi baaha dhee esebo vi̱i̱ni̱, aaghinuwa, aatamiila, muhala wee wʼobuto aataha, aalangaala naye. Haabwa kutamiila, esebo ataamanya ngoku aalangaaye na muhala wee oghu.
Bahala baa Looti̱ aba bombi baaku̱li̱ya.
Muhala wee wʼobukulu aabyala mwana wabusaasa, aamuluka li̱i̱na Mowaabu. Niiye taata wa ntu̱la eghi bilo bini bakughilaghamu Bamowaabu.
Muhala wee wʼobuto aabyala mwana wabusaasa, aamuluka li̱i̱na Bbenaami̱. Niiye taata wa ntu̱la eghi bakughilaghamu Bamooni̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aalu̱gha mu kyalo kya Mami̱le, aaghenda kuukala mu elungu lya Negeebbu mu kyalo eki baaghilaghamu Gelaali̱ ekili haagati ya Kadesi̱ na Suula.
Analiyeyo, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaghila bantu boona ati mukali̱ wee Saala ni mwani̱na wee. Du̱mbi̱ Abbi̱meleeki̱ mukama wa Gelaali̱ aatuma kumutwalila Saala mu kikaali kiye.
Bhaatu kilo eki kyonini, Luhanga aabonekela Abbi̱meleeki̱ mu ndooti̱, amughila ati, “Uwe obhonganuuwe ku̱ku̱wa, nanga mukali̱ oghu waatwete ni mukali̱ wa baanini.”
Abbi̱meleeki̱ akaba atakakolangaane naye. Du̱mbi̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama wanje, buuye okubbala ku̱mpwelekeeleli̱ya kuni ntali na musango?

Ebbulahi̱mu̱ eenini, taaniiye akaghila ati Saala ni mwani̱na wee kandi Saala naye aaghila ati Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ni mwani̱na wee? Kini tanaaki̱koli̱ye nkighendeleeye kusaali̱ja muunakyanje bbaa. Si̱ye tandi na musango ghwona.”

Mu ndooti̱ eghi, Luhanga aamukuukamu ati, “Nkimani̱ye ngoku otali na musango. Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye ntaku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kukola nsobi̱ mu maaso ghanje kandi ntaku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kuba na mukali̱ oghu.
Nahabweki oku̱u̱ki̱li̱ye mukali̱ oghu bali̱i̱ wee, alakusabila nanga ni mulangi̱. Bhaatu otaamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱ye ye, okimanye uwe nʼeka yaawe yoona mu̱ku̱twi̱ka.”
Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, Abbi̱meleeki̱ aabilikila bakoli̱ be boona, aabasoboolola ebyamulehukaanʼo byona. Obu baaghu̱u̱ye, boobahila kimui.

Du̱mbi̱ Abbi̱meleeki̱ aabilikila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mu numba, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Waatu̱koli̱ye otiyo nangaaki? Ni nsobi̱ ki eghi naaku̱koli̱ye kundeeteleja musango ghuunamu̱li̱to ghutiyo, si̱ye hamui na bukama bwanje bwona? Wankoli̱ye kintu eki muntu atabhonganuuwe kukola muunakiye.”
Abbi̱meleeki̱ aatodha aabu̱u̱li̱ya Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, “Nkiki ekyaleki̱ye waakola kintu ngʼeki?”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Nkaba nimani̱ye nti bantu bʼeni taboobahi̱ye Luhanga kandi neeli̱li̱kana nti basobola kunjita haabwa mukali̱ wanje niikuwo bo bamuswele.
Majima kuwo, eye ni mwani̱naasi̱ye, nanga eseetu̱we nʼomui, kuuyʼo twataane bwani̱na, nankabha ali mukali̱ wanje.

Obu Luhanga anji̱hi̱ye ewaa tita, nantwala mu kyalo kinji ekitali kyʼewaatu, nkeesengeleli̱ya Saala nti, ‘Kini niikiyo kikoluwa kya ngughuma eki obhonganuuwe kukola, hoona hambali tulakahi̱kagha, oghilaghe bantu baayo oti, “Musaasa oghu ni mwani̱naasi̱ye.” ’ ”
Du̱mbi̱ Abbi̱meleeki̱ aaleeta ntaama, mbu̱li̱, nte, hamui na basyana baabukali̱ na baabusaasa, aabaha Ebbulahi̱mu̱, aatodha amu̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱ya mukali̱ wee Saala.
Abbi̱meleeki̱ aatodha aamughila ati, “Olole kyalo kyanje eki kyona, ookale hambali okabbali̱ye.”
Abbi̱meleeki̱ aaghila Saala ati, “Nkuha mu̱ghenji̱ waawe oghu bi̱twi̱ke lu̱ku̱mi̱ bya siliva mu maaso ghaa bantu bani boona kusasula nsobi̱ yoona eghi ndaba nku̱sobeleei̱ye.”
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aasabila Abbi̱meleeki̱, Luhanga aaki̱li̱ya mukali̱ wee, hamui na basyana be baabukali̱, baatodha baatandika ku̱byala.
Nanga
akaba naamali̱ye kufoola bakali̱ baa mu lu̱byalo lwa Abbi̱meleeki̱ kuba ngumba, haabwa Saala mukali̱ wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
aaghilila Saala ngughuma, aahi̱ki̱i̱li̱li̱ya ebi aamughambiiye ngoku aali asangu̱u̱we amulaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.
Saala aaku̱li̱ya etundu, aabyalila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mu bukaakulu buwe mwana wabusaasa. Kini kikabʼo haa bwile bwonini obu Luhanga aasangu̱u̱we abalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaluka mwana wabo oghu li̱i̱na ati niiye I̱saka.
Obu mwana oghu aahi̱ki̱i̱ye bilo munaanaa, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamusala kusighikila ngoku Luhanga aalaghiiye.
Bwile obu, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ akaba ali na myaka 100.
Du̱mbi̱ Saala aaghila ati, “Luhanga aaleki̱ye naadheedhuwa. Kandi oghu alakaaghu̱wagha ngoku naabyaye, naye aladheedhuwagha hamui nanje, haabwa mukaakulu nganje ku̱byala.”
Aatodha aaghila ati, “Ni ani̱ angu̱gu̱bhi̱ye kughambila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati nanje Saala nangugubha kwonki̱ya mwana? Olole, naamu̱byaliiye mwana wabusaasa mu bukaakulu buwe.”
I̱saka oghu aakulila kimui, du̱mbi̱ baamuuya haa mabeele. Haa kilo eki baamuuhiyʼo eki, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukolela ki̱ghenu̱ kyamaani̱.
Kilo kimui, Saala aabona Sumai̱li̱, mutabani̱ wa Hagali̱ mu̱syana wabo Munami̱si̱li̱ oghu abyaliiye Ebbulahi̱mu̱, nendi̱ya I̱saka.
Niibuwo Saala aaghi̱li̱ye Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, “Obhinge mukali̱ mu̱syana waawe oghu hamui na mutabani̱ wee. Mutabani̱ wee oghu taaligwetuwa hamui na mutabani̱ wanje haa bintu byawe bbaa.”
Kintu eki kyatu̱ntu̱li̱ya Ebbulahi̱mu̱ munu, nanga Sumai̱li̱ naye akaba ali mwana wee.
Bhaatu Luhanga aaghila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, “Oleke kutuntula haabwa Sumai̱li̱ na mu̱syana waawe. Kandi okole ngoku Saala aakughambiiye, nanga baana baa I̱saka bonkaha niibo nkubala kuba baasukulu baawe.
Na mutabani̱ wa mu̱syana waawe oghu, naye nkumuha baana bakani̱ye niikuwo naye afooke ehanga liinamu̱li̱to, nanga naye ni mwana waawe.”

Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aatwala byokuliya hamui na ki̱cu̱pa kilimu maasi, aabiha Hagali̱, aamu̱heeki̱ya biyo, du̱mbi̱ aamubhinga hamui na mwana wee. Hagali̱ aaghenda kitiyo-kitiyo mu elungu lya Bbeli̱seba.
Haanu̱ma ya bwile, maasi ghaahuwa mu ki̱cu̱pa omu. Obu maasi agha ghaahooye, aaghenda aabi̱sa mwana oghu mu kahu̱mbu̱.
Du̱mbi̱ aaghenda aasitama haakpengbu̱, haa mutima ghuwe naanaghila ati, “Tambbali̱ye kubona ngoku mwana wanje aku̱ku̱wa bbaa.” Anasitami̱ye haala, du̱mbi̱ aatandika kulila.

Luhanga aaghu̱wa mwana naalila, du̱mbi̱ malai̱ka aabilikiilila Hagali̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu eghulu, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mbiki, Hagali̱? Oleke kwobaha! Luhanga aaghu̱u̱ye kulila kwa mwana waawe hambali waamulangaai̱ye.
Ohimbe mwana waawe, omulele, nanga ndimufoola ehanga lyamaani̱.”
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aamwoleka kyahu̱dhu̱ kya maasi. Aaghenda aataha maasi, aaghaasu̱li̱ya mu ki̱cu̱pa eki aahekelaghamu, du̱mbi̱ aatandika ku̱nwesi̱yʼo mwana oghu.
Luhanga aalinda mwana oghu, aakula. Aakulila mu elungu, du̱mbi̱ aafooka wamaani̱ mu kuhiigha.
Anali mu elungu lya Palaani̱, ni̱na wee aamuswelela mukali̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Banami̱si̱li̱.
Bwile obu, Abbi̱meleeki̱ hamui na Fi̱kooli̱ mukulu wa baasilikale be, baaghambila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ bati, “Luhanga akuukalagha naawe mu bu̱li̱ kintu kyona eki okukolagha.

Dhelu nkubbala olahile mu maaso ghaa Luhanga ngoku otalikola kintu kyona kya bisubha mu maaso ghanje, si̱ye neenini, batabani̱ banje kedha baasukulu banje. Kandi ongilile ngughuma hamui na bantu aba ookaayemu nga munamahanga, ngʼesi naakughiliiye.”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Majima nkulahila mu li̱i̱na lya Luhanga nti niikuwo kiliba kitiyo.”
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aatandika kutongana na Abbi̱meleeki̱ haabwa kyahu̱dhu̱ eki baheeleli̱ya baa Abbi̱meleeki̱ baahi̱yʼo Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
Abbi̱meleeki̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Si̱ye tanimani̱ye oghu aakoli̱ye kintu ngʼeki. Nanga taawangambiiye bwangu, kintu eki nanje naakimanya obwalo.”
Niibuwo Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaleeti̱ye ntaama hamui na nte aasiha Abbi̱meleeki̱, du̱mbi̱ basaasa babili aba baakola ndaghaano.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aata haakpengbu̱ byana bya ntaama musanju̱ byabukali̱,
du̱mbi̱ Abbi̱meleeki̱ aabu̱u̱li̱ya Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, “Mughaso ghwa byana bya ntaama ebi waataaye haakpengbu̱ ebi mbiki?”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Nkukusaba osi̱i̱me byana bya ntaama musanju̱ ebi naakuhaaye ku̱lu̱gha mu mikono yanje kuba buukai̱so ngoku aani̱i̱si̱ye nkalima kyahu̱dhu̱ kini.”
Du̱mbi̱ ki̱i̱kalo eki baakiluka li̱i̱na lya Bbeli̱seba (elyamani̱i̱si̱yagha “kyahu̱dhu̱ kya kilahilo”).
Haanu̱ma ya kukola ndaghaano eghi e Bbeli̱seba, Abbi̱meleeki̱ na Fi̱kooli̱ baakuukayo mu kyalo kya Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aahela kiti kya bukalali̱ya e Bbeli̱seba, aalami̱li̱yʼo
, Luhanga oghu ataakuhuwaghʼo.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakala mu kyalo kya Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱ kumala bwile bukani̱ye.
Haanu̱ma yʼebi, Luhanga aalengeesi̱ya Ebbulahi̱mu̱ niikuwo alole ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kuwe. Aamubilikila ati, “Ebbulahi̱mu̱!” Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Ndi hani.”

Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aamughila ati, “Otwale mwana waawe I̱saka oghu oli naye enkaha kandi oghu oku̱ndi̱ye kwonini otiyo, mughende naye mu kyalo kya Moli̱ya. Omuhonge nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye haa mwena oghu nkukughambila.”

Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyongeyʼo, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamuka hamui na baheeleli̱ya be babili, ndogooi̱ yee, hamui na mwana wee I̱saka. Aaseena nkui sikani̱ye sya kwokeesi̱ya kihonguwa kiye, du̱mbi̱ aamu̱ki̱ya kughenda mu ki̱i̱kalo eki Luhanga aamughambiiye.
Haa kilo kyakasatu mbanaghenda, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakebuka elughulu, aabona ki̱i̱kalo eki baaghendaghamu eki kinaseli̱yeyo.

Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaghila baheeleli̱ya be ati, “Mu̱ti̱ghale hani na ndogooi̱ eghi niikuwo si̱ye na mutabani̱ wanje tughende tu̱hi̱ke mu ki̱i̱kalo eki. Tughende tulami̱ye Luhanga, du̱mbi̱ tutodhe tukuuke.”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaheeki̱ya mutabani̱ wee I̱saka nkui, eye eenini aaheeka muhiyo na mulilo ghwa kwokeesi̱ya kihonguwa, du̱mbi̱ baadonga bombi.

Banadongi̱ye hamui, I̱saka aabu̱u̱li̱ya ese wee ati, “Tita!” Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Wangi̱, mwana wanje?” I̱saka aatodha aaghila ati, “Tu̱heeki̱ye nkui na mulilo, bhaatu kyana kya ntaama eki tu̱kwoki̱ya mahonga, kili haa?”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Mwana wanje, Luhanga eenini akutuha kyana kya ntaama kya kuhonga.” Du̱mbi̱ beeyongela kughenda.
Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye hambali Luhanga aabaagha amughambiiye, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakwelʼo kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, aapangʼo nkui, du̱mbi̱ aaboha mutabani̱ wee I̱saka, aamulangaali̱ya haagu̱u̱li̱ ya nkui esi.
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakoma muhiyo ghuwe ati asale mutabani̱ wee oghu.
Naanabbala kumusala haa mumelo, malai̱ka wa
ku̱lu̱gha mu eghulu aamubilikila naaghila ati, “Ebbulahi̱mu̱! Ebbulahi̱mu̱!” Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakuukamu ati, “Ndi hani.”
Malai̱ka aamughila ati, “Otaata mwana waawe kandi otamukolʼo kabhi koona, nanga naamali̱ye kubona ngoku ohu̱ti̱i̱ye Luhanga. Tawaakukutiiye kumpa mwana waawe oghu oli naye enkaha bhembei̱.”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamu̱ki̱ya maaso ghe, du̱mbi̱ aabona ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama, mahembe ghaayo ghakwatu̱u̱we mu bi̱si̱ngo. Du̱mbi̱ aaghenda aghisambuula, aaghihongela
nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kya mwana wee.
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaluka ki̱i̱kalo eki li̱i̱na ati niikiyo “
niiye akuhaagha.” Ku̱lu̱gha na bwile obu, baaghila bati, “
alahaagha bantu be haa mwena ghuni.”
Malai̱ka wa
aatodha aabilikiilila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mulundi ghwa kabili.
Aamughila ati, “
aaghi̱li̱ye ati, ‘Wantaayemu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kandi tawaakukutiiye mwana waawe kandi oghu oli naye enkaha.
Majima kuwo, nkukuha mu̱gi̱sa,
lu̱byalo lwawe na baasukulu baawe bakukanila kimui nga nsooli̱ya sya mu mwanya na musene ghwa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja. Baasukulu baawe balitwala etungo lya ngi̱ghu̱ syabo.
Kandi mu baasukulu baawe niimuwo nkuheela mahanga ghaa munsi yoona mu̱gi̱sa, nanga waadhooteeye elaka lyanje.’ ”
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakuuka mu basyana be, baamu̱ki̱li̱ya hamui, baaghenda Bbeli̱seba hambali Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakalagha.
Haanu̱ma yʼebi, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaghu̱wa ati naali siye Milika, muka waani̱na wee Naholi̱, akamu̱byalila baana baabusaasa.
Mwana wa mu̱li̱ghaaso niiye akaba ali U̱ji̱, waakabili Bbu̱ji̱, na Kamweli̱ (ese wa Alaamu),
Keseedi̱, Hajo, Pilidaasi, Jidilaafi̱, hamui na Bbesweli̱.
Bbesweli̱ niiye akaba ali ese wa Lebbeeka. Milika niiye akabyalila Naholi̱ waani̱na Ebbulahi̱mu̱ baana munaanaa aba.
Naholi̱ akaba ali na mukali̱ onji li̱i̱na liye Leuma, naye akaba ali na baana. Mali̱i̱na ghaabo: Teebba, Gahama, Tahasi, hamui na Maaka.
Saala aamala myaka 127 ya bukulu.
Akwi̱la mu kyalo kya Ki̱li̱yasa-alaba, endindi ekimanu̱u̱we nga Hebbu̱looni̱, ekili mu nsi ya Kanaani̱. Eghi niiyo Ebbulahi̱mu̱ eeghungiiye mukali̱ wee Saala oghu.
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aalu̱gha haa mu̱ku̱ ghwa mukali̱ wee, aaghenda ku̱bu̱gha na bakulu baa mu ntu̱la ya Bahi̱ti̱ ati,
“Si̱ye ndi mu̱ku̱lu̱ki̱ mu kyalo kyanu muni. Gutu mu̱ngu̱li̱ye etaka hambali ndajiika mukali̱ wanje mu mulingo ghusemeeye.”
Mukulu wa Bahi̱ti̱ aakuukamu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ bati,

“Otegheeleli̱ye, mukama wanje, oli muntu bahu̱ti̱i̱ye mu kyalo muni. Weekomele weenini ki̱i̱kalo kisemeeye haliyo waajiika mukali̱ waawe. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kubhenga kukukoonela mu kijibu ngʼeki bbaa.”
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamuka, aagomba ku̱si̱i̱ma Bahi̱ti̱, bantu abaabaagha mu kyalo eki.
Aabaghila ati, “Ngoku mwasi̱i̱mi̱ye kunkoonela, mbeesengeleei̱ye gutu mu̱mbu̱ghi̱lane na Efu̱looni̱, mutabani̱ wa Johali̱,

angu̱li̱ye ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale, elili mu musili ghuwe oghuli Macepela. Nkumusasuulila haa bbei̱ yoona ya musili oghu kandi hambali baakai̱so bali, niikuwo nanje ntunge ki̱i̱kalo eki ndajiikaghamu bantu banje.”
Efu̱looni̱ eye, akaba asitami̱ye mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Bahi̱ti̱ abaabaagha haa mulyango ghwa kibugha eki, du̱mbi̱ aakuukamu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ banategheleei̱ye. Aamughila ati,
“Bbaa mukama wanje, ontegheeleli̱ye. Nkukuha musili ghwona na ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale ekilimu mu maaso ghaa bantu banje boona. Kandi naakuheeleeye ghuwo busa, oghende ojiikaghemu bantu baawe.”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aatodha aagomba hansi, eebali̱ya bataka baa mu kyalo eki,
aakuukamu Efu̱looni̱ na bantu boona banategheleei̱ye ati, “Bbaa, nkusaba oleke ngule musili oghu bbei̱ eghi ghubhonganuuwe, niikuwo njiikaghemu bantu banje baku̱u̱ye.”
Efu̱looni̱ aakuukamu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati,

“Mukama wanje ontegheeleli̱ye. Musili oghu ghubhonganuuwe bi̱twi̱ke 400 bya siliva. Bhaatu ninaaku̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye ghuwo, takikwoleka bu̱u̱bhootu̱ bbaa. Uwe oghende mu maaso, ojiike mukali̱ waawe oghu aaku̱u̱ye.”

Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aasi̱i̱ma bbei̱ ya Efu̱looni̱ eghi aamulamuuye, baapi̱i̱ma bi̱twi̱ke 400 bya siliva, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kya mu katale, bantu bakulu baa Bahi̱ti̱ baaba baakai̱so baa bughulaani̱ obu.
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaghula musili ghwa Efu̱looni̱, mu kyalo kya Macepela, haai-haai na Mami̱le. Aaghulilamu ki̱i̱na kilimu ebaale na biti byona ebyali bikilimu.
Musili oghu ghwafooka kuba ghuwe, nanga akaghughula mu maaso ghaa bakulu baa Bahi̱ti̱ haa mulyango ghwa tau̱ni̱ yabo.
Du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aajiika mukali̱ wee Saala mu kyalo kya Kanaani̱, mu ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale mu Macepela, haai-haai na Mami̱le, eghi emanu̱u̱we nga Hebbu̱looni̱.
Du̱mbi̱ musili oghu na ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale ebyali bili bya Bahi̱ti̱ byaba eli̱mbe Ebbulahi̱mu̱, hambali alajiikagha bantu be.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ akaba amali̱ye kukaakulila kimui kandi
amali̱ye kumuha mu̱gi̱sa mu bu̱li̱ kintu kyona.
Kilo kimui, Ebbulahi̱mu̱, aaghambila mu̱heeleli̱ya wee, mukulu wa baheeleli̱ya be, oghu akaba alemi̱ye bu̱li̱ kintu kyona eki baabaagha nakiyo ati, “Ote ngalo yaawe hansi ya kibelo kyanje.
Kandi nkubbala olahile mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga wʼomu eghulu na munsi oti, tooliswelela mutabani̱ wanje mukali̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu bahala baa Banakanaani̱.
