Bhaatu olighenda mu nsi yʼewaatu kandi mu nganda syanje, haaliiyo waahila mutabani̱ wanje I̱saka mukali̱.”

Mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aabu̱u̱li̱ya Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, “Ti̱ ninaabooneyo mukali̱ oghu atabbali̱ye kwisa mu kyalo eki tulimu kini, buuye du̱mbi̱ ntwale mutabani̱ waawe I̱saka aghende aakale mu nganda syawe na hambali waalu̱ghi̱ye?”
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Bbaa! Kandi weelinde, otalitwala eghi mutabani̱ wanje.
Nanga

Luhanga wʼomu eghulu, oghu akanjiya ewaa tita kandi munsi yʼewaatu, akandaghi̱i̱sani̱ya kandi aalahila naaghila ati aliha nsi eni yoona baasukulu banje. Aatodha aaghila ati, alituma malai̱ka ewaawe, niikuwo oswelele mutabani̱ wanje mukali̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu nganda syanje.
Mukali̱ oghu obu alikabhenga kwisa naawe, oliba otahendi̱ye ndaghaano yaatu eni. Bhaatu hatalibʼo nsonga yoona eghi elileka otwale mutabani̱ wanje hambali naalu̱ghi̱ye.”
Du̱mbi̱ mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aalahila anataaye ngalo yee hansi ya kibelo kya Ebbulahi̱mu̱, nʼelaghi̱i̱sani̱ya na ngoku akukola byona ebi Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamulaghiiye.

Du̱mbi̱ mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aaheeki̱ya ngamila eku̱mi̱ sya mukama wee Ebbulahi̱mu̱ bisembo bikaniiye kandi ebitembeeye kimui ebi mukama wee oghu aamuhaaye kuha mukali̱ wa mutabani̱ wee. Aamu̱ki̱ya kughenda mu kyalo li̱i̱na lyakiyo Alaamu Nahalahi̱mu̱ ekimanu̱u̱we nga kibugha Mesopotami̱ya, hambali Naholi̱ waani̱na Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aakalagha.
Aaki̱dhayo mbwabaaye lwagholo. Aalaghila ngamila kulangaala hansi haakpengbu̱ ya kyambu, hanja ya kibugha eki. Bwile obu niibuwo bakali̱ baaghi̱i̱laghamu maasi haa kyambu eki.
Mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aatandika kusaba naaghila ati, “
Luhanga wa mukama wanje Ebbulahi̱mu̱, gutu, onsi̱ngu̱li̱i̱si̱ye obwalo buni, onjoleke kukunda kwawe hali mukama wanje Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
Olole neemiliiye haakpengbu̱ ya kyambu hambali bahala baa bantu baa mu tau̱ni̱ eni baku̱ghi̱i̱lagha maasi.

Ti̱ mwana wabukali̱ weena oghu ndakaghila nti ampe haa maasi ghe ninuwʼo, naasi̱i̱ma kandi naaseeselela ngamila syanje, oleke aliiye waaba okomeeye mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe I̱saka. Ti̱ eki nkyanabayʼo, nkughila nti waaghiliiye mukama wanje Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ngughuma syawe.”
Atakamali̱ye kusaba, Lebbeeka aasa aheeki̱ye munagha. Lebbeeka oghu akaba ali muhala wa Bbesweli̱, mutabani̱ wa Naholi̱ na mukali̱ wee Milika. Naholi̱ oghu akaba ali waani̱na Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
Mwana wabukali̱ oghu akaba asemeleeye kimui kandi atamani̱ye basaasa. Aaghenda aataha maasi, aasu̱li̱ya munagha ghuwe, du̱mbi̱ aakuuka.
Mu̱heeleli̱ya oni du̱mbi̱ anguwa bwangu-bwangu, aamwebinga, aamughila ati, “Gutu ompe haa maasi agha oheeki̱ye mu munagha ghwawe.”
Mwana wabukali̱ oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama wanje maasi ngani, onuwʼo.” Du̱mbi̱ Lebbeeka aasu̱ndi̱ya munagha ghwa maasi, aamuha aanuwa.
Obu aamali̱ye kunuwa, aatodha aamughila ati, “Oleke ntahile na ngamila syawe maasi nasiyo sinuwe.”
Maasi obu ghaahooye mu munagha, mwana wabukali̱ oghu aali̱gi̱ta bwangu-bwangu haa kyambu, aataha maasi ghanji, aaghaseeselela ngamila esi, syanuwela kimui, syona syakuta.
Mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aakala analoleleeye mwana wabukali̱ oghu, anaholeei̱ye, naaneeli̱li̱kana
alakaba naamughiliiye ngughuma kusighikila haa kusaba kuwe.
Obu ngamila syamali̱ye kunuwa, du̱mbi̱ akwata mpete ya feeja ya ku̱lu̱wala mu muhuli na bikomo bibili bya feeja bya bbei̱ byaku̱lu̱wala haa mikono, aamuha biyo.
Aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Uwe oli muhala waani̱? Gutu ongambile. Buuye so waawe angututungila kisiika kya kulaalamu obwalo?”
Mwana wabukali̱ oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Si̱ye ndi muhala wa Bbesweli̱, muusukulu wa Naholi̱ na Milika.”
Aatodha aamughila ati, “Tuli na bi̱si̱ngo hamui na biliyo bikani̱ye bya ngamila syawe kandi twaba na kisiika kya baghenu̱.”
Musaasa oni du̱mbi̱ aagomba hansi, aalami̱ya
naanaghila ati, “Asi̱i̱mu̱we
Luhanga wa mukama wanje Ebbulahi̱mu̱. Anjoleki̱ye bulungi na bwesighibuwa bwamaani̱ kandi ampi̱ki̱ya mu nganda siye syonini.”
Mwana wabukali̱ oni aali̱gi̱ta ewaabo e ka, du̱mbi̱ aaghambila bʼewaabo ebyalehukaane byona.
Lebbeeka akaba ali na mwani̱na wee li̱i̱na liye Labbaani̱. Labbaani̱ du̱mbi̱ aali̱gi̱ta kusangaana musaasa oni haa kyambu.

Kusighikila ngoku aali naamali̱ye kubona mpete yʼomu muhuli hamui na bikomo bya haa mikono ya mwani̱na wee kandi naaghu̱u̱ye bighambo Lebbeeka aali naabu̱ghi̱ye, aaghenda hambali musaasa oghu aabaagha. Aasanga anaamiliiye na ngamila siye haai na kyambu eki.
Du̱mbi̱ aamughila ati, “Wiise olaale ewaatu, uwe oghu okaheebuwa mu̱gi̱sa ku̱lu̱gha ewaa
.” Aatodha aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Eki̱leki̱ye oomiliiye hanja nkiki? Naamali̱ye kukughomolela ki̱i̱kalo kya ngamila syawe hamui naawe weenini.”

Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oni aaghenda e ka na Labbaani̱, Labbaani̱ aayʼo ngamila nku̱mba esi syali si̱heeki̱ye, aamwoleka hambali sikulaala kandi aasiha na byokuliya. Du̱mbi̱ baaleetela baheeleli̱ya baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aba maasi ghaa kunaaba mu maghulu,
baabaleetela na byokuliya. Bhaatu mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aaghila ati, “Tankuliya ntakabaghambiiye ebi nkubbala ku̱bu̱gha.” Du̱mbi̱ Labbaani̱ aaghila ati, “Otughambile.”
Du̱mbi̱ aaghila ati, “Si̱ye ndi mu̱heeleli̱ya wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
akaha mukama wanje Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mu̱gi̱sa kandi aatungila kimui. Aamuha ntaama, nte, siliva na feeja, baheeleli̱ya baabusaasa na baabukali̱, ngamila na ndogooi̱.
“Ti̱ Saala mukali̱ wa mukama wanje Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aabyala mwana wabusaasa amali̱ye kukaakulila kimui kandi mwana oghu niiye aahaaye bu̱li̱ kintu kiye kyona.
Mukama wanje oghu akandahi̱li̱ya nangila ati ntaliswelela mutabani̱ wee mukali̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Banakanaani̱, mu etaka hambali niikaaye.
“Aatodha angila ati, ‘Oghende mu ka ya tita kandi mu katu̱la kaatu haaliiyo waaswelela mutabani̱ wanje mukali̱.’
“Du̱mbi̱ nanje naabu̱u̱li̱ya mukama wanje oghu nti, ‘Buuye manaabukali̱ oghu ataasi̱i̱mi̱ye kwisa nanje?’
Ankuukamu ati, ‘
, oghu naakalagha mu maaso ghe, akukusindikila malai̱ka wee ku̱semeli̱ya lughendo lwawe, niikuwo ogubhe kutungila mutabani̱ wanje mukali̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu katu̱la kaatu kandi mu ka ya tita.
Du̱mbi̱ okaakughenda mu katu̱la kaatu, okuba otali na musango haa ebi waalahiiye. Noobu babhenga kukuha mukali̱ oghu, uwe okuba oosu̱li̱i̱si̱i̱ye ebi waalahiiye.’ ”
Mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aatodha aaghila ati, “Obwalo obu naahi̱ki̱ye haa kyambu haala, naaghila nti, ‘Ai̱,
Luhanga wa mukama wanje Ebbulahi̱mu̱, okaakuba obbali̱ye, gutu ompe mu̱gi̱sa mu lughendo luni olu naasi̱yemu.
Olole neemiliiye haakpengbu̱ ya kyambu kini, ti̱ kaakuba manaabukali̱ weena aasa kutaha maasi, du̱mbi̱ mbu̱gha naye nti ampe haa maasi ghe ninuwʼo,
kaakuba angila ati, “Onuwʼo kandi nkutodha ntahile na ngamila syawe nasiyo sinuwe,” oleke aaliiye waaba okomeeye mutabani̱ wa mukama wanje.’
“Ntakamali̱ye kusaba haa mutima ghwanje, Lebbeeka aasa aheeki̱ye munagha ghuwe. Aaghenda haa kyambu kutaha maasi, du̱mbi̱ nanje naamughila nti ampe haa maasi haala ninuwʼo.
“Du̱mbi̱ aaya munagha haa mabegha ghe aasu̱ndi̱ya, aaghila ati, ‘Onuwe kandi nkuha na ngamila syawe nasiyo sinuwe dhee.’ Du̱mbi̱ naanuwa kandi aaha na ngamila syanje.

“Du̱mbi̱ naamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya nti, ‘Oli muhala wa ani̱?’ Ankuukamu ati, ‘Ni muhala wa Bbesweli̱ kandi taata wanje niiye Naholi̱ na mamba niiye Milika.’ Du̱mbi̱ naamu̱lu̱wi̱ka mpete haa muhuli hamui na bikomo haa mikono.
Du̱mbi̱ naagomba hansi, naalami̱ya
. Naasinda
Luhanga wa mukama wanje Ebbulahi̱mu̱ oghu akandinda mu kihanda kandi aaleka naabonayo muusukulu wa mu̱ghenji̱ wee, oghu akasi̱i̱ma kusweluwa mutabani̱ wa mukama wanje oghu.
Ti̱ mulakaba nimughilila mukama wanje ngughuma na bwesighibuwa, kedha mutaakumughilila siyo, mungambile, niikuwo ndole kintu kinji kya kukola.”
Du̱mbi̱ Labbaani̱ na Bbesweli̱ baakuukamu bati, “Etu̱we tatuli na kya kukola kyona, nanga eki ki̱lu̱ghi̱ye ewaa
Olole, Lebbeeka ngughu, omutwale, aghende aabe mukali̱ wa mutabani̱ wa mukama waawe ngoku
aakwoleki̱ye.”
Obu mu̱heeleli̱ya wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaghu̱u̱ye baku̱u̱ki̱yemu batiyo, aagomba hansi, aalami̱ya
Du̱mbi̱ mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aaleeta bintu bya bbei̱ bi̱koleeu̱we mu siliva na feeja, hamui na byaku̱lu̱waala, aabiha Lebbeeka. Kandi aaha ni̱na wee hamui na mu̱ghenji̱ wee bintu bikani̱ye bya bbei̱.

Du̱mbi̱ mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu na bantu aba aabaagha ali nabo baaliya kandi baanuwa, du̱mbi̱ baalangaala ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bwile obu bwakeeye. Obu bwile bwakeeye, mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aaghila ati, “Muleke nkuukeyo ewaa mukama wanje.”
Du̱mbi̱ mwani̱na Lebbeeka na ni̱na wee baamukuukamu bati, “Tu̱ku̱du̱bha kuukala na Lebbeeka kumala bilo eku̱mi̱, niikuwo mughende.”
Bhaatu musaasa oghu aabaghila ati, “Mutankeesekeleja.
aamali̱ye kungilila ngughuma mu lughendo lwanje. Nahabweki muleke nkuukeyo ewaa mukama wanje.”
Du̱mbi̱ baaghila bati, “Oleke tu̱du̱bhe tubilikile Lebbeeka, tu̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ye eki akwete kweli̱li̱kana.”
Baabilikila Lebbeeka, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye oku̱si̱i̱ma kughenda na musaasa oni?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Naasi̱i̱mi̱ye, nkughenda naye.”
Du̱mbi̱ baalagha Lebbeeka, baamuleka aaghenda na mu̱heeleli̱ya wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ na bantu aba aali aasi̱ye nabo. Mukali̱ oghu akalela Lebbeeka ku̱lu̱gha mu bwana buwe, naye aaghenda amuhelekeeye.
Baamuha mu̱gi̱sa ghuwe obu baamulaghagha mbaghila bati,
“Mwani̱naatu̱we,
akuhe mu̱gi̱sa,
obyale baana bakaniiye kimui.
Baasukulu baawe,
batwalaghe etungo lya ngi̱ghu̱ syabo.”
Du̱mbi̱ Lebbeeka na baheeleli̱ya be baabukali̱ baani̱na ngamila, baaghenda na musaasa oghu. Nahabweki mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aaghenda na Lebbeeka.
Bwile obu maka ghaa I̱saka ghakaba ghali Negeebbu haanu̱ma ya ku̱lu̱gha Bbeeli-lahai̱-looyi̱.
Lwagholo lumui, I̱saka aalubhatangagha mu musili naateekeleja, aabona ngamila nsiisa.
Obu Lebbeeka aaloli̱ye elughulu naabona I̱saka, du̱mbi̱ aasu̱ndu̱ka bwangu-bwangu haa ngamila.

Aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Oghu ni musaasa ki oghu akwete kulubhatangila mu musili kwisa kutusangaana?” Mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Ni mukama wanje.” Du̱mbi̱ eeswi̱ki̱li̱la haa li̱i̱so na kaaleeso ke nga mugholi.
Mu̱heeleli̱ya wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ oghu aatandika kughambila I̱saka byona ebi aakoli̱yeyo.

I̱saka aasi̱i̱ma kuswela Lebbeeka, aamutaahi̱ya mu weema ya ni̱na wee Saala. Du̱mbi̱ aaba mukali̱ wee kandi aamukundila kimui. Nankabha ni̱na wee Saala aaku̱u̱ye, Lebbeeka aafooka mu̱hu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya wa I̱saka haabwa ku̱ku̱wa kwa ni̱na wee.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aatodha aaswela mukali̱ onji li̱i̱na liye Keetula.
Aabyala Jimulaani̱, Yokasaani̱, Medeeni̱, Mi̱di̱yaani̱, Isibbaaki, hamui na Suuwa.
Yokasaani̱ aabyala Sebba na Dedaani̱. Baasukulu baa Dedaani̱ ni Basu̱lu̱hi̱mu̱, Baletu̱si̱hi̱mu̱ na Balehu̱mi̱mu̱.
Na batabani̱ baa Mi̱di̱yaani̱ bakaba bali Efaha, Efeli̱, Enoka, Abbi̱da, hamui na Elidaaya. Aba boona bakaba bali baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, aba mu lu̱byalo lwa mukali̱ wee Keetula.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aagweta I̱saka etunga liye lyona.
Bhaatu obu aabaagha atakaku̱u̱ye, aaha bisembo batabani̱ be aba aabyayʼo bakali̱ banji, du̱mbi̱ aababhinga ku̱lu̱gha haai-haai na mutabani̱ wee I̱saka, aabatwala mu kyalo kya bu̱lu̱gha ejooba.
Ebbulahi̱mu̱ akamala myaka 175 munsi,
du̱mbi̱ Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaku̱wa amali̱ye kukaakulila kimui. Aajiikuwa nga baataata be.

Batabani̱ be aba, I̱saka na Sumai̱li̱, baamujiika mu ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale kili mu musili mu kyalo kya Macepela, haai-haai na Mami̱le, mu musili oghwali ghuli ghwa Efu̱looni̱ mutabani̱ wa Johali̱ Mu̱hi̱tahi̱ti̱.
Musili oghu baamu̱ji̱i̱ki̱yemu na mukali̱ wee Saala, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ oghu akaba aasangu̱u̱we aghu̱ghu̱li̱ye eenini mu Bahi̱ti̱.
Haanu̱ma ya ku̱ku̱wa kwa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, Luhanga aaha mutabani̱ wee I̱saka mu̱gi̱sa. I̱saka, oghu aaghenda aakala Bbeeli-lahai̱-looyi̱ mu elungu lya Negeebbu.
Eni niiyo nsoboolola ya lu̱byalo lwa Sumai̱li̱, mutabani̱ wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, oghu aabyayʼo Hagali̱, mu̱syana wa Saala oghu akaba alu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱.
Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaabo, hamui na ntu̱la syabo. Mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa Sumai̱li̱ niiye akaba ali Nebbayosi̱, aalabhi̱yo Kedala, Adi̱bbeeli̱, Mibisaamu,
Miisima, Duuma, Masa,
Hadaadi̱, Teema, Yetu̱li̱, Nafi̱si̱, hamui na Kedeema.

Batabani̱ baa Sumai̱li̱ eku̱mi̱ na babili bani, niibo balemi̱ eku̱mi̱ na babili abaatandi̱ki̱i̱si̱i̱ye ntu̱la eku̱mi̱ nʼebili, esi baalu̱ki̱ye mali̱i̱na ghaabo kandi baghasolongeei̱ye bakwamililiiye bi̱i̱kalo hambali baabaagha baakaaye kedha baghooni̱ye
Sumai̱li̱ aamala munsi myaka 137 ya bukulu, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa, aajiikuwa hamui na baataata be.

Lu̱byalo lwa Sumai̱li̱ lukaakala munsi eghi eli haagati ya Havila na Suula, ebikusanguwagha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Mi̱si̱li̱, ololeleeye luhande lwa kyalo kya Asi̱li̱ya. Baakala bataghonjangaane na baghenji̱ baabo.
Bini niibiyo ebikwetʼo ka na lu̱byalo lwa I̱saka, mutabani̱ wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
I̱saka obu aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 40 ya bukulu, aaswela Lebbeeka muhala wa Bbesweli̱ Munaalaamu ku̱lu̱gha Padanalaamu kandi Lebbeeka oghu akaba ali mwani̱na Labbaani̱ Munaalaamu.
I̱saka aasaba
nanga mukali̱ wee akaba ali ngumba.
aakuukamu kusaba kuwe, du̱mbi̱ mukali̱ wee oghu aaku̱li̱ya.
Balongo aabaagha aku̱li̱i̱ye, baakala ku̱ti̱ngi̱tana munda. Lebbeeka aatandika kwebu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Haabwaki kintu nga kini nkimbʼo?” Du̱mbi̱ aaghenda kwebu̱u̱li̱yʼo
aamukuukamu ati,
“Mahanga abili ghali mu etundu lyawe
kandi aku̱byala baana babili abalyetambulani̱yamu.
Omui aliba wamaani̱ kusaali̱ya muunakiye
kandi wʼobukulu ali̱heeleli̱ya wʼobuto.”
Obu bwile bwa ku̱byala bwahi̱ki̱ye, Lebbeeka aabyala balongo baabusaasa.
Mwana oghu akadu̱bha ku̱byaluwa, akaba ali munjilakaki̱ kandi byoha bimumalakaki̱ye mubili ghwona nga kinyama kya mu kisaka. Baamuluka li̱i̱na bati niiye Esau.
Haanu̱ma, waakabili naye aabyaluwa, mukono ghuwe ghukwete haa kati̱ngelo kaa Esau. Du̱mbi̱ baamuluka li̱i̱na bati niiye Yakobbo.
I̱saka akaba amali̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya myaka nkaagha ya bukulu obu Lebbeeka aabyaye balongo aba.

Batabhana aba baakula. Esau aaba wamaani̱ mu kuhiigha kandi aakilagha munu kuukala mu kisaka bwile buwe bunamu̱nji̱ naahiigha. Bhaatu Yakobbo eye akaba ali mwana mu̱holi̱ya kandi aakalagha e ka bwile bwona.
I̱saka akaba aku̱ndi̱ye Esau nanga aabbalagha kuliya nyama sya mu kisaka esi aamuleetelagha. Lebbeeka eye akaba aku̱ndi̱ye Yakobbo.
Kilo kimui obu Yakobbo aateekagha mukubi, Esau aaki̱dha ku̱lu̱gha mu kisaka aluhiiye kimui.
Aaghila Yakobbo ati, “Njala enkwete kwonini, ompe haa muto ghwawe ghutukuuye haala.” (Eki niikiyo baamulukiiye li̱i̱na linji bati niiye Edomu, makulu ghaaliyo, “Kintu kiimutuku.”)
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “Odu̱bhe ongu̱li̱ye mu̱gi̱sa ghwawe.”
Esau aamukuukamu ati, “Si̱ye njala elimanjita. Mu̱gi̱sa oghu ghuli na mughaso ki ninaanaku̱u̱ye?”
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “Odu̱bhe olahile ngoku olimampa mu̱gi̱sa ghwawe ghwa mu̱li̱ghaaso oghu.” Du̱mbi̱ Esau aalahila ngoku alimamuha ghuwo.
Yakobbo aaha Esau migaati̱ na muto ghwa bikoole oghu. Esau aaliya, aakamali̱ye kuliya, aamuka du̱mbi̱ aaghenda.
Niikuwo Esau aaghahi̱ye atiyo mu̱gi̱sa ghuwe ghwa kuba mu̱li̱ghaaso.

Niibuwo njala yamaani̱ yaaghuuye mu nsi eghi, ngoku yaadu̱bhi̱ye kughuwa mu bwile obu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aabaaghʼo. Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aaghenda mu kyalo kya Gelaali̱, hambali Abbi̱meleeki̱ mukama wa Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱ aakalagha.
Bwile obu,
aabonekela I̱saka, aamughila ati, “Otaghenda eku̱wa e Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi okole ngoku ndakughambila.

Odu̱bhe ookale munsi eni haabwa bwile bukee nga mu̱ku̱lu̱ki̱. Ndaakalagha naawe kandi nkukuha mu̱gi̱sa. Ndimagu̱mi̱ya ngoku nkukuha byalo bini byona na lu̱byalo lwawe lwona, ngoku naakoli̱ye ndaghaano na so waawe Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
Ndikani̱ya baasukulu baawe nga nsooli̱ya syʼeghulu kandi mbahe byalo bini byona. Ti̱ mahanga ghoona ghalitunga mu̱gi̱sa kusaalila mu baasukulu baawe aba.
Nkukola eki nanga Ebbulahi̱mu̱ akasi̱i̱ma kukola ebi naamughambilagha kandi aadhootela bilaghilo byanje byona.”
Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aakala Gelaali̱.

Obu basaasa baa mu kyalo eki baabu̱u̱i̱ye I̱saka haa bikwetʼo mukali̱ wee Lebbeeka, aabaghila ati ni mwani̱na wee. Oobaha kughila ati ni mukali̱ wee nanga bamwita, haabwa kusemela kwa mukali̱ wee oghu.
Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukani̱ye I̱saka aliyeyo, Abbi̱meleeki̱ mukama wa Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱, aalolela hansi ali eghulu mu di̱li̱sa, aabona I̱saka naaseka na mukali̱ wee Lebbeeka.

Niibuwo Abbi̱meleeki̱ aabilikiiye I̱saka aamughila ati, “Haabwaki nuwaaghi̱li̱ye oti Lebbeeka ni mwanjoko waawe?” I̱saka aamukuukamu ati, “Nkabu̱gha ntiyo nanga neeli̱li̱kanagha nti, kedha nangufeeluwa bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanje haabwa mukali̱ oni.”
Du̱mbi̱ Abbi̱meleeki̱ aaghila ati, “Ti̱ waatu̱koli̱ye otiyo nangaaki? Buuye nguli omui mu basaasa bani aakolangaane na mukali̱ oghu tawangubaaye otuleeteleeye musango?”
Abbi̱meleeki̱ du̱mbi̱ aatelʼo bantu be boona kilaghilo ati, “Muntu weena oghu akukola kubhi musaasa oni hamui na mukali̱ wee, akulaghila bamwite.”
Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aahela ndimo yee kandi mu mwaka oghu ghwonini, yeela milundi nga ki̱ku̱mi̱, nanga
akaba naamali̱ye kumuha mu̱gi̱sa.
Musaasa oghu aatungila kimui kandi etungo liye lyeyongeleela kimui.
Aatungila kimui bisolo nga ntaama, mbu̱li̱, nte, hamui na basyana, ekyaleeteli̱i̱je Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱ kumughilila etima.
Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱ aba haabwa etima baaseesa etaka mu byahu̱dhu̱ bya maasi hambali I̱saka aanwelagha, ebi basyana baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ baabaagha bali̱mi̱ye.
Haakumaliilila, Abbi̱meleeki̱ aalaghila I̱saka ku̱lu̱gha mu kyalo eki. Aamughila ati, “Olu̱ghe muni, oghende hanji, nanga uwe waabaaye wamaani̱ kusaali̱ya etu̱we boona.”
Nahabweki I̱saka na bantu be baaku̱lu̱ka mu kyalo eki, baaghenda mu kighona kya Gelaali̱ hambali baakweye weema syabo, du̱mbi̱ baakalayo.

Aatodha aalima buhyaka byahu̱dhu̱ ebyabaagha babi̱li̱mi̱ye mu bwile obu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aabaaghʼo, ebi Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱ baabaagha baaghaaye obu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aaku̱u̱ye. I̱saka aatodha aabiluka mali̱i̱na ghaabiyo ghanamukulu.
Basyana baa I̱saka baalima mu kighona eki kyahu̱dhu̱, baatungayo maasi ghasemeeye.

Bhaatu bali̱i̱si̱ya baa bisolo baalu̱gha Gelaali̱, baatandika kutongana na bali̱i̱si̱ya baa bisolo bya I̱saka mbaghila bati, “Maasi agha ni ghaatu.” Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aaluka kyahu̱dhu̱ eki li̱i̱na ati Eseki̱, elikumani̱i̱si̱ya, “Mpaka.”
Basyana baa I̱saka baalima kyahu̱dhu̱ kinji, nakiyo baatodha baakitonganilana na bali̱i̱si̱ya aba. Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aakiluka li̱i̱na ati niikiyo Si̱ti̱na, elikumani̱i̱si̱ya, “Bunanji̱ghu̱wa.”
I̱saka aalu̱gha haala, du̱mbi̱ batodha baalima kyahu̱dhu̱ kinji. Dhelu eki takyabaayʼo ntongani̱ yoona bbaa. Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aaluka kyahu̱dhu̱ eki li̱i̱na lya “Lehobboti̱,” aaghila ati, “Dhelu
aatuhaaye ki̱i̱kalo kya kuukalamu kandi tukuguudhaalilamu.”
I̱saka aalu̱ghayo, aaghenda Bbeli̱seba
hambali

aamubonekeeye mu kilo kyonini eki aaki̱dhi̱i̱yemu. Du̱mbi̱ aamughila ati, “Ndi Luhanga wa so waawe Ebbulahi̱mu̱. Otoobaha nanga nkuba naawe. Nkukuha mu̱gi̱sa kandi nkani̱ye muhendo ghwa baasukulu baawe haabwa mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje Ebbulahi̱mu̱.”
I̱saka aakwelʼo kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi aalami̱ya
. Aakwelʼo weema yee kandi baheeleli̱ya be baalimʼo kyahu̱dhu̱.
Kilo kimui, Mukama Abbi̱meleeki̱ aalu̱gha Gelaali̱, ali na mu̱hi̱ wee wa magheji li̱i̱na liye Ahusaati, hamui na Fi̱kooli̱ mukulu wa baasilikale be.
Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Buuye mbiki byabaleeti̱ye eni, kuni mukambhinga ewaanu nanga kunjoha?”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Tuboone bbeni̱-bbeni̱ tuti
ali naawe. Nahabweki tukubbala kutunga nkolangana esemeeye naanu. Nahabweki muleke tukole ndaghaano.
Olahile oti tookutukola kubhi, ngoku naatu tutaaku̱koli̱ye kubhi. Bwile bwona tukakukola kusemeeye, na bwile obu twabalaghi̱ye ewaatu, tukabalagha mu bu̱si̱nge. Tooli̱ olole ngoku
aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa.”
I̱saka aabakolela ki̱ghenu̱, baaliya kandi baanuwa.
Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, bu̱li̱ muntu aalahila kilahilo ngoku atalisobola kutalibani̱ya muunakiye. Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aabasindika mu maka ghaabo, baaghenda, baamu̱ti̱gha na bu̱si̱nge.
Kilo eki kyonini, basyana baa I̱saka baasa baamughambila ngoku baali̱mi̱ye kyahu̱dhu̱ kandi ngoku baaboone maasi ghasemeeye.
Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aaluka kyahu̱dhu̱ eki li̱i̱na ati niikiyo Si̱bba (makulu ghaaliyo, “kilahilo”). Ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi, tau̱ni̱ eghi bakughighilaghamu Bbeli̱seba.
Obu Esau aamali̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya myaka 40, aaswela Yu̱di̱ta muhala wa Bbeeli̱ hamui na Bbasemaati muhala wa Elooni̱ baa mu ntu̱la ya Bahi̱ti̱.
Bakali̱ baa Esau aba baaleeteleja bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa I̱saka na Lebbeeka kuba bwa bujune.
Kilo kimui, I̱saka amali̱ye kukaakula na kuughala maaso, aabilikila Esau mutabani̱ wee wʼobukulu aamughila ati, “Mwana wanje.” Esau aamukuukamu ati, “Ndi hani tita.”
Ese wee aamughila ati, “Si̱ye naamali̱ye kukaakula. Ti̱ tanimani̱ye kilo eki nku̱kwi̱lamu.
Nkubbala okwate buta bwawe na bimala, oghende onjitile kisolo kya mu kisaka.
Onteekele kusemeeye byokuliya ebi nku̱ndi̱ye, ti̱ obindeetele hani mbiliye, du̱mbi̱ nkukuha mu̱gi̱sa ntakaku̱u̱ye.”
Kwesi̱ Lebbeeka aaghu̱u̱ye ebi bali̱i̱ wee I̱saka aaghambilagha mutabani̱ wee Esau. Obu Esau aaghendi̱ye mu kisaka kuhiighila ese wee,
Lebbeeka aaghambila mutabani̱ wee Yakobbo ati, “Olole, naaghu̱u̱ye so waawe naaghila ati Esau
aghende amwitile kisolo kya mu kisaka, niikuwo amuteekele byokuliya bisemeeye, du̱mbi̱ akumusabila mu̱gi̱sa mu maaso ghaa
eye atakaku̱u̱ye.”
Du̱mbi̱ aamuha magheji, aamughila ati, “Mwana wanje nkubbala ontegheeleli̱ye kandi okole kyonini eki nkukughambila.
Oghende mu bu̱hi̱yo bwa mbu̱li̱, ooyeyo mbu̱li̱ ebili, osindeetele. Oleke si̱ye nteekele so waawe kiihulo kisemeeye ngoku akubbalagha.
Du̱mbi̱ omutwalile kiyo, Esau atakaasi̱ye, niikuwo uwe otwale mu̱gi̱sa oghu.”
Yakobbo aakuukamu ni̱na wee ati, “Wamaaha Esau ali na byoha haa mubili ghuwe ghwona kandi si̱ye ndi na mubili ghu̱telelu̱ki̱ye.
Ti̱ buuye tita naananku̱mi̱yʼo, taakughila ati ndimamu̱dhomi̱ya, neeleeteleje mukiino ghwa busa mu ki̱i̱kalo kya mu̱gi̱sa?”
Ni̱na wee aamukuukamu ati, “Mwana wanje, oleke mukiino oghu ghube hali si̱ye. Kuuyʼo uwe okole eki naakughambiiye nti ondeetele mbu̱li̱.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aatuwa hanja, aaleetela ni̱na wee mbu̱li̱. Lebbeeka aasitwala, aasibaagha, aateekela I̱saka kiihulo kinuliiye kimui ngoku aabbalagha.
Du̱mbi̱ Lebbeeka aakoma lughoye lusemeeye lwa mwana wee wa bukulu Esau, olu Lebbeeka aabaagha abi̱i̱ki̱ye mu numba, aaluha mwana wee wʼobuto Yakobbo aalu̱waala.
Aaswi̱ki̱la mikono hamui na bi̱twi̱ke bya bikiya bya Yakobbo ebyali bi̱telelu̱ki̱ye na luhu lwa mbu̱li̱.
Du̱mbi̱ aaha Yakobbo kiihulo kinuliiye kimui, aatʼo migaati̱ aateeki̱ye.
Yakobbo aaghenda ewaa ese wee, aamubilikila ati, “Tita.”
I̱saka aamukuukamu ati, “Mwana wanje, naani̱ akwete kumbilikila?”
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni Esau, mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwawe. Naakoli̱ye ngoku wandaghiiye. Oomuke ositame, oliye, niikuwo ompe mu̱gi̱sa ghwawe.”
I̱saka aabu̱u̱li̱ya mutabani̱ wee ati, “Mwana wanje, waatu̱ngi̱ye oti̱ya kisolo eki bwangu?”
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “
Luhanga waawe niiye aaleki̱ye naakitunga.”
Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aaghila Yakobbo ati, “Weesu̱kane haai-haai nku̱ku̱mʼo, niikuwo nimanye majima olakaba oli Esau eenini.”
Yakobbo eesu̱kana haai-haai na ese wee, du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aamu̱ku̱mʼo. Aaghila ati, “Kusa mumelo ni ghwa Yakobbo, bhaatu mikono ni ya Esau.”
I̱saka aasaaghuwa kumaniilila Yakobbo nanga mikono yee ekaba eli na byoha nga bya Esau. Du̱mbi̱ eeteekani̱ja kuha Yakobbo mu̱gi̱sa.
I̱saka aatodha aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Bhaatu majima kuwo niiwe mwana wanje Esau?”
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni.”
Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aaghila ati, “Mwana wanje, ondeetele byokuliya wanteekeeye. Oleke mbiliye, niikuwo nkuhe mu̱gi̱sa.”
Yakobbo aaleetela ese wee byokuliya, aabiliya kandi aanuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi aamuleeteeye.
Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aaghila Yakobbo ati, “Mwana wanje, oneesu̱kane haai-haai nkughuwe mu ki̱ku̱bha.”
Yakobbo aamwesu̱kana haai-haai, du̱mbi̱ aamughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha. Obu I̱saka aaghu̱u̱ye kisu kya mu lughoye lwa Esau olu Yakobbo aali alu̱wete, aaha Yakobbo mu̱gi̱sa naaghila ati,
“Haa! Kisu kya mutabani̱ wanje
kili nga musili
oghu
ahaaye mu̱gi̱sa.
Luhanga akuhe mu̱gi̱sa ku̱lu̱gha mu eghulu
kandi mbu̱la na ki̱me,
bihaaghe lwejo etaka lyawe,
niikuwo weeleli̱yaghe kimui bilimuwa byawe.
Mahanga ghakani̱ye ghaku̱heeleli̱yaghe,
na bantu boona baku̱teeleli̱yaghe.
Obe mukama wa baghenji̱ baawe
kandi na baa njoko waawe baku̱teeleli̱yaghe.
Boona abalakukiinagha, nabo balakiinuwagha.
Abalakuhaagha mu̱gi̱sa, nabo balaghuheebuwagha.”
I̱saka akaba amakamala ati kumuha mu̱gi̱sa, na Yakobbo amakamu̱lu̱ghʼo ati, du̱mbi̱ Esau naye aaki̱dha ku̱lu̱gha mu kuhiigha.
Naye dhee aateeka byokuliya bi̱nu̱li̱ye, aabileetela ese wee. Aamughila ati, “Tita, oomuke oliye, naakuteekeeye byokuliya na ngoku wandaghiiye, niikuwo ompe mu̱gi̱sa ghwawe.”
Ese wee I̱saka aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Uwe nuuwe ani̱?” Esau aamukuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni mutabani̱ waawe kandi mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwawe, Esau.”

Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aasweka kandi aatandika kutukumila, du̱mbi̱ aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Buuye ni ani̱ oghu aku̱lu̱gha kunjihuulila kiihulo kya nyama sya mu kisaka endindi otakaasi̱ye? Naamali̱ye kuliya kandi naamali̱ye kumuha mu̱gi̱sa, tandi nangoku ndasobola kumuuyʼo ghuwo.”
Obu Esau aaghu̱u̱ye ebi ese wee aabu̱ghi̱ye, aatandika kulilila kimui, naneesengeleli̱ya ese wee ati, “Tita, nanje dhee gutu, ompe mu̱gi̱sa.”
Bhaatu I̱saka aamukuukamu ati, “Wanjoko waawe aasi̱ye andimaaga kandi aatwala mu̱gi̱sa ghwawe.”
Esau aaghila ati, “Buuye taki̱hi̱ki̱ye kumughilamu Yakobbo?
Oghu ghwaba mulundi ghwakabili nanjibha. Akatwala mu̱gi̱sa ghwanje ghwa kuba mu̱li̱ghaaso. Ti̱ olole aatodhi̱ye kutwala mu̱gi̱sa ghwanje. Buuye nanje tawambiikiiyeyo hakili mu̱gi̱sa ghumui bughila?”

Bhaatu I̱saka aamughila ati, “Naamali̱ye kufoola Yakobbo kuba mukama waawe kandi naamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha nti baghenji̱ be boona bakuba basyana be kandi naamuha mu̱gi̱sa ghwa kweli̱yagha bilimuwa bikaniiye kimui na binji ebilalu̱ghaghamu vi̱i̱ni̱. Mwana wanje, taaliyo eki nkugubha kukukolela bbaa.”
Esau aaghila ese wee ati, “Tita, majima kuwo waabaagha na mu̱gi̱sa ghumui ghwonkaha? Gutu tita, nanje ompe mu̱gi̱sa.” Du̱mbi̱ Esau aalilila kimui.
Ese wee I̱saka aamukuukamu ati,
“Uwe olaakalagha hʼetaka elitaakweli̱yagha bilimuwa
kandi mbu̱la teelatoonagha mu etaka lyawe bbaa.
Kihiyo kyawe niikiyo kilakulindagha
kandi okuba mu̱syana wa mu̱ghenji̱ waawe.
Bhaatu obu olyekamba kwelwanʼo,
olitunga bughabe ku̱mu̱lu̱ghʼo.”

Ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu, Esau oohela kimui Yakobbo haabwa mu̱gi̱sa oghu ese wee aamuhaaye. Du̱mbi̱ Esau aakwatuwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha, aatandika kuteekeleja ati, “Bwile bwa tita ku̱ku̱wa buli haai ku̱hi̱ka, du̱mbi̱ nanje ndiita mu̱ghenji̱ wanje Yakobbo.”
Obu baaghambiiye Lebbeeka ebi mutabani̱ wee wabukulu Esau akwete kweli̱li̱kana, du̱mbi̱ aatu̱mi̱i̱si̱ya mutabani̱ wee Yakobbo, aamughila ati, “Mu̱ghenji̱ waawe Esau niibuwo aabbala kukwita.”
Ti̱ mwana wanje okole ngoku ndakakughambila: Oomu̱ki̱ye bwangu, oolukile ewaa mwani̱naasi̱ye Labbaani̱ mu kyalo kya Halaani̱.
Ookaleyo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya wanjoko waawe ki̱i̱ni̱gha kimuhooyʼo.
Ki̱i̱ni̱gha kikaakumuhuwʼo, naamala kuubululuwa eki waamu̱koli̱ye, ndikumani̱i̱si̱ya niikuwo okuuke, nanga tambbali̱ye kubafeeluwa enu̱we bombi haa mulundi ghumui.
Du̱mbi̱ Lebbeeka aaghila I̱saka ati, “Ni̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye neetamu̱u̱we kuukala na bahala baa Bahi̱ti̱ bani. Kandi mutabani̱ wanje Yakobbo kukaswela mu ntu̱la ya Bahi̱ti̱, hakili nku̱we.”
Du̱mbi̱ I̱saka aabilikila Yakobbo, aamuha mu̱gi̱sa kandi aamughila ati, “Otaliswela mukali̱ weena ku̱lu̱gha mu bahala baa Banakanaani̱.
Kuuyo oghende Padanalaamu ewaa taata waawe Bbesweli̱, aliiye waaswela mukali̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu bahala baa sookulu waawe Labbaani̱.
Ti̱ Luhanga wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona ahe buswele bwawe mu̱gi̱sa, niikuwo obyale baana bakani̱ye kandi baasule munsi yoona.
Akuhe mu̱gi̱sa hamui na baasukulu baawe nga oghu aahaaye Ebbulahi̱mu̱, niikuwo naawe otwale kyalo eki olimu nga munamahanga, eki Luhanga aahaaye Ebbulahi̱mu̱.”
I̱saka aalagha Yakobbo, du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aaghenda Padanalaamu ewaa Labbaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Bbesweli̱ Munaalaamu, waani̱na Lebbeeka, ni̱na Yakobbo na Esau.

Esau aamanya ngoku I̱saka aahaaye Yakobbo mu̱gi̱sa kandi aamutuma kughenda Padanalaamu kuswelayo mukali̱. Ti̱ obu aamali̱ye kumuha mu̱gi̱sa, aamughila ati, “Otaliswela mukali̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu bahala baa Banakanaani̱.”
Esau aatodha aamanya ngoku Yakobbo aadhooteeye babyaye be obu baamu̱tu̱mi̱ye kughenda Padanalaamu.
Esau aakenga ngoku bahala baa Banakanaani̱ aba aadu̱bhi̱ye kuswela baali batadheedhi̱ye ese wee I̱saka.
Du̱mbi̱ Esau aaswela Mahalasi, muhala wa Sumai̱li̱ mutabani̱ wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱. Aamwongela haa bakali̱ be, Mahalasi akaba ali mwani̱na Nebbayosi̱.
Niibuwo Yakobbo aalu̱ghi̱ye Bbeli̱seba, aaghenda mu kyalo kya Halaani̱.
Obu aanaghendagha, haabwa bwile kwala, aasitama mu ki̱i̱kalo kimui, aakoma ebaale aalyegi̱ma na mutuwe ghuwe, aalangaala kandi aaghwesaghila.
Obu aali anaghwesaghiiye, aaloota basi̱mbi̱ye madaala hansi hambali aali alangaaye ghahi̱ki̱i̱ye kimui mu eghulu, baamalai̱ka baa Luhanga mbani̱i̱ni̱lʼo kandi mbanasu̱ndu̱ki̱lʼo.
Du̱mbi̱
amwemilila elughulu ngʼala. Aaghila ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni
Luhanga wa so waawe Ebbulahi̱mu̱ hamui na I̱saka. Nkukuha hamui na baasukulu baawe kyalo eki olangaaye mu eki.
Baasukulu baawe aba balikanila kimui nga tu̱u̱tu̱, balikanila kimui mu bi̱twi̱ke byona bya munsi kandi bantu boona balitunga mu̱gi̱sa ku̱lu̱gha muliibo.
Si̱ye ndiikala naawe, ndakulindagha hoona hambali olaghendagha kandi nku̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye munsi eni. Tandikuleka ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ndimala kukukolela byona ebi nakulaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.”
Obu Yakobbo aasu̱su̱mu̱ki̱ye, aaghila ati, “Majima kuwo
ali mu ki̱i̱kalo kini, bhaatu si̱ye naabaagha ntakimani̱ye bbaa.”
Du̱mbi̱ oobahila kimui, aaghila ati, “Ki̱i̱kalo kini nkyamaani̱, niikiyo Numba ya Luhanga kandi niikiyo elembo lya kughenda mu eghulu.”
Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, Yakobbo aakwata ebaale eli aabaagha eegi̱mi̱ye hansi ya mutuwe ghuwe, aalisimba nga mpaghi ya kuusukilaghʼo, du̱mbi̱ aaliseesʼo mafu̱ta.
Ki̱i̱kalo eki Yakobbo aakighilamu ati niikiyo Bbeteeli̱ (kikumani̱i̱si̱ya numba ya Luhanga), bhaatu li̱i̱na lya kibugha eki lyaku̱du̱bha baakighilaghamu Lu̱u̱ji̱.
Niibuwo Yakobbo aalahiiye naaghila ati, “Luhanga naakaaye nanje hoona hambali ndakaghendagha kandi ampa byokuliya na ngoye,
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ndikuuka kulungi mu maka ghaa tita, niibuwo
akuba Luhanga wanje.
Ti̱ ebaale lini eli naami̱li̱i̱ye nga mpaghi, lilifooka numba ya Luhanga. Kandi haa byona ebi olampaagha, ndakuhaaghʼo kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱.”
Yakobbo eeyongela kughenda, du̱mbi̱ aaki̱dha mu bantu baa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba.

Makakuba ati li̱i̱so, aabona kyahu̱dhu̱ kya Maasi hambali aasangi̱ye biigambi̱ bisatu bya bu̱hi̱yo bya ntaama. Mu kyahu̱dhu̱ eki niimuwo ntaama esi syanwelagha kandi hakaba haliyo ebaale liinamu̱li̱to haa mu̱nu̱wa ghwakiyo.
Ntaama syona sya mu ki̱twi̱ke eki syakaasagha haa kyahu̱dhu̱ eki, bali̱i̱si̱ya baasiyo boona baati̱ngi̱tagha ebaale eli baliiyʼo. Ti̱ syakabaagha nsi̱lu̱ghʼo, baatodhagha bali̱hi̱li̱ngi̱ti̱yʼo.
Yakobbo aabu̱u̱li̱ya bali̱i̱si̱ya baa ntaama esi ati, “Enu̱we mu̱lu̱ghi̱ye haa, baghenji̱ banje?”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Tu̱lu̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye mu kyalo kya Halaani̱.”
Aatodha aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mumani̱ye Labbaani̱ muusukulu wa Naholi̱?”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Tumumani̱ye.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Buuye ali kulungi?”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Ee, ali kulungi. Olole na muhala wee Lakeeli̱ ali hani, naye niibuwo aali̱i̱si̱ya ntaama.”
Yakobbo aabaghila ati, “Ngoku bwile bunaakaaye, haabwaki mutanwesi̱ya bisolo byanu. Muha ntaama esi maasi kandi mu̱si̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye haa bi̱si̱ngo?”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Tatukugubha kukola eki, ntaama syona sitakamali̱ye kugumbaana hamui na kuuyʼo kibaale ekili haa mu̱nu̱wa ghwa kyahu̱dhu̱ eki.”
Obu Yakobbo anabu̱ghagha nabo atiyo, du̱mbi̱ Lakeeli̱ aaki̱dha na ntaama sya ese wee, nanga Lakeeli̱ oghu naye akaba ali mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya wa ntaama esi.

Obu Yakobbo aaboone Lakeeli̱ adongeei̱ye ntaama sya ese wee Labbaani̱, aali̱gi̱ta bwangu aahi̱li̱ngi̱ti̱ya kibaale ekyabaagha haa mu̱nu̱wa ghwa kyahu̱dhu̱ eki, aatandika kuha ntaama esi maasi ghaa kunuwa.
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aaghuwa Lakeeli̱ mu ki̱ku̱bha, aatandika kulila.
Aaghila Lakeeli̱ ati, “Si̱ye ndi lughanda lwa so waawe, nanga ndi mutabani̱ wa mwani̱na wee Lebbeeka.” Du̱mbi̱ Lakeeli̱ aali̱gi̱ta kughambila ese wee.

Obu Labbaani̱ aaghu̱u̱ye makulu agha ghakwetʼo Yakobbo mutabani̱ wa mwani̱na wee, anguhila kimui kughenda kumusangaana. Obu aamuboone, aamughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha, aamutwala mu numba yee, du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aatandika kumusoboolola bighambo ebi.
Labbaani̱ aamughila ati, “Uwe oli mwana wanje eenini kandi saghama yanje.”
Haanu̱ma ya Yakobbo kumala mu maka ghaa Labbaani̱ kweli̱ kumui,
Labbaani̱ aaghila Yakobbo ati, “Uwe kuba mwana wanje takikuleka onkolele milimo ya busa bbaa, kuuyʼo ongambile musaala oghu ndakusasulagha.”
Labbaani̱ akaba ali na bahala be babili. Wʼobukulu niiye akaba ali Leei̱ya na wʼobuto aniiye Lakeeli̱.
Leei̱ya akaba asemeeye haali̱i̱so, bhaatu Lakeeli̱ akaba asemeeye mubili hamui na haali̱i̱so.
Yakobbo aabbalila kimui Lakeeli̱, du̱mbi̱ aaghila Labbaani̱ ati, “Oleke nkukolele kumala myaka musanju̱, niikuwo obu ndimala, ompe muhala waawe Lakeeli̱.”
Labbaani̱ aaghila ati, “Eki kisemeeye uwe kumutwala kukaleka muntu onji naamutwala. Ti̱ ookale hani nanje.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aatandika kumukolela kumala myaka musanju̱ eghi. Bhaatu kusighikila ngoku aabaagha abbali̱ye Lakeeli̱, myaka musanju̱ eghi ekamufookela nga bilo bikee.
Obu Yakobbo aamali̱ye myaka yee musanju̱, aaghila Labbaani̱ ati, “Naamali̱ye myaka eghi wantwi̱li̱i̱ye, ompe mukali̱ wanje tutandike buswele bwatu.”
Nahabweki Labbaani̱ aabilikila bantu baa mu kyalo eki, aabakolela ki̱ghenu̱.
Bhaatu bwile obu bwali̱ye, Labbaani̱ aaleeta muhala wee Leei̱ya mu mweli̱ma, aamuha Yakobbo. Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aalangaala naye.
(Labbaani̱ aahaayo mu̱syana wee Ji̱li̱pa kughenda kuba mu̱syana wa muhala wee Leei̱ya.)

Obu bwile bwakeeye, niibuwo Yakobbo aamaniliiye mukali̱ wee aasanga ali Leei̱ya bamuhaaye. Du̱mbi̱ aaghenda ewaa Labbaani̱, aamughila ati, “Kini nkiki wankoli̱ye? Si̱ye nkakukolela haabwa Lakeeli̱, bhaatu olole uwe ngoku wandimaagi̱ye kughenda kumpa Leei̱ya oghu ntaakoleeleeye!”
Labbaani̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Takibhonganuuwe mu asi̱li̱ yaatu ku̱du̱bha ku̱sweleesi̱ya mwana wʼobuto, wʼobukulu analiyo bbaa.
Odu̱bhe ookale nʼoghu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bilo byanu musanju̱ bya bugholi bihooyʼo, niikuwo obu olakasi̱i̱ma kutodha kunkolela haabwa myaka enji musanju̱, niibuwo nkukuha na Lakeeli̱.”
Yakobbo aasi̱i̱ma, aamala na Leei̱ya bilo musanju̱ bya bugholi. Du̱mbi̱ Labbaani̱ aamuha Lakeeli̱ naye kuba mukali̱ wee.
Labbaani̱ aahaayo mu̱syana wee Bbi̱i̱la kughenda kuba mu̱syana wa muhala wee Lakeeli̱.
Yakobbo aalangaala na Lakeeli̱ kandi aamubbalila kimui kusaali̱ya Leei̱ya. Du̱mbi̱ eeyongela kukolela Labbaani̱ myaka enji musanju̱ eghi baalaghaane.
Obu
aaboone Yakobbo atabbali̱ye Leei̱ya, du̱mbi̱ aaha Leei̱ya lu̱byalo, Lakeeli̱ aakala anali ngumba.
Leei̱ya aaku̱li̱ya, aabyala mwana wabusaasa. Aaghila ati “
aaboone kubona-bona kwanje kandi bali̱i̱ wanje akunkunda.” Du̱mbi̱ aaluka mwana oghu li̱i̱na ati Leu̱bbeeni̱.
Aatodha aaku̱li̱ya kandi aabyala mwana wabusaasa dhee. Aaghila ati, “
aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku batanku̱ndi̱ye, akampa mwana wabusaasa onji.” Naye aamuluka li̱i̱na ati Si̱mi̱yooni̱.

Aatodha aaku̱li̱ya, aabyala mwana onji kandi naye wabusaasa. Aaghila ati, “Dhelu bali̱i̱ wanje hamui nanje tukuba mu bumui, nanga naamu̱byaliiye baana baabusaasa basatu.” Aamuluka li̱i̱na ati niiye Leevi̱.
Aatodha aaku̱li̱ya kandi aabyala mwana onji wabusaasa. Du̱mbi̱ aaghila ati, “Dhelu mulundi ghuni nku̱si̱i̱ma
.” Mwana oghu aamuluka li̱i̱na ati niiye Yu̱da.
Du̱mbi̱ aaleka ku̱byala.
Obu Lakeeli̱ aaboone atabyaliiye Yakobbo mwana, aakwatiluwa mwana waani̱na wee Leei̱ya etima. Du̱mbi̱ aaghila Yakobbo ati, “Ombyalʼo baana, kitali eki, nku̱ku̱wa.”
Yakobbo aasaliluwa, aamughila ati, “Buuye ni̱i̱si̱ye Luhanga oghu aleki̱ye otabyala?”
Du̱mbi̱ Lakeeli̱ aamughila ati, “Oghende olangaale na mu̱syana wanje Bbi̱i̱la, omubyalʼo baana niikuwo nanje ntunge baana ku̱lu̱gha mu eye.”
Yakobbo aasi̱i̱ma, du̱mbi̱ aalangaala na Bbi̱i̱la mu̱syana wa mukali̱ wee Lakeeli̱.
Bbi̱i̱la aaku̱li̱ya kandi aabyala mwana wabusaasa.
Du̱mbi̱ Lakeeli̱ aaghila ati, “Luhanga antwi̱li̱i̱yemu kulungi, majima kuwo aaghu̱u̱ye kusaba kwanje kandi ampa mwana wabusaasa.” Du̱mbi̱ aamuluka li̱i̱na ati niiye Daani̱.
Bbi̱i̱la aatodha aaku̱li̱ya, aabyala mwana waakabili.
Du̱mbi̱ Lakeeli̱ aaghila ati, “Majima kuwo naalwane na maani̱ kandi naasi̱ngu̱la wamaaha.” Du̱mbi̱ mwana oghu aamuluka li̱i̱na Nafutaali.
Obu Leei̱ya naye aaboone aleki̱ye ku̱byala, aaleeta mu̱syana wee Ji̱li̱pa, aamuha Yakobbo ati amuswele.
Du̱mbi̱ Ji̱li̱pa naye aabyalila Yakobbo mwana wabusaasa.
Leei̱ya aaghila ati, “Ghuni nga ghuli mu̱gi̱sa ghwamaani̱!” Du̱mbi̱ mwana oghu aamuluka li̱i̱na Gaadi̱.
Ji̱li̱pa aabyala mwana waakabili kandi na wabusaasa.
Leei̱ya aaghila ati, “Ndheedheeu̱we endindi kandi bakali̱ boona balabu̱ghagha ngoku ndheedheeu̱we.” Du̱mbi̱ mwana oghu aamuluka li̱i̱na Aseli̱.

Kilo kimui mu bwile bwa kukesa ngano, Leu̱bbeeni̱ aaghenda mu musili, aabonayo bi̱dodoi̱ma, aabiiyayo, aabileetela ni̱na wee Leei̱ya. Du̱mbi̱ Lakeeli̱ aaghila Leei̱ya ati, “Nkwesengeleei̱ye ompe haa bi̱dodoi̱ma bya mutabani̱ waawe.”

Leei̱ya aamukuukamu ati, “Okanjiyʼo bali̱i̱ wanje, ti̱ ndatodha nkuhe na bi̱dodoi̱ma bya mutabani̱ wanje? Kwesi̱ otwale bali̱i̱ waawe akumali̱ye.” Lakeeli̱ aaghila ati, “Hakili ompʼo niikuwo nanje ndakuhaaye alangaale ewaawe kilo kimui bughila.”

Obu Yakobbo aalu̱ghi̱ye haa musili lwagholo, Leei̱ya aaghenda kumusangaana, aamughila ati, “Okulaghiluwa obwalo kulaala nanje, nanga naaku̱ghu̱li̱ye na bi̱dodoi̱ma bya mutabani̱ wanje.” Yakobbo aasi̱i̱ma du̱mbi̱ aalangaalayo.
Luhanga aaghu̱wa kusaba kwa Leei̱ya, du̱mbi̱ Leei̱ya aaku̱li̱ya, aabyala mwana waakataano kandi naye wabusaasa.
Leei̱ya aaghila ati, “Kini ni kisembo kyanje Luhanga ampaaye haabwa mu̱syana wanje oghu naahaaye bali̱i̱ wanje.” Du̱mbi̱ mwana oghu aamuluka li̱i̱na I̱sakaali.
Leei̱ya aatodha aaku̱li̱ya etundu lyamukaagha, aabyala mwana onji wabusaasa.

Leei̱ya aaghila ati, “Luhanga ampaaye kisembo kyanje kyamaani̱, dhelu bali̱i̱ wanje alampaagha ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, nanga naamu̱byaliiye baana baabusaasa mukaagha.” Du̱mbi̱ mwana oghu aamuluka li̱i̱na Jabbu̱looni̱.
Haanu̱ma Leei̱ya aabyala mwana wabukali̱, aamuluka li̱i̱na Dina.
Niibuwo Luhanga aasu̱ki̱ye Lakeeli̱, du̱mbi̱ naye aamuha lu̱byalo.
Lakeeli̱ aaku̱li̱ya, aabyala mwana wabusaasa, du̱mbi̱ aaghila ati, “Luhanga anji̱hi̱yʼo nsoni̱.”
Mwana oghu aamuluka li̱i̱na Yojeefu̱,
kandi aaghila ati, “
anyongele mwana onji wabusaasa.”
Obu Lakeeli̱ aamali̱ye ku̱byala Yojeefu̱, du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aaghila Labbaani̱ ati, “Oleke nkuuke ewaatu hambali naalu̱ghi̱ye.
Onsi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye ngende na baana hamui na bakali̱ banje boona aba naatu̱ngi̱ye haabwa kukukolela. Ti̱ uwe omani̱ye milimo yoona eghi naakukoleeye.”
Labbaani̱ aamughila ati, “Nuwaabaaye ongiliiye ngughuma, gutu ookale hani. Naamali̱ye kwolekuwa ngoku
ampaaye mu̱gi̱sa haabwawe.”
Aatodha aamughila ati, “Ongambile kyona eki okubbala, si̱ye ndakuhaagha kiyo.”
Yakobbo aamughila ati, “Olole milimo yamaani̱ eghi naakukoleeye eghi yoona, bisolo byawe byona byaku̱li̱ye kulungi haabwanje.
Nkakusanga na bisolo bikee, bhaatu olole ngoku byeyongeeye kandi
aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa haabwanje. Ti̱ si̱ye ndekolela dhi̱ kintu kisemeeye ewanje?”
Labbaani̱ aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Buuye nkuhe ki?”
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “Tambbali̱ye na kantu bbaa. Bhaatu nuwaanakoli̱ye eki ndimakughambila kini, nkuukala niinali̱i̱si̱ya bisolo byawe.
Oleke ngende mu bisolo byawe byona niiyemu byana bya ntaama bijilaghu̱li̱ hamui na bya mbu̱li̱ biibhitanga, kedha bughondo byona haaliibiyo byaba musaala ghwanje.

Niikuwo bwesighibuwa bwanje okububona obu okwisa kulola mu ebi ndaba niiyemu. Ti̱ kasita osangamu mbu̱li̱ yoona eghi etali bhitanga kedha bughondo, na ntaama eghi etali njilaghu̱li̱, bu̱li̱ eghi nkuba ngi̱i̱bhi̱ye.”
Labbaani̱ aaghila ati, “Naasi̱i̱mi̱ye, oleke kibe ngoku waabu̱ghi̱ye.”
Bhaatu kilo eki kyonini, Labbaani̱ aayamu ntu̱u̱li̱ sya mbu̱li̱ syona esi baalaghaane na Yakobbo, aasiha batabani̱ be kusiloleelela.
Du̱mbi̱ baabitwala lughendo lwa bilo bisatu ku̱lu̱gha hambali Yakobbo aabaagha. Bhaatu Yakobbo eeyongela na ku̱li̱i̱si̱ya bisolo bya Labbaani̱ ebyati̱ghaayʼo.
Bhaatu Yakobbo aaleeta buti bwa matolu̱, bunji butukuuye, hamui na bunji obwali budhootaagi̱ye, aatandika kubututuula mighongo yabuwo naanatʼo bugalagala bujelu.
Buti obu aabusimba mu maaso ghaa biidhebe ebi bisolo ebi byanwelaghamu ati nanga niiyo byamilani̱yagha byakabaagha bi̱i̱si̱ye kunuwa.
Bisolo ebi byakaamilani̱yagha mu maaso ghaa buti obu, byabyalagha byana bilimu siibhitanga na siibhughondo.

Yakobbo aaghabani̱ja ntaama na mbu̱li̱ siye. Bwile bwasiyo kwima, aasi̱loli̱yagha hambali siibhitanga na siibughondo sya Labbaani̱ sili, niikuwo sibyale siibughondo na siibhitanga. Mu mulingo oghu, Yakobbo aakani̱ya bisolo biye mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kukani̱ya bya mukama wee Labbaani̱.
Yakobbo aakabonagha bisolo ebisemeeye hambali bi̱kwi̱mi̱lani̱ya, du̱mbi̱ aaleetʼo buti buwe obu ati niikuwo bi̱byale byana biibhitanga niikuwo abitwale mu biye.

Bhaatu bisolo ebi byakabaagha bitasemeeye, taaleetaghʼo buti obu bbaa. Mbyabyala byana ebitasemeeye, ebi abiha Labbaani̱. Du̱mbi̱ Labbaani̱ aati̱ghali̱ya ebitasemeeye, Yakobbo aatwala ebisemeeye byonkaha.
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aatungila kimui bisolo bikani̱ye, aatunga kwonini, aaba na baheeleli̱ya bakani̱ye baabukali̱ na baabusaasa, ngamila, hamui na ndogooi̱ sikaniiye kimui.
Yakobbo aaghu̱wa ngoku baana baa Labbaani̱ baabu̱ghagha bati, “Olole Yakobbo aatwete bintu bya eseetu̱we kandi buguudha obu ali na buwo bwona abu̱u̱hi̱ye mu bintu bya eseetu̱we.”
Kandi Yakobbo aakenga ngoku Labbaani̱ atakwete kumutwalikani̱ya ngoku aamutwalikani̱yagha haaku̱du̱bha.
Du̱mbi̱
aaghila Yakobbo ati, “Okuuke ewaa so waawe hamui na nganda syawe, si̱ye nkuukala naawe.”
Nahabweki Yakobbo aabilikila Lakeeli̱ na Leei̱ya kwisa hambali aali̱i̱si̱li̱yagha bisolo biye.
Aabaghila ati, “Naaboone eseenu̱we aatandi̱ki̱ye kuntwalikani̱ya kunji. Bhaatu Luhanga wa tita akuukalagha nanje.
Enu̱we bombi mumani̱ye ngoku naakolelagha eseenu̱we na maani̱ ghanje ghoona.
Ti̱ mulole ngoku angobeleei̱ye mu kunsasula, aakeehi̱ya musaala ghwanje milundi eku̱mi̱. Bhaatu Luhanga taamu̱si̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye kunkolʼo kabhi koona bbaa.

Obu Labbaani̱ aaghilagha ati, ‘Bisolo ebi bilakabyalagha biibhitanga bilabaagha byawe,’ du̱mbi̱ niibiyo byakabyalagha. Kandi obu aaghilagha ati, ‘Bilakabyalagha bughondo bilabaagha byawe,’ niibiyo byakabyalagha.”
Nahabweki Luhanga aayʼo eseenu̱we bisolo biye byona, aabimpa.
“Kilo kimui, mu bwile bwa bisolo kwema, nkaloota ntu̱u̱li̱ sya mbu̱li̱ esili na bigalagala, siibhitanga, hamui na siibughondo nsi̱i̱mi̱li̱ya mu bu̱hi̱yo.
Malai̱ka wa Luhanga ambilikila mu ndooti̱ ati, ‘Yakobbo.’ Nanje naamukuukamu nti, ‘Ndi hani.’

“Angila ati, ‘Olole elughulu ntu̱u̱li̱ sya mbu̱li̱ syona esiliyeyo nsi bhitanga, bughondo, na sya bigalagala sikwete kwi̱mi̱li̱ya mu bu̱hi̱yo. Naabbali̱ye kukwoleka siyo nanga naaboone ebi Labbaani̱ akwete kukukola.
Ni̱i̱syoni Luhanga oghu akakubonekela e Bbeeseeli̱ hambali waasi̱mbi̱ye mpaghi ya ebaale eghi waasi̱i̱ghi̱yʼo mafu̱ta kandi waalahila kundami̱yagha. Endindi oomuke oghende ewaanu mu nganda syawe.’ ”
Du̱mbi̱ Lakeeli̱ na Leei̱ya baakuukamu Yakobbo bati, “Ti̱ buuye tuli na bugwetuwa bwona haa etungo lya eseetu̱we?
Buuye taatu̱koli̱ye nga banamahanga? Nanga akamala ku̱tu̱lu̱ghi̱i̱si̱ya kandi aaliya byona ebi aatu̱ngi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu etu̱we.
Ti̱ bintu bini byona ebi Luhanga aakuhaaye ku̱lu̱gha ewaa eseetu̱we, mbyatu na baana baatu. Kwesi̱ okole eki Luhanga aakughambiiye.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aani̱i̱ni̱ya bakali̱ be na baana be haa ngamila.
Du̱mbi̱ aaghenda ewaabo Kanaani̱ hamui na bintu biye byona ebi aabaagha atungiiye e Padanalaamu.
Obu Labbaani̱ aabaagha aghendi̱ye kughemba ntaama siye byoha, Lakeeli̱ aabha bisasani̱ bya bihongano bya ese wee.
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aaghenda ki̱bi̱so, ataghambiiye Labbaani̱ Munaalaamu ngoku balimaghenda.
Aatwala bu̱li̱ kintu kyona eki aabaagha nakiyo. Aaghenda na bantu be boona baabhasuka maasi ghaanamu̱li̱to li̱i̱na lyagho Efulaati̱, mbaghenda mu kyalo kya bwena kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱.
Haa kilo kyakasatu, niibuwo Labbaani̱ aamani̱ye ngoku Yakobbo hamui na bantu be boona baaghendi̱ye.
Du̱mbi̱ Labbaani̱ na bantu be baakwama Yakobbo kumala bilo musanju̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu baamusangi̱ye mu kyalo kya bwena kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aabonekela Labbaani̱ Munaalaamu mu ndooti̱, aamughila ati, “Weelinde, otatodha ku̱bu̱ghʼo Yakobbo kintu kyona kibhi.”
Yakobbo akaba akweye weema yee mu kyalo kya bwena kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱. Obu Labbaani̱ aamu̱ki̱dhi̱i̱yeyo, du̱mbi̱ naye aakwelʼo weema yee na bantu aba aabaagha nabo.
Du̱mbi̱ Labbaani̱ aaghila Yakobbo ati, “Mbiki waakoli̱ye ebi? Haabwaki nuwanji̱lu̱ki̱ye kuleeta eni baana banje otangambiiye ngʼoghu oti okabahu̱nga haa bulemo?
Haabwaki nuwaalu̱ki̱ye? Hakili nguli wangambiiye niikuwo nkulagha kulungi, nku̱helekeeleli̱ya na bilimbo, buuciki-ciki, hamui na du̱ngu̱.
Okaleka ntaaghu̱wa baasukulu banje na bahala banje mu ki̱ku̱bha kandi mbalagha kulungi. Majima kuwo eki ni kintu kya butaami̱ waakoli̱ye!
Ndi na bu̱toki̱ bwa kukukola kubhi, bhaatu eso Luhanga aabu̱ghi̱ye nanje mu ndooti̱ ati ntagubha kukukolʼo kintu kyona ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
Uwe waatu̱u̱yemu kughenda nanga waaboone obhonganuuwe kughenda ewaanu. Ti̱ haabwaki nuwaabhi̱ye bihongano byanje?”
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “Nkaba noobahi̱ye nanga nkaba nkimani̱ye nti okunjiyʼo bahala baawe na ki̱ku̱bha.”

Yakobbo eye akaba atamani̱ye ngoku Lakeeli̱ aniiye ali na bihongano ebi. Du̱mbi̱ aaghila ati, “Kaakuba osanga muntu weena muli etu̱we oghu ali nabiyo, aatibuwe. Nahabweki oose olole mu bintu byatu bini byona, kaakuba osangamu kintu kyawe, okiiyemu.”
Du̱mbi̱ Labbaani̱ aataha mu weema ya Yakobbo, ya Leei̱ya, hamui na sya basyana be Ji̱li̱pa na Bbi̱i̱la, ataasangamu kantu. Haakumaliilila aataaha mu ya Lakeeli̱.

Lakeeli̱ eye akaba naamali̱ye ku̱bi̱sa bisasani̱ bya bihongano ebi mu kasau kaa ngamila yee kandi akaba abisitamiiye. Labbaani̱ aataha mu weema ya Lakeeli̱ omu, aatandika kubibbala, bhaatu taagu̱bhi̱ye kubibona bbaa.

Lakeeli̱ aaghila ese wee ati, “Tita, otasaaliluwa haabwanje kubhenga kwemilila. Ndi mu nsonga syatu sya kikali̱, niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye ntaamilila mu maaso ghaawe.” Labbaani̱ eeyongela kubbala haala bhaatu taaboone na kantu bbaa.
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aasaaliluwa, aabu̱u̱li̱ya Labbaani̱ ati, “Naakoli̱ye musango ki? Kandi nkilaghilo ki naatu̱u̱ye ekikuleka nompiigha otiyo?
Buuye obu waalolakaki̱ye mu bintu byanje byona, oli na kintu kyawe kyona eki waasangi̱yemu? Ti̱ kilakaba kilimu, okileete mu maaso ghaa bantu baawe nanje hani, niikuwo batu̱twi̱lemu si̱ye naawe.
“Endindi naakala naawe kumala myaka 20. Ti̱ ntaama yaawe kedha mbu̱li̱ nʼemui tayakwi̱si̱i̱ye kandi tanaaliiye na mpaha syawe sya ntaama.
Tanaakuleeteeye kisolo eki kinyama kihutaai̱ye, nkasi̱i̱ma naafweluwa. Niibuwo waaghila oti nkusasule ebi baabhi̱ye ntangaali̱ kedha mukilo.
“Nkabona-bona ewaawe, ntangaali̱, musana ghwa mpuulagha, ti̱ mukilo, tanaaghwesaghilagha nanga mpeu.

Olole, nkabona-bona ntiyo kumala myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ninali mu maka ghaawe. Myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼenaa niikuwo ompe bahala baawe babili, na myaka enji mukaagha niikuwo ompe bisolo bini nga musaala ghwanje. Ti̱ waatodha waakeehi̱ya musaala ghwanje milundi eku̱mi̱.

Nguli Luhanga wa baatita, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ na I̱saka ataabaagha nanje, wangubaaye ombhi̱ngi̱ye ntali na kantu. Bhaatu Luhanga aabona bu̱koli̱ bwanje hamui na ngoku naaboona-boone ewaawe, du̱mbi̱ eso mukilo aakutanuka.”

Labbaani̱ aakuukamu Yakobbo ati, “Bakali̱ aba oli nabo aba mbahala banje, baana aba baabyaye mbaasukulu banje, bisolo ebi oli nabiyo ebi mbyanje na bu̱li̱ kantu koona aka oboone nkanje. Buuye nkole ki obwalo haabwa bahala banje hamui na baana baabo aba?
Wiise tukole ndaghaano niikuwo etubeele nga buukai̱so haagati yaatu.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aakwata ebaale aalisimba nga mpaghi ya kuusukilaghʼo.
Aaghila bantu be ati, “Mukumaani̱ye mabaale.” Nahabweki baakumaani̱ya ntuumo ya mabaale kandi baaliila haai-haai na ntuumo eghi.
Labbaani̱ aaluka ntuumo eghi li̱i̱na lya Yagala Sahu̱du̱sa.
Na Yakobbo aalighilamu Galeedi̱.
Labbaani̱ aaghila ati, “Ntuumo ya mabaale eghi ni buukai̱so haagati yanje naawe.” Niikiyo kyaleki̱ye baakighilamu Galeedi̱.
Baatodha baakighilamu bati Mijipa elikumani̱i̱si̱ya “Ngbaali.” Labbaani̱ aaghila ati, “
akuukala naalola haagati yaatu ntwaghendi̱ye bu̱li̱ muntu ewe.
Kaakuba okola kubhi bahala banje, kedha oswela bakali̱ banji, nankabha si̱ye ntamani̱ye, okimanye oti Luhanga niiye kai̱so kandi aku̱loli̱ye.”
Labbaani̱ aatodha aaghila ati, “Olole ntuumo ya mabaale eghi, hamui na mpaghi eni eghi naasi̱mbi̱ye haagati yanje naawe.
Ntuumo ya mabaale eni hamui na mpaghi eni niibiyo buukai̱so bwatu kwoleka ngoku ntaakughisaala kwisa ewaawe kukukolʼo kabhi koona, kedha uwe kughisaala kwisa ewanje kunkolʼo kabhi koona.
Oleke Luhanga wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, Naholi̱, hamui na esebo atu̱twi̱lemu si̱ye naawe.” Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aalahila Luhanga oghu ese wee I̱saka aalami̱yagha.
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aasala kihonguwa, aakihongela mu kyalo kya bwena kandi aabilikila bantu be boona, baaghenda kuliya. Obu baamali̱ye kuliya, baalalayo.
Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, Labbaani̱ aaghuwa baasukulu be na bahala be mu ki̱ku̱bha, aabaha mu̱gi̱sa, du̱mbi̱ aakuukayo ewe.
Yakobbo naye aaghenda, du̱mbi̱ aasangaana baamalai̱ka baa Luhanga.
Obu Yakobbo aaboone baamalai̱ka aba, aaghila ati, “Lini ni ehe lya Luhanga.” Du̱mbi̱ ki̱i̱kalo eki aakighilamu ati “Mahanahi̱mu̱.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aadu̱bha aatuma batumuwa be ewaa mu̱ghenji̱ wee Esau e Seyi̱li̱, mu nsi ya Edomu.
Aabalaghila ati, “Mulakamu̱hi̱kʼo, mumughile muti, ‘Si̱ye mu̱heeleli̱ya wee Yakobbo naaghi̱li̱ye nti, “Nkaakala na Labbaani̱ kumala bwile bukani̱ye kandi ndimakuuka e ka.
Olole, ndi na nte, ndogooi̱, ntaama, mbu̱li̱, hamui na basyana. Bhaatu ndimakusaba nti ongilile ngughuma, mukama wanje.” ’ ”
Obu batumuwa aba baaku̱u̱ki̱ye ewaa Yakobbo, baamughila bati, “Tukaghenda ewaa mu̱ghenji̱ waawe Esau kandi niibuwo aasa na basaasa bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa kukusangaana.”
Yakobbo oobaha kandi eeyungila kimui, du̱mbi̱ aatambulani̱yamu kabili bantu hamui na bisolo ebi aabaagha ali nabiyo.
Eeli̱li̱kana ati, “Kaakuba Esau aasa ku̱lu̱mba ki̱bbu̱la kimui, kedha kinji kilali̱gi̱ta niikuwo ki̱ti̱ghalʼo.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aasaba naaghila ati, “Ai̱ Luhanga wa taata Ebbulahi̱mu̱, Luhanga wa tita I̱saka, Ai̱
okangila oti, ‘Okuuke ewaanu, mu baghenji̱ baawe hambali waabyaliluuwe kandi nkukukola kusemeeye.’

Endindi tansemeeye mu maaso ghaawe nankabha na bwesighibuwa obu waabaagha ompaaye tandi nabuwo bbaa. Olole, nkabhasuka Yolodaani̱ ntali na kantu koona kuuyʼo mwi̱gho ghwonkaha, bhaatu olole endindi ndi na bi̱bbu̱la bibili bya bantu hamui na bibili bya bisolo.
Ti̱
, nkukusaba oose onkoonele, nanga noobahiiye kimui mu̱ghenji̱ wanje Esau kwisa ku̱mpwelekeeleli̱ya na bakali̱ banje hamui na baana banje boona.
Bhaatu oosuke ngoku wandaghiisani̱i̱ye kunkola kusemeeya. Waatodha waaghila oti okumpa baasukulu bakaniiye kimui nga musene ghwa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja, niikuwo muntu nʼomui atagubha kubabala.”
Yakobbo aamala kilo eki hambali aasabiiye, du̱mbi̱ aakoma mu bisolo biye ebisemeleeye kimui, aabibiikila mu̱ghenji̱ wee Esau nga kisembo kiye.
Mu bisolo biye ebi, aamukomelamu mbu̱li̱ 200 syabukali̱ na sinji 20 syabusaasa, ntaama 200 syabukali̱ na sinji 20 syabusaasa,
ngamila 30 syabukali̱ hamui na byana byasiyo, nte 40 syabukali̱ na syabusaasa 10, ndogooi̱ syabukali̱ 20 hamui na syabusaasa 10.

Bisolo ebi aabiha baheeleli̱ya be. Bu̱li̱ bisolo aabita mu bi̱bbu̱la kusighikila haa mulingo ghwabiyo kandi bu̱li̱ bisolo aabiha mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu akubiloleelela. Du̱mbi̱ aaghila baheeleli̱ya be aba ati, “Mumpikile na bisolo ebi, bhaatu mu̱ti̱ghʼo mwanya haagati ya bu̱li̱ ki̱bbu̱la.”

Yakobbo aalaghikiilila oghu akaba abahikiiye ati, “Kaakuba mu̱ghenji̱ wanje Esau akusangaana kandi aku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, ‘Olu̱ghi̱ye ewaa ani̱? Kandi okughenda haa? Ti̱ ni ani̱ mukama wa bisolo ebikuhikiiye ebi?’
Du̱mbi̱ omughile oti, ‘Ni bisembo bya mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe Yakobbo ampaaye ati mbitwalile mukama wee Esau kandi naye niibuwo aasa enu̱ma eghi.’ ”
Aatodha aalaghikiilila na waakabili, waakasatu, hamui na boona abaabaagha bakweme bisolo ebi ati, “Naanu nimwanasangaane Esau aliikuwo mwabu̱gha mutiyo dhee.”

Kandi mutaabululuwa kumughambila muti, “Mu̱syana waawe Yakobbo naye niibuwo aasa enu̱ma eghi.” Nanga akeeli̱li̱kana ati, “Nku̱dhooti̱ya Esau na bisembo ebi naadu̱bhi̱ye kumusindikila ninaanamuboone kedha kilaleetʼo bu̱si̱nge haagati yaatu.”
Du̱mbi̱ baadu̱bha kutwala bisembo ebi Yakobbo aabahaaye, bhaatu eye aati̱ghala enu̱ma syabo hambali baghooneeye, aatodha aalaalamu kilo eki.
Bwile obu bwali̱ye mukilo eki kyonini, Yakobbo aatwala bakali̱ be babili, basyana be babili, na baana be eku̱mi̱ nʼomui baabhasuka maasi li̱i̱na lyagho Yabboki̱.
Obu aamali̱ye kubabhasu̱ki̱ya maasi, du̱mbi̱ aatwalayo na bintu biye byona.
Yakobbo aati̱ghala enkaha ebhi̱mba, du̱mbi̱ musaasa omui aatandika kumulwani̱i̱si̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bwile obu bwakeeye.
Obu musaasa oghu aaboone ati taakugubha kulema Yakobbo, aamusobani̱ya kiigembe.
Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aaghila ati, “Ngoku bwile bwakeeye, oleke ngende.”
Bhaatu Yakobbo aaghila ati, “Tanku̱ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kughenda otakampaaye mu̱gi̱sa.”
Musaasa oghu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Nuuwe ani̱?”
Aamukuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni Yakobbo.”
Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aaghila ati, “Tookutodha kuba Yakobbo bbaa, kuuyʼo balakughilaghamu I̱saaleeli̱,
nanga waalwane na Luhanga hamui na bantu, bhaatu waasi̱ngu̱la.”
Yakobbo aaghila ati, “Nanje ongambile li̱i̱na lyawe.”
Bhaatu musaasa oghu aaghila ati, “Haabwaki nombu̱u̱li̱ya li̱i̱na lyanje?” Du̱mbi̱ aamuheela mu̱gi̱sa haala hoonini.
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aaghila ati, “Dhelu naaboone Luhanga haali̱i̱so, ti̱ naakala ninali mwomi̱i̱li̱!” Du̱mbi̱ ki̱i̱kalo eki aakighilamu “Peneeli̱.”
Obu musana ghwatooye, Yakobbo aalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo kya Peneeli̱ eki. Aatandika ku̱sengu̱dha haabwa kiigembe eki baamusobani̱i̱ye.
Ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu, Banai̱saaleeli̱ tabakuliyagha nyama ya kiigembe, nanga niiyo baasobani̱i̱ye taata wabo Yakobbo eku̱wa lya mu kiigembe.

Yakobbo akaba makalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, aalola elughulu, aabona Esau naasa na basaasa be 400. Du̱mbi̱ aabaghani̱jamu baana be, aabaha Leei̱ya, Lakeeli̱, na banji aabaha basyana be babili, Ji̱li̱pa na Bbi̱i̱la.
Aahi̱ki̱li̱ya basyana be na baana baabo, aatʼo Leei̱ya na baana be, du̱mbi̱ Lakeeli̱ na Yojeefu̱ baamaliilila.
Yakobbo eye eenini aaghenda kwebinga mu̱ghenji̱ wee Esau, obu aamu̱hi̱ki̱yʼo, aagomba hansi milundi musanju̱ naamulamu̱ki̱ya.
Bhaatu Esau aali̱gi̱ti̱la kimui kumwebinga, du̱mbi̱ aamughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha. Kandi bombi baalila.
Esau aalola elughulu, aabonayʼo baana na bakali̱. Aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yakobbo ati, “Mbaki baabaagha naawe aba?”
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “Aba mbaana aba Luhanga, haabwa ngughuma siye, aahaaye mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe Yakobbo.”
Du̱mbi̱ baheeleli̱ya baa Yakobbo aba na baana baabo beebinga Esau, baagomba hansi kumulamu̱ki̱ya.
Obu aba baamali̱ye, Leei̱ya na baana be nabo baasa, baagomba hansi kulamu̱ki̱ya Esau. Haakumaliilila niibuwo Lakeeli̱ na Yojeefu̱ nabo baasi̱ye dhee, nabo baagomba hansi kumulamu̱ki̱ya.
Esau aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Bintu ebi naaboone oleeti̱ye byona mbyaki?”
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “Naakuleeteeye biyo niikuwo ongilile ngughuma, mukama wanje.”
Bhaatu Esau aaghila ati, “Si̱ye ndi na bintu bikani̱ye kaana kaa maaha. Webiikile ebi weenini.”

Yakobbo aaghila ati, “Bbaa, nkwesengeleei̱ye, olakaba ongiliiye ngughuma, osi̱i̱me bisembo ebi naakuleeteeye bini. Nanga obu naakuboone, ndi nga muntu naaboone Luhanga eenini haabwa kuntangilila kusemeeye kutiyo.
Mukama wanje osi̱i̱me kyona eki naakuleeteeye, nanga nanje Luhanga akangilila ngughuma, ampa kyona eki nkwetaaghisibuwa.” Haabwa kulola ngoku Yakobbo aamuukaliliiye, du̱mbi̱ Esau aasi̱i̱ma bintu ebi.
Du̱mbi̱ Esau aaghila ati, “Oleke si̱ye mbahikile, tughende.”

Yakobbo aaghila ati, “Mukama wanje, omani̱ye ngoku baana bani banali bato, tabakugubha kulubhatanga bwangu-bwangu. Kandi ndi na kuloleelela ntaama na nte esili na byana bito. Ntwanabilubhatangi̱i̱ye bwangu-bwangu, bi̱ku̱kwi̱la kilo kimui.
Oleke mukama wanje eye ahikile niikuwo si̱ye ndubhatange bukee-buke, na bisolo byanje hamui na baana banje ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu nanje ndaku̱ki̱dhʼo mu kyalo kya Seyi̱li̱.”
Esau aaghila ati, “Kwesi̱ oleke nku̱ti̱ghi̱le bamui haa bantu banje.”
Yakobbo aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama wanje, eki takikwetaaghisibuwa. Kuuyʼo ongilile ngughuma.”
Kilo eki, Esau aatandika lughendo luwe lwa kukuuka mu Seyi̱li̱.
Mu ki̱i̱kalo kya Yakobbo kughenda Seyi̱la, aaghenda mu kyalo kya Su̱kooti̱, hambali eekweleeye numba yee na bujalaja bwa bisolo biye. Ki̱i̱kalo eki bakakighilamu Su̱kooti̱.
Haakumaliilila, obu Yakobbo aalu̱ghi̱ye Padanalaamu, hambali abaagha aalu̱ki̱ye, aaki̱dha kulungi mu tau̱ni̱ ya Sekeemu mu kyalo kya Kanaani̱, du̱mbi̱ aaghoona haai-haai na tau̱ni̱ eghi.
Aaghula kibanja eki aali aakaayemu ewaa batabani̱ baa Hamooli̱, ese wa Sekeemu, na bi̱twi̱ke ki̱ku̱mi̱ bya siliva.
Du̱mbi̱ aakwelʼo kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, aakiluka li̱i̱na Eli Elohe I̱saaleeli̱.
Bwile obu Dina, muhala wa Leei̱ya oghu Yakobbo aamubyayʼo, aaghenda kubungila bakali̱ baa mu kyalo eki abaabaagha balimu.
Obu Sekeemu, mu̱lemi̱ wa mu ki̱twi̱ke eki, mutabani̱ wa Hamooli̱ wa mu ntu̱la ya Bahi̱vi̱, aaboone Dina, aamughwilikiilila, du̱mbi̱ aamuhamba.
Obu aamali̱ye kumuhamba, mutima ghuwe ghwabbalila kimui Dina muhala wa Yakobbo, du̱mbi̱ aabu̱gha naye na elaka lya ngonji̱ kandi lyaku̱mu̱tegheeleli̱ya.
Du̱mbi̱ Sekeemu aaghenda ewaa ese wee Hamooli̱, aamughila ati, “Tita, ondu̱ghi̱le manaabukali̱ oni.”
Obu Yakobbo aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku Sekeemu aabhi̱hi̱i̱ye muhala wee Dina, aaholeli̱ya kimui ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu batabani̱ be baalu̱ghi̱ye hambali baali̱i̱si̱li̱yagha bisolo.
Hamooli̱ ese wa Sekeemu aaghenda ku̱bu̱gha na Yakobbo haa kintu eki.

Obu baana baa Yakobbo baalu̱ghi̱ye mu ku̱li̱i̱si̱ya bisolo, baaghu̱wa ngoku Sekeemu aahambi̱ye mwani̱nabo Dina, baakwatuwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha haabwa Sekeemu kuhamba mwani̱nabo kandi ekitangubhonganuuwe kubʼo mu baana baa I̱saaleeli̱.
Bhaatu Hamooli̱ aaghila ati, “Mutabani̱ wanje Sekeemu eye mutima ghuwe ghwona ghuli haa muhala waanu. Ti̱ muleke amuswele.
Muleke tuswele nganda syanu, niikuwo naanu mulaswelagha e syatu.
Mwanguukala naatu, nanga kyalo kyatu kikani̱ye. Muli na bughabe bwa kuukala hambali mukabbali̱ye, mukolelemu bu̱su̱u̱bu̱ji̱ kandi mutungilemu bintu bikani̱ye.”
Du̱mbi̱ Sekeemu aaghila ese wa Dina hamui na baani̱na wee ati, “Mungilile ngughuma, muleke nswele muhala waanu oghu, ti̱ nanje nkubaha kyona eki mulakabbala.
Mu̱ntwi̱le ndu̱ghi̱ hamui na bisembo ebi mukubbala byona, si̱ye nkubaha biyo. Niikuwo naanu mumpe manaabukali̱ oghu abe mukali̱ wanje.”
Haabwa kulola ngoku baasangu̱u̱we babhi̱hi̱i̱ye mwani̱nabo Dina, batabani̱ baa Yakobbo aba baakuukamu mbadimaaga Sekeemu hamui na ese wee Hamooli̱.
Baaghila bati, “Tatukugubha kukola kintu ngʼeki, kuha mwani̱naatu̱we musaasa oghu batasali̱ye bbaa. Nanga eki kikuba kili kintu kya nsoni̱.
Tukubasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kuswela mwani̱naatu̱we nimwanasi̱i̱mi̱ye kuba ngʼatu, musala basaasa boona abali ewaanu.
Du̱mbi̱ tukubaha bahala baatu, naatu tuswele bahala baanu. Tukuukala ewaanu, etu̱we boona tufooke muntu omui.
Bhaatu nimwanabhengi̱ye kubasala, tukubaayʼo mwani̱naatu̱we du̱mbi̱ tughende.”
Du̱mbi̱ Hamooli̱ na Sekeemu baasi̱i̱ma kyeli̱li̱kano kya kusaluwa eki baabaghambiiye.
Du̱mbi̱ Sekeemu, oghu baabaagha bahu̱ti̱li̱i̱ye kimui mu lu̱byalo lwa Hamooli̱, eye taagu̱bhi̱ye kubhenga byona ebi baabu̱ghi̱ye, nanga eye akaba adheedheeu̱we haabwa kuswela muhala wa Yakobbo.
Du̱mbi̱ Hamooli̱ na mutabani̱ wee Sekeemu baaghenda mu ki̱i̱tu̱u̱bbi̱ ekyabaagha haa mulyango ghwa tau̱ni̱ yʼewaabo kughambila bantu boona.

Baaghila bati, “Basaasa bani batubbali̱i̱ye bu̱u̱bhootu̱, oleke baakale mu kyalo kyatu, basuubule kandi batunge bintu nanga tuli na etaka likani̱ye eli bakugubha kuukalamu. Du̱mbi̱ tuswele bahala baabo, nabo baswele bahala baatu.
Bhaatu basaasa bani baku̱si̱i̱ma kuukala naatu kaakuba basaasa bʼewaatu boona baasi̱i̱ma kubasala ngoku nabo basalu̱u̱we.
Tooboone, ntwanasi̱i̱mi̱ye, bisolo byabo hamui na bintu byabo byona bikuba byatu? Kwesi̱ oleke tubasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye niikuwo baakale mu kyalo kyatu.”
Basaasa boona abaakalagha mu tau̱ni̱ eghi baasi̱i̱ma ebi Hamooli̱ na mutabani̱ wee Sekeemu baabu̱ghi̱ye. Kandi bu̱li̱ musaasa weena mu tau̱ni̱ eghi aasaluwa.

Haanu̱ma ya bilo bisatu basaasa aba batakaki̱li̱ye, Leevi̱ na Si̱mi̱yooni̱, batabani̱ baa Yakobbo, baani̱na Dina, baakwata bihiyo byabo, baaghenda kwegimba mu tau̱ni̱ eghi, bantu baayo batamani̱ye kandi baatayo basaasa boona abaabaagha bali mu tau̱ni̱ eghi.
Haanu̱ma ya kwita Hamooli̱ na mutabani̱ wee Sekeemu na kihiyo, du̱mbi̱ baatwala mwani̱nabo Dina.
Obu baamali̱ye kwita bantu aba, baahu̱nga bintu byabo mu kibugha eki byona haabwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha kya Sekeemu ku̱bhi̱i̱ya mwani̱nabo.
Baatwala bisolo byabo byona na matungo ghaabo, ndogooi̱ syabo, na bu̱li̱ kintu kyona eki baabaagha bali nakiyo mu kibugha na mu misili yabo.
Baatwala etungo lyabo lyona, bakali̱ baabo, baana baabo, hamui na byona ebyabaagha mu manumba ghaabo.

Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aaghila Leevi̱ na Si̱mi̱yooni̱ ati, “Enu̱we mwandeeteeye kasaale kandi mwaleki̱ye Banakanaani̱ na Bapeleeji̱ mu kyalo kini banjoha. Ti̱ mulole etu̱we tuli bakee, bantu aba mbanalungaane kundwani̱i̱si̱ya, si̱ye na ka yanje yoona tu̱ku̱twi̱ka.”
Leevi̱ na Si̱mi̱yooni̱ nabo baamukuukamu bati, “Majima kuwo Sekeemu naye angubaaye akoli̱ye atiyo mwani̱naatu̱we nga malaaya?”
Kilo kimui Luhanga aaghila Yakobbo ati, “Oghende Bbeteeli̱ aaniiyo waakala kandi okweleyo eki okuhongelʼo bihonguwa byanje, si̱ye Luhanga oghu akakubonekela obu waalukagha wanjoko waawe Esau.”
Niibuwo Yakobbo aaghi̱li̱ye bakali̱ be na baana be hamui na boona abaabaagha naye ati, “Mwehiyʼo baaluhanga banji aba muli nabo aba, munaabe mwele kandi mu̱lu̱waale bi̱lu̱walo binji.
Du̱mbi̱ mwise tughende tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeteeli̱ hambali nkukwelela Luhanga kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, oghu akankoonela obu naabaagha mu kubona-bona kandi oghu aakalagha nanje hoona hambali naakaghendagha.”
Niibuwo baahaaye Yakobbo bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga baabo ebi baabaagha nabiyo. Baamuha na manengeniya
agha bali balu̱wete haa matui. Aaghajiika hansi mu ki̱i̱looku̱ mu kyalo kya Sekeemu.
Obu baamu̱ki̱ye kughenda, Luhanga aaleeteleja bantu bʼomu maatau̱ni̱ agha baasalilaghamu kwobahila kimui, niikuwo atabʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akubakwama kughenda kubakola kubhi.
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo hamui na bantu boona abaabaagha naye baaki̱dha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Lu̱u̱ji̱ eghi baadu̱bhagha kughilamu Bbeteeli̱ mu nsi ya Kanaani̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo aakwela mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeteeli̱ kyakuhongelʼo Luhanga bihonguwa kandi aakiluka li̱i̱na Eli̱-bbeteeli̱ nanga niiyo Luhanga aamubonekeeye obu aalukagha waani̱na wee Esau.
Bwile obu Debbola, oghu akalela Lebbeeka, aaku̱wa, baamujiika eku̱wa ya tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeteeli̱ hansi ya kiti ki̱i̱looku̱. Kiti eki baakiluka li̱i̱na Aloni̱-bbaku̱si̱.
Obu Yakobbo aamali̱ye kukuuka mu kyalo kya Padanalaamu,
Luhanga aatodha aamubonekela kandi aamuha mu̱gi̱sa.
Luhanga aamughila ati, “Li̱i̱na lyawe nuuwe Yakobbo, bhaatu bantu tabakutodha kukughilamu Yakobbo, kuuyʼo nuuwe okuba I̱saaleeli̱.” Du̱mbi̱ aamuluka li̱i̱na lya I̱saaleeli̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aamughila ati, “Ndi Luhanga wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona, obyale baana bakaniiye kimui, baasukulu baawe balifooka mahanga ghakani̱ye kandi bamui mu bo balifooka bakama.
Nkukuha kyalo eki naahaaye Ebbulahi̱mu̱ na I̱saka kuba kyawe bilo nʼebilo kandi haanu̱ma yaawe, ndikiha baasukulu baawe.”
Du̱mbi̱ Luhanga aalu̱ghʼo Yakobbo, aaghenda.
Yakobbo aasimba mpaghi ya ebaale hambali aabu̱ghi̱i̱ye na Luhanga haala. Aaghiseesʼo kihonguwa kyakunuwa hamui na mafu̱ta kughifoola ya kulamiliyʼo Luhanga.
Ki̱i̱kalo eki Yakobbo aakighilamu Bbeteeli̱.
Du̱mbi̱ baamu̱ki̱ya ku̱lu̱gha Bbeteeli̱. Obu baanaghendagha, hanati̱ghaayʼo lughendo lujambi̱ye ku̱hi̱ka mu kyalo kya Efulaati̱, Lakeeli̱ aakwatuwa ku̱byala. Aaghu̱wa busaali̱ji̱ bukani̱ye.
Obu aanalumuwagha, mukali̱ oghu aamu̱byali̱i̱si̱yagha aamughila ati, “Otoobaha, nanga oku̱byala mwana onji wabusaasa.”
Obu Lakeeli̱ aaboone naaghenda ku̱ku̱wa, mwana oghu aamuluka li̱i̱na ati niiye Bbenoni̱.
Bhaatu ese wee aamuluka li̱i̱na ati niiye Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱.
Haanu̱ma obu Lakeeli̱ aaku̱u̱ye, baamujiika mu kihanda ekikughenda Efulaati̱ eghi baaghilaghamu dhee Bbeteleheemu.
Haagu̱u̱li̱ ya kituulo eki, Yakobbo aasimbʼo mpaghi. Ti̱ nʼendindi mpaghi eghi enaliyo kwoleka hambali kituulo kya Lakeeli̱ kili.
Yakobbo oghu baaghilaghamu I̱saaleeli̱ aatodha aamu̱ki̱ya lughendo luwe, du̱mbi̱ aakwela weema yee luhande lweli̱ lwa ki̱i̱kalo baaghilaghamu Migidaali-eda.
Obu Yakobbo aabaagha anaakaaye mu kyalo eki, Leu̱bbeeni̱, omui mu batabani̱ be eku̱mi̱ na babili, aaghenda aalaala na Bbi̱i̱la, mukali̱ wee onji. Yakobbo
aakimanya.
Baana aba Yakobbo aabyayʼo Leei̱ya niibo bani: Leu̱bbeeni̱ wa mu̱li̱ghaaso, Si̱mi̱yooni̱, Leevi̱, Yu̱da I̱sakaali, hamui na Jabbu̱looni̱.
Baana aba Yakobbo aabyayʼo Lakeeli̱ niibo bani: Yojeefu̱ na Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱.
Baana aba Yakobbo aabyayʼo Bbi̱i̱la mu̱syana wa Lakeeli̱ niibo bani: Daani̱ na Nafutaali.
Baana aba Yakobbo aabyayʼo Ji̱li̱pa mu̱syana wa Leei̱ya niibo bani: Gaadi̱ na Aseli̱. Bani niibo baana baa Yakobbo aabyaye obu aabaagha anali Padanalaamu.
Yakobbo aaghenda ewaabo e ka mu kyalo kya Mami̱le kulola ese wee I̱saka. Kyalo eki endindi bakwete kughilamu Hebbu̱looni̱. Ebbulahi̱mu̱ na I̱saka nabo dhee bakaba mbaakaayʼo mu kyalo eki.
I̱saka aamala myaka 180 ya bukulu.
Aaku̱wa akaakuliiye kimui. Batabani̱ be Yakobbo na Esau baamujiika.
Bani niibo baasukulu baa Esau oghu baaghilaghamu dhee Edomu.

Esau aaswela bakali̱ basatu ku̱lu̱gha mu bahala baa Banakanaani̱. Aaswela Aada muhala wa Elooni̱ wa mu ntu̱la ya Bahi̱ti̱. Aaswela dhee Aholi̱bbama muhala wa Aana kandi muusukulu wa Ji̱bbi̱yooni̱ wa mu ntu̱la ya Bahi̱vi̱.
Aaswela dhee Bbasemaati muhala wa Sumai̱li̱ kandi mwani̱na Nebbayosi̱.
Du̱mbi̱ aabyalʼo mukali̱ wee Aada mwana, baamuluka li̱i̱na Elifaaji. Bbasemaati naye aamu̱byalila mwana, baamuluka li̱i̱na Leu̱weli̱.
Mukali̱ wee Aholi̱bbama aamu̱byalila baana basatu: Yewusi, Yalaamu, na Koola. Aba niibo baana baa Esau aabyaye anali mu kyalo kya Kanaani̱.

Esau aatwala bakali̱ be, baana be, bantu baa ka yee boona, bisolo biye, hamui na bintu biye byona abe aabaagha nabiyo, mu kyalo kya Kanaani̱ aaku̱lu̱ki̱la mu kyalo kinji ati niikuwo haselanʼo na waani̱na wee Yakobbo.
Esau akaku̱u̱lu̱ka nanga bintu byabo hamui na bisolo ebi baabaagha bali nabiyo bikaba bikaniiye kimui, kyalo eki baabaaghamu takyagubhagha kumala bintu ebi haabwa kuba kikee.
Nahabweki Esau, oghu baaghilaghamu Edomu, aaghenda kuukala mu kyalo kya bwena kya Seyi̱li̱.
Bani niibo baasukulu baa Esau ese wa Banʼedomu, abaabaagha baakaaye mu kyalo kya bwena kya Seyi̱li̱.
Mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ baa Esau niigho ghani: Elifaaji, oghu aabyayʼo Aada, na Leu̱weli̱, oghu aabyayʼo Bbasemaati.
Na batabani̱ baa Elifaaji niibo bani: Temaani, Omala, Jeefo, Gataamu, na Kenaji̱.
Elifaaji akaba ali na mukali̱ onji mbamughilamu Timuna, aamu̱byalʼo Amaleeki̱. Aba niibo baasukulu baa Esau haa lubalu̱ lwa mukali̱ wee Aada.
Na batabani̱ baa Leu̱weli̱ niibo bani: Nahasi, Jeela, Saama, na Miija, aba niibo baasukulu baa Esau haa lubalu̱ lwa mukali̱ wee Bbasemaati.
Baana aba Esau aabyayʼo mukali̱ wee Aholi̱bbama muhala wa Aana kandi muusukulu wa Ji̱bbi̱yooni̱ niibo bani: Yewusi, Yalaamu, na Koola.

Buni niibuwo bu̱tu̱la obwalu̱ghi̱ye mu baasukulu baa Esau. Haa lubalu̱ lwa mukali̱ wee Aada, haa batabani̱ baa mu̱li̱ghaaso ghuwe Elifaaji hakalu̱ghamu ntu̱la sini: ntu̱la ya Temaani, ntu̱la ya Omala, ntu̱la ya Jeefo, ntu̱la ya Kenaji̱,
ntu̱la ya Koola, ntu̱la ya Gataamu, na ntu̱la ya Amaleeki̱. Aba niibo baabaagha balemi̱ baasukulu baa ntu̱la ya Elifaaji wamu kyalo kya Edomu. Bakaba bali baasukulu baa Aada.

Na baana baa mutabani̱ wa Esau Leu̱weli̱, balemi̱ niibo bani: Nahasi, Jeela, Saama, na Miija. Bakaba bali balemi̱, bali baasukulu baa Leu̱weli̱ wa mu kyalo kya Edomu. Bakaba bali baasukulu baa Bbasemaati mukali̱ wa Esau.
Kandi na baana baa Aholi̱bbama, mukali̱ wa Esau kandi muhala wa Aana, abaalu̱ghi̱ye mu bu̱tu̱la niibo bani: Yewusi, Yalaamu, na Koola.
Aba niibo baabaagha batabani̱ baa Esau oghu baaghilaghamu Edomu kandi aba niibo baalu̱ghi̱yemu bu̱tu̱la.
Bani niibo batabani̱ baa Seyi̱li̱ wa mu ntu̱la ya Bahooli̱, abaakalagha mu kyalo kya Edomu: Lotaani̱, Sobbali, Ji̱bbi̱yooni̱, Aana,
Di̱sooni̱, Eeja, na Disaani̱. Aba niibo baabaagha batabani̱ baa Seyi̱li̱ wa mu ntu̱la ya Bahooli̱ mu kyalo kya Edomu kandi abaalu̱ghi̱yemu bu̱tu̱la.
Na baana baa Lotaani̱ niibo bani: Hooli̱ na Hemaani̱. Bhaatu Timuna eye akaba ali mwani̱na Lotaani̱.
Kandi batabani̱ baa Sobbali niibo bani: Alivani, Manahasi, Ebbali, Seefo, na Onamu.

Na batabani̱ baa Ji̱bbi̱yooni̱ niibo bani: Ai̱ha na Aana. Kandi Aana oni niiye oghu akajoola maasi ghatu̱u̱mi̱ye aghaalu̱ghagha eku̱li̱mu̱ mu elungu obu aali̱i̱si̱yagha ndogooi̱ sya ese wee Ji̱bbi̱yooni̱.
Kandi baana baa Aana niibo bani: Di̱sooni̱ na Aholi̱bbama muhala wa Aana.
Baana baa Di̱sooni̱ niibo bani: Hemudaani̱, Esubbaani̱, I̱si̱laani̱, na Kelaani̱.
Na baana baa Eeja niibo bani: Bbi̱li̱hani̱, Javaani̱, na Akani̱.
Baana baa Disaani̱ niibo bani: U̱ji̱ na Alaani̱.
Kandi abaalu̱ghi̱yemu bu̱tu̱la bunji mu ntu̱la ya Bahooli̱ obu baamali̱ye kwebaghani̱ja mu kyalo kya Seyi̱la niibo bani: Lotaani̱, Sobbali, Ji̱bbi̱yooni̱, Aana,
Di̱sooni̱, Eeja, na Disaani̱, aba niibo balemi̱ ntu̱la ya Bahooli̱, abalabhiililaane mu̱lemi̱ haa mu̱lemi̱ mu kyalo kya Seyi̱li̱.
Bani niibo bakama abaadu̱bhi̱ye kulema kyalo kya Edomu atakabaayʼo mukama weena ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱.
Bbeela mutabani̱ wa Bbeyola niiye akaba mukama wʼoku̱du̱bha mu kyalo kya Edomu, na tau̱ni̱ yee eghi aabaagha alemi̱ye baaghighilaghamu Dinahabba.
Obu Bbeela aaku̱u̱ye, Yobbaabbu mutabani̱ wa Jeela ku̱lu̱gha mu kyalo kya Bbojila aakuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye.
Obu Yobbaabbu aaku̱u̱ye, Husaamu ku̱lu̱gha mu kyalo kya Batemaani̱ aakuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye.
Obu Husaamu aaku̱u̱ye, Hadaadi̱ mutabani̱ wa Bbedaadi̱, oghu akasi̱ngu̱la Banami̱di̱yaani̱ mu kyalo kya Mowaabu, aakuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye. Na tau̱ni̱ eghi aabaagha alemi̱ye baaghighilaghamu Avisi.
Obu Hadaadi̱ aaku̱u̱ye, Samula ku̱lu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Masileka aakuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye.
Obu Samula aaku̱u̱ye, Sau̱li̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu kyalo kya Lehobboti̱ ekyabaagha haa maasi ghaanamu̱li̱to aakuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye.
Obu Sau̱li̱ naye aaku̱u̱ye, Bbaali̱-hanaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Akibbola aakuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye.

Obu Bbaali̱-hanaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Akibbola aaku̱u̱ye, Hadala aakuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye, na kibugha eki aabaagha alemi̱ye baakighilaghamu Paau, na mukali̱ wee baamughilaghamu Mehetabbeeli̱, muhala wa Mati̱leedi̱ kandi Mati̱leedi̱ ali muhala wa Majehaabbu.
Kandi bani niibo baalu̱ghi̱yemu bu̱tu̱la mu baasukulu baa Esau kusighikila haa bu̱tu̱la hamui na byalo ebi baalu̱ghi̱yemu: Timuna, Aluva, Yeseesi̱,
Aholi̱bbama, Eela, Pi̱nooni̱,
Kenaji̱, Temaani, Mi̱bbu̱jala,
Magi̱dyeli̱, na Ilaamu. Aba niibo baalu̱ghi̱yemu bu̱tu̱la mu kyalo kya Edomu kusighikila mu njikala yabo kandi boona balu̱ghi̱ye mu baasukulu baa Esau.
Yakobbo aakala mu kyalo kya Kanaani̱ hambali ese wee aabaagha aakaaye.
Kandi eni niiyo nsoboolola ya Yakobbo na baana be.

Obu Yojeefu̱ aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka 17 ya bukulu, aatandika kughenda ku̱li̱i̱si̱ya bu̱hi̱yo bwa bisolo bya ese wee, ali hamui na baghenji̱ be batabani̱ baa baka ese wee Bbi̱i̱la na Ji̱li̱pa. Bwile bunji Yojeefu̱ aaghambilagha ese wee bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi baghenji̱ be aba baakolagha.
Yakobbo akaba aku̱ndi̱ye kimui Yojeefu̱ kusaali̱ya baana be boona, nanga niiye mwana oghu aabyaye mu bukulu buwe. Aamukolela nkanji̱ esemeleeye kimui.
Obu baana baa ni̱na Yojeefu̱ baaboone ngoku esebo amu̱ku̱ndi̱ye kusaali̱ya ebo, du̱mbi̱ baamwohela kimui kandi tabaamu̱bu̱ghi̱lagha kighambo kyona kisemeeye.
Kilo kimui Yojeefu̱ aaloota kilooto. Obu aaghambiiye baghenji̱ be aba ebi aalooti̱ye, beeyongelela kimui kumwoha.
Yojeefu̱ aaghila baghenji̱ be aba ati, “Mu̱tegheeleli̱ye kilooto eki naalooti̱ye.
Twabaagha tuli mu musili ntuboha bibha bya ngano, kusa kibha kyanje kyemilila, du̱mbi̱ bibha byanu byona byasa byeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kyanje kandi byatandika kugomba mbi̱ki̱hu̱ti̱ya.”

Baana baa ni̱na wee baamukuukamu bati, “Buuye uwe okubbala kuba mukama waatu? Kandi majima kuwo okubbala kutulema?” Du̱mbi̱ beeyongelela kimui kumwoha haabwa ndooti̱ yee eghi hamui na bighambo ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye.

Bwile bunji aaloota kilooto kinji, na ebi aalooti̱ye aabighambila baghenji̱ be ati, “Mu̱tegheeleli̱ye, naatodhi̱ye naaloota kilooto kinji. Dhelu buni musana, kweli̱, na nsooli̱ya eku̱mi̱ nʼemui nasiyo syagomba ewanje.”

Obu aaghambiiye ese wee dhee ebi aalooti̱ye, du̱mbi̱ ese wee aamutanuka, aamughila ati, “Eki nkilooto kya mulingo ki walooti̱ye? Buuye okumani̱i̱si̱ya oti si̱ye so waawe, njoko waawe, na baana baa njoko waawe ni̱i̱tu̱we tukwisa kukugombela?”
Baana baa ni̱na Yojeefu̱ baamughilila etima likani̱ye, bhaatu ese wee aakala naaneeli̱li̱kana haa ndooti̱ esi.
Kilo kimui obu baana baa ni̱na Yojeefu̱ baaghendi̱ye ku̱li̱i̱si̱ya bu̱hi̱yo bwa bisolo bya esebo haai na kyalo kya Sekeemu,
Yakobbo aabilikila Yojeefu̱ aamughila ati, “Omani̱ye ngoku baghenji̱ baawe baghendi̱ye ku̱li̱i̱si̱ya mu kyalo ekili haai na Sekeemu, nkubbala kukutuma hambali bali.” Yojeefu̱ aasi̱i̱ma kughendayo.

Yakobbo aamughila ati, “Oghende olole bu̱hi̱yo obu hamui na baghenji̱ baawe boona balakaba bali kulungi ti̱ wiise ongambile.” Du̱mbi̱ aamutuma ku̱lu̱gha mu kighona kya Hebbu̱looni̱ hambali baabaagha baakaaye, kughenda Sekeemu. Obu Yojeefu̱ aaki̱dhi̱yeyo,
musaasa omui aamubona naalolakaka mu kisaka aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mbiki okubbala?”
Aamukuukamu ati, “Nkubbala baghenji̱ banje. Wangungambila hambali bakwete ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱ya bu̱hi̱yo bwabo?”
Musaasa oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Hani bakalu̱ghʼo, bhaatu nkaaghu̱wa mbaghila bati bakaghenda mu kyalo kya Dosani.” Du̱mbi̱ Yojeefu̱ aabakwama, aabasanga mu kyalo kya Dosani eki.
Bhaatu obu baamuboone anaseli̱ye, baatandika kughila bati, “Oleke aase niikuwo tumwite.”
Baatodha baghambilangana bati, “Olole, munakuloota ngughu aasi̱ye,
mwise tumwite, tumukube mu kimui haa bi̱i̱na bini niikuwo tulaghila tuti binyama niibiyo byamuliiye. Ti̱ tulole ekilalu̱gha mu bilooto biye ebi.”
Obu Leu̱bbeeni̱ aaghu̱u̱ye, aalengʼo kumukoonela naaghila ati, “Bhaawai̱ tutamwita.”

Leu̱bbeeni̱ aatodha aaghila ati, “Mutamumalʼo, kuuyʼo mumukube mu ki̱i̱na kini mu elungu muni, bhaatu mutamuhuula.” Leu̱bbeeni̱ aabu̱gha ebi kumukoonela ati batamwita kuuyʼo amu̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye ewaa ese wee.
Du̱mbi̱ obu Yojeefu̱ aabaki̱dhi̱yʼo, baamu̱tu̱u̱bbu̱lamu nkanji̱ yee eghi esemeleeye kimui eghi aabaagha alu̱wete,
baamutwala, baamukuba mu ki̱i̱na. Bhaatu ki̱i̱na eki kikaba kitalimu kantu koona bbaa.

Obu baasitami̱ye kuliya byokuliya byabo, baabona ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu baa mu ntu̱la ya Banasumai̱li̱ mbalu̱gha mu kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱. Bakaba bali na ngamila syabo si̱heeki̱ye bintu bisasi̱ye, mubaji̱, na miila mbabitwala eku̱wa ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Yu̱da aaghila baghenji̱ be ati, “Tukughobʼo ki ntwati̱ye mu̱ghenji̱ waatu kandi tu̱swi̱ki̱la saghama yee?”
Du̱mbi̱ baaghambilana bati, “Mwise tu̱mu̱ghu̱li̱ye Banasumai̱li̱ bani, bhaatu tutamuhuula, kyʼoku̱du̱bha ni lughanda lwatu eenini kandi waani̱naatu̱we.” Du̱mbi̱ baghenji̱ be aba boona baasi̱i̱ma.

Obu baghu̱li̱ baasi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu Mi̱di̱yaani̱, du̱mbi̱ baghenji̱ be baamubhula mu ki̱i̱na omu, baamu̱ghu̱li̱ya mu Banasumai̱li̱ bi̱twi̱ke maku̱mi̱ abili bya siliva, du̱mbi̱ Banasumai̱li̱ aba baamutwala Mi̱si̱li̱.
Obu Leu̱bbeeni̱ aaku̱u̱ki̱ye haa ki̱i̱na haala naasanga Yojeefu̱ atalimu, eetemuulila ngoye haa mubili kwoleka ngoku aali asaliiwe.
Aakuuka mu baghenji̱ be ati, “Buuye mutabhana nga atalimu, ngende mmubbalile haa?”
Du̱mbi̱ baasala mbu̱li̱, baaleeta saghama yayo baaghiseesangilila haa nkanji̱ ya Yojeefu̱.
Baatwala nkanji̱ eghi ewaa esebo baamughila bati, “Twasangaane nkanji̱, oghilole kulungi niikuwo omanye elakaba eli ya mwana waawe Yojeefu̱.”
Aaghimaniilila, du̱mbi̱ aaghila ati, “Eni majima kuwo ni nkanji̱ ya mwana wanje! Kinyama kya mu kisaka kyamwi̱ti̱ye. Ee, mutabani̱ wanje Yojeefu̱ kisolo kyamutemanguuyemu buhande-hande!”
Du̱mbi̱ Yakobbo eetemangulila ngoye haa mubili, aalu̱wala ngoye sya bujune, eeghungila mutabani̱ wee oghu kumala bilo bikani̱ye.

Batabani̱ be na bahala be boona baasa ku̱mu̱hu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya, bhaatu eye aabhengela kimui kuleka. Du̱mbi̱ aaghila ati, “Bbaa, nkuukala nineeghu̱ngi̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nanje obu ndi̱ku̱wa niikuwo ngende hambali mwana wanje aaghendi̱ye.” Niibuwo eeyongeleeye kimui kweghunga na kulila haabwa mutabani̱ wee Yojeefu̱.
Bhaatu basu̱u̱bu̱ji̱
aba abaatwete Yojeefu̱, bakaghenda baamu̱ghu̱li̱ya ewaa Poti̱i̱fa omui mu bakulu mu bukama bwa Falaaho kandi oghu akaba ali mukulu wa abaalindagha Falaaho.
Bwile obu, Yu̱da aalu̱ghʼo baghenji̱ be, aaghenda kuukala na musaasa wa mu ntu̱la ya Adulaamu oghu baaghilaghamu Hiila.
Yu̱da aabonayo mukali̱, muhala wa Banakanaani̱ li̱i̱na liye Suha, aamuswela.
Mukali̱ oghu aaku̱li̱ya, aabyala mwana wabusaasa, Yu̱da aamuluka li̱i̱na Eli̱.
Mukali̱ oghu aatodha aaku̱li̱ya, aabyala mwana onji wabusaasa dhee, aamuluka li̱i̱na Onani.
Aatodha aabyala mwana onji wabusaasa, aamuluka li̱i̱na Seela. Bwile obu, Yu̱da na mukali̱ wee Suha baali baakaaye mu kyalo kya Kejibbu̱.
Yu̱da aaswelela mutabani̱ wee Eli̱ mukali̱, li̱i̱na liye Tamaali̱.
Bhaatu Eli̱, mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa Yu̱da, akaba ali mu̱si̱i̱si̱ mu maaso ghaa
, du̱mbi̱
aamwita.
Du̱mbi̱ Yu̱da aaghila mutabani̱ wee Onani ati, “Oghende olangaale na mukaa wanjoko waawe, omuswele niikuwo obyalile wanjoko waawe baana.”
Onani aakimanya ati nankabha abyalʼo mukali̱ oghu baana, tabakuba be bbaa. Akaghendagha kulangaala na mukali̱ oghu, aakala kuta nsigho yee hansi ati niikuwo atabyalila waani̱na wee baana.
Kandi eki aakoli̱ye eki kyasaalila
, naye
aamwita dhee.

Niibuwo Yu̱da aaghi̱li̱ye mugholi wee Tamaali̱ ati, “Oghende, ookale ewaanu nga mu̱kwi̱si̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu mutabani̱ wanje Seela alakakula.” Aabu̱gha atiyo haabwa kwobaha ati kedha Seela angu̱ku̱wa ngoku baghenji̱ be baaku̱u̱ye. Du̱mbi̱ Tamaali̱ aaghenda aakala ewaabo.

Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukani̱ye, mukaa Yu̱da, muhala wa Suha, aaku̱wa. Obu Yu̱da aamali̱ye kunaaba mukali̱ wee oghu, aaghenda na bhootu̱ siye Hiila wa mu ntu̱la ya Adulaamu, mu kyalo kya Temina hambali basaasa abaaghembagha ntaama siye byoha
baakalagha.
Obu Tamaali̱ aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku esebyala wee Yu̱da alimaghenda mu kyalo kya Temina kughemba ntaama siye byoha,

eetu̱u̱bbu̱lamu ngoye sya bu̱kwi̱si̱ya esi aakalagha alu̱wete. Du̱mbi̱ aalu̱wala ngoye sinji, aatodha eeswi̱ki̱li̱la lunji, aasitama mu elembo lya tau̱ni̱ ya Enai̱mu̱ mu kihanda ekyaghendagha mu kyalo kya Temina. Akakola eki haanu̱ma ya kubona ati Seela oghu baamulaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kumuswela aamali̱ye kukula, bhaatu tabakaghi̱li̱ye bati amuswele.
Obu Yu̱da aamuboone, aamanya ati ni malaaya haabwa kweswi̱ki̱la haali̱i̱so.

Haabwa kutamanya ngoku ali mugholi wee, aaghenda hambali aabaagha ali mu maakpengbu̱ ghaa luguudhe, aamughila ati, “Nkubbala kulangaala naawe.” Mugholi wee aamukuukamu ati, “Buuye nuuwalangaaye nanje, mbiki okumpa?”
Yu̱da aamughila ati, “Nkukuha kyana kya mbu̱li̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu etungo lyanje.”
Mugholi wee aamukuukamu ati, “Buuye ni musimbo ki oku̱nti̱ghi̱la ku̱hi̱ki̱ya oleeti̱ye mbu̱li̱ eghi?”
Aamukuukamu ati, “Buuye nku̱ti̱ghi̱le musimbo ki?”
Tamaali̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Onti̱ghile mpete eghi eliyo li̱i̱na lyawe, na kaghuwo
kaayo akali mu bikiya byawe, hamui na mwi̱gho okwete mu ngalo oghu.” Yu̱da aasi̱i̱ma kumuha biyo, du̱mbi̱ aalangaala naye, du̱mbi̱ mukali̱ oghu aaku̱li̱ya.
Obu mukali̱ oghu aalu̱ghi̱ye haala, eetu̱bbu̱la ngoye esi aabaagha alu̱wete, aatodha aalu̱wala ngoye sya bu̱kwi̱si̱ya.
Du̱mbi̱ Yu̱da aatuma bhootu̱ siye Hiila kutwalila mukali̱ oghu mbu̱li̱ eghi baalaghaane niikuwo aayeyo musimbo oghu aati̱ghi̱yeyo. Bhaatu Hiila obu aaki̱dhi̱yeyo, atasangayo mukali̱ oghu.
Du̱mbi̱ aabu̱u̱li̱ya bantu abaakalaghʼo ati, “Malaaya oghu akuukalagha haa elembo lya tau̱ni̱ ya Enai̱mu̱ ali haa?”
Baamukuukamu bati, “Hani taaliyo malaaya nʼomui bbaa.”
Du̱mbi̱ Hiila aakuukayo, aaghila Yu̱da ati, “Tanaamusangi̱yʼo, kuuyʼo naasangi̱yʼo bantu abakuukalaghʼo, bangila bati taaliyo malaaya weena oghu aakuukalaghʼo bbaa.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yu̱da aaghila ati, “Oleke aakale na bintu ebi naamu̱ti̱ghi̱i̱ye, nanga bantu mbaakimani̱ye, batusekeelela. Olole naali nku̱tu̱mi̱ye kumusasula, bhaatu tawamusangi̱yʼo.”
Haanu̱ma ya meeli̱ asatu, muntu aaghambila Yu̱da ati, “Mugholi waawe Tamaali̱ aabaaye malaaya kandi aku̱li̱i̱ye.”
Yu̱da aaghila ati, “Mumuleete, bamwoki̱ye aku̱we.”

Obu banamutwalagha, aatu̱mi̱i̱si̱ya makulu ewaa esebyala wee naaghila ati, “Mukama wa bintu bini ebi ndi nabiyo, niiye akampa etundu lini.” Aatodha aaghila ati, “Olole kandi omaaniilile mpete eghi na kaghuwo kaayo na mwi̱gho ni bintu bya ani̱?”
