aaghi̱li̱ye Musa na Alooni̱ ati,
“Kaakuba Falaaho abaghila ati, ‘Mukole kyakuswekani̱ya.’ Oghile Alooni̱ oti, ‘Okube hansi mwi̱gho ghwawe mu maaso ghaa Falaaho, ghukufooka njoka.’ ”
Nahabweki Musa na Alooni̱ baaghenda ewaa Falaaho kandi baakola ngoku
aabalaghiiye. Alooni̱ aakuba hansi mwi̱gho ghuwe mu maaso ghaa Falaaho na baheeleli̱ya be kandi ghwafooka njoka.
Niibuwo Falaaho aatu̱mi̱ye bantu kubilikila baakalimagheji na baku̱mu̱ baa Mi̱si̱li̱. Baasa kandi baakoleesi̱ya maaje ghaabo kukola eki Musa na Alooni̱ baakoli̱ye.
Bu̱li̱ omui mu bantu aba aakuba hansi mwi̱gho ghuwe kandi ghwafooka njoka. Bhaatu mwi̱gho ghwa Alooni̱ ghwammela mi̱i̱gho yabo.
Bhaatu mutima ghwa Falaaho ghwakala ghunomakakaane. Aabhenga ku̱tegheeleli̱ya Musa na Alooni̱ ngoku
aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Mutima ghwa Falaaho ghunomakakaane kandi aabhengi̱ye ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ kughenda.
Munkiya nkyambisi oghende ewaa Falaaho, obu akuba naatuwa kughenda haa maasi ghaa Nailo. Otwale mu ngalo yaawe mwi̱gho oghwafooki̱ye njoka kandi omulindilile haa ki̱si̱yo kya maasi agha.
Oghile Falaaho oti, ‘
Luhanga wa Bahebbulaayo, antu̱mi̱ye ewaawe naaghila ati: Oleke bantu banje baghende, niikuwo bagubhe ku̱mpeeleli̱ya mu elungu. Bhaatu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi onabhengi̱ye ku̱mu̱u̱ghu̱wa.’
aakwete kughila ati, ‘Eki nkukola kikuleka omanye ngoku ndi
.’ Si̱ye Musa, mwi̱gho oghu nkwete mu ngalo yanje, nkughuhuula haa maasi ghaa Nailo kandi maasi agha ghakufooka saghama.
Nsu̱i̱ esilimu si̱ku̱ku̱wa kandi maasi agha ghaku̱nu̱nka, Banami̱si̱li̱ tabakugubha kughanuwa.”

aaghila Musa ati, “Oghambile Alooni̱ oti, ‘Okwate mwi̱gho ghwawe, oghuhuule haa maasi ghaa Mi̱si̱li̱, haa mikula yabo ya maasi, haa byahu̱dhu̱ byabo kandi nsulo syabo, maasi agha ghoona ghakufooka saghama. Nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona ekuusulamu saghama, nankabha mu bintu byona ebi bakutaaghamu maasi ebi̱koleeu̱we mu mbaau kedha mabaale.’ ”
Musa na Alooni̱ baakola ngoku
aabalaghiiye. Alooni̱ aamu̱ki̱ya mwi̱gho ghuwe mu maaso ghaa Falaaho na baheeleli̱ya be kandi aaghuhuula haa maasi ghaa Nailo, maasi agha ghoona ghaafooka saghama.
Nsu̱i̱ syʼomu maasi ghaa Nailo syaku̱wa kandi maasi agha ghoona ghaanu̱nka, Banami̱si̱li̱ baasaaghuwa kughanuwa. Saghama yaamalakaka mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona.
Bhaatu banamaaje baa Banami̱si̱li̱ baakola eki dhee haabwa maaje ghaabo. Nahabweki mutima ghwa Falaaho ghwakala ghunomakakaane, aabhenga ku̱tegheeleli̱ya Musa na Alooni̱, ngoku
aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Falaaho eegaali̱ya kandi aaghenda mu numba yee, ekyabaayʼo eki ataakifuwʼo haa mutima ghuwe.
Banami̱si̱li̱ boona baalima bi̱i̱na haai na maasi ghaa Nailo, kutunga maasi ghaa kunuwa, nanga tabangu̱gu̱bhi̱ye kunuwa maasi ghaa Nailo.
Bilo musanju̱ byahuwʼo haanu̱ma ya
kuhuula maasi ghaa Nailo.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Oghende ewaa Falaaho kandi omughile oti
akwete kughila ati, ‘Oleke bantu banje baghende, niikuwo bagubhe kundami̱ya.
Bhaatu kaakuba obhenga kubasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kughenda, nkuha nsi yaawe yoona kifubilo kya bigbende.

Maasi ghaa Nailo ghakuusulamu bigbende ebi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu kandi biise mu numba yaawe na mu kisiika kyawe na haa bulili bwawe kandi mu manumba ghaa baheeleli̱ya baawe na bantu baawe, mu bi̱tu̱mi̱ko byanu na capu̱li̱ya syanu.
Bigbende ebi bi̱ku̱ku̱ni̱i̱nʼo kandi bi̱ni̱i̱nʼo bantu baawe na baheeleli̱ya baawe boona.’ ”

aaghila Musa ati, “Oghambile Alooni̱ oti, ‘Onanule mukono oghukwete mwi̱gho ghwawe kandi oghuhuule haa maasi, mikula ya maasi, byahu̱dhu̱ na nsulo, bigbende bi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu kandi biise mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.’ ”
Nahabweki Alooni̱ aamu̱ki̱ya mukono ghuwe kandi aahuula maasi ghaa Mi̱si̱li̱, bigbende byalu̱ghamu kandi byasula nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Bhaatu banamaaje nabo baakola eki dhee mbakoleesi̱ya maaje ghaabo kandi baaleeta bigbende mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Niibuwo Falaaho aabilikiiye Musa na Alooni̱, aabaghila ati, “Mwesengeleli̱ye
kunjiyʼo bigbende ebi kandi kubiiyʼo bantu banje. Nku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya bantu baanu kughenda kandi kuhongela bihonguwa

Musa aaghila Falaaho ati, “Nkuleka okome bwile obu nkukusabila. Nkwesengeleli̱ya Luhanga haabwawe kandi haabwa baheeleli̱ya baawe na bantu baawe, kubaayʼo bigbende ebi kandi kubiiya mu manumba ghaanu kandi kubileka mu maasi ghaa Nailo ghonkaha.”
Falaaho aaghila ati, “Munkiya.”
Musa aamughila ati, “Nkukola ngoku waabu̱ghi̱ye, niikuwo omanye ngu taaliyo luhanga onji oghu ali nga
Luhanga waatu.
Bigbende ebi bi̱ku̱ku̱lu̱ghʼo kandi bi̱lu̱ghe mu manumba ghaawe, haa baheeleli̱ya baawe na bantu baawe, bi̱ku̱ti̱ghala mu maasi ghaa Nailo ghonkaha.”
Musa na Alooni̱ baalu̱gha ewaa Falaaho kandi Musa eesengeleli̱ya
kuuyʼo kifubilo kya bigbende ebi aabaagha asindikiiye Falaaho.
aakola eki Musa aamusabi̱ye. Bigbende byona byaku̱wa ebyabaagha mu manumba ghaabo, hanjaakati syabo, na mu misili yabo.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabikumaani̱ya ntuumo kandi nsi eghi yoona yaanu̱nka.
Bhaatu obu Falaaho aaboone kijibu eki nkyahuwʼo, oomakakani̱ya mutima ghuwe kandi aabhenga ku̱tegheeleli̱ya Musa na Alooni̱, ngoku
aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Oghile Alooni̱ oti, ‘Ohi̱dhe mwi̱gho ghwawe kandi oghuhuule hansi mu tu̱u̱tu̱, niikuwo efooke mibui mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona.’ ”

Baakola kuwo. Alooni̱ aahi̱dha mukono ghuwe oghukwete mwi̱gho kandi aaghuhuula mu tu̱u̱tu̱ hansi. Tu̱u̱tu̱ yoona ya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yaafooka mibui kandi mibui eghi yaasu̱nda haa bantu boona na bisolo byona.
Banamaaje baa Mi̱si̱li̱ baalengʼo dhee mu maaje ghaabo kuleeta mibui, bhaatu baasaaghuwa. Nahabweki mibui yaasu̱ndʼo bantu na bisolo.
Niibuwo banamaaje aba baaghi̱li̱ye Falaaho bati, “Eki ni kyala kya Luhanga.” Bhaatu mutima ghwa Falaaho ghwakala ghunomakakaane kandi aabhenga ku̱tegheeleli̱ya Musa na Alooni̱, ngoku
aabu̱ghi̱ye.
aaghila Musa ati, “Oomuke nkyambisi cu̱i̱ kandi oghende ewaa Falaaho, obu akuba naaghenda haa maasi, omughile oti
akwete kughila ati, ‘Oleke bantu banje baghende, niikuwo bagubhe kundami̱ya.

Kaakuba otaleka bantu banje kughenda, nkukusindikila nsoola sikaniiye kimui na baheeleli̱ya baawe, na bantu baawe kandi mu manumba ghaanu. Manumba ghaa Banami̱si̱li̱ ghakuusulamu nsoola sikani̱ye kandi sikuusula hansi hoona.
“ ‘Bhaatu bwile obu nkulinda kyalo kya Goseeni̱, hambali bantu banje baakaaye. Taaliyo nsoola sikani̱ye esikubaayo, niikuwo mumanye ngoku siye
, nkwete kukola mulimo ghwanje mu nsi eni hambali muukaaye.
Nkulinda bantu banje nsoola kutabahi̱kamu esikuluma bantu baawe kubalwali̱ya. Kyakuswekani̱ya kini kikubʼo munkiya.’ ”
aakola ngoku aabu̱ghi̱ye. Nsoola sikaniiye kimui syasula mu kikaali kya Falaaho na manumba ghaa baheeleli̱ya be. Nsoola syasula mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona kandi syabhi̱i̱ya nsi eghi yoona.
Niibuwo Falaaho aabilikiiye Musa na Alooni̱, aabaghila ati, “Mughende kandi muhonge bihonguwa ewaa Luhanga waanu, bhaatu mubihongele mu nsi eni.”
Bhaatu Musa aaghila ati, “Taaki̱hi̱ki̱ye kukola eki, nanga bihonguwa tukuhongela
Luhanga waatu, Banami̱si̱li̱ babyohi̱ye. Kaakuba Banami̱si̱li̱ batubona ntuhonga bihonguwa ebi boohi̱ye, buuye tabakutuhuula mabaale?
Tuli na kughenda lughendo lwa bilo bisatu mu elungu, niikuwo tuhongele bihonguwa
Luhanga waatu, ngoku aatulaghiiye.”
Falaaho aaghila ati, “Nkuleka mughende mu elungu kandi muhongele bihonguwa
Luhanga waanu, bhaatu mutaghenda hambali haseli̱ye. Nahabweki munsabile.”
Musa aaghila ati, “Ndimaghenda kandi nkwesengeleli̱ya

nti munkiya nsoola sikaniiye kimui esi si̱lu̱ghʼo Falaaho kandi si̱lu̱ghʼo baheeleli̱ya be na bantu be. Bhaatu otatodha kutudimaaga kandi obhenga ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya bantu aba kughenda kuhonga bihonguwa ewaa
Nahabweki Musa aalu̱gha ewaa Falaaho kandi aasaba ewaa
kandi
aakola ngoku Musa aamusabi̱ye. Nsoola esi aasiiyʼo Falaaho, baheeleli̱ya be na bantu be, taaliyo nʼemui eghi ekati̱ghalʼo.
Bhaatu bwile obu Falaaho aatodha oomakakani̱ya mutima ghuwe dhee kandi aabhenga kuleka bantu aba kughenda.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Oghende ewaa Falaaho kandi omughile oti, ‘
Luhanga wa Bahebbulaayo akwete kughila ati, “Oleke bantu banje baghende, niikuwo bagubhe kundami̱ya.”
Kaakuba obhenga dhee kubaleka kughenda,
mukono ghwa
ghukusindika bulwaye bwa kabhi haa bisolo byawe byona ebili mu mali̱i̱si̱li̱yo ghaawe, nkai̱na, ndogooi̱, ngamila, nte, ntaama kandi mbu̱li̱.
Bhaatu
akutambulani̱yamu bisolo bya Banai̱saaleeli̱ na bisolo bya Banami̱si̱li̱, niikuwo atabʼo kisolo na kimui kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ eki̱ku̱ku̱wa.’ ”
aatʼo bwile, naaghila ati, “Munkiya
akukola kintu eki mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.”
Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo
aakola kintu eki. Bisolo byona bya Banami̱si̱li̱ byaku̱wa, bhaatu taaliyo kisolo na kimui kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ekyaku̱u̱ye.

Obu Falaaho aabu̱u̱i̱ye bantu, baamughambila ngoku ataliyo kisolo na kimui kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ekyaku̱u̱ye. Bhaatu mutima ghwa Falaaho ghwakala ghunomakakaane kandi aabhenga kuleka Banai̱saaleeli̱ kughenda.
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati, “Mukwate ki̱bu̱ kyʼomu mahi̱gha mu ngalo syanu, Musa akihanje mu mwanya Falaaho analoli̱ye.
Ki̱bu̱ eki kikufooka tu̱u̱tu̱ mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona kandi ekuleka bantu baa mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ balwale bihute na bisolo byabo byona, ebi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu bibbodhe.”
Nahabweki Musa na Alooni̱ baakwata ki̱bu̱ kyʼomu mahi̱gha kandi beemilila mu maaso ghaa Falaaho. Musa aakihanja mu mwanya kandi kyaleeteleja Banami̱si̱li̱ na bisolo byabo kulwala bihute.
Banamaaje baa Banami̱si̱li̱ tabaagu̱bhi̱ye kuhakani̱ya Musa nanga nabo dhee bakaba balwaye bihute nga Banami̱si̱li̱ banji boona.
Bhaatu
oomakakani̱ya mutima ghwa Falaaho kandi aabhenga ku̱tegheeleli̱ya Musa na Alooni̱, ngoku
aaghambiiye Musa.
aaghila Musa ati, “Oomuke nkyambisi cu̱i̱ oghende ewaa Falaaho kandi omughile oti, ‘
Luhanga wa Bahebbulaayo akwete kughila ati: Oleke bantu banje baghende niikuwo bagubhe kundami̱ya.
Mulundi ghuni nkughenda kusindika bifubilo byanje byona hali uwe, baheeleli̱ya baawe na bantu baawe, niikuwo ogubhe kumanya ngu taaliyo luhanga onji oghu engaane nanje munsi yoona.
Nanga endindi nguli naamu̱ki̱i̱ye mukono ghwanje kuha uwe na bantu baawe kifubilo kya ndwala, enu̱we boona mwanguhwelekeleeye munsi.
Bhaatu naaku̱leki̱ye oli mwomi̱i̱li̱ haabwa kighendeleluwa kini, kukwoleka maani̱ ghanje, niikuwo li̱i̱na lyanje lilangililuwe munsi yoona.
Bhaatu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi onakwepankilʼo bantu banje kandi onabhengi̱ye kubaleka kughenda.
Nahabweki bwile nga buni munkiya, nku̱tooni̱ya mbu̱la yamaani̱ ya lubaale. Mbu̱la eghi etakatoonagha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ ku̱lu̱gha kilo eki nsi eghi yaakabʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.

Endindi otume bantu kuleeta bisolo byawe, na bintu byawe byona ebi oli nabiyo, ebili mu musili, babitaahi̱ye mu bi̱i̱kalo hambali bikuukala kusemeeye. Nanga mbu̱la ya lubaale eghi ekuhuula bantu na bisolo byona ebili mu musili, bisolo ebi bataaleeti̱ye e ka byona bi̱ku̱ku̱wa.’ ”
Bamui mu bantu baa Falaaho aboobahi̱ye haabwa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi
aabu̱ghi̱ye, baataahi̱ya bwangu basyana baabo na bisolo byabo mu manumba ghaabo.
Bhaatu abaabhengi̱ye ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi
aabu̱ghi̱ye, baaleka basyana baabo na bisolo byabo mu musili.
aaghila Musa ati, “Oomu̱ki̱ye mukono ghwawe mu mwanya, niikuwo mbu̱la ya lubaale etoone mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona, ehuule bantu, bisolo na bilimuwa byona ebili mu misili mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.”
Nahabweki Musa aamu̱ki̱ya mwi̱gho ghuwe aaghu̱loli̱ya mu mwanya kandi
aasindika nkubha na mbu̱la ya lubaale kandi nkubha yaabbyoka munsi.
aatooni̱ya mbu̱la ya lubaale mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Mbu̱la yamaani̱ ya lubaale yaaghuwa eghi elimu nkubha, eghi ekwete kwetanuka, kubbyoka kandi etaakulekeelela. Mbu̱la eghi ekaba etakatoonagha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona ku̱lu̱gha nsi eghi ebʼo.
Mbu̱la ya lubaale eghi yaahuula bintu byona ebyabaagha mu misili mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, otaayemu bantu na bisolo. Yaabhi̱i̱ya bilimuwa byona mu misili kandi yaagenga hansi biti byona.
Mu kyalo kya Goseeni̱ kyonkaha, hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabaagha baakaaye, niikiyo mbu̱la ya lubaale eghi etaatooni̱yemu.
Niibuwo Falaaho aatu̱mi̱ye muntu kubilikila Musa na Alooni̱ kwisa ewe. Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye aabaghila ati, “Endindi naasi̱i̱si̱ye kandi
Luhanga ahi̱ki̱i̱ye kukola kintu kini, si̱ye na bantu banje twasobeei̱ye.
Mwesengeleli̱ye
, akeesi̱ye mbu̱la eghi elimu nkubha kandi mbu̱la ya lubaale eghi, nanga yaatuhingulaane. Du̱mbi̱ nkubaleka mughende, tamukutodha kuukala mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.”
Musa aamughila ati, “Nkaaku̱lu̱gha mu kibugha kini, nku̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya mikono yanje ewaa
. Nkubha eghi ekuleka kandi mbu̱la ya lubaale teekutodha kutoona, niikuwo ogubhe kumanya ngoku nsi eni eli ya
Bhaatu nimani̱ye ngoku uwe na baheeleli̱ya baawe mutoobahi̱ye
Luhanga.”
(Mbu̱la ya lubaale eghi yaabhi̱i̱ya hansi bu̱goi̱go na bbaale, nanga bbaale ekaba etandi̱ki̱ye kwana kandi bu̱goi̱go bukaba buli haai kwela.
Bhaatu ngano tayaabhi̱hi̱ye nanga ekaba etakatooye.)
Musa aalu̱gha ewaa Falaaho, aatuwa mu kibugha eki, aamu̱ki̱ya mikono yee ewaa
, nkubha yaaleka kandi mbu̱la ya lubaale yaakiya, tayaatodhi̱ye etoona mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Bhaatu obu Falaaho aaboone mbu̱la yamaani̱ eghi niyaaleka kutoona kandi lubaale na nkubha mbyaleka, aatodha asi̱i̱sa kandi eye na baheeleli̱ya be boomakakani̱ya mitima yabo.
Falaaho oomakakani̱ya mutima ghuwe, abhenga kuleka bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ kughenda, ngoku
aabu̱ghi̱ye naakoleesi̱ya Musa.
aaghila Musa ati, “Oghende ewaa Falaaho, nanga noomakakani̱i̱ye mutima ghuwe kandi mutima ghwa baheeleli̱ya be, niikuwo ngubhe kukola byakuswekani̱ya bini mu bantu aba.
Naakoli̱ye eki niikuwo mugubhe kughambila baana baanu na baasukulu baanu ngoku naafubiiye Banami̱si̱li̱ kandi byakuswekani̱ya ebi naakoli̱ye mu bantu aba, niikuwo mugubhe kumanya ngu Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Nahabweki Musa na Alooni̱ baaghenda ewaa Falaaho kandi baamughila bati, “
Luhanga wa Bahebbulaayo akwete kughila ati, ‘Okubhenga kundhootela ku̱hi̱ki̱ya dhi̱? Oleke bantu banje baghende, niikuwo bagubhe kundami̱ya.
Nuwaabhengi̱ye kuleka bantu banje kughenda, munkiya nkuleeta njighe mu nsi yaawe.
Njighe esi si̱ku̱swi̱ki̱la nsi yaawe yoona niikuwo atabʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kubona etaka. Sikuliya ebi mbu̱la ya lubaale yaati̱ghi̱yʼo kandi siliye biti byanu byona ebitooye mu misili.

Njighe esi sikuusula mu manumba ghaawe, na manumba ghaa baheeleli̱ya baawe boona, na manumba ghaa Banami̱si̱li̱ boona, sikukanila kimui, esi baa eseenu̱we na baataata baanu batakabonagha, ku̱lu̱gha babyaluwa ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.’ ” Du̱mbi̱ Musa aalu̱gha ewaa Falaaho kandi aaghenda.
Niibuwo baheeleli̱ya baa Falaaho baamu̱ghi̱li̱ye bati, “Musaasa oni aku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kutuleetela bijibu? Oleke bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ baghende niikuwo baheeleli̱ye
Luhanga wabo. Tookakengi̱ye ngoku nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yaabhi̱i̱hi̱ye?”
Niibuwo Falaaho aatu̱mi̱ye bantu kubilikila Musa na Alooni̱ kukuuka ewe. Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye aabaghila ati, “Mughende mu̱heeleli̱ye
Luhanga waanu. Bhaatu mbaki bakughenda?”
Musa aamukuukamu ati, “Tukughenda na bantu baatu bato na bakulu. Tukutwala batabani̱ baatu na bahala baatu, ntaama, mbu̱li̱ na nte syatu, nanga tuli na kukolela
ki̱ghenu̱.”
Bhaatu Falaaho aabaghila ati, “Kaakuba mbasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kutwala bakali̱ baanu na baana baanu,
akwetaaghisibuwa kuba ali naanu! Endindi naakimanya ngoku muli na kighendeleluwa ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye mu byeli̱li̱kano byanu.
Bbaa, basaasa bonkaha haaliibo baaghenda ku̱heeleli̱ya
, nanga eki niikiyo mukwete kusaba.” Du̱mbi̱ Falaaho aababhinga mu kikaali kiye.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Onanule mukono ghwawe mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, niikuwo njighe sikani̱ye siisemu kandi siliye bu̱li̱ kilimuwa ekili mu nsi eghi, eki mbu̱la ya lubaale yaati̱ghi̱yemu.”
Nahabweki Musa aamu̱ki̱ya mwi̱gho ghuwe aaghwoleka nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱,
aaleeta mwegha ghwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba kandi ghwahunga mu nsi eghi ntangaali̱ yoona na mukilo. Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye nkyambisi, mwegha oghu ghukaba ni ghwaleeti̱yemu njighe.
Njighe syasa mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi syakala mu ehanga eli lyona. Njighe sikaniiye kimui esi bantu baabaagha batakabonaghʼo kandi esitalitodha kubʼo.

Njighe esi syamalakaka etaka lyona lya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi etaka eli lyafooka linjilaghu̱li̱ nanga njighe esi kandi syaliya bi̱si̱ngo byona ebyabaagha mu nsi eghi na bi̱ghu̱ma bya biti byona ebi mbu̱la ya lubaale yaati̱ghi̱yʼo. Taaliyo kintu kyona kya ki̱si̱ka kibisi ekyati̱ghaaye, kedha kiti kedha kilimuwa kyʼomu musili, mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona.
Niibuwo Falaaho aabilikiiye bwangu Musa na Alooni̱, aabaghila ati, “Naasi̱i̱si̱ye ewaa
Luhanga waanu kandi naasi̱i̱si̱ye ewaanu.
Gutu, munganile kibhi kyanje mulundi ghuni ghwonkaha kandi mwesengeleli̱ye
Luhanga waanu enkaha kunjiyʼo kifubilo kya lu̱ku̱ kini.”
Nahabweki Musa aalu̱gha ewaa Falaaho kandi eesengeleli̱ya
aaleeta mwegha ghwamaani̱ ghwa bughuwa ejooba, ghwamu̱ki̱ya njighe esi kandi ghwasitwala mu Nanja Mutuku. Taaliyo lujighe na lumui olwati̱ghaaye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Bhaatu
oomakakani̱ya mutima ghwa Falaaho kandi aabhenga kuleka bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ kughenda.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Onanule mukono ghwawe mu mwanya, mweli̱ma ghukwisa mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, mweli̱ma ghukwataane kwonini oghu muntu akugubha ku̱ku̱mʼo.”
Nahabweki Musa aamu̱ki̱ya mukono ghuwe mu mwanya, mweli̱ma ghwamaani̱ ghwakwata mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona haabwa bilo bisatu.
Bwile obu bantu tabaagubhagha kubonangana kedha ku̱lu̱gha mu maka ghaabo haabwa bilo bisatu. Bhaatu kyeleeli̱ kyakala hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabaagha baakaaye.
Falaaho aabilikila Musa kandi aamughila ati, “Mughende mu̱heeleli̱ye
waanu kandi mutwale baana baanu bato bonkaha, bhaatu mu̱ti̱ghe hani ntaama, mbu̱li̱ na nte syanu.”
Bhaatu Musa aamughila ati, “Oli na ku̱tu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kutwala bisolo bya kuhonga na bya bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye, ebi tukuhongela
Luhanga waatu.
Bisolo byatu tuli na kughenda nabiyo kandi taaliyo na kimui eki̱ku̱ti̱ghala, nanga bimui haa bisolo ebi tukubihaayo nga bihonguwa ewaa
Luhanga waatu kandi tatumani̱ye ebi tukuhongela
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya tu̱ki̱dhi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.”
Bhaatu
oomakakani̱ya mutima ghwa Falaaho kandi aabhenga ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ kughenda.
Niibuwo Falaaho aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Ondu̱ghe mu maaso! Tambali̱ye kutodha kukubona! Kilo eki nkutodha kukubona, oku̱ku̱wa!”
Musa aamughila ati, “Waahi̱ki̱i̱ye! Tookutodha kumbona bbaa!”
aaghila Musa ati, “Hanaliyo kifubilo kimui eki nkuha Falaaho na nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, du̱mbi̱ akuleka mughende. Bwile obu akuleka enu̱we boona mughende, taaliyo nʼomui oghu aku̱ti̱ghala.

Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱, bu̱li̱ musaasa aghende ewaa muliilanuwa wee wabusaasa Munami̱si̱li̱ kandi bu̱li̱ mukali̱ aghende ewaa muliilanuwa wee wabukali̱ Munami̱si̱li̱ amusabe kumuha bintu bi̱koleeu̱we mu siliva kandi feeja.”
aaleka Banami̱si̱li̱ baaghilila kisa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Banyolo baa Falaaho na Banami̱si̱li̱ beeli̱li̱kanaghʼo Musa ngoku ali muntu wamaani̱ mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Musa aaghila Falaaho ati, “
akwete kughila ati, ‘Obwalo saaha mukaagha sya mukilo nkusaalila mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.

Mwana wabusaasa mu̱li̱ghaaso mu bu̱li̱ ka ya Munami̱si̱li̱ aku̱ku̱wa ku̱lu̱gha haa mu̱li̱ghaaso wabusaasa wa mukama Falaaho, oghu akusitama haa ntebe ya bukama yee, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa mu̱syana wabukali̱ oghu akusiyagha haa lubengo, na mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya bisolo.
Hakubʼo kulila kwamaani̱ mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ yoona okutakabaaghʼo kandi okutalitodha kubʼo.
Bhaatu taaliyo mbuwa nʼemui eghi ekugbomela muntu weena mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ kedha bisolo byabo, niikuwo mumanye ngoku
akutaaghʼo mbaghani̱ja haagati ya Banami̱si̱li̱ na Banai̱saaleeli̱.’

Baheeleli̱ya baawe bani boona bakwisa kandi bateeli̱ye mu maaso ghanje, baghile bati, ‘Olu̱ghe hani, oghende na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baawe boona.’ Haanu̱ma yʼeki, nkughenda.” Musa aalu̱gha ewaa Falaaho asaaluuwe kwonini.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Falaaho taakubaaghu̱wa, niikuwo neeyongele kukola byakuswekani̱ya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.”
Musa na Alooni̱ baakola byakuswekani̱ya bini byona mu maaso ghaa Falaaho, bhaatu
oomakakani̱ya mutima ghwa Falaaho kandi aabhenga kuleka Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu nsi yee.
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ ati,
“Kweli̱ kuni kubaaghe kwʼoku̱du̱bha kwa meeli̱ ghaanu, haaliikuwo mwatandikilaghʼo kubala mwaka ghwanu.

Mughambile ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyona muti haa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya kweli̱ kuni bu̱li̱ musaasa ali na kukoma kyana kya ntaama kya kwita nga kihonguwa haabwa ka yee, kyana kya ntaama kimui haabwa bu̱li̱ ka.

Bhaatu ka eghi niyaabaaye eli nkee kuliya kisolo eki kyona, bakitambulane na ka ya muliilanuwa wee. Batambulane kisolo eki kusighikila haa muhendo ghwa bantu abali mu bu̱li̱ ka kandi na nyama esi muntu akugubha kuliya kandi kumalʼo.
Bisolo ebi mukukomamu bili na kuba ebitali na kamogo, byabusaasa kandi ebili na mwaka ghumui. Mukugubha kubiiya mu ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱ syanu.
Bisolo ebi mubiloleelelaghe ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kilo kya eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa kya kweli̱ kuni, obu ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakwekumaani̱ya kwita byana bya ntaama lwagholo.
Bantu aba bali na kutwala haa saghama ya bisolo ebi baghisiighe haa bi̱ji̱ngi̱li̱jo bya njighi na fuleemu syʼelughulu sya njighi sya manumba ghaabo hambali bakuliila bisolo ebi.
Mukilo eghi booki̱ye nyama esi haa mulilo, basiliye na migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kandi bulaala busaaliiye.
Mutaliya nyama esi sinali mbisi kedha kusiteeka, bhaatu syona mu̱syoki̱ye, otaayemu mutuwe, bilenge na byenda.
Mutati̱gha haa nyama esi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi, kaakuba si̱ti̱ghalʼo mu̱syoki̱ye sihuwʼo butakahi̱ki̱ye nkyambisi.
Muliye kiihulo eki bu̱li̱ muntu eebohi̱ye mu̱ci̱pi̱, alu̱wete nkai̱to mu bighele kandi akwete mwi̱gho mu ngalo yee. Mukiliye bwangu-bwangu nanga eki ni ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo kya

“Mukilo eghi nkusaalila mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi nkwita bu̱li̱ mwana wabusaasa mu̱li̱ghaaso wa Banami̱si̱li̱ na mi̱li̱ghaaso yabusaasa ya bisolo byabo kandi nkufubila baaluhanga boona baa Banami̱si̱li̱. Ni̱i̱si̱ye

Saghama eghi ekuba eli haa bi̱ji̱ngi̱li̱jo ebi ekuba kaakulolelʼo kwoleka manumba hambali muli. Nkaakubona saghama eghi, nkubasaala. Kifubilo kya lu̱ku̱ takikubahi̱kʼo obu nkuba ninfubila nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
“Kilo kini mukiisukaghe bu̱li̱ mwaka kandi mukolelaghe
ki̱ghenu̱, kini mukikwate nga kilaghilo kya bilo nʼebilo mu mijo yaanu yoona.

Muliyaghe migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so haabwa bilo musanju̱. Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha muuyaghe ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kyona mu manumba ghaanu, kaakuba muntu weena aliya mugaati̱ ghulimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, ku̱lu̱gha haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha ku̱hi̱ka haa kilo kya musanju̱, muntu oghu abhinguwaghe mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.

Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi na kilo kyamusanju̱ mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Haa bilo bibili ebi mutakolagha mulimo. Mulimo ghwonkaha oghu muli na kukola ni kuteeka byokuliya.

“Mukolaghe Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Migaati̱ Etalimu Ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, nanga haa kilo kini kyonini, niibuwo naahi̱ye ntu̱la syanu mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱. Nahabweki mukolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ eki haa kilo kini, mu mijo yaanu yoona, nga kilaghilo kya bilo nʼebilo.
Muliyaghe migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kutandikila lwagholo lwa kilo kya eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa kya kweli̱ kwʼoku̱du̱bha oku, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo lwa kilo kya maku̱mi̱ abili na kimui.

Mu bilo musanju̱ ebi mutaba na ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kyona mu manumba ghaanu. Kaakuba muntu weena aliya mugaati̱ ghulimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, muntu oghu abhinguwe mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱, nankabha aba ali munamahanga kedha Munai̱saaleeli̱.
Mutaliliya kintu kyona ekilimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, hambali muukaaye, muliyaghe migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so.”
Niibuwo Musa aabilikiiye beebembeli̱ boona baa I̱saaleeli̱, aabaghila ati, “Mughende kandi mwekomele byana bya ntaama kusighikila haa ntu̱la syanu kandi mubiite kukola ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo.

Mukwate kabha kaa hai̱sopu̱ mukalu̱bi̱ke mu saghama eghi ali mu bbaafu kandi mughisiighe haa fuleemu syʼelughulu sya njighi syanu na haa bi̱ji̱ngi̱li̱jo. Atabʼo muntu nʼomui mu enu̱we oghu akutuwa mu numba yee ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi.

akusaalila mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi akwita Banami̱si̱li̱. Bhaatu akaakubona saghama haa fuleemu syʼelughulu sya njighi syanu na haa bi̱ji̱ngi̱li̱jo, akusaala lwighi olu. Taaku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya malai̱ka wa lu̱ku̱ kutaaha mu manumba ghaanu kwita enu̱we.
“Muusuke, ndaghikiililo sini nkilaghilo ngoku enu̱we na baasukulu baanu muli na kukola ki̱ghenu̱ eki bilo nʼebilo.
Mukaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi
akubaha ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye, mukolaghe mukolo oghu.
Baana baanu mbaanabu̱u̱i̱ye enu̱we bati, ‘Mukolo ghuni ghukumani̱i̱si̱ya ki?’
Mubakuukemu muti, ‘Tukwete kuhaayo kihonguwa kya Kusaaluwʼo kya
, nanga akasaala manumba ghaa Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu Mi̱si̱li̱, obu aatagha baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso baa Banami̱si̱li̱, bhaatu aasaala manumba ghaatu.’ ” Bantu aba baateeli̱ya hansi kandi baalami̱ya
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghenda kandi baakola ebi
aalaghiiye Musa na Alooni̱.
Saaha mukaagha sya mukilo

aata baana baabusaasa boona mi̱li̱ghaaso ya Banami̱si̱li̱ ku̱lu̱gha haa mu̱li̱ghaaso wabusaasa wa mukama Falaaho, oghu akusitama haa ntebe ya bukama yee, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa muntu wa bu̱li̱ kilo oghu ali mu nkomo, na mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya bisolo.
Mukilo eghi Falaaho aamuka na baheeleli̱ya be boona na Banami̱si̱li̱ boona. Baaghu̱wa bantu mbalilila kimui mu Mi̱si̱li̱, nanga mu bu̱li̱ numba muntu akaba aku̱u̱yemu.
Mukilo eghi Falaaho aatuma kubilikila Musa na Alooni̱ kandi aabaghila ati, “Muumuke, enu̱we na Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi mughende mu̱heeleli̱ye
waanu ngoku mwabu̱ghi̱ye.
Mutwale ntaama, mbu̱li̱ na nte syanu ngoku mwabu̱ghi̱ye, mughende. Munsabile kutunga mu̱gi̱sa.”
Banami̱si̱li̱ baataamu maani̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha bwangu mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, baabaghila bati, “Mutaaghendi̱ye etu̱we boona tu̱ku̱ku̱wa.”
Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakwata ki̱tu̱mbe kitalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, baakita mu capu̱li̱ya, baaboha capu̱li̱ya esi mu ngoye syabo kandi baasiheeka haa mabegha ghaabo.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baakola ngoku Musa aabaghambiiye, baasaba Banami̱si̱li̱ kubaha ngoye na bintu bi̱koleeu̱we mu siliva kandi feeja.
aaleka Banami̱si̱li̱ baaghilila kisa Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi baabaha ebi baabasabi̱ye, niikuwo Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatwete batiyo buguudha bwa Banami̱si̱li̱.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatandika kulubhatanga na maghulu ku̱lu̱gha Lamu̱sesi̱ ku̱hi̱ka Su̱kooti̱. Bakaba bali nga basaasa mitwalo nkaagha, otabaliiyemu bakali̱ na baana.
Bantu banji bakani̱ye baa ntu̱la syambaghani̱ja baaghenda na Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba kandi baatwala bitunguwa byabo bikaniiye kimui bya ntaama, mbu̱li̱ na nte.

Ki̱tu̱mbe eki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baahi̱ye mu Mi̱si̱li̱, baakiteekamu migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so nanga bakababhinga bwangu-bwangu mu Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi bataatunga bwile bwa kutwala ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kandi kuteeka byokuliya.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakaba mbaakaaye mu Mi̱si̱li̱ haabwa myaka bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa na maku̱mi̱ asatu.
Kilo kyonini eki myaka bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa na maku̱mi̱ asatu yaahweleeyemu, ntu̱la syona sya bantu baa
syalu̱gha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Mukilo eghi
aalinda bantu be kubaaya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, nahabweki mukilo eghi Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baghihaagheyo ewaa
bu̱li̱ mwaka mu mijo yabo yoona.
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati, “Bini niibiyo bilaghilo bya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo: Hatabʼo munamahanga nʼomui oghu akuliya haa kiihulo kya ki̱ghenu̱ eki.
Bhaatu mu̱syana weena oghu baghu̱li̱ye na sente akugubha kuliya haa ki̱ghenu̱ eki haanu̱ma ya kumusala.
Hatabʼo munamahanga kedha mu̱koli̱ bapangi̱i̱si̱i̱ye oghu akugubha kuliya haa ki̱ghenu̱ eki.
“Bu̱li̱ ka eli na kuliila kiihulo kya Kusaaluwʼo mu numba hambali baakiteekeeye. Batatwesi̱ya haa byokuliya ebi hanja kandi batahenda eku̱wa lyakiyo na limui.
Ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kikolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ eki.
“Kaakuba munamahanga weena oghu aakaaye naanu, abbala kukolela

ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo, muli na ku̱du̱bha kusala basaasa boona abali mu ka yee. Du̱mbi̱ akolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo nga Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji boona. Bhaatu taaliyo musaasa weena oghu batasali̱ye oghu ali na kuliya haa kiihulo eki.
Kilaghilo kimui eki ni kya Banai̱saaleeli̱, na banamahanga abaakaaye naanu.”
Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baakola ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa na Alooni̱.
Kilo eki kyonini
aaya ntu̱la sya Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Muhaagheyo ewanje baana boona baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso. Mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona ya baana baabusaasa baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ na mi̱li̱ghaaso yabusaasa ya bisolo byabo, ni byanje.”
Musa aaghila bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Muusukaghe kilo kini eki mwalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱, mu nsi hambali mwabaagha basyana.
akabaayayo na mukono ghuwe ghwamaani̱. Kilo eki mutaliyagha migaati̱ elimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so.
Obwalo mu kweli̱ kuni kwa Abi̱bu̱, niibuwo mu̱ku̱lu̱gha Mi̱si̱li̱.

akaakubaki̱dhi̱ya mu nsi ya Banakanaani̱, Bahi̱ti̱, Bamooli̱, Bahi̱vi̱ na Bayebu̱si̱, eghi aalahiiye ewaa baataata baanu ati akuha enu̱we, nsi eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki, mukolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ kini mu kweli̱ kuni.
Bilo musanju̱ muliyaghe migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kandi haa kilo kyamusanju̱ habaaghʼo ki̱ghenu̱ kya

Muliyaghe migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so haabwa bilo musanju̱, taaliyo mugaati̱ oghulimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so oghuli na kuboneka mu enu̱we kandi taaliyo ki̱tu̱mbi̱so ekili na kuboneka mu enu̱we mu nsi yaanu yoona.
Haa kilo eki, oghambilaghe baana baawe oti, ‘Nkwete kukola ki̱ghenu̱ kini haabwa ebi
ankoleeye obu naalu̱ghagha Mi̱si̱li̱.’
Ki̱ghenu̱ kini kilabaagha nga kabonelo haa mukono ghwawe kandi kaakulolelʼo haa bhu̱u̱su̱ yaawe, ku̱ku̱u̱su̱ki̱ya ku̱bu̱gha kandi kwegha kilaghilo kya
, nanga
akakuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ na mukono ghuwe ghwamaani̱.
Okolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ mu bwile bwakiyo bwonini bu̱li̱ mwaka.
akaaku̱ku̱ki̱dhi̱ya mu nsi ya Banakanaani̱ kandi naakuha nsi eghi, ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye na kilahilo uwe na baataata baawe,
oli na kuhaayo ewaa
bu̱li̱ mwana wabusaasa mu̱li̱ghaaso. Mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya bisolo byawe elabaagha ya
Ocungulaghe bu̱li̱ mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwabusaasa ghwa ndogooi̱ na kyana kya ntaama, bhaatu otaaghucunguuye, oghuhende bikiya. Oli na kucungula baana baawe baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso.
“Mu bwile obuliisa obu baana baawe bali̱ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, ‘Kini kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ki?’ Obaghile oti, ‘
akatuuya Mi̱si̱li̱ na mukono ghuwe ghwamaani̱, aatuuya mu nsi hambali twabaagha basyana.
Obu Falaaho aabhengi̱ye kutuleka kughenda,
aata baana boona baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, mi̱li̱ghaaso ya bantu na bisolo. Eki niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye nimpayo bu̱li̱ mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa kisolo nga kihonguwa ewaa
. Bhaatu haabwa bu̱li̱ mwana wanje wabusaasa mu̱li̱ghaaso, nkumucungula nimpayo kisolo nga kihonguwa.’
Ki̱ghenu̱ eki kilabaagha nga kabonelo haa mukono ghwawe kandi kaakulolelʼo haa bhu̱u̱su̱ yaawe ku̱ku̱u̱su̱ki̱ya ngoku
aaku̱u̱hi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ na mukono ghuwe ghwamaani̱.”

Obu Falaaho aasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ kughenda, Luhanga taabahikiiye kukwamila mu kihanda kya mu nsi ya Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱, nankabha nkyabaagha kya haai-haai. Nanga Luhanga akaghila ati, “Kaakuba bantu aba basangayo bulemo, bakugubha kuhindula byeli̱li̱kano byabo kandi bakuuke Mi̱si̱li̱.”
Bhaatu Luhanga aabahikila kukwama kihanda kyʼomu elungu eki̱ghendi̱ye haa Nanja Mutuku. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ bali na byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya bulemo.

Musa aatwala maku̱wa ghaa Yojeefu̱, nanga Yojeefu̱ akaba naaleki̱ye batabani̱ baa I̱saaleeli̱ mbalahiiye kukola eki. Aaghila ati, “Kilo kimui, Luhanga akwisa kandi abajune. Nahabweki muli na kuheeka maku̱wa ghanje obu mukuba ni̱mu̱lu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo kini.”
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha Su̱kooti̱ kandi baaghoona Etamu, haa mutaano ghwa elungu.
Ntangaali̱
aabahikilagha mu mpaghi ya kicu kubooleka kihanda kandi mukilo aabahikila mu mpaghi ya mulilo kubaha kyeleeli̱, niikuwo bagubhe kughenda mukilo na ntangaali̱.
Mpaghi ya kicu yaakalagha ehikiiye bantu aba ntangaali̱ kandi mpaghi ya mulilo ebahikiiye mukilo.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuuke enu̱ma kandi baghoone mu maaso ghaa tau̱ni̱ ya Pihahi̱looti̱, haagati ya tau̱ni̱ ya Mi̱gi̱doli̱ na Nanja Mutuku, haai na Bbaali̱-jefoni̱.
Falaaho akweli̱li̱kana ati, ‘Banai̱saaleeli̱ niibuwo baalalanga mu nsi kandi elungu libatangi̱ye kughenda.’
Nkwomakakani̱ya mutima ghwa Falaaho kandi akuhuma enu̱we. Nku̱mu̱si̱ngu̱la na mahe ghe, niikuwo bantu bampe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa. Haanu̱ma yʼeki Banami̱si̱li̱ bakumanya ngoku ndi
.” Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola eki
aabalaghiiye.

Obu baaghambiiye Falaaho mukama wa Mi̱si̱li̱ ngoku Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱ki̱ye, Falaaho na baheeleli̱ya be baahindula byeli̱li̱kano byabo haa Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi baaghila bati, “Nkiki kini eki twakoli̱ye? Twaleki̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghenda kandi bakuleka kuba basyana baatu!”
Du̱mbi̱ Falaaho aateekani̱ja kigaali̱ kiye kandi aaghenda na mahe ghe.
Aatwala bigaali̱ lukaagha bisemeeye kwonini na bigaali̱ binji byona bya Mi̱si̱li̱, bu̱li̱ kimui kili na mukulu wa mahe wakiyo.
oomakakani̱ya mutima ghwa Falaaho mukama wa Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi aahuma Banai̱saaleeli̱ abaaghendagha batoobahi̱ye.

Mahe ghaa Banami̱si̱li̱, nkai̱na syabo syona, bigaali̱ na abaabifugagha, baahuma Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi baabasanga hambali baghooneeye haa ki̱si̱yo kya Nanja Mutuku haai na tau̱ni̱ ya Pihahi̱looti̱ mu maaso ghaa tau̱ni̱ ya Bbaali̱-jefoni̱.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaboone Falaaho na mahe ghe mbabeebinga, boobahila kimui kandi baatandika kutaagha ewaa
kubakoonela.
Baaghila Musa bati, “Waatu̱leeti̱ye mu elungu lini ku̱kwi̱lamu nangaaki? Buuye mu Mi̱si̱li̱ taabaaghayo bituulo ebikutumala? Waatu̱u̱hi̱ye mu Mi̱si̱li̱ bwaki?
Tatwakughambiiye tutakalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱ tuti, ‘Otuleke tuukale tunali basyana baa Banami̱si̱li̱. Nkilungi etu̱we kuba basyana mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ku̱kwi̱la hani mu elungu!’ ”
Musa aakuukamu ati, “Mutoobaha kandi mugume, obwalo mukubona eki
akukola kujuna enu̱we kandi tamukutodha kubona Banami̱si̱li̱ aba bbaa.
akubalwanilila kandi enu̱we mukuukala mu̱loli̱ye kwonkaha.”
aaghila Musa ati, “Okwete ku̱neesengeleli̱ya kukukoonela nangaaki? Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ beeyongele kughenda mu maaso.
Oomu̱ki̱ye mwi̱gho ghwawe kandi onanule mukono ghwawe haa nanja kughitambulani̱yamu, niikuwo Banai̱saaleeli̱ babhasuke nanja eghi mbalubhatangila hʼetaka lyomi̱ye.
Nkwomakakani̱ya mitima ya Banami̱si̱li̱ niikuwo baase babalabhi̱ye kandi bantu bakumpa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa haabwa ku̱si̱ngu̱la Falaaho, bigaali̱ biye na mahe ghe ghoona aghani̱i̱ni̱ye haa nkai̱na.
Bantu bakumpa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kandi Banami̱si̱li̱ bakumanya ngoku ndi
nkaakumala ku̱si̱ngu̱la Falaaho, bigaali̱ biye na mahe ghe aghani̱i̱ni̱ye haa nkai̱na.”
Malai̱ka wa Luhanga oghu aaghendagha ahikiiye mahe ghaa I̱saaleeli̱, aaghenda enu̱ma syabo kandi mpaghi ya kicu yaalu̱gha mu maaso ghaabo kandi yaaghenda enu̱ma syabo.

Mpaghi eghi yeemilila haagati ya mahe ghaa Banami̱si̱li̱ na Banai̱saaleeli̱. Mukilo eghi yoona kicu eki kyaleeta mweli̱ma haa luhande lwa Banami̱si̱li̱ kandi kyeleeli̱ haa luhande lwa Banai̱saaleeli̱, nahabweki taaliyo mahe agheebi̱ngi̱ye ghaanakyaghʼo mukilo eghi yoona.
Musa aananula mukono ghuwe haa nanja kandi
aaleetʼo mwegha ghwamaani̱ ku̱lu̱gha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba. Mwegha oghu ghwahunga mukilo eghi yoona, ghwatambulani̱yamu kabili maasi agha kandi haabaamu kihanda kyʼetaka lyomi̱ye.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakwamila haagati ya nanja eghi mbalubhatangila hʼetaka lyomi̱ye, maasi ghaneemiliiye nga kisiika haa luhande lwabo lwa mukono ghwabuliyo na ghwa bumesu.
Banami̱si̱li̱ baabakwama haagati ya nanja eghi, bali na nkai̱na syona sya Falaaho, bigaali̱ biye, na mahe ghoona abaaghendagha bani̱i̱ni̱ye haa nkai̱na esi.
Nkyambisi cu̱i̱,
aalola Banami̱si̱li̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu mpaghi ya mulilo na mpaghi ya kicu kandi aaleka boobaha.
Aaleka nkata sya bigaali̱ byabo syasaaba kandi baasaaghuwa kubifuga. Baaghila bati, “Oleke tuuluke Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba!
niibuwo aalwana naatu Banami̱si̱li̱ haabwa bantu aba.”
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Onanule mukono ghwawe haa nanja, niikuwo maasi ghamele Banami̱si̱li̱, bigaali̱ byabo na abani̱i̱ni̱ye haa nkai̱na.”
Nkyambisi cu̱i̱, Musa aananula mukono ghuwe haa nanja kandi maasi agha ghaatodha ghaakuuka ngoku ghaabaagha. Banami̱si̱li̱ baalengʼo kuuluka maasi agha, bhaatu
aakuba Banami̱si̱li̱ aba haagati ya nanja eghi.

Maasi agha ghaakuuka ngoku ghaabaagha. Ghaamela mahe ghaa Falaaho ghoona abaabaagha balabhi̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu nanja eghi. Ghaaswi̱ki̱la bigaali̱ byabo byona, nkai̱na syabo na abaabaagha basi̱ni̱i̱ni̱yʼo. Taaliyo nʼomui oghu akati̱ghalʼo.
Bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalubhatangila mu nanja eghi haa etaka lyomi̱ye kandi maasi ghaamilila nga kisiika haa luhande lwabo lwa mukono ghwabuliyo na ghwabumesu.
Kilo eki
aajuna Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu mukono ghwa Banami̱si̱li̱ kandi Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabona mi̱ku̱ ya Banami̱si̱li̱ haa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja eghi.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaboone bu̱toki̱ bwamaani̱ obu
aakoleeseei̱ye ku̱si̱ngu̱la Banami̱si̱li̱, Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baahu̱ti̱ya
kandi baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja. Baahi̱ki̱li̱ja dhee mu̱heeleli̱ya wee Musa.
Niibuwo Musa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalimbiiye
kilimbo kini bati,
“Nkulimbila
, nanga aasi̱ngu̱u̱ye kwonini,
aaku̱bi̱ye mu nanja nkai̱na nʼoghu aghi̱ni̱i̱ni̱yʼo.
niiye akumpaagha maani̱ kandi kilimbo kyanje.
Niiye akunjunagha
kandi niiye Luhanga wanje, nkumusinda.
Niiye Luhanga wa tita kandi nku̱mu̱ku̱ghi̱ja.
ni mulwani̱ wamaani̱
kandi
niiliyo li̱i̱na liye.
“Bigaali̱ bya Falaaho na mahe ghe aabi̱ku̱bi̱ye mu nanja,
bakulu be baa mahe baamaani̱ baadhikiiye mu Nanja Mutuku.
Nanja etobheeye yaabameli̱ye
kandi baadhikila hansi yayo nga ebaale.
Ai̱
, mukono ghwawe ghwabuliyo ghuli na bu̱toki̱ bwamaani̱,
Ai̱
, mukono ghwawe ghwabuliyo ghwasabanguuye ngi̱ghu̱.
Ku̱si̱ngu̱la kwawe kwamaani̱
kwaleki̱ye waaweelekeeleli̱ya ngi̱ghu̱ syawe
kandi ki̱i̱ni̱gha kyawe kikubaagha nga mulilo
kandi okwoki̱yagha ngi̱ghu̱ syawe nga bisunga.
Obu waahu̱u̱hi̱ye lwoha lwʼomu mihuli yaawe
maasi ghaaba ntuumo,
mighina yeemilila nga kisiika
kandi nanja etobheeye yaakwatana.
“Ngi̱ghu̱ aaghila ati, ‘Nkubahuma kandi mbakwate.
Nkutambulana etungo lyabo kandi nkutwala byona ebi nkubbala.
Nkubhulayo kihiyo kyanje
kandi mukono ghwanje ghukubahwelekeeleli̱ya.’
Okahuuha lwoha lwawe kandi nanja yaabamela,
baadhikila hansi nga kyoma mu maasi ghaamaani̱.
“Ai̱
ni ani̱ ali ngaawe mu baaluhanga?
Ni ani̱ ali ngaawe mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱le,
oghu bantu boobahi̱ye kandi oghu akukolagha byakuswekani̱ya?
Okananula mukono ghwawe ghwabuliyo,
nsi yaamela ngi̱ghu̱ syatu.
“Kukunda kwawe kwamaani̱ kukaleka waahikila
bantu baawe aba waacunguuye
kandi haabwa maani̱ ghaawe
waabatwala mu kyalo kyawe ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Bantu bʼomu mahanga ghanji baku̱u̱ghu̱wa eki kandi bakutukumila.
Bantu abaakaaye mu Fi̱li̱si̱ti̱ya bakwobahila kimui.
Beebembeli̱ bʼomu Edomu batuntuuye.
Basaasa baamaani̱ baa Mowaabu niibuwo baatukumila
kandi bantu boona abaakaaye Kanaani̱ mitima ebakangami̱ye munda.
Ai̱
, bantu aba boona boobahi̱ye kandi niibuwo baatukumila,
haabwa mukono ghwawe ghwamaani̱.
Ai̱
, bantu aba baku̱holi̱ya nga ebaale
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bantu baawe aba waacunguuye basaaye.
Ai̱
, okubatwala kandi obate haa mwena ghwawe,
mu ki̱i̱kalo eki waakomi̱yemu kuukalamu.
Ai̱ Mukama, ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eki waakoli̱ye na mikono yaawe.
akulema bilo nʼebilo.”
Obu nkai̱na sya Falaaho, bigaali̱ biye na basaasa be abaaghendagha basi̱ni̱i̱ni̱yʼo baakoti̱ye mu nanja,
aaku̱u̱ki̱ya maasi agha kandi ghaabamela. Bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakaba mbaamali̱ye kubhasuka nanja eghi haagati mbalubhatangila haa etaka lyomi̱ye.
Niibuwo Mi̱li̱yamu mulangi̱ wabukali̱, mwani̱na Alooni̱, aakwete kaaciki-ciki mu ngalo yee. Bakali̱ banji boona baaghenda bamulabhi̱ye mbateela buuciki-ciki bwabo kandi mbabi̱na.
Mi̱li̱yamu aabalimbila naaghila ati,
“Mulimbile
, nanga aasi̱ngu̱u̱ye kwonini,
aaku̱bi̱ye mu nanja nkai̱na nʼoghu aghi̱ni̱i̱ni̱yʼo.”
Niibuwo Musa aahikiiye Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha haa Nanja Mutuku, baaghenda mu elungu lya Suula. Baalubhatanga bilo bisatu mu elungu eli kandi bataabona maasi.
Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye e Maala, tabaagubha kunuwa maasi ghaayo, nanga ghakaba ghasaaliiye, nahabweki ki̱i̱kalo eki baakiluka li̱i̱na Maala.
Bantu aba baatongana na Musa bati, “Buuye tukunuwa biki?”
Musa ataaghila
kandi
aamwoleka ki̱twi̱ke kya lukui. Musa aakikuba mu maasi agha, du̱mbi̱ ghaaleka kusaalila.
Mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
aateelʼo Banai̱saaleeli̱ kilaghilo na ntu̱wamu naabbala kubalengesa.
Aabaghila ati, “Kaakuba weekamba ku̱hu̱ti̱ya si̱ye
Luhanga waawe, okola ebi̱ndheedhi̱ye, okwata bilaghilo byanje na ntu̱wamu syanje, tankukuha kifubilo kya ndwala esi naaleki̱ye Banami̱si̱li̱ baalwala, nanga ni̱i̱si̱ye
oghu aku̱ku̱ki̱li̱yagha.”
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha Maala kandi baaki̱dha Eli̱mu̱, hambali baasangi̱ye nsulo eku̱mi̱ nʼebili na bi̱ti̱na nsanju̱ bya mba, baaghoona mu ki̱i̱kalo eki haakpengbu̱ ya maasi.

Ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyalu̱gha Eli̱mu̱ kandi kyaki̱dha mu elungu lya Si̱i̱ni̱, haagati ya Eli̱mu̱ na Si̱naai̱, haa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ na bitaano kya kweli̱ kwakabili haanu̱ma ya ku̱lu̱gha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Obu baabaagha banali mu elungu eli, ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyona kyatongana na Musa na Alooni̱.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baabaghila bati, “Twekumbulagha hakili nguli
aatwitiiye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, nanga eghi twasitamagha tuliya nyama sikani̱ye na byokuliya kandi tuukuta. Bhaatu mwaleeti̱ye mu elungu lini ki̱bbu̱la kini kyona ku̱twi̱ti̱ya njala.”

aaghila Musa ati, “Nkuleka byokuliya bya mbaghani̱ja bilaghalike hansi ku̱lu̱gha mu mwanya nga mbu̱la. Bantu aba bali na kutuwa kandi kukumaani̱ya ebikubamala kilo eki kyonkaha. Eki kikuleka nimanye bakaakuba mbahu̱ti̱ya kilaghilo kyanje kedha bbaa.
Kilo kyamukaagha bu̱li̱ wi̱i̱ki̱, obu balabaagha mbakumaani̱ya byokuliya, bakumaani̱yaghe milundi ebili nga bya bu̱li̱ kilo.”
Musa na Alooni̱ baaghambila Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona bati, “Obwalo lwagholo mukumanya ngoku
aaniiye aabaahi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱
kandi nkyambisi mukubona ngoku
ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, nanga aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku mukwete kutongana naye. Buuye ni̱i̱tu̱we baki enu̱we kutongana naatu?”
Musa aatodha aabaghila ati, “Lwagholo
alabahaagha nyama sya kuliya kandi nkyambisi byokuliya ebi mukuliya kandi muukute, nanga aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku mukwete kutongana naye. Obu mukwete kutongana naatu, majima niibuwo mwatongana na
Niibuwo Musa aaghi̱li̱ye Alooni̱ ati, “Oghambile ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mwise mu maaso ghaa
, nanga aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku mukwete kutongana.’ ”
Alooni̱ naanabu̱gha na ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱, baalola mu elungu kandi baabona ku̱bbeni̱ya kwa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya
mu kicu.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Naaghu̱u̱ye ngoku Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakwete kutongana. Obaghile oti, ‘Bu̱li̱ lwagholo balaliyaagha nyama kandi bu̱li̱ nkyambisi baliyaghe byokuliya kandi baakute. Du̱mbi̱ mukumanya ngu ndi
Luhanga waanu.’ ”
Lwagholo olu nkwali syasa kandi syamalakaka hambali baghooneeye kandi nkyambisi ki̱me kyakwata hambali baghooneeye.
Obu ki̱me kyahooyʼo, baabona mu elungu eli bintu bijelu biinabwana bikwataane nga ki̱me hansi.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabiboone baabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Ebi mbiki?” Nanga bakaba batabimani̱ye.
Musa aabaghila ati, “Ni byokuliya ebi
aabahaaye kuliya.
Kini niikiyo eki
aalaghiiye ati, ‘Bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we akumaani̱ye byokuliya ebi akugubha kuliya kandi kumalʼo. Bu̱li̱ muntu akumaani̱ye jaaga emui ya byokuliya haabwa bu̱li̱ muntu oghu ali mu ka yee.’ ”
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola ngoku baabaghambiiye. Bamui mu bantu aba baakumaani̱ya byokuliya bikani̱ye na banji baakumaani̱ya bikee.

Bhaatu obu baabi̱pi̱i̱mi̱ye haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo, abaakumaani̱i̱ye bikani̱ye tabaati̱ghaai̱ye kantu kandi abaakumaani̱i̱ye bikee tabaabu̱lu̱u̱we kantu. Bu̱li̱ muntu aakumaani̱ya byokuliya ebi akugubha kuliya kandi kumalʼo.
Musa aabaghila ati, “Hatabʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akubiika haa byokuliya ebi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi.”
Bhaatu bamui mu bantu aba baabhenga ku̱u̱ghu̱wa Musa, baabiika haa byokuliya ebi kandi nkyambisi baasanga biisuuyemu bi̱su̱ni̱ kandi bi̱nu̱nki̱ye. Musa aasaaliluwa na bantu aba.
Bu̱li̱ nkyambisi muntu aakumaani̱yagha byokuliya ebi akwetaaghisibuwa kandi musana ghwakasaakalagha, ebi̱ti̱ghaaye hansi binuunuuta.

Haa kilo kyamukaagha, bantu baakumaani̱yagha byokuliya bya milundi ebili, bu̱li̱ muntu aakumaani̱yagha jaaga ebili sya byokuliya ebikumala bilo bibili. Beebembeli̱ baa bantu baaghenda kandi baaghambila Musa.
Aabaghila ati, “Eki niikiyo
aalaghiiye ati, ‘Munkiya ni kilo kya kuhuumula, kilo kya Sabhato ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kya
. Nahabweki mukumaani̱ye byokuliya byona ebi mukubbala kwomeleli̱ya kedha kuteeka kuliya, ebi̱ku̱ti̱ghalʼo mubibiike kubiliya munkiya.’ ”
Bantu aba baabiika haa byokuliya ebi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi, ngoku Musa aabalaghiiye, tabyaghaghi̱ye kedha kubaamu bi̱su̱ni̱.
Musa aaghila bantu aba ati, “Obwalo muliye byokuliya ebi nanga ni kilo kya Sabhato kya kulami̱ya
. Obwalo tamukubona hansi byokuliya bbaa.
Bilo mukaagha bu̱li̱ wi̱i̱ki̱ mulakumaani̱yagha byokuliya, bhaatu haa kilo kyamusanju̱, kilo kya Sabhato, tabilabaaghʼo bbaa.”
Haa kilo kyamusanju̱, bamui mu bantu aba baaghenda kukumaani̱ya byokuliya, bhaatu bataasangayo kantu.
aaghila Musa ati, “Mu̱ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kubhenga kukwata bilaghilo byanje na ndaghikiililo syanje?
Mulole, si̱ye
, ni̱i̱si̱ye naabahaaye kilo kya Sabhato, nanga haa kilo kyamukaagha nkubahaagha byokuliya bya bilo bibili, bu̱li̱ muntu aatalu̱ghagha mu ka yee haa kilo kyamusanju̱.”
Nahabweki bantu aba baahuumulaghe haa kilo kyamusanju̱.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaluka byokuliya ebi li̱i̱na maanu. Ekaba eli nga kasigho kati̱i̱ kanjelu kandi enuliliiye nga capati basi̱i̱ghi̱yʼo njoki.
Musa aaghila ati, “
aalaghiiye ati, ‘Mubiike ki̱lo ebili sya maanu, mughibiikile baasukulu baanu, niikuwo babone byokuliya ebi naahaaye enu̱we kuliya mu elungu, obu naayagha enu̱we mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.’ ”
Musa aaghila Alooni̱ ati, “Okwate jaaga kandi otemu kilo ebili sya maanu, oghite mu maaso ghaa
, ebiikuwe mu mijo yaanu yoona.”
Alooni̱ aata jaaga eghi mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, kuukalʼo, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaliya maanu haabwa myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya baki̱dhi̱ye haa mutaano ghwa nsi ya Kanaani̱ hambali baaghendagha kuukala.
(Bwile obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakoleesi̱yagha jaaga ku̱pi̱i̱ma byokuliya byabo. Jaaga emui ekaba yengaane na ki̱lo ebili kandi jaaga eku̱mi̱ syasu̱li̱yagha dhebe emui.)
Ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyona kyalu̱gha mu elungu lya Si̱i̱ni̱, baghenda mbanalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo kughenda mu kinji ngoku
aabalaghiiye kandi baaghoona e Lefi̱di̱mu̱, bhaatu ki̱i̱kalo eki kikaba kitalimu maasi ghaa bantu kunuwa.
Bantu aba baatandika kutongana na Musa bati, “Otuhe maasi ghaa kunuwa.”
Musa aabaghila ati, “Mukwete kutongana nanje nangaaki? Mukwete kulengesa
bwaki?”
Bhaatu bantu aba eliyo lyabakwata kwonini kandi baatongana na Musa bati, “Waatu̱u̱hi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, na baana baatu na bisolo byatu ku̱twi̱ti̱ya eliyo nangaaki?”
Musa aataaghila
naaghila ati, “Bantu bani mbakolele ki? Bakubbala kumpuula mabaale.”
aaghila Musa ati, “Oghende mu maaso ghaa bantu aba oli na bamui mu beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Oghende okwete mu ngalo yaawe mwi̱gho oghu waahuuye haa maasi ghaa Nailo.
Nkwemilila mu maaso ghaawe, haa kikuka kya mwena Holebbu. Ohuule kikuka eki, maasi ghaku̱lu̱ghamu ghaa bantu aba kunuwa.” Musa aahuula kikuka eki mu maaso ghaa beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba.
Musa aaluka ki̱i̱kalo eki li̱i̱na Masa
kandi Meli̱ba,
nanga Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakatongana na Musa kandi baalengesa
mbaghila bati, “
ali naatu kedha bbaa?”
Bameleeki̱ baasa kandi baalwana na Banai̱saaleeli̱ e Lefi̱di̱mu̱.
Musa aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Otukomelemu basaasa kandi mughende mulwane na Bameleeki̱ munkiya. Si̱ye nkwemilila haagu̱u̱li̱ ya keena nkwete mwi̱gho ghwa Luhanga mu ngalo yanje.”
Yosuwa aakola ngoku Musa aamughambiiye kandi aalwana na Bameleeki̱. Musa, Alooni̱ na Hula baani̱i̱na haagu̱u̱li̱ ya keena.
Musa aakaamu̱ki̱yagha mukono ghuwe Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasi̱ngu̱lagha kandi naaghu̱su̱ndu̱ki̱ya, Bameleeki̱ baasi̱ngu̱lagha.

Bhaatu mikono ya Musa yaaluwakaka, nahabweki baamuleetela ebaale kandi aalisitamʼo. Alooni̱ na Hula, omui amwemilila haa luhande lumui na onji haa luhande lunji, baakala baamu̱ki̱i̱ye mikono yee ku̱hi̱ki̱ya musana ghu̱koti̱ye.
Nahabweki Yosuwa aahwelekeeleli̱ya mahe ghaa Bameleeki̱ na kihiyo.
aaghila Musa ati, “Ohandiike ebyabaayʼo bini mu kitabo, niikuwo bantu baakalaghe mbabiisuka kandi obisomele Yosuwa, nanga nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya Bameleeki̱ boona munsi.”
Musa aakwela kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi aakiluka li̱i̱na ati, “
niiye akumpaagha bu̱si̱ngu̱li̱.”
Musa aaghila ati, “Naalahila mu li̱i̱na lya
akweyongela kulwana na Bameleeki̱ bilo nʼebilo.”
Yetelo, mu̱hongi̱ wʼomu Mi̱di̱yaani̱, nkyame sya Musa, aaghu̱wa byona ebi Luhanga aakoleeye Musa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi ngoku
aahi̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Bwile obu Yetelo, nkyame sya Musa, aatwala Jipola mukali̱ wa Musa, nanga Musa akaba amu̱ti̱ghi̱ye ewaa nkyame siye oghu,
na batabani̱ be babili. Li̱i̱na lya omui baamughilaghamu Geli̱soomu̱,
nanga Musa akaghila ati, “Naabaagha munamahanga mu nsi etali yaatu.”
Li̱i̱na lya onji baamughilaghamu Eli̱yeeja,
nanga Musa akaghila ati, “Luhanga wa tita niiye akankoonela kandi anjuna kihiyo kya Falaaho.”
Yetelo, nkyame siye, aasa na mukali̱ wa Musa na batabani̱ baa Musa babili, aamusanga mu elungu, hambali aabaagha aghooneeye haai na mwena ghwa Luhanga.
Yetelo aatuma muntu kughila Musa ati, “Si̱ye, nkyame syawe Yetelo, niibuwo naasa ewaawe, na mukali̱ waawe na batabani̱ baawe babili.”
Musa aatuwa kusangaana nkyame siye, aagomba kandi aaghuwa nkyame siye mu ki̱ku̱bha. Baalamukangani̱ya, du̱mbi̱ baataaha mu weema ya Musa.
Musa aaghambila nkyame siye byona ebi
aakoli̱yʼo Falaaho na Banami̱si̱li̱ haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Aamughambila bijibu byona ebyababaayʼo mu kihanda kandi ngoku
aabaju̱ni̱ye.
Yetelo aadheedhuwa haabwa bintu bisemeeye byona ebi
aakoleeye Banai̱saaleeli̱, kubajuna ku̱lu̱gha mu mukono ghwa Banami̱si̱li̱.
Yetelo aaghila ati, “
asi̱i̱mu̱we, oghu aabaju̱ni̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu mukono ghwa Banami̱si̱li̱ na mukono ghwa Falaaho kandi oghu aacunguuye bantu be ku̱lu̱gha mu mukono ghwa Banami̱si̱li̱.
Endindi naamani̱ye ngoku
asaai̱ye baaluhanga banji boona, nanga aaju̱ni̱ye bantu be ku̱lu̱gha mu banamyempanko baa Banami̱si̱li̱ abaababona-boni̱yagha.”
Yetelo nkyame sya Musa, aahongela Luhanga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye na bihonguwa binji. Alooni̱ na beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasa kuliya hamui na nkyame sya Musa mu maaso ghaa Luhanga.
Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo Musa aasitama ku̱twi̱la bantu misango kandi bantu baamilila bamweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye ku̱lu̱gha nkyambisi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo.

Obu nkyame sya Musa aaboone byona ebi Musa akwete kukolela bantu aba, aamughila ati, “Nkiki okwete kukolela bantu aba? Ositami̱ye wenkaha kandi bantu aba boona baamiliiye bakweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye ku̱lu̱gha nkyambisi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo nangaaki?”
Musa aaghila nkyame siye ati, “Bantu aba bakwisagha ewanje kumanya ebi Luhanga akubbala ati bakole.
Bakaakubaagha bali na mpaka syabo, bakwisagha ewanje kubatwi̱lamu kandi kubaghambila ntu̱wamu na bilaghilo bya Luhanga.”
Nkyame sya Musa aamughila ati, “Eki okwete kukola takisemeeye.
Uwe na bantu abali naawe mukweluwakaki̱ya kandi mulimo oghu okwete kukola ghukuhingulaane, tookugubha kughukola wenkaha.
Ontegheeleli̱ye endindi kandi ooghu̱we eki kukuhanuulila, Luhanga akuba naawe. Bantu aba balakabaagha bali na nsonga syabo, uwe osighambilaghe Luhanga.
Obeegheesi̱yaghe bilaghilo biye na ebi aalaghikiliiye. Oboolekaghe ngoku bali na kwetwalikani̱ya kandi ebi bali na kukola.

Okwetaaghisibuwa dhee mu bantu aba boona kukomamu basaasa abali na magheji, abahu̱ti̱i̱ye Luhanga, beesighibuwa kandi aboohi̱ye ngu̱ji̱. Bamui mu bantu aba babe beebembeli̱ baa bantu lu̱ku̱mi̱-lu̱ku̱mi̱, banji baa bantu ki̱ku̱mi̱-ki̱ku̱mi̱, banji baa bantu maku̱mi̱ ataano-ataano na banji baa bantu eku̱mi̱-eku̱mi̱.

Oleke basaasa aba batwi̱laghe bantu misango bwile bwona. Misango yamaani̱ haaliiyo baakuleetelagha, bhaatu misango nkee baghimalaghe bonkaha. Bantu aba bakuleka mulimo oghu ghukudhootele nanga bakuba mbakukoonela kughukola.
Nuwaakoli̱ye eki, ngoku Luhanga akulaghiiye, okugubha kukola mulimo oghu kandi bantu aba boona balakuukagha mu maka ghaabo na bu̱si̱nge.”
Musa aaghu̱wa nkyame siye kandi aakola byona ebi aamughambiiye.

Musa aakoma mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ basaasa abali na magheji, aabafoola beebembeli̱ baa bantu lu̱ku̱mi̱-lu̱ku̱mi̱, banji baa bantu ki̱ku̱mi̱-ki̱ku̱mi̱, banji baa bantu maku̱mi̱ ataano-ataano na banji baa bantu eku̱mi̱-eku̱mi̱.
Basaasa aba baatandika ku̱twi̱la bantu misango bwile bwona. Misango eghi ebasaaghi̱ye baaghileetelagha Musa, bhaatu misango nkee baaghi̱tu̱waghamu boonini.
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aalagha nkyame siye kandi nkyame siye oghu aakuuka ewe e ka.
Kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya kweli̱ kwakasatu haanu̱ma ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, baaki̱dha mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱ghi̱ye Lefi̱di̱mu̱, baaghenda mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱ kandi baaghoona mu nti̱na ya mwena ghwa Si̱naai̱ oghu.
Musa aani̱i̱na haa mwena oghu ku̱bu̱gha na Luhanga.
aabu̱gha na Musa ku̱lu̱gha mu mwena oghu ati, “Oghende kandi oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱, baasukulu baa Yakobbo oti,
‘Mweboneeye enu̱we boonini ebi naakoli̱yʼo Banami̱si̱li̱ kandi ngoku naaheeki̱ye enu̱we ngoku kibebe kikuheekagha bwana bwakiyo mu mapapa kandi naabaleeta ewanje.
Nahabweki kaakuba mu̱mpu̱ti̱ya kandi mukwata ndaghaano yanje, mukuba bantu banje baa mbaghani̱ja mu bantu boona bʼomu nsi, nanga nsi yoona ni yanje.
Enu̱we mukuba bukama bwanje bwa bahongi̱ kandi ehanga li̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.’ Bighambo ebi haaliibiyo waaghenda kughambila Banai̱saaleeli̱.”
Nahabweki Musa aakota ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena, aabilikila beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi aabaghambila bighambo byona ebi
aamulaghiiye ku̱bu̱gha.
Bantu boona baakuukamu bati, “Tukukola byona ebi
aabu̱ghi̱ye.” Du̱mbi̱ Musa aaghenda kandi aaghambila
ebi bantu aba baabu̱ghi̱ye.
aaghila Musa ati, “Olole, nkwisa hambali oli mu kicu kikwataane, niikuwo bantu bagubhe ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ngoku nkwete ku̱bu̱gha naawe kandi baku̱hi̱ki̱li̱je bilo nʼebilo.” Du̱mbi̱ Musa aaghambila
ebi bantu aba baabu̱ghi̱ye.
aaghila Musa ati, “Oghende hambali bantu aba bali, obaghambile beeyeli̱ye obwalo na munkiya kandi banaabi̱ye ngoye syabo,
kweteekani̱li̱ja kilo kyakasatu. Haa kilo kyakasatu eki
akwisa haa mwena Si̱naai̱ bantu boona banaloli̱ye.

Ote mutaano kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya mwena oghu hambali bantu aba bakuhelela kwemilila kandi obaghile oti, ‘Mweghendeseleje kutani̱i̱na haa mwena oghu kedha ku̱ku̱ma haa nti̱na yaghuwo. Muntu weena oghu aku̱ku̱ma haa mwena oghu ali na kwitibuwa.

Muntu oghu ali na kuhuuluwa mabaale kedha kumulasa bimala kandi muntu nʼomui atamu̱ku̱mʼo. Kaakuba muntu aku̱ma haa mwena oghu, ali na kwitibuwa kandi kaakuba kisolo ki̱ku̱mʼo, kili na kwitibuwa.’ Nahabweki bantu bali na kulinda ku̱hi̱ki̱ya baaghu̱u̱ye elaka lya ki̱i̱di̱yo. Kaakuba baaghu̱wa elaka eli, du̱mbi̱ beebinge haai na mwena oghu.”
Niibuwo Musa aakoti̱ye ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghu, aaghenda hambali bantu aba bali, aabaghambila kweyeli̱ya kandi baanaabi̱ya ngoye syabo.
Musa aaghila bantu aba ati, “Mweteekani̱li̱je kilo kyakasatu kandi munalindiliiye kilo eki, atabʼo musaasa nʼomui oghu akulangaala na mukali̱.”

Kilo kyakasatu nkyambisi, nkubha yeetanuka kandi yaabbyoka, kicu kikwataane kyaboneka haa mwena kandi bantu baaghu̱wa elaka lyamaani̱ lya ki̱i̱di̱yo, bantu boona abaabaagha hambali baghooneeye baatandika kutukumila.
Musa aaya bantu aba hambali baghooneeye kughenda kusanga-sangaana na Luhanga, baaghenda kandi beemilila mu nti̱na ya mwena oghu.
Mwi̱ka ghwaswi̱ki̱la mwena ghwa Si̱naai̱, nanga
akaasʼo ali mu mulilo. Mwi̱ka ghwatandika kucuuka haa mwena oghu nga ghwa mulilo ghwamaani̱. Mwena oghu ghwona ghwatandika kudhinga-dhingila kimui.
Elaka lya ki̱i̱di̱yo eki lyakeeyongelagha kuba lyamaani̱, Musa abu̱gha kandi Luhanga aamukuukamu nʼelaka nga lya nkubha.
aasu̱ndu̱ka haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena ghwa Si̱naai̱ kandi aabilikila Musa ku̱ni̱i̱na haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena oghu kandi Musa aani̱i̱nayo.
aaghila Musa ati, “Okote kandi oteelelele bantu aba kutaghuluka mutaano oghu kulengʼo kubona si̱ye
, nanga bakani̱ye mu ebo baku̱ku̱wa.
Bahongi̱ bonkaha niibo bakugubha kwisa haai na
, bhaatu badu̱bhe beeyeli̱ye, niikuwo ntabafubila.”
Musa aaghila
ati, “Bantu aba tabakwisa haa mwena Si̱naai̱ ghuni bbaa, nanga okatuteelelela oti, ‘Mute mutaano kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya mwena oghu kandi mughufoole ghu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati, “Okote kandi okuuke hani na Alooni̱. Bhaatu otasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya bahongi̱ na bantu aba kughuluka mutaano oghu kandi kwisa hambali
ali, nanga abafubila.”
Musa aakota hambali bantu aba bali kandi aabaghambila ebi
aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Luhanga aabu̱gha bighambo bini byona.
Aaghila ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waawe, oghu akakuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ hambali waabaagha mu̱syana.
“Otaliba na baaluhanga banji kuuyʼo si̱ye.
“Otalyekolela kisasani̱ kya mulingo ghwona, eki̱su̱si̱ye kintu kyona ekili mu mwanya, hansi, kedha mu maasi.
Otali̱bi̱teeleli̱ya kedha kubilami̱ya, nanga si̱ye
Luhanga waawe, ndi Luhanga wʼetima. Nkufubilagha baana haabwa bibhi bya beesebo ku̱hi̱ka haa buusukulu bwakasatu na bwakanaa bwa mujo ghwa bantu abanjoi̱ye.
Bhaatu nkwolekagha kukunda kwamaani̱ haa nku̱mi̱ na nku̱mi̱ sya baku̱ndi̱ye si̱ye kandi bahu̱ti̱ya bilaghilo byanje.
“Otalilahila busa li̱i̱na lya
Luhanga waawe, nanga
akufubila weena oghu aku̱koleesi̱ya kubhi li̱i̱na liye.
“Oosukaghe kilo kya Sabhato kandi okilinde kili ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Oli na bilo mukaagha bya kukola milimo yaawe yoona,
bhaatu kilo kyamusanju̱ ni kilo kya Sabhato kya
Luhanga waawe. Otalikola mulimo ghwona haa kilo eki, uwe kedha mutabani̱ waawe kedha muhala waawe, mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱, bisolo byawe, kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye naawe.
Mu bilo mukaagha
akahanga eghulu na nsi, nanja na byona ebilimu, haa kilo kyamusanju̱ aahuumula. Niikiyo kyaleki̱ye Mukama aaha mu̱gi̱sa kilo kya Sabhato eki kandi aakifoola ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“Ohu̱ti̱yaghe so waawe na njoko waawe, niikuwo omale bwile bukani̱ye mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha.
“Otaliita.
“Otali̱syana.
“Otaliibha.
“Otalihabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya muliilanuwa waawe.

“Otalyeghomba numba ya muliilanuwa waawe. Otalyeghomba mukali̱ wa muliilanuwa waawe, kedha mu̱heeleli̱ya wee wabukali̱ kedha wabusaasa, nte yee kedha ndogooi̱ yee, kedha kintu kyona kya muliilanuwa waawe.”

Obu bantu baaboone ngoku nkubha ekwete kwetanuka kandi kubbyoka, mbaaghu̱wa elaka lya ki̱i̱di̱yo kandi mbaabona ngoku mwi̱ka ghukwete kucuuka haa mwena, boobaha kandi baatandika kutukumila. Beemilila hambali haseli̱ye
kandi baaghila Musa bati, “Uwe obu̱ghe naatu, tu̱ku̱tegheeleli̱ya. Bhaatu otaleka Luhanga naabu̱gha naatu, tu̱ku̱ku̱wa.”
Musa aaghila bantu aba ati, “Muleka kwobaha, nanga Luhanga aasi̱ye kubalengesa, niikuwo muukale mumwobahi̱ye kandi mutagubha ku̱si̱i̱sa.”
Bantu aba baakala beemiliiye hambali haseli̱ye, Musa naaneebinga kicu kikwataane hambali Luhanga aabaagha.
aaghila Musa ati, “Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mwaboone enu̱we boonini ngoku naabu̱ghi̱ye naanu ku̱lu̱gha mu eghulu.
Mutalyekolela bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga baakulami̱ya baa siliva kedha feeja mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kulami̱ya si̱ye.

“ ‘Munkwelele kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya etaka kandi mukihongelaghʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye byanu na bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge bya ntaama na nte syanu. Mu ki̱i̱kalo kyona eki nkukomamu enu̱we kundami̱li̱yamu, ndabaasaghamu kandi mbahe mu̱gi̱sa.

Kaakuba obbala kunkwelela kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya mabaale, otakoleesi̱ya kyoma kyona kwatakaki̱ya mabaale agha. Kaakuba okola eki, kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki kikuba kitahi̱ki̱ye enu̱we ku̱ki̱koleesi̱ya kundami̱ya.
Mutani̱i̱nagha haa madaala ku̱hi̱ka haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kyanje, niikuwo muntu atabona muhina ghwanu.’ ”
“Bini niibiyo bilaghilo oli na kuteelʼo Banai̱saaleeli̱.
“Kaakuba oghula Muhebbulaayo kuba mu̱syana waawe, aku̱heeleli̱yaghe haabwa myaka mukaagha. Bhaatu mwaka ghwamusanju̱ omuleke aghende atakusasuuye kantu koona.
Kaakuba aasa enkaha, aghende enkaha. Kaakuba aasa asweye, aghende na mukali̱ wee.
Kaakuba mukama wee amuha mukali̱ kandi mu̱syana oghu amu̱byalʼo baana baabusaasa kedha baabukali̱, mukali̱ oghu na baana aba babe baa mukama wee, bhaatu musaasa oghu ali na kughenda enkaha.
“Bhaatu kaakuba mu̱syana oghu abu̱gha bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ati, ‘Nku̱ndi̱ye mukama wanje, mukali̱ wanje na baana banje, tambali̱ye kuleka kuba mu̱syana wee,’

du̱mbi̱ mukama wee amutwale hambali bakulami̱li̱yagha Luhanga. Amwemi̱li̱li̱ye haai na lwighi kedha bi̱ji̱ngi̱li̱jo bya lwighi lwa numba eghi, amutobhole kutui na ngilaghilo kandi afooke mu̱syana wee bilo nʼebilo.
“Kaakuba musaasa aghu̱li̱ya muhala wee nga mu̱syana, mwana wabukali̱ oghu taali na bughabe ku̱lu̱gha ewaa mukama wee nga mu̱syana wabusaasa.

Kaakuba mwana wabukali̱ oghu atakola ebi̱dheedhi̱ye mukama wee, oghu aabbalagha kumuswela, aleke ese wa mwana wabukali̱ oghu amucungule. Taali na bughabe ku̱mu̱ghu̱li̱ya banamahanga, nanga akuba amu̱koli̱ye kubhi.
Bhaatu kaakuba mukama wa mu̱syana oghu amuha mutabani̱ wee kumuswela, ali na kumutwalikani̱ya nga muhala wee.
Kaakuba musaasa oghu aswela mukali̱ onji, atakeehi̱ya haa byokuliya na ngoye ebi aahaagha mukali̱ wee wʼoku̱du̱bha kandi ataleka kulangaala naye.
Kaakuba musaasa oghu atamukolela bintu bisatu ebi, mu̱syana wabukali̱ oghu ali na bughabe kughenda kandi taakwetaaghisibuwa kusasula kantu.
“Weena oghu akuhuula muntu kandi amwita, naye aatibuwe.
Kaakuba muntu oghu aata muunakiye atakighendeleeye, bhaatu buli butanduwa, nkukoma ki̱i̱kalo hambali muntu oghu alaalukilagha kujuna bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe.
Bhaatu kaakuba muntu alu̱mba muunakiye kandi amwita akighendeleeye, nankabha aalukila haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kyanje, omuuyʼo kandi omwite.
“Weena oghu akuhuula ese wee kedha ni̱na wee, naye ali na kwitibuwa.
“Weena oghu akwibha muntu kughenda ku̱mu̱ghu̱li̱ya kedha kumufoola mu̱syana, oghu aakoli̱ye kintu eki ali na kwitibuwa.
“Weena oghu akukiina ese wee kedha ni̱na wee ali na kwitibuwa.
“Kaakuba bantu baba mbatongana, omui ahuula muunakiye ebaale kedha kikonde, oghu baahuuye ataku̱wa bhaatu aakala alangaaye haa bulili,

oghu baahuuye naatandi̱ki̱ye kuumuka kandi kutuwa mu numba akwete nkoni̱, oghu aamuhuuye ataba na musango, bhaatu amusasule haabwa bwile obu aamali̱ye haa bulili kandi amuloleelele ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aki̱li̱ye.
“Kaakuba muntu ahuula na mwi̱gho mu̱syana wee wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱ kandi mu̱syana oghu amu̱kwi̱la mu ngalo, muntu oghu ali na kufubiluwa.
Bhaatu kaakuba mu̱syana oghu amala kilo kimui kedha bibili du̱mbi̱ aku̱wa, mukama wee atafubiluwa, nanga aafeeleuwe oghu aaghu̱li̱ye na sente siye.

“Kaakuba basaasa baba mbalwana, omui ahuula mukali̱ aku̱li̱i̱ye kandi etundu li̱lu̱ghamu, bhaatu mukali̱ oghu ataba kubhi, oghu aamuhuuye ali na kusasula fai̱ni̱ yoona eghi bali̱i̱ wa mukali̱ oghu aku̱mu̱twi̱la, bhaatu ngoku bacu̱ baatu̱u̱yemu.
Bhaatu mukali̱ oghu kaakuba ahutaala kubhi kandi aku̱wa, musaasa oghu naye aatibuwe,
oghu akuuyamu muunakiye li̱i̱so, omuuyemu li̱i̱so, oghu akumukobha li̱i̱no, omukobhe li̱i̱no, oghu akumujombʼo mukono, omujombʼo mukono, oghu akumujombʼo kighele, omujombʼo kighele,
oghu aku̱mwoki̱ya, omwoki̱ye, oghu akumuhutaali̱ya, omuhutaali̱ye, oghu akumuhuula kubhi, omuhuule kubhi.
“Kaakuba muntu ahuula li̱i̱so mu̱syana wee wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱ kandi litobhoka, ali na kuha mu̱syana oghu bughabe kughenda, nanga eghi niiyo nsasu̱li̱ ya li̱i̱so eli.
Kaakuba muntu ahuula mu̱syana wee wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱ kandi amukobha li̱i̱no, ali na kuha mu̱syana oghu bughabe kughenda, nanga eghi niiyo nsasu̱li̱ ya li̱i̱no eli.
“Kaakuba nte ehuumila na mahembe ghaayo musaasa kedha mukali̱ kandi emwita, nte eghi muli na kughihuula mabaale eku̱we kandi nyama syayʼo mutasiliya kandi mutafubilagha mukama wayo.

Bhaatu nte niyaabaaye neekuhuumilagha bantu, baaghambila mukama wayo, bhaatu abhenga kughiboha, kaakuba ehuumila musaasa kedha mukali̱ kandi emwita, nte eghi baghihuule mabaale eku̱we kandi mukama wayo aatibuwe.
Bhaatu kaakuba nganda sya muntu oghu nte eghi yaati̱ye basi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya mukama wayo kusasula fai̱ni̱ kujuna bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe, ali na kusasula syona esi baamughambiiye.
Kaakuba nte eghi ehuumila mutabani̱ kedha muhala wa muntu kandi emwita, mukama wayo afubiluwe ngoku kilaghilo kini kikulaghila.

Kaakuba nte ehuumila mu̱syana wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱ kandi emwita, mukama wa nte eghi ali na kusasula mukama wa mu̱syana oghu bi̱twi̱ke maku̱mi̱ asatu bya siliva kandi nte eghi baghihuule mabaale eku̱we.
“Muntu naanaahi̱ye haa ki̱i̱na eki baswi̱ki̱yʼo kedha alima ki̱i̱na bhaatu ataki̱swi̱ki̱la, nte kedha ndogooi̱ yeegengamu,
mukama wa ki̱i̱na eki ali na kusasula kisolo eki. Ali na kuha mukama wakiyo sente kandi mukama wa ki̱i̱na eki atwalaghe mu̱ku̱ ghwa kisolo ekyaku̱u̱ye.

“Kaakuba nte ya muntu ehuumila nte ya muntu onji kandi eghiita, nte eghi bantu aba bombi baghi̱ghu̱li̱ye enaakaaye kandi sente esi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu bu̱li̱ omui atwale kimui kyakabili kyasiyʼo na eghi yaaku̱u̱ye bu̱li̱ omui atwale kimui kyakabili kya nyama esi.
Bhaatu nte eghi mbaabaaye baghimani̱ye ngoku ekuhuumilagha kandi mukama wayo abhenga kughiboha, nte eghi yaaku̱u̱ye asasulemu nte enji eghi enaakaaye kandi atwale eghi yaaku̱u̱ye.”
Kaakuba muntu aabha nte kedha ntaama, aghiita kedha aghi̱ghu̱li̱ya, nte eghi asasulemu nte etaano kandi ntaama eghi asasulemu ntaama enaa.
Kaakuba baakwata musuma naahenda numba mukilo kandi bamuhuula akwi̱lʼo, muntu oghu aamwi̱ti̱ye taali na musango ghwa bu̱ji̱ndi̱,
bhaatu bwile mbwabaaye bukeeye, oghu aamwi̱ti̱ye ali na musango ghwa bu̱ji̱ndi̱.
Musuma oghu ali na kusasula bintu ebi aabhi̱ye. Kaakuba aba atali nʼeki akusasula bamu̱ghu̱li̱ye nga mu̱syana kusasula haabwa busuma buwe.
Kaakuba bamusanga na kisolo eki aabhi̱ye kinaakaaye, nankabha eba eli nte, ndogooi̱ kedha ntaama, akisasulemu milundi ebili.

Kaakuba muntu aba naali̱i̱si̱li̱ya bisolo biye mu musili ghuwe kedha mu bilimuwa biye kandi aleka bisolo ebi bighenda mu musili ghwa muntu onji biliya bilimuwa biye, ali na kuuya mu musili ghuwe bilimuwa bisemeeye kwonini abisasule muntu oghu.
Kaakuba muntu atu̱mi̱ka mulilo mu kisaka kiye, ghutuwamu kandi ghwoki̱ya ngano eghi balu̱ndi̱ye kedha eghi eneemiliiye, oghu aaghu̱tu̱mi̱ki̱ye ali na kusasulamu bilimuwa ebyabhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
Kaakuba muntu aha muliilanuwa wee sente kedha bintu kumubiikila biyo kulungi kandi babiibha mu numba ya muliilanuwa wee oghu, mbaakwete musuma oghu, ali na kubisasulamu milundi ebili.
Bhaatu musuma oghu bataamukwete, oghu aabaagha abi̱i̱ki̱ye bintu ebi bamutwalaghe mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali bakulami̱li̱yagha Luhanga kandi alahilaghe ngoku ataabhi̱ye bintu bya muliilanuwa wee.

Kaakuba bantu babili baba mbatongana haabwa bintu nga nte, ndogooi̱, ntaama, ngoye kedha kintu kyona ekyabu̱li̱ye kandi bu̱li̱ omui aghila ati, “Kintu eki nkyanje.” Bantu aba bombi babatwale hambali bantu bakulami̱li̱yagha Luhanga. Mu̱cu̱ atu̱wemu musango oghu kandi oghu ghu̱ku̱si̱nga, asasule muunakiye milundi ebili.
Kaakuba muntu aha muliilanuwa wee ndogooi̱, nte, ntaama kedha kisolo kinji kyona kumubiikila kiyo, bhaatu ki̱ku̱wa kedha kihutaala kedha muntu akitwala batamuboone,
bombi bali na kughenda hambali bantu bakulami̱li̱yagha kandi oghu aabaagha aki̱bi̱i̱ki̱ye alahile aamu̱ki̱i̱ye mikono mu maaso ghaa
ngoku ataaki̱i̱bhi̱ye. Mukama wa kisolo eki ali na ku̱si̱i̱ma eki muunakiye aalahiiye kandi atakisasulamu.
Bhaatu kaakuba bamwibhʼo kisolo eki, asasule mukama wakiyo.
Kaakuba kinyama kya mu kisaka kiita kisolo eki, muntu oghu aleete ebyati̱ghaayʼo nga buukai̱so kandi atasasulamu kisolo eki kinyama kyati̱ye.
Kaakuba muntu omba kisolo kya muliilanuwa wee kandi kihutaala kedha ki̱mu̱kwi̱lʼo haanu̱ma ya kukiiya ewaa mukama wakiyo, ali na kukisasulamu.
Kaakuba kihutaala kedha ki̱ku̱wa mukama wakiyo haliyo, oghu akyombi̱ye taali na kukisasulamu. Mbaabaaye bakipangi̱si̱i̱ye kukola mulimo, asasule muhendo oghu baabaagha balaghaane.
Kaakuba musaasa asoona-soona mwana wabukali̱ oghu atamani̱ye basaasa kandi oghu batalu̱ghi̱ye alangaala naye, ali na ku̱mu̱lu̱gha kandi amuswele.
Kaakuba ese wa mwana wabukali̱ oghu abhenga kumuha musaasa oghu kumuswela, musaasa oghu ali na kusasula ndu̱ghi̱ yoona eghi bakusasulilagha haabwa mwana wabukali̱ atamani̱ye basaasa.
Mukali̱ weena oghu alafookagha mu̱ku̱mu̱ omwitaghe.
Muntu weena oghu alalangaalagha na kisolo omwitaghe.
Muntu weena oghu alahongelagha luhanga onji, mu ki̱i̱kalo kya
omwitaghe.
Mutalikola kubhi munamahanga kedha kumubona-boni̱ya, nanga naanu mukaba muli banamahanga mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Mutalibona-boni̱ya mu̱kwi̱si̱ya kedha nku̱u̱bbi̱.
Kaakuba mubakola kubhi kandi bandiliilila kubakoonela, majima nku̱u̱ghu̱wa kulila kwabo.
Nkusaaliluwa naanu kandi nkubaata na kihiyo. Bakali̱ baanu bakufooka bakwi̱si̱ya kandi baana baanu bakuba nku̱u̱bbi̱.
Kaakuba oha ebanja lya sente omui mu bantu banje banaku, otaghila oti akuteelʼo maghobo nga bantu abakuhaagha mabanja ghaa sente kubateelʼo maghobo.
Kaakuba otwala kooti̱ ya muliilanuwa waawe nga musimbo haabwa ebanja waamuhaaye, omu̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱ye yo musana ghutakakoti̱ye,
nanga kikugubha kuba kyakweswi̱ka kyonkaha eki ali nakiyo. Buuye akugubha ati̱ya kughwesaghila ateeswi̱ki̱ye? Muntu oghu kaakuba andiliilila kumukoonela, nku̱mu̱u̱ghu̱wa, nanga ndi wa kisa.
Otali̱bu̱ghʼo kubhi Luhanga kedha kukiina mu̱lemi̱ waanu.
“Otakeesekeleluwagha kumpongela haa bilimuwa byawe ebi weeleei̱ye kedha vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi elu̱ghi̱ye mu bi̱ghu̱ma byawe.
“Ompaaghe baana baawe baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso.
Ompaaghe dhee mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa nte na ntaama syawe. Bhaatu kisolo eki kiikalaghe na ni̱naakiyo haabwa bilo musanju̱, haa kilo kyamunaanaa okimpaaghe.
“Muli na kuba bantu banje bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Nahabweki mutaliliya kisolo kyona eki kinyama kya mu kisaka ki̱i̱ti̱ye. Mukikubilaghe mbuwa.”
“Otaliha makulu ghaa bisubha kedha kukoonela muntu mubhi nooha buukai̱so obutali bwamajima.
“Obu̱ghaghe majima mu kooti̱, nankabha bantu banji boona baba abatali beesighibuwa kandi abatabbali̱ye bwengani̱ja.
Otaghilila kisa munaku mamu̱twi̱la musango nanga eye kuba munaku.
“Kaakuba osanga nte kedha ndogooi̱ ya ngi̱ghu̱ yaawe neeghenda kubula, omutwalileyo.
Kaakuba obona ndogooi̱ ya muntu oghu akwohi̱ye yeegengi̱ye hansi na bintu ebi eheeki̱ye, otaghi̱ti̱ghʼo, bhaatu omukoonele ku̱ghi̱i̱mu̱ki̱ya.
“Mu kooti̱ otabhenga ku̱twi̱la munaku musango mu bwengani̱ja.

Otalinyegheelela muntu musango ghwa bisubha kandi otali̱twi̱la musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa muntu oghu atali nʼeki asobeei̱ye kandi ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nanga weena oghu akukola kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki nkumufubila.
“Otali̱si̱i̱ma ngu̱ji̱ nanga ngu̱ji̱ ekuughalagha maaso muntu wa magheji, oghu ali na bwengani̱ja kandi eleka atwi̱la kubhi muntu musango.
“Otalikola kubhi munamahanga. Mumani̱ye eki kuba munamahanga kikumani̱i̱si̱ya, nanga naanu mukaba muli banamahanga mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
“Mu myaka mukaagha ohelaghe bilimuwa mu misili yʼomu nsi yaawe kandi okesaghe ebyeli̱yemu.

Bhaatu mu mwaka ghwamusanju̱ mutakolagha mu misili yaanu. Bilimuwa mbyatooyemu mubilekele banaku kubiliya. Bilimuwa binji mbyati̱ghaayemu mubilekele binyama byʼomu kisaka kubiliya. Mulekaghe dhee misili yaanu ya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ na biti oli̱va.

“Oli na bilo mukaagha bya kukola milimo yaawe, bhaatu kilo kya musanju̱ ohuumulaghe. Nte yaawe na ndogooi̱ yaawe nabiyo dhee bihuumulaghe. Mutabani̱ wa mu̱syana waawe wabukali̱ na munamahanga abaakaaye naawe nabo bahuumulaghe.
“Mweghendeseleje kukwata byona ebi naabaghambiiye. Mutalilami̱ya baaluhanga banji kedha ku̱ku̱mi̱ya mali̱i̱na ghaabo na kanu̱wa kaanu.
“Okolaghe bi̱ghenu̱ bisatu bu̱li̱ mwaka ku̱mpu̱ti̱ya.

“Okolaghe Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Migaati̱ Etalimu Ki̱tu̱mbi̱so ngoku naakulaghiiye. Oliyaghe migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so haabwa bilo musanju̱ mu bwile bwakiyo bwonini mu kweli̱ kwa Abi̱bu̱, nanga mu kweli̱ oku niibuwo waalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱.
“Hatalibʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akwisa ewanje atali na kantu.
“Okolaghe Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kukesa kya mughanulo ghwa ebi waakoli̱ye kandi weeleei̱ye mu misili yaawe.
“Okolaghe dhee Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kumaliilila Kukesa mu bwile olabaagha noomala kukesa, haanu̱ma ya kukumaani̱ya bilimuwa byawe ku̱lu̱gha mu misili yaawe.
“Bu̱li̱ mwaka basaasa boona baasaghe milundi esatu mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga.
“Otampongelagha saghama ya kihonguwa kyanje na migaati̱ elimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, kedha kubiika bisabu̱ bya ki̱ghenu̱ kyanje ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi.
“Oleetaghe mughanulo ghwa bilimuwa byawe mu numba ya
Luhanga waawe.
“Kyana kya mbu̱li̱ otali̱ki̱teeki̱ya mati̱i̱ti̱ ghaa ni̱naakiyo.
“Olole, nkukutumila malai̱ka oghu akukuhikila mu kihanda kandi kukutwala mu ki̱i̱kalo eki naakuteekani̱li̱i̱je.
Omu̱tegheeleli̱ye bhyani, ohu̱ti̱ye elaka liye kandi otamujeemela nanga taakukughanila bikoluwa byawe bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, nanga ni̱i̱si̱ye naamu̱tu̱mi̱ye.
Kaakuba weeghendeseleja ku̱hu̱ti̱ya elaka liye kandi okola byona ebi nku̱bu̱gha, nkuba ngi̱ghu̱ ya ngi̱ghu̱ syawe kandi nkulwana na abakulwana naawe.
Malai̱ka wanje akaakukuhikila kandi naaku̱ki̱dhi̱ya mu nsi ya Bamooli̱, Bahi̱ti̱, Bapeleeji̱, Banakanaani̱, Bahi̱vi̱ na Bayebu̱si̱, nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba.
Otali̱teeleli̱ya baaluhanga baabo kedha kubaheeleli̱ya kedha kukola ebi bantu aba bakukolagha, bhaatu obahwelekeeleli̱ye kandi ohende mpaghi sya baaluhanga baabo.
Olami̱ye
Luhanga waawe, akukuha mu̱gi̱sa otunge byokuliya na maasi kandi akukulinda kutalwala.
Mu nsi yaawe taakubaamu mukali̱ oghu etundu li̱ku̱lu̱ghamu kedha ngumba, nkuleka ookalemu bwile bukani̱ye.
“Nkuleka bantu bʼomu mahanga agha bakwobahe otakaki̱dhi̱yeyo, nkuta butaaghu̱wana mu bantu aba kandi nkuleka ngi̱ghu̱ syawe syona sikuuluke.
Nkutuma minkebe kukuhikila kandi kubhinga Bahi̱vi̱, Banakanaani̱ na Bahi̱ti̱ noonaghenda.
Tankuleka obhingemu bantu aba mu mwaka ghumui, nanga nsi eti̱ghala eli elungu elitalimu kantu kandi binyama byʼomu kisaka bikanamu kusaali̱ya uwe.
Nkuleka obhingemu bantu aba bukee bukee, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya okani̱ye kandi otwete nsi eghi.

“Nkuta mitaano yaawe ku̱lu̱gha haa Nanja Mutuku ku̱hi̱ka haa nanja ya Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱ kandi ku̱lu̱gha mu elungu ku̱hi̱ka haa maasi Efulaati̱. Nkuta mu mukono ghwawe bantu abaakaaye mu nsi eghi kandi okubabhingamu.
Otalikola ndaghaano na bantu aba kedha na baaluhanga baabo.
Bantu aba bataakala mu nsi yaawe nanga bakuleka osi̱i̱se ewanje. Kaakuba olami̱ya baaluhanga baabo, majima kikukufookela ki̱ki̱ya.”
aaghila Musa ati, “Oni̱i̱ne haa mwena hambali ndi, uwe na Alooni̱, Nadaabbu, Abbi̱hu̱ na bengei̱ nsanju̱ baa I̱saaleeli̱, mundami̱ye munali hambali haseli̱ye.
Musa nuuwe wenkaha okwebinga
, bhaatu banji baakale hambali haseli̱ye kandi bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ bataasa haa mwena.”
Musa aaghenda kandi aaghambila bantu bighambo byona ebi
aabu̱ghi̱ye nʼebi aalaghiiye. Bantu aba boona baakuukamu bati, “Byona ebi
aabu̱ghi̱ye tukubikola.”
Musa aahandiika bighambo byona ebi
aabu̱ghi̱ye. Aamuka nkyambisi cu̱i̱ kandi aakwela kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa mu nti̱na ya mwena oghu. Aasimbʼo mpaghi sya mabaale eku̱mi̱ nʼebili kusighikila haa ntu̱la eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya I̱saaleeli̱.
Aatuma bamui mu batabhana baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ kuhonga bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye kandi kuhonga ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte nga bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge ewaa
Musa aata kimui kyakabili kya saghama ya bisolo ebi mu bibindi kandi kimui kyakabili kyayʼo aakimisanga haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.
Aakwata kitabo kya ndaghaano kandi aakisoma bantu boona banategheleei̱ye. Bantu aba baaghila bati, “Tu̱ku̱hu̱ti̱ya
kandi tukukola byona ebi aalaghiiye.”
Musa aakwata saghama eghi eli mu maabbaafu kandi aaghimisangila bantu aba. Aaghila ati, “Eni niiyo saghama eghi eku̱gu̱mi̱ya ndaghaano eghi
aakoli̱ye naanu kusighikila haa bighambo bini byona.”
Niibuwo Musa, Alooni̱, Nadaabbu, Abbi̱hu̱ na bengei̱ nsanju̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghendi̱ye haa mwena
kandi baabona Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱. Hansi ya bighele biye hakaba hasu̱si̱ye nga mabaale ghaa muhendo baali̱ye agha bakughilaghamu su̱fi̱lo kandi hasu̱si̱ye nga mwanya ghubbeneeye kimui.
Bengei̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱
taabakoli̱ye kubhi na mukono ghuwe, bakamubona, baaliya kandi baanuwa.
aaghila Musa ati, “Oni̱i̱ne haa mwena hambali ndi kandi ookalʼo. Nkukuha bihande bya mabaale ebi naahandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo bilaghilo na ndaghikiililo ebi okwegheesi̱ya bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱.”
Musa aaghenda na Yosuwa oghu aamukoonelagha haa mulimo kandi Musa aani̱i̱na haa mwena ghwa Luhanga.
Aaghila bengei̱ aba ati, “Mutulinde hani ku̱hi̱ki̱ya tu̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye, nkubati̱ghi̱la Alooni̱ na Hula, muntu weena oghu ali na butaaghu̱wana na muunakiye, aghendaghe hambali bali.”
Niibuwo Musa aani̱i̱ni̱ye haa mwena Si̱naai̱ kandi kicu kyaswi̱ki̱la mwena oghu.
Kyeleeli̱ kyamaani̱ kya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya
kyaboneka haa mwena Si̱naai̱ kandi kicu kyaswi̱ki̱la mwena oghu haabwa bilo mukaagha. Haa kilo kyamusanju̱
ali haagati ya kicu eki aabilikila Musa.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabona kyeleeli̱ kyeli̱ye dhiyo kya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya
haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena oghu ki̱su̱si̱ye nga mulilo oghu̱ku̱hwelekeeleli̱yagha.
Musa aani̱i̱na haa mwena oghu kandi ataaha mu kicu, aamalayo bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa mukilo na ntangaali̱.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ kundeetela bisembo. Kaakuba muntu aba ali na mutima ghwa kuhaayo kisembo kiye, akuleetele kiyo.
Bantu aba bakuleetele bisembo bini: feeja, siliva, bbu̱looji̱,
mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku, lughoye lusemeeye, byoha bya mbu̱li̱,
mpu siimutuku sya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama, mpu sya mbu̱li̱, mbaau sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo,
mafu̱ta ghaa kuta mu taala, bintu bisasi̱ye bya kuta mu mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha, bintu bisasi̱ye bya kuta mu bubbani̱ busasi̱ye,
mabaale onika, na mabaale ghanji ghaa muhendo, ghaa kuta haa efodi̱ na kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha.
“Banai̱saaleeli̱ bankwelele ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, niikuwo niikale nabo.
Muli na kukwela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi kutaamu bintu byamu kusighikila haa ndaghikiililo eghi nkukwoleka.

“Banai̱saaleeli̱ bankwelele sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ku̱lu̱gha mu mbaau sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo, kujamba kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ esatu na i̱nci̱ mwenda, kugbaatikana fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu kandi kukangama fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu.
Oghi̱swi̱ki̱le na feeja esemeeye mukati na haagu̱u̱li̱ kandi oghyeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ye yoona na mugoma ghwa feeja.
Oghikolele mpete enaa sya feeja kandi osite haa maghulu anaa ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi. Ote mpete ebili haa luhande lumui kandi mpete ebili haa luhande lunji.
Okole mpaghi sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi osi̱swi̱ki̱le na feeja.
Mpaghi esi osikwami̱ye mu mpete esili haa mpande syombi sya sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi, kughiheekelaghʼo.
Mpaghi esi siikalaghe mu mpete sya sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi, otalisiiyamu.
Ote mu sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi bihande bya mabaale ebi nkukuha, hambali bilaghilo bihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we.
“Okole kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi mu feeja esemeeye. Kujamba kwakiyo fu̱u̱ti̱ esatu na i̱nci̱ mwenda kandi kugbaatikana fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu.
Owiise na nondo bakelu̱bbi̱ babili baa feeja kandi obate haa mpande syombi sya kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi.
Kelu̱bbi̱ omui omute haa luhande lumui kandi onji omute haa luhande lunji. Feeja yoonini eghi oku̱koleesi̱ya kukola kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi, oghi̱koleesi̱ye dhee kukola bakelu̱bbi̱ aba.
Bakelu̱bbi̱ aba baale mapapa ghaabo eghulu ya kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi ku̱ki̱swi̱ki̱la. Baakale balolaane kandi baloli̱ye haa kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi.
Kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi eki, okite haagu̱u̱li̱ ya sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano kandi mukati yayo otemu bihande bibili bya mabaale ebihandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo bilaghilo ebi nkukuha.

Haagu̱u̱li̱ ya kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi eki, niiyo ndasanga-sangaanagha naawe kandi mbu̱ghe naawe ku̱lu̱gha haagati ya bakelu̱bbi̱ babili abali haagu̱u̱li̱ ya sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano. Haala niiyo ndasanga-sangaanagha naawe kandi nkuhe bilaghilo bya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
“Okole meeja mu mbaau sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo, kujamba kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ esatu, kugbaatikana kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ emui na i̱nci̱ mukaagha, kukangama kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu.
Oghi̱swi̱ki̱le na feeja esemeeye kandi oghitʼo mugoma ghwa feeja.
Oghyeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ye mu maakpengbu̱ na fuleemu ya i̱nci̱ esatu kandi otʼo mugoma ghwa feeja.
Oghikolele mpete enaa sya feeja kandi osite haa nsondo syayʼo enaa, haa maghulu ghaayʼo anaa.
Mpete esi osite haai na mugoma ghwa meeja eghi kandi sikwataghe mpaghi sya kuheekelaghʼo meeja eghi.
Okole mpaghi sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi osi̱swi̱ki̱le na feeja, haaliisiyo mwaheekelaghʼo meeja eghi.
Oghikolele sahaani̱ na bibindi bya kuheekelamu bubbani̱, bbaaku̱li̱ na jaaga bya kutaamu bihonguwa byakunuwa. Ebi byona bikoluwe mu feeja esemeeye.
Bwile bwona mutaaghe mugaati̱ oghu bampongeeye haa meeja haala mu maaso ghanje.
“Okole kyakutʼo taala mu feeja esemeeye. Kyakutʼo taala eki kyona, otaayemu bimole byakiyo byaku̱ki̱semeli̱ya, obiwiise na nondo mu feeja esemeeye eghi yoonini.
Kyakutʼo taala eki kibe na matai mukaagha aghalu̱ghi̱ye haa ki̱ti̱na kya haagati, matai asatu haa luhande lumui na ghanji asatu haa luhande lunji.
