Bu̱li̱ etai haa matai mukaagha ghaa kyakutʼo taala eki, libʼo bimole bisatu ebi̱su̱si̱ye bimole bya kiti alu̱mondi̱.
Haa ki̱ti̱na kya haagati ya kyakutʼo taala eki habʼo bimole bbinaa ebi̱su̱si̱ye bimole bya kiti alu̱mondi̱.
Hansi ya bu̱li̱ matai abili aghalu̱ghi̱ye haa ki̱ti̱na kya kyakutʼo taala eki, otʼo kimole eki̱su̱si̱ye kimole kya kiti alu̱mondi̱.
Kyakutʼo taala eki, otaayemu matai ghaakiyo na bimole byakiyo byaku̱ki̱semeli̱ya, obiwiise na nondo mu feeja esemeeye eghi yoonini.
“Okole taala musanju̱ sya kuta haagu̱u̱li̱ ya matai mukaagha na ya kuta haagu̱u̱li̱ ya ki̱ti̱na kya haagati ya kyakutʼo taala eki. Otʼo taala esi niikuwo siikale sibhaki̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaakiyo.
Makaasi ghaa taala esi na biisaniya byasiyo bikoluwe mu feeja esemeeye.
Kyakutʼo taala eki na bintu byakiyo byona obikole mu ki̱lo maku̱mi̱ asatu nʼetaano sya feeja esemeeye.
Olole ngu bu̱li̱ kintu waaki̱koli̱ye kusighikila haa ndaghikiililo eghi naakwoleki̱ye haa mwena ghuni.”
Okwele weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na kateni̱ eku̱mi̱ sya lughoye lusemeeye kandi mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo na mutuku. Mu̱soni̱ mulungi asonele haa kateni̱ esi bisasani̱ bya bakelu̱bbi̱.
Kateni̱ esi syona syengana-ngane, kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta eku̱mi̱ nʼebili kandi kugbaatikana mi̱ta ebili.
Kateni̱ etaano osikwatani̱ye hamui, na sinji etaano osikwatani̱ye hamui.

Haa mukughilo ghwa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila, haa kateni̱ etaano esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui, otʼo mpete sya lughoye lwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱ kandi okole otiyo dhee mukughilo ghwa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila ya sinji etaano esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui.

Ote mpete sya lughoye maku̱mi̱ ataano haa mukughilo ghwa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila haa kateni̱ etaano esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui, na mpete sya lughoye sinji maku̱mi̱ ataano haa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila haa kateni̱ sinji etaano esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui kandi silolane.
Okole bigwasi maku̱mi̱ ataano bya feeja kandi obi̱koleesi̱ye kukwatani̱ya hamui kateni̱ esi, niikuwo ebe weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye emui.
“Okole dhee kateni̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼemui mu byoha bya mbu̱li̱ sya ku̱swi̱ki̱la weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Kujamba kwa bu̱li̱ kateni̱ kube mi̱ta eku̱mi̱ nʼesatu kandi kugbaatikana kube mi̱ta ebili. Kateni̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼemui esi syona syengana-ngane.
Kateni̱ etaano osikwatani̱ye syonkaha, na sinji mukaagha osikwatani̱ye syonkaha. Kateni̱ ya mukaagha oghi̱ku̱nemu kabili kandi oghite haa mulyango ghwa weema.

Ote mpete sya lughoye maku̱mi̱ ataano haa mukughilo ghwa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila haa kateni̱ etaano esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui na mpete sya lughoye maku̱mi̱ ataano haa mukughilo ghwa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila haa kateni̱ mukaagha esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui.
Okole bigwasi maku̱mi̱ ataano bya bbu̱looji̱ kandi obite mu mpete sya lughoye kukwatani̱ya weema eghi, niikuwo ebe weema emui.
Ki̱twi̱ke kya kateni̱ esikuba si̱ti̱ghaayʼo, kimui kya kabili kyasiyo, oki̱dhodhooki̱ye enu̱ma ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Ki̱twi̱ke kya mi̱ta eki̱ti̱ghaayʼo ki̱swi̱ki̱le mu maakpengbu̱ ghaa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Okole bintu binji bibili bya ku̱swi̱ki̱la weema eghi, kimui ku̱lu̱gha mu mpu siimutuku sya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama na kinji ku̱lu̱gha mu mpu sya mbu̱li̱.
“Okole fuleemu sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo sya kwemi̱li̱li̱yʼo weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Kujamba kwa bu̱li̱ fuleemu kube fu̱u̱ti̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼetaano kandi kugbaatikana kube fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu.
Bu̱li̱ fuleemu oghikolele nkondo ebili sya kuta hansi yayo, kusikwatani̱ya. Fuleemu syona sya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi haaliikuwo waasikola otiyo.
Okole fuleemu maku̱mi̱ abili sya kuta haa luhande lwa eku̱wa lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Okole ncuba sya siliva maku̱mi̱ anaa sya kutaamu fuleemu maku̱mi̱ abili esi kandi ote ncuba ebili hansi ya bu̱li̱ fuleemu kukwata nkondo syayʼo ebili.
Okole fuleemu maku̱mi̱ abili sya kuta haa luhande lwʼelughulu lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Okole ncuba sya siliva maku̱mi̱ anaa, ncuba ebili sya kuta hansi ya bu̱li̱ fuleemu.
Okole fuleemu mukaagha sya kuta enu̱ma ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi haa luhande lwa bughuwa ejooba.
Okole fuleemu ebili sya kuta haa nsondo ku̱gu̱mi̱ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Fuleemu sya mu nsondo esi osikwatani̱ye ku̱lu̱gha hansi ku̱hi̱ka elughulu kandi osi̱bohi̱ye mpete emui. Haaliikuwo waakola otiyo fuleemu syombi syʼomu nsondo ebili.
Okole fuleemu munaanaa na ncuba sya kusitaamu eku̱mi̱ na mukaagha sya siliva kandi ncuba ebili hansi ya bu̱li̱ fuleemu.
“Okole mikiiko etaano mu ki̱i̱lu̱mbo, ya kukwatani̱ya fuleemu sya luhande lwʼelughulu lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Okole mikiiko etaano ya kukwatani̱ya fuleemu sya luhande lwʼeku̱wa kandi mikiiko etaano ya kukwatani̱ya fuleemu sya luhande lwa bughuwa ejooba bwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Mukiiko ghwa fuleemu ghwa kuta haagati ya fuleemu esi ghu̱lu̱ghe haa luhande lumui ku̱hi̱ka haa luhande lunji.
Fuleemu esi osi̱swi̱ki̱le na feeja kandi okole mpete syasiyo sya feeja sya kukwata mikiiko kandi mikiiko eghi oghi̱swi̱ki̱le na feeja.
“Olole ngu waakweye weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kusighikila haa ndaghikiililo eghi naakwoleki̱ye haa mwena ghuni.
“Okole kateni̱ mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye kandi osonelʼo kulungi bisasani̱ bya bakelu̱bbi̱.
Oghi̱dhodhooki̱ye na ndobhaani̱ sya feeja haa mpaghi enaa sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo esi̱swi̱ki̱ye na feeja kandi esili mu ncuba enaa sya siliva sya kutaamu mpaghi esi.

Kateni̱ eghi oghi̱dhodhooki̱ye na bigwasi haagati ya weema eghi kandi ote sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano enu̱ma syayo. Kateni̱ eghi ekutambulani̱yamu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kusaali̱ya byona.
Ote kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi haagu̱u̱li̱ ya sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano mu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kusaali̱ya byona.
Ote meeja enja ya kateni̱ eghi haa luhande lwʼelughulu lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi kandi kyakutʼo taala haa luhande lwʼeku̱wa.
“Haa mulyango ghwa weema eghi, otʼo kateni̱ ya langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye kandi eghi mu̱soni̱ mulungi akoli̱ye.

Kateni̱ eghi oghikolele mpaghi etaano sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi osi̱swi̱ki̱le na feeja. Ndobhaani̱ esi oku̱dhodhooki̱yʼo kateni̱ eghi sibe sya feeja kandi mpaghi esi osite mu ncuba etaano sya bbu̱looji̱.”

Okole kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa mu ki̱i̱lu̱mbo. Kyona kyengana-ngane, kujamba kwakiyo fu̱u̱ti̱ musanju̱ nʼeki̱twi̱ke, kugbaatikana fu̱u̱ti̱ musanju̱ nʼeki̱twi̱ke kandi kukangama fu̱u̱ti̱ enaa nʼeki̱twi̱ke.
Okikolele mahembe kandi haa bu̱li̱ nsondo syakiyo enaa otʼo ehembe limui. Mahembe agha oghakole mu ki̱twi̱ke kya kiti eki kyonini kandi oki̱swi̱ki̱le na bbu̱looji̱.
Okole byaku̱koleesi̱ya haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki: capu̱li̱ya sya kutaamu ki̱bu̱, bi̱ti̱i̱yo, bibindi, huuma na capu̱li̱ya sya ku̱tu̱mi̱kamu mulilo, bintu ebi byona obikole mu bbu̱looji̱.
Okole kati̱mba kaa bbu̱looji̱ kandi haa bu̱li̱ nsondo syako enaa otʼo mpete emui.
Kati̱mba aka okakoti̱ye mukati hansi ya mugoma ghwa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi kahi̱ke haagati yakiyo.
Okole mpaghi sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo sya kuheekelaghʼo kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki kandi osi̱swi̱ki̱le na bbu̱looji̱.
Mpaghi esi osikwami̱ye mu mpete esili haa mpande ebili sya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki, niikuwo bakiheekelaghʼo.
Kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki, okikole mu mbaau kandi mukati yakiyo habemu mwanya. Okikole ngoku naakwoleki̱ye haa mwena.
Okole jighati̱ ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Haa luhande lwa eku̱wa lwa weema eghi otʼo kateni̱ sya lughoye lusemeeye, kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta maku̱mi̱ anaa nʼenaa.
Mpaghi maku̱mi̱ abili sya kateni̱ esi na ncuba sya kusitaamu maku̱mi̱ abili byona bibe bya bbu̱looji̱, bhaatu ndobhaani̱ sya mpaghi esi na mpete syasiyo bibe bya siliva.

Haa luhande lwa elughulu, otʼo kateni̱ kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta maku̱mi̱ anaa nʼenaa. Mpaghi maku̱mi̱ abili sya kutʼo kateni̱ esi na ncuba maku̱mi̱ abili sya kutaamu mpaghi esi bibe bya bbu̱looji̱, bhaatu ndobhaani̱ sya mpaghi esi na mpete syasiyo bibe bya siliva.
“Haa luhande lwa bughuwa ejooba, otʼo kateni̱ kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta maku̱mi̱ abili nʼebili kandi osite haa mpaghi eku̱mi̱ esili mu ncuba eku̱mi̱.
Haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, kujamba kwa jighati̱ kube mi̱ta maku̱mi̱ abili nʼebili.
Kateni̱ sya kuta haa luhande lumui lwa mulyango, kujamba kwasiyo kube mi̱ta mukaagha nʼeki̱twi̱ke kandi osite haa mpaghi esatu esili mu ncuba esatu.
Haa luhande lunji lwa geeti̱ eghi, otʼo kateni̱ kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta mukaagha nʼeki̱twi̱ke kandi osite haa mpaghi esatu esili mu ncuba esatu.
“Haa geeti̱ otʼo kateni̱ kujamba kwayʼo mi̱ta mwenda, mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo na mutuku, eghi mu̱soni̱ mulungi akoli̱ye mu lughoye lusemeeye kandi oghite haa mpaghi enaa esili mu ncuba enaa.
Mpaghi syona esyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye jighati̱ eghi osikwatani̱ye na mpete sya siliva, ndobhaani̱ sya kuta haa mpaghi sya jighati̱ esi sibe sya siliva kandi ncuba sya bbu̱looji̱ sya kutaamu mpaghi esi.

Jighati̱ yayo kujamba kwayʼo kube fu̱u̱ti̱ ki̱ku̱mi̱ na maku̱mi̱ ataano, kugbaatikana kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ nsanju̱ nʼetaano kandi kateni̱ sya kukola lugho kujamba kwasiyo kube mi̱ta ebili na kimui kyakanaa, esi̱koleeu̱we mu lughoye lusemeeye. Ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi esi sibe sya bbu̱looji̱.
Bintu byona byaku̱koleesi̱ya mu weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nkondo syayʼo syona, na nkondo sya jighati̱, bibe bya bbu̱looji̱.
“Olaghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ kukuleetela mafu̱ta ghasemeeye ghaa biti oli̱va ghaa kuta mu taala, niikuwo taala eghi eekalaghe yaaki̱ye bwile bwona.
Mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, enja ya kateni̱ eghi eli mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be, baakalaghe babhaki̱i̱ye taala bwile bwona mu maaso ghaa
ku̱lu̱gha lwagholo ku̱hi̱ka nkyambisi. Kini nkilaghilo eki Banai̱saaleeli̱ bali na kukwata mu mijo yabo yoona bilo nʼebilo.”

aalaghila Musa ati, “Obilikile mwana wa njoko waawe Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be Nadaabbu, Abbi̱hu̱, Eli̱yeeja na I̱tamala kwisa hambali oli. Bantu aba niibo naakomi̱yemu̱ mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona ku̱mpeeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱.
Okolele mwana wa njoko waawe Alooni̱ bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya bu̱hongi̱, ebikuleka bantu mbamu̱hu̱ti̱ya kandi ebi̱ku̱mu̱semeli̱ya.
Oghambile basaasa abamani̱ye kubikola kwonini kandi aba naahaaye magheji, bakolele Alooni̱ bi̱lu̱waalo bya ku̱mu̱lu̱wi̱ka mamufoola mu̱hongi̱ wanje.

Bini niibiyo bi̱lu̱waalo bali na kukola: kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha, efodi̱, nkanji̱, kyaku̱lu̱waala mukati, kyaku̱lu̱waala mu mutuwe na muheeko. Bakolele Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi balalu̱waalagha mbampeeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱.
Basaasa abamani̱ye kubikola, bakoleesi̱ye feeja na mahu̱u̱ji̱ mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye.
“Basaasa aba bakole efodi̱ mu feeja na mu lughoye lusemeeye kandi mu̱soni̱ mulungi atemu mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo na mutuku.
Haa nsondo ebili sya efodi̱ eghi, ote haa mpande syombi buheeko bwa kukwatani̱ya haa mabegha ki̱twi̱ke kya mu maaso na kyʼenu̱ma, niikuwo ekwatane hamui.
Basaasa aba bakole muheeko mu lughoye lusemeeye olu baakoli̱yemu efodi̱ kandi batemu mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa feeja, ghaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo na mutuku.
“Okwate mabaale abili onika kandi oghahandiikʼo mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ eku̱mi̱ na babili baa I̱saaleeli̱.
Haa ebaale limui ohandiikʼo mali̱i̱na mukaagha na haa ebaale linji ohandiikʼo mali̱i̱na mukaagha ngoku balabhangaane mu ku̱byaluwa kwabo.

Mubhaaki̱ wa mabaale ngoku akuteelaghʼo bisasani̱ kusemeeye, haaliikuwo naawe waata kusemeeye haa mabaale agha mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ baa I̱saaleeli̱. Mabaale agha oghate mu buufuleemu buunabwana bwa feeja.

Mabaale abili agha oghabohe haagu̱u̱li̱ ya efodi̱ na buheeko bubili haa mabegha ghombi kughikwatani̱ya hamui kandi ghakuba kaakuusukilʼo batabani̱ baa I̱saaleeli̱. Alooni̱ aghendaghe aheeki̱ye mali̱i̱na agha mu maaso ghaa
, niikuwo
abaasukaghe.
Okole buufuleemu buunabwana bubili bwa feeja,
na bujeghele bubili mu feeja esemeeye, obutali̱ye nga bughuwo kandi obutaahi̱ye mu buufuleemu buunabwana bwa feeja obu.

“Okole kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha eki mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona alalu̱waalagha naaghambila bantu eki Luhanga akubbala bakole. Okikole mu lughoye lwonini olu waakoli̱yemu efodi̱ kandi otemu mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa feeja, langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye.
Oki̱ku̱nemu̱ kabili kandi kyengaane mpande syona, i̱nci̱ mwenda kujamba kandi i̱nci̱ mwenda kugbaatikana.
Okitʼo lai̱ni̱ enaa sya mabaale ghaa muhendo. Lai̱ni̱ yʼoku̱du̱bha otʼo ghaamutuku salu̱di̱yo, ghaa ki̱si̱ka kibisi topaji̱ na ghaamutuku kabu̱nku̱lo.
Lai̱ni̱ yaakabili otʼo ghaa ki̱si̱ka kibisi i̱mi̱lali̱do, ghaa bbu̱lu̱lu̱ su̱fi̱lo na ghaa njelu dayamondi̱.
Lai̱ni̱ yaakasatu otʼo ghaa mutuku takwi̱je, ghaa njelu agate na ghaa papo ameti̱si̱to.
Lai̱ni̱ yaakanaa otʼo ghaa kinjaali̱ bbelu̱lo, ghaa mutuku onika na ghaa ki̱si̱ka kibisi yesipa. Mabaale agha oghate mu buufuleemu buunabwana bwa feeja.
Hakubʼo mabaale eku̱mi̱ nʼabili kandi haa bu̱li̱ ebaale ohandiikʼo li̱i̱na lya omui haa batabani̱ eku̱mi̱ na babili baa Yakobbo kwoleka ntu̱la eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya I̱saaleeli̱.
“Kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha eki okikolele bujeghele bubili bwa feeja busemeeye obutali̱ye nga bughuwo.
Kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha eki okikolele mpete ebili sya feeja kandi osite haa nsondo syakiyo ebili syʼelughulu.
Obohe bujeghele bubili bwa feeja mu mpete ebili esili haa mpande ebili sya kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha.
Okwatani̱ye kumaliilila kunji kwa bujeghele bubili haa buufuleemu buunabwana bwa feeja kandi obubohe mu maaso ghaa efodi̱ eghi.
Okole mpete ebili sya feeja kandi osite haa nsondo ebili syʼeku̱wa ya kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha, mukati haai na efodi̱.
Okole mpete sinji ebili sya feeja kandi osite haakumaliilila kwa bughuwo bubili bwa haa mabegha ghaa efodi̱, hambali ki̱twi̱ke kyayʼo kyʼeku̱wa kilabhaane na muheeko oghu̱soni̱ye kulungi.

Mpete syakiyo osibohele haa mpete sya kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha na bughuwo bwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, niikuwo kilangaale haa muheeko ghwa efodi̱ eghi ekoleeu̱we kulungi, niikuwo kitatelebuka haa efodi̱ eghi.
“Obu Alooni̱ alabaagha naataaha mu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, alu̱waalaghe kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha eki, ekihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱wʼo mali̱i̱na ghaa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱, niikuwo si̱ye
niisukaghe bantu banje aba.
Ote U̱li̱i̱mu̱ na Tu̱mi̱i̱mu̱ mu kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha, niikuwo Alooni̱ abiheekaghe haa ki̱ku̱bha obu alabaagha naasa mu maaso ghaa
. Bwile obu abiheekaghe haa ki̱ku̱bha kumanya ebi si̱ye
nkubbala bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ bakole.
“Okole nkanji̱ ya langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱ ya ku̱lu̱waala mukati ya efodi̱.
Nkanji̱ eghi ebe na kihulu haagati ekiliyo mukughilo kya kukwami̱yamu mutuwe niikuwo etatemuka.
Okole mikomamahanga mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo na mutuku kandi oghite haa mukughilo ghwa eku̱wa ghwa nkanji̱ eghi. Ote bida bya feeja haagati ya mikomamahanga eghi.
Kida kya feeja okilabhani̱ye na mukomamahanga, kida kya feeja okilabhani̱ye na mukomamahanga, kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya mukughilo ghwa eku̱wa ghwa nkanji̱ eghi.
Alooni̱ abi̱lu̱waalaghe naaghenda ku̱heeleli̱ya kandi baaghu̱waghe elaka lya bida ebi obu alabaagha naataaha mu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa
kandi naatuwayo, niikuwo ataku̱wa.
“Okole kaapa mu feeja esemeeye kandi okahandiikʼo oti, ‘Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Kaapa aka okabohe na kaghuwo kaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱ mu maaso ghaa kyaku̱lu̱waala mu mutuwe.
Alooni̱ akalu̱waalaghe haa bhu̱u̱su̱, niikuwo si̱ye
nsi̱i̱maghe bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuba baleeti̱ye ewanje, nankabha bantu aba basobi̱ya obu bakuba mbahonga bihonguwa ebi.
“Okolele Alooni̱ kyaku̱lu̱waala mukati mu lughoye lusemeeye. Omukolele kyaku̱lu̱waala mu mutuwe mu lughoye lusemeeye kandi omukolele muheeko oghuliyo mudali̱jo, oghu mu̱soni̱ mulungi akoli̱ye.
Batabani̱ baa Alooni̱ nabo dhee obakolele kyaku̱lu̱waala mukati, kyaku̱lu̱waala mu mutuwe na miheeko, ebikuleka bantu mbabahu̱ti̱ya kandi ebikubasemeli̱ya.
Olu̱wi̱ke mwana wa njoko waawe Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be bi̱lu̱waalo byabo bya bu̱hongi̱, obasiighʼo mafu̱ta kandi obeeli̱ye, niikuwo bampeeleli̱ye nga bahongi̱.
“Obakolele mpale sya mukati sya langi̱ njelu, sitandikile mu mi̱ghelu̱ ku̱hi̱ka mu bibelo, niikuwo atabʼo muntu oghu akubona mihina yabo.

Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be balu̱waalaghe bi̱lu̱waalo ebi mbataaha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Babi̱lu̱waalaghe dhee mbaghenda haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kukola mulimo mu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Kaakuba bakola eki, tabakuba na musango kandi tankubaha kifubilo kya lu̱ku̱.
“Alooni̱ na baasukulu be bali na kukwata kilaghilo kini bilo nʼebilo.”
“Kini niikiyo oli na kukolʼo Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be ku̱beeli̱ya, niikuwo bagubhe ku̱mpeeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱. Okwate ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui na ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili esitali na kamogo.

Okande ki̱tu̱mbe kya ngano eghi esemeeye kandi kitalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so. Ki̱tu̱mbe eki oteekemu migaati̱ ya milundi esatu, emui haa migaati̱ eghi oghi̱teeki̱ye mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va, enji otaghi̱teeki̱ya mafu̱ta kandi enji oghiteekemu bugaati̱ buunabwana bu̱si̱i̱ghi̱yʼo mafu̱ta.
Migaati̱ eghi yoona oghite mu kighegha kandi wiise nayo obu okuba noosa kuhonga ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte na ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili esi.
Oleete Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi obanaabi̱ye na maasi.

Okwate bi̱lu̱waalo bya bu̱hongi̱ kandi olu̱wi̱ke Alooni̱ kyaku̱lu̱waala mukati, nkanji̱ na efodi̱. Omu̱lu̱wi̱ke efodi̱ kandi kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha. Efodi̱ eghi oghibohe na muheeko oghu̱koleeu̱we kulungi.
Omu̱lu̱wi̱ke kyaku̱lu̱waala mu mutuwe kandi obohe kaapa kahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haa kyaku̱lu̱waala mu mutuwe eki.
Okwate mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha kandi oghaseese Alooni̱ mu mutuwe ku̱mweli̱ya.
Du̱mbi̱ oleete batabani̱ be kandi obalu̱wi̱ke byaku̱lu̱waala mukati.
Obalu̱wi̱ke miheeko na byaku̱lu̱waala mu mutuwe. Weeli̱ye otiyo Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be nanga ebo na baasukulu baabo ku̱mpeeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱ ni kilaghilo kya bilo nʼebilo.
“Oleete ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte eghi mu maaso ghaa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be bate mikono yabo haa mutuwe ghwa ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte eghi.
Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte eghi mughiitile mu maaso ghaa
haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.

Otwale haa saghama ya ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte eghi kandi oghisiighe na kyala kyawe haa mahembe ghaa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa. Saghama eghi eku̱ti̱ghalʼo oghiseese haa ki̱twi̱ke kya hansi ya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.
Okwate bisabu̱ ebi̱swi̱ki̱ye byenda, ki̱twi̱ke kisemeeye kya bu̱ne, mpi̱gho syombi na bisabu̱ byasiyo, obyokeli̱ye haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.
Bhaatu ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte eghi, luhu, nyama syayʼo na mabhi̱ ghaayʼo, abyokeli̱ye haa mulilo enja ya hambali baghooneeye. Eki kibe kihonguwa kya kughanila bahongi̱ bibhi byabo.
“Otwale emui haa ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama kandi oghambile Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be kuta mikono yabo haa mutuwe ghwa ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi.
Osale ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi kandi omisange saghama yayo haa mpande syona sya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.
Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi oghiiyemu myana, onaabi̱ye byenda byayʼo, bilenge byayʼo na mutuwe ghwayʼo na myana eghi.
Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi yoona oghyokeli̱ye haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
“Okwate ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama enji, Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be bate mikono yabo haa mutuwe ghwa ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi.

Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi oghisale kandi ooye haa saghama yayo, oghisiighe haa nsonga ya kutui kwabuliyo kwa Alooni̱ na haa nsonga sya matui ghaabuliyo ghaa batabani̱ be, na haa byala byabo byabusaasa bya mikono yabuliyo, na haa bighele byabo byabusaasa bya maghulu ghaabo ghaabuliyo. Saghama eghi eku̱ti̱ghalʼo oghimisange haa mpande syona sya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.

Ooye haa saghama eghi eli haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, oghitabule mu mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha kandi oghamisangile Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be. Oghamisangile haa bi̱lu̱waalo byabo, du̱mbi̱ bakufooka bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi bi̱lu̱waalo byabo bikufooka bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye dhee.

“Haa ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi, ooyʼo bisabu̱ bya haa mukila, bisabu̱ byona ebi̱swi̱ki̱ye byenda, ki̱twi̱ke kisemeeye kya bu̱ne, mpi̱gho syombi na bisabu̱ byasiyo na kibelo kyabuliyo. (Ni ntaama ya mukolo ghwa ku̱lu̱wi̱ka bahongi̱.)
Ooye mu kighegha ekili mu maaso ghaa
, mugaati̱ ghumui oghutalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so. Ooyemu dhee mugaati̱ ghumui oghu̱teeki̱ye na mafu̱ta kandi ooyemu dhee na capati esi̱i̱ghi̱yʼo mafu̱ta.
Ebi byona obikwati̱ye mu ngalo Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be kandi babi̱i̱mu̱ki̱ye nga kihonguwa baamu̱ki̱i̱ye ewaa
Du̱mbi̱ obiiye mu ngalo syabo kandi obyokeli̱ye haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa haagu̱u̱li̱ ya kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, niikuwo kibe kihonguwa kyokeei̱ye kyona mu maaso ghaa
, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱mu̱dheedhi̱ye. Ni kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo kya
Okwate mbanda ya ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama ya mukolo ghwa ku̱lu̱wi̱ka Alooni̱ bu̱hongi̱ kandi oghi̱i̱mu̱ki̱ye nga kihonguwa baamu̱ki̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa
kandi mbanda eghi oghitwale.

“Haa mukolo ghwa ku̱lu̱wi̱ka mu̱hongi̱, mbanda na kibelo kya ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama ebi baakoleeseei̱ye, babi̱i̱mu̱ki̱yaghe kubihaayo ewanje nga kisembo kya mbaghani̱ja kandi ghubaaghe mughabo ghwa Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ balakahaaghayo bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge ewaa
, kagungu na kibelo bya kisolo eki bibaaghe mughabo ghwa bahongi̱ kandi eki nkilaghilo naataayʼo ekitaakuhinduka.
“Alooni̱ naaku̱u̱ye, bi̱lu̱waalo biye bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya bu̱hongi̱ babibiikile batabani̱ be kandi babi̱lu̱waale mabalu̱wi̱ka kuba bahongi̱.
Mutabani̱ wee oghu akukuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye nga mu̱hongi̱, obu alaghendagha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kukola mulimo mu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, abi̱lu̱waalaghe haabwa bilo musanju̱.

“Okwate nyama sya ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi baakoleeseei̱ye ku̱lu̱wi̱ka Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be kuba bahongi̱ kandi nyama esi ositeekele mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kya mbaghani̱ja kya hanjaakati eghi.
Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be baliye nyama sya ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama esi na migaati̱ eghi eli mu kighegha. Babiliile haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Baliye byokuliya ebyahongeeu̱we ebi haabwa mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi byabo mabalu̱wi̱ka kandi mabeeli̱ya kuba bahongi̱, oghu atali mu̱hongi̱ ataliya haa byokuliya ebi, nanga bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Kaakuba nyama sya ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte kedha migaati̱ ebyakoleesebeeu̱we haa mukolo ghwa ku̱lu̱wi̱ka bahongi̱ oghu bilaalʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi, obyoki̱ye na mulilo, byokuliya ebi bitaliibuwa, nanga bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“Mukolo ghwa ku̱lu̱wi̱ka Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be kuba bahongi̱ oghukole ngoku naakulaghiiye kandi ghumale bilo musanju̱.
Mu bilo musanju̱ ebi ohongaghe bu̱li̱ kilo ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte nga kihonguwa kya mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi bya bantu aba kandi osiighaghe mafu̱ta haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa ku̱kyeli̱ya.
Okole eki bu̱li̱ kilo haabwa bilo musanju̱, du̱mbi̱ kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki kikuba kyeli̱ye kwonini kandi muntu kedha kintu kyona eki̱ku̱ku̱mʼo kikufooka ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“Bini niibiyo oli na kuhongela haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki bu̱li̱ kilo: byana bya ntaama bibili bya mwaka ghumui.
Kyana kya ntaama kimui okihongaghe nkyambisi na kinji okihongaghe lwagholo.

Nkyambisi kyana kya ntaama kyʼoku̱du̱bha okihongaghe na ki̱lo emui ya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu li̱ta emui ya mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va. Ohongaghe dhee li̱ta emui ya vi̱i̱ni̱, kuba kihonguwa kyakunuwa.

Ohongaghe kyana kya ntaama kinji lwagholo kandi okihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa, mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va na vi̱i̱ni̱ ebyengaane na bya nkyambisi. Eki kibe kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
“Mu mijo yaanu yoona muhongaghe kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye eki ewaa
haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, hambali ndasanga-sangaanagha naanu ku̱bu̱gha naanu.
Mu ki̱i̱kalo eki niiyo ndasanga-sangaanagha na bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ kandi ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyanje kilafoolagha ki̱i̱kalo eki kuba ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“Weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa ndabyeli̱yagha. Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be ndabeeli̱yagha dhee, niikuwo bampeeleli̱yaghe nga bahongi̱.
Nkuukala hamui na Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi nkuba Luhanga wabo.
Bakumanya ngoku ndi
Luhanga wabo, oghu akabaaya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ niikuwo ngubhe kuukala nabo. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga wabo.”
Okole kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱ mu ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi kyona kyengana-ngana.
Kujamba kwakiyo fu̱u̱ti̱ emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke, kugbaatikana kwakiyo fu̱u̱ti̱ emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke kandi kukangama kwakiyo fu̱u̱ti̱ esatu. Mahembe ghaakiyo anaa ghalu̱ghe mu ki̱twi̱ke eki kyonini.
Oki̱swi̱ki̱le na feeja esemeeye haagu̱u̱li̱ yakiyo, haa mpande syakiyo syona na haa mahembe ghaakiyo kandi okyeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ye na mugoma ghwa feeja.
Okikolele mpete ebili sya feeja kandi osite hansi ya mugoma ghwa feeja haa mpande ebili mu maakpengbu̱ hambali bakuta mpaghi esi balakiheekelaghʼo.
Mpaghi esi osikole mu ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi osi̱swi̱ki̱le na feeja.
Ote kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱ enja ya kateni̱ eghi eli mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano na kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi eki̱swi̱ki̱ye haagu̱u̱li̱ yayo, hambali ndasanga-sangaanagha naawe.
“Bu̱li̱ nkyambisi obu Alooni̱ alaasagha kuteekani̱ja taala, atu̱mi̱kaghʼo bubbani̱ busasi̱ye kulungi.
Alooni̱ ali na ku̱tu̱mi̱ka dhee bubbani̱ bu̱li̱ lwagholo obu alabaagha naabhaki̱ya taala, bubbani̱ obu buukalaghe bwaki̱ye mu maaso ghaa
mu mijo yaanu yoona.
Haa kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱ eki, otali̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱ obutasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱bu̱u̱we kedha kuhongelʼo kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, kedha kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kandi otaliseesʼo kihonguwa kyakunuwa.

Alooni̱ akolaghe mukolo ghwa kweli̱ya kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱ eki mulundi ghumui mu mwaka. Asiighaghe haa mahembe ghaakiyo saghama ya kisolo eki baahongi̱ye haabwa mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi byabo mulundi ghumui bu̱li̱ mwaka mu mijo yaanu yoona, nanga kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱ eki ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini ewaa
aaghila Musa ati,
“Obu okuba noobala bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱, bu̱li̱ muntu aheyo ewaa
sente sya kucungula bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe, niikuwo kifubilo kya ndwala kitabahi̱kʼo obu okuba noobabala.
Bu̱li̱ muntu oghu balakabalagha, ali na kuhaayo kimui kyakabili kya mukwenge ghwa siliva
kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kya siliva mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, bu̱li̱ muntu ali na kuhaayo sente esi nga kihonguwa ewaa
Muntu weena oghu bakubala mu kubaluwa oku, oghu ali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ya bukulu na kusaalʼo, ali na kuhaayo kihonguwa kya
eki.
Baguudha batahayo sisaayʼo kandi banaku batahayo esili hansi ya kimui kyakabili kya mukwenge oghu, obu mulabaagha nimuhayo kihonguwa ewaa
. Sente esi ni muhendo oghu bu̱li̱ muntu ali na kusasula haabwa kughaniluwa kwa bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe.
Oli na kukumaani̱ya sente esi ku̱lu̱gha mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi osi̱koleesi̱ye milimo yʼomu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Sente esi silalekagha
aasukaghe ngoku Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasasuuye haabwa kughaniluwa kwa bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwabo.”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Okole bbaafu ya bbu̱looji̱ ya kunaabilamu na kyakughitʼo kya bbu̱looji̱. Oghite haagati ya weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi ote maasi mu bbaafu eghi.
Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be bali na kunaaba maasi agha mu ngalo syabo na mu bighele.
Obu balabaagha mbaghenda mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, kedha mbeebinga haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kukola mulimo kedha kuhongela
bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, badu̱bhaghe banaabe maasi agha, niikuwo bataku̱wa.
Bali na kunaaba mu ngalo syabo na mu bighele byabo, niikuwo bataku̱wa. Kini kili na kuba kilaghilo kya bilo nʼebilo ewaa Alooni̱ na baasukulu be mu mijo yabo yoona.”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Okole mafu̱ta ku̱lu̱gha mu bintu bisasi̱ye bini: ki̱lo mukaagha sya mafu̱ta ghaa miila, ki̱lo esatu sya nsyano esasi̱ye kinamooni̱, ki̱lo esatu ku̱lu̱gha mu bikaka bisasi̱ye,
na ki̱lo mukaagha sya nsyano esasi̱ye bakughilaghamu kaasiya kandi li̱ta enaa sya mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va, kusighikila haa bi̱pi̱i̱mi̱si̱yo byʼomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Bintu ebi obbale muntu oghu amani̱ye kubitabula kusemeeye, abikolemu bigita bisasi̱ye bya maasi kandi bibe mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha ghahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Mafu̱ta agha oghasiighe haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano,
haa meeja na bintu byayʼo byona, haa kyakutʼo taala na bi̱twi̱ke byakiyo na kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱.
Oghasiighe haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye na bintu byakiyo byona kandi haa bbaafu na kyakughitʼo.
Bintu ebi byona obyeli̱ye niikuwo bibe bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini. Kintu kyona ekilabi̱ku̱maghʼo kilafookagha ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be obasiighe mafu̱ta agha kandi obeeli̱ye, niikuwo bagubhe ku̱mpeeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱.
Oghile bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha ghani ghalabaagha mafu̱ta ghanje ghahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu mijo yaanu yoona.

Mutalighasiighʼo muntu wa bu̱li̱ kilo kandi otalikola mafu̱ta ghanji aghasu̱si̱ye nga mafu̱ta agha ku̱lu̱gha mu bintu ngʼebi waakoleeseei̱ye. Mafu̱ta ghani ghahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi ghali na kuba ghahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini ewaanu.
Muntu weena oghu alakolagha mafu̱ta aghasu̱si̱ye ghani kedha aghasiigha muntu oghu atali mu̱hongi̱, bamubhingaghe mu bantu banje.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati, “Okwate bi̱lu̱ngi̱yo bisasi̱ye kulungi sitakite, onu̱ka, galibanu̱mu̱, obitabulani̱ye na bubbani̱ busemeeye kandi byona byengaane.
Oghile muntu oghu amani̱ye kubitabula abikolemu bubbani̱ busasi̱ye kandi otemu kisula niikuwo buukale busemeeye kandi bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Bimui haa bintu ebi obisiyemu nsyano esemeeye kandi oghite mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, hambali ndasanga-sangaanagha naawe. Bubbani̱ obu bube bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini ewaanu.
Muntu atali̱koleesi̱ya bintu ebi kwekolela bubbani̱ busasi̱ye obu. Bwile bwona mu̱bweli̱li̱kanaghʼo nga bubbani̱ bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bwa
Weena oghu akwekolela bigita bisasi̱ye kwonini nga ebi, abhinguwe mu bantu banje.”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Naakomi̱ye Bbejaleeli̱ mutabani̱ wa U̱li̱, muusukulu wa Hula, wʼomu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da.
Naaleki̱ye mwoyo wanje aamwisʼo kwonini, naamuhaaye magheji, kwetegheeleli̱ya kandi naamufoola oghu amani̱ye kukola bintu bya ngalo.
Akugubha kukola bintu bisemeeye ku̱lu̱gha mu feeja, siliva na bbu̱looji̱.
Akugubha kubhaaka mabaale kandi kughata mu buufuleemu bwa feeja, kulanda mbaau kandi kukola bu̱li̱ mulimo ghwona ghwa ngalo.

Naakomi̱ye dhee Oholi̱yaabbu, mutabani̱ wa Ahisamaki̱, wʼomu ntu̱la ya Daani̱, kukola hamui na Bbejaleeli̱. Naahaaye magheji bantu boona abakwete kukola milimo ya ngalo, niikuwo bagubhe kukola byona ebi naakulaghiiye.
Bakukola weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi, na bintu byona byʼomu weema eghi.
Bakukola dhee meeja na byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo, kyakutʼo taala kisemeeye na bintu byakiyo byona, kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱,
kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye na bintu byakiyo byona, bbaafu na kyakughitʼo,
bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya bu̱hongi̱ bya Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be ku̱lu̱waala mbakola mulimo ghwa bu̱hongi̱,
mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha na bubbani̱ busasi̱ye bwa ku̱tu̱mi̱ka mu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Bintu ebi byona babikole ngoku naakulaghiiye.”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mu̱hu̱ti̱yaghe kilo kyanje kya Sabhato, nanga kilo eki ni kaakulolelʼo haagati yanje naanu mu mijo yaanu yoona, niikuwo mugubhe kumanya ngoku ndi
oghu akubafoolagha bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“ ‘Muli na ku̱hu̱ti̱ya kilo kya Sabhato nanga ni kilo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaanu. Muntu weena oghu akukola bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye haa kilo eki nʼoghu akukola mulimo ghwona haa kilo eki, aatibuwaghe.
Muli na bilo mukaagha bya kukola milimo yaanu yoona, bhaatu kilo kyamusanju̱ ni kilo kya Sabhato kya kuhuumula kandi ni kilo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
. Muntu weena oghu alakolagha mulimo haa kilo kya Sabhato eki, aatibuwaghe.
Nahabweki bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ bali na ku̱hu̱ti̱ya kilo kya Sabhato, mu mijo yabo yoona, nga ndaghaano ya bilo nʼebilo.
Kilo eki nkaakulolelʼo kaa bilo nʼebilo haagati yanje na Banai̱saaleeli̱, nanga mu bilo mukaagha
akahanga eghulu na nsi kandi haa kilo kyamusanju̱ ataakola kantu kandi aahuumula.’ ”
Obu
aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha na Musa haa mwena Si̱naai̱, aaha Musa bihande bibili bya mabaale, ebi Luhanga eenini ahandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo bilaghilo.

Obu bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ baaboone Musa ataku̱u̱ki̱ye bwangu ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena, beekumaani̱ya kandi baaghenda hambali Alooni̱ ali, baamughila bati, “Otukolele bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga aaniibiyo byaghendagha bituhikiiye, nanga Musa oghu akatuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ tatumani̱ye hambali ali.”
Alooni̱ aabaghila ati, “Muuye mu matui mpete sya feeja esi bakali̱ baanu, batabani̱ baanu na bahala baanu balu̱weete, musindeetele.”
Nahabweki bantu aba boona baayamu mpete sya feeja esi baabaagha balu̱weete mu matui ghaabo kandi baasileetela Alooni̱.

Alooni̱ aakwata mpete esi, aasita haa mulilo syanuunuuta kandi asikolamu kisasani̱ kya kyana kya nte. Bantu aba baaghila bati, “Etu̱we Banai̱saaleeli̱, oni niiye luhanga waatu, oghu akatuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱!”
Obu Alooni̱ aaboone kisasani̱ kya kyana kya nte eki, aakwela kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa mu maaso ghaakiyo kandi aalangilila bantu aba ati, “Munkiya tukukolela
ki̱ghenu̱.”
Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo bantu aba baamuka nkyambisi cu̱i̱, baahonga bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye na bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge. Bantu aba baakamali̱ye kuliya kandi kunuwa, du̱mbi̱ baatandika ku̱bi̱na.
aaghila Musa ati, “Okote bwangu, nanga bantu baawe waahi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ beebhi̱hi̱i̱ye kwonini.

Baalu̱ghi̱ye bwangu haa ebi naabalaghiiye. Beekoleeye kisasani̱ kya kyana kya nte, baakilami̱i̱ye kandi baakihongela bihonguwa. Bakwete kughila bati, ‘Uwe I̱saaleeli̱, oni niiye luhanga waatu, oghu akatuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱!’ ”
aaghila Musa ati, “Olole, naaboone bantu aba, ni ntaaghu̱wa kwonini.
Nahabweki ondeke, nkwoleka bantu aba ngoku nsaaluuwe kwonini kandi nkubahwelekeeleli̱ya. Du̱mbi̱ nkukufoola ehanga lyamaani̱.”
Musa eesengeleli̱ya
Luhanga wee ati, “Ai̱
, nkiki ki̱leki̱ye osaaluuwe otiyo na bantu baawe aba waahi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ na bu̱toki̱ bwawe kandi mukono ghwawe ghwamaani̱?
Banami̱si̱li̱ bakughila bati, ‘Luhanga aahi̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu Mi̱si̱li̱ niikuwo agubhe kubaatila mu myena kandi kubamala munsi.’ Gutu oleke kusaaliluwa otiyo kandi otafubila bantu baawe aba.

Oosuke baheeleli̱ya baawe Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo. Oosuke eki waalahiiye ewaabo ngoku okukani̱ya baasukulu baabo nga nsooli̱ya syʼomu mwanya. Okalaghi̱i̱sani̱ya ngoku baasukulu baabo bakutwala nsi eghi nga bugwetuwa bwabo bilo nʼebilo.”
aahindula byeli̱li̱kano biye, ataahwelekeeleli̱ya bantu be aba ngoku aabaagha abu̱ghi̱ye.
Musa aakota ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghu, akwete mu ngalo bihande bibili bya mabaale ebihandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo ndaghaano. Bihande bya mabaale ebi bikaba bihandi̱i̱ki̱ye haa mpande syombi.
Bihande bya mabaale ebi Luhanga eenini niiye akabibhaaka kandi aahandiikʼo bilaghilo na mukono ghuwe.
Obu Yosuwa aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku bantu bakwete ku̱bu̱gha nʼelaka lyamaani̱, aaghila Musa ati, “Ni̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye elaka lya bulemo hambali bantu baghooneeye.”
Bhaatu Musa aamughila ati, “Eli talili elaka lya bu̱si̱ngu̱li̱ kedha elaka lya ku̱si̱ngu̱wa, bhaatu ni̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye elaka lya bantu abakwete kulimba.”

Obu Musa eebi̱ngi̱ye hambali bantu aba baghooneeye kandi naabona kyana kya nte eki na bantu abakwete ku̱bi̱na, aasaaliluwa kwonini. Musa aakuba hansi bihande bya mabaale ebi mu nti̱na ya mwena oghu kandi aabyatakaki̱ya.
Aakwata kyana kya nte eki baakoli̱ye, aakyoki̱ya mu mulilo kandi aakisiya kyafooka tu̱u̱tu̱. Aaseesa tu̱u̱tu̱ eghi mu maasi kandi aalaghila Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba kughanuwa.
Musa aaghila Alooni̱ ati, “Bantu aba baaku̱koli̱ye ki kubaleetʼo kibhi kyamaani̱ kitiyo?”
Alooni̱ aaghila Musa ati, “Wai̱tu̱, otasaaliluwa munu otiyo. Omani̱ye ngoku bantu aba bakukolagha bwangu bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
Bantu aba niibo bangi̱li̱ye bati, ‘Otukolele bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga aaniibiyo byaghendagha bituhikiiye, nanga Musa oghu akatuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ tatumani̱ye hambali ali.’

Nahabweki naabaghila nti, ‘Muntu weena oghu alu̱wete mu matui mpete ya feeja aaghiiyemu kandi aghindeetele.’ Baasiiyamu kandi baasindeetela, du̱mbi̱ naasikuba mu mulilo, syalu̱ghamu kyana kya nte kini.”
Obu Musa aamani̱ye ngoku Alooni̱ aaleteli̱i̱je bantu aba kufooka ntaaghu̱wa, abataakugubha kwelinda kandi kuleka ngi̱ghu̱ syabo nsibasekeelela,
du̱mbi̱ Musa eemilila haa geeti̱ ya hambali bantu aba baghooneeye kandi aabu̱gha nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Muntu weena oghu ali haa luhande lwa
aase hambali ndi.” Bantu boona bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ baasa hambali ali.
Musa aaghila bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ aba ati, “

Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ akwete kughila ati, ‘Bu̱li̱ muntu akwate kihiyo kiye, mughende hoona hambali bantu aba baghooneeye, mu̱lu̱ghaghe haa geeti̱ emui mughendaghe haa geeti̱ enji. Bu̱li̱ muntu aate mwana waa ni̱na wee, bhootu̱ siye kandi muliilanuwa wee.’ ”
Bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ aba baakola ngoku Musa aabalaghiiye. Kilo eki baata bantu nku̱mi̱ esatu.
Musa aabaghila ati, “Obwalo mwehaayeyo ku̱heeleli̱ya
, nanga bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we aatu̱u̱yemu kwita mutabani̱ wee kedha mwana waa ni̱na wee, nahabweki obwalo aabahaaye mu̱gi̱sa.”
Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo Musa aaghila bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Mwakoli̱ye kibhi kyamaani̱. Bhaatu nkukuuka ewaa
kulola nkaakuba ndi nʼeki nkugubha kukola eye kubaghanila kibhi kyanu.”
Nahabweki Musa aakuuka ewaa
aamughila ati, “Bantu aba baakoli̱ye kibhi kyamaani̱. Beekoleeye baaluhanga baa feeja.
Gutu, nkwesengeleei̱ye obaghanile kibhi kyabo eki, bhaatu nuwaabhengi̱ye, onjiye mu kitabo eki ohandi̱i̱ki̱yemu mali̱i̱na ghaa bantu baawe.”
aaghila Musa ati, “Muntu weena oghu aasi̱i̱si̱ye ewanje, niiye nkuuya mu kitabo kyanje.
Bhaatu oghende ohikile bantu aba kandi obatwale mu ki̱i̱kalo eki naakughambiiye. Malai̱ka wanje akughenda akuhikiiye. Bhaatu bwile bu̱ku̱hi̱ka obu nkufubila bantu aba haabwa kibhi kyabo.”
aaha bantu aba kifubilo kya ndwala, nanga ebo kulami̱ya kisasani̱ kya kyana kya nte eki Alooni̱ aakoli̱ye.
aaghila Musa ati, “Olu̱ghe hani, na bantu waahi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱, oghende mu nsi eghi naalahiiye kuha Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo na baasukulu baabo.
Nkutuma malai̱ka kukuhikila kandi nkuleka obhinge mu nsi eghi Banakanaani̱, Bamooli̱, Bahi̱ti̱, Bapeleeji̱, Bahi̱vi̱ na Bayebu̱si̱.
Oghende mu nsi eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki, bhaatu tankughenda naanu, nangubahwelekeeleli̱ya mu kihanda, nanga muli bantu ntaaghu̱wa.”
Obu bantu aba baaghu̱u̱ye bighambo bisaakaaye ebi, beeghunga kandi baaleka ku̱lu̱waala bukwanji bwabo kwoleka ngoku basaaluuwe kwonini.
Nanga

akaba naaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Oghile bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Muli bantu ntaaghu̱wa, ninaaghendi̱ye naanu bwile bukee bwonkaha, nkubahwelekeeleli̱ya. Nahabweki mwehiyemu bintu bisemeeye ebi mu̱lu̱weete, niikuwo ndole eki nkubakolela.’ ”
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱ghi̱ye haa mwena Holebbu, tabaatodhi̱ye balu̱wala bintu bisemeeye ebi.
Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakaghoonagha mu ki̱i̱kalo, Musa aatwalagha weema kandi aghikwela enja ya hambali baghooneeye, hambali haseli̱yʼo kandi aaghila ati, “Eni ni weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu na
.” Muntu weena aakabaagha ali nʼeki akubbala kwebu̱u̱li̱yʼo
, aaghendagha mu weema eghi.

Bwile bwona, Musa aakabaagha naalu̱gha hambali bantu aba baghooneeye kughenda mu weema eghi, bantu boona baamuka kandi bu̱li̱ muntu aamilila haa mulyango ghwa weema yee, baakala bamu̱loli̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ataahi̱ye mu weema eghi.
Musa aakataahagha mu weema eghi, mpaghi ya kicu esu̱ndu̱ka yeemilila haa mulyango ghwa weema eghi kandi
aatandika ku̱bu̱gha na Musa.
Bantu aba boona baakabonagha mpaghi ya kicu yeemiliiye haa mulyango ghwa weema eghi, boona baamuka kandi bu̱li̱ muntu atandika kulami̱li̱ya haa mulyango ghwa weema yee.

aabu̱ghagha na Musa ngoku muntu aku̱bu̱ghagha na bhootu̱ siye. Musa aakakuukagha hambali bantu baghooneeye, mutabhana Yosuwa oghu aamukoonelagha haa mulimo, mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, ati̱ghala haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Musa aaghila
ati, “Olole, nuuwe okangila oti, ‘Otwale bantu aba,’ bhaatu tawangambiiye oghu okutuma kughenda nanje. Okangila oti, ‘Omani̱ye si̱ye kandi nkukolagha ebi̱ku̱dheedhi̱ye.’
Nahabweki nkaakuba ninkukolagha ebi̱ku̱dheedhi̱ye, onjoleke bikoluwa byawe, niikuwo nkumanye kandi neeyongele kukola ebi̱ku̱dheedhi̱ye. Oosuke ngoku waakomi̱ye bantu bani kuba ehanga lyawe.”
aaghila ati, “Nkughenda naawe kandi nkukuha kuhuumula.”
Musa aaghila
ati, “Okaakuba otaakughenda naatu, otatu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya ku̱lu̱gha hani.

Buuye otaaghendi̱ye naatu, bantu bakumanya bati̱ya ngoku si̱ye na bantu baawe tukukolagha ebi̱ku̱dheedhi̱ye? Nkintu ki kinji ekikwoleka ngu si̱ye na bantu baawe tuli baa mbaghani̱ja na bantu banji boona bʼomu nsi?”
aaghila Musa ati, “Kintu eki waabu̱ghi̱ye kyonini niikiyo nkukola, nanga okukolagha ebi̱ndheedhi̱ye kandi nkumani̱ye kwonini.”
Musa aaghila ati, “Gutu onjoleke ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyawe.”
aaghila ati, “Nkusaalila mu maaso ghaawe obone bulungi bwanje bwona kandi nkukughambila li̱i̱na lyanje. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
. Nkughilila ngughuma oghu mbbali̱ye kughilila ngughuma kandi nkughilila kisa oghu mbbali̱ye kughilila kisa.
Bhaatu tookumbona haali̱i̱so, nanga muntu namboone taakuukala ali mwomi̱i̱li̱.”
aatodha aaghila ati, “Haai nanje haliyo kikuka, oghende weemilile haa kikuka eki.
Obu nkuba ninsaala mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyanje, nkukuta hambali kikuka kyati̱ki̱ye kandi nku̱ku̱swi̱ki̱la na mukono ghwanje, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nimali̱ye kusaala.
Du̱mbi̱ nkuuyʼo mukono ghwanje obone mughongo ghwanje, bhaatu tookumbona haali̱i̱so.”

aaghila Musa ati, “Obhaake bihande bibili bya mabaale ebi̱su̱si̱ye ngʼebi waadu̱bhi̱ye kubhaaka. Nkuhandiikʼo bighambo ngʼebi naadu̱bhi̱ye kuhandiika haa bihande bibili bya mabaale byʼoku̱du̱bha ebi waatakaki̱i̱ye.
Munkiya nkyambisi weeteekani̱je kandi oni̱i̱ne haa mwena Si̱naai̱ kandi kwisa kunsanga-sangaana haa haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena oghu.
Muntu nʼomui ataasa naawe kandi muntu nʼomui ataboneka haa mwena oghu. Otasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya ntaama, mbu̱li̱ kedha nte kuliila haai na mwena oghu.”
Nahabweki Musa aabhaaka bihande bibili bya mabaale nga byʼoku̱du̱bha. Aamuka nkyambisi cu̱i̱ kandi aani̱i̱na haa mwena Si̱naai̱, ngoku
aamulaghiiye. Aaghenda akwete mu ngalo bihande bibili bya mabaale ebi.
aasu̱ndi̱ki̱la mu kicu kandi eemilila haai na Musa, aamughambila ngoku li̱i̱na liye aniiye
aasaalila mu maaso ghaa Musa naalangilila ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga oghu ali na kisa kandi ngughuma. Tankusaaliluwagha bwangu, ndi na kukunda kwamaani̱ kandi bwesighibuwa.

Nkughililagha kukunda kwamaani̱ nku̱mi̱ na nku̱mi̱ sya bantu kandi nkughanilagha bantu bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi bakukolagha, nsobi̱ syabo na kibhi. Bhaatu nkufubilagha baana haabwa bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi beesebo bakukolagha ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa mujo ghwakasatu na ghwakanaa ghwa baasukulu baabo.”
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aalangaala bwangu hansi makpu̱ngbu̱ kandi aatandika kulami̱ya.
Aaghila ati, “Ai̱

nkaakuba ninkukolagha ebi̱ku̱dheedhi̱ye, gutu oghende naatu, nankabha bantu aba bali ntaaghu̱wa, otughanile bikoluwa byatu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye na kibhi kyatu kandi otu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye kuba bugwetuwa bwawe.”
aaghila ati, “Ndimakola ndaghaano na Banai̱saaleeli̱. Nkukola byakuswekani̱ya byamaani̱ banaloli̱ye ebitakakoluwagha mu bantu baa munsi yoona. Bantu boona bakubona byakuswekani̱ya ebi si̱ye
nkukola nanga nkughenda kukola kintu haabwanu ekikuleka bantu boona boobahe.
Okwate ebi nkukulaghila obwalo kandi nkubhinga onaloli̱ye Bamooli̱, Banakanaani̱, Bahi̱ti̱, Bapeleeji̱, Bahi̱vi̱ na Bayebu̱si̱.
Weeghendeseleje kandi otakola ndaghaano ya bu̱si̱nge na bantu abaakaaye mu nsi hambali okughenda, nanga ekufookela ki̱ki̱ya.
Mugenge hansi byakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byabo, muhenange mpaghi sya baaluhanga baabo kandi mujombakake mpaghi sya luhanga wabukali̱ Asela.
Otalilami̱ya luhanga onji, nanga
oghu li̱i̱na liye aniiye Etima, ni Luhanga wʼetima.

“Otakola ndaghaano ya bu̱si̱nge na bantu abaakaaye mu nsi eghi, nanga mbaabaaye mbeefoola baamalaaya mu kulami̱ya baaluhanga baabo kandi mbabahongela bihonguwa, bakukubilikila kuliya haa byokuliya ebi bahongeeye baaluhanga baabo.

Batabani̱ baawe banguswela bahala baa bantu aba kandi bakali̱ baabo aba mbabaaye mbeefoola baamalaaya mu kulami̱ya baaluhanga baabo, bakugubha kusoona-soona batabani̱ baawe kufooka baamalaaya mu kulami̱ya baaluhanga baabo aba.
“Otalyekolela baaluhanga ku̱lu̱gha mu byoma.

“Okolaghe Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Migaati̱ Etalimu Ki̱tu̱mbi̱so. Haa bwile obu oliyaghe migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so haabwa bilo musanju̱ ngoku naakulaghiiye. Okolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ eki haa bwile bwakiyo bwonini mu kweli̱ kwa Abi̱bu̱, nanga mu kweli̱ oku niibuwo waalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱.
“Bu̱li̱ mwana waanu wabusaasa mu̱li̱ghaaso alabaagha wanje, na mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya nte, ntaama na mbu̱li̱ syanu.

Mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwabusaasa ghwa kyana kya ndogooi̱ mukisasuulilaghe nimuhonga kyana kya ntaama. Bhaatu kaakuba mutakola eki, mukihende bikiya. Muli na kusasula haabwa baana baanu baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso.
“Hatabʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akwisa mu maaso ghanje atali na kantu.
“Oli na bilo mukaagha bya kukola milimo yaawe, bhaatu haa kilo kyamusanju̱ oli na kuhuumula. Kilo eki mu bwile bwa kukola na bwa kukesa oli na kuhuumula.
“Mukolaghe Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kukesa, nimuleeta mughanulo ghwa ngano mwakesi̱ye kandi mukolaghe Ki̱ghenu̱ kya kulaala mu Bujalaja haa kumaliilila kwa kukesa bu̱li̱ mwaka.
Baana baawe baabusaasa boona baasaghe milundi esatu bu̱li̱ mwaka mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱.
Nkuleka obhinge bantu bʼomu mahanga agha kandi nkugbaatikani̱ya mitaano yaawe. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akwekumbula nsi yaawe, obu olabaagha oghendi̱ye mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe milundi esatu mu mwaka.
“Otampongelagha saghama ya kihonguwa kyanje na migaati̱ elimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, kedha kubiika haa byokuliya bya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi.
“Oleetaghe mughanulo ghwa bilimuwa byawe mu numba ya
Luhanga waawe.
“Kyana kya mbu̱li̱ otali̱ki̱teeki̱ya mati̱i̱ti̱ ghaa ni̱naakiyo.”
aaghila Musa ati, “Ohandiike bighambo ebi naakughambiiye, nanga niibiyo ndaghaano eghi naakoli̱ye naawe na Banai̱saaleeli̱.”
Mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, Musa aakala na
haa mwena bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa mukilo na ntangaali̱. Ataakuliya byokuliya kedha kunuwa maasi kandi aahandiika haa bihande bibili bya mabaale bighambo bya ndaghaano eghi, bilaghilo eku̱mi̱.

Musa aatandika kukota ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena Si̱naai̱, akwete mu ngalo bihande bibili bya mabaale ebihandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo ndaghaano, ataamanya ngoku haali̱i̱so yee akwete kubbebbeniya, haabwa bwile aamali̱ye naabu̱gha na Luhanga.
Obu Alooni̱ na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baaboone Musa kandi mbaabona haali̱i̱so yee naabbebbeniya, du̱mbi̱ boobaha kumwebinga.
Bhaatu Musa aababilikila, du̱mbi̱ Alooni̱ na beebembeli̱ boona baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghenda hambali ali kandi aatandika ku̱bu̱gha nabo.
Niibuwo Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baasi̱ye hambali Musa ali kandi aabalaghila byona ebi
aamughambiiye haa mwena Si̱naai̱.
Obu Musa aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha na bantu aba, aaswi̱ki̱la haali̱i̱so yee na kitambaala.
Musa aakaghendagha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu ku̱bu̱gha na
, aayagha kitambaala eki haali̱i̱so yee ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aalu̱ghi̱yeyo. Du̱mbi̱ aaghambila Banai̱saaleeli̱ ebi
aamulaghiiye.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakabonagha Musa naabbebbeniya haali̱i̱so, du̱mbi̱ eeswi̱ki̱la kitambaala haali̱i̱so, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya atodhi̱ye kukuuka mu weema eghi ku̱bu̱gha na
Musa aakumaani̱ya ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱, aabaghila ati, “Bini niibiyo bintu ebi
aabalaghiiye kukola.
Muli na bilo mukaagha bya kukola milimo yaanu, bhaatu kilo kyamusanju̱ kilabaagha kilo kya Sabhato kya kuhuumula kandi ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
. Muntu weena oghu alakolagha mulimo haa kilo eki aatibuwaghe.
Mutali̱tu̱mi̱ka mulilo mu maka ghaanu haa kilo kya Sabhato.”
Musa aaghila ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Kini niikiyo kintu eki
aabalaghiiye kukola.
Muheyo kisembo ewaa
. Muntu weena oghu ali na mutima ghwa bwenge, aleete kisembo kya
: feeja, siliva, bbu̱looji̱,
mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku, lughoye lusemeeye, byoha bya mbu̱li̱,
mpu siimutuku sya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama, mpu sya mbu̱li̱, mbaau sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo,
mafu̱ta ghaa kuta mu taala, bintu bisasi̱ye bya kuta mu mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha, bubbani̱ busasi̱ye,
mabaale onika na mabaale ghanji ghaa muhendo, ghaa kuta haa efodi̱ na kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha.
“Muntu weena oghu amani̱ye kukola bintu bya ngalo, aase tukole bintu byona ebi
aalaghiiye:
weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na byaku̱ghi̱swi̱ki̱la, bigwasi byayʼo, fuleemu syayʼo, mikiiko yayo, mpaghi syayʼo, ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi,
sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, mpaghi syayʼo, kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi, kateni̱ ya kuta mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi,
meeja na mpaghi syayʼo, na byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona, mugaati̱ ghwa kuhongela Luhanga,
kyakutʼo taala na byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona, taala syakiyo na mafu̱ta ghaakuta mu taala esi,
kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱ na mpaghi syakiyo, mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha, bubbani̱ busasi̱ye, kateni̱ ya kuta haa mulyango ghwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye,
kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye, kati̱mba kaakiyo kaa bbu̱looji̱, mpaghi syakiyʼo, byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona, bbaafu ya bbu̱looji̱ na kyakughitʼo,
kateni̱ sya kukola lugho lwa jighati̱, mpaghi sya jighati̱ eghi, ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi esi, kateni̱ ya kuta haa geeti̱ ya jighati̱,
nkondo sya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nkondo sya jighati̱ na mighuwo yasiyo,

bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱koleeu̱we kulungi bya bahongi̱ ku̱lu̱waalagha mbakola mulimo mu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱ na bi̱lu̱waalo bya batabani̱ be balalu̱waalagha mbaheeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱.”
Du̱mbi̱ ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyalu̱gha hambali Musa ali kandi kyaghenda.
Bu̱li̱ muntu aaghenda kandi aakola ngoku mutima ghuwe ghwamughambiiye. Baaleetela
bisembo bya kukola mulimo ghwa kukwela weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, milimo yayo yoona na bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya bu̱hongi̱.
Bakali̱ na basaasa beehaayo kandi baaleeta bintu bisemeeye bya feeja, bigwasi, mpete syʼomu matui, mpete syʼomu byala na bikwanji byʼomu bikiya, baabihaayo ewaa
Muntu weena oghu akaba ali na lughoye lwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku kedha lughoye lusemeeye, byoha bya mbu̱li̱, mpu siimutuku sya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama na mpu sya mbu̱li̱, byona baabileeta.
Muntu weena oghu aagubhagha kuleeta kisembo kya siliva kedha bbu̱looji̱ aakihaayo nga kisembo ewaa
. Muntu oghu akaba ali na mbaau sisemeeye sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo sya kukola mulimo aasileeta.
Bakali̱ boona abaabaagha bamani̱ye kukola kulungi milimo ya ngalo, baaluka bintu ebi baagu̱bhi̱ye kandi baabileeta, bintu bya langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye.
Bakali̱ boona abaabaagha bamani̱ye kukola ngoye mu byoha bya mbu̱li̱, baasikola badheedheeu̱we.
Beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱, baaleeta mabaale onika na mabaale ghaa muhendo, ghaa kuta haa efodi̱ na kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha.
Baaleeta bintu bisasi̱ye na mafu̱ta ghaa kuta mu taala, mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha na bubbani̱ busasi̱ye.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona, bakali̱ na basaasa, abaabaagha na mutima ghwa kuhaayo kintu kyona haabwa mulimo oghu
aalaghiiye Musa kukola, baabileeta kandi baabihaayo ewaa
nga kisembo badheedheeu̱we.
Musa aaghila Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “
aakomi̱ye Bbejaleeli̱ mutabani̱ wa U̱li̱, muusukulu wa Hula, wʼomu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da.
Luhanga aaleki̱ye Mwoyo wee aamwisʼo kwonini, aamuha magheji, kwetegheeleli̱ya kandi aamufoola oghu amani̱ye kukola bintu bya ngalo.
Akugubha kukola bintu bisemeeye ku̱lu̱gha mu feeja, siliva na bbu̱looji̱.
Akugubha kubhaaka mabaale kandi kughata mu buufuleemu bwa feeja, kulanda mbaau kandi kukola bu̱li̱ mulimo ghwona ghwa ngalo.
aahaaye Bbejaleeli̱ na Oholi̱yaabbu mutabani̱ wa Ahisamaki̱ wʼomu ntu̱la ya Daani̱, magheji ghaa kwegheesi̱ya bantu banji.

Aabahaaye magheji ghaa kukola bintu bya ngalo, kuteela bisasani̱, kusona kulungi ngoye kandi kutaamu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku kandi kukola lughoye lusemeeye. Bakugubha kukola bintu bikani̱ye.
“Nahabweki Bbejaleeli̱, Oholi̱yaabbu na bu̱li̱ musaasa oghu
aahaaye magheji kandi kwetegheeleli̱ya kwa kumanya ngoku bakukola mulimo ghwa kukwela ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, baasa kukola mulimo ngoku
aalaghiiye.”
Niibuwo Musa aabilikiiye Bbejaleeli̱ na Oholi̱yaabbu na bu̱li̱ musaasa oghu
aahaaye magheji kandi oghu aabbali̱ye kwisa kukola mulimo oghu.

Musa aaha bantu aba bisembo byona ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ baahaayeyo haabwa kukola mulimo ghwa kukwela ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Bu̱li̱ kilo nkyambisi Banai̱saaleeli̱ beeyongela kuleetela Musa bisembo byabo badheedheeu̱we.
Nahabweki bantu boona abaabaagha na magheji ghaa kukwela ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye baalu̱gha haa milimo eghi baakolagha.
Baaghila Musa bati, “Bantu niibuwo baaleeta bintu bikani̱ye kusaali̱ya ebi tukwetaaghisibuwa haabwa mulimo oghu
aatulaghiiye kukola.”

Musa aalaghila bantu aba kughambila bantu boona hambali baghooneeye bati, “Hatabʼo musaasa weena kedha mukali̱ oghu akutodha kuhaayo kisembo kya kukola mulimo ghwa kukwela ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.” Nahabweki baatanga bantu kutodha kuhaayo bisembo ebi.
Ebi bantu aba baabaagha mbaahaayeyo bikaba bisaaye haa ebyetaaghisibuwagha kukola mulimo oghu.

Abaabaagha bamani̱ye kukola mulimo oghu, baakwela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na kateni̱ eku̱mi̱ sya lughoye lusemeeye kandi mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo na mutuku. Mu̱soni̱ mulungi aasonela haa kateni̱ esi bisasani̱ bya bakelu̱bbi̱.
Kateni̱ esi syona syengana-ngana, kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta eku̱mi̱ nʼebili kandi kugbaatikana mi̱ta ebili.
Bakoli̱ aba baakwatani̱ya kateni̱ etaano hamui, na sinji kateni̱ etaano baasikwatani̱ya hamui.
Baakola mpete sya lughoye maku̱mi̱ ataano mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱ kandi baasita haa mukughilo ghwa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila haa kateni̱ etaano esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui.

Baata mpete sya lughoye maku̱mi̱ ataano haa mukughilo ghwa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila haa kateni̱ etaano esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui, na mpete sya lughoye sinji maku̱mi̱ ataano haa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila haa kateni̱ sinji etaano esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui kandi syalolana.
Baakola bigwasi maku̱mi̱ ataano bya feeja kandi baabi̱koleesi̱ya kukwatani̱ya hamui kateni̱ esi kandi yaaba weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye emui.
Baakola dhee kateni̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼemui mu byoha bya mbu̱li̱ sya ku̱swi̱ki̱la weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Kujamba kwa bu̱li̱ kateni̱ kwaba mi̱ta eku̱mi̱ nʼesatu kandi kugbaatikana kwaba mi̱ta ebili. Kateni̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼemui esi syona syengana-ngaana.
Kateni̱ etaano baasikwatani̱ya syonkaha, na sinji mukaagha baasikwatani̱ya syonkaha.

Baata mpete sya lughoye maku̱mi̱ ataano haa mukughilo ghwa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila haa kateni̱ etaano esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui na mpete sya lughoye maku̱mi̱ ataano haa mukughilo ghwa kateni̱ yʼokumaliilila haa kateni̱ mukaagha esikwatani̱i̱ye hamui.
Baakola bigwasi maku̱mi̱ ataano bya bbu̱looji̱ kandi baabita mu mpete sya lughoye kukwatani̱ya weema eghi, niikuwo ebe weema emui.
Baakola bintu binji bibili bya ku̱swi̱ki̱la weema eghi, kimui ku̱lu̱gha mu mpu siimutuku sya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama na kinji ku̱lu̱gha mu mpu sya mbu̱li̱.
Baakola fuleemu sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo sya kwemi̱li̱li̱yʼo weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Kujamba kwa bu̱li̱ fuleemu kwaba fu̱u̱ti̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼetaano kandi kugbaatikana kwaba fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu.
Bu̱li̱ fuleemu baaghikolela nkondo ebili sya kuta hansi yayo, kusikwatani̱ya. Fuleemu syona sya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi niikuwo baasi̱koli̱ye batiyo.
Baakola fuleemu maku̱mi̱ abili sya kuta haa luhande lwa eku̱wa lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Baakola ncuba maku̱mi̱ anaa sya siliva sya kutaamu fuleemu maku̱mi̱ abili esi kandi baata ncuba ebili hansi ya bu̱li̱ fuleemu kukwata nkondo syayʼo ebili.
Baakola fuleemu maku̱mi̱ abili sya kuta haa luhande lwʼelughulu lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Baakola ncuba maku̱mi̱ anaa sya siliva, ncuba ebili sya kuta hansi ya bu̱li̱ fuleemu.
Baakola fuleemu mukaagha sya kuta enu̱ma ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi haa luhande lwa bughuwa ejooba.
Baakola fuleemu ebili sya kuta haa nsondo ku̱gu̱mi̱ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Fuleemu ebili esi baasikwatani̱ya ku̱lu̱gha hansi ku̱hi̱ka elughulu kandi baasikwatani̱ya na mpete emui. Baakola batiyo fuleemu syombi syʼomu nsondo ebili.
Baakola fuleemu munaanaa na ncuba sya siliva eku̱mi̱ na mukaagha sya kutaamu fuleemu esi kandi ncuba ebili hansi ya bu̱li̱ fuleemu.
Baakola mikiiko etaano mu ki̱i̱lu̱mbo, ya kukwatani̱ya fuleemu sya luhande lwʼelughulu lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.

Baakola mikiiko etaano ya kukwatani̱ya fuleemu sya luhande lwʼeku̱wa lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mikiiko etaano ya kukwatani̱ya fuleemu sya luhande lwa bughuwa ejooba bwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Mukiiko ghwa fuleemu ghwa kuta haagati ya fuleemu esi ghwalu̱gha haa luhande lumui ku̱hi̱ka haa luhande lunji.
Fuleemu esi baasi̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja kandi baakola mpete syasiyo sya feeja sya kukwata mikiiko kandi mikiiko eghi baaghi̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja.
Baakola kateni̱ mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku, na lughoye lusemeeye kandi baasonelʼo kulungi bisasani̱ bya bakelu̱bbi̱.
Baaghikolela mpaghi enaa sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi baasi̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja. Ndobhaani̱ sya mpaghi esi baasikola mu feeja kandi baakola ncuba enaa sya siliva sya kutaamu mpaghi esi.
Haa mulyango ghwa weema eghi, baatʼo kateni̱ ya langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku, na lughoye lusemeeye kandi eghi mu̱soni̱ mulungi akoli̱ye.

Kateni̱ eghi baaghikolela mpaghi etaano sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi baasi̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja. Ndobhaani̱ sya ku̱dhodhooki̱yʼo kateni̱ syaba sya feeja kandi mpaghi esi baasita mu ncuba etaano sya bbu̱looji̱.

Bbejaleeli̱ aakola sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano mu mbaau sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo. Kujamba kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ esatu na i̱nci̱ mwenda, kugbaatikana kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu kandi kukangama kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu.
Aaghi̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja esemeeye mukati na haagu̱u̱li̱ kandi aaghyeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya yoona na mugoma ghwa feeja.
Aaghikolela mpete enaa sya feeja kandi aasita haa maghulu anaa ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi, mpete ebili aasita haa luhande lumui kandi mpete ebili aasita haa luhande lunji.
Aakola mpaghi enaa mu mbaau sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi aasi̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja.
Mpaghi esi aasikwami̱ya mu mpete esili haa mpande syombi sya sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi kughiheekelaghʼo.
Aakola kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi mu feeja esemeeye. Kujamba kwakiyo fu̱u̱ti̱ esatu na i̱nci̱ mwenda kandi kugbaatikana fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu.
Aawiisa na nondo bakelu̱bbi̱ babili baa feeja kandi aabata haa mpande syombi sya kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi.

Kelu̱bbi̱ omui aamuta haa luhande lumui kandi onji aamuta haa luhande lunji. Feeja yoonini eghi aakoleeseei̱ye kukola kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi, haaliiyo aaghi̱koleesi̱ya dhee kukola bakelu̱bbi̱ aba.
Bakelu̱bbi̱ aba baala mapapa ghaabo eghulu ya kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi ku̱ki̱swi̱ki̱la. Baakala balolaane kandi baloli̱ye haa kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi.
Bbejaleeli̱ aakola meeja mu mbaau sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo, kujamba kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ esatu, kugbaatikana kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ emui na i̱nci̱ mukaagha, kukangama kwayʼo fu̱u̱ti̱ ebili na i̱nci̱ esatu.
Aaghi̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja esemeeye kandi aaghitʼo mugoma ghwa feeja.
Aaghyeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya mu maakpengbu̱ na fuleemu ya i̱nci̱ esatu kandi aatʼo mugoma ghwa feeja.
Aaghikolela mpete enaa sya feeja kandi aasita haa nsondo syayʼo enaa, haa maghulu ghaayʼo anaa.
Mpete esi aasita haai na mugoma ghwa meeja eghi kandi kukwatagha mpaghi sya kuheekelaghʼo meeja eghi.
Aakola mpaghi sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo sya kuheekelaghʼo meeja eghi kandi aasi̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja.
Aakola mu feeja esemeeye bintu byaku̱koleesi̱ya haa meeja eghi: sahaani̱, bibindi bya kuheekelamu bubbani̱, bbaaku̱li̱ na jaaga bya kutaamu bihonguwa byakunuwa.
Aakola kyakutʼo taala mu feeja esemeeye. Aawiisa na nondo kyakutʼo taala eki kyona, otaayemu bimole byakiyo byaku̱ki̱semeli̱ya mu feeja eghi yoonini.
Kyakutʼo taala eki kyaba na matai mukaagha aghalu̱ghi̱ye haa ki̱ti̱na kya haagati, matai asatu haa luhande lumui na ghanji asatu haa luhande lunji.
Bu̱li̱ etai haa matai mukaagha ghaa kyakutʼo taala eki, aabʼo bimole bisatu ebi̱su̱si̱ye bimole bya kiti alu̱mondi̱.
Haa ki̱ti̱na kya haagati ya kyakutʼo taala eki, aabʼo bimole bbinaa ebi̱su̱si̱ye bimole bya kiti alu̱mondi̱.
Hansi ya bu̱li̱ matai abili aghalu̱ghi̱ye haa ki̱ti̱na kya kyakutʼo taala eki, aatʼo kimole eki̱su̱si̱ye kimole kya kiti alu̱mondi̱.
Aawiisa na nondo kyakutʼo taala eki, otaayemu matai ghaakiyo na bimole byakiyo byaku̱ki̱semeli̱ya, mu feeja esemeeye eghi yoonini.
Aakola taala musanju̱ sya feeja, makaasi ghaasiyo na buusaniya mu feeja esemeeye.
Kyakutʼo taala eki na bintu byakiyo byona aabikola mu ki̱lo maku̱mi̱ asatu nʼetaano sya feeja esemeeye.

Aakola kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱ mu ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi kyona kyengana-ngana. Kujamba kwakiyo fu̱u̱ti̱ emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke, kugbaatikana fu̱u̱ti̱ emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke kandi kukangama fu̱u̱ti̱ esatu. Mahembe ghaakiyo anaa ghaalu̱gha mu ki̱twi̱ke eki kyonini.
Aaki̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja esemeeye haagu̱u̱li̱ yakiyo, haa mpande syakiyo syona na haa mahembe ghaakiyo kandi aakyeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya na mugoma ghwa feeja.
Aakikolela mpete ebili sya feeja kandi aasita hansi ya mugoma ghwa feeja haa mpande ebili mu maakpengbu̱ hambali bakuta mpaghi esi balakiheekelaghʼo.
Mpaghi esi aasikola mu ki̱i̱lu̱mbo kandi aasi̱swi̱ki̱la na feeja.
Aakola dhee mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha ghahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na bubbani̱ busasi̱ye bwa ku̱tu̱mi̱ka. Bintu ebi aabikola kusemeeye nga muntu oghu abimani̱ye kwonini akukolagha.

Aakola kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya kuhongelʼo kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye mu ki̱i̱lu̱mbo. Kyona kyengana-ngana, kujamba kwakiyo fu̱u̱ti̱ musanju̱ nʼeki̱twi̱ke, kugbaatikana fu̱u̱ti̱ musanju̱ nʼeki̱twi̱ke kandi kukangama fu̱u̱ti̱ enaa nʼeki̱twi̱ke.
Aakikolela mahembe kandi haa bu̱li̱ nsondo syakiyo enaa aatʼo ehembe limui. Mahembe agha aaghakola mu ki̱twi̱ke kya kiti eki kyonini kandi aaki̱swi̱ki̱la na bbu̱looji̱.
Aakola byaku̱koleesi̱ya haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki: capu̱li̱ya sya kutaamu ki̱bu̱, bi̱ti̱i̱yo, bibindi, huuma na capu̱li̱ya sya ku̱tu̱mi̱kamu mulilo, bintu ebi byona aabikola mu bbu̱looji̱.
Aakola kati̱mba kaa bbu̱looji̱, aakakoti̱ya mukati hansi ya mugoma ghwa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi kahi̱ke haagati yakiyo.
Aakola mpete enaa sya bbu̱looji̱ kandi aata emui haa bu̱li̱ nsondo emui ya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki, haa nsondo syakiyo enaa sya kutaamu mpaghi sya kukiheekelʼo.
Aakola mpaghi sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo sya kuheekelaghʼo kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki kandi aasi̱swi̱ki̱la na bbu̱looji̱.
Mpaghi esi aasikwami̱ya mu mpete esili haa mpande ebili sya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki niikuwo bakiheekelaghʼo. Kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki, aakikola mu mbaau kandi mukati yakiyo haabaamu mwanya.
Aakola bbaafu ya bbu̱looji̱ na kyakughitʼo kya bbu̱looji̱. Aabikola mu ndebelwamu sya bakali̱ abaaheeleli̱yagha haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Aakola jighati̱ ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Haa luhande lwa eku̱wa lwa weema eghi aatʼo kateni̱ sya lughoye lusemeeye, kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta maku̱mi̱ anaa nʼenaa.
Mpaghi maku̱mi̱ abili sya kateni̱ esi na ncuba sya kusitaamu maku̱mi̱ abili byona byaba bya bbu̱looji̱, bhaatu ndobhaani̱ sya mpaghi esi na mpete syasiyo byaba bya siliva.

Haa luhande lwa elughulu, aatʼo kateni̱ kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta maku̱mi̱ anaa nʼenaa, mpaghi maku̱mi̱ abili sya kutʼo kateni̱ esi na ncuba maku̱mi̱ abili sya kutaamu mpaghi esi byaba bya bbu̱looji̱, bhaatu ndobhaani̱ sya mpaghi esi na mpete syasiyo byaba bya siliva.

Haa luhande lwa bughuwa ejooba, aatʼo kateni̱ kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta maku̱mi̱ abili nʼebili kandi aasita haa mpaghi eku̱mi̱ esili mu ncuba eku̱mi̱. Bhaatu mpete na ndobhaani̱ sya mpaghi esi byaba bya siliva.
Haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, kujamba kwa jighati̱ kwaba mi̱ta maku̱mi̱ abili nʼebili.
Kateni̱ sya kuta haa luhande lumui lwa mulyango, kujamba kwasiyo kwaba mi̱ta mukaagha nʼeki̱twi̱ke kandi aasita haa mpaghi esatu esili mu ncuba esatu.
Haa luhande lunji lwa geeti̱ ya jighati̱ eghi, aatʼo kateni̱ kujamba kwasiyo mi̱ta mukaagha nʼeki̱twi̱ke kandi aasita haa mpaghi esatu esili mu ncuba esatu.
Kateni̱ syona esi aataaye mu jighati̱ eghi sikaba si̱koleeu̱we kusemeeye mu lughoye lusemeeye.
Ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi esi sikaba sili sya bbu̱looji̱, bhaatu ndobhaani̱ na mpete sya mpaghi esi syaba sya siliva kandi mpaghi sya jighati̱ esi syona baasi̱swi̱ki̱la na siliva haagu̱u̱li̱ yasiyo.

Haa geeti̱ aatʼo kateni̱ kujamba kwayʼo mi̱ta mwenda kandi kukangama mi̱ta ebili na kimui kyakanaa. Aaghikola mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo na mutuku kandi eghi mu̱soni̱ mulungi akoli̱ye mu lughoye lusemeeye. Kateni̱ eghi ekaba yengaane na kateni̱ sinji esi̱koli̱ye lugho lwa jighati̱.

Kateni̱ eghi baaghi̱dhodhooki̱ya haa mpaghi enaa, bu̱li̱ mpaghi baaghita mu ncuba yayo ya bbu̱looji̱. Ndobhaani̱ sya mpaghi esi na mpete syasiyo bikaba bili bya siliva kandi haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mpaghi esi baswi̱ki̱yʼo siliva.
Nkondo syona esi baakoleeseei̱ye haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na nkondo sya jighati̱ eghi syaba sya bbu̱looji̱.

Ghuni niighuwo muhendo ghwa bintu ebi baakoleeseei̱ye kukwela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, ki̱i̱kalo kya kutaamu Bilaghilo Eku̱mi̱. Musa niiye akalaghila Baleevi̱ kubibala kandi oghu akaba mukulu wabo haa mulimo oghu ni I̱tamala mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱.
Bbejaleeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Hu̱li̱ kandi muusukulu wa Hula, wʼomu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da, aakola byona ebi
aalaghiiye Musa.

Mulimo oghu aaghukola na Oholi̱yaabbu mutabani̱ wa Ahisamaki̱, wʼomu ntu̱la ya Daani̱, oghu akaba amani̱ye kukola kulungi milimo ya ngalo, kuteela bisasani̱, mu̱soni̱ mulungi wa ngoye sya langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na haa lughoye lusemeeye.

Bakoli̱ aba baakoleesi̱ya ki̱lo lu̱ku̱mi̱ sya feeja kukola mulimo ghwona ghwa kukwela ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kyʼomu weena eghi. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baahaayo feeja eghi nga kihonguwa ewaa
Siliva eghi ekalu̱gha mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baabali̱ye, yaahi̱ki̱ya ki̱lo nga nku̱mi̱ esatu bbinaa na asatu.

Baabala basaasa boona abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ya bukulu na kweyongelayo kandi bu̱li̱ muntu oghu baabalagha, aasasulagha kimui kyakabili kya mukwenge ghwa siliva, muhendo ghwa basaasa aba baabali̱ye, ghwaba mitwalo nkaagha, nku̱mi̱ esatu bitaano nʼataano.

Baakoleesi̱yagha ki̱lo nku̱mi̱ esatu na bbinaa sya siliva kukola ncuba ki̱ku̱mi̱. Bu̱li̱ ncuba yaaba ki̱lo maku̱mi̱ asatu nʼenaa sya kutaamu mpaghi ki̱ku̱mi̱ sya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi kutʼo kateni̱.
Ki̱lo maku̱mi̱ asatu sya siliva eghi ekati̱ghalʼo, baaghikolamu ndobhaani̱ na mpete bya ku̱dhodhooki̱yʼo kateni̱ haa mpaghi kandi baaghi̱koleesi̱ya ku̱swi̱ki̱la haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mpaghi esi.
Bbu̱looji̱ eghi Banai̱saaleeli̱ baahaayeyo na bihonguwa binji bya mbaghani̱ja byahi̱ka ki̱lo nku̱mi̱ ebili bbinaa abili nʼetaano.
Baakoleesi̱ya bbu̱looji̱ eghi kukolamu ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi sya mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya bbu̱looji̱ na byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona.

Baakoleesi̱ya bbu̱looji̱ eghi kukola ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi sya jighati̱ eghi yeeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi, na ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi sya geeti̱ ya jighati̱ na nkondo syona sya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na jighati̱ yayo.

Bbejaleeli̱ na baanakiye baakola bi̱lu̱waalo bisemeleeye kimui mu ngoye sya langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo na mutuku bya bahongi̱ ku̱lu̱waalagha mbakola mulimo mu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Baakola bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya Alooni̱, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baakoleesi̱ya feeja, mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye, kukola efodi̱.

Baakoleesi̱ya nondo kuwiisa feeja kandi baaghiiyamu buntu bu̱ti̱-bu̱ti̱i̱, du̱mbi̱ baabujombakaka baayamu mahu̱u̱ji̱ kandi bantu abali na bukugu baaghasoni̱ya lughoye lusemeeye lwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye.
Efodi̱ eghi baata haa mpande syombi buheeko bwa kukwatani̱ya haa mabegha ki̱twi̱ke kya mu maaso na kyʼenu̱ma, niikuwo ekwatane hamui.
Basaasa aba baakola muheeko mu lughoye lusemeeye olu baakoli̱yemu efodi̱ kandi baatamu mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa feeja ghaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baabhaaka mabaale abili onika, baaghata mu buufuleemu buunabwana bwa feeja kandi muntu aahandiikʼo mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ eku̱mi̱ na babili baa I̱saaleeli̱.
Mabaale abili agha baaghaboha haa mabegha haagu̱u̱li̱ ya efodi̱ kuba kaakuusukilʼo batabani̱ baa I̱saaleeli̱, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baasona kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha mu lughoye lwonini olu baakoli̱yemu efodi̱. Baakitaamu mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa feeja, langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye.
Kyaku̱lu̱wala haa ki̱ku̱bha eki, baaki̱ku̱namu kabili kandi kyengaana mpande syona, i̱nci̱ mwenda kujamba kandi i̱nci̱ mwenda kugbaatikana.
Baatʼo lai̱ni̱ enaa sya mabaale ghaa muhendo. Lai̱ni̱ yʼoku̱du̱bha baatʼo ghaamutuku salu̱di̱yo, ghaa ki̱si̱ka kibisi topaji̱ na ghaamutuku kabu̱nku̱lo.
Lai̱ni̱ yaakabili baatʼo ghaa ki̱si̱ka kibisi i̱mi̱lali̱do, ghaa bbu̱lu̱lu̱ su̱fi̱lo na ghaa njelu dayamondi̱.
Lai̱ni̱ yaakasatu baatʼo ghaa mutuku takwi̱je, ghaa njelu agate na ghaa papo ameti̱si̱to.
Lai̱ni̱ yaakanaa baatʼo ghaa kinjaali̱ bbelu̱lo, ghaa mutuku onika na ghaa ki̱si̱ka kibisi yesipa kandi baaghata mu buufuleemu buunabwana bwa feeja.
Haabʼo mabaale eku̱mi̱ nʼabili kandi haa bu̱li̱ ebaale baahandiikʼo li̱i̱na lya omui haa batabani̱ eku̱mi̱ na babili baa Yakobbo kwoleka ntu̱la eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya I̱saaleeli̱.
Kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha eki baakikolela bujeghele bubili bwa feeja busemeeye kandi obutali̱ye nga bughuwo.
Baakola buufuleemu buunabwana bubili bwa feeja bwa kutaamu mabaale agha. Kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha eki baakikolela mpete ebili sya feeja kandi baasita haa nsondo syakiyo ebili syʼelughulu.
Baaboha bujeghele bubili bwa feeja mu mpete ebili esili haa mpande ebili sya kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha.
Baakwatani̱ya kumaliilila kunji kwa bujeghele bubili haa buufuleemu buunabwana bwa feeja kandi baabuboha mu maaso ghaa efodi̱ eghi.
Baakola mpete ebili sya feeja kandi baasita haa nsondo ebili syʼeku̱wa ya kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha, mukati haai na efodi̱.
Baakola dhee mpete sinji ebili sya feeja kandi baasita haakumaliilila kwa bughuwo bubili bwa haa mabegha ghaa efodi̱, hambali ki̱twi̱ke kyayʼo kyʼeku̱wa kilabhaane na muheeko oghu̱soni̱ye kulungi.

Mpete syakiyo baasibohela haa mpete sya kyaku̱lu̱waala haa ki̱ku̱bha na bughuwo bwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, niikuwo kilangaale haa muheeko ghwa efodi̱ eghi ekoleeu̱we kulungi, niikuwo kitatelebuka haa efodi̱ eghi, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baakola nkanji̱ ya langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱ ya ku̱lu̱waala mukati ya efodi̱.
Nkanji̱ eghi yaaba na kihulu haagati ekiliyo mukughilo kya kukwami̱yamu mutuwe niikuwo etatemuka.
Baata haa mukughilo ghwa nkanji̱ eghi mikomamahanga mu langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo, mutuku na lughoye lusemeeye.
Baakola bida bya feeja esemeeye kandi baabyeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya haa mukughilo ghwa nkanji̱ eghi mbalabhani̱ya kida na mukomamahanga.
Baalabhani̱yagha kida na mukomamahanga, kida na mukomamahanga, kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya mukughilo ghwa eku̱wa ghwa nkanji̱ eghi. Alooni̱ aghi̱lu̱waalaghe naakola mulimo ghuwe nga mu̱hongi̱, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baakolela Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be kyaku̱lu̱waala mukati, mu lughoye lusemeeye.
Baabakolela kyaku̱lu̱waala mu mutuwe, sipeewa na mpale sya mukati, mu lughoye lusemeeye.
Mu̱soni̱ mulungi aasona muheeko mu lughoye lusemeeye kandi aasonelʼo mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, papo na mutuku, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baakola kaapa mu feeja esemeeye kandi baakahandiikʼo bati, “Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Kaapa aka aakaboha na kaghuwo kaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱ mu maaso ghaa kyaku̱lu̱waala mu mutuwe, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Nahabweki mulimo ghwona ghwa kukwela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, ghwahuwa. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola bintu byona ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baaleeta ewaa Musa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na bintu byayʼo byona: bigwasi byayʼo, fuleemu syayʼo, mikiiko yayo, mpaghi syayʼo, ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi,
kyaku̱swi̱ki̱la weema eghi eki̱koleeu̱we mu mpu siimutuku sya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama, mpu sya mbu̱li̱, kateni̱ ya kuta mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱,
sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, mpaghi syayʼo, kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi,
meeja na byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona, mugaati̱ ghwa kuhongela Luhanga,
kyakutʼo taala kya feeja esemeeye na taala syakiyo, byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona na mafu̱ta ghaakuta mu taala esi,
kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya feeja, mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha, bubbani̱ busasi̱ye, kateni̱ ya kuta haa mulyango ghwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye,
kyakuhongelʼo kya bbu̱looji̱, kati̱mba kaakiyo kaa bbu̱looji̱, mpaghi syakiyʼo, byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona, bbaafu ya bbu̱looji̱ na kyakughitʼo,

kateni̱ sya kukola lugho lwa jighati̱, mpaghi sya jighati̱ eghi, ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi esi, kateni̱ ya kuta haa geeti̱ ya jighati̱, mighuwo na nkondo sya jighati̱ ya weema eghi na byaku̱koleesi̱ya byona mu weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.

Baaleeta bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱koleeu̱we kulungi bya bahongi̱ ku̱lu̱waalagha mbakola mulimo mu Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱ na bi̱lu̱waalo bya batabani̱ be balalu̱waalagha mbaheeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola mulimo ghwona ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Musa aalola bhyani bintu ebi byona kandi aabona ngoku baakoli̱ye mulimo oghu kwonini ngoku
aalaghiiye. Nahabweki Musa aaha bantu aba mu̱gi̱sa.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Okwele weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya kweli̱ kwokubanja.
Ote mu weema eghi sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano kandi odhodhooki̱ye kateni̱ mu maaso ghaayo.
Otaahi̱yemu meeja kandi otʼo bintu byayʼo. Du̱mbi̱ otaahi̱yemu kyakutʼo taala kandi otʼo taala syakiyo.
Ote kyaku̱tu̱mi̱kʼo bubbani̱ kya feeja mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano kandi ote kateni̱ haa mulyango ghwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“Ote kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye mu maaso ghaa mulyango ghwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Ote bbaafu haagati ya weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi otemu maasi.
Okole jighati̱ kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya weema eghi kandi ote kateni̱ haa geeti̱ ya lugho lwa jighati̱ eghi.
“Okwate mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha kandi oghasiighe haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na bu̱li̱ kintu ekilimu, oghyeli̱ye na bintu byayʼo byona kandi ekuba ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Osiighe mafu̱ta haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye na byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona, weeli̱ye kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki kandi kikufooka ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini.
Osiighe mafu̱ta haa bbaafu na haa kyakughitʼo kandi obyeli̱ye.
“Oleete Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi obanaabi̱ye na maasi.
Olu̱wi̱ke Alooni̱ bi̱lu̱waalo bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya bu̱hongi̱, omusiighe mafu̱ta kandi omweli̱ye, niikuwo agubhe ku̱mpeeleli̱ya nga mu̱hongi̱.
Oleete batabani̱ baa Alooni̱ kandi obalu̱wi̱ke byaku̱lu̱waala mukati byabo.

Obasiighe mafu̱ta ngoku waaghasi̱i̱ghi̱ye esebo, niikuwo bagubhe ku̱mpeeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱. Kusiigha mafu̱ta Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be, kukubafoola na baasukulu baabo kuba bahongi̱ mu mijo yabo yoona eghi ekwisa.”
Musa aakola bu̱li̱ kintu ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Nahabweki aakwela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya kweli̱ kwokubanja kwa mwaka ghwakabili haanu̱ma ya ku̱lu̱gha Mi̱si̱li̱.
Musa aakola ncuba, aataamu fuleemu, aakwatani̱ya mikiiko kandi aakwela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, du̱mbi̱ aasimba mpaghi sya kutʼo kateni̱.
Aabi̱swi̱ki̱la na weema kandi aata haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi kya ku̱ghi̱swi̱ki̱la, ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Aakwata bihande bibili bya mabaale bya ndaghaano, aabita mu sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, aata mpaghi mu mpete syayʼo kandi aatʼo kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi kyaku̱swi̱ki̱la haagu̱u̱li̱.
Aataahi̱ya mu weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano kandi aata kateni̱ haagati ya weema eghi ku̱bi̱sa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Musa aata meeja mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu haa luhande lwʼelughulu lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi, mu maaso ghaa kateni̱ eghi.
Aata mugaati̱ haa meeja eghi mu maaso ghaa
, ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Aata kyakutʼo taala haa luhande lwʼeku̱wa lwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi kyalolana na meeja ya kuhongelʼo mugaati̱ mu weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Aatʼo taala mu maaso ghaa
, ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Musa aata kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya feeja mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu eghi, mu maaso ghaa kateni̱ eghi.
Aatu̱mi̱ka haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki bubbani̱ busasi̱ye ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Du̱mbi̱ aata kateni̱ enji haa mulyango ghwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Musa aata kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye haai na mulyango ghwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi aahongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye na bihonguwa bya bilimuwa, ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Aata bbaafu haagati ya weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi aataamu maasi ghaa kunaaba.
Maasi agha niigho Musa, Alooni̱ na batabani̱ baa Alooni̱ baanaabagha mu ngalo na mu maghulu.
Baanaabagha mbaghenda mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kedha mbeebinga kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aakwela jighati̱ kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi aata kateni̱ haa geeti̱ ya jighati̱ eghi. Nahabweki Musa aamala mulimo oghu.
Du̱mbi̱ kicu kyaswi̱ki̱la weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya
kyasula mu weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Musa ataagubha kutaaha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu nanga kicu kikaba ki̱ghi̱swi̱ki̱ye kandi ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya
kiisuuye mu weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Mu lughendo lwona lwa Banai̱saaleeli̱, kicu eki kyakaamukagha haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi, du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatandika ku̱lu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki kandi baghenda mu ki̱i̱kalo kinji.
Bhaatu kicu eki kyakabaagha kitalu̱ghi̱ye haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi, baghoona mu ki̱i̱kalo eki ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ki̱todhi̱ye ku̱lu̱ghʼo.
Nahabweki kicu kya
kyakalagha haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ntangaali̱ kandi mulilo ghwakagha mu kicu eki mukilo, mu maaso ghaa Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona mu ngendo syabo syona.
Leviticus: aabilikila Musa kandi aabu̱gha naye ku̱lu̱gha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, aamughila ati,
“Obu̱ghe na Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi obaghile oti, ‘Kaakuba muntu weena mu enu̱we abbala kutwala kihonguwa ewaa
, akiiyaghe mu nte, ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱ siye.
“ ‘Kaakuba kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kiba eki̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu nte siye, atwale yabusaasa kandi eghi etali na kamogo. Ali na kughileeta haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu niikuwo
aghi̱si̱i̱me.
Muntu oghu ali na kuta mukono ghuwe haa mutuwe ghwa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye eki kandi
aku̱ki̱si̱i̱ma haabwa mukolo ghwa muntu oghu kughaniluwa bibhi biye.
Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte eghi aghisalile mu maaso ghaa
kandi bahongi̱ batabani̱ baa Alooni̱, batwale saghama yayo baghimisange haa mpande syona sya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa ekili haai na mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye eki akibaaghe kandi ajombakake nyama syakiyo mu myana.
Batabani̱ baa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱, bali na ku̱tu̱mi̱ka mulilo haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi bapangʼo nkui.
Du̱mbi̱ bahongi̱ batabani̱ baa Alooni̱, bapange haa mulilo oghu nyama esi baajombakaki̱ye mu myana, mutuwe na bisabu̱, haa mulilo ghwa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki.

Muntu oghu ali na kunaabi̱ya na maasi byenda na bilenge, du̱mbi̱ mu̱hongi̱ ooki̱ye kisolo eki kyona haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa. Eki kibe kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
“ ‘Kaakuba kihonguwa eki kiba kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱, ahonge yabusaasa kandi eghi etali na kamogo.
Kisolo eki akisalile haa luhande lwa elughulu ya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa mu maaso ghaa
. Du̱mbi̱ bahongi̱ batabani̱ baa Alooni̱ bamisange saghama yakiyo haa mpande syona sya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.
Kisolo eki akiiyemu myana, mutuwe na bisabu̱ kandi mu̱hongi̱ oghu abipange kusemeeye haa nkui esili haa mulilo haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.

Muntu oghu ali na kunaabi̱ya na maasi byenda na bilenge kandi mu̱hongi̱ aleete nyama sya kisolo eki syona kandi asyoki̱ye haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa. Eki kibe kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, eki bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu ahongela
kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya noni̱, ali na kuleeta kihonguwa kya ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo kedha kaapi̱i̱so.

Mu̱hongi̱ atwale noni̱ eghi haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, aki̱tu̱wʼo mutuwe kandi aghwokeli̱ye haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa. Saghama ya noni̱ eghi aghitoonakaki̱ye haa mpande sya kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki.
Mu̱hongi̱ aaye mu noni̱ eghi kisaki̱li̱yo kyayʼo na ebili mukati yakiyo kandi abikube haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali bakukubagha ki̱bu̱.

Mu̱hongi̱ akwate mapapa ghaa noni̱ eghi kandi aghyati̱ye, bhaatu ataghi̱tu̱wamu kabili, du̱mbi̱ aghyokeli̱ye haa mulilo ghwa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa. Eki kibe kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, eki bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu aleeta kihonguwa kya bilimuwa ewaa
