akubaghanila bibhi byanu kandi mukufooka abeeli̱ye mu maaso ghe.
Eki kibaaghe kilo kyanu kya Sabhato kya kuhuumula, hatabʼo muntu oghu akuliya byokuliya kilo eki kedha kukola mulimo ghwona. Eki nkilaghilo kya bilo nʼebilo.

Mu̱hongi̱ oghu basi̱i̱ghi̱ye mafu̱ta kandi balu̱wi̱ki̱ye kukuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ese wee nga mukulu wa bahongi̱, aaniiye aakolagha mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi. Alu̱waalaghe biigandulo binjelu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye
kandi akolaghe mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi ghwa Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kusaali̱ya byona, weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, bahongi̱ na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
“Eki kili na kuba kilaghilo kyanu kya bilo nʼebilo. Mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi byona bya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ghuli na kukoluwa mulundi ghumui bu̱li̱ mwaka.”
Musa aakola ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile Alooni̱, batabani̱ be na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kini niikiyo
aalaghiiye.
Kaakuba Munai̱saaleeli̱ weena ahonga nte, ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱ hambali baghooneeye kedha hantu hanji hoona,
mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kughileeta haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, kughihaayo nga kihonguwa ewaa
, mu maaso ghaa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ya
. Muntu oghu ali na musango ghwa bu̱ji̱ndi̱, nanga aaseesi̱ye saghama ya kisolo eki kandi ali na kubhinguwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakiye.

Eki nkilaghilo kya kutanga Banai̱saaleeli̱ kuhongelagha bihonguwa hanja ya hambali baghooneeye, bhaatu babitwalaghe ewaa mu̱hongi̱ haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, kubihaayo nga bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge ewaa
Mu̱hongi̱ ali na kumisanga saghama ya kisolo eki haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi ooki̱ye bisabu̱ byakiyo nga kihonguwa, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye

Banai̱saaleeli̱ batatodha kwefoola baamalaaya kuhonga bihonguwa ewaa bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga ebi̱su̱si̱ye mbu̱li̱ ebi bakwete kulami̱ya. Eki nkilaghilo kya bilo nʼebilo eki bali na kukwata mu mijo yabo yoona.’
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Munai̱saaleeli̱ weena kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye nabo, oghu akuhaayo kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kedha kihonguwa kinji
kandi abhenga kukileeta haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kukihongela
, muntu oghu ali na kubhinguwa mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu weena mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ kedha munamahanga oghu akaaye nabo aliya saghama, nkufubila kwonini muntu oghu kandi nkumubhinga mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakiye.
Bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa kihanguwa buli mu saghama yakiyo. Saghama eghi naaghihaaye enu̱we kughihongagha haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa haabwa kukola mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi byanu.
Nahabweki naatangi̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ nti, “Atabʼo muntu nʼomu mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba oghu ali na kuliya saghama, kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye nabo oghu ali na kuliya saghama.”

“ ‘Kaakuba Munai̱saaleeli̱ weena kedha munamahanga oghu akaaye hamui nabo ahiigha kandi aata kinyama kya mu kisaka kedha noni̱ ebikugubha kuliibuwa, ali na kuseesa saghama hansi kandi aghi̱swi̱ki̱le nʼetaka.

Bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa bu̱li̱ kihanguwa kyona buli mu saghama yakiyo. Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naalaghila Banai̱saaleeli̱ nti, “Mutaliliyagha saghama ya kihanguwa kyona, nanga bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa bu̱li̱ kihanguwa buli mu saghama yakiyo kandi muntu weena oghu akuliya saghama ali na kubhinguwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.”

“ ‘Munai̱saaleeli̱ weena kedha munamahanga oghu akaaye hamui nabo, oghu akuliya kisolo kyekwi̱li̱i̱ye kedha eki kinyama kya mu kisaka kyati̱ye, ali na kunaabi̱ya ngoye siye kandi anaabe maasi mubili ghwona. Muntu oghu akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo.
Kaakuba atanaabi̱ya ngoye siye kandi anaaba maasi mubili ghwona, ali na kufubiluwa haabwa kibhi eki.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
Mutalikola bintu ngʼebi Banami̱si̱li̱ bakukolagha hambali mwabaagha muukaaye kandi mutakola bintu ngʼebi Banakanaani̱ bakukolagha hambali ndimabatwala. Mutakwamilila bikoluwa bya bantu aba.
Muli na kukwata bilaghilo byanje kandi kweghendeseleja kukola ebi nkubalaghila. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
Muli na kukwata ebi nkubalaghila na bilaghilo byanje kandi muntu weena oghu akukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye akuba mwomi̱i̱li̱ haabwabiyo.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Atalibʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akulangaala na mukali̱ oghu ali lughanda luwe. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Otalilangaala na njoko waawe kuhemula so waawe. Mukali̱ oghu ni njoko waawe, nahabweki otalilangaala naye.
“ ‘Otalilangaala nʼomui haa bakali̱ baa so waawe, eki kikuhemula so waawe.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na mwanjoko waawe, nankabha muhala wa so waawe kedha muhala wa njoko waawe, nankabha bamubyaliiye ewaanu kedha hantu hanji.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na muhala wa mutabani̱ waawe kedha muhala wa muhala waawe, eki kikukuhemula.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na muhala wa mukali̱ wa so waawe, oghu so waawe amu̱byayʼo, nanga ni mwanjoko waawe.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na esenga waawe, nanga ni mwani̱na so waawe.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na mu̱ghenji̱ wa njoko waawe wabukali̱, nanga ni lughanda lwa njoko waawe eenini.
“ ‘Otalihemula mu̱ghenji̱ wa so waawe kulangaala na mukali̱ wee, nanga naye ali nga esenga waawe.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na mugholi waawe, nanga ni mukali̱ wa mutabani̱ waawe, nahabweki otalilangaala naye.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na mukali̱ wa mwana wa njoko waawe, eki kikuhemula mwana wa njoko waawe oghu.

“ ‘Otalilangaala na mukali̱ kandi bwile bunji olangaala na muhala wee. Otalilangaala nankabha na muhala wa mutabani̱ wee kedha muhala wa muhala wee. Bakali̱ aba ni nganda sya mukali̱ oghu syonini kandi eki ni kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kukola.
“ ‘Otaliswela mu̱ghenji̱ wa mukali̱ waawe kuba mukali̱ waawe waakabili kandi otalilangaala naye mukali̱ waawe anaakaaye.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na mukali̱ analwaye bulwaye bwa bakali̱, nanga bwile obu akubaagha ateeli̱ye.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na mukali̱ wa muliilanuwa waawe, nanga eki kikukufoola oghu ateeli̱ye.
“ ‘Otalihonga omui haa baana baawe ewaa Moleki̱, nanga eki kikuhemula li̱i̱na lya Luhanga waawe. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Otalilangaala na musaasa muunakyawe, ngoku okulangaalagha na mukali̱. Eki Luhanga akyohi̱ye kwonini.
“ ‘Otalyebhi̱i̱ya kulangaala na kisolo kandi mukali̱ atalighenda hambali kisolo kili kulangaala nakiyo, eki ni kikoluwa ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kwonini.
“ ‘Mutalyebhi̱i̱ya kukola kimui haa bikoluwa ebi, nanga bantu aba nkubhinga munaloli̱ye mu mahanga hambali mukwete kughenda, bakeebhi̱i̱ya haabwa kukola bintu ebi.
Bikoluwa byabo bikabhi̱i̱ya nsi yabo, nahabweki nkufubila bantu aba haabwa bibhi byabo kandi nsi eghi ekabhenga bantu abaabaagha baakaayemu.
Bhaatu enu̱we muli na kukwata ebi nkubalaghila na bilaghilo byanje. Munai̱saaleeli̱ nʼomui kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye naanu, atalikola na kimui haa bintu ebi noohi̱ye ebi.
Bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi niibiyo bantu abaabaagha baakaaye mu nsi eghi baakolagha, enu̱we mutakaki̱dhi̱yemu kandi byabhi̱i̱ya nsi eghi.
Kaakuba naanu mu̱bhi̱i̱ya nsi eghi, ekubabhenga ngoku yaabhengi̱ye abaabaagha baakaayemu mutakaki̱dhi̱yemu.
“ ‘Bantu boona abakukola kimui haa bintu ebi noohi̱ye ebi, bantu aba bali na kubhinguwa mu bantu baabo.
Muli na kukwata ebi nkubalaghikiilila kandi mutakola na kimui haa bikoluwa ebi noohi̱ye ebi bantu baakolagha mutakaasi̱ye kandi mu̱teebhi̱i̱ya kukola bintu ebi. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Obu̱ghe na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi obaghile oti, ‘Mube bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye nanga si̱ye,
Luhanga waanu, ndi ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“ ‘Bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we ali na ku̱hu̱ti̱ya ni̱na wee na ese wee kandi muli na ku̱hu̱ti̱ya bilo bya Sabhato byanje. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
“ ‘Mutalilami̱ya bisasani̱ kedha kwekolela baaluhanga baa byoma. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
“ ‘Obu mulabaagha nimuhayo kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge ewaa
, mukihongaghe mu mulingo ghu̱hi̱ki̱ye niikuwo nsi̱i̱maghe kihonguwa eki haabwanu.
Kihonguwa eki mukiliyaghe haa kilo eki mwakihongeeyemu kyonini na kilo ekilabhi̱yʼo. Kintu kyona eki̱ku̱ti̱ghala haa kihonguwa eki ku̱hi̱ki̱ya kilo kyakasatu, bali na ku̱kyoki̱ya na mulilo.
Kaakuba kihonguwa eki kiliibuwa haa kilo kyakasatu, kikuba eki̱teeli̱ye kandi tanku̱ki̱si̱i̱ma.
Muntu weena oghu akuliya haa kihonguwa eki haa kilo kyakasatu, ali na kufubiluwa haabwa ku̱bhi̱i̱ya kihonguwa ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kya
kandi ali na kubhinguwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.
“ ‘Obu olabaagha nookesa bilimuwa ebi weeleei̱ye mu nsi yaawe, otahi̱kagha haakumaliilila kwa musili kedha kubimalamu.
Obu olabaagha nookobha bi̱ghu̱ma byawe bya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱, otatodhagha kukuukililamu kedha kukoma-koma ebyalaghali̱ki̱ye, obilekelaghe banaku na banamahanga. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
“ ‘Mutaliibha.
“ ‘Mutalihabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya baanakyanu.
“ ‘Mutaliha bisubha.
“ ‘Mutalilahila busa li̱i̱na lyanje kedha kuleka mbaghaya li̱i̱na lya Luhanga waanu. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Otalibona-boni̱ya muliilanuwa waawe kedha kwibha bintu biye.
“ ‘Otalilaala otasasuuye muntu oghu waahaaye mulimo kughukola.
“ ‘Otalikiina muntu oghu matui ghaaghaaye kedha kuta kintu mu maaso ghaa muntu oghu maaso ghaaghaaye niikuwo akikobhoke, bhaatu ohu̱ti̱ye Luhanga waawe. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Otali̱tu̱wa musango etali mu bwengani̱ja mu kooti̱. Otaghilila muntu kisa nanga eye kuba munaku kedha muguudha, bhaatu mu̱twi̱laghe bantu misango mu bwengani̱ja.
“ ‘Otalighenda nookoka bantu banji.
“ ‘Otalikola kintu kyona ekikuta bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa muliilanuwa waawe mu kabhi. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Otalyoha mu̱ghenji̱ waawe haa mutima ghwawe. Otanukaghe muliilanuwa waawe bbeni̱-bbeni̱ niikuwo otaba mu eki aasobeei̱ye.
“ ‘Otalihoola ngi̱ghu̱ kedha kusaaliluwa na omui mu bantu aba ookaaye nabo, bhaatu okundaghe muunakyawe ngoku weeku̱ndi̱ye weenini.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Okwate ebi nkukulaghila.
“ ‘Otali̱i̱mi̱i̱si̱ya bisolo bya mbaghani̱ja.
“ ‘Otalihela mu musili ghwawe nsigho sya milingo ebili.
“ ‘Otali̱lu̱waala lughoye olu̱koleeu̱we mu ngoye sya milingo ebili.

“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa alangaala na mukali̱ mu̱syana oghu musaasa onji alu̱ghi̱ye bhaatu batakamucunguuye kedha atakafooki̱ye wa bughabe, bantu aba bali na kufubiluwa bhaatu batabaata, nanga mukali̱ oghu aabaagha anali mu̱syana.
Bhaatu musaasa oghu ali na kuleeta ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu nga kihonguwa kya kuuhibuwʼo musango ewaa
Mu̱hongi̱ ahonge ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi nga kihonguwa kya kuuhibuwʼo musango kandi akole mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi bya muntu oghu mu maaso ghaa
kandi bibhi biye bikughaniluwa.
“ ‘Mukaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi ya Kanaani̱, muhele biti bya milingo yoona bya bi̱ghu̱ma ebi bakuliyagha, bhaatu bi̱ghu̱ma ebi mutabiliya haabwa myaka esatu, bwile obu bikuba bitangu̱u̱we enu̱we kubiliya.
Mu mwaka ghwakanaa bi̱ghu̱ma ebi byona bikuba bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi bikuba bihonguwa bya ku̱si̱i̱ma ewaa
Bhaatu mu mwaka ghwakataano, mukugubha kuliya bi̱ghu̱ma ebi, niikuwo biti ebi byeyongele kwana bi̱ghu̱ma bikani̱ye. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
“ ‘Mutaliliya nyama eghi enalimu saghama.
“ ‘Mu enu̱we atalibaamu mu̱ku̱mu̱ kedha oghu akubanduwa mi̱li̱mu̱.
“ ‘Mutalyeghemba esoke lyʼomu maakpengbu̱ ghaa mituwe yaanu kedha kweghemba bi̱lelu̱.
“ ‘Mutalyetalanga haa mibili yaanu haabwa kweghungila bantu baku̱u̱ye kedha kuteela bisasani̱ haa mibili yaanu. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Mutalihemula bahala baanu kubasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kufooka baamalaaya, nanga nsi eghi ekufooka ya baamalaaya kandi eesulemu bikoluwa bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
“ ‘Mu̱hu̱ti̱yaghe kilo kyanje kya Sabhato na ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kyanje. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Mutaghendagha kulaghu̱li̱ya mu baku̱mu̱ kedha bantu abakubanduwagha mi̱li̱mu̱, nanga baku̱bhi̱i̱ya enu̱we. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
“ ‘Mwemililaghe mu maaso ghaa bantu bakulu, muhaaghe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa abaku̱li̱ye mu myaka kandi mu̱hu̱ti̱yaghe Luhanga waanu. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Kaakuba munamahanga aakala naanu mu nsi yaanu, mutamubona-boni̱ya.
Munamahanga oghu aakaaye naanu muli na kumutwalikani̱ya nga Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyanu. Mumukunde ngoku mweku̱ndi̱ye, nanga naanu mukaba muli banamahanga mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
“ ‘Mutakoleesi̱yagha ki̱pi̱i̱mo ekitahi̱ki̱ye obu mukuba ni̱mu̱pi̱i̱ma kujamba, ku̱lyota kedha kwengaana kwa kintu.
Mu̱koleesi̱yaghe minjaani̱ eghi ehi̱ki̱ye, mabaale ghahi̱ki̱ye, dhebe esi̱hi̱ki̱ye kandi biigalaponi̱ ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu, oghu akabaaya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
“ ‘Mukwate ebi nkubalaghila byona na bilaghilo byanje byona kandi mukole ebi bilaghiiye. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
aaghila Musa ati,

“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kaakuba Munai̱saaleeli̱ weena kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye hamui nabo, ahonga omui haa baana be ewaa Moleki̱, muntu oghu ali na kwitibuwa. Ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kimuhuule mabaale aku̱we.

Muntu oghu nkumufubila kandi nimubhinge mu Banai̱saaleeli̱, nanga aahongi̱ye omui haa baana be ewaa Moleki̱. Aabhi̱i̱hi̱i̱ye ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kyanje kandi aahemula li̱i̱na lyanje li̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Kaakuba muntu ohongela Moleki̱ omui haa baana be, bantu bʼomu kyalo eki aakaayemu batafuwʼo eki aakoli̱ye kandi babhenga kumwita,
nkufubila muntu oghu na ka yee yoona kandi nkumubhinga mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ na boona abaabaagha naye obu beefolagha nga baamalaaya kulami̱ya Moleki̱.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu aaghenda kulaghu̱li̱ya mu baku̱mu̱ kedha mu bantu abaku̱bu̱ghagha na mi̱li̱mu̱ kandi eefoola nga malaaya, nkumufubila kandi nkumubhinga mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.
“ ‘Enu̱we mweyeli̱ye kandi mube bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nanga ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
Mukwate ebi nkubalaghila kandi mubikwamile. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
, oghu akubafoolagha bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu akiina ese wee kedha ni̱na wee, ali na kwitibuwa kandi musango ghu̱mu̱si̱ngi̱ye.
“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa asyana na mukali̱ wa baanini, mukali̱ wa muliilanuwa wee, bombi musaasa na mukali̱ bali na kwitibuwa.
“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa alangaala na mukali̱ wa ese wee, akuba ahemuuye ese wee, bombi musaasa na mukali̱ bali na kwitibuwa kandi musango ghubasi̱ngi̱ye.
“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa alangaala na mugholi wee, bombi bali na kwitibuwa. Bakuba baakoli̱ye kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kwonini kandi musango ghubasi̱ngi̱ye.
“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa alangaala na musaasa muunakiye ngoku basaasa bakulangaalagha na bakali̱, bombi bakuba bakoli̱ye kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kwonini kandi bali na kwitibuwa, nanga musango ghubasi̱ngi̱ye.

“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa aswela mukali̱ na ni̱na wee, eki ni kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kwonini. Musaasa oghu na bakali̱ aba bombi bali na ku̱booki̱ya mu mulilo, niikuwo kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye nga eki kitatodha kukoluwa mu enu̱we.
“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa alangaala na kisolo, ali na kwitibuwa kandi muli na kwita kisolo eki.
“ ‘Kaakuba mukali̱ aghenda hambali kisolo kili kandi alangaala nakiyo, mwite mukali̱ oghu kandi kisolo eki. Mukali̱ oghu musango ghu̱mu̱si̱ngi̱ye na kisolo eki.

“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa aswela mwani̱na wee, nankabha muhala wa ese wee kedha wa ni̱na wee kandi balangaala hamui, eki ni kintu kya kuhemula. Bantu aba bali na kubhinguwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱. Musaasa oghu akuba ahemuuye mwani̱na wee kandi musango ghu̱mu̱si̱ngi̱ye.

“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa alangaala na mukali̱ mu bwile obu mukali̱ oghu alwaye bulwaye bwa bakali̱, bantu aba bombi bali na kubhinguwa mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱, nanga baatu̱u̱ye kilaghilo ekikwetʼo kuukala eeli̱ye.
“ ‘Otalilangaala na mu̱ghenji̱ wa njoko waawe kedha mwani̱na so waawe, nanga okuba olangaaye na lughanda lwawe eenini kandi enu̱we bombi muli na kufubiluwa haabwa kibhi kyanu eki.
“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa alangaala na mukali̱ wa mu̱ghenji̱ wa ese wee, akuba ahemuuye mu̱ghenji̱ wa ese wee oghu. Bombi musaasa na mukali̱ bali na kufubiluwa haabwa kibhi kyabo kandi tabaku̱byala mwana.
“ ‘Kaakuba musaasa alangaala na mukali̱ wa mu̱ghenji̱ wee, eki ni kikoluwa ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kandi akuba ahemuuye mu̱ghenji̱ wee kandi tabaku̱byala mwana.
“ ‘Mukwate byona ebi nkubalaghila na bilaghilo byanje kandi mubikwamilile, niikuwo nsi eghi ndimabatwalamu kuukalamu etababhenga.
Mutaba na bikoluwa nga bya bantu aba nkubhinga munaloli̱ye mu nsi eghi, nanga bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi byona niibiyo bakukolagha kandi eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naabooha.
Bhaatu nkaghila enu̱we nti, “Mukutwala nsi ya bantu aba kandi nkughiha enu̱we nga bugwetuwa, nsi eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki.” Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu, oghu akabakomamu mu bantu bʼomu mahanga ghanji.

“ ‘Nahabweki muli na kumanya mbaghani̱ja ya bisolo ebyeli̱ye na ebi̱teeli̱ye kandi mbaghani̱ja ya noni̱ esyeli̱ye na esi̱teeli̱ye. Mu̱teebhi̱i̱ya kuliya kisolo kedha noni̱ kedha kintu kyona ekikwekuluulilagha hansi, ebi naaghi̱li̱ye nti tabyeli̱ye ewaanu.
Muli na kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewanje nanga si̱ye
ndi ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi nkakoma enu̱we mu bantu bʼomu mahanga ghanji kuba bantu banje.
“ ‘Musaasa weena kedha mukali̱ weena mu enu̱we oghu aku̱bu̱gha na mi̱li̱mu̱ kedha akuba mu̱ku̱mu̱, ali na kwitibuwa. Muli na kubahuula mabaale baku̱we kandi musango ghubasi̱ngi̱ye.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati, “Oghile bahongi̱ batabani̱ baa Alooni̱ oti, ‘Atalibʼo mu̱hongi̱ nʼomui oghu akwebhi̱i̱ya haabwa ku̱ku̱mʼo mu̱ku̱ ghwa lughanda luwe oghu aaku̱u̱ye,
kuuyʼo ali lughanda luwe eenini, nga ni̱na wee kedha ese wee, mutabani̱ wee kedha muhala wee, mwana waa ni̱na wee,
kedha mwani̱na wee oghu atakasweuwe oghu aakaaye naye, haabwa kutaba na eba wee.
Mu̱hongi̱ ateebhi̱i̱ya ku̱ku̱mʼo mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu oghu aaku̱u̱ye e bukuwe buwe kandi afooka oghu ateeli̱ye.
“ ‘Bahongi̱ tabali na kweghemba esoke haa mutuwe, kedha bi̱lelu̱ kedha kwetalanga haa mubili haabwa kweghunga.
Bali na kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa Luhanga wabo kandi batahemula li̱i̱na lya Luhanga wabo, nanga bakuhongagha bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo bya
, byokuliya bya Luhanga wabo, nahabweki bali na kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Bahongi̱ bataliswela bakali̱ abeebhi̱hi̱i̱ye haabwa kuba baamalaaya kedha aba beebabo babhi̱ngi̱ye, nanga bahongi̱ bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa Luhanga wabo.
Muli na kutwalikani̱ya bahongi̱ nga bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nanga niibo bakuhongelagha Luhanga waanu byokuliya. Bahongi̱ bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaanu, nanga si̱ye
oghu akubafoolagha bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ndi ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Kaakuba muhala wa mu̱hongi̱ eebhi̱i̱ya kufooka malaaya, akuba ahemuuye ese wee kandi mwana wabukali̱ oghu bali na ku̱mwoki̱ya mu mulilo.

“ ‘Mukulu wa bahongi̱ oghu basi̱i̱ghi̱ye haa mutuwe mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha kumufoola ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi oghu aku̱lu̱waalagha bi̱lu̱waalo bya bu̱hongi̱, ataakala ateecanuuye esoke liye kandi atalitemula biigandulo biye kwoleka ngoku eeghu̱ngi̱ye.
Atalyebhi̱i̱ya kutaaha hambali mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu ghuli. Ateefoola oghu ateeli̱ye kutaahayo, nankabha oghu aaku̱u̱ye aba ali ese wee kedha ni̱na wee.

Atali̱bhi̱i̱ya ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kya Luhanga wee ku̱lu̱ghamu kandi kughenda hambali muntu aaku̱u̱ye, nanga mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha ghaa Luhanga wee agha baamu̱si̱i̱ghi̱ye ghakamufoola oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Mukulu wa bahongi̱ ali na kuswela mukali̱ oghu atamani̱ye basaasa.

Ataliswela mukali̱ mu̱kwi̱si̱ya kedha mukali̱ oghu eba wee abhi̱ngi̱ye kedha mukali̱ oghu eebhi̱i̱hi̱i̱ye haabwa kuba malaaya, bhaatu aswele oghu atamani̱ye basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu be Banai̱saaleeli̱,
niikuwo baana be batahemuka mu bantu baa ntu̱la yee. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
oghu akufoolagha mu̱hongi̱ kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Alooni̱ oti, ‘Mu mijo yaanu yoona eghi ekwisa, hatalibʼo nʼomui mu baasukulu baawe oghu ali na kamogo, oghu ali na kwebinga kandi kuhongela Luhanga wee kihonguwa kya byokuliya.

Taaliyo musaasa nʼomui mu baasukulu baawe oghu ali na kamogo, oghu ali na kwebinga kandi ku̱mpeeleli̱ya nga mu̱hongi̱. Taaliyo oghu ali na ku̱mpeeleli̱ya kaakuba aba maaso ghamuughaaye, ali mulema, alamaaye haali̱i̱so, oghu ali na kughulu ku̱di̱i̱di̱ye kusaali̱ya kunji,
oghu alamaaye kughulu kedha mukono,
oghu ali na egu̱mbe, oghu akpakpi̱ye, oghu ali na ki̱dheli̱ mu li̱i̱so, oghu ali na bibbodhe kedha kweyagha-yagha kedha oghu kyʼensoni̱ kiye ki̱kpeetu̱ki̱ye.
Taaliyo musaasa nʼomui mu baasukulu baa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱, oghu ali na kamogo oghu ali na kwebinga kandi kuhonga bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo bya
, ngoku ali na kamogo, taali na kwebinga kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi kuhonga byokuliya ewaa Luhanga wee.
Mu̱hongi̱ oghu akugubha kuliya haa byokuliya bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini bya Luhanga wee. Akugubha dhee kuliya haa byokuliya binji bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Mu̱hongi̱ oghu haabwa kuba na kamogo, ateebinga kateni̱ ya kutaaha mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kedha kwebinga haai na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa. Eki ki̱ku̱bhi̱i̱ya bintu byanje bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebili mu ki̱i̱kalo eki. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
oghu nkufoolagha bintu ebi kuba bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.’ ”
Musa aaghambila Alooni̱, batabani̱ baa Alooni̱ na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona bilaghilo ebi.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be ku̱hu̱ti̱ya bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuhaayo ewanje, niikuwo batahemula li̱i̱na lyanje li̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“Obaghile oti, ‘Mu mijo yaanu yoona eghi ekwisa, kaakuba omui mu baasukulu baanu oghu ateeli̱ye eebinga bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuhaayo ewaa
, muntu oghu ali na kubhinguwa mu maaso ghanje. Ni̱i̱si̱ye

“ ‘Kaakuba omui mu baasukulu baa Alooni̱ aba alwaye bulwaye bwa ntumbi kedha mahu̱nu̱ ngamutuwa mu busaasa, taali na kuliya haa bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aki̱li̱ye. Mu̱hongi̱ weena akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye kaakuba aku̱mʼo kintu kyona eki̱teeli̱ye kedha mu̱ku̱ kedha eelootelela.

Muntu weena akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye kaakuba aku̱mʼo kisolo kyona ekikwekuluulilagha hansi kedha muntu weena oghu akugubha kuleka naafooka ateeli̱ye kedha muntu wa mulingo ghwona oghu akumufoola oghu ateeli̱ye.
Muntu weena oghu aku̱ku̱mʼo kimui haa bintu ebi akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo. Taali na kuliya haa bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya anaabi̱ye maasi mubili ghwona.
Musana ghukaakukota, akuba eeli̱ye kandi akugubha kuliya haa bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nanga ni byokuliya biye.
Muntu oghu taali na kuliya kintu kyona aasangi̱ye kyekwi̱li̱i̱ye kedha eki binyama bya mu kisaka byati̱ye kandi kileka afooka oghu ateeli̱ye. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“ ‘Bahongi̱ bali na kukwata ebi naabalaghiiye, niikuwo musango ghutabasi̱nga kandi baku̱wa haabwa kubighaya. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
oghu akubafoolagha bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

“ ‘Taaliyo munamahanga nʼomui oghu atali wa mu ka ya mu̱hongi̱ oghu akugubha kuliya haa bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi, nankabha mu̱ghenu̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ oghu kedha mu̱koli̱ wee, ataliya haa bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi.
Kaakuba mu̱hongi̱ aghula mu̱syana na sente, kedha mu̱syana bamubyaliiye mu ka ya mu̱hongi̱ oghu, muntu oghu akugubha kuliya haa byokuliya ebi.
Kaakuba muhala wa mu̱hongi̱ asweluwa musaasa oghu atali mu̱hongi̱, mukali̱ oghu ataliya haa bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Kaakuba muhala wa mu̱hongi̱ aba ali mu̱kwi̱si̱ya kedha eba wee amu̱bhi̱ngi̱ye, bhaatu atali na baana kandi aasa kuukala mu ka ya ese wee, ngoku aakalaghayo anali mwana, akugubha kuliya haa byokuliya bya ese wee. Bhaatu muntu oghu atali wʼomu ka ya mu̱hongi̱ ataliya haa byokuliya ebi.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu weena asobi̱ya kandi aliya haa kihonguwa ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, ali na kusasula mu̱hongi̱ haabwa kihonguwa eki kandi ongelʼo kimui kyakataano kya muhendo ghwa byokuliya ebi.
Mu̱hongi̱ taali na ku̱bhi̱i̱ya bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuhaayo ewaa
haabwa ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya bantu abatali mu ntu̱la ya bahongi̱ kuliya haa bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi, kileeteleja bantu aba kuuhibuwʼo musango kandi kusasula. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
oghu akufoolagha bihonguwa ebi kuba bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Alooni̱, batabani̱ be na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona oti, ‘Kaakuba Munai̱saaleeli̱ kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye na Banai̱saaleeli̱, aleeta kisembo kuba kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya
, ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki aalahiiye kedha haabwa kubbala kuwe,
ali na kuleeta kisolo ekitali na kamogo ku̱lu̱gha mu nte, ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱ siye, niikuwo nki̱si̱i̱me.
Muntu ataleeta kisolo ekili na kamogo, nanga
taaku̱ki̱si̱i̱ma.
Kaakuba muntu ahayo kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge ewaa
ku̱lu̱gha mu nte, ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱ siye, ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki aalahiiye kedha haabwa kubbala kuwe, kikulaghiluwa kuba kisemeeye kandi ekitali na kamogo, niikuwo nki̱si̱i̱me.
Mutalihongela
kisolo eki maaso ghaaghaaye, ekihutaaye, ekilamaaye, ekikweyagha-yagha kedha ekilwaye bibbodhe. Mutalihonga kimui haa bisolo ebi haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa nga kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo.
Muntu akugubha kuhaayo ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte kedha ntaama eghi eli na kughulu ku̱di̱i̱di̱ye kedha kujambi̱ye kusaali̱ya ghanji nga kihonguwa haabwa kubbala kuwe, bhaatu
taaku̱si̱i̱ma kisolo eki haabwa muntu ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki aalahiiye.
Kisolo kyona eki ki̱twi̱ke kyakiyo kya nsoni̱ kyati̱ki̱ye, ki̱kpeetu̱ki̱ye, kihutaaye kedha ki̱jombi̱yʼo, mutalikihongela
kandi mutalikola kintu eki mu nsi yaanu.
Bisolo ngʼebi mutalibiiya mu banamahanga abaakaaye mu nsi yaanu kubihaayo nga bihonguwa bya byokuliya ewaa Luhanga. Taaku̱si̱i̱ma bisolo ebi haabwanu, nanga bili na kamogo kandi bilamaaye.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Kaakuba kyana kya nte, kyana kya ntaama kedha kyana kya mbu̱li̱ ki̱byaluwa, kili na kuukala na ni̱naakiyo haabwa bilo musanju̱. Kilo kyamunaanaa bakugubha kukihaayo ewaa
nga kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo.
Mutalisala nte na kyana kyayʼo, ntaama na kyana kyayo kandi mbu̱li̱ na kyana kyayo haa kilo kimui kubihonga.
“Kaakuba muhayo kihonguwa kya ku̱si̱i̱ma ewaa
, mukihongaghe mu mulingo ghu̱hi̱ki̱ye, niikuwo aki̱si̱i̱me haabwanu.
Muli na kuliya nyama sya kisolo eki haa kilo eki kyonini, mutati̱ghʼo nyama nʼemui ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“Nahabweki mukwate bilaghilo byanje kandi mukolaghe ebi bilaghiiye. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Mutalihemula li̱i̱na lyanje li̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, niikuwo Banai̱saaleeli̱ bamanye ngoku ndi ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
oghu akufoolagha enu̱we kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye
kandi oghu akabaaya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kuba Luhanga waanu. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Bini niibiyo bi̱ghenu̱ ebi
aataayʼo, ebi muli na kulangilila Banai̱saaleeli̱ kubaagha na kwekumaani̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kulami̱ya.

“ ‘Muli na bilo mukaagha bya kukola milimo yaanu, bhaatu kilo kyamusanju̱ ni kilo kya Sabhato kya kuhuumula, kilo kya kuba na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Mutalikola mulimo ghwona, hoona hambali muukaaye. Kilo eki ni kilo kya Sabhato kya
“ ‘Bini niibiyo bi̱ghenu̱ ebi
aataayʼo haabwanu, ebi muli na kukola haa bwile bwabiyo bwonini. Haa bilo ebi mubaaghe na kwekumaani̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kulami̱ya.
“ ‘Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo kya
kilatandikagha lwagholo lwa kilo kya eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa kya kweli̱ kwʼoku̱du̱bha.
Haa kilo kya eku̱mi̱ na bitaano kya kweli̱ oku, niibuwo Ki̱ghenu̱ kya
kya migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kilatandikagha kandi muli na kuliya migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so haabwa bilo musanju̱.
Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mutakolagha mulimo.
Muhongelaghe
bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo haabwa bilo musanju̱ kandi haa kilo kyamusanju̱ kya ki̱ghenu̱ eki mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mutakolagha mulimo.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mukaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi ndimaghenda kubaha kandi nimwakesa ebi mweleei̱ye, muleete ewaa mu̱hongi̱ mughanulo ghwa kabha kaa bilimuwa ebi mwadu̱bhi̱ye kukesa.
Mu̱hongi̱ oghu aamu̱ki̱ye kabha aka mu maaso ghaa
, niikuwo
asi̱i̱me kihonguwa eki haabwanu kandi mu̱hongi̱ ali na ku̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya kabha aka haa kilo ekilabhi̱yʼo Sabhato niyaahooyʼo.
Haa kilo eki mu̱hongi̱ aku̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya kabha aka, muli na kuhonga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya
kya kyana kya ntaama kya mwaka ghumui kandi ekitali na kamogo.
Kyana kya ntaama eki mukihonge na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kya ki̱lo ebili sya nsyano eghi esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta, kuba kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
. Muhonge dhee li̱ta emui ya vi̱i̱ni̱ kuba kihonguwa kyakunuwa.

Haa kilo eki, mutaliliya migaati̱, bilimuwa bi̱teeki̱ye kedha bibisi, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱leeti̱ye kihonguwa kya Luhanga waanu. Eki nkilaghilo eki muli na kukwata bilo nʼebilo kandi hoona hambali mulabaagha muukaaye mu mijo yaanu yoona mu bwile obuliisa.
“ ‘Muli na kubala wi̱i̱ki̱ musanju̱ ku̱lu̱gha haa kilo ekilabhi̱ye kilo kya Sabhato, kilo eki mwaleeti̱ye kabha kaa kihonguwa kya ku̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya.
Muli na kubala dhee bilo maku̱mi̱ ataano ku̱hi̱ka haa kilo ekilabhi̱ye Sabhato ya musanju̱, du̱mbi̱ muhaagheyo ewaa
kihonguwa kihyaka kya bilimuwa.
Bu̱li̱ ka eli na kuleeta migaati̱ ebili eghi elimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so ya ku̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya ewaa
, eghi bateeki̱ye mu ki̱lo ebili sya nsyano esemeeye, kuba kihonguwa kya mughanulo ewaa
Migaati̱ eghi mughihongaghe na byana bya ntaama musanju̱ bya mwaka ghumui kandi ebitali na kamogo, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui na ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili. Eki kibe kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya
. Mukihongaghe na bihonguwa bya bilimuwa na byakunuwa, kuba kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
Muli na kuhonga ntu̱u̱li̱ emui ya mbu̱li̱ kuba kihonguwa haabwa kibhi kandi byana bya ntaama bibili bya mwaka ghumui, kuba kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge.
Mu̱hongi̱ ali na ku̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya byana bya ntaama bibili mu maaso ghaa
nga kihonguwa baamu̱ki̱i̱ye, na mugaati̱ ghwa mughanulo. Bintu ebi ni kihonguwa ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
haabwa mu̱hongi̱ oghu.
Kilo eki mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mutakolagha mulimo. Eki nkilaghilo eki muli na kukwata bilo nʼebilo mu mijo yaanu yoona, hambali mulabaagha muukaaye.
“ ‘Obu mulabaagha nimukesa bilimuwa byanu mu nsi yaanu, mutahi̱kagha haa bu̱li̱ kumaliilila kwa musili, kedha kubimalamu byona, ebyati̱ghaayemu mubilekelaghe banaku na banamahanga. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,

“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya kweli̱ kwamusanju̱ kili na kuba kilo kyanu kya kuhuumula. Mulakaaghu̱wagha elaka lya bi̱i̱di̱yo haa kilo eki, mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Mutakolagha mulimo ghwona haa kilo eki, bhaatu muhongaghe ewaa
kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,

“Kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya kweli̱ kwamusanju̱ kilabaagha kilo kya mukolo ghwa bantu kughaniluwa bibhi. Haa kilo eki mutaliyagha kantu koona, bhaatu mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi muhaagheyo kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo kya
Mutakolagha mulimo ghwona haa kilo eki, nanga ni kilo kya mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi byanu mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waanu.
Muntu weena mu enu̱we oghu akubhenga kwesala ataliiye haa kilo eki, ali na kubhinguwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Muntu weena oghu akukola mulimo haa kilo eki, nku̱mu̱hwelekeeleli̱ya mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Mutalikola mulimo ghwona haa kilo eki kandi eki nkilaghilo kyanu eki muli na kukwata bilo nʼebilo mu mijo yaanu yoona, hambali mulabaagha muukaaye.
Kilo eki kilabaagha Sabhato yaanu kuhuumula kandi muli na kwesala mutaliiye. Sabhato yaanu etandikaghe lwagholo lwa kilo kya mwenda kya kweli̱ oku ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo lwa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱.”
aaghila Musa ati,
Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, “Kilo kya eku̱mi̱ na bitaano kya kweli̱ kwamusanju̱, niibuwo Ki̱ghenu̱ kya
kya Kulaala mu Bujalaja kilatandikagha kandi kilamalagha bilo musanju̱.
Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya ki̱ghenu̱ eki, mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mutakolagha mulimo ghwona.
Bilo musanju̱ ebi mubimalaghe nimunahongela
bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, haa kilo kyamunaanaa mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi kuhongela
kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo. Kilo eki kibaaghe kya kulami̱ya kumaliilila ki̱ghenu̱ eki kandi mutakolagha mulimo ghwona.
“Ebi niibiyo bi̱ghenu̱ ebi
aataayʼo ebi muli na kulangilila bantu, bwile obu balabaagha na kwekumaani̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kulami̱ya kandi kuleeta bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo bya
, bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye, bihonguwa bya bilimuwa, bihonguwa binji na bihonguwa byakunuwa kandi bu̱li̱ kimui mbakihonga haa kilo kyakiyo.
Mukolaghe bi̱ghenu̱ ebi kwongela haa Sabhato sya
kandi haa bisembo byanu, bihonguwa mulahiiye kuhaayo na bihonguwa mukuhaayo haabwa kubbala kwanu ewaa
“Nahabweki haa kilo kya eku̱mi̱ na bitaano kya kweli̱ kwamusanju̱, haanu̱ma ya kukumaani̱ya ebi mweleei̱ye mu nsi yaanu, mukolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ kya
eki haabwa bilo musanju̱. Kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya ki̱ghenu̱ eki ni kilo kya kuhuumula kandi na kilo kyamunaanaa ni kilo dhee kya kuhuumula.

Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya ki̱ghenu̱ eki mukwataghe bi̱ghu̱ma bya biti bisemeeye, bi̱kongu̱bho bya mba na matai ghaa biti bya mababi ghakani̱ye ebitooye haakpengbu̱ ya maasi kandi mudheedhuwaghe mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waanu haabwa bilo musanju̱.
Mukolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ kya
eki haabwa bilo musanju̱ bu̱li̱ mwaka. Kini nkilaghilo kyanu kukwata bilo nʼebilo mu mijo yaanu yoona. Muli na kukola ki̱ghenu̱ eki bu̱li̱ kweli̱ kwamusanju̱.
Mulaalaghe mu bujalaja haabwa bilo musanju̱. Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona bali na kulaala mu bujalaja,
niikuwo baasukulu baanu bamanye ngoku si̱ye
naalekagha Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalaala mu bujalaja, obu naabaayagha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.”
Nahabweki Musa aalangilila Banai̱saaleeli̱ bi̱ghenu̱ bya
ebi.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Olaghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ kukuleetela mafu̱ta ghasemeeye ghaa biti oli̱va ghaa kuta mu taala niikuwo taala eghi eekalaghe yaaki̱ye bwile bwona.
Bu̱li̱ lwagholo, Alooni̱ aghendaghe mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, abhaki̱yaghe taala kandi siikalaghe syaki̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi, mu maaso ghaa
, enja ya kateni̱ eghi eli mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano. Eki nkilaghilo eki muli na kukwata bilo nʼebilo mu mijo yaanu yoona eghi ekwisa.
Alooni̱ ali na kuloleelela taala esili haa kyakutʼo taala kya feeja esemeeye kandi siikalaghe syaki̱ye bwile bwona mu maaso ghaa
“Okwate ki̱lo eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya nsyano esemeeye kandi oteekemu migaati̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼebili.
Migaati̱ eghi oghipange mu lai̱ni̱ ebili, ote mukaagha mu bu̱li̱ lai̱ni̱, haa meeja ya feeja esemeeye mu maaso ghaa
Ote bubbani̱ busemeeye kandi busasi̱ye haa bu̱li̱ lai̱ni̱, hamui na migaati̱ kuba kyakuusukilʼo kya kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo kya
Bu̱li̱ kilo kya Sabhato, Alooni̱ apangaghe kusemeeye migaati̱ eghi haa meeja mu maaso ghaa
, haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ kuusuka ndaghaano ya bilo nʼebilo.

Migaati̱ eghi ebaaghe ya Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be kandi baghiliilaghe mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nanga nkilaghilo migaati̱ eghi kuba mughabo ghwabo ghu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini, haa bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo bya

Hakaba haliyo mutabani̱ wa mukali̱ Munai̱saaleeli̱ oghu musaasa Munami̱si̱li̱ aamubyayʼo, kilo kimui mutabhana oghu aatuwa mu weema yee hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye, aaghenda kandi aatandika kulwana na Munai̱saaleeli̱.
Mutabani̱ wa mukali̱ Munai̱saaleeli̱, ambula li̱i̱na lya
, du̱mbi̱ baamukwata kandi baamuleeta ewaa Musa. (Li̱i̱na lya ni̱na mutabhana oghu baamughilaghamu Selomi̱ti̱, muhala wa Di̱bbi̱li̱ wʼomu ntu̱la ya Daani̱.)
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baata mutabhana oghu mu nkomo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bamani̱ye eki
akubbala ati bakole.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati,
“Mu̱twesi̱ye enja ya hambali mughooneeye mutabhana oghu ambuuye
. Bantu boona abaaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki bate mikono yabo haa mutuwe ghuwe kandi ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kimuhuule mabaale aku̱we.
Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kaakuba muntu weena akiina Luhanga wee, bamufubile haabwa kibhi eki.
Muntu weena oghu akwambula li̱i̱na lya
ali na kwitibuwa. Ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kimuhuule mabaale aku̱we, nankabha aba ali munamahanga kedha ali Munai̱saaleeli̱, kaakuba ambula li̱i̱na lya
, ali na kwitibuwa.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu aata muunakiye, ali na kwitibuwa.
Kaakuba muntu aata kisolo kya muunakiye, asasulemu kisolo kisemeeye ekinaakaaye, bwomi̱i̱li̱ busasuluwe bwomi̱i̱li̱.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu ahutaali̱ya muliilanuwa wee, ngoku aamu̱hu̱taai̱ye haaliikuwo naye baamuhutaali̱ya.
Kaakuba amuhenda eku̱wa omuhende eku̱wa, oghu akumuuyamu li̱i̱so, omuuyemu li̱i̱so, oghu akumukobha li̱i̱no, omukobhe li̱i̱no.
Muntu ngoku aahu̱taai̱ye muunakiye haaliikuwo naye baamuhutaali̱ya.
Kaakuba muntu aata kisolo kya muunakiye, asasulemu kinji kisemeeye ekinaakaaye, bhaatu muntu weena oghu akwita muunakiye, ali na kwitibuwa.
Eki nkilaghilo kimui haa munamahanga na Munai̱saaleeli̱. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.’ ”
Obu Musa aamali̱ye kughambila Banai̱saaleeli̱ bintu ebi, du̱mbi̱ baatwesi̱ya enja ya hambali baghooneeye mutabhana oghu ambuuye
kandi baamuhuula mabaale aaku̱wa. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
aaghila Musa haa mwena Si̱naai̱ ati,
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mukaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi ndimaghenda kubaha, bu̱li̱ mwaka ghwamusanju̱ mutakolagha nsi eghi ku̱hu̱ti̱ya
Mu myaka mukaagha ohelaghe bilimuwa byawe mu misili yaanu, osaliililaghe misili yaawe ya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ kandi okesaghe bilimuwa byawe.
Bhaatu mwaka ghwamusanju̱ ghubaaghe Sabhato ya
kandi etaka lyona lihuumulaghe mwaka oghu. Otahelagha mu misili yaawe kedha kusaliilila misili yaawe ya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱.
Otakesagha bilimuwa ebikwetwela mu nsi eghi kedha kukobha bi̱ghu̱ma bya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ eghi etasaliliiye. Nsi eghi eli na kuhuumula mwaka oghu ghwona.

Bhaatu bilimuwa ebikwetwela mu nsi mu mwaka ghwa Sabhato ghwa kuhuumula oghu, bikugubha kuba byokuliya byanu kandi bya baheeleli̱ya baanu baabusaasa na baabukali̱, bakoli̱ baanu, banamahanga abaakaaye naanu,
bisolo byawe na binyama bya mu kisaka mu nsi yaanu eghi. Okugubha kuliya bilimuwa byona ebikutuwa mu nsi eghi.
“ ‘Obalaghe Sabhato ya myaka musanju̱, ekikumaani̱i̱si̱ya myaka musanju̱ milundi musanju̱, eghi niiyo yoona myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa na mwenda.
Haa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya kweli̱ kwamusanju̱ kwa mwaka ghwa maku̱mi̱ anaa na mwenda, kilo kya mukolo ghwa bantu kughaniluwa bibhi, muteelaghe bi̱i̱di̱yo mu nsi yaanu yoona.
Mutwalaghe mwaka ghwa maku̱mi̱ ataano kuba ghu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mulangililaghe bantu boona mu nsi yaanu ngoku ghuli mwaka ghwa bughabe.
Mwaka oghu ghubaaghe ghwa bughabe hambali bu̱li̱ muntu ali na kukuuka mu kibanja kiye kandi mu ntu̱la yee.
Mwaka ghwa maku̱mi̱ ataano ghubaaghe mwaka ghwanu ghwa bughabe. Mutahelagha bilimuwa kedha kukesa ebyetweleeyemu byonini kedha kukobha bi̱ghu̱ma bya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ eghi mutasaliliiye.
Nanga ni mwaka ghwa bughabe kandi ghu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaanu. Nahabweki muliyaghe ebyetweleeye mu misili.
“ ‘Mu mwaka ghwa bughabe oghu bu̱li̱ muntu ali na kukuuka mu kibanja kiye.
“ ‘Kaakuba oghu̱li̱ya kedha oghula kibanja na Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe, bu̱li̱ muntu abe wa majima haa muunakiye.

Kaakuba oghula musili ewaa Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe, muhendo okusasula ghuli na kusighikila haa myaka eghi yaasaaye ku̱lu̱gha haa mwaka ghwa bughabe oghu. Oghu aku̱ghu̱li̱ya ali na kutʼo muhendo naasighikila haa myaka eghi enati̱ghaaye ku̱hi̱ka haa mwaka ghunji ghwa bughabe oghu.
Myaka eghi niyaabaaye ekani̱ye, ali na kukani̱ya muhendo, bhaatu niyaabaaye eli nkee, ali na ku̱keehi̱ya muhendo, nanga ebi akwete ku̱ku̱ghu̱li̱ya ni bilimuwa ebi okuhelamu.
Bu̱li̱ muntu abe wa majima haa muunakiye kandi mu̱hu̱ti̱ye Luhanga. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
“ ‘Mu̱hu̱ti̱ye ebi nkubalaghila kandi mweghendeseleje kukwata bilaghilo byanje, niikuwo muukale kusemeeye mu nsi eghi.
Nsi eghi ekweli̱ya byokuliya bikani̱ye, mukuliya muukute kandi muukale mu nsi eghi kusemeeye.
Mukugubha ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya muti, “Mbiki tukuliya mu mwaka ghwamusanju̱ obu tukuba tutaakuhela kandi tutaakukesa bilimuwa byatu?”
Mu mwaka ghwa mukaagha nkubaha mu̱gi̱sa, nsi yaanu ekweli̱ya byokuliya ebikubamala haabwa myaka esatu.
Obu mukuba nimuhela bilimuwa mu mwaka ghwa munaanaa, mukuliya byokuliya ebi mwaheli̱ye mu myaka ya enu̱ma kandi mukweyongela kuliya byokuliya ebi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kukesa kwa mwaka ghwa mwenda.
“ ‘Muntu ataghu̱li̱ya muunakiye kibanja kukitwalila kimui, nanga nsi eghi ni yanje, enu̱we mukughiikalamu nga banamahanga kandi bapangi̱i̱si̱ya banje.
Kaakuba muntu aghula kibanja ewaa muunakiye, oghu aamu̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye kiyo niiye ali na kukicungula.
Kaakuba Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe aba munaku kandi aghu̱li̱ya haa kibanja kiye, lughanda luwe eenini aaniiye aacungula kibanja eki.
Kaakuba muntu oghu aba atali na lughanda luwe eenini oghu akughula kibanja eki, bhaatu atunga sente sikumala sya kugubha kukicungula,
ali na kubala myaka eghi yaasaaye ku̱lu̱gha aaki̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye, niikuwo asasule oghu akakighula myaka eghi enati̱ghaaye mu maaso kandi akyeku̱u̱ki̱li̱ye.

Kaakuba atagubha ku̱kyeku̱u̱ki̱li̱ya, aleke kiikale kili kya oghu aaki̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa mwaka ghwa bughabe. Mu mwaka ghwa bughabe oghu, kibanja eki baki̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱ye mukama wakiyo oghu akaki̱ghu̱li̱ya.

“ ‘Kaakuba muntu aghu̱li̱ya numba eghi eli mu kibugha eki bigho byeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye, ali na bughabe kutodha kughighula mwaka ghumui ghutakahooyʼo haanu̱ma ya ku̱ghi̱ghu̱li̱ya. Mu mwaka oghu ghwona akugubha kutodha kughicungula.

Kaakuba atagubha kucungula numba eghi mu mwaka ghumui, numba eghi eli mu kibugha eki bigho byeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye, elabaagha ya oghu aaghi̱ghu̱li̱ye na baasukulu be bilo nʼebilo. Mu mwaka ghwa bughabe batamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱ya numba eghi.
Bhaatu manumba ngaabaaye ghali mu kyalo kandi ghatali na bigho bi̱gheeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye, bakama baa manumba agha bakugubha kughacungula kandi ku̱gheeku̱u̱ki̱li̱ya mu mwaka ghwa bughabe.
“ ‘Kaakuba Baleevi̱ baba bali na manumba mu maatau̱ni̱ agha bigho byeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye, bali na bughabe bwa kughacungula bwile bwona.

Bhaatu kaakuba Mu̱leevi̱ aghu̱li̱ya numba mu maatau̱ni̱ agha kandi atagubha kughicungula, eli na kumukuukila mu mwaka ghwa bughabe, nanga manumba agha Baleevi̱ bali nagho mu maatau̱ni̱ agha ni manumba ghaabo bwile bwona mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Bhaatu byalo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu ebili haai na maatau̱ni̱ ghaa Baleevi̱, tabali na ku̱bi̱ghu̱li̱ya, nanga ni byabo bilo nʼebilo.
“ ‘Kaakuba omui mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyawe aba munaku kandi atakugubha kwekoonela, omukoonele ngoku wangukola munamahanga kedha mu̱ghenu̱ wa bwile bukee, niikuwo aakale naawe.
Otamuuyʼo maghobo ghaa mulingo ghwona, bhaatu uwe ohu̱ti̱ye Luhanga waawe, niikuwo Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe oghu aakale naawe.
Otamweholi̱ya sente oti akuteelʼo maghobo kedha ku̱mu̱ghu̱li̱ya byokuliya niikuwo otungʼo maghobo.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu, oghu akabaaya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kubaha nsi ya Kanaani̱ kandi kuba Luhanga waanu.
“ ‘Kaakuba Muhebbulaayo muunakyawe aba munaku kandi atu̱wamu kweghu̱li̱ya ewaawe, otamu̱koleesi̱ya nga mu̱syana.
Omutwalikani̱ye nga muntu opangi̱i̱si̱i̱ye kukukolela kedha nga mu̱ghenu̱ oghu aakaaye naawe kandi ali na kukukolela ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa mwaka ghwa bughabe.
Bwile obu oli na kumuleka aghende na baana be mu ka yee kandi mu ntu̱la yee.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ ni baheeleli̱ya banje aba naahi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi tabali na kubaghu̱li̱ya nga basyana.
Otabatwalikani̱yagha kubhi, bhaatu ohu̱ti̱yaghe Luhanga waawe.
Basyana baanu baabusaasa na baabukali̱ bali na ku̱lu̱gha mu mahanga agheeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye enu̱we, mukugubha kughula basyana ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu aba.
Mukugubha kughula banamahanga abaakaaye naanu kedha bamui mu baana baabo aba babyaliiye mu nsi yaanu kuba basyana baanu.
Mukugubha kuha bantu aba batabani̱ baanu kuba bantu baabo kedha kubafoola basyana baabo bilo nʼebilo, bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanu, mutalilengʼo kubatwalikani̱ya kubhi.

“ ‘Kaakuba munamahanga kedha mu̱ghenu̱ wa bwile bukee oghu aakaaye naanu afooka muguudha kandi omui mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanu aba munaku kandi eeghu̱li̱ya ewaa munamahanga oghu aakaaye naanu kedha aba omui mu bantu baa ntu̱la ya muntu oghu,
haanu̱ma ya muntu oghu kweghu̱li̱ya, omui haa baghenji̱ be boonini ali na bughabe bwa kumucungula.
Muto wa ese wee kedha mu̱ghenji̱ wee kedha omui haa bantu baa ntu̱la yee boonini akugubha kumucungula, kedha naabaaye muguudha akugubha kwecungula eenini.

Eye na oghu alimaghula bali na kubala bwile ku̱lu̱gha eeghu̱li̱i̱ye ku̱hi̱ka haa mwaka ghwa bughabe. Muhendo ghwa kumucungula ghuli na kusighikila haa muhendo bakusasulagha mu̱koli̱ haabwa myaka eghi.
Kaakuba aba anali na myaka ekani̱ye ku̱hi̱ka haa mwaka ghwa bughabe, niikuwo eecungule, ali na kusasula ghusaaye haa muhendo ghwa sente esi baamu̱ghu̱li̱ye.

Kaakuba aba ati̱ghaaye myaka nkee ku̱hi̱ka haa mwaka ghwa bughabe, abaliilile na mukama wee, naasighikila haa myaka eghi anati̱ghaai̱ye kukola ku̱hi̱ka haa mwaka ghwa ki̱ghenu̱ eki kandi asasulaghe sente sya myaka eghi eti̱ghaaye kwecungula.
Munamahanga ali na kumutwalikani̱ya nga mu̱koli̱ apangi̱si̱i̱ye bu̱li̱ mwaka. Mutasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya munamahanga oghu kukola kubhi Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyanu.
Nankabha asaaghuwa kwecungula mu milingo eghi yoona, mu mwaka ghwa kukola ki̱ghenu̱ eki, mukama wee ali na kumuha bughabe kughenda na baana be.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ ni bantu banje kandi baheeleli̱ya banje aba naahi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.’ ”
aaghila ati, “Mutalyekolela bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga kedha kusimba mpaghi sya mabaale kedha bisasani̱ bya mabaale mu nsi yaanu, mutali̱teeleli̱ya bintu ebi kubilami̱ya. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.
“Mu̱hu̱ti̱yaghe kilo kyanje kya Sabhato na ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kyanje. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
“Kaakuba mukwamilila bilaghilo byanje kandi mweghendeseleja kukwata ebi nkubalaghila,
nkuleka mbu̱la etoone mu nsi yaanu mu bwile bwayʼo, nsi eghi ekweli̱ya bilimuwa kandi biti bikwanʼo bi̱ghu̱ma.

Mukukesa bilimuwa bikani̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa bwile bwa kukobha mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ kandi kukobha mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ kukweyongela ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kuhela nsigho. Mukuliya byokuliya byona ebi mukubbala kandi muukale kusemeeye mu nsi yaanu.

“Nkubaha bu̱si̱nge mu nsi eghi, mukulangaala kandi mughwesaghile hataliyo muntu oghu akuboobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya. Nkuuya mu nsi yaanu binyama bya kabhi bya mu kisaka ebikwitagha kandi taakubaamu bulemo bwona.
Mukubhinga ngi̱ghu̱ syanu kandi mubaate na kihiyo.
Bantu bataano mu enu̱we balabhingagha ki̱ku̱mi̱ kandi ki̱ku̱mi̱ balabhingagha bantu mutwalo ghumui baa ngi̱ghu̱ syanu kandi mukubaata boona na kihiyo.
Nkughilila enu̱we kisa, nkuleka mu̱byale baana bakani̱ye kandi mukane, nkulinda ndaghaano eghi naakoli̱ye naanu.
Mukuba nimunaliya bilimuwa ebi mwabi̱i̱ki̱ye mu mwaka ghuhooye kandi mulabiiyagha mu sitoowa syanu niikuwo mutunge mwanya ghwa kutaamu ebi mwakesi̱ye buhyaka.
Nkuukala naanu kandi tankubalu̱ghʼo.
Ndaghendagha naanu, nkuba Luhanga waanu kandi mukuba bantu banje.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu oghu akabaaya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, niikuwo mutatodha kuba basyana baa Banami̱si̱li̱. Nkabaaya mu kubona-bona mwabaaghamu kandi naaleka mwalubhatanga mu̱gu̱mi̱ye.
“Kaakuba mubhenga ku̱nji̱ghu̱wa kandi kukwata bilaghilo byanje byona, nkubafubila.
Kaakuba mubhenga ebi nkubalaghila, mughaya ntu̱wamu syanje, musaaghuwa kukwata ebi nkubalaghila byona kandi mu̱tu̱wa ndaghaano yanje,
nkubakolʼo bini: nkubaleetʼo bintu bya kabhi, ndwala esitaakukila, mu̱swi̱ja oghukubaaghala maaso kandi mukwoloba kwonini. Mukuhela nsigho bhaatu ngi̱ghu̱ syanu niisiyo sikuliya bilimuwa byanu.
Nkufubila enu̱we kandi ngi̱ghu̱ syanu sikubasi̱ngu̱la, aboohi̱ye enu̱we niibo bakubalema kandi mulali̱gi̱tagha muntu nʼomui atakwete kubahuma.
“Kaakuba mubhenga ku̱nji̱ghu̱wa haanu̱ma ya kubakolʼo ebi byona, nkubafubila milundi musanju̱ kusaali̱ya haala haabwa bibhi byanu.
Nkubamalamu kwepanka kwanu kwa butaaghu̱wa, mbu̱la teekutodha kutoona ku̱lu̱gha mu mwanya, nsi yaanu ekwoma kandi yoomiile nga kyoma.
Maani̱ ghaanu ghaa kukola ghaku̱kwi̱la busa, nanga nsi yaanu teekweli̱ya bilimuwa kandi biti tabikwanʼo bi̱ghu̱ma.
“Kaakuba mweyongela kukola ebi ntabbali̱ye kandi kubhenga ku̱nji̱ghu̱wa, nkweyongela kubafubila milundi musanju̱ kusaali̱ya haala haabwa bibhi byanu.
Nkubatumila binyama bya mu kisaka, bikwita baana baanu, bi̱ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bisolo byanu, mu̱ku̱ti̱ghala bakee kandi nguudhe syanu si̱ku̱ku̱wa.
“Bhaatu haanu̱ma ya bifubilo ebi byona, kaakuba muukala munabhengi̱ye ku̱nji̱ghu̱wa kandi mweyongela kukola ebi ntabbali̱ye,
nanje nkukola ebi mutabbali̱ye kandi nkubafubila milundi musanju̱ kusaali̱yʼo haabwa bibhi byanu.

Nkubaleetamu bulemo nkuhoola ngi̱ghu̱ haabwa ku̱tu̱wa ndaghaano yanje. Kaakuba mughenda kwekumaani̱li̱ya mu bibugha byanu, nkubasindikila bifubilo bya ndwala kandi nkubahaayʼo mu mikono ya ngi̱ghu̱ syanu.
Nku̱keei̱ya byokuliya byanu, bakali̱ eku̱mi̱ balateekelagha mu capu̱li̱ya emui, balaleetagha byokuliya haanu̱ma ya ku̱pi̱i̱ma ebi muntu akuliya, mulaliyagha byokuliya bhaatu tamulaakutagha.
“Kaakuba mubona ebi byona, bhaatu mubhenga ku̱nji̱ghu̱wa kandi mweyongela kukola ebi ntabbali̱ye,
nanje nkukola ebi mutabbali̱ye, nkusaaliluwa kwonini naanu kandi nkubafubila milundi musanju̱ haabwa bibhi byanu.
Njala ekuleka muliye batabani̱ baanu na bahala baanu.

Nku̱hwelekeeli̱ya bi̱i̱kalo bya haagu̱u̱li̱ ya bwena hambali mukulami̱li̱yagha baaluhanga baanu. Nkujombakaka byakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byanu hambali mu̱ku̱tu̱mi̱kagha bubbani̱. Mi̱ku̱ yaanu nkughituuma haagu̱u̱li̱ ya bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga baanu kandi nkwoha enu̱we.
Nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bibugha byanu, nkugenga hansi bi̱i̱kalo hambali mukulami̱li̱yagha baaluhanga baanu kandi tanku̱si̱i̱ma bihonguwa byanu bisasi̱ye.
Nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kwonini nsi yaanu kandi ngi̱ghu̱ syanu abaakaayemu bakusweka.
Nkubaleetamu bulemo, ngi̱ghu̱ syanu sikubaata na kihiyo kandi nkulalangi̱ya enu̱we mu mahanga ghanji. Nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bibugha byanu kandi nsi yaanu ekifooka elungu.
Haanu̱ma yʼeki kubʼo, enu̱we munali mu mahanga ghaa ngi̱ghu̱ syanu, nsi yaanu ekutunga bilo bya Sabhato bya kuhuumula ngoku mwangughilekagha ehuumula haa bu̱li̱ mwaka ghwamusanju̱.
Bwile obu nsi ekumala etalimu muntu, ekutunga kuhuumula kwamaani̱ oku yaabaagha etakatu̱ngi̱ye mu bilo bya Sabhato enu̱we munaakaayemu.

“ ‘Bamui mu enu̱we abakuba bati̱ghaayʼo kandi balalangiiye mu mahanga ghaa ngi̱ghu̱ syabo bakwobahila kimui, elaka lya kibabi mpwegha eku̱hu̱ngi̱ya lilalekagha bali̱gi̱te. Mulali̱gi̱tagha nga bantu bakwete kuuluka kihiyo kandi muleegengagha muntu ataakubahuma.
Muntu alakobhokagha muunakiye nga bantu bakwete kuuluka kihiyo, nankabha hataliyo oghu akwete kubahuma. Nahabweki tamukugubha kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syanu.
Mu̱ku̱kwi̱la mu mahanga ghanji kandi bantu bʼomu nsi sya ngi̱ghu̱ syanu baku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya enu̱we.
Bakee mu enu̱we abakuba bati̱ghaayʼo mu nsi ya ngi̱ghu̱ syanu, bakuhwelekeelela haabwa bibhi byanu na bibhi bya baataata baanu.
“ ‘Kaakuba bantu aba baatula bibhi byabo na ebi baataata baabo baakoli̱ye haabwa kubhenga ku̱nji̱ghu̱wa kandi kukola ebi ntabbali̱ye.

Bintu ebi niibiyo byaleki̱ye naasaaliluwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi naabalalangi̱ya mu nsi sya ngi̱ghu̱ syabo. Bhaatu kaakuba Banai̱saaleeli̱ baba badhooti̱, baleka kuba na mitima yoomakakaane kandi basi̱i̱ma kufubiluwa haabwa bibhi byabo,
nkuusuka ndaghaano yanje eghi naakoli̱ye na Yakobbo kandi ndaghaano yanje eghi naakoli̱ye na I̱saka kandi ndaghaano yanje eghi naakoli̱ye na Ebbulahi̱mu̱ kandi nkuusuka nsi eghi.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ baku̱lu̱gha mu nsi eghi, eti̱ghale etalimu muntu kandi etunge bilo bya Sabhato bya kuhuumula. Bantu aba bakusasula haabwa bibhi byabo haabwa kubhenga bilaghilo byanje kandi kughaya ebi naalaghiiye.

Bhaatu eki kikaakubʼo, obu bakuba babatwete kandi banali mu nsi sya ngi̱ghu̱ syabo, tankubhenga Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba kedha kubooha kedha kubahwelekeeleli̱ya. Tankuleka ndaghaano eghi naakoli̱ye na bantu aba. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga wabo.

Haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba, nkuusuka ndaghaano eghi naakoli̱ye na baataata baabo aba naahi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, bantu bʼomu mahanga ghanji banaloli̱ye kandi kuba Luhanga wa Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Ebi niibiyo bilaghilo, ntu̱wamu na ndaghikiililo ebi
aahaaye Musa haa mwena Si̱naai̱ haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kaakuba muntu alahila kuhaayo muntu onji ewaa
, muntu oghu ali na kuba na bughabe haanu̱ma ya kusasula muhendo ghwa sente.
Musaasa oghu ali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa myaka nkaagha ya bukulu, bamusasuulilaghe bi̱twi̱ke maku̱mi̱ ataano bya siliva, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kya mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye
kandi muntu oghu naabaaye ali mukali̱, bamusasuulilaghe bi̱twi̱ke maku̱mi̱ asatu bya siliva.

Kaakuba aba ali mwana wabusaasa oghu ali na myaka etaano ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ya bukulu, bamusasuulilaghe bi̱twi̱ke maku̱mi̱ abili bya siliva kandi wabukali̱ bi̱twi̱ke eku̱mi̱ bya siliva.
Kaakuba mwana wabusaasa aba ali haagati ya kweli̱ kumui na myaka etaano ya bukulu, bamusasuulilaghe bi̱twi̱ke bitaano bya siliva kandi wabukali̱ bi̱twi̱ke bisatu bya siliva.

Kaakuba musaasa oghu aba ali na myaka nkaagha ya bukulu na kusaalʼo, bamusasuulilaghe bi̱twi̱ke eku̱mi̱ na bitaano bya siliva kandi naabaaye ali wabukali̱ bamusasuulilaghe bi̱twi̱ke eku̱mi̱ bya siliva.

Kaakuba muntu oghu aalahiiye aba ali munaku kandi ataakugubha kusasula muhendo oghu baataayʼo, aghende ewaa mu̱hongi̱ kandi mu̱hongi̱ amughambile muhendo, naasighikila ngoku muntu oghu akugubha kusasula.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu aalahila kuhaayo kisolo nga kihonguwa ewaa
, kisolo eki kikufooka ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Kisolo kisemeeye atakihingamu kisolo ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kandi kisolo ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye atakihingamu kisolo kisemeeye. Kaakuba kisolo eki akihingamu kisolo kinji, byombi bikufooka bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Kaakuba kisolo eki muntu aalahiiye kuhaayo kiba eki̱teeli̱ye ewaanu kandi eki bataakugubha kuhongela
, muntu oghu akitwale ewaa mu̱hongi̱.
Mu̱hongi̱ atu̱wemu muhendo ghwa kisolo eki, naasighikila haa kusemela kedha kutasemela kwakiyo kandi muhendo oghu aku̱tu̱wamu aaniighuwo baakighula.
Kaakuba mukama wa kisolo eki abbala kukicungula, ali na kwongela kimui kyakataano haa muhendo ghwakiyo.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu ahayo numba yee nga kintu ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
, mu̱hongi̱ atu̱wemu muhendo ghwa numba eghi naasighikila haa kusemela kedha kutasemela kwayo kandi muhendo oghu aku̱tu̱wamu aaniighuwo baaghighula.
Kaakuba musaasa oghu aahaayeyo numba eghi abbala kughicungula, ali na kwongela kimui kyakataano haa muhendo oghu kandi numba eghi etodhe ebe yee.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu ahayo ewaa

ki̱twi̱ke kya kibanja baa ka yee bamuhaaye, mu̱hongi̱ atu̱wemu muhendo ghwakiyo naasighikila haa kukana kwa nsigho eghi bakuhelamu, nsigho ya bbaale niyaabaaye eli ki̱lo maku̱mi̱ abili baghighulaghe bi̱twi̱ke eku̱mi̱ bya siliva.
Kaakuba muntu ahayo musili ghuwe mu mwaka ghwa bughabe, muhendo oghu mu̱hongi̱ aatu̱u̱yemu aaniighuwo baaghughula.

Kaakuba ahayo musili ghuwe haanu̱ma ya mwaka ghwa ki̱ghenu̱ eki, mu̱hongi̱ abaliilile muhendo ghwa musili oghu naasighikila haa myaka eghi enati̱ghaaye ku̱hi̱ka haa mwaka ghunji ghwa bughabe kandi akeehi̱ye haa muhendo ghwa musili oghu.
Kaakuba musaasa oghu aahaayeyo musili oghu abbala kughucungula, ali na kwongelʼo kimui kyakataano kya muhendo oghu kandi musili oghu ghutodhe ghube ghuwe.
Bhaatu kaakuba atabbala kucungula musili oghu, kedha aba aghu̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye muntu onji, taakugubha kutodha kughucungula.
Kaakuba musili oghu baghucungula mu mwaka ghwa bughabe, ghukufooka musili ghu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye nga musili bahaayeyo ewaa
kandi ghukuba ghwa bahongi̱.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu ahayo ewaa
musili oghu aghu̱li̱ye, oghutali ki̱twi̱ke kya kibanja eki bantu baa ka yee bamuhaaye,
mu̱hongi̱ ali na ku̱tu̱wamu muhendo ghwa musili oghu ku̱hi̱ka haa mwaka ghwa bughabe kandi muntu oghu aaghu̱ghu̱li̱ye aghusasule kilo eki kyonini nga kintu ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Mu mwaka ghwa bughabe oghu, musili oghu ghuli na kukuukila oghu akaghu̱ghu̱li̱ya, oghu akadu̱bha kuba mukama waghuwo.
Muhendo ghwa bu̱li̱ musili, mu̱hongi̱ aaniiye aaghu̱tu̱waagha naasighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kyomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
“ ‘Hatabʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akuhaayo mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa kisolo, nanga mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona ni ya
. Mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona ya nte, ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱, ni ya

Mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa kisolo eki̱teeli̱ye, mukama waghuwo ali na kughucungula haa muhendo oghu mu̱hongi̱ aataayʼo kandi ongelʼo kimui kyakataano kya muhendo oghu. Kaakuba ataghucungula baghu̱ghu̱li̱ye haa muhendo oghu mu̱hongi̱ aatu̱u̱yemu.
“ ‘Bhaatu taaliyo kintu na kimui eki musaasa aahaayeyo ewaa
, eki bali na ku̱ghu̱li̱ya kedha kucungula, nankabha ali muntu, kisolo kedha musili, nanga kintu kyona eki bahaayeyo ewaa
ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini.
Muntu oghu baahaayeyo kuhwelekeelela, taali na kucunguluwa, bhaatu ali na kwitibuwa.
“ ‘Kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya bu̱li̱ kintu eki̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu nsi eghi, kibe kya bilimuwa byʼomu musili kedha kya bi̱ghu̱ma bya biti, byona ni bya
kandi bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Kaakuba muntu abbala kucungula bimui haa kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ eki, ali na kwongelʼo kimui kyakataano kya muhendo ghwa kintu eki.
Kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya nte, ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱, kisolo eki mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya wakiyo akutaaghʼo mwi̱gho ghuwe makibala, kikuba kisolo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Muntu taali na kukoma mu bisolo ebi ekisemeeye nʼekitasemeeye, kedha ku̱hi̱ngamu kisolo kinji. Kaakuba ahingamu kinji, byombi bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi tabili na kucunguluwa.’ ”
Ebi niibiyo bilaghilo ebi
aahaaye Musa haa mwena Si̱naai̱ haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Numbers: aabu̱gha na Musa mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱ haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya kweli̱ kwakabili kwa mwaka ghwakabili, haanu̱ma ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Aaghila Musa ati, “Obale muhendo ghwona ghwa ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo. Ohandiike bu̱li̱ li̱i̱na lya musaasa omui haa omui.
Uwe na Alooni̱ muli na kubala basaasa boona Banai̱saaleeli̱ abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo, abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe.
Musaasa omui ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la kandi mukulu wa ntu̱la eghi akukoonela enu̱we.
Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la abali na kukoonela enu̱we:
Aba niibo basaasa aba baakomi̱ye mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱, beebembeli̱ baa ntu̱la sya baataata baabo. Baaba bakulu baa ntu̱la sya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Musa na Alooni̱ baabilikila hamui basaasa eku̱mi̱ na babili aba baahaayeyo mali̱i̱na ghaabo

kandi baakumaani̱ya hamui ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya kweli̱ kwakabili. Baahandiika muhendo ghwa basaasa boona abaabaagha bali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo,
ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa. Musa aabala bantu aba mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa I̱saaleeli̱, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo omui haa omui, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ ghwaba mitwalo enaa kakaagha na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo omui haa omui, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱ ghwaba mitwalo etaano kenda na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bisatu.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo omui haa omui, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ ghwaba mitwalo enaa nku̱mi̱ etaano lukaagha na maku̱mi̱ ataano.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo omui haa omui, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da ghwaba mitwalo musanju̱ nku̱mi̱ enaa na lukaagha.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali, abaabaagha bali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo omui haa omui, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali ghwaba mitwalo etaano nku̱mi̱ enaa na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo omui haa omui, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱ ghwaba mitwalo etaano kasanju̱ na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Yojeefu̱ kandi baasukulu baa Efulahi̱mu̱, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo omui haa omui, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ ghwaba mitwalo enaa na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Manase, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo omui haa omui, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Manase ghwaba mitwalo esatu nku̱mi̱ ebili na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ ghwaba mitwalo esatu nku̱mi̱ etaano na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Daani̱, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Daani̱ ghwaba mitwalo mukaagha nku̱mi̱ ebili na lusanju̱.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Aseli̱, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Aseli̱ ghwaba mitwalo enaa lu̱ku̱mi̱ nʼebitaano.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Nafutaali, abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe, baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaabo, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Nafutaali, ghwaba mitwalo etaano nku̱mi̱ esatu na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.
Abaabali̱ye bantu aba ni Musa, Alooni̱ na beebembeli̱ eku̱mi̱ na babili baa Banai̱saaleeli̱, bu̱li̱ omui mu beebembeli̱ aba ali mukulu wa ntu̱la yee.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baabusaasa abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ya bukulu na kusaalʼo kandi abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe ghaa Banai̱saaleeli̱, baababala kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Muhendo ghwona ghwa basaasa aba ghwaba mitwalo nkaagha nku̱mi̱ esatu bitaano na maku̱mi̱ ataano.
Bhaatu basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ tabaababaliiye mu muhendo ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ oghu.
akaba naaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati,
“Otabala basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ kedha kubala muhendo ghwabo mu muhendo ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyabo.

Bhaatu Baleevi̱ obahe mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi elimu sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, bintu byayo byona na byaku̱koleesi̱yamu byona. Baleevi̱ aba bali na kuheeka weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye hambali baakaghendi̱ye hoona kandi baaghoonaghe baghyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye.

Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ balabaagha mbalu̱gha hambali baghooneeye, Baleevi̱ bonkaha haaniibo baasakaalulagha weema eghi kandi baghikwelaghe mu ki̱i̱kalo kihyaka hambali mukughenda kughoona. Muntu onji weena oghu akwebinga weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi ali na kwitibuwa.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji boona bali na kukwela weema syabo kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo. Bu̱li̱ musaasa ali na kughoona na bantu bʼomu ntu̱la yee kandi bu̱li̱ ntu̱la eli na kusimba bhendela yayo.
Baleevi̱ bali na kukwela weema syabo kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, niikuwo
atasaaliluwagha na ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱. Baleevi̱ bali na kuba na mulimo ghwa kuloleelela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola byona ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati,
“Banai̱saaleeli̱ bali na kughoona beeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, bhaatu bateebinga haai na weema eghi. Bu̱li̱ musaasa aakale mu ntu̱la yee kandi bu̱li̱ ntu̱la ebe na bhendela yayo.”
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da baaghoonaghe haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba kusighikila haa bhendela sya ntu̱la syabo. Mukulu wa ntu̱la eghi ni Naasoni̱ mutabani̱ wa Aminadaabbu.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo musanju̱ nku̱mi̱ enaa na lukaagha.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali baghoonaghe balabhaane na baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali ni Netaneeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Juhala.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo etaano nku̱mi̱ enaa na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱ baghoonaghe balabhaane na baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱ ni Eli̱yaabbu mutabani̱ wa Heloni̱.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo etaano kasanju̱ na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa boona bʼomu bi̱bbu̱la bisatu bya luhande lwa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da, ghwaba mitwalo eku̱mi̱ na munaanaa kakaagha na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa. Bantu aba baghendaghe bali ki̱bbu̱la kyʼoku̱du̱bha.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ baghoonaghe haa luhande lwa eku̱wa hansi ya bhendela yabo, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ ni Elijuula mutabani̱ wa Sedula.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo enaa kakaagha na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱ baghoonaghe balabhaane na baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱ ni Selu̱myeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Yulisadaai̱.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo etaano kenda na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bisatu.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ baghoonaghe balabhaane na baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ ni Eli̱yasaafu mutabani̱ wa Leu̱weli̱.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo enaa nku̱mi̱ etaano lukaagha na maku̱mi̱ ataano.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa boona bʼomu bi̱bbu̱la bisatu bya luhande lwa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, ghwaba mitwalo eku̱mi̱ nʼetaano lu̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa na maku̱mi̱ ataano. Bantu aba baghendaghe bali ki̱bbu̱la kyakabili.

Du̱mbi̱ Baleevi̱ balabhaghʼo kandi baghendaghe baheeki̱ye weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, bali haagati ya bi̱bbu̱la bibili ebihikiiye na bi̱bbu̱la bibili ebi̱ti̱ghaaye enu̱ma. Bantu baa bu̱li̱ ntu̱la baghendaghe balabhi̱ye oghu aheeki̱ye bhendela yabo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ baghoonaghe haa luhande lwa bughuwa ejooba kusighikila haa bhendela sya ntu̱la syabo. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ ni Eli̱sama mutabani̱ wa Ami̱hu̱di̱.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo enaa na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Manase baghoonaghe balabhaane na baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Manase ni Gamalyeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Pedajula.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo esatu nku̱mi̱ ebili na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ baghoonaghe balabhaane na baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ ni Abbidaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Gi̱di̱yooni̱.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo esatu nku̱mi̱ etaano na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa boona bʼomu bi̱bbu̱la bisatu bya luhande lwa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱, ghwaba mitwalo eku̱mi̱ kanaanaa na ki̱ku̱mi̱. Bantu aba baaghendagha bali ki̱bbu̱la kyakasatu.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Daani̱ baghoonaghe haa luhande lwa elughulu, kusighikila haa bhendela sya ntu̱la syabo. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Daani̱ ni Ahi̱yejeeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Amisadaai̱.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo mukaagha nku̱mi̱ ebili na lusanju̱.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Aseli̱ baghoonaghe balabhaane na baa ntu̱la ya Daani̱. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Aseli̱ ni Pagi̱yeeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Okulaani̱.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo enaa lu̱ku̱mi̱ na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Nafutaali baghoonaghe balabhaane na baa ntu̱la ya Daani̱. Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Nafutaali ni Ahi̱la mutabani̱ waa Enani̱.
Mu ntu̱la yee baabalamu basaasa mitwalo etaano nku̱mi̱ esatu na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.

Muhendo ghwa basaasa boona bʼomu ntu̱la ya Daani̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, ghwaba mitwalo eku̱mi̱ nʼetaano kasanju̱ na lukaagha. Bantu aba baghendaghe bati̱ghaaye enu̱ma kandi baamu̱ki̱i̱ye bhendela sya ntu̱la syabo.

Musa na abaamukoonelagha baababala basaasa boona baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ abaagubhagha kulwana. Baababala mu bi̱bbu̱la kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo kandi muhendo ghwabo ghwaba mitwalo nkaagha nku̱mi̱ esatu bitaano na maku̱mi̱ ataano.
Bhaatu Baleevi̱ tabaababaliiye mu muhendo ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyabo, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola byona ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa. Baaghoona kusighikila haa bhendela sya ntu̱la syabo kandi bu̱li̱ muntu aaghendagha na bantu baa ka yee.
Bani niibo baasukulu baa Musa na Alooni̱, bwile obu
aabu̱ghi̱ye na Musa haa mwena Si̱naai̱.
Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ baa Alooni̱: Nadaabbu niiye akaba ali mu̱li̱ghaaso ghuwe, aalabhʼo Abbi̱hu̱, Eli̱yeeja na I̱tamala.
Agha niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ baa Alooni̱, aba baasi̱i̱ghi̱ye mafu̱ta kandi baabalu̱wi̱ka ku̱heeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱.
Bhaatu Nadaabbu na Abbi̱hu̱ baakwi̱la mu maaso ghaa

mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱, haabwa ku̱tu̱mi̱ka mu maaso ghe mulilo atabalaghiiye. Nadaabbu na Abbi̱hu̱ bakaba batali na baana. Nahabweki Eli̱yeeja na I̱tamala baakala mbaheeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱ esebo Alooni̱ anaakaaye.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oleete ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ mu maaso ghaa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱, niikuwo bamukoonelaghe.
Bali na ku̱heeleli̱ya Alooni̱ na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi kukola milimo haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi.
Bali na kuloleelela bintu byʼomu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi kukola mulimo mu weema eghi haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona.
Baleevi̱ aba obahe Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be, naamuhaaye kwonini bantu aba ku̱lu̱gha mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji.
Okome Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be ku̱heeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱. Muntu onji weena oghu akwebinga ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ali na kwitibuwa.”
aatodha aaghila Musa ati,
“Olole, mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona naatwete Baleevi̱ mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kutwala bu̱li̱ mwana wabusaasa mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba. Baleevi̱ ni bantu banje,

nanga mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ni yanje. Obu naati̱ye mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona ya Banami̱si̱li̱, nkakomamu baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kuba banje. Mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya bisolo na bantu ni byanje. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
aaghila Musa mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱ ati,
“Obale Baleevi̱ boona kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo. Obale bu̱li̱ mwana wabusaasa oghu ali na kweli̱ kumui na kusaalʼo.”
Nahabweki Musa aabala Baleevi̱ aba, ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ baa Leevi̱: Geli̱sooni̱, Kohati̱ na Melaali̱.
Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ baa Geli̱sooni̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo: Li̱bbi̱ni̱ na Si̱meeyi̱.
Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ baa Kohati̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo: Amulaamu, I̱jali̱, Hebbu̱looni̱ na U̱jeeli̱.
Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa batabani̱ baa Melaali̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo: Mahi̱li̱ na Mu̱si̱. Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Baleevi̱ kusighikila haa baataata baabo.
Ntu̱la sya Bageli̱sooni̱ syalu̱gha mu batabani̱ be babili, Li̱bbi̱ni̱ na Si̱meeyi̱.
Muhendo ghwa baana baabusaasa aba baabali̱ye mu ntu̱la ya Li̱bbi̱ni̱ na Si̱meeyi̱ abaabaagha na kweli̱ kumui na kusaalʼo ghwaba kasanju̱ na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.
Ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ eghoonaghe luhande lwa bughuwa ejooba enu̱ma sya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ akaba ali Eli̱yasaafu mutabani̱ wa Lai̱li̱.

Mulimo oghu bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ baakolagha haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, ghukaba ghuli ghwa kuloleelela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, byaku̱swi̱ki̱la haagu̱u̱li̱ yayo, kateni̱ ya kuta haa mulyango ghwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye,

kateni̱ sya kuta haa lugho lwa jighati̱, kateni̱ sya kuta haa geeti̱ ya lugho olweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, mighuwo na milimo yoona eghi ekwetʼo ku̱koleesi̱ya bintu ebi byona.
Mu baasukulu baa Kohati̱ haalu̱ghamu ntu̱la ya Amulaamu, ya I̱jali̱, ya Hebbu̱looni̱ na U̱jeeli̱. Esi niisiyo ntu̱la enaa sya baasukulu baa Kohati̱.
Muhendo ghwa baana baabusaasa abali na kweli̱ kumui na kusaalʼo ghwaba kanaanaa na lukaagha. Mulimo ghwa ntu̱la sya Bakohati̱ ghukaba ghuli kuloleelela bintu byʼomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Ntu̱la esi syaghoonagha haa luhande lwa eku̱wa lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Mukulu wa ntu̱la sya Bakohati̱ akaba ali Elijafaani̱ mutabani̱ wa U̱jeeli̱.

Mulimo ghwa ntu̱la enaa esi ghukaba ghuli kuloleelela sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, meeja, kyakutʼo taala, byakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, bintu bya bahongi̱ ku̱koleesi̱ya mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kateni̱ na milimo yoona eghi ekwetʼo ku̱koleesi̱ya bintu ebi.
Eli̱yeeja mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱ niiye akaba ali mwebembeli̱ wa ntu̱la ya Leevi̱. Niiye akaba aloleleeye abaabaagha na bujanaani̱ji̱buwa bwa kulinda Ki̱i̱kalo Ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Ntu̱la ebili sya Melaali̱ ni ya Mahi̱li̱ na ya Mu̱si̱.
Muhendo ghwa baana baabusaasa abali na kweli̱ kumui na kusaalʼo aba baabali̱ye ghwaba kakaagha na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili.
Mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ akaba ali Ju̱lyeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Abbiyai̱li̱. Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ bali na kughoona haa luhande lwa elughulu lwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ baabaha mulimo ghwa kuloleelela fuleemu sya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, mikiiko yayo, mpaghi, ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi esi, byaku̱koleesi̱yamu byona na milimo yoona eghi ekwetʼo ku̱koleesi̱ya bintu ebi.
Baaloleelagha dhee mpaghi sya kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya mu jighati̱, ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi esi, nkondo sya mpaghi sya lugho lwa jighati̱ na mighuwo yasiyo.

Musa, Alooni̱ na batabani̱ baa Alooni̱, baaghoonagha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Bakaba bali na mulimo ghwa kuloleelela ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Muntu onji weena oghu eebingagha ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aatibuwagha.
Muhendo ghwona ghwa Baleevi̱ oghu Musa na Alooni̱ baabali̱ye, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo ngoku
aabalaghiiye, otaayemu baana boona baabusaasa abali na kweli̱ kumui na kusaalʼo, ghwaba mitwalo ebili na nku̱mi̱ ebili.
aaghila Musa ati, “Obale mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi ohandiike bu̱li̱ li̱i̱na lya mwana wabusaasa oghu ali na kweli̱ kumui na kusaalʼo.
Mu ki̱i̱kalo kya mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona ya Banai̱saaleeli̱, onkomelemu Baleevi̱ kandi mu ki̱i̱kalo kya mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona ya bisolo bya Banai̱saaleeli̱ onkomelemu bya Baleevi̱. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Nahabweki Musa aabala mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona ya Banai̱saaleeli̱, ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Muhendo ghwa baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso abali na kweli̱ kumui na kusaalʼo, aba aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye mali̱i̱na ghaabo, ghwaba mitwalo ebili nku̱mi̱ ebili bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili nsanju̱ na basatu.
aaghila dhee Musa ati,

“Baleevi̱ bakuba banje kandi bakukuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kya baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso ya Banai̱saaleeli̱. Bisolo bya Baleevi̱ aba bikukuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kya mi̱li̱ghaaso yabusaasa ya bisolo bya Banai̱saaleeli̱. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Kucungula baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili nsanju̱ na basatu baa Banai̱saaleeli̱, abasaaye haa muhendo ghwa Baleevi̱,
bu̱li̱ omui bamusasuulile bi̱twi̱ke bitaano bya siliva, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kyʼomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Sente esi bantu bakusasula haabwa kucungula mi̱li̱ghaaso ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ abasaaye haa muhendo ghwa Baleevi̱, basihe Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be.”
Nahabweki Musa aakumaani̱ya siliva eghi bantu baasasuuye haabwa kucungula baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso baa Banai̱saaleeli̱, abasaaye haa muhendo ghwa Baleevi̱.

Siliva eghi baakumaani̱i̱ye haabwa baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ abasaaye haa muhendo ghwa Baleevi̱ yaaba lu̱ku̱mi̱ na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bisatu nkaagha nʼetaano, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kyʼomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Siliva baahaayeyo haabwa kucungula baana baabusaasa aba, Musa aaghiha Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be, ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati,
“Mubale basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la sya Bakohati̱ mu ntu̱la ya Baleevi̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Mubale basaasa boona abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ asatu ku̱hi̱ka haa myaka maku̱mi̱ ataano ya bukulu, abakugubha kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Mulimo oghu baasukulu baa Kohati̱ balakolagha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, ni kuloleelela bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini.

Obu mulabaagha ni̱mu̱lu̱gha hambali mughooneeye, Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be bataahaghe mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, basu̱ndu̱ki̱yaghe kateni̱ eghi eli mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano kandi baghi̱swi̱ki̱laghe haa sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi.
Du̱mbi̱ bali na kuta haa sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi lughoye olu̱koleeu̱we mu mpu sya mbu̱li̱, baswi̱ki̱lʼo na lughoye lwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱ kandi bate mpaghi sya kughiheekelʼo mu mpete syayo.

“Haagu̱u̱li̱ ya meeja ya kutʼo mugaati̱ ghwa kuhonga, baalʼo lughoye lwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱ kandi batʼo capu̱li̱ya, bbaaku̱li̱, bibindi na jaaga sya kutaamu kihonguwa kyakunuwa. Bhaatu mugaati̱ ghuli na kuukalʼo bwile bwona.
Bintu ebi babi̱swi̱ki̱le na lughoye lwa langi̱ mutuku kandi baswi̱ki̱lʼo na lughoye olu̱koleeu̱we mu mpu sya mbu̱li̱ kandi bate mu meeja eghi mpaghi sya kughiheekelʼo.
“Bakwate lughoye lwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱ kandi balu̱swi̱ki̱le haa kyakutʼo taala, taala syakiyo, makaasi, biisaniya, bibindi na bintu byona bya kutaamu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Bali na ku̱swi̱ki̱la kyakutʼo taala, na byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona na lughoye olu̱koleeu̱we mu mpu sya mbu̱li̱ kandi babite haa fuleemu sya kubiheekelʼo.
“Kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya feeja baki̱swi̱ki̱le na lughoye lwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, baswi̱ki̱lʼo lughoye olu̱koleeu̱we mu mpu sya mbu̱li̱ kandi batemu mpaghi sya kukiheekelʼo.

“Bakwete bintu byona ebi baku̱koleesi̱yagha mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, babibohe mu lughoye lwa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱, baswi̱ki̱lʼo na lughoye olu̱koleeu̱we mu mpu sya mbu̱li̱ kandi babite haa fuleemu sya kubiheekelʼo.
“Baaye ki̱bu̱ haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya bbu̱looji̱ kandi baalʼo lughoye lwa langi̱ ya papo.

Batʼo bintu byakiyo byona ebi baku̱koleesi̱yaghʼo bini: capu̱li̱ya sya ku̱tu̱mi̱kamu mulilo, huuma sya kukwati̱ya nyama, bi̱ti̱i̱yo, biisaniya na bibindi. Baswi̱ki̱le bintu ebi na lughoye olu̱koleeu̱we mu mpu sya mbu̱li̱ kandi batemu mpaghi sya kuheekelʼo kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki.

“Obu Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be balamalagha ku̱swi̱ki̱la bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi, na byona ebi baku̱koleesi̱yagha mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bamali̱ye kweteekani̱ja ku̱lu̱gha hambali baghooneeye, basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bakohati̱ baasaghe kuheeka bintu ebi. Bhaatu bataku̱ma haa bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi. Kaakuba bakola eki baku̱ku̱wa. Ebi niibiyo bintu byʼomu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu ebi Bakohati̱ bali na kuheeka.

“Eli̱yeeja mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱, aaniiye aaloleelelagha mafu̱ta ghaa taala, bubbani̱ busasi̱ye, kihonguwa kya bu̱li̱ ki̱lo kya bilimuwa na mafu̱ta ghaa kusiigha. Eli̱yeeja aaniiye aaloleelelagha weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, na bu̱li̱ kintu ekilimu, otaayemu bintu byamu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye byona.”
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati,
“Mutaleka ntu̱la sya baasukulu baa Kohati̱ nsihwelekeelela mu Baleevi̱.

Kini haaliikiyo mwabakolelagha niikuwo baakale bali boomi̱i̱li̱ kandi bataku̱wa kaakuba beebinga bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be bali na kutaaha mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi bahaaghe bu̱li̱ musaasa wʼomu ntu̱la ya Bakohati̱ mulimo oghu akukola kandi eki akuheeka.
Bhaatu Bakohati̱ aba batataahagha mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kubona ngoku Baleevi̱ bakwete ku̱swi̱ki̱la bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Kaakuba bakola eki baku̱ku̱wa.”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Obale basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ kusighikila haa maka ghaabo na ntu̱la syabo.
Ohandiike mali̱i̱na ghaa basaasa boona abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ asatu ku̱hi̱ka haa maku̱mi̱ ataano ya bukulu, abakugubha kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
“Ghuni niighuwo mulimo oghu bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ balakolagha kandi nʼebi balaheekagha:

Balaheekagha kateni̱ syʼomu weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, byaku̱ghi̱swi̱ki̱la kandi bya ku̱swi̱ki̱la haagu̱u̱li̱ bya mpu sya mbu̱li̱, kateni̱ sya kuta haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.

Baheekaghe dhee kateni̱ syʼomu jighati̱ sya kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, kateni̱ ya kuta haa geeti̱ ya jighati̱, mighuwo na bintu byona ebi baku̱koleesi̱yagha milimo mu weema eghi. Bageli̱sooni̱ bakolaghe byona ebikwetaaghisibuwa kuloleelela bintu ebi.
Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be haaliibo baaghambilagha basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ mulimo oghu bali na kukola. Baghambilaghe bantu aba ebi bali na kuheeka kandi milimo enji eghi bali na kukola.
Oghu niighuwo mulimo oghu basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ balakolagha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. I̱tamala mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱ abaaghe mukulu wabo haa mulimo oghu.”
aatodha aaghila Musa ati, “Obale basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ kusighikila haa maka ghaabo na ntu̱la syabo.
