Ohandiike mali̱i̱na ghaa basaasa boona abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ asatu ku̱hi̱ka haa maku̱mi̱ ataano ya bukulu, abakugubha kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.

Ghuni niighuwo mulimo oghu basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ balakolagha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Baheekaghe fuleemu sya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, mikiiko yayo, mpaghi syayo, ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi,

mpaghi sya jighati̱ ya kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya weema eghi, ncuba sya kutaamu mpaghi esi, nkondo sya kukwata mpaghi sya weema eghi, mighuwo na byaku̱ghi̱koleesi̱ya byona. Ohandiike mali̱i̱na ghaa bintu ebi bu̱li̱ musaasa ali na kuheeka.
Oghu niighuwo mulimo oghu basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ bali na kukola mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. I̱tamala mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱ abaaghe mukulu wabo haa mulimo oghu.”
Musa, Alooni̱ na beebembeli̱ baa ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabala basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bakohati̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Baabala basaasa boona abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ asatu ku̱hi̱ka haa maku̱mi̱ ataano ya bukulu, abakugubha kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa aba baabali̱ye kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo ghwaba nku̱mi̱ ebili lusanju̱ na maku̱mi̱ ataano.
Oghu niighuwo muhendo ghwa basaasa boona bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bakohati̱ abaaheeleli̱yagha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Musa na Alooni̱ baabala basaasa aba, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baabala basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Baabala basaasa boona abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ asatu ku̱hi̱ka haa maku̱mi̱ ataano ya bukulu, oghu akugubha kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa aba baabali̱ye kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo, ghwaba nku̱mi̱ ebili lukaagha na maku̱mi̱ asatu.
Oghu niighuwo muhendo ghwa basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ abaaheeleli̱yagha mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Musa na Alooni̱ baabala bantu aba ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baabala basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Baabala basaasa boona abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ asatu ku̱hi̱ka haa maku̱mi̱ ataano ya bukulu, abakugubha kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa aba baabali̱ye kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, ghwaba nku̱mi̱ esatu na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili.
Oghu niighuwo muhendo ghwa basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la sya Melaali̱. Musa na Alooni̱ baabala basaasa aba ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Nahabweki Musa, Alooni̱ na beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabala basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo na maka ghaabo.
Basaasa boona abaabaagha na myaka maku̱mi̱ asatu ku̱hi̱ka haa maku̱mi̱ ataano ya bukulu, abaasi̱ye kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya kandi kuheeka weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu,
ghwaba kanaanaa bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano na kinaanaa.
Bu̱li̱ musaasa baamuha mulimo oghu akukola kandi nʼeki akuheeka, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa. Baabala basaasa aba ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
aaghila Musa ati,

“Olaghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱twesi̱yagha enja ya hambali baghooneeye muntu weena oghu alwaye ntumbi kedha oghu mahu̱nu̱ ghakwete kutuwa mu mubili, kedha oghu aafooki̱ye ateeli̱ye haabwa ku̱ku̱mʼo mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu.
Batwesi̱yaghe hanja ya hambali baghooneeye musaasa kedha mukali̱ oghu ali na ndwala eghi, niikuwo batabhi̱i̱ya hambali baghooneeye haala, nanga niiyo nkuukala na Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba.”
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola eki. Baatwesi̱ya bantu aba hanja ya hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye. Baakola eki
aalaghiiye Musa.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kaakuba musaasa kedha mukali̱ akola kimui haa bibhi ebi bantu bakukolagha kandi abhi̱i̱ya bwesighibwa buwe na
, muntu oghu musango ghu̱mu̱si̱ngi̱ye
kandi ali na kwatula kibhi eki aakoli̱ye. Ali na kusasula muhendo ghuusuuye haabwa eki aasobeei̱ye. Muntu oghu ali na kwongelʼo kimui kyakataano kandi byona abihe oghu aasobeleei̱ye.
Bhaatu kaakuba oghu baakoli̱ye kubhi aku̱wa kandi atabʼo lughanda luwe lwonini oghu akutwala nsasu̱li̱ eghi, ebaaghe ya
kandi baghihaaghe mu̱hongi̱, hamui na ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi muntu oghu aahaayeyo nga kihonguwa haabwa mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi biye.
Bihonguwa byona bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ balaleetagha ewaa mu̱hongi̱, bibaaghe bya mu̱hongi̱ oghu.
Bihonguwa byona bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi balaleetagha ewaa mu̱hongi̱ bibaaghe bya mu̱hongi̱ oghu kandi bu̱li̱ mu̱hongi̱ ali na kubiika bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi baamuhaaye.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kaakuba mukali̱ oghu asweuwe afooka oghu atali mwesighibuwa,
haabwa kulangaala na musaasa onji kandi aki̱bi̱sa eba wee kedha muntu onji, mukali̱ oghu eebhi̱i̱hi̱i̱ye nankabha kai̱so atabʼo kandi bataamukwatiiye mu kikoluwa eki.
Kaakuba eba wee atandika kweli̱li̱kanʼo kubhi mukali̱ wee oghu ati aakoli̱ye kibhi kedha amuteekelejʼo kubhi kandi mukali̱ oghu atakoli̱ye kintu eki,

musaasa oghu atwale mukali̱ wee oghu ewaa mu̱hongi̱. Atwale dhee ki̱lo emui ya nsyano ya bbaale nga kihonguwa haabwa mukali̱ wee oghu. Kihonguwa eki mu̱hongi̱ atatamu mafu̱ta kedha bubbani̱ nanga ni kihonguwa eki musaasa oghu akwete kweli̱li̱kanʼo kubhi mukali̱ wee aaleeti̱ye, kubbala kumanya mukali̱ oghu akaakuba naakoli̱ye kintu eki.
“ ‘Mu̱hongi̱ ali na kuleeta mukali̱ oghu kandi amwemi̱li̱li̱ye mu maaso ghaa
Du̱mbi̱ mu̱hongi̱ ali na kuta maasi ghahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu jaaga ya ebumba kandi ali na kuuya haa tu̱u̱tu̱ eghi eli hansi mu weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, aghite mu maasi agha.
Haanu̱ma ya mu̱hongi̱ kwemi̱li̱li̱ya mukali̱ oghu mu maaso ghaa

, alaghile kumusambuula esoke kandi amukwati̱ye mu ngalo kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kya musaasa oghu akwete kweli̱li̱kanʼo kubhi mukali̱ wee aaleeti̱ye. Mu̱hongi̱ oghu aakale anakwete jaaga eghi elimu maasi ghasaaliiye ghaa mukiino.’ ”

Du̱mbi̱ mu̱hongi̱ alahi̱li̱ye mukali̱ oghu kandi amughile ati, “Musaasa onji akaakuba ataalangaaye naawe kandi otaasobeei̱ye kwefoola oghu ateeli̱ye onasweuwe bali̱i̱ waawe, maasi ghasaaliiye ghaa mukiino ghani ghatakukolʼo kabhi koona.
Bhaatu okaakuba nuwaasobeei̱ye kulangaala na musaasa onji onasweuwe bali̱i̱ waawe kandi weebhi̱i̱ya kulangaala na musaasa onji oghu atali bali̱i̱ waawe”
du̱mbi̱ mu̱hongi̱ ali na kughambila mukali̱ oghu kulahila ngoku mukiino ghuni ghukumubʼo. Ali na kumughila ati, “
akuleka okiinuwe mu bantu baa ewaanu, bakughaye, tooku̱byala mwana kandi aku̱bhi̱mba etundu.
Maasi ghaa mukiino ghani, ghakaakukota munda yaawe, ghaku̱ku̱bhi̱mbi̱ya etundu kandi tooku̱byala mwana.”
Mukali̱ oghu akuukemu mu̱hongi̱ ati, “Aami̱i̱na, haaliikuwo kyaba.”
“Mu̱hongi̱ ahandiike bighambo bya mukiino ebi mu kitabo kandi abinaabi̱yemu bighende mu maasi ghasaaliiye agha.
Maasi ghasaaliiye ghaa mukiino agha mu̱hongi̱ ali na kughaha mukali̱ oghu aghanuwe, ghakaakumukota munda, etundu likutandika kumusaalila.
Mu̱hongi̱ aaye kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kya musaasa oghu akwete kweli̱li̱kanʼo kubhi mukali̱ wee, mu ngalo sya mukali̱ oghu, aki̱i̱mu̱ki̱ye mu maaso ghaa
kandi akitwale haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.

Du̱mbi̱ mu̱hongi̱ aaye ngalo emui ya nsyano haa kihonguwa kya bilimuwa eki nga kihonguwa kyakuusukilʼo kandi aghyokeli̱ye haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa. Haanu̱ma yʼeki, ahe mukali̱ oghu maasi agha kandi aghanuwe.

Mukali̱ oghu akaakuba eebhi̱i̱hi̱i̱ye kandi atali mwesighibuwa ewaa eba wee, akaakunuwa maasi ghasaaliiye ghaa mukiino agha, aku̱bhi̱mba etundu, taaku̱byala baana kandi akukiinuwa mu bantu baa ewaabo.
Bhaatu kaakuba mukali̱ oghu aba ataakoli̱ye kintu eki kandi ali oghu eeli̱ye, kabhi takakumubʼo kandi akugubha ku̱byala baana.
“Eki niikiyo kilaghilo haa mukali̱ oghu asweuwe oghu aku̱sobi̱ya kandi kwebhi̱i̱ya kulangaala na musaasa onji anasweuwe eba wee,
kedha musaasa eeli̱li̱kana kubhi ati mukali̱ wee aalangaaye na musaasa onji. Mu̱hongi̱ aleke mukali̱ oghu eemilile mu maaso ghaa
kandi mu̱hongi̱ ali na kukola mukolo oghu ngoku bilaghilo bilaghiiye.
Musaasa oghu taali na musango, bhaatu mukali̱ wee oghu kaakuba musango ghuba ghu̱mu̱si̱ngi̱ye, ali na kufubiluwa haabwa kibhi eki.”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kaakuba musaasa kedha mukali̱ abbala kukola kilahilo kya mbaghani̱ja kya kwehaayo ewaa
atalinuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ kedha kyakunuwa kinji kyona ekikutami̱i̱li̱yagha. Atalinuwa kyakunuwa kisaaliiye kya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ kandi kuliya bi̱ghu̱ma bibisi kedha byomi̱ye bya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱.
Bwile obu akumala aneehaayeyo ewaa
, ataliliya kintu kyona eki̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ nankabha nsigho yayo kedha biiyamba byayo.
“ ‘Bwile bwona obu akumala analahiiye kwehaayo ewaa
, batalimughemba esoke na kaawembo. Ali na kuukala ali oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bwile bwona obu akumala aneehaayeyo ewaa
, aleke esoke liye likule kandi lijambe.
Bwile bwona obu muntu oghu akumala aneehaayeyo ewaa
, atalyebinga mu̱ku̱.

Nankabha aba ali ese wee, ni̱na wee, mu̱ghenji̱ wee kedha mwani̱na wee, ataku̱mʼo mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu oghu kwebhi̱i̱ya, nanga esoke lijambi̱ye mu mutuwe ghuwe nkaakulolelʼo ngoku eehaayeyo ewaa Luhanga.
Bwile bwona obu ali na kumala aneehaayeyo, ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu akwi̱la bwangu-bwangu haai na muntu oghu kandi afoola esoke liye kuba eli̱teeli̱ye ewaa
, haa kilo kyamusanju̱ kya kweyeli̱ya bamughembe esoke, niikuwo atodhe afooke oghu eeli̱ye.
Haa kilo kyamunaanaa muntu oghu ali na kuleeta bi̱i̱bbi̱mbo bibili kedha bwana bwa bu̱u̱pi̱i̱so bubili ewaa mu̱hongi̱ haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Mu̱hongi̱ ali na kuhonga emui haa noni̱ esi nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi kandi enji nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, niikuwo muntu oghu
amughanile, nanga aasi̱i̱si̱ye kuba haai na mu̱ku̱. Kilo eki kyonini esoke liye likutodha kuba li̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Ali na kulahila buhyaka ngoku aatodhi̱ye kutandika kwehaayo ewaa
kandi ali na kuleeta kyana kya ntaama kya mwaka ghumui nga kihonguwa kya kuuhibuwʼo musango. Bhaatu atabala bilo aadhu̱bhi̱ye kumala ateeli̱ye ewaa
nanga bwile obu akuba eebhi̱i̱hi̱i̱ye.
“ ‘Kini ni kilaghilo kya muntu oghu eehaayeyo ewaa
haanu̱ma ya bwile buwe kuhuwʼo. Muntu oghu bamuleetaghe haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Haa mulyango haala, ali na kuhaayo bihonguwa biye ewaa

. Kyana kya ntaama kya mwaka ghumui kandi ekitali na kamogo, kuba kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, ntaama yabukali̱ ya mwaka ghumui eghi etali na kamogo, kuba kihonguwa haabwa kibhi kandi ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama eghi etali na kamogo, kuba kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge.

Ali na kuleeta dhee kighegha kya migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, keeki̱ esi̱teeki̱ye na mafu̱ta kandi nsyano esemeeye na capati esi̱si̱i̱ghi̱yʼo mafu̱ta. Ali na kuleeta kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na bihonguwa byakunuwa.
“ ‘Mu̱hongi̱ ali na kubitwala mu maaso ghaa
kandi ahonge kihonguwa haabwa kibhi na kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye.
Mu̱hongi̱ oghu ali na kuhonga ewaa
kighegha kya migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama nga kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge, kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na kihonguwa kyakunuwa.
“ ‘Oghu eehaayeyo ewaa
, bali na kumughemba esoke lyona mu mutuwe, haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Ali na kukwata esoke eli kandi alite mu mulilo hambali mu̱hongi̱ ahongeeye kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge.
“ ‘Haanu̱ma ya kughemba esoke lya oghu eehaayeyo ewaa
, mu̱hongi̱ ali na kuuya mu kighegha nyama ya ebhango eghi eteeki̱ye ya ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama, mugaati̱ ghutalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so na capati eghi etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kandi abikwati̱ye muntu oghu mu ngalo.
Mu̱hongi̱ aamu̱ki̱ye bintu ebi ewaa
, nga kihonguwa eki baamu̱ki̱i̱ye, mbanda na kibelo, byona bikufooka bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi ni bya mu̱hongi̱. Haanu̱ma yʼeki oghu aabaagha eehaayeyo akugubha kunuwa vi̱i̱ni̱.
“ ‘Kini niikiyo kilaghilo kya oghu eehaayeyo ewaa

kandi oghu aalahiiye kuhaayo kihonguwa kiye haabwa kwehaayo kuwe. Akugubha kuleeta dhee bihonguwa binji, bhaatu ali na ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki aalahiiye kuhaayo kusighikila haa kilaghilo kya muntu oghu eehaayeyo.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be bighambo bini ebi balabu̱ghagha mbaha Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu̱gi̱sa. Baghilaghe bati,
akuhe mu̱gi̱sa
kandi akulinde.
akulole na maaso ghe adheedheeu̱we
kandi akughilile ngughuma.
akulole
kandi akuhe mpempa.’ ”
“Kaakuba Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be baha mu̱gi̱sa Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu li̱i̱na lyanje, nkuha Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba mu̱gi̱sa.”

Obu Musa aamali̱ye kukwela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, naaghisiigha mafu̱ta ghaa ku̱ghyeli̱ya kandi kweli̱ya bintu byayo byona, aasiigha dhee mafu̱ta kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa ku̱kyeli̱ya na byaku̱koleesi̱yʼo byona.

Du̱mbi̱ beebembeli̱ eku̱mi̱ na babili baa ntu̱la eku̱mi̱ nʼebili baa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱, baaleeta bihonguwa byabo haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi. Basaasa aba ni beebembeli̱ abaakooneeye Musa na Alooni̱ kubala Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Bini niibiyo bihonguwa ebi baaleeti̱ye mu maaso ghaa
, nte eku̱mi̱ nʼebili kandi bu̱li̱ mwebembeli̱ aaleeta nte emui, bigaali̱ mukaagha kandi bu̱li̱ beebembeli̱ babili baaleeta kigaali̱ kimui. Baabihaayo mu maaso ghaa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Osi̱i̱me bihonguwa byabo ebi, niikuwo bantu babi̱koleesi̱ye mulimo haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Obihe Baleevi̱ babi̱koleesi̱ye kusighikila haa mulimo oghu muntu akwete kukola.”
Nahabweki Musa aakwata bigaali̱ ebi na nte esi kandi aabiha Baleevi̱.
Aaha ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ bigaali̱ bibili na nte enaa, kusighikila haa mulimo ghwabo.
Aaha ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ bigaali̱ bbinaa na nte munaanaa, kusighikila haa mulimo ghwabo. Bantu aba boona oghu aabaloleelelagha haa mulimo ni I̱tamala mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱.
Bhaatu Musa taahaaye Bakohati̱ haa bintu ebi, nanga mulimo ghwabo ghukaba ghuli kuheeka bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haa mabegha ghaabo.
Obu Musa aasi̱i̱ghi̱ye mafu̱ta haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaleeta bihonguwa byabo haabwa kukihaayo kandi baabita mu maaso ghaa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki.
aaghila Musa ati, “Bu̱li̱ kilo, mwebembeli̱ omui ahaagheyo kihonguwa kiye haabwa kuhaayo kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.”
Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha Naasoni̱ mutabani̱ wa Aminadaabbu, mwebembeli̱ wa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da aaleeta kihonguwa kiye.

Bini niibiyo aaleeti̱ye: sahaani̱ emui ya siliva ku̱lyota kwayo ki̱lo emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke, bbaaku̱li̱ emui ya siliva ku̱lyota kwayo gulaamu lunaanaa, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kyʼomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Bu̱li̱ emui ekaba elimu nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va, kuba kihonguwa kya bilimuwa.
Aaleeta kaasaniya kamui kaanabwana kaa feeja ku̱lyota kwakʼo gulaamu ki̱ku̱mi̱ nʼeku̱mi̱, akaasuuyʼo bubbani̱,
ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui na kyana kya ntaama kimui kyabusaasa kya mwaka ghumui, nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye.
Aaleeta ntu̱u̱li̱ emui ya mbu̱li̱ nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi,

nte ebili, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama etaano, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya mbu̱li̱ etaano na byana bya ntaama bitaano byabusaasa bya mwaka ghumui, nga kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge. Eki niikiyo kihonguwa eki Naasoni̱ mutabani̱ wa Aminadaabbu aaleeti̱ye.
Haa kilo kyakabili Netaneeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Juhala, mwebembeli̱ wa ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali, aaleeta kihonguwa kiye.

Haa kilo kyakasatu, Eli̱yaabbu mutabani̱ wa Heloni̱, mwebembeli̱ wa ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱, aaleeta kihonguwa kiye.

ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui na kyana kya ntaama kimui kyabusaasa kya mwaka ghumui, nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye.
Aaleeta ntu̱u̱li̱ emui ya mbu̱li̱ nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi,

nte ebili, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama etaano, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya mbu̱li̱ etaano na byana bya ntaama bitaano byabusaasa bya mwaka ghumui, nga kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge. Eki niikiyo kihonguwa eki Pagi̱yeeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Okulaani̱ aaleeti̱ye.
Haa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ na bibili Ahi̱la mutabani̱ wa Enani̱, mwebembeli̱ wa ntu̱la ya Nafutaali, aaleeta kihonguwa kiye.

Bini niibiyo aaleeti̱ye: sahaani̱ emui ya siliva ku̱lyota kwayo ki̱lo emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke, bbaaku̱li̱ emui ya siliva ku̱lyota kwayo gulaamu lunaanaa, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kyʼomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Bu̱li̱ emui ekaba elimu nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va, kuba kihonguwa kya bilimuwa.
Aaleeta kaasaniya kamui kaanabwana kaa feeja ku̱lyota kwakʼo gulaamu ki̱ku̱mi̱ nʼeku̱mi̱, akaasuuyʼo bubbani̱,
ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui na kyana kya ntaama kimui kyabusaasa kya mwaka ghumui, nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye.
Aaleeta ntu̱u̱li̱ emui ya mbu̱li̱ nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi,

nte ebili, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama etaano, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya mbu̱li̱ etaano na byana bya ntaama bitaano byabusaasa bya mwaka ghumui, nga kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge. Eki niikiyo kihonguwa eki Ahi̱la mutabani̱ wa Enani̱ aaleeti̱ye.

Bini niibiyo bihonguwa ebi beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baahaayeyo obu Musa aasi̱i̱ghi̱ye mafu̱ta haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa haabwa kukihaayo: sahaani̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya siliva, bbaaku̱li̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya siliva na buusaniya buunabwana eku̱mi̱ na bubili bwa feeja.

Bu̱li̱ sahaani̱ ku̱lyota kwayʼo kukaba kuli ki̱lo emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke kandi bu̱li̱ bbaaku̱li̱ ku̱lyota kwayʼo kukaba kuli gulaamu lunaanaa. Bintu byona bya siliva ku̱lyota kwabiyo kwaba ki̱lo maku̱mi̱ abili na musanju̱ na gulaamu lukaagha, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kyʼomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Buusaniya buunabwana eku̱mi̱ na bubili bwa feeja eghi eesuuyemu bubbani̱, bu̱li̱ kamui ku̱lyota kwakʼo kwaba gulaamu eku̱mi̱ nʼemui kandi buusaniya obu bwona bwaba ki̱lo emui na kimui kyakasatu, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kyʼomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Muhendo ghwa bisolo bya kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye ghwaba ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte eku̱mi̱ nʼebili, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama eku̱mi̱ nʼebili, byana bya ntaama byabusaasa eku̱mi̱ na bibili bya mwaka ghumui na bihonguwa byabiyo bya bilimuwa. Ntu̱u̱li̱ sya mbu̱li̱ syaba eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya kihonguwa haabwa kibhi.

Muhendo ghwa bisolo bya kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge ghwaba ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte maku̱mi̱ abili nʼenaa, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama nkaagha, mbu̱li̱ nkaagha syabusaasa na byana bya ntaama nkaagha bya mwaka ghumui. Ebi niibiyo byabaaye bihonguwa haabwa kuhaayo kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa haanu̱ma ya Musa kukisiigha mafu̱ta.
Obu Musa aataahi̱ye mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu ku̱bu̱gha na
, aaghu̱wa elaka lya
ndi̱bu̱gha naye ku̱lu̱gha haagati ya baa kelu̱bbi̱ babili abali eghulu ya kyakughaniililʼo bantu bibhi ekili haagu̱u̱li̱ ya sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano. Niikuwo
aabu̱ghi̱ye atiyo na Musa.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Alooni̱ oti, ‘Okaakubhaki̱ya taala musanju̱, osite haa kyakutʼo taala niikuwo siikale sibhaki̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaakiyo.’ ”
Alooni̱ aakola ngoku Musa aamughambiiye. Taala esi aasitʼo si̱loli̱ye mu maaso ghaa kyakutʼo taala, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baawiisa na nondo kyakutʼo taala kyona kya feeja, ku̱lu̱gha haa ncuba yakiyo ku̱hi̱ka haa bimole byaku̱ki̱semeli̱ya. Baakikola mu mulingo ghwonini oghu
ooleki̱ye Musa.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona okomemu Baleevi̱ kandi okole mukolo ghwa ku̱beeli̱ya.
Mukolo ghwa ku̱beeli̱ya oghukole mu mulingo ghuni: obamisangile maasi aghakweli̱yagha, babaghembe mubili ghwona na kaawembo, banaabi̱ye ngoye syabo. Du̱mbi̱ bakuba beeli̱ye ewaanu.
Batwale ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta kandi ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte yaakabili kuba kihonguwa haabwa kibhi.
Otwale Baleevi̱ aba mu maaso ghaa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi okumaani̱ye ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Oleete Baleevi̱ aba mu maaso ghaa
kandi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bate mikono yabo haa mituwe ya Baleevi̱ aba.
Alooni̱ ali na kuhaayo Baleevi̱ mu maaso ghaa
nga kihonguwa baamu̱ki̱i̱ye kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba, niikuwo bakole mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya
“Du̱mbi̱ Baleevi̱ bate mikono yabo haa mituwe ya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte esi kandi mu̱hongi̱ ali na kuhonga ewaa
ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi kandi yaakabili nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, kya kukola mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi bya Baleevi̱.
Olaghile Baleevi̱ ku̱heeleli̱yagha Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be kandi obaheyo nga kihonguwa baamu̱ki̱i̱ye ewaa
Mukolo oghu ghukwoleka ngoku Baleevi̱ bali baa mbaghani̱ja mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji kandi bakuba bantu banje.
“Okaakumala kukola mukolo ghwa kweli̱ya Baleevi̱ kandi kubahaayo nga kihonguwa baamu̱ki̱i̱ye ewaa
, du̱mbi̱ bali na kwisa kandi kukola mulimo ghwabo haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Baleevi̱ aba ni bantu banje baa mbaghani̱ja mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji boona kandi bakuba banje mu ki̱i̱kalo kya baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso ya Banai̱saaleeli̱.

Mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwona ghwabusaasa mu I̱saaleeli̱ ni ghwanje. Mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya bisolo ni yanje. Kilo eki naati̱ye baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱, nkafoola mi̱li̱ghaaso ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kuba banje.
Nahabweki naatwete Baleevi̱ kuba banje mu ki̱i̱kalo kya baana baabusaasa boona mi̱li̱ghaaso baa Banai̱saaleeli̱.

Mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona, naafooye Baleevi̱ kuba kisembo kya Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be. Baleevi̱ aba balakolagha mulimo haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Balakolagha mukolo ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ kughaniluwa bibhi niikuwo Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba kaakuba beebinga weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, batatunga kifubilo kya ndwala kubaata.”
Musa, Alooni̱ na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baahaayo Baleevi̱ ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Baleevi̱ beeyeli̱ya kandi baanaabi̱ya ngoye syabo. Du̱mbi̱ Alooni̱ aabahaayo nga kihonguwa baamu̱ki̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa
kandi aakola mukolo ghwa Baleevi̱ aba kughaniluwa bibhi niikuwo bafooke abeeli̱ye.

Haanu̱ma yʼeki, Baleevi̱ baaghenda kukola mulimo ghwabo haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, Alooni̱ na batabani̱ be niibo baabaloleelelagha haa mulimo oghu. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola byona ebikwetʼo Baleevi̱ ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Kini kikwetʼo Baleevi̱: Basaasa abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili nʼetaano na kusaalʼo bali na kwisa kandi kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Bhaatu basaasa abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ ataano ya bukulu bali na kuhuumula kandi baleke kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya oghu.
Bakugubha kukoonela baanakyabo kukola milimo yabo haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, bhaatu ebo batakola mulimo oghu. Haaliikuwo waahaagha Baleevi̱ milimo ya kukola.”
aabu̱gha na Musa mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱ mu kweli̱ kwʼoku̱du̱bha kwa mwaka ghwakabili haanu̱ma ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱. Aaghila ati,
“Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ kukolagha Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo haa bwile bwakiyo bwonini.
Mukole ki̱ghenu̱ eki haa bwile bwakiyo bwonini, lwagholo lwa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ na bbinaa kya kweli̱ kuni. Mulole ngu mwakwamiliiye bilaghilo byona na ndaghikiililo bya ki̱ghenu̱ eki.”
Nahabweki Musa aaghambila Banai̱saaleeli̱ kukolagha ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo.
Baatandika kukola Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo eki mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱ lwagholo lwa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ na bbinaa kya kweli̱ kwʼoku̱du̱bha. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakola bu̱li̱ kintu ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.

Bhaatu bamui mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba tabaakoli̱ye ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo eki haa kilo eki nanga bakaba bateeli̱ye haabwa ku̱ku̱mʼo mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu. Nahabweki baasa ewaa Musa na Alooni̱ kilo eki kyonini
kandi baaghila Musa bati, “Twafooki̱ye abateeli̱ye nanga twaku̱mi̱yʼo mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu. Buuye nkiki kyaleki̱ye mwatutanga kuhaayo kihonguwa ewaa
na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyatu haa bwile bwakiyo bwonini?”
Musa aabakuukamu ati, “Mulinde ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ni̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye eki
akulaghila ekikwetʼo enu̱we.”
aaghila Musa ati,

“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kaakuba muntu weena mu enu̱we kedha mu baasukulu baanu, afooka oghu ateeli̱ye haabwa ku̱ku̱mʼo mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu kedha aba ali mu lughendo lu̱seli̱ye, akugubha kukola ki̱ghenu̱ kya
kya Kusaaluwʼo.
Bantu aba bali na kukola ki̱ghenu̱ eki lwagholo lwa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ na bbinaa kya kweli̱ kwakabili. Bali na kuliya kyana kya ntaama na migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kandi bulaala busaaliiye.

Tabali na ku̱ti̱gha haa nyama sya kyana kya ntaama eki ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi kandi obu bakuba mbakiliya batahenda eku̱wa lyakiyo na limui. Obu bakuba mbakola Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo eki, bali na kukwamilila bilaghilo byakiyo byona.
Bhaatu kaakuba muntu aba eeli̱ye kandi atali mu lughendo asaaghuwa kukola ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo, muntu oghu ali na kubhinguwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakiye, nanga taahaayeyo kihonguwa kya
haa bwile bwakiyo bwonini. Muntu oghu ali na kufubiluwa haabwa kibhi kiye.
“ ‘Kaakuba munamahanga oghu aakaaye naanu abbala kukola ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo kya
, ali na kukikola naakwamilila bilaghilo na ndaghikiililo syakiyo syona. Bilaghilo ebi bili na kuba bya munamahanga na Munai̱saaleeli̱.’ ”

Haa kilo eki baamali̱ye kukwela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, weema ya sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, kicu kyaghi̱swi̱kila. Kyakala eghulu ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi ku̱lu̱gha lwagholo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi kandi kikaba ki̱su̱si̱ye nga mulilo.
Weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi niikuwo yaakalagha etiyo, kicu kyaghi̱swi̱ki̱lagha bu̱li̱ kilo kandi mukilo kyasusagha nga mulilo.

Kicu eki kyakaamukagha haa weema eghi, du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ batandika ku̱lu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki kandi baghenda mu ki̱i̱kalo kinji. Kicu eki kyakalekagha kughenda, du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghoona mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.
niiye aalaghilagha Banai̱saaleeli̱ hambali bakughenda kandi abalaghila hambali bakughoona. Kicu eki kyakabaagha kitalu̱ghi̱ye haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi, baghoona mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.
Kicu eki kyakaakalagha haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi haabwa bwile bukani̱ye, Banai̱saaleeli̱ bahu̱ti̱ya kilaghilo kya
kandi batalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.
Bwile bunji kicu eki kyakalagha haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi haabwa bilo bikee, du̱mbi̱ baghoona mu ki̱i̱kalo eki ngoku
aabalaghiiye. Bhaatu naabalaghila, batandika ku̱lu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.

Bwile bunji kicu eki kyakalagha haa weema eghi ku̱lu̱gha lwagholo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi. Kicu eki kyakaamukaghʼo nkyambisi, du̱mbi̱ batandika kughenda. Bhaatu bwile bunji kyakalaghʼo mukilo na ntangaali̱ kandi kyakaamukaghʼo, du̱mbi̱ batodha batandika kughenda.

Kicu eki kyakaakalagha haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bilo bibili, kedha kweli̱ kedha mwaka, Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakalagha hambali baghooneeye kandi tabaalu̱ghagha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki. Bhaatu kyakaamukaghʼo, batandika kughenda.
aakabalaghilagha baghoona kandi naabalaghila ku̱lu̱ghʼo du̱mbi̱ batandika kughenda. Baakolagha byona ebi
aalaghilagha Musa.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Owiise na nondo bi̱i̱di̱yo bibili bya siliva, obi̱koleesi̱yaghe kubilikila ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kwekumaani̱li̱ya hamui kandi kughambila bantu aba ku̱lu̱gha hambali baghooneeye.
Balakateelagha bi̱i̱di̱yo byombi ebi, ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyona kyekumaani̱li̱yaghe hambali oli, haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Kaakuba bateela ki̱i̱di̱yo kimui kyonkaha, beebembeli̱ baa ntu̱la sya Banai̱saaleeli̱ bonkaha haaliibo beekumaani̱li̱yagha hambali oli.
Olakateelagha ki̱i̱di̱yo nʼelaka lyamaani̱, bantu bʼomu ntu̱la esi̱ghooni̱ye haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba batandikaghe kughenda.

Olakateelagha ki̱i̱di̱yo eki mulundi ghwakabili, bantu bʼomu ntu̱la esi̱ghooni̱ye haa luhande lwa eku̱wa batandikaghe kughenda. Oli na kuteela ki̱i̱di̱yo mu elaka likee-likee kughambila bantu kughenda.
Bhaatu olakabaagha noobbala kubilikila ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyona kugumbaana hamui, oteelaghe ki̱i̱di̱yo mu elaka lya mbaghani̱ja.
“Bahongi̱ batabani̱ baa Alooni̱ haaliibo baateelagha bi̱i̱di̱yo ebi. Kini kili na kuba kilaghilo kyanu kukwata bilo nʼebilo mu mijo yaanu yoona eghi ekwisa.
Mulakaghendagha kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syanu esikwete kubabona-boni̱ya mu nsi yaanu, muteelaghe bi̱i̱di̱yo ebi nʼelaka lyamaani̱. Du̱mbi̱
Luhanga waanu alaasukagha kukoonela enu̱we kandi kubajuna ngi̱ghu̱ syanu esi.

Muli na kuteela bi̱i̱di̱yo ebi haa bwile bwanu bwa kudheedhuwa, bwile bwa kukola bi̱ghenu̱ byanu na kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya meeli̱ ghaanu. Muteelaghe bi̱i̱di̱yo ebi obu mulabaagha nimuhayo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye byanu na bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge. Luhanga waanu akubaaghu̱wa kandi abaasuke. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.”
Haa kilo kya maku̱mi̱ abili kya kweli̱ kwakabili kwa mwaka ghwakabili, kicu eki kyamuka haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatandika ku̱lu̱gha mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱, baakala mbanalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo kimui kandi mbanaghoona mu ki̱i̱kalo kinji ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu kicu eki kyemiliiye mu elungu lya Palaani̱.
Olu niiluwo lwabaaye lughendo lwabo lwʼoku̱du̱bha ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da niibo baadu̱bhi̱ye kughenda baamu̱ki̱i̱ye bhendela yabo, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo. Naasoni̱ mutabani̱ wa Aminadaabbu niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali baaba baakabili. Netaneeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Juhala niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱ baalabhʼo, Eli̱yaabbu mutabani̱ wa Heloni̱ niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Du̱mbi̱ Baleevi̱ baasakaalula weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Bageli̱sooni̱ na bʼomu ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ baaghiheeka kandi baalabhʼo kughenda.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ baalabhʼo, baamu̱ki̱i̱ye bhendela yabo. Elijuula mutabani̱ wa Sedula niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱ baalabhʼo. Selu̱myeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Yulisadaai̱ niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ baalabhʼo. Eli̱yasaafu mutabani̱ wa Deu̱weli̱ niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Du̱mbi̱ bantu baa ntu̱la ya Bakohati̱ baalabhʼo, baheeki̱ye bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ekaba eli na kukweluwa mu ki̱i̱kalo kihyaka ebo batakaki̱dhi̱yeyo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ baalabhʼo, baamu̱ki̱i̱ye bhendela yabo. Eli̱sama mutabani̱ wa Ami̱hu̱di̱ niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Manase baalabhʼo. Gamalyeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Pedajula niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ baalabhʼo. Abbidaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Gi̱di̱yooni̱ niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.

Haakumaliilila, bantu baa ntu̱la ya Daani̱ baalabhʼo, baamu̱ki̱i̱ye bhendela yabo. Mahe ghaa bantu baa ntu̱la eghi niibo baalindagha enu̱ma sya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyabo. Ahi̱yejeeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Amisadaai̱ niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Aseli̱ baalabhʼo. Pagi̱yeeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Okulaani̱ niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Nafutaali baalabhʼo. Ahi̱la mutabani̱ wa Enani̱ niiye akaba ali mukulu wa mahe ghaabo.
Mahe ghaa Banai̱saaleeli̱ niikuwo ghaaghendagha ghalabhaane ku̱lu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo kimui kughenda mu ki̱i̱kalo kinji, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Musa aaghila Hobbaabbu mutabani̱ wa nkyame siye Leu̱weli̱ Munami̱di̱yaani̱ ati, “Tuli haai kughenda mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
aaghi̱li̱ye ati, ‘Nkubaha ki̱i̱kalo eki.’ Wiise oghende naatu, tukukukola kusemeeye, nanga
aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kukolela etu̱we Banai̱saaleeli̱ bintu bilungi.”
Bhaatu Hobbaabbu aamughila ati, “Bbaa, tankughenda. Nkukuuka mu ehanga lya ewaatu kandi mu nganda syanje.”
Bhaatu Musa aamughila ati, “Gutu otatu̱lu̱ghʼo. Omani̱ye bi̱i̱kalo mu elungu hambali tukugubha kughoona. Otutwale mu bi̱i̱kalo ebi.
Kaakuba oghenda naatu, tukukuha haa bintu bilungi byona ebi
akutuha.”
Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha haa mwena ghwa
kandi baalubhatanga lughendo lwa bilo bisatu. Sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
yaaghenda ebahikiiye bilo bisatu ebi kubatungila ki̱i̱kalo hambali bakuhuumulila.
Kicu kya
kyasagha eghulu yabo ntangaali̱, baakabaagha mbalu̱gha hambali baghooneeye.
Bwile bwona abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano baakatandikagha kughenda, Musa aghila ati,
“Ai̱
oomuke!
Ngi̱ghu̱ syawe sihanjikane
kandi abakwohi̱ye bakuuluke.”
Bwile bwona abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi baakeemililagha, Musa aaghila ati,
“Ai̱
, okuuke
mu nku̱mi̱ na nku̱mi̱ sya Banai̱saaleeli̱.”
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatandika kutongana
anategheleei̱ye haabwa bijibu ebi baatu̱ngi̱ye. Obu
aaghu̱u̱ye eki, aasaaliluwa kwonini. Du̱mbi̱ mulilo ghwa
ghwaka kandi ghwoki̱ya bimui haa bi̱i̱kalo bya kumaliilila kwa hambali baghooneeye.
Obu bantu aba baataaghi̱ye ewaa Musa, aasaba ewaa
kandi mulilo oghu ghwali̱ma.
Nahabweki ki̱i̱kalo eki baakighilamu Tabbela,
nanga mulilo ku̱lu̱gha ewaa
ghukaaka mu bantu aba.
Bamui mu banamahanga abaaghendagha na Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakaba babbali̱ye munu kuliya nyama kandi Banai̱saaleeli̱ nabo dhee baatandika kutaagha mbaghila bati, “Tukwekumbula kuliya nyama!
Twasu̱ki̱ye nsu̱i̱ esi twaliyagha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ esi tutaghu̱li̱ye. Twaliyagha dhee cucumba, meloni̱, bu̱tu̱ngu̱lu̱ buunabwana, matu̱ngu̱lu̱ na bu̱tu̱ngu̱lu̱su̱mu̱.
Bhaatu endindi maani̱ ghaatuhooye, muntu taakyabona byokuliya binji, kuuyʼo maanu eni yonkaha!”
Maanu ekaba esu̱si̱ye nga kasigho kati̱i̱ kanjelu.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghendagha kandi bakumaani̱ya maanu, baghisiya haa lubengo kedha baghisekula mu musekulo. Baaghiteekelagha mu minagha kandi bakolamu keeki̱ kandi syanulagha nga migaati̱ bateekeei̱ye mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Ki̱me kyakakwatagha hambali baghooneeye mukilo, du̱mbi̱ maanu elaghalika hansi.
Musa aaghu̱wa ngoku bantu aba bakwete kutongana, bu̱li̱ omui ali haa mulyango ghwa weema yee.
aasaaliluwa kwonini na bantu aba kandi Musa aatamuwa.
Musa aabu̱u̱li̱ya
ati, “Si̱ye mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe wandeeteeye kijibu kini nangaaki? Nkiki naaku̱koli̱ye ekyakutami̱ye kumpa mulimo ghutimbiikaane ghwa kuba mwebembeli̱ wa bantu bani?

Bantu aba taali̱i̱si̱ye esebo. Buuye ni̱i̱si̱ye nkababyala? Nkiki ki̱leki̱ye nongila oti, ‘Obaheeke haa ki̱ku̱bha kyawe ngoku mukali̱ akuheekagha mwana oghu akwonki̱ya kandi mbaki̱dhi̱ye mu nsi eghi waalahiiye kuha baataata baabo?’
Buuye nkuuya haa nyama sya kuha bantu aba boona? Bakuukalagha mbataagha nanje bati, ‘Otuhe nyama sya kuliya!’
Si̱ye nenkaha tankugubha kuba mwebembeli̱ wa bantu aba. Mulimo oghu ghuntimbikilaane kwonini.
Okaakuba haaliikuwo okuntwalikani̱ya otiyo, nkwesengeleei̱ye gutu ongilile kisa kandi onjite bwangu, niikuwo ndeke kubona-bona ntiyo kuloleelela bantu aba.”
aaghila Musa ati, “Okumaani̱ye beebembeli̱ nsanju̱ aba omani̱ye nga beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Oleete bantu aba haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi beemililʼo naawe.

Nku̱su̱ndu̱ka haa weema eghi kandi mbu̱ghe naawe. Du̱mbi̱ nkuuya haa maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo wanje agha oli nagho kandi nkuha haa maani̱ agha bantu aba. Bakukukoonela haa mulimo ghwa kuloleelela bantu aba, niikuwo oleke kughukola wenkaha.
“Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mweyeli̱ye kweteekani̱li̱ja kilo kya munkiya, nanga mukuliya nyama.
aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku mukwete kutaagha muti, “Tukwekumbula kuliya nyama! Twabaagha kusemeeye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱!” Nahabweki
akubaha nyama sya kuliya.
Tamukuliya nyama esi haabwa kilo kimui, kedha bibili, kedha bitaano, kedha eku̱mi̱ kedha maku̱mi̱ abili.
Bhaatu mukuliya nyama esi haabwa kweli̱ kwona, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya sibatami̱ye, nanga mwabhengi̱ye
, oghu aakaaye mu enu̱we kandi mwataagha muti nguli mutaalu̱ghi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.’ ”
Musa aaghila
ati, “Ndi hani na basaasa mitwalo nkaagha. Bhaatu niibuwo waaghila oti, ‘Nkubaha nyama sya kuliya haabwa kweli̱ kwona!’
Buuye nankabha basala bisolo bikaniiye kimui, bantu aba bakugubha kutunga nyama esikubamala? Nankabha bakumaani̱ya nsu̱i̱ syona esili mu nanja, buuye sikugubha kumala bantu aba?”
aakuukamu Musa ati, “Buuye mukono ghwa
ghu̱di̱i̱di̱ye? Nahabweki nkaakuba ninaabu̱ghi̱ye majima kedha bisubha okubona!”
Nahabweki Musa aatuwa kandi aaghambila bantu ebi
aabu̱ghi̱ye. Aakumaani̱ya bengei̱ nsanju̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱, beemilila kandi beeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Du̱mbi̱

aasu̱ndu̱ka ali mu kicu kandi aabu̱gha na Musa. Aamuuyʼo ghamui haa maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo agha aabaagha amuhaaye kandi aaghaha bengei̱ nsanju̱ aba. Mwoyo akaba makabaasʼo, baalangilila ebikubʼo, bhaatu tabaatodhi̱ye beeyongela kukikola.

Basaasa babili Elidaadi̱ na Medaadi̱, bakaba batali mu bengei̱ aba, bakaba bati̱ghaaye hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye. Bakaba bahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu muhendo ghwa bengei̱ nsanju̱ aba, bhaatu ebo bataaghenda haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Bhaatu nabo dhee baatunga haa maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo oghu kandi baatandika kulanga hambali bantu baghooneeye.
Mutabhana aali̱gi̱ta kandi aaghambila Musa ati, “Elidaadi̱ na Medaadi̱ niibuwo baalangilila hambali bantu baghooneeye.”
Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, oghu ku̱lu̱gha mu buujongo buwe aakoonelagha Musa haa mulimo, aaghila ati, “Mukama wanje Musa, obatange.”
Bhaatu Musa aamughila ati, “Okwatu̱u̱we etima haabwanje? Nkwekumbula bantu baa
boona baba balangi̱ kandi
abaha Mwoyo wee!”
Du̱mbi̱ Musa na bengei̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba boona baakuuka hambali bantu baghooneeye.

aatuma mwegha kandi ghwahu̱ngi̱ya nkwali ku̱lu̱gha haa nanja. Syasu̱nda hansi hoona kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye. Nkwali esi syakanila kimui ku̱hi̱ka haai lughendo lwa muntu lwa kilo kimui haa mpande syona hambali baghooneeye.

Bantu aba boona baamuka kilo eki mukilo na ntangaali̱ na kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo kandi baakumaani̱ya nkwali esi kandi oghu aakumaani̱yagha sikee aasu̱li̱ya haai bighegha eku̱mi̱. Bu̱li̱ muntu aanikila nkwali siye hansi kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya hambali baghooneeye ku̱syomeleli̱ya.
Obu baatandikagha kuliya nyama esi kandi sinali mu kanu̱wa kaabo,
aasaaliluwa kwonini na bantu aba kandi aabaha kifubilo kya ndwala yamaani̱ kandi yaata bakani̱ye.
Nahabweki ki̱i̱kalo eki baakighilamu Ki̱bbu̱loti̱-hatava, nanga bakajiikamu bantu bakani̱ye abeekumbuuye kuliya nyama.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱ghi̱ye Ki̱bbu̱loti̱-hatava, baaghenda Hajelooti̱ kandi baaghoonayo.
Musa aaswela mukali̱ Munaku̱u̱si̱ kandi Mi̱li̱yamu na Alooni̱ baatandika ku̱bu̱ghʼo kubhi Musa haabwa kuswela mukali̱ oghu.
Baaghila bati, “Buuye
aku̱bu̱ghagha naakwamila mwa Musa enkaha? Taaku̱bu̱ghagha dhee naakwamila mu etu̱we?”
aaghu̱wa ebi bakwete ku̱bu̱gha.
Musa akaba ali musaasa mu̱dhooti̱ kandi akaba ali mu̱dhooti̱ kusaali̱ya bantu boona abali munsi.
Du̱mbi̱
aaghila Musa, Alooni̱ na Mi̱li̱yamu ati, “Enu̱we basatu mwise haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.” Nahabweki bantu basatu aba baaghenda haa weema eghi.
aasu̱ndu̱ka ali mu mpaghi ya kicu, aamilila haa mulyango ghwa weema eghi kandi aabilikila Alooni̱ na Mi̱li̱yamu. Obu bombi baamwebi̱ngi̱ye,
aabaghila ati, “Mu̱tegheeleli̱ye ebi ndimabu̱gha,
“Kaakuba mulangi̱ aba mu enu̱we,
si̱ye
nkumweyoleka mu kubonekeluwa
kandi mbu̱ghe naye mu ndooti̱.
Bhaatu tanku̱bu̱ghagha ntiyo na mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje Musa.
Niiye muntu oghu neesi̱ghi̱ye mu bantu boona
kwebembela bantu banje.
Nku̱bu̱ghagha naye tubonangaane haali̱i̱so na haali̱i̱so.
Tubonangaane bbeni̱-bbeni̱ etali mu nsi̱mo
kandi akubonagha ngoku si̱ye
nsu̱si̱ye.
Nkiki kyaleki̱ye mutoobaha
ku̱bu̱ghʼo kubhi mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje Musa?”
aasaaliluwa kwonini na Alooni̱ na Mi̱li̱yamu kandi aabalu̱ghʼo.
Obu kicu kyalu̱ghi̱ye haa weema eghi, du̱mbi̱ Mi̱li̱yamu aalwala ntumbi, mubili ghuwe ghwafooka ghunjelu nga bilika. Obu Alooni̱ eegaai̱ye kulola Mi̱li̱yamu, aabona Mi̱li̱yamu alwaye ntumbi.
Alooni̱ aaghila Musa ati, “Gutu, mukama wanje, otatufubila haabwa kibhi kini eki twakoli̱ye nanga budhoma bwatu.
Otaleka Mi̱li̱yamu kuba nga mwana oghu abyauwe aku̱u̱ye kandi oghu kimui kyakabili kya mubili ghuwe ki̱gu̱ndi̱ye.”
Musa aasaba neesengeleli̱ya
ati, “Ai̱ Luhanga, gutu oki̱li̱ye Mi̱li̱yamu!”

aakuukamu Musa ati, “Ese wa Mi̱li̱yamu nguli aaniiye aamu̱tu̱u̱ye matanta haali̱i̱so, buuye Mi̱li̱yamu tangu̱hemu̱ki̱ye haabwa bilo musanju̱? Muleke aakale enja ya hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye haabwa bilo musanju̱, haanu̱ma ya bilo ebi akugubha kukuuka hambali baghooneeye.”
Nahabweki Mi̱li̱yamu aakala enja ya hambali baghooneeye haabwa bilo musanju̱ kandi Banai̱saaleeli̱ tabaalu̱ghi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo eki ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu baamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱i̱ye hambali baghooneeye.
Haanu̱ma yʼeki, Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha Hajelooti̱ kandi baghoona mu elungu lya Palaani̱.
aaghila Musa ati,

“Otume bamui mu basaasa kughenda kandi kubega nsi ya Kanaani̱, eghi ndimaha Banai̱saaleeli̱. Mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la haa ntu̱la eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya Banai̱saaleeli̱, okomemu musaasa omui mwebembeli̱ wa ntu̱la eghi.”
Nahabweki Musa aakola ngoku
aamulaghiiye kandi aabatuma ku̱lu̱gha mu elungu lya Palaani̱. Basaasa aba boona bakaba bali beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaabo: Samuha mutabani̱ wa Jakula, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱.
Safati mutabani̱ wa Hooli̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱.
Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da.
Igali̱ mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali.
Hoseya mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱.
Pali̱ti̱ mutabani̱ wa Lafu, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱.
Gadyeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Sodi̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱.
Gaadi̱ mutabani̱ wa Su̱si̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la Manase, eghi baaghilaghamu ya Yojeefu̱.
Amyeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Gemaali̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Daani̱.
Setu̱lu̱ mutabani̱ wa Mikai̱li̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Aseli̱.
Nahabbi̱ mutabani̱ wa Vofi̱si̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Nafutaali.
Gaweli̱ mutabani̱ wa Maaki̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱.
Agha niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa basaasa aba Musa aatu̱mi̱ye kughenda kandi kubega nsi ya Kanaani̱. Hoseya mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ Musa aamughilamu Yosuwa.
Musa aabatuma kughenda kandi kubega nsi ya Kanaani̱. Aabaghila ati, “Mukaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi ya Kanaani̱, mukwamile mu elungu lya Negeebbu, du̱mbi̱ mukome elughulu mu kyalo kya bwena.
Mulole nsi eghi ngoku esu̱si̱ye kandi bantu abaakaayemu bakaakuba bali na maani̱ kedha bali baceke, bakaakuba bali bakee kedha bakani̱ye.
Bantu aba baakaaye mu nsi ya mulingo ki? Esemeeye kedha ebhi̱i̱hi̱ye? Baakaaye mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaa mulingo ki? Taghali na bigho kedha ghali na bigho bikangami̱ye?

Etaka lyayo li̱su̱si̱ye li̱ti̱ya? Lili na ki̱li̱i̱si̱ya kedha bbaa? Nsi eghi elimu biti kedha bbaa? Mukole eki mukugubha kulola ngu mwaleeti̱ye bimui haa bi̱ghu̱ma bya mughanulo bya mu nsi eghi.” Bwile obu niibuwo mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ yaatandikagha kwela.
Nahabweki basaasa aba baaghenda kandi baabega nsi ya Kanaani̱ yoona ku̱lu̱gha mu elungu lya Ji̱i̱ni̱ eku̱wa ku̱hi̱ka elughulu mu tau̱ni̱ ya Lehobbu̱ haai na kibugha kya Lebbo-hamati̱.

Baakoma kandi baakwamila mu elungu lya Negeebbu, baaki̱dha mu kibugha kya Hebbu̱looni̱, hambali ntu̱la ya Bahi̱maani̱, ya Basesaai̱, na ya Batalumaai̱ baasukulu baa Anaki̱ baabaagha baakaaye. (Kibugha kya Hebbu̱looni̱ bakakikwela haabwa myaka musanju̱ batakakweye kibugha kya Jowani̱ mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.)

Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye mu kighona kya Esi̱kooli̱, baajomba etai elyani̱yʼo mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱. Etai eli likaba li̱neeti̱ye kandi basaasa babili baaliheekela haa mpaghi. Baaleeta dhee bimui haa bi̱ghu̱ma bya mikomamahanga na bya biti mi̱ti̱i̱ni̱.
Ki̱i̱kalo eki baakighilamu kighona kya Esi̱kooli̱, nanga Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakajombayo etai elyani̱yʼo mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ ekani̱ye.
Obu basaasa aba baamali̱ye bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa mbanabega nsi ya Kanaani̱, du̱mbi̱ baalu̱ghayo.

Basaasa aba baakuuka ewaa Musa, Alooni̱ na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱ mu elungu lya Palaani̱. Baaghambila Musa, Alooni̱ na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ebi baaboone kandi baabooleka bi̱ghu̱ma ebi baahi̱ye mu nsi ya Kanaani̱.
Baaghila Musa bati, “Twaghendi̱ye mu nsi eghi waatu̱tu̱mi̱yemu, ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki. Bini niibiyo bimui haa bi̱ghu̱ma bya mu nsi eghi.
Bhaatu bantu abaakaaye mu nsi eghi bali na maani̱, bibugha byamu bili na bigho bi̱gu̱mi̱ye kandi bikangami̱ye. Twabooneyo dhee baasukulu baa Anaki̱.
Bameleeki̱ baakaaye mu kyalo kya Negeebbu. Bahi̱ti̱, Bayebu̱si̱ na Bamooli̱ baakaaye mu kyalo kya bwena. Banakanaani̱ baakaaye haai na nanja Medi̱teleni̱yani̱ kandi haai na maasi Yolodaani̱.”
Du̱mbi̱ Kelebbu aaholeesi̱ya bantu aba mu maaso ghaa Musa kandi aaghila ati, “Tuli na kughenda kandi kutwala nsi eghi, nanga tukugubha kughikwata.”
Bhaatu basaasa abaaghendi̱ye na Kelebbu oghu baaghila bati, “Tatukugubha ku̱lu̱mba bantu aba, nanga batusaaye maani̱.”

Baatandika kulalangi̱ya makulu ghabhi̱i̱hi̱ye mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ aghakwetʼo nsi ya Kanaani̱ eghi baabegi̱ye, mbaghila bati, “Nsi eghi twabegi̱ye eneeteeye kimui kandi tatukugubha kughikwata. Bantu aba twabooneyo boona bakangami̱ye kwonini.

Twabooneyo bantu baamaani̱ baasukulu baa Anaki̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu Banefi̱li̱. Obu twelengeesani̱i̱ye na Banefi̱li̱ aba, twaboone na maaso ghaatu tuli nga bu̱si̱ni̱ni̱ ewaa bantu aba kandi nabo niikuwo baatuboone batiyo dhee.”
Mukilo yoona ya kilo eki bantu boona bʼomu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatandika kulila nʼelaka lyamaani̱.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baatandika kutongana na Musa na Alooni̱. Ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghila Musa na Alooni̱ bati, “Kyangubaaye kilungi etu̱we ku̱kwi̱la mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kedha mu elungu lini!
niibuwo aatutwala mu nsi hambali ngi̱ghu̱ syatu sikutwita na kihiyo nangaaki? Baku̱hu̱nga bakali̱ baatu na baana baatu kandi babatwale. Buuye takili kilungi etu̱we kukuuka mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱?”
Baaghambilana bati, “Oleke twekomele mwebembeli̱ kandi tukuuke mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.”
Du̱mbi̱ Musa na Alooni̱ beegenga hansi makpu̱ngbu̱ mu maaso ghaa ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ na Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune, abaabaagha mu basaasa abaaghendi̱ye kubega nsi ya Kanaani̱, baatemula ngoye syabo.
Baaghila ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ bati, “Nsi eghi twabungiiyemu kubega ni nsi eghi esemeeye kwonini.
Kaakuba
adheedhuwa naatu, akututwala mu nsi eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki kandi akutuha nsi eghi.
Nahabweki mutajeemela
kandi muleke kwobaha bantu abaakaaye mu nsi eghi, nanga tukubasi̱ngu̱la. Tibakyali na mu̱li̱ndi̱, bhaatu
ali naatu. Muleke kwobaha bantu aba.”
Bhaatu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ eki kyona kyatandika kuhanuula kuhuula mabaale Yosuwa na Kelebbu. Du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba boona baabona ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya
nkyaboneka haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
aaghila Musa ati, “Bantu aba baku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kungaya? Baku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kubhenga ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja, nankabha ninaakoli̱ye byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye mu bantu aba?
Nkubaata na ndwala ya kabhi kandi nkubahwelekeeleli̱ya. Bhaatu nkukufoola ehanga liinamu̱li̱to kandi lyamaani̱ kusaali̱ya bantu aba.”
Musa aaghila
ati, “Gutu otahwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba! Kaakuba okikola Banami̱si̱li̱ baku̱u̱ghu̱wa. Okaaya bantu aba mu Banami̱si̱li̱ na bu̱toki̱ bwawe bwamaani̱.
Banami̱si̱li̱ bakughambila Banakanaani̱ abaakaaye mu nsi eghi kintu eki. Banakanaani̱ aba bamani̱ye ngoku uwe Ai̱
, okuukalagha mu bantu baawe aba. Ai̱

bamani̱ye ngoku bantu baawe bakukubonagha haali̱i̱so na haali̱i̱so kandi ngoku mpaghi ya kicu yaawe ekuukalagha eghulu yabo. Bamani̱ye ngoku ntangaali̱ okughendagha ohikiiye bantu baawe mu mpaghi ya kicu kandi mukilo mu mpaghi ya mulilo.
Kaakuba bantu aba obaata haa mulundi ghumui, bantu bʼomu mahanga abaaghu̱u̱ye makulu ngoku oli na maani̱, bakughila bati,
taagu̱bhi̱ye kutwala bantu aba mu nsi eghi aalahiiye kubaha, niikiyo kyaleki̱ye aabaatila mu elungu.’
“Gutu
, wooleke ngoku oli na maani̱ ghakani̱ye ngoku waabu̱ghi̱ye. Okaghila oti,
‘Si̱ye

tankusaaliluwagha bwangu, ndi na kukunda kwamaani̱ kandi nkughanilagha bantu bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi bakukolagha kandi nsobi̱ syabo. Bhaatu nkufubilagha baana haabwa bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi beesebo bakukolagha ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa mujo ghwakasatu na ghwakanaa ghwa baasukulu baabo.’
Kusighikila haa kukunda kwamaani̱ kwawe, oghanile bantu aba kibhi kyabo, ngoku okubaghanilagha ku̱lu̱gha bwile baalu̱ghi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.”
aamughila ati, “Naaghaniiye bantu aba, ngoku waasabi̱ye.
Bhaatu majima ngoku ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱ kandi ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyanje
kimalakaki̱ye nsi yoona,
taaliyo nʼomui mu bantu abaaboone ngoku ndi na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa na byakuswekani̱ya ebi naakoli̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ na mu elungu, bhaatu baaghaya si̱ye kandi bandengesa milundi ekani̱ye,
taaliyo nʼomui mu bantu aba oghu aku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi naalahiiye kuha baataata baabo. Taaliyo nʼomu mu bantu ababhengi̱ye si̱ye aba oghu akubona nsi eghi.

Bhaatu haabwa mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje Kelebbu kuba na mwoyo ghulungi kandi mutima ghusemeeye, nkuleka aki̱dhe mu nsi ya Kanaani̱ eghi aaghendi̱ye kubega. Nsi eghi nkughiha baasukulu be kughitwala nga bugwetuwa bwabo.
Nahabweki ngoku Bameleeki̱ na Banakanaani̱ baakaaye mu bighona mu nsi eghi, mukuuke kandi mukwamile mu kihanda kyʼomu elungu ku̱ki̱dha haa Nanja Mutuku.”
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati,
“Ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu babhi eki ki̱ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kutongana nanje? Naaghu̱u̱ye ngoku Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba bakwete kutongana.
Nahabweki obaghile oti, ‘Si̱ye,
, ngoku ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱, nkubakolʼo bintu byonini ebi naaghu̱u̱ye ni̱mu̱bu̱gha.

Enu̱we boona mu̱ku̱ku̱wa kandi mi̱ku̱ yaanu ekwandakaalala mu elungu lini. Musaasa weena oghu ali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ya bukulu na kusaalʼo, oghu Musa aabali̱ye kandi oghu aatongaane nanje aku̱ku̱wa.
Taaliyo nʼomui mu bantu aba oghu aku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi naalahiiye kuha enu̱we kuukalamu, kuuyʼo Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune na Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱.
Baana baanu bato aba mwaghi̱li̱ye muti ngi̱ghu̱ syanu si̱ku̱hu̱nga, niibo nkuleka baki̱dhe mu nsi eghi kandi badheedhuwe kuukala mu nsi eghi enu̱we mwabhengi̱ye.
Bhaatu enu̱we bantu bakulu, mi̱ku̱ yaanu ekwandakaalala mu elungu lini.
Baana baanu bakuba bali̱i̱si̱ya baa ntaama mu elungu lini haabwa myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa, bakubona-bona haabwa buteesighibuwa bwanu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya enu̱we boona mu̱kwi̱li̱i̱ye mu elungu lini.

Basaasa baanu ngoku baamali̱ye bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa mbanabega nsi ya Kanaani̱, niikuwo mukumala myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa nimunafubiluwa haabwa bibhi byanu, mwaka ghumui haabwa kilo kimui kandi mukumanya ngoku nsaaluuwe.’
Si̱ye,
, ni̱i̱si̱ye naabu̱ghi̱ye. Nahabweki nkukolʼo bintu ebi ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu babhi eki, abeelungani̱i̱ye kubhenga si̱ye. Baku̱kwi̱la mu elungu lini kandi bahwelekeelele.”
Basaasa aba Musa aatu̱mi̱ye kubega nsi ya Kanaani̱ baakuuka. Baaha makulu ghabhi̱i̱hi̱ye aghaaleki̱ye ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatongana na
Bwile obu bwonini basaasa abaaleeti̱ye makulu ghabhi̱i̱hi̱ye aghakwetʼo nsi ya Kanaani̱ baatunga kifubilo kya ndwala eghi
aabatumiiye kandi baaku̱wa.
Bhaatu mu basaasa eku̱mi̱ na babili aba Musa aatu̱mi̱ye kubega nsi ya Kanaani̱, abaakaaye banali boomi̱i̱li̱ ni Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ na Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune.
Obu Musa aaghambiiye Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona ebi
aabu̱ghi̱ye, bantu aba beeghunga kwonini.
Nkyambisi cu̱i̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamuka kandi baani̱i̱na mu kyalo kya bwena. Baaghila bati, “Twasi̱i̱si̱ye, bhaatu tweteekani̱i̱je kughenda mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kutuha.”
Bhaatu Musa aabaghila ati, “Mukwete kughaya eki
aalaghiiye nangaaki? Eki mukwete kubbala takikubʼo!
Mutaghenda mu kyalo kya bwena eki, nanga
taali naanu kandi ngi̱ghu̱ syanu sikubasi̱ngu̱la.
Bameleeki̱ na Banakanaani̱ bakulwana naanu mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, nanga mwalu̱ghi̱yʼo
, akuba atali hamui naanu kandi ngi̱ghu̱ syanu sikubaata na kihiyo.”
Bhaatu bantu aba baabhenga ku̱u̱ghu̱wa Musa. Nahabweki Musa aati̱ghala hambali baabaagha baghooneeye na sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
. Bhaatu bantu aba baani̱i̱na mu kyalo kya bwena eki.
Du̱mbi̱ Bameleeki̱ na Banakanaani̱ abaakalagha mu kyalo kya bwena, baasa kandi baalu̱mba Banai̱saaleeli̱. Baasi̱ngu̱la Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi baabahuma ku̱hi̱ka mu tau̱ni̱ ya Holu̱ma.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mukaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi ndimabaha kandi nimwakalamu,
muhaagheyo ewaa
bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu nte, ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱ syanu, ebi kusasa kwabiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
. Bihonguwa ebi bikugubha kuba bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, bihonguwa bya ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya kilahilo, kedha bihonguwa ebi muntu akuhaayo haabwa kubbala kuwe, kedha bihonguwa bya ki̱ghenu̱.
Muntu oghu alaleetagha kihonguwa kiye ewaa
, aleetaghe dhee kihonguwa kya bilimuwa ki̱lo emui ya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu li̱ta emui ya mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Bu̱li̱ kyana kya ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱ eki muntu alahaaghayo nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, ali na kuleeta dhee li̱ta emui ya vi̱i̱ni̱ kuba kihonguwa kyakunuwa.
“ ‘Obu muntu alabaagha naahayo kihonguwa kya ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama, ataaghʼo kihonguwa kya bilimuwa ki̱lo ebili sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu li̱ta emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke ya mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Muntu oghu aheyo dhee kihonguwa kyakunuwa li̱ta emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke ya vi̱i̱ni̱ kuba kihonguwa eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu aabbala kuhaayo ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, kedha kihonguwa kya kilahilo, kedha kihonguwa kya bu̱si̱nge ewaa
aleete dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa ki̱lo esatu sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu li̱ta ebili sya mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Muntu oghu aleetaghe dhee kihonguwa kyakunuwa li̱ta ebili sya vi̱i̱ni̱, kuba kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
Oli na kukola otiyo haabwa bu̱li̱ ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama, kyana kya ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱.
Haaliikuwo waakolagha bu̱li̱ kimui haa bintu ebi mabihonga noosighikila haa muhendo ghwabiyo.
“ ‘Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona bakolaghe batiyo obu balabaagha mbahayo kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
Mu mijo yaanu yoona eghi ekwisa, kaakuba munamahanga kedha muntu oghu aakaaye naanu, abbala kuhaayo kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
, ali na kukola ngoku enu̱we mukukolagha.

Mu ki̱bbu̱la kyanu bilaghilo bya kuhonga ni bimui ewaanu na banamahanga abaakaaye naanu. Bilaghilo ebi ni bya bilo nʼebilo mu mijo yaanu yoona, nanga enu̱we na banamahanga aba, muli na ku̱hu̱ti̱ya bilaghilo bya
Bilaghilo na ndaghikiililo ebi̱lemi̱ye enu̱we, niibiyo bi̱lemi̱ye dhee banamahanga abaakaaye naanu.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mukaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi ndimabatwalamu
kandi nimwaliya bimui haa byokuliya bya mu nsi eghi, muhaagheyo kihonguwa kya mbaghani̱ja ewaa
Muli na kuhonga migaati̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu mughanulo ghwa nsyano yaanu. Muli na kukola eki obu mukuba nimuhayo kihonguwa kya mbaghani̱ja kya nsyano eghi mwadu̱bhi̱ye kusiya haa lubengo.
Muli na kuhaayo ewaa
haa mughanulo ghwa nsyano esemeeye, nga kihonguwa mu mijo yaanu yoona eghi ekwisa.
“ ‘Kaakuba mutakighendeleeye musaaghuwa kukwata kimui haa bilaghilo ebi
aahaaye Musa,
kimui haa bilaghilo byona ebi
aahaaye Musa kughambila enu̱we, ku̱lu̱gha haa kilo eki
aabahaaye bilaghilo ebi na kweyongela mu mijo yaanu eghi ekwisa,

kaakuba mukikola mutakighendeleeye kandi ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kitamani̱ye, ki̱bbu̱la eki kyona kili na kuhaayo kihonguwa kya ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte nga kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
. Ki̱bbu̱la eki kili na kuhaayo dhee kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na kihonguwa kyakunuwa, kusighikila haa kilaghilo kandi kili na kuhaayo dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi.
Mu̱hongi̱ ali na kukola mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa kwa ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ eki kandi bakughaniluwa, nanga baaki̱koli̱ye batakighendeleeye kandi baahaayeyo ewaa
kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo na kihonguwa haabwa kibhi.
Ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyona na banamahanga abaakaaye nabo bakughaniluwa, nanga bantu aba boona baabaaye mu kintu eki baasobeei̱ye batakighendeleeye.
“ ‘Bhaatu kaakuba muntu omui asi̱i̱sa atakighendeleeye, ali na kuleeta mbu̱li̱ yabukali̱ ya mwaka ghumui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi.
Mu̱hongi̱ ali na kuhonga mbu̱li̱ eghi mu maaso ghaa
haabwa kughaniluwa kwa muntu oghu aakoli̱ye kibhi atakighendeleeye, haanu̱ma ya mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa oghu, muntu oghu akughaniluwa.
Eki nkilaghilo kimui ekikwetʼo muntu weena oghu aku̱si̱i̱sa atakighendeleeye, nankabha aba ali Munai̱saaleeli̱ kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye naanu.
“ ‘Bhaatu muntu weena oghu aku̱si̱i̱sa akighendeleeye, abe Munai̱saaleeli̱ kedha munamahanga, akuba ambuuye
kandi muntu oghu ali kubhinguwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Muntu oghu akuba aghai̱ye eki
aabu̱ghi̱ye kandi atu̱u̱ye bilaghilo biye, ali na kubhinguwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ nanga musango ghu̱mu̱si̱ngi̱ye.’ ”
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabaagha mu elungu, bantu baasanga musaasa naaseena nkui haa kilo kya Sabhato.
Bantu abaamuboone naaseena nkui, baamuleeta ewaa Musa na Alooni̱ na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Baamuta mu nkomo, nanga bakaba batamani̱ye eki bakumukola.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Musaasa oghu ali na ku̱ku̱wa. Ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ bali na ku̱mu̱twesi̱ya hanja ya hambali baghooneeye kandi bamuhuule mabaale.”
Nahabweki ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatwesi̱ya musaasa oghu hanja ya hambali baghooneeye kandi baamuhuula mabaale aaku̱wa, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
aaghila Musa ati,

“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mu mijo yaanu yoona, muli na kuta mighuwo ya mahu̱u̱ji̱ ejambi̱ye haa nsondo sya bi̱lu̱waalo byanu kandi haa bu̱li̱ mughuwo mutaaghʼo mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghaa langi̱ ya bbu̱lu̱lu̱.
Mighuwo ya mahu̱u̱ji̱ ejambi̱ye eghi ebe kaakulolelʼo kubaasu̱ki̱ya ku̱hu̱ti̱ya bilaghilo bya
byona, niikuwo muteefoola nga baamalaaya kukola ebi mitima yaanu ekweghomba.
Mighuwo eghi ekubakoonela kuusuka ngoku muli na kukwata bilaghilo byanje byona kandi kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa Luhanga waanu.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu, oghu akabaaya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kuba Luhanga waanu. Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waanu.’ ”

Koola mutabani̱ wa I̱jali̱ kandi muusukulu wa Kohati̱ wʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱, hamui na Dataani̱ na Abbilaamu batabani̱ baa Eli̱yaabbu na Oni̱ mutabani̱ wa Peleti̱ bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, baajeemela Musa.
Baasoona-soona beebembeli̱ banji bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili na maku̱mi̱ ataano aba bantu bahu̱ti̱i̱ye mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kulungana nabo kuhakani̱ya Musa.
Bantu aba baaghenda nga ki̱bbu̱la kuhakani̱ya Musa na Alooni̱ kandi baabaghila bati, “Mwahingulani̱i̱ye kwebhi̱mba-bhi̱mbi̱ya! Ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ni bantu baa
kandi
ali hamui nabo. Buuye mukwete kwefoola muti muli na bu̱toki̱ kusaali̱ya bantu boona bʼomu ki̱bbu̱la kya
nangaaki?”
Obu Musa aaghu̱u̱ye eki, eegenga hansi makpu̱ngbu̱.
Du̱mbi̱ aaghila Koola na baanakiye boona ati, “Munkiya nkyambisi
akutwoleka muntu wee oghu aakomi̱yemu kandi oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Musaasa oghu akukomamu niiye akumwebinga.
Uwe Koola na ki̱bbu̱la kyawe muli na kukola kini, mukwate bibindi bya ku̱tu̱mi̱kamu bubbani̱,
munkiya mutemu mulilo kandi bubbani̱ mu maaso ghaa
. Musaasa oghu
akukomamu niiye akuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Enu̱we Baleevi̱ mwahingulani̱i̱ye kwebhi̱mba-bhi̱mbi̱ya!”
Musa aatodha aaghila Koola ati, “Endindi mu̱tegheeleli̱ye enu̱we Baleevi̱!
Buuye takibamali̱ye Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ kukomamu enu̱we mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji kandi kuleeta enu̱we haai naye kukola mulimo haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ya
kandi kwemilila mu maaso ghaa ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kubaheeleli̱ya?
niiye akaleeta uwe Koola na Baleevi̱ baanakyawe haai naye, bhaatu endindi niibuwo mwabbala dhee kuba bahongi̱.
Uwe na baanakyawe mwekumaani̱i̱ye hamui kuhakani̱ya
. Buuye Alooni̱ niiye ani̱ enu̱we kutongana naye?”
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aatuma bantu kubilikila Dataani̱ na Abbilaamu batabani̱ baa Eli̱yaabbu. Bhaatu baaghila bati, “Bbaa, tatukwisa.
Buuye kutuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki, kwisa kandi kutwitila mu elungu lini takimali̱ye? Buuye endindi niibuwo waabbala dhee kuba mukama waatu?
Tookatu̱ki̱dhi̱i̱ye mu nsi eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki kandi tookatuhaaye bisaka bya kukolamu na misili ya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱. Buuye okugubha kudimaaga bantu bani boona? Tatukwisa bbaa!”
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aasaaliluwa kwonini kandi aaghila
ati, “Otasi̱i̱ma kihonguwa kya basaasa aba. Tankaayaghʼo bantu aba kintu kyona nankabha ndogooi̱ nʼemui kandi tankakoli̱ye kubhi muntu nʼomui mu basaasa aba.”
Musa aaghila Koola ati, “Munkiya uwe na ki̱bbu̱la kyawe mwise mu maaso ghaa
kandi Alooni̱ akubʼo dhee.
Bu̱li̱ musaasa ali na kukwata kibindi kiye, atemu bubbani̱ kandi akileete mu maaso ghaa
, bibindi bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili na maku̱mi̱ ataano. Uwe na Alooni̱ bu̱li̱ omui ali na kuleeta dhee kibindi kiye.”
Nahabweki bu̱li̱ omui mu basaasa bʼomu ki̱bbu̱la kya Koola aakwata kibindi kiye, aataamu mulilo na bubbani̱ kandi beemilila hamui na Musa na Alooni̱ haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Du̱mbi̱ Koola aakumaani̱ya ki̱bbu̱la kya basaasa be boona haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi beemilila balolaane na Musa na Alooni̱. Ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya
kyabonekela ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyona.
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati,
“Mu̱lu̱ghe mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki, nkubbala ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba haa mulundi ghumui.”

Bhaatu Musa na Alooni̱ baagenga hansi makpu̱ngbu̱ kandi baaghila bati, “Ai̱ Luhanga, Luhanga oghu okuhaagha bantu boona bwomi̱i̱li̱. Kaakuba muntu omui asi̱i̱sa, buuye okusaaliluwa na ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyona?”
Du̱mbi̱
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mu̱lu̱ghe haai na weema ya Koola, ya Dataani̱ na ya Abbilaamu.’ ”
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aamuka kandi aaghenda ewaa Dataani̱ na ewaa Abbilaamu. Beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghenda bamulabhi̱ye.

Musa aaghambila ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Mu̱lu̱ghe haai na weema sya basaasa babhi aba. Mutaku̱ma haa kintu kyabo na kimui. Kaakuba mukola eki, Luhanga akubahwelekeeleli̱ya hamui na bantu aba haabwa bibhi byabo byona.”

Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha haai na weema ya Koola, ya Dataani̱ na ya Abbilaamu. Dataani̱ na Abbilaamu bakaba bali enja kandi baamiliiye haa milyango ya weema syabo na bakali̱ baabo, baana baabo bakulu na bato.
Musa aaghila ati, “Endindi mukumanya ngoku
antu̱mi̱ye kukola bintu bini byona kandi etali haabwa kubbala kwanje.
Kaakuba basaasa aba baku̱wa lu̱ku̱ lwa bu̱li̱ kilo ngoku bantu boona baku̱ku̱waagha, kikumani̱i̱si̱ya
tantu̱mi̱ye.
Bhaatu kaakuba
akola kwonini kintu ekitakabaaghʼo, aleka nsi yeesama kandi emela bantu aba na bintu byabo byona kandi bakota eku̱li̱mu̱ mu kituulo banaakaaye, du̱mbi̱ mukumanya ngoku bantu aba baaghai̱ye
Musa akaba makamala ku̱bu̱gha ebi byona, nsi hambali bantu aba baabaagha baamiliiye yaatikamu kabili,
yeesama kandi yaammela bantu aba banaakaaye na bintu byabo byona. Yaammela dhee basaasa boona abaahagilagha Koola na bintu byabo byona.
Bantu aba baakota eku̱li̱mu̱ banaakaaye na bintu byabo byona. Nsi eghi yaabaswi̱ki̱la kandi baahwelekeelela mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghu̱u̱ye ngoku bantu aba bakwete kutakangana, baali̱gi̱ta mbagugangana bati, “Naatu nsi ekutumela dhee!”
Du̱mbi̱ mulilo ghwalu̱gha ewaa
kandi ghwoki̱ya basaasa bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili na maku̱mi̱ ataano abaahongagha bubbani̱.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile Eli̱yeeja mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱, kuuya bibindi ebilimu bubbani̱ mu mulilo oghu oghwokeei̱ye bintu ebi kandi ahanjaage ki̱bu̱ eki, nanga bibindi ebi bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Bibindi bya basaasa abaasi̱i̱si̱ye kandi kyaleka baahwelekeelela, bantu babiwiisemu na nondo sahaani̱ sya ku̱swi̱ki̱la haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, nanga bantu baabihongeeye
kandi bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Sahaani̱ esi silabaagha kaakulolelʼo kaa kuteelelela Banai̱saaleeli̱.”

Nahabweki mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja aakumaani̱ya bibindi bya bbu̱looji̱ ebi basaasa aba baaleeti̱ye kandi ebi mulilo ghwokeei̱ye kandi baawiisamu na nondo sahaani̱ sya ku̱swi̱ki̱la haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa,
ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa. Eki kikabʼo ku̱u̱su̱ki̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ngu taaliyo muntu onji weena kuuyʼo muusukulu wa Alooni̱ oghu ali na ku̱tu̱mi̱ka bubbani̱, mu maaso ghaa
. Muntu oghu naaki̱koli̱ye akuba nga Koola na ki̱bbu̱la kiye.
Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyona kyatandika kutongana na Musa na Alooni̱. Baaghila bati, “Mwati̱ye bantu baa

Bantu bʼomu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ beekumaani̱ya kuhakani̱ya Musa na Alooni̱. Bhaatu obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baaloli̱ye haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, du̱mbi̱ kicu kyaghi̱swi̱ki̱la kandi ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya
kyabonekʼo.
Du̱mbi̱ Musa na Alooni̱ baaghenda mu maaso ghaa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Mu̱lu̱ghe mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki, nkubbala ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba haa mulundi ghumui.” Du̱mbi̱ Musa na Alooni̱ beegenga hansi makpu̱ngbu̱.

Musa aaghila Alooni̱ ati, “Okwate kibindi kyawe kandi otemu bubbani̱ na mulilo ghwa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa. Obitwale bwangu mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba haabwa mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi byabo, niikuwo
abaghanile.
asaaluuwe kwonini na bantu aba kandi aatandi̱ki̱ye kubaha kifubilo kya ndwala ya kabhi.”

Alooni̱ aakola ngoku Musa aamughambiiye aakwata kibindi kandi aali̱gi̱ta haagati ya ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba. Ndwala yamaani̱ eghi ekaba niyaati̱ye bakani̱ye mu bantu aba. Bhaatu Alooni̱ aahonga bubbani̱ obu kandi aakola mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi bya bantu aba.
Alooni̱ aamilila haagati ya bantu abaakaaye na abaaku̱u̱ye, du̱mbi̱ ndwala ya kabhi eghi yaaleka kwita bantu aba.
Bhaatu ndwala eghi ekaba niyaati̱ye bantu mutwalo ghumui nku̱mi̱ enaa na lusanju̱, kwongela haa basaasa abaaku̱u̱ye haabwa bu̱jeemi̱ bwa Koola.
Du̱mbi̱ Alooni̱ aakuuka ewaa Musa haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, nanga ndwala eghi ekaba niyaaleki̱ye kwita bantu aba.
aaghila Musa ati,

“Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ kukuha mi̱i̱gho eku̱mi̱ nʼebili, bu̱li̱ mwebembeli̱ wa ntu̱la akuhe mwi̱gho ghumui kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo kandi haa mwi̱gho ghwa bu̱li̱ mwebembeli̱ ohandiikʼo li̱i̱na liye.
Haa mwi̱gho ghwa ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ ohandiikʼo li̱i̱na lya Alooni̱, nanga bu̱li̱ mwebembeli̱ wa ntu̱la ali na kuleeta mwi̱gho ghumui.
Mi̱i̱gho eghi oghite mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, hambali nkusanga-sangaanagha naawe.
Bimole bikutuwa haa mwi̱gho ghwa musaasa oghu nkukomamu, nku̱holeesi̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba kandi bakuleka kuukala mbatongana naanu.”

Nahabweki Musa aaghambila Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi beebembeli̱ baabo baamuha mi̱i̱gho eku̱mi̱ nʼebili. Mwi̱gho ghumui haabwa bu̱li̱ mwebembeli̱ wa bu̱li̱ ntu̱la kandi na mwi̱gho ghwa Alooni̱ ghukuba ghulimu dhee.
Musa aata mi̱i̱gho eghi mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
mu weema ya sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano.
Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, obu Musa aataahi̱ye mu weema ya sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, aabona mwi̱gho ghwa Alooni̱ ghwa ntu̱la ya Leevi̱, ghutooyʼo bimole na bi̱ghu̱ma byeli̱ye bya kiti alu̱mondi̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aatwesi̱ya mi̱i̱gho eghi yoona mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu mu maaso ghaa
kandi aaghyoleka Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona. Baalola mi̱i̱gho eghi kandi bu̱li̱ mwebembeli̱ aatwala mwi̱gho ghuwe.

aaghila Musa ati, “Oku̱u̱ki̱ye mwi̱gho ghwa Alooni̱ mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano. Mwi̱gho oghu ghuukalʼo kandi ghube kaakulolelʼo kaa kuteelelela Banai̱saaleeli̱ bajeemi̱ aba ngu kaakuba beeyongela kutongana nanje, baku̱ku̱wa.”
Musa aakola ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghila Musa bati, “Olole, tu̱ku̱ku̱wa! Tukuhwelekeelela kandi tukuhuwʼo!
Muntu weena oghu akwebinga weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ya
aku̱ku̱wa. Buuye etu̱we boona tu̱ku̱ku̱wa?”

aaghila Alooni̱ ati, “Uwe, batabani̱ baawe na ka ya so waawe mulabaagha na musango haabwa kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ekilakoluwagha haa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi uwe na batabani̱ baawe mulabaagha na musango haabwa kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki mu̱hongi̱ alakolagha.
Oleete Baleevi̱ baanakyawe ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la yaanu, niikuwo baase kandi bakukoonele kukola milimo obu uwe na batabani̱ baawe mulabaagha nimukola mulimo haa weema ya sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano.

Bhaatu obu bakuba mbakola mulimo oghu, tabali na kwebinga haai na bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebili mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kedha kwebinga haai na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa. Kaakuba bakola eki baku̱ku̱wa kandi uwe na batabani̱ baawe mu̱ku̱ku̱wa dhee.
Baleevi̱ bali na kukola naawe mulimo ghwa kuloleelela weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi kukola milimo yoona haa weema eghi. Bhaatu oghu atali Mu̱leevi̱, taali na kwebinga hambali muli.
“Uwe na batabani̱ baawe muli na kuloleelela ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, niikuwo ntatodha kusaaliluwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye neenini oghu naakomi̱ye Baleevi̱ baanakyawe mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji kandi naabaha enu̱we bahongi̱ nga kisembo kyanu. Baleevi̱ aba naabahaayeyo ewaa
kukolagha milimo haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.

Bhaatu uwe na batabani̱ baawe mukugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱ haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa na mukati ya kateni̱. Mulimo ghwanu ghwa kuba bahongi̱ ni kisembo eki̱lu̱ghi̱ye ewanje. Muntu onji weena oghu akulengʼo kwebinga weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye eghi ali na kwitibuwa.”

aaghila Alooni̱ ati, “Si̱ye neenini naakuhaaye mulimo ghwa kuloleelela bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakundeetela. Naahaaye uwe na batabani̱ baawe bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi nga mughabo ghwanu ghwa bilo byona.

Naakuhaaye ki̱twi̱ke kya bihonguwa ebi batookeei̱ye haa mulilo. Ki̱twi̱ke kya bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bini: bihonguwa bya bilimuwa kedha bihonguwa haabwa kibhi kedha bihonguwa haabwa kuuhibuwʼo musango, ki̱twi̱ke kya bihonguwa ebi ni kyawe na batabani̱ baawe.
Bihonguwa ebi obiliilaghe mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Bu̱li̱ musaasa oghu ali mu ka yaawe akugubha kubiliya. Bihonguwa ebi bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaawe.

“Bini ni byawe dhee: bihonguwa byona bya ku̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuhaayo ni byawe dhee. Naahaaye bihonguwa ebi uwe, batabani̱ baawe na bahala baawe nga mughabo ghwa bilo byona. Muntu weena mu ka yaawe oghu eeli̱ye ewaanu akugubha kubiliya.
“Naakuhaaye dhee mafu̱ta ghasemeeye ghaa biti oli̱va, vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka na bilimuwa bisemeeye ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuhaayo ewaa
nga mughanulo ghwabo.
Mighanulo yoona ya bilimuwa mu kyalo eki eghi Banai̱saaleeli̱ balaleetelagha si̱ye
elabaagha yaawe. Muntu weena mu ka yaawe oghu eeli̱ye ewaanu akugubha kubiliya.
“Kintu kyona eki Banai̱saaleeli̱ balahaaghayo ewaa
kilabaagha kyawe.
Mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwona ghwabusaasa ghube ghwa muntu kedha ghwa kisolo oghu bahongeeye
, ghulabaagha ghwawe. Bhaatu mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwabusaasa ghwa muntu oli na kughucungula kandi na mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa kisolo eki̱teeli̱ye oli na kughucungula.
Baana baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso mbabaaye bali na kweli̱ kumui, obacungulaghe na bi̱twi̱ke bitaano bya siliva, kusighikila haa ki̱pi̱i̱mo kyomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

“Bhaatu tooli na kucungula mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa nte, ntaama kedha mbu̱li̱, nanga bisolo ebi bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Saghama ya bisolo ebi oghimisangaghe haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kandi bisabu obihongaghe nga kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
Nyama sya bisolo ebi sili na kuba syawe, ngoku mbanda na kibelo kyabuliyo ebi baamu̱ki̱i̱ye nga kihonguwa ewaa
bili byawe.
Bihonguwa byona bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuhaayo ewaa
, naakuhaaye biyo na batabani̱ baawe na bahala baawe, kuba mughabo ghwawe bwile bwona. Eghi ni ndaghaano ya bilo nʼebilo eghi naakoli̱ye naawe na baasukulu baawe kandi eghi etalihuwʼo.”
aaghila Alooni̱ ati, “Tookutunga bugwetuwa mu nsi eghi, kedha kutunga mughabo nga Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji. Ni̱i̱si̱ye mughabo ghwawe kandi bugwetuwa bwawe mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.
“Naahaaye Baleevi̱ bu̱li̱ kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ nga bugwetuwa bwabo eki Banai̱saaleeli̱ balahaaghayo ewanje haabwa mulimo bakukola ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Kutandikila endindi Banai̱saaleeli̱ batatodha kughenda haai na weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Kaakuba bakola eki baku̱si̱ngu̱wa musango kandi baku̱we.

Baleevi̱ bonkaha niibo bali na kukola mulimo haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Kaakuba basobi̱ya kintu kyona haa weema eghi, baku̱si̱ngu̱wa musango. Eki ni kilaghilo kya bilo nʼebilo mu mijo yaanu yoona eghi ekwisa. Baleevi̱ tabakutunga bugwetuwa bwa nsi nga Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji.
Bhaatu bugwetuwa obu naahaaye Baleevi̱ ni kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ eki Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuhaayo nga kihonguwa ewaa
. Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naabu̱ghʼo Baleevi̱ nti, ‘Tabakutunga bugwetuwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghile Baleevi̱ oti, ‘Mulakatungagha kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ eki naahaaye enu̱we nga bugwetuwa bwanu ku̱lu̱gha mu Banai̱saaleeli̱, muli na kuhaayo kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kyakiyo nga kihonguwa ewaa
Banai̱saaleeli̱ balakabaagha mbaha si̱ye ki̱twi̱ke kya bilimuwa na vi̱i̱ni̱, naanu muli na kuta haakpengbu̱ ki̱twi̱ke kya ebi mwatu̱ngi̱ye kya kumpa.
Muli na kuhaayo mutiyo kihonguwa ewaa
ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ eki mulatungagha ku̱lu̱gha mu Banai̱saaleeli̱. Haa kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ eki muuyaghʼo kihonguwa kya
kya kuha mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱.
Haa bisembo byona ebi mulatungagha, muuyaghʼo ki̱twi̱ke ekisemeeye kwonini kuba kihonguwa kya mbaghani̱ja kya
kandi mukihongaghe ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini.’

“Oghile Baleevi̱ oti, ‘Haanu̱ma yaanu kumpa ki̱twi̱ke kisemeeye, mukugubha kuliya ebyati̱ghaayʼo, ngoku Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakuliyagha ki̱twi̱ke kya bihonguwa byabo bya bilimuwa na vi̱i̱ni̱ haanu̱ma yabo kubimpongela.
Uwe na bantu bʼomu ka yaawe mukugubha kuliila hantu hoona ebi̱ti̱ghaaye haa kihonguwa eki, nanga ni nsasu̱li̱ haabwa milimo oghu mukwete kukola haa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.

Kaakuba muhayo ki̱twi̱ke ekisemeeye kwonini kya kihonguwa eki tamu̱ku̱si̱ngu̱wa musango haabwa kukola eki, du̱mbi̱ tamu̱ku̱bhi̱i̱ya bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi tamu̱ku̱ku̱wa.’ ”
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati,
“Kini nkilaghilo eki
aataayo ati, ‘Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ kukuleetela nte mutuku, eghi etalamaaye, eghi etali na kamogo kandi eghi batakakoleeseei̱ye mulimo ghwona.
Nte eghi baghihe mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja, du̱mbi̱ baghi̱twesi̱ye hanja ya hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye kandi baghisalile mu maaso ghe.
Du̱mbi̱ mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja akoti̱ye kyala kiye mu saghama ya nte eghi kandi aghimisange milundi musanju̱ mu maaso ghaa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu.
Nte eghi yoona, otaayemu luhu, nyama, saghama na mabhi̱ ghaayʼo byona babyoki̱ye mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja analoli̱ye.
Mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja akwate kati kaa ki̱i̱looku̱, kabha kaa hai̱sopu̱ na hu̱u̱ji̱ mutuku kandi abikube mu mulilo ghwa nyama sya nte esikwete kuhiya.

Haanu̱ma yʼeki, mu̱hongi̱ oghu ali na kunaabi̱ya ngoye alu̱weete kandi anaabe maasi mubili ghwona. Du̱mbi̱ akuuke hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye, bhaatu akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo.
Musaasa oghu ookeei̱ye nte eghi naye dhee ali na kunaabi̱ya ngoye esi alu̱weete kandi anaabe maasi mubili ghwona, bhaatu naye dhee akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo.

“ ‘Musaasa oghu eeli̱ye akumaani̱ye ki̱bu̱ kya nte eghi kandi akite mu ki̱i̱kalo kyeli̱ye hanja ya hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye. Ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kibiike ki̱bu̱ eki kukitaagha mu maasi ghaa mukolo ghwa kweli̱ya bantu, kubaayʼo kibhi.

Musaasa oghu akukumaani̱ya ki̱bu̱ kya nyama sya nte eghi ali na kunaabi̱ya dhee ngoye esi alu̱weete kandi naye dhee akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo. Kini ni kilaghilo kya bilo byona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ na banamahanga abaakaaye nabo.
“ ‘Muntu weena oghu alaku̱magha haa mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu, alafookagha oghu ateeli̱ye haabwa bilo musanju̱.

Muntu oghu ali na kweyeli̱ya haa kilo kyakasatu na kilo kyamusanju̱ haabwa kunaaba maasi aghakweli̱yagha agha, du̱mbi̱ akufooka oghu eeli̱ye. Bhaatu kaakuba ateeyeli̱ya haa kilo kyakasatu na kilo kyamusanju̱, akuukala anali oghu ateeli̱ye.
Muntu weena oghu aku̱ku̱mʼo mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu kandi asaaghuwa kweyeli̱ya, aku̱bhi̱i̱ya weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ya
. Muntu oghu ali na kubhinguwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱, nanga tabamumisangiiye maasi aghakweli̱yagha, nahabweki ni muntu oghu ateeli̱ye kandi akuukala ali oghu ateeli̱ye.

“ ‘Kini ni kilaghilo ekikwetʼo muntu oghu akwi̱li̱i̱ye mu weema yee. Muntu weena oghu akutaaha mu weema eghi kandi muntu weena oghu akuba ali mu weema eghi, akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye haabwa bilo musanju̱
kandi bu̱li̱ kintu kyona ekili mu weema eghi ekitaswi̱ki̱ye haa mu̱nu̱wa kikufooka eki̱teeli̱ye.

“ ‘Kaakuba muntu weena aba ali mu musili kandi aku̱mʼo mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu oghu baati̱ye na kihiyo kedha oghu aku̱u̱ye lu̱ku̱ lwa bu̱li̱ kilo, kedha aku̱ma haa eku̱wa lya muntu oghu kedha haa kituulo kiye, alafookagha oghu ateeli̱ye haabwa bilo musanju̱.
“ ‘Kweli̱ya muntu oghu, bate ki̱bu̱ kya nte eghi bookeei̱ye nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi kuuyʼo bantu kibhi kandi bakite mu jaaga, du̱mbi̱ baseesemu maasi.

Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu eeli̱ye akwate kabha kaa hai̱sopu̱, akakoti̱ye mu maasi agha kandi aghamisange haa weema, haa byaku̱koleesi̱yamu byona na bantu abaabaagha mu weema eghi. Ali na kughamisangila dhee haa muntu weena oghu aaku̱mi̱ye haa eku̱wa lya muntu kedha kituulo kedha haa mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu oghu baati̱ye kedha muntu oghu aaku̱u̱ye lu̱ku̱ lwa bu̱li̱ kilo.

Musaasa oghu eeli̱ye ali na kumisangila maasi agha muntu oghu ateeli̱ye oghu haa kilo kyakasatu na kilo kyamusanju̱. Muntu oghu eeli̱ye atodhe akole mukolo ghwa kweli̱ya muntu oghu haa kilo kyamusanju̱. Muntu oghu bakwete kukolʼo mukolo ghwa ku̱mweli̱ya ali na kunaabi̱ya ngoye esi alu̱weete, anaabe maasi mubili ghwona kandi lwagholo olu akufooka oghu eeli̱ye.
Bhaatu kaakuba muntu oghu ateeli̱ye asaaghuwa kukola mukolo ghwa kweyeli̱ya, ali na kubhinguwa mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱, nanga aabhi̱hi̱i̱ye ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kya
. Nanga bakuba batamumisangiiye maasi aghakweli̱yagha kandi ni muntu oghu ateeli̱ye.
Kini nkilaghilo kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kya bilo nʼebilo.

“ ‘Muntu oghu akumisangila muunakiye maasi aghakweli̱yagha, akulaghiluwa dhee kunaabi̱ya ngoye esi alu̱weete kandi muntu weena oghu aku̱ku̱mʼo maasi aghakweli̱yagha akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo.
Kintu kyona eki muntu oghu ateeli̱ye aku̱ku̱mʼo kikufooka eki̱teeli̱ye kandi muntu weena oghu aku̱ku̱mʼo kintu eki akufooka oghu ateeli̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo.’ ”
Mu kweli̱ kwʼoku̱du̱bha ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaki̱dha mu elungu lya Ji̱i̱ni̱ kandi baaghoona mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱. Mi̱li̱yamu aakwi̱la mu ki̱i̱kalo eki kandi baamujiikayo.
Maasi ghakaba ghatali mu ki̱i̱kalo eki ghaa ki̱bbu̱la eki kunuwa, du̱mbi̱ bantu aba beekumaani̱ya kuhakani̱ya Musa na Alooni̱.
Baatongana na Musa bati, “Nguli twaku̱u̱ye bwile obu baghenji̱ baatu baakwi̱li̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa
Nkiki kyaleki̱ye waaleeta ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu baa
mu elungu lini, etu̱we na bisolo byatu ku̱kwi̱lamu?

Waatu̱u̱hi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, kutuleeta mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye nangaaki? Ki̱i̱kalo kini takilimu bilimuwa, biti mi̱ti̱i̱ni̱, mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ kedha mikomamahanga kandi maasi ghaa kunuwa taghalimu!”
Musa na Alooni̱ baalu̱gha mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki kandi baaghenda haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, beegenga hansi makpu̱ngbu̱ kandi ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya
kyababonekela.
aaghila Musa ati,

“Okwate mwi̱gho ghwawe kandi uwe na mu̱ghenji̱ waawe Alooni̱ mukumaani̱ye ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki. Olaghile kikuka bantu aba banaloli̱ye kandi maasi ghaku̱lu̱ghamu. Okuuya maasi mu kikuka ghaa ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba na bisolo byabo kunuwa.”
Nahabweki Musa aakwata mwi̱gho oghwabaagha mu maaso ghaa
ngoku
aamulaghiiye.
Musa na Alooni̱ baakumaani̱ya ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba mu maaso ghaa kikuka. Musa aabaghila ati, “Mu̱u̱ghu̱we, enu̱we bantu bajeemi̱! Buuye tubaahile maasi mu kikuka kini?”

Du̱mbi̱ Musa aamu̱ki̱ya mukono ghuwe kandi aahuula mwi̱gho oghu haa kikuka eki milundi ebili. Maasi ghakani̱ye ghaalu̱ghamu kandi ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba baatandika kunuwa maasi agha na bisolo byabo byanuwa dhee.
Bhaatu

aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati, “Mwabhengi̱ye kuneesigha kwonini kandi ku̱mpu̱ti̱ya ngoku ndi ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba, tamu̱ku̱ki̱dhi̱ya ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba mu nsi eghi nkuha bantu aba.”
Agha niigho maasi agha baatu̱ngi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo baghilaghamu Meli̱ba,
hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatongaane na
kandi aabooleka ngoku ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Musa aatuma batumuwa ku̱lu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱ kughenda ewaa mukama wa Edomu kandi kumughila bati, “Mu̱ghenji̱ waawe I̱saaleeli̱ akwete kughila ati, ‘Omani̱ye bijibu byona ebyatubaayʼo.
Baataata baatu baakahona mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi twakalayo myaka ekani̱ye. Banami̱si̱li̱ baabona-boni̱ya etu̱we na baataata baatu.
Bhaatu twataaghila
kutukoonela. Aaghu̱wa kutaagha kwatu kandi aatuma malai̱ka wee kutuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
“ ‘Endindi tuli mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱, eghi eli haa mutaano ghwa kyalo kyawe.

Gutu otu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye kusaalila mu kyalo kyawe. Tatukusaalila mu misili kedha misili ya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱, kedha kunuwa maasi ghaa byahu̱dhu̱ byanu. Tukukwamila mu luguudhe lwonkaha kandi tatukwegaali̱ya haa mukono ghwabuliyo kedha ghwabumesu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya tumali̱ye kusaalila mu kyalo kyawe.’ ”
Bhaatu mukama wa Edomu aaghila ati, “Bbaa, tamukusaalila mu kyalo kyatu, kaakuba mulengʼo kukwamilamu, tukwisa kulwana naanu tukwete bihiyo.”

Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamughila bati, “Tukusaalilila mu luguudhe lwonkaha kandi kaakuba tunuwa maasi ghaanu kedha bisolo byatu bighanuwa, tukughasasula. Eki tukwete kubbala ni kusaalila mu kyalo kyanu ntulubhatanga, taaliyo kintu kinji tukukola.”
Bhaatu mukama oghu aabaghila ati, “Tamukusaalilamu bbaa!” Du̱mbi̱ aasindika mahe ghe ghaamaani̱ ghaa Edomu kughenda kandi kulwana na Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Obu bantu baa Edomu baabhengi̱ye ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kusaalila mu kyalo kyabo, du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baakuuka kandi baakwama kihanda kinji.
Ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱ kandi baaki̱dha haa mwena Hooli̱.
