Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabaagha haa mwena Hooli̱ haai na kyalo kya Edomu,
aaghila Musa na Alooni̱ ati,
“Alooni̱ aku̱ku̱wa kandi akukwama baataata be. Taaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi nkuha Banai̱saaleeli̱, nanga enu̱we bombi obu mwabaagha haa maasi ghaa Meli̱ba mukabhenga ku̱u̱ghu̱wa eki naabalaghiiye.
Musa, otwale Alooni̱ na mutabani̱ wee Eli̱yeeja kandi mu̱ni̱i̱ne haa mwena Hooli̱.
Ooyemu Alooni̱ bi̱lu̱waalo biye kandi obi̱lu̱wi̱ke mutabani̱ wee Eli̱yeeja, nanga Alooni̱ aku̱kwi̱la haa mwena ghuni kandi akukwama baataata be.”
Musa aakola ngoku
aamulaghiiye. Baani̱i̱na haa mwena Hooli̱ ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ banabaloli̱ye.
Musa aayamu Alooni̱ bi̱lu̱waalo biye kandi aabi̱lu̱wi̱ka Eli̱yeeja mutabani̱ wa Alooni̱ kandi Alooni̱ aakwi̱la haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena oghu. Du̱mbi̱ Musa na Eli̱yeeja baakota ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghu.
Obu ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamani̱ye ngoku Alooni̱ aaku̱u̱ye, baamweghungila haabwa bilo maku̱mi̱ asatu.

Obu Munakanaani̱, mukama wa Aladi̱ oghu akaba aakaaye Negeebbu, aaghu̱u̱ye ngu Banai̱saaleeli̱ niibuwo baasa mu luguudhe olukweme mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghwa Atali̱i̱mu̱, aaghenda kubalu̱mba kandi aakwata bamui mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba.
Du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalahila ewaa
bati, “Kaakuba otu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya ku̱si̱ngu̱la bantu aba, tu̱ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kwonini bibugha byabo.”
aaghu̱wa eki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamusabi̱ye kandi aaleka baasi̱ngu̱la Banakanaani̱ aba. Baabahwelekeeleli̱ya kwonini na bibugha byabo kandi baaluka ki̱i̱kalo eki li̱i̱na Holu̱ma.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha haa mwena Hooli̱, baakwama kihanda kya Nanja Mutuku kandi baaghenda mbaneeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya ehanga lya Edomu. Bhaatu bantu aba baasaaghuwa ku̱gu̱mi̱si̱li̱ja mu lughendo olu.
Baatandika kutongana na Luhanga kandi na Musa bati, “Nkiki kyaleki̱ye mwatuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ ku̱kwi̱la mu elungu? Byokuliya tabilimu! Maasi taghalimu! Byokuliya bitasemeeye maanu byatutami̱ye.”
Du̱mbi̱
aabasindikila njoka sya buseguwe, syabaluma kandi bakani̱ye mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baaku̱wa.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baasa hambali Musa ali kandi baamughila bati, “Twasi̱i̱si̱ye kutongana na
kandi kuhakangana naawe. Gutu osabe
kutuuyʼo njoka esi.” Nahabweki Musa aasabila bantu aba.
aaghila Musa ati, “Okole kisasani̱ kya njoka ya bbu̱looji̱ kandi oghi̱dhodhooki̱ye haa mpaghi. Muntu weena oghu njoka ekuluma kandi alola haa njoka eghi akukila.”
Nahabweki Musa aakola kisasani̱ kya njoka ya bbu̱looji̱ kandi aaghi̱dhodhooki̱ya haa mpaghi. Njoka yaakalumagha muntu weena kandi naalola haa njoka eghi, akila.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ beeyongela kughenda kandi baaghoona mu ki̱i̱kalo baaghilaghamu Obboti̱.
Du̱mbi̱ baalu̱gha Obboti̱ baaghenda kandi baaghoona I̱ye-abbali̱mu̱, mu elungu elilolaane na Mowaabu bu̱lu̱gha ejooba.
Baalu̱gha mu elungu eli, baaghenda kandi baaghoona mu kighona kya Jeledi̱.

Du̱mbi̱ baalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki baaghenda kandi baaghoona luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Alu̱nooni̱, mu elungu eli̱hi̱ki̱ye mu kyalo kya Bamooli̱. Maasi Alu̱nooni̱ ghakaba ghali haa mutaano ghwa Mowaabu, haagati ya Mowaabu na Bamooli̱.
Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye Kitabo kya Malemo ghaa
kyaghila kiti,
“Kibugha kya Wahebbu mu kyalo kya Sufa,
na bighona bya maasi Alu̱nooni̱,
ku̱hi̱ka mu bighona ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye mu kibugha kya Ala,
haa mutaano ghwa ehanga lya Mowaabu.”
Obu baalu̱ghi̱ye haala, baaghenda kandi baaki̱dha Bbeela, haa kyahu̱dhu̱ hambali
aaghi̱li̱ye Musa ati, “Okumaani̱ye hamui Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi nkubaha maasi.”
Du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalimba kilimbo kini bati,
“Uwe kyahu̱dhu̱, otuhe maasi!
Bhaawai̱, mukilimbile kilimbo.
Kyahu̱dhu̱ eki balemi̱ baali̱mi̱ye
na mi̱i̱gho ya bukama
kandi bantu aba bahu̱ti̱i̱ye baaki̱tobheeli̱ya
na mi̱i̱gho yabo.”
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱ghi̱ye mu elungu eli baaghenda kandi baaghoona Matana.
Du̱mbi̱ baalu̱gha Matana kandi baaki̱dha Nahalyeli̱. Baalu̱gha Nahalyeli̱ kandi baaki̱dha Bbamoti̱.
Baalu̱gha Bbamoti̱ kandi baaki̱dha mu kighona kya Mowaabu mu nti̱na ya mwena ghwa Pisiga hambali muntu eemililagha kandi alola hansi mu elungu.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatuma batumuwa ewaa Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱ kumughila bati,

“Otu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye tusaalile mu kyalo kyawe. Tatukwekita mu misili yaanu ya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ kedha kunuwa maasi ghaa byahu̱dhu̱ byanu. Tukukwama mu luguudhe lwonkaha ku̱hi̱ki̱ya tu̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu kyalo kyawe.”

Bhaatu Si̱hooni̱ aabhenga ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kusaalila mu kyalo kiye. Aakumaani̱ya mahe ghe kandi aaghenda mu ki̱i̱kalo baaghilaghamu Jahaaji̱ mu elungu, aatandika kulwana na Banai̱saaleeli̱.

Bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamu̱si̱ngu̱la haa bulemo kandi baatwala kyalo kiye ku̱lu̱gha haa maasi Alu̱nooni̱ ku̱hi̱ka haa maasi Yabboki̱. Baakuukila haa mutaano ghwa Bamooni̱, nanga mahe ghaamaani̱ ghaa Bamooni̱ ghakaba ghali̱ndi̱ye mutaano oghu.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakwata bibugha byona bya Bamooli̱ otaayemu kibugha kya Hesi̱bbooni̱, na maatau̱ni̱ ghoona agheeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye kibugha eki kandi baakalamu.
Hesi̱bbooni̱ niikiyo kyabaagha kibugha kya Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱, oghu akalwana na mukama wa Mowaabu kandi aamuuyʼo kyalo kiye kyona ku̱hi̱ka haa maasi Alu̱nooni̱.
Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye bali̱mbi̱ baaghila bati,
“Mwise tukwele kibugha kya Hesi̱bbooni̱,
tukwele buhyaka kibugha kya Si̱hooni̱ kandi kigume.
Mulilo ghukaaka mu kibugha kya Hesi̱bbooni̱
kandi ghwamuka mu kibugha kya Si̱hooni̱.
Ghwahwelekeeleli̱ya kibugha kya Ala mu ehanga lya Mowaabu
kandi bwena obuli haai na maasi Alu̱nooni̱.
Ngamulikibona enu̱we bantu baa Mowaabu!
Enu̱we bantu abakulami̱yagha luhanga Kemosi̱ mukuhwelekeelela!
Batabani̱ baanu bakulalanga
kandi bahala baanu bakubakwata,
babatwale ewaa Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱.
Bhaatu twabasi̱ngu̱u̱ye
kandi twahwelekeleei̱ye kibugha kya Hesi̱bbooni̱ ku̱hi̱ka Di̱bbooni̱.
Twabahwelekeleei̱ye ku̱hi̱ka mu kibugha kya Noofa,
ku̱hi̱ka mu tau̱ni̱ ya Medeba.”
Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghoona mu kyalo kya Bamooli̱.
Musa aatuma basaasa kubega kibugha kya Yajeeli̱. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakikwata na maatau̱ni̱ agheeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye kibugha eki kandi baabhingamu Bamooli̱ abaabaagha baakaayemu.
Du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakuuka kandi baakwama kihanda eki̱ghendi̱ye Bbasaani. Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani na baasilikale be baasa kulwana na Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu tau̱ni̱ ya Edeleeyi̱.

Bhaatu Mukama aaghila Musa ati, “Otamwobaha, nanga naamali̱ye kukuha ye na baasilikale be boona kandi okutwala nsi yee yoona. Omukole ngoku waakoli̱ye Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱, oghu akaba alemi̱ye mu Hesi̱bbooni̱.”
Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baata mukama Ogi̱, batabani̱ be, mahe ghe ghoona na bantu be boona. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akati̱ghalʼo ali mwomi̱i̱li̱ kandi baatwala kyalo kiye kyona.
Niibuwo Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghendi̱ye mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu kandi baaghoona haai na maasi Yolodaani̱, kibugha kya Yeli̱ko kili luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi agha.
Bbalaki̱ mukama wa Mowaabu, mutabani̱ wa Jipola, aaghu̱wa byona ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakoli̱yʼo Bamooli̱.
Banamowaabu boobaha kwonini Banai̱saaleeli̱, nanga Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakaba bakani̱ye kwonini.

Banamowaabu baaghila beebembeli̱ baa Banami̱di̱yaani̱ bati, “Bantu bakaniiye kimui aba baku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bintu byona ebyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye etu̱we. Bakuba nga nte eghi ekuliyaagha bi̱si̱ngo byona byʼomu kisaka.”
Nahabweki Bbalaki̱ oghu akaba ali mukama wa Mowaabu bwile obu kandi mutabani̱ wa Jipola,

aatuma batumuwa kuleeta Bbalaamu, mutabani̱ wa Bbeyola. Bbalaamu akaba aakaaye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Petola haai na maasi ghaa Efulaati̱. Bbalaki̱ aatuma bantu kughila Bbalaamu bati, “Olole, ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu bakaniiye kimui kyalu̱ghi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱. Bantu aba bamalakaki̱ye nsi yoona kandi baghooni̱ye haai na ehanga lyanje.

Bantu aba bali na maani̱ kusaali̱ya si̱ye, nahabweki nkubbala wiise kandi obakiine. Kaakuba obakiina, nkugubha kubasi̱ngu̱la kandi kubabhinga mu ehanga lyanje. Nanga nimani̱ye ngu oghu okuhaagha mu̱gi̱sa akutungagha mu̱gi̱sa kandi oghu okukiinagha akutungagha mukiino.”
Beebembeli̱ baa Mowaabu na baa Mi̱di̱yaani̱ baaghenda kandi baatwala sente sya kusasula Bbalaamu haabwa mukiino oghu. Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye ewaa Bbalaamu, baamughambila ebi mukama Bbalaki̱ aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Bbalaamu aabaghila ati, “Mulaale hani mukilo eni, munkiya nkubaghambila eki
akuba abu̱ghi̱ye.” Nahabweki beebembeli̱ bʼomu ehanga lya Mowaabu baalaala ewaa Bbalaamu.
Mukilo eghi Luhanga aasa kandi aabu̱u̱li̱ya Bbalaamu ati, “Basaasa abali ewaawe aba mbaki?”
Bbalaamu aaghila Luhanga ati, “Bbalaki̱ mukama wa Mowaabu, mutabani̱ wa Jipola, niiye aabatu̱mi̱ye ewanje naaghila ati,

‘Olole, bantu bakaniiye kimui baalu̱ghi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi baamalakaki̱ye kyalo kyona. Nahabweki wiise kandi obankiinile. Kaakuba okola eki nkugubha kulwana nabo kandi kubabhinga mu ehanga lyanje.’ ”
Bhaatu Luhanga aaghila Bbalaamu ati, “Otaghenda na basaasa aba kandi otakiina bantu abaalu̱ghi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ aba, nanga ni̱i̱si̱ye naabahaaye mu̱gi̱sa.”
Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, Bbalaamu aamuka kandi aaghila bakama aba Bbalaki̱ aatu̱mi̱ye ati, “Mukuuke mu ehanga lyanu, nanga
aabhengi̱ye ku̱nsi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kughenda naanu.”
Nahabweki beebembeli̱ bʼomu ehanga lya Mowaabu aba baakuuka ewaa Bbalaki̱ kandi baamughila bati, “Bbalaamu aabhengi̱ye kwisa naatu.”
Du̱mbi̱ Bbalaki̱ aatuma bakama banji bakani̱ye kandi aba bantu bahu̱ti̱i̱ye kusaali̱ya bʼoku̱du̱bha.
Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye ewaa Bbalaamu baamughila bati, “Bbalaki̱ mutabani̱ wa Jipola niibuwo aaghila ati, ‘Gutu atabʼo kintu kyona ekikukutanga kwisa ewanje.
Nkukuha nsasu̱li̱ esemeeye kwonini kandi nkukola kyona eki oku̱bu̱gha. Gutu wiise kandi onkiinile bantu aba.’ ”
Bhaatu Bbalaamu aakuukamu basaasa aba ati, “Nankabha Bbalaki̱ ampa kikaali kiye ekiisuuyemu siliva na feeja, tanku̱keei̱ya kedha kwongela haa eki
Luhanga wanje andaghiiye.
Nahabweki mulaale hani mukilo eni ngoku bʼoku̱du̱bha baakoli̱ye, nkubbala kumanya
akaakuba ali na kintu eki akungambila.”
Mukilo eghi Luhanga aasa ewaa Bbalaamu kandi aamughila ati, “Basaasa aba ngoku baakwisiiye, oghende nabo, bhaatu okole eki nkukulaghila kyonkaha.”
Bbalaamu aamuka nkyambisi, aani̱i̱na haa ndogooi̱ yee kandi aaghenda na beebembeli̱ bʼomu ehanga lya Mowaabu.
Bhaatu Luhanga aasaaliluwa kwonini haabwa Bbalaamu kughenda kandi malai̱ka wa
eemilila mu luguudhe kumutanga. Bbalaamu akaba ani̱i̱ni̱ye haa ndogooi̱ yee kandi baheeleli̱ye be babili bali hamui naye.
Obu ndogooi̱ eghi yaaboone malai̱ka wa
eemiliiye mu luguudhe kandi akwete kihiyo mu ngalo, yaalu̱gha mu luguudhe kandi yaaghenda mu kisaka. Bbalaamu aatandika kughihuula kandi ku̱ghi̱ku̱u̱ki̱ya mu luguudhe.
Du̱mbi̱ malai̱ka wa
aaghenda kandi eemilila mu kahanda kabhokaane akali haagati ya misili ebili ya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ eghi eli na bigho mpande syombi.
Obu ndogooi̱ eghi yaaboone malai̱ka wa
, yeeki̱i̱ti̱ya haa kisiika eki kandi yaami̱ghi̱i̱li̱lʼo kughulu kwa Bbalaamu. Nahabweki Bbalaamu aatodha aaghihuula.
Du̱mbi̱ malai̱ka wa
aaghenda kandi eemilila mu ki̱i̱kalo kibhokaane hambali hatali mwanya ghwa kwegaali̱ya haa luhande lwabuliyo kedha lwabumesu.
Obu ndogooi̱ eghi yaaboone malai̱ka wa
, yaalangaala hansi, Bbalaamu anaghi̱ni̱i̱ni̱yʼo. Bbalaamu aasaaliluwa kandi aatandika kuhuula ndogooi̱ eghi na mwi̱gho ghuwe.
Du̱mbi̱
aaghula kanu̱wa kaa ndogooi̱ eghi, yaabu̱gha kandi yaaghila Bbalaamu eti, “Naaku̱koli̱ye ki uwe kumpuula milundi esatu eghi?”
Bbalaamu aakuukamu ndogooi̱ eghi ati, “Wanfooye nga mudhoma, nguli naabaagha na kihiyo nangu̱kwi̱ti̱ye endindi.”
Bhaatu ndogooi̱ eghi yaamukuukamu eti, “Buuye taani̱i̱si̱ye ndogooi̱ yaawe eghi oku̱ni̱i̱nagha bu̱li̱ kilo? Naalaku̱koli̱ye kintu nga kini?”
Bbalaamu aaghila ati, “Bbaa.”
aaleka Bbalaamu aabona ngoku malai̱ka wa
eemiliiye mu luguudhe kandi akwete kihiyo. Du̱mbi̱ Bbalaamu aateeli̱ya kandi haali̱i̱so yee aaku̱ma hansi.
Malai̱ka wa
aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Waahuuye ndogooi̱ yaawe milundi esatu nangaaki? Naasi̱ye hani kukutanga nanga tambali̱ye oghende Mowaabu.
Ndogooi̱ eghi yamboone kandi yeegaali̱ya kunjiluka milundi esatu. Ndogooi̱ eghi nguli etanji̱lu̱ki̱ye, endindi nangubaaye nkwi̱ti̱ye kandi eyo ngileka.”
Bbalaamu aaghila malai̱ka wa
ati, “Naasi̱i̱si̱ye. Tanaamani̱ye ngoku aanuuwe waabaagha weemiliiye mu luguudhe kuntanga kughenda. Okaakuba otabbali̱ye oti ngende Mowaabu, nkukuuka.”
Malai̱ka wa
aaghila Bbalaamu ati, “Oghende na basaasa aba, bhaatu obu̱ghe ebi nkukughambila byonkaha.” Nahabweki Bbalaamu aaghenda na bakama aba Bbalaki̱ aatu̱mi̱ye.
Obu Bbalaki̱ aaghu̱u̱ye ngu Bbalaamu niibuwo aasa, aaghenda kumusangaana mu kibugha kya Mowaabu haai na maasi Alu̱nooni̱ haa mutaano ghwa ehanga eli.
Bbalaki̱ aaghila Bbalaamu ati, “Tanaatu̱mi̱ye bantu nti wiise bwangu-bwangu? Tawaasi̱ye ewanje bwile obu nangaaki? Weeli̱li̱kanagha oti tankugubha kukusasula kusemeeye?”
Bbalaamu aaghila Bbalaki̱ ati, “Olole, endindi naasi̱ye, buuye okweli̱li̱kana oti nku̱bu̱gha kintu kyona eki mbali̱ye? Eki Luhanga akungambila niikiyo nku̱bu̱gha kyonkaha.”
Du̱mbi̱ Bbalaamu aaghenda na Bbalaki̱ mu kibugha kya Ki̱li̱yaati̱-hajoti̱.
Bbalaki̱ aahonga nte na ntaama kandi aaha simui haa nyama esi Bbalaamu na bakama aabaagha naye.

Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo Bbalaki̱ aani̱i̱na na Bbalaamu mu ki̱i̱kalo kikangami̱ye eki baaghilaghamu Bbamoti̱-bbaali̱ kandi Bbalaamu aabona bimui haa bi̱bbu̱la biinamu̱li̱to bya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Bbalaamu aaghila Bbalaki̱ ati, “Onkwelele hani byakuhongelʼo bihonguwa musanju̱ kandi ondeetele ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte musanju̱ na ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama musanju̱.”
Bbalaki̱ aakola ngoku Bbalaamu aamughambiiye kandi bombi baahonga ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui na ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui haa bu̱li̱ kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.
Bbalaamu aaghila Bbalaki̱ ati, “Weemilile haai na kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kyawe. Oleke ngende haakpengbu̱ hali̱, kedha
aasa kusanga-sangaana nanje. Eki akundaghila niikiyo nkukughambila.”
Du̱mbi̱ Bbalaamu aani̱i̱na haagu̱u̱li̱ ya keena akatatooyʼo kantu koona.

Luhanga aasanga-sangaana na Bbalaamu kandi Bbalaamu aamughila ati, “Naakweye byakuhongelʼo bihonguwa musanju̱ kandi haa bu̱li̱ kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa naahongeeyʼo ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui na ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui.”
aaghambila Bbalaamu ebi akughambila Bbalaki̱ kandi aamughila ati, “Okuuke hambali Bbalaki̱ ali kandi omughambile ebi naakughambiiye.”
Nahabweki Bbalaamu aakuuka hambali Bbalaki̱ ali kandi aamusanga eemiliiye haai na kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kiye na beebembeli̱ boona bʼomu ehanga lya Mowaabu.
Bbalaamu aaghila ati,
“Bbalaki̱ mukama wa Mowaabu anji̱hi̱ye mu ehanga lya Si̱li̱ya,
mu myena ya bu̱lu̱gha ejooba.
Aaghila ati, ‘Wiise kandi onkiinile baasukulu baa Yakobbo
kandi obu̱ghʼo bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱.’
Buuye nkugubha nti̱ya kukiina bantu aba Luhanga ataki̱i̱ni̱ye?
Buuye nkugubha nti̱ya ku̱bu̱ghʼo bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bantu aba
atabu̱ghi̱yʼo bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
Mboone bantu aba ku̱lu̱gha haa bikuka bikangami̱ye
kandi nkubalolagha ndi haagu̱u̱li̱ ya bwena.
Bantu aba ni ehanga elili lyonkaha
kandi talikwebalilagha mu mahanga ghanji.
Buuye ni ani̱ akugubha kubala muhendo ghwa baasukulu baa Yakobbo abakani̱ye nga tu̱u̱tu̱?
Ni ani̱ akugubha kubala kimui kyakanaa kya Banai̱saaleeli̱?
Oleke nku̱we mu bu̱si̱nge
nga bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aba!”
Bbalaki̱ aaghila Bbalaamu ati, “Mbiki wankoli̱ye? Naaku̱leeti̱ye hani kukiina ngi̱ghu̱ syanje, bhaatu niibuwo waabaha mu̱gi̱sa!”
Bbalaamu aamukuukamu ati, “Buuye ntabu̱gha eki
aaghi̱li̱ye ati mbu̱ghe?”

Bbalaki̱ aaghila Bbalaamu ati, “Wiise tughende mu ki̱i̱kalo kinji hambali okugubha kubona Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba, bhaatu okubona ki̱twi̱ke kya bantu aba etali boona. Du̱mbi̱ mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, onkiinile bantu aba.”

Nahabweki Bbalaki̱ aatwala Bbalaamu mu ki̱i̱kalo Jofi̱mu̱ haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena ghwa Pisiga kandi aakwelʼo byakuhongelʼo bihonguwa musanju̱ kandi aahongela haa bu̱li̱ kimui ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui na ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui.
Bbalaamu aaghila Bbalaki̱ ati, “Weemilile haai na kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kyawe, oleke ngende haakpengbu̱ hali kandi nsanga-sangaane na
aasanga-sangaana na Bbalaamu kandi aamuha butumuwa bunji ati, “Okuuke hambali Bbalaki̱ ali kandi omughambile ebi naakughambiiye.”
Nahabweki Bbalaamu aakuuka kandi aasanga Bbalaki̱ eemiliiye haai na kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kiye na beebembeli̱ boona bʼomu ehanga lya Mowaabu. Bbalaki̱ aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mbiki
aabu̱ghi̱ye?”
Du̱mbi̱ Bbalaamu aaghila ati,
“Bbalaki̱, oomuke kandi ontegheeleli̱ye.
Onji̱ghu̱we, uwe mutabani̱ wa Jipola.
Luhanga taali nga bantu, kuha bisubha
kandi taali mutabani̱ wa muntu kuhindula byeli̱li̱kano biye.
Buuye aku̱bu̱ghagha kintu atakikola?
Buuye akulaghi̱i̱sani̱yagha kintu kitabʼo?
andaghiiye kuha mu̱gi̱sa Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Aabahaaye mu̱gi̱sa kandi si̱ye tankugubha kuhindula eki bbaa.
Taaliyo kabhi akakubʼo baasukulu baa Yakobbo
kandi Banai̱saaleeli̱ tabakutunga kijibu kyona.
Luhanga wabo ali hamui nabo
kandi bakulangililagha nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ngoku ali mukama wabo.
Luhanga akabaaya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Bali na maani̱ nga ghaa mbogho.
Taaliyo oghu akugubha kukiina baasukulu baa Yakobbo.
Taaliyo mu̱ku̱mu̱ oghu ali na maani̱ kukolʼo kabhi koona Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba.
Nahabweki bantu baku̱bu̱ghʼo baasukulu baa Yakobbo
na Banai̱saaleeli̱ bati,
‘Olole bintu byamaani̱ ebi Luhanga aabakoleeye!’
Bantu aba bali na maani̱ nga ghaa ntale yabukali̱
kandi baku̱lu̱mbagha nga ntale
eghi etaakulangaalagha ku̱hi̱ki̱ya eliiye nyama
kandi enooye saghama yʼeki yaati̱ye.”
Du̱mbi̱ Bbalaki̱ aaghila Bbalaamu ati, “Waabhengi̱ye kukiina Banai̱saaleeli̱, bhaatu gutu otabaha mu̱gi̱sa!”
Bbalaamu aakuukamu Bbalaki̱ ati, “Buuye tanaakughambiiye nti kyona eki
aku̱bu̱gha niikiyo nkukola?”
Bbalaki̱ aaghila Bbalaamu ati, “Wiise, nkutwale mu ki̱i̱kalo kinji. Eki kyangudheedha Luhanga kandi aku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye kunkiinila bantu aba mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.”
Nahabweki Bbalaki̱ aatwala Bbalaamu haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena ghwa Peyola, hambali akugubha kulola hansi mu elungu.
Bbalaamu aaghila Bbalaki̱ ati, “Onkwelele hani byakuhongelʼo bihonguwa musanju̱ kandi ondeetele ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte musanju̱ na ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama musanju̱.”
Bbalaki̱ aakola ngoku Bbalaamu aabu̱ghi̱ye kandi Bbalaki̱ aahonga ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui na ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui haa bu̱li̱ kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.
Obu Bbalaamu aaboone ngoku
aabbali̱ye kuha Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu̱gi̱sa, ataaghenda kulaghu̱li̱ya ngoku aakolagha bwile bunji, bhaatu aalola mu elungu.
Obu Bbalaamu aaloli̱ye kandi naabona Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooni̱ye kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, Mwoyo wa Luhanga aamwisʼo.
Bbalaamu aaghila ati,
“Buni niibuwo butumuwa bwa Bbalaamu mutabani̱ wa Bbeyola,
butumuwa bwa muntu oghu akubonagha bbeni̱-bbeni̱,
butumuwa bwa muntu oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha bighambo bya Luhanga,
muntu oghu akubonagha ebi Luhanga wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona akunjolekagha,
nankabha ndangaala hansi makpu̱ngbu̱ nkuukalagha mboone ebikubʼo.
Ai̱ Yakobbo, weema syawe sisemeeye kwonini,
Ai̱ I̱saaleeli̱, okuukalagha mu ki̱i̱kalo kilungi!
Weema syawe sili nga mba baheli̱ye mu bighona,
nga misili eghi eli haai na maasi,
nga biti bikangami̱ye
kandi bisasi̱ye ebi
aheli̱ye,
nga bi̱i̱looku̱ bitooye haakpengbu̱ ya maasi.
Bbaketi̱ syawe silaseesekeli̱yagha maasi
kandi bilimuwa byawe bilatungagha mbu̱la ekani̱ye.
Mukama waawe akuba wamaani̱ kusaali̱ya mukama Agagi̱
kandi bantu bakusinda bukama buwe.
Luhanga akaaya Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Ali na maani̱ nga ghaa mbogho kubalwanilila.
Baku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya mahanga aghakubahakani̱ya,
bahenange maku̱wa ghaa bantu aba mu bi̱twi̱ka-twi̱ke
kandi bakulasa ngi̱ghu̱ syabo na bimala byabo byonini.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ bali nga ntale,
eghi ekulangaalagha hansi kandi yeenanula.
Buuye ni ani̱ akugubha kulwana nabo?
Muntu weena oghu akuha Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu̱gi̱sa, akutunga mu̱gi̱sa.
Bhaatu oghu akubakiina naye akukiinuwa!”

Obu Bbalaamu aabu̱ghi̱ye eki, Bbalaki̱ aateela mu ngalo na maani̱ asaaluuwe kwonini kandi aaghila Bbalaamu ati, “Naakubilikiiye kwisa kukiina ngi̱ghu̱ syanje, bhaatu milundi esatu eghi yoona niibuwo waabaha mu̱gi̱sa.
Nahabweki olu̱ghe hani endindi kandi oghende mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ewaanu! Naabaagha ngi̱li̱ye nti nkukusasula kusemeeye, bhaatu
aakutangi̱ye kutunga kantu koona.”
Bbalaamu aakuukamu Bbalaki̱ ati, “Buuye tanaghambiiye batumuwa aba waatu̱mi̱ye ewanje nti,
‘Nankabha Bbalaki̱ ampa kikaali kiye kyona ekiisuuyemu siliva na feeja, tankukola kintu kyona haabwanje, kibe kilungi kedha ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, kusaali̱ya haa eki
andaghiiye. Eki
akungambila, niikiyo nku̱bu̱gha kyonkaha!’
Endindi ndimakuuka mu bantu baa ewaatu, bhaatu wiise, oleke nkughambile eki Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakukolʼo bantu bʼomu ehanga lyawe mu bwile obuliisa.”
Bbalaamu aaghila ati,
“Buni niibuwo butumuwa bwa Bbalaamu mutabani̱ wa Bbeyola,
butumuwa bwa muntu oghu akubonagha bbeni̱-bbeni̱,
butumuwa bwa muntu oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha bighambo bya Luhanga,
eetegheeleli̱ya magheji ghaa wa Eghulu Munu,
muntu oghu akubonagha ebi Luhanga wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona akunjolekagha,
nankabha ndangaala hansi makpu̱ngbu̱ nkuukalagha mboone ebikubʼo.
Mboone mukama oghu akulema ku̱lu̱gha mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Taakwisa kulema endindi, bhaatu mu bwile bwʼomu maaso.
Muusukulu wa Yakobbo oghu
akuba nga nsooli̱ya eghi ekwete kwaka kwonini.
Aku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya beebembeli̱ baa bantu baa Mowaabu
kandi akukpeetagula buhanga bwa baasukulu baa Seeji̱ boona.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakukwata nsi ya Edomu
kandi basi̱ngu̱le ngi̱ghu̱ syabo abaakaaye haai na mwena Seyi̱li̱.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba bakufooka baamaani̱.
Mu̱lemi̱ aku̱lu̱gha mu baasukulu baa Yakobbo
kandi aku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya abakuba bati̱ghaaye mu bibugha bya Edomu.”
Bbalaamu aabona ebikughenda kubʼo Bameleeki̱ mu bwile bwa mu maaso kandi aalanga ati,
“Ehanga lya Bameleeki̱ niiliyo lyabaagha lyamaani̱ kusaali̱ya ghanji ghoona,
bhaatu haakumaliilila likuhwelekeelela.”
Obu aaboone Banakeeni̱ aaghila ati,
“Ki̱i̱kalo kyanu muukaayemu ki̱gu̱mi̱ye
kandi kili nga kisui kikwehuwe haa kikuka.
Bhaatu enu̱we Banakeeni̱ mukuhwelekeelela,
Banasi̱li̱ya bakukwata enu̱we haa bulemo kandi babatwale.”
Bbalaamu aatodha aaghila ati,
“Ni ani̱ akuukala ali mwomi̱i̱li̱
obu Luhanga akukola eki?
Maati̱ ghalimu balwani̱ ghaku̱lu̱gha Ki̱ti̱mu̱.
Baku̱si̱ngu̱la Si̱li̱ya na Ebbeli̱, bhaatu nabo bakuhwelekeelela dhee.”
Du̱mbi̱ Bbalaamu aamuka kandi aakuuka ewe e ka kandi Bbalaki̱ naye aaghenda dhee.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabaagha baghooni̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo baaghilaghamu Si̱ti̱mu̱, bamui mu basaasa baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatandika kulangaala na bahala baa Banamowaabu.

Bakali̱ aba baakabaagha mbakola mukolo ghwa kuhongela bihonguwa baaluhanga baabo, baabikilagha basaasa aba kubʼo. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatandika kuliya haa byokuliya ebi bantu aba bahongeeye baaluhanga baabo kandi kubateeleli̱ya.
Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatandika kulungana na bantu aba kulami̱ya Bbaali̱ wa bantu baa Peyola kandi
aasaaliluwa kwonini na Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba.
aaghila Musa ati, “Otwale beebembeli̱ boona baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi obaate ntangaali̱ mu maaso ghaa
bantu boona banaloli̱ye, niikuwo si̱ye
ndeke kusaaliluwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba.”
Musa aaghila bacu̱ baa misango baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we ali na kwita basaasa be abaaghendi̱ye mu kulami̱ya Bbaali̱ wa bantu baa Peyola.”

Bwile obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabaagha baneeghu̱ngi̱ye haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, omui mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba aatwala mukali̱ Munami̱di̱yaani̱ mu weema yee, Musa na ki̱bbu̱la kya kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ banaloli̱ye.
Obu Fi̱nehaasi mutabani̱ wa Eli̱yeeja kandi muusukulu wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱ aaboone eki, aalu̱gha mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ eki, aakwata eti̱mu̱ mu ngalo yee

kandi aakwama Munai̱saaleeli̱ oghu mu weema yee. Aatu̱bhi̱ta eti̱mu̱ bombi musaasa oghu na mukali̱ oghu kandi eti̱mu̱ eli lyahootani̱ya mu musaasa kandi lyatu̱bhi̱ta mukali̱ oghu mu etundu. Du̱mbi̱ ndwala eghi yaatagha Banai̱saaleeli̱ yaaleka.
Bhaatu bantu boona aba ndwala eghi yaati̱ye baaba mitwalo ebili na nku̱mi̱ enaa.
aaghila Musa ati,

“Fi̱nehaasi mutabani̱ wa Eli̱yeeja kandi muusukulu wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱, eki aakoli̱ye kyaleki̱ye naaleka kusaaliluwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱. Taabbali̱ye bantu kulami̱ya luhanga onji kuuyʼo si̱ye kandi aaleki̱ye ntaahwelekeeleli̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona.
Nahabweki omughambile ngoku nkukola naye ndaghaano ya mpempa.
Ndaghaano eghi ni ya Fi̱nehaasi na baasukulu be kuba bahongi̱ bilo nʼebilo, nanga taabbali̱ye bantu kulami̱ya luhanga onji kuuyʼo si̱ye. Aahi̱yʼo Banai̱saaleeli̱ kibhi niikuwo ngubhe kubaghanila.”
Li̱i̱na lya Munai̱saaleeli̱ oghu Fi̱nehaasi aati̱ye hamui na mukali̱ Munami̱di̱yaani̱, baamughilamu Ji̱mi̱li̱ mutabani̱ wa Salu, mukulu wa ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱.
Li̱i̱na lya mukali̱ Munami̱di̱yaani̱, baamughilaghamu Koji̱bi̱, muhala wa Juula, omui mu bakulu baa ntu̱la sya Banami̱di̱yaani̱.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Otwalikani̱ye Banami̱di̱yaani̱ nga ngi̱ghu̱ syanu kandi obaate,

nanga bakatwalikani̱ya enu̱we nga ngi̱ghu̱ syabo obu baadimaagi̱ye bamui mu enu̱we kulami̱ya luhanga wabo Bbaali̱ e Peyola kandi nʼeki Koji̱bi̱ muhala wa Juulu, omui mu bakulu baa ntu̱la sya Banami̱di̱yaani̱ aakoli̱ye, oghu akaatibuwa mu bwile obu ndwala ya kabhi yaatagha Banai̱saaleeli̱ e Peyola.”
Haanu̱ma ya ndwala ya kabhi kuhuwʼo,
aaghila Musa na Eli̱yeeja mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱ ati,
“Obale ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona kusighikila haa maka ghaabo. Ohandiike mali̱i̱na ghaa basaasa boona abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ya bukulu na kusaalʼo, abakugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya mu mahe.”

Nahabweki Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja baabu̱gha na ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱. Bwile obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakaba baghooni̱ye mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu, haakpengbu̱ ya maasi Yolodaani̱. Kibugha kya Yeli̱ko kikaba kili luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi agha. Baaghila beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ bati,
“Mubale basaasa abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ya bukulu na kusaalʼo ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.”
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya baasukulu baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ abaalu̱ghi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa Yakobbo, ya Hanoki̱, ya Palu,
ya Heji̱looni̱ na ya Kalami̱.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Leu̱bbeeni̱ kandi baabalamu basaasa mitwalo enaa nku̱mi̱ esatu lusanju̱ na maku̱mi̱ asatu.
Mutabani̱ wa Palu baamughilaghamu Eli̱yaabbu

kandi batabani̱ baa Eli̱yaabbu niibo bani: Nemweli̱, Dataani̱ na Abbilaamu. Dataani̱ na Abbilaamu niibo beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ abaajeemeeye Musa na Alooni̱ kandi baaba mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Koola, ekyajeemeeye

Nsi yeesama kandi yaammela bantu aba hamui na Koola, oghu ki̱bbu̱la kiye kyaku̱u̱ye obu mulilo ghwokeei̱ye basaasa bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili na maku̱mi̱ ataano kandi kyaba kya kuteelela ewaa Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji.
Bhaatu batabani̱ baa Koola tabaaku̱u̱ye bwile obu.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa Si̱mi̱yooni̱: ya Nemweli̱, ya Yami̱ni̱ ya Yaki̱ni̱,
ya Jeela na ya Sau̱li̱.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Si̱mi̱yooni̱. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo ebili nku̱mi̱ ebili nʼebibili.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa Gaadi̱: ya Jefoni̱, ya Haagi̱, ya Su̱u̱ni̱,
ya Oji̱ni̱, ya Eli̱,
ya Alodi̱ na ya Aleeli̱.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Gaadi̱. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo enaa na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.
Eli̱ na Onani̱ bakaba bali batabani̱ baa Yu̱da, bhaatu baakwi̱la mu nsi ya Kanaani̱.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa Yu̱da: ya Seela, ya Peleeji̱, na ya Jeela.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa Peleeji̱: ya Heji̱looni̱ na ya Hamu̱li̱.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Yu̱da. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo musanju̱ kakaagha na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa I̱sakaali: ya Tola, ya Puuna,
ya Yasubu na ya Si̱mi̱looni̱.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya I̱sakaali. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo mukaagha nku̱mi̱ enaa na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bisatu.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa Jabbu̱looni̱: ya Seledi̱, ya Eloni̱ na ya Yahaleeli̱.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Jabbu̱looni̱. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo mukaagha na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.
Mu ntu̱la ya Yojeefu̱ hakaba halimu ntu̱la ebili: ya Manase na ya Efulahi̱mu̱.
Mu ntu̱la ya Manase hakaba halimu ntu̱la ebili: ya Maki̱li̱ na ya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱. Maki̱li̱ niiye akaba ali ese wa Gi̱li̱yaadi̱.
Mu ntu̱la ya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ hakaba halimu ntu̱la sini: ya Yejeeli̱, ya Heleki̱,
ya Asi̱li̱yeeli̱, ya Sekeemu,
ya Semi̱da na ya Hefeli̱.
Jelofehaadi̱ mutabani̱ wa Hefeli̱ taabaagha na baana baabusaasa, akabyala baabukali̱ bonkaha. Mali̱i̱na ghaabo ni Maahala, Nooha, Hogu̱la, Milika na Tiluja.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Manase. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo etaano nku̱mi̱ ebili na lusanju̱.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa Efulahi̱mu̱: ya Suseela, ya Bbekeli̱, na ya Tahani̱.
Eni niiyo ntu̱la ya batabani̱ baa Suseela: ya Elani̱ li̱i̱na lya taata wabo.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Efulahi̱mu̱. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo esatu nku̱mi̱ ebili na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Manase na Efulahi̱mu̱ kandi boona bakaba bali baasukulu baa Yojeefu̱.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱: ya Bbeela, ya Asu̱bbeeli̱, ya Ahilaamu,
ya Sufaamu na ya Hufaamu.
Ntu̱la ya Alu̱di̱ na ya Namani̱ boona bakaba bali baasukulu baa Bbeela.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo enaa nku̱mi̱ etaano na lukaagha.
Mu ntu̱la ya Daani̱ baabalamu basaasa mitwalo mukaagha nku̱mi̱ enaa na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa. Basaasa aba boona bakaba balu̱ghi̱ye mu ntu̱la emui ya Suhaamu.
Muhendo ghwa basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Suhaamu ghwaba mitwalo mukaagha nku̱mi̱ enaa na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya Aseli̱: ya Imuna, ya I̱si̱vi̱, na ya Bbeli̱ya.
Ntu̱la ya Hebbeli̱ na ya Mali̱kyeli̱ sikaba si̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu ntu̱la ya Bbeli̱ya.
Aseli̱ akaba ali na muhala wee oghu baaghilaghamu Seela.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Aseli̱. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo etaano nku̱mi̱ esatu na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa Nafutaali: ya Yahajeeli̱, ya Gu̱ni̱,
ya Yejeeli̱ na ya Sileemu.
Esi niisiyo ntu̱la sya Nafutaali. Baabalamu basaasa mitwalo enaa nku̱mi̱ etaano na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.
Muhendo ghwona ghwa basaasa Banai̱saaleeli̱ oghu baabali̱ye ghwaba mitwalo nkaagha, lu̱ku̱mi̱ na lusanju̱ na maku̱mi̱ asatu.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Nsi eghi oghitambu̱li̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ nga bugwetuwa bwabo kusighikila haa muhendo ghwa mali̱i̱na ghaabo.

Ntu̱la eghi eli na bantu bakani̱ye oghihe bugwetuwa bukani̱ye kandi ntu̱la eghi eli na bantu bakee oghihe bugwetuwa bukee. Bu̱li̱ ntu̱la etunge bugwetuwa bwayʼo kusighikila haa muhendo ghwa bantu abalimu.
Olole ngu nsi eghi waaghitambu̱li̱ya nookoma buluulu. Bu̱li̱ ntu̱la etunge bugwetuwa bwayʼo kusighikila haa mali̱i̱na ghaa ntu̱la sya baataata baabo.
Otambulani̱ye nsi eghi nookoma buluulu. Ntu̱la eghi ekani̱ye oghihe bugwetuwa bukani̱ye kandi ntu̱la nkee oghihe bugwetuwa bukee.”
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la sya batabani̱ baa Baleevi̱ esi baabali̱ye: ya Geli̱sooni̱, ya Kohati̱ na ya Melaali̱.
Sini niisiyo ntu̱la esyalu̱ghi̱ye mu batabani̱ basatu baa Leevi̱ aba: ya Li̱bbi̱ni̱, ya Hebbu̱looni̱, ya Mahi̱li̱, ya Mu̱si̱, na ya Koola. Kohati̱ niiye akaba ali ese wa Amulaamu.
Mukali̱ wa Amulaamu baamughilaghamu Yokobbedi̱, muhala wa Leevi̱, oghu baabyaliiye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱. Yakobbedi̱ aabyalila Amulaamu baana bani: Alooni̱, Musa na mwani̱nabo Mi̱li̱yamu.
Alooni̱ aabyala Nadaabbu, Abbi̱hu̱, Eli̱yeeja na I̱tamala.
Bhaatu Nadaabbu na Abbi̱hu̱ baaku̱wa obu baahongi̱ye mulilo ghutasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱bu̱u̱we mu maaso ghaa

Baana baabusaasa Baleevi̱ abaabaagha na kweli̱ kumui na kusaalʼo muhendo ghwabo ghwaba mitwalo ebili na nku̱mi̱ esatu. Tabaabali̱ye baana aba mu muhendo ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱, nanga tabaatu̱ngi̱ye bugwetuwa nga Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji.

Aba niibo basaasa aba Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja baabali̱ye obu baabali̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu haai na maasi Yolodaani̱ kandi kibugha kya Yeli̱ko kili luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi agha.
Taaliyo muntu nʼomui mu basaasa baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱ baadu̱bhi̱ye kubala mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱ oghu akaba ali mu muhendo ghwa bantu aba.
Nanga

akaba naabu̱ghi̱yʼo bantu aba ati, “Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba boona baku̱kwi̱la mu elungu.” Mu bantu aba taati̱ghaayʼo muntu nʼomui oghu aakaaye, kuuyʼo Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune na Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱.

Kilo kimui bahala baa Jelofehaadi̱ mutabani̱ wa Hefeli̱, Hefeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ mutabani̱ wa Maki̱li̱ kandi Maki̱li̱ mutabani̱ wa Manase, bakaba bali bʼomu ntu̱la ya Yojeefu̱. Mali̱i̱na ghaa baana baabukali̱ aba ni Maahala, Nooha, Hogu̱la, Milika na Tiluja.

Baaghenda haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu kandi beemilila mu maaso ghaa Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja na beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱. Baaghila bati,
“Eseetu̱we akakwi̱la mu elungu. Akaba atali mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Koola, abeekumaani̱i̱ye kuhakani̱ya
, bhaatu aaku̱wa haabwa kibhi kiye eenini kandi atabyaye baana baabusaasa.
Buuye li̱i̱na lya eseetu̱we likubula mu ntu̱la yee nanga eye ku̱tabyala mwana wabusaasa? Gutu, otuhe kibanja mu baghenji̱ baa eseetu̱we.”
Musa aabu̱u̱li̱ya
haa kintu eki.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Eki bahala baa Jelofehaadi̱ bakwete ku̱bu̱gha ki̱hi̱ki̱ye. Oli na kubaha kibanja nga bugwetuwa bwabo mu baghenji̱ baa esebo kandi kibanja eki esebo angutwete nga bugwetuwa buwe obahe kiyo.
“Oghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Kaakuba musaasa aku̱wa atabyaye mwana wabusaasa, bugwetuwa buwe mubuhe muhala wee
kandi kaakuba aba atali na mwana wabukali̱, bugwetuwa buwe mubuhe baana baani̱na wee baabusaasa.
Kaakuba aba atali na baana baani̱na wee baabusaasa, bugwetuwa buwe mubuhe baghenji̱ baa ese wee.
Kaakuba ese wee aba atali na baana baani̱na wee baabusaasa, bugwetuwa buwe mubuhe lughanda luwe lwonini mu ntu̱la yee abutwale. Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakwate kilaghilo eki, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati, “Oni̱i̱ne haa mwena ghwa Abbali̱mu̱ kandi olole nsi eghi naahaaye Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Haanu̱ma ya kubona nsi eghi, oku̱ku̱wa kandi okukwama baataata baawe, nga mu̱ghenji̱ waawe Alooni̱.

Obu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ banjeemeeye mu elungu lya Ji̱i̱ni̱, enu̱we bombi tamwahu̱ti̱i̱ye kilaghilo kyanje. Eki kikabʼo obu waahuuye kikuka haai na maasi Meli̱ba mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱ kuuhilamu bantu aba maasi. Tawooleki̱ye bantu aba ngoku ndi ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nahabweki tooku̱ki̱dha mu nsi ya Kanaani̱.”
Musa aaghila
ati,
Luhanga, uwe omani̱ye mitima ya bantu boona, okome musaasa oghu akuba mwebembeli̱ wa ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu baawe aba.
Musaasa oghu alahikilagha Banai̱saaleeli̱ haa bulemo kandi abaku̱u̱ki̱yaghe e ka, niikuwo ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu baa
eki kitaba nga ntaama esitali na mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya.”
aaghila Musa ati, “Otwale Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, musaasa oghu mwoyo wanje haliyo kandi omutʼo mikono yaawe.
Omwemi̱li̱li̱ye mu maaso ghaa mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi omufoole mwebembeli̱ wabo banaloli̱ye.
Omuhe haa bu̱toki̱ bwawe niikuwo ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona bamu̱hu̱ti̱ye.
Mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja akoleesi̱yaghe U̱li̱i̱mu̱ kumanya eki
akubbala Yosuwa kukola. Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa aghambilaghe Banai̱saaleeli̱ kughenda haa bulemo kandi abaaku̱u̱ki̱yaghe kusemeeye. Alaghambilagha ki̱bbu̱la kyona Banai̱saaleeli̱ ebi bali na kukola.”
Musa aakola ngoku
aamulaghiiye. Aatwala Yosuwa kandi aamwemi̱li̱li̱ya mu maaso ghaa mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aatʼo Yosuwa mikono yee kandi aamufoola mwebembeli̱, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Olaghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Bihonguwa bya byokuliya ebi bakuleeta ewanje nga bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, ebi kusasa kwabiyo ku̱ndheedhi̱ye, obihongaghe haa bwile bwabiyo bwonini.’
Bini niibiyo bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo ebi muli na kuleeta ewaa
: byana bya ntaama bibili byabusaasa bya mwaka ghumui ebitali na kamogo, kuba kihonguwa bookeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo.
Kyana kya ntaama kimui okihongaghe nkyambisi na kinji okihongaghe lwagholo.
Bu̱li̱ kyana kya ntaama mukihongaghe na ki̱lo emui ya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu li̱ta emui ya mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Eki ni kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye eki baalaghiiye enu̱we Banai̱saaleeli̱ kuhaayo obu baabaagha haa mwena Si̱naai̱, kuba kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
Kihonguwa kyakunuwa kya bu̱li̱ kyana kya ntaama kibaaghe li̱ta emui ya vi̱i̱ni̱. Kihonguwa kyakunuwa eki bakiseesaghe mu maaso ghaa
mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.

Ohongaghe kyana kya ntaama kinji lwagholo kandi okihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa, mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va na vi̱i̱ni̱ ebyengaane na bya nkyambisi. Eki kibe kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo, eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye Mukama.”

“ ‘Haa kilo kya Sabhato, muhongaghe byana bya ntaama bibili bya mwaka ghumui kandi ebitali na kamogo na ki̱lo ebili sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va kuba kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo.
Eki ni kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ Sabhato, kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya bu̱li̱ kweli̱, muli na kuhaayo kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye ewaa
kya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte ebili, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui na byana bya ntaama musanju̱ bya mwaka ghumui. Bisolo ebi byona bibe ebitali na kamogo.

Bu̱li̱ ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte muli na kughihonga na ki̱lo esatu sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va nga kihonguwa kya bilimuwa. Bu̱li̱ ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama muli na kughihonga na ki̱lo ebili sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Bu̱li̱ kyana kya ntaama muli na kukihonga na ki̱lo emui ya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va, kuba kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye

Bu̱li̱ ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte muli na kughihonga na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kya li̱ta ebili sya vi̱i̱ni̱ kandi bu̱li̱ ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama muli na kughihonga na li̱ta emui nʼeki̱twi̱ke ya vi̱i̱ni̱. Bu̱li̱ kyana kya ntaama muli na kukihonga na li̱ta emui ya vi̱i̱ni̱. Eki kibaaghe kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya bu̱li̱ kweli̱ mu mwaka.
Kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo eki, na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo, muli na kuhonga dhee ewaa
ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi.
“ ‘Haa kilo kya eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa kya kweli̱ kwʼoku̱du̱bha, mukolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ kya
kya Kusaaluwʼo.
Haa kilo ekilabhi̱yʼo mutandikaghe kukola ki̱ghenu̱ kya migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kandi muliyaghe migaati̱ eghi haabwa bilo musanju̱.
Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mutakolagha mulimo.
Kilo eki muhongaghe kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye, nga kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo ewaa
kya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte ebili, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui na byana bya ntaama musanju̱ bya mwaka ghumui, bisolo ebi byona bibe ebitali na kamogo.

Bu̱li̱ ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte mughihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa ki̱lo esatu sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va. Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama mughihongaghe na ki̱lo ebili sya nsyano eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Bu̱li̱ kyana kya ntaama mukihongaghe na ki̱lo emui ya nsyano eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, haabwa mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi byanu.
Muhongaghe bihonguwa ebi kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ ki̱lo, kya bu̱li̱ nkyambisi.
Muhongaghe byokuliya bya kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo bu̱li̱ kilo haabwa bilo musanju̱ bya ki̱ghenu̱ eki, kuba kihonguwa eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
. Bhaatu muli na kuhonga dhee bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye binji bya bu̱li̱ kilo na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo.
Haa kilo kyamusanju̱ kya ki̱ghenu̱ eki mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mutakolagha mulimo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kukesa, obu mulabaagha nimuleeta kihonguwa kya mughanulo ghwanu ewaa
, mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mutakolagha mulimo.
Muhaagheyo kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte ebili, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui na byana bya ntaama musanju̱ byabusaasa bya mwaka ghumui, kuba kihonguwa eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye

Bu̱li̱ ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte mughihongaghe na ki̱lo esatu sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va nga kihonguwa kya bilimuwa. Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama mughihongaghe na ki̱lo ebili sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Byana bya ntaama musanju̱ ebi, bu̱li̱ kimui mukihongaghe na ki̱lo emui ya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ nga kihonguwa haabwa mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi byanu.
Bihonguwa ebi byona mubihongaghe na bihonguwa byakunuwa, kwongela haa bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye bya bu̱li̱ kilo na bihonguwa bya bilimuwa. Mulole ngu mwahongi̱ye bisolo ebitali na kamogo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya kweli̱ kwamusanju̱ mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mutakolagha mulimo. Kilo eki kibaaghe kyanu kya kuteela bi̱i̱di̱yo.
Kilo eki muhongaghe kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
. Muhongaghe ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui na byana bya ntaama musanju̱ bya mwaka ghumui kandi bisolo ebi bibe ebitali na kamogo.

Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte muli na kughihonga na ki̱lo esatu sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va kuba kihonguwa kya bilimuwa. Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui mughihongaghe na ki̱lo ebili sya nsyano.
Bu̱li̱ kimui haa byana bya ntaama musanju̱ ebi, mukihongaghe na ki̱lo emui ya nsyano.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, haabwa mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi byanu.

Muhongaghe bihonguwa ebi kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya bu̱li̱ kweli̱ na bihonguwa byabiyo bya bilimuwa na bihonguwa byakunuwa, kusighikila haa kilaghilo, kuba kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
“ ‘Haa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya kweli̱ kwamusanju̱ mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Kilo eki mutaliyagha byokuliya kandi mutakolagha mulimo.

Bhaatu muhongaghe ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui na byana bya ntaama musanju̱ bya mwaka ghumui kandi ebitali na kamogo kuba kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte mughihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kya ki̱lo esatu sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va kandi ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama mughihongaghe na ki̱lo ebili.
Bu̱li̱ kimui haa byana bya ntaama musanju̱ ebi, mukihongaghe na ki̱lo emui ya nsyano eghi.

Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi kwongela haa kihonguwa kya mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi na kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kyakiyo na bihonguwa byakunuwa byabiyo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ na bitaano kya kweli̱ kwamusanju̱, mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi mutakolagha mulimo. Mukolaghe ki̱ghenu̱ kya
haabwa bilo musanju̱.
Muleetaghe kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kuba kihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo eki kusasa kwakiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
, kya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte eku̱mi̱ nʼesatu, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili, byana bya ntaama eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa bya mwaka ghumui kandi bisolo ebi bibe ebitali na kamogo.

Ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte eku̱mi̱ nʼesatu esi, bu̱li̱ emui mughihongaghe na ki̱lo esatu sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va kuba kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kandi bu̱li̱ emui haa ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili esi, mughihongaghe na ki̱lo ebili sya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Byana bya ntaama eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa ebi, bu̱li̱ kimui mukihongaghe na ki̱lo emui ya nsyano esemeeye, eghi etabuuyemu mafu̱ta ghaa biti oli̱va.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo, kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyakabili, muhongaghe ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte eku̱mi̱ nʼebili, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili na byana bya ntaama eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa bya mwaka ghumui kandi bisolo ebi byona bibe ebitali na kamogo.
Bu̱li̱ emui haa ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama na byana bya ntaama, mubihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kandi bihonguwa byakunuwa kusighikila ngoku kilaghilo kilaghiiye.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo, kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na bihonguwa byakunuwa byabiyo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyakasatu, muhongaghe ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte eku̱mi̱ nʼemui, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili na byana bya ntaama eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa bya mwaka ghumui kandi bisolo ebi byona bibe bitali na kamogo.
Bu̱li̱ emui haa ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama na byana bya ntaama, mubihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na bihonguwa byakunuwa kusighikila ngoku kilaghilo kilaghiiye.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo, kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyakanaa, muhongaghe ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte eku̱mi̱, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili na byana bya ntaama eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa bya mwaka ghumui kandi bisolo ebi byona bibe ebitali na kamogo.
Bu̱li̱ emui haa ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama na byana bya ntaama, mubihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kandi bihonguwa byakunuwa kusighikila ngoku kilaghilo kilaghiiye.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo, kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyakataano, muhongaghe ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte mwenda, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili na byana bya ntaama eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa bya mwaka ghumui, bisolo ebi byona bibe ebitali na kamogo.
Ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama na byana bya ntaama, mubihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na bihonguwa byakunuwa kusighikila ngoku kilaghilo kilaghiiye.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo, kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyamukaagha, muhongaghe ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte munaanaa, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili kandi na byana bya ntaama eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa bya mwaka ghumui, bisolo ebi byona bibe ebitali na kamogo.
Bu̱li̱ emui haa ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama na byana bya ntaama, mubihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na bihonguwa byakunuwa kusighikila ngoku kilaghilo kilaghiiye.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo, kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na bihonguwa byakunuwa byakiyo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyamusanju̱ muhongaghe ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte musanju̱, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama ebili na byana bya ntaama eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa bya mwaka ghumui, bisolo ebi byona bibe ebitali na kamogo.
Bu̱li̱ emui haa ntu̱u̱li̱ sya nte, ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama na byana bya ntaama, mubihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na bihonguwa byakunuwa kusighikila ngoku kilaghilo kilaghiiye.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo, kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo.
“ ‘Haa kilo kyamunaanaa, mubaaghe na kusanga-sangaana ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kundami̱ya kandi mutakolagha mulimo.

Muhongaghe ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte emui, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama emui na byana bya ntaama musanju̱ kandi bisolo ebi byona bibe bitali na kamogo kuba bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye, bihonguwa bookeei̱ye haa mulilo ebi kusasa kwabiyo ku̱dheedhi̱ye
Ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte, ntu̱u̱li̱ ya ntaama na byana bya ntaama, mubihongaghe na kihonguwa kya bilimuwa kandi bihonguwa byakunuwa kusighikila ngoku kilaghilo kilaghiiye.
Muhongaghe dhee ntu̱u̱li̱ ya mbu̱li̱ emui nga kihonguwa haabwa kibhi, kwongela haa kihonguwa kyona kyokeei̱ye kya bu̱li̱ kilo, kihonguwa kya bilimuwa na kihonguwa kyakunuwa kyakiyo.
“ ‘Ebi niibiyo bilaghilo ebikwetʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye, bihonguwa bya bilimuwa, bihonguwa byakunuwa, na bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge ebi mulahaaghayo ewaa
haa bwile bwa bi̱ghenu̱ byanu. Ebi ni bihonguwa ebi mulongelagha haa bihonguwa mulahaaghayo ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki mwalahiiye kedha haabwa kubbala kwanu.’ ”
Nahabweki Musa aaghambila Banai̱saaleeli̱ byona ebi
aamulaghiiye.
Musa aaghila beebembeli̱ baa ntu̱la sya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “
aalaghiiye ati,
‘Kaakuba musaasa alahila kedha eelaghi̱i̱sani̱ya ewaa
kukola kintu, ali na kukola byona ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye.
“ ‘Kaakuba mwana wabukali̱ oghu anali muujongo kandi anali mu numba ya ese wee alahila kuha kedha eelaghi̱i̱sani̱ya ewaa
kukola kintu
kandi ese wee aaghu̱wa eki muhala wee aalahiiye kedha eelaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye bhaatu atabu̱gha kantu, muhala wee oghu ali na kukola byona ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Bhaatu kaakuba ese wee aamutanga haa kilo eki aaghu̱u̱ye kintu eki, mwana wabukali̱ oghu taali na kukola na kimui haa bintu ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye.
akumughanila, nanga ese wee aamutangi̱ye.
“ ‘Kaakuba mwana wabukali̱ oghu asweluwa haanu̱ma ya kulahila kedha kwelaghi̱i̱sani̱ya bwangu ewaa
kukola kintu, atadu̱bhi̱ye kweli̱li̱kana bhyani
kandi bali̱i̱ wee aki̱i̱ghu̱wa bhaatu atabu̱gha naye kantu, mwana wabukali̱ oghu ali na kukola ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Bhaatu kaakuba bali̱i̱ wee aki̱i̱ghu̱wa kandi amutanga, mwana wabukali̱ oghu taali na kukola ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye kandi
akumughanila.
“ ‘Kaakuba mukali̱ mu̱kwi̱si̱ya kedha mukali̱ oghu eba wee abhi̱ngi̱ye alahila kedha eelaghi̱i̱sani̱ya ewaa
kukola kintu, ali na kukola ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye.
“ ‘Kaakuba mukali̱ asweuwe alahila kedha eelaghi̱i̱sani̱ya ewaa
kukola kintu
kandi bali̱i̱ wee aki̱i̱ghu̱wa, bhaatu atabu̱gha kantu kandi atamutanga, mukali̱ oghu ali na kukola byona ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Bhaatu kaakuba bali̱i̱ wee aki̱i̱ghu̱wa kandi amutanga, mukali̱ oghu taali na kukola ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye kandi
akumughanila.
Bali̱i̱ wa mukali̱ oghu ali na ku̱si̱i̱ma kedha kubhenga ebi mukali̱ oghu aalahiiye kedha eelaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kukola.
Bhaatu kaakuba bali̱i̱ wee ataba nʼeki aabu̱ghi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha kilo eki aaghu̱u̱ye ebi, akuba asi̱i̱mi̱ye ebi mukali̱ wee aabu̱ghi̱ye, nanga taabu̱ghi̱ye kantu obu aabi̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye.
Bhaatu kaakuba musaasa oghu aghaya ebi mukali̱ wee aabu̱ghi̱ye haanu̱ma ya kumala bilo bikani̱ye abi̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye, akuba na musango kandi akufubiluwa mu ki̱i̱kalo kya mukali̱ wee.’ ”
Ebi niibiyo bilaghilo ebi
aahaaye Musa ebikwetʼo musaasa na mukali̱ wee, musaasa na muhala wee oghu anali muujongo kandi oghu anaakaaye mu numba ya ese wee.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oli na kuhoola ngi̱ghu̱ haa Banami̱di̱yaani̱ haabwa eki baakoli̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱. Haanu̱ma yʼeki oku̱ku̱wa kandi okwame baataata baawe.”

Du̱mbi̱ Musa aaghila Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Mukome bamui mu basaasa baanu kughenda kandi kulwana na Banami̱di̱yaani̱. Mubahe byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya baghende kandi bahoole ngi̱ghu̱ haa Banami̱di̱yaani̱ ngoku
akwete kubbala.
Mutume haa bulemo basaasa lu̱ku̱mi̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la ya Banai̱saaleeli̱.”

Nahabweki baakoma basaasa lu̱ku̱mi̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la ya Banai̱saaleeli̱, boona baaba basaasa mutwalo ghumui na nku̱mi̱ ebili abali na byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya kandi abeeteekani̱i̱je kulwana bulemo.

Musa aatuma bantu aba haa bulemo, basaasa lu̱ku̱mi̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la ya I̱saaleeli̱. Baaghenda na Fi̱nehaasi mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja kandi aaghenda na bimui haa bintu byʼomu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na bi̱i̱di̱yo bya kuteela.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baalwana na Banami̱di̱yaani̱ ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa kandi baata basaasa boona.
Mu basaasa aba baati̱ye haa bulemo hakaba halimu bakama bataano baa Banami̱di̱yaani̱ bani: Evi̱, Lekemu, Juula, Hula na Leba. Baata dhee Bbalaamu mutabani̱ wa Bbeyola na kihiyo.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakwata haa bulemo obu bakali̱ Banami̱di̱yaani̱ na baana kandi baahu̱nga nte syabo syona, ntaama, mbu̱li̱ na bintu binji byona.
Booki̱ya na mulilo maatau̱ni̱ ghoona hambali Banami̱di̱yaani̱ baabaagha baakaaye kandi baghooni̱ye.
Baatwala bakali̱ boona, baana, bisolo na bintu byona ebi baahu̱ngi̱ye haa bulemo.

Baaleeta bantu aba baakwete haa bulemo na bintu byona ebi baahu̱ngi̱ye hambali Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye, mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu haai na maasi Yolodaani̱. Kibugha kya Yeli̱ko kikaba kili luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi agha.
Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja na beebembeli̱ boona baa ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghenda kusangaana bantu aba hanja ya hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye.
Musa aasaaliluwa na bakulu baa mahe abaadhuumilagha baasilikale lu̱ku̱mi̱-lu̱ku̱mi̱ na abaadhuumilagha baasilikale ki̱ku̱mi̱-ki̱ku̱mi̱, abaaku̱u̱ki̱ye ku̱lu̱gha haa bulemo.
Musa aabu̱u̱li̱ya baasilikale aba ati, “Mwaleki̱ye bakali̱ aba boona kuukala bali boomi̱i̱li̱ nangaaki?
Muusuke ngoku bakali̱ aba haaliibo baaghu̱u̱ye ebi Bbalaamu aabu̱ghi̱ye kandi baaleeteleja Banai̱saaleeli̱ kutaba beesighibuwa ewaa
haabwa ebyabaayʼo e Peyola. Bakali̱ aba niibo baaleki̱ye ndwala ya kabhi yaata bantu bakani̱ye mu ki̱bbu̱la kya
Nahabweki mwite endindi baana baabusaasa aba boona kandi mwite bakali̱ boona abamani̱ye basaasa.
Bhaatu baana baabukali̱ abatakamani̱ye basaasa mutabaata. Mubatwale kuba bakali̱ baanu kedha basyana.

“Enu̱we boona abaati̱ye bantu kedha ku̱ku̱mʼo muntu oghu baati̱ye muli na kuukala hanja ya hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye haabwa bilo musanju̱. Haa kilo kyakasatu na kyamusanju̱ muli na kweyeli̱ya kandi kweli̱ya bantu aba mwakwete haa bulemo.
Muli na kweli̱ya bu̱li̱ ki̱lu̱waalo, bu̱li̱ kintu eki̱koleeu̱we mu luhu, byoha bya mbu̱li̱ na mbaau.”
Du̱mbi̱ mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja aaghila baasilikale abaaghendi̱ye haa bulemo ati, “Kini nkilaghilo eki
aalaghiiye Musa ati,
‘Feeja, siliva, bbu̱looji̱, byoma na byoma binji
byona ebitaakugubha kuhiya, mubite mu mulilo ku̱byeli̱ya. Bhaatu muli na kubinaabi̱ya dhee na maasi aghakweli̱yagha. Kintu kyona eki mulilo ghu̱kwoki̱yagha muli na kukinaabi̱ya na maasi.
Haa kilo kyamusanju̱ munaabi̱ye ngoye syanu kandi mukufooka bantu abeeli̱ye. Du̱mbi̱ mukugubha kwisa hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Uwe na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja na beebembeli̱ baa ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ mubale bantu boona na bisolo ebi baasilikale baahu̱ngi̱ye haa bulemo.
Bintu ebi baahu̱ngi̱ye mubitambulani̱yemu bi̱twi̱ke bibili. Ki̱twi̱ke kimui mukihe baasilikale abaaghendi̱ye haa bulemo kandi ki̱twi̱ke kimui kinji mukihe Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji.
Haa mughabo ghwa baasilikale abaaghendi̱ye haa bulemo, ooyʼo mughabo ghwa
, ooyaghe muntu omui haa bu̱li̱ bantu maku̱mi̱ ataano aba baakwete haa bulemo. Haaliikuwo waakola otiyo dhee nte, ndogooi̱, ntaama kandi mbu̱li̱.
Haa ki̱twi̱ke kya mughabo ghwa baasilikale aba, ooyʼo ki̱twi̱ke kandi okihe mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja kuba mughabo ghwa

Haa ki̱twi̱ke kya mughabo ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji boona, haa bu̱li̱ bantu maku̱mi̱ ataano, ooyaghʼo muntu omui. Haaliikuwo waakola otiyo dhee nte, ndogooi̱, ntaama, mbu̱li̱ na bisolo binji. Bintu ebi obihe Baleevi̱ abakwete kukola mulimo ghwa kuloleelela weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ya
Nahabweki Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja baakola ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Muhendo ghwa bintu ebyati̱ghaaye haa ebi baasilikale baahu̱ngi̱yʼo Banami̱di̱yaani̱ ghwaba ntaama mitwalo nkaagha na musanju̱ na nku̱mi̱ etaano,
nte mitwalo musanju̱ na nku̱mi̱ ebili,
ndogooi̱ mitwalo mukaagha na lu̱ku̱mi̱
kandi bakali̱ abatakamani̱ye basaasa baaba mitwalo esatu na nku̱mi̱ ebili.
Basaasa baa mahe abaaghendi̱ye haa bulemo baatunga kimui kyakabili kya bintu ebi nga mughabo ghwabo. Ntaama syaba mitwalo maku̱mi̱ asatu nʼesatu kasanju̱ na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano
kandi mughabo ghwa
ghwaba ntaama lukaagha nsanju̱ nʼetaano.
Nte syaba mitwalo esatu na kakaagha kandi mughabo ghwa
ghwaba nte nsanju̱ nʼebili.
Ndogooi̱ syaba mitwalo esatu na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano kandi mughabo ghwa
ghwaba ndogooi̱ nkaagha nʼemui.
Bantu baaba mutwalo ghumui na kakaagha kandi mughabo ghwa
ghwaba bantu maku̱mi̱ asatu na babili.
Musa aaha mughabo oghu mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja nga mughabo ghwa
, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Musa aaha ki̱twi̱ke kimui Banai̱saaleeli̱ nga mughabo ghwabo kandi ki̱twi̱ke kimui kinji aakiha baasilikale abaaghendi̱ye haa bulemo.
Ki̱twi̱ke kya mughabo ghwa ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ghwaba ntaama mitwalo maku̱mi̱ asatu nʼesatu kasanju̱ na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano.
Nte syaba mitwalo esatu na kakaagha.
Ndogooi̱ syaba mitwalo maku̱mi̱ asatu na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano
kandi bantu baaba mutwalo ghumui na kakaagha.
Haa ki̱twi̱ke kya mughabo ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱, Musa aayagha haa bisolo maku̱mi̱ ataano kisolo kimui. Aakola atiyo dhee bantu na bisolo kandi aabiha Baleevi̱ abaaloleelelagha weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ya
, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Bakulu baa mahe abaadhuumilagha baasilikale lu̱ku̱mi̱-lu̱ku̱mi̱ na abaadhuumilagha ki̱ku̱mi̱-ki̱ku̱mi̱ baaghenda ewaa Musa
kandi baamughila bati, “Etu̱we baheeleli̱ya baawe twabali̱ye baasilikale aba twadhuumilagha haa bulemo kandi taaliyo nʼomui oghu aabu̱li̱yʼo.
Nahabweki twaleeti̱ye kihonguwa ewaa
kya bintu ebi̱koleeu̱we mu feeja, byakulwala haa mikono, mpete syʼomu matui na bukwanji, ebi twahu̱ngi̱ye haa bulemo. Twasi̱ye kubihonga mu maaso ghaa
niikuwo atuuyʼo bibhi byatu kandi atughanile.”
Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja baasi̱i̱ma bintu ebi̱koleeu̱we mu feeja ebi bakulu baa mahe aba baaleeti̱ye.
Feeja yoona eghi bakulu baa mahe baahaayeyo ewaa
ku̱lyota kwayʼo kwaba haai nga ki̱lo bi̱ku̱mi̱ bibili.
Bu̱li̱ omui mu baasilikale baa bu̱li̱ kilo akaba naatwete bintu ebi aahu̱ngi̱ye haa bulemo.
Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja baasi̱i̱ma feeja eghi bakulu baa mahe aba baaleeti̱ye kandi baaghitwala mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, niikuwo
aasukaghe kukoonela Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na baa ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱, bakaba bali na bisolo bikani̱ye kandi baabona kyalo kya Yajeeli̱ na kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ kisemeeye ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu bisolo byabo.
Nahabweki bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na ya Gaadi̱ baasa ewaa Musa na mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja na beebembeli̱ baa ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi baaghila Musa bati,
“Maatau̱ni̱ ghani: Atalooti̱, Di̱bbooni̱, Yajeeli̱, Nimula, Hesi̱bbooni̱, Eli̱yaale, Sebbamu, Nebbo na Bbehoni̱.
aakooneeye etu̱we ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kukwata kyalo eki kyona kandi kisemeeye bisolo byatu kuliilamu, nanga etu̱we baheeleli̱ya baawe tuli na bisolo bikani̱ye.
Tukaakuba ntukukolagha ebi̱ku̱dheedhi̱ye, gutu ohe etu̱we baheeleli̱ya baawe nsi eghi kuba yaatu. Otaleka ntubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kuukala luhande lweli̱.”
Musa aaghila bantu baa ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ na ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ ati, “Buuye Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanu bakughenda haa bulemo, enu̱we munasitami̱ye hani?
Mukwete kumala maani̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanu kutabhasuka kandi kughenda mu nsi eghi
aabaaye nangaaki?
Eki niikiyo beeseenu̱we baakoli̱ye obu naabatu̱mi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱-bbaluneya kughenda kandi kubega nsi ya Kanaani̱.
Obu baahi̱ki̱ye mu kighona kya Esi̱kooli̱ kandi mbaabona nsi eghi, baamala maani̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ niikuwo bataghenda mu nsi eghi
aabahaaye.
Kilo eki
aasaaliluwa kandi aalahila naaghila ati,

‘Majima bantu abaalu̱ghi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, abali na myaka maku̱mi̱ abili ya bukulu na kusaalʼo, taaliyo nʼomui oghu aku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi naalahiiye kuha Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo, nanga tabankwamiliiye na mitima yabo yoona.
Taaliyo nʼomui oghu aku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi kuuyʼo Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune Munakeni̱i̱ji̱ na Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, nanga baakaaye baneesi̱ghi̱ye
na mitima yabo yoona.
aasaaliluwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi aaleka baalalanga mu elungu haabwa myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mujo ghwa bantu abaakoli̱ye bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye mu maaso ghe boona baaku̱u̱ye.
“ ‘Mukwete ku̱lu̱ghʼo Luhanga ngoku baataata baanu baakoli̱ye. Muli mujo ghwa bantu babhi nga bantu aba kandi mwaleki̱ye
eeyongela kusaaliluwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Kaakuba muleka kwesigha
, akutodha kuleka bantu be boona Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu elungu kandi mukuleka bahwelekeelele.’ ”
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ na ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ beebinga Musa kandi baamughila bati, “Tukubbala kukwela hani bigho bya bisolo byatu kandi bibugha bya bakali̱ baatu na baana baatu.

Bhaatu tweteekani̱i̱je kukwata byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya byatu kandi kuhikila Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyatu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya tubaki̱dhi̱i̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali bakuukala. Bakali̱ baatu na baana baatu bakuukala mu bibugha ebili na bigho bi̱gu̱mi̱ye kubalinda bantu bʼomu kyalo kini kubalu̱mba.
Tatukukuuka mu maka ghaatu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bu̱li̱ Munai̱saaleeli̱ atu̱ngi̱ye bugwetuwa buwe.
Tatukutunga bugwetuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyatu luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱, nanga twatu̱ngi̱ye bugwetuwa bwatu bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yolodaani̱.”
Musa aaghila bantu aba ati, “Muli na kukola eki mwabu̱ghi̱ye. Muli na kukwata byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya kandi kulwana malemo haabwa
Basaasa baanu boona balwani̱ bali na kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ mu maaso ghaa
bakwete byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱ya abhi̱ngi̱ye ngi̱ghu̱ siye mu maaso ghe.
Haanu̱ma ya
kutwala nsi eghi, mukugubha kukuuka mu maka ghaanu. Mukuba mu̱koli̱ye eki mwalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye
na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanu muti mukukola. Du̱mbi̱ mukugubha kutwala nsi eni eghi
aabahaaye.
“Bhaatu kaakuba musaaghuwa kukola eki, mukuba ni̱mu̱si̱i̱sa ewaa
kandi mumanye ngoku mukufubiluwa haabwa kibhi kyanu.
Nahabweki mukwele bibugha bya bakali̱ baanu na baana baanu kandi bigho bya bisolo byanu, bhaatu muli na kukola eki mwelaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.”
Bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ na ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ baaghila Musa bati, “Mukama waatu, etu̱we baheeleli̱ya baawe tukukola eki waatulaghiiye.
Baana baatu, bakali̱ baatu na bisolo byatu bi̱ku̱ti̱ghala hani mu bibugha byʼomu kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱.
Bhaatu basaasa baatu boona abakugubha kulwana bakubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱. Mukama waatu, tukulwana bulemo bwa
, ngoku waabu̱ghi̱ye.”
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aalaghila mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja, Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ na beebembeli̱ baa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱ ebikwetʼo bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na ya Gaadi̱.
Musa aabaghila ati, “Kaakuba basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ na ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, babhasuka naanu maasi Yolodaani̱ mu maaso ghaa
bakwete byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya kandi bakoonela baanakyabo kulwana bulemo kandi kukwata nsi eghi, du̱mbi̱ mubahe kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ kuba kyabo.
Bhaatu kaakuba batabhasuka naanu bakwete byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya kandi beeteekani̱i̱je kulwana, tabakutunga nsi ya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, bali na kutunga mughabo mu nsi ya Kanaani̱ nga Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyabo.”
Bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ na ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ baakuukamu Musa bati, “Etu̱we baheeleli̱ya baawe tukukola eki
aabu̱ghi̱ye.
Tukubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ mu maaso ghaa
kughenda mu nsi ya Kanaani̱ tukwete byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya, bhaatu kyalo eki tukutwala nga bugwetuwa bwatu kikuba luhande luni lwa maasi Yolodaani̱.”

Du̱mbi̱ Musa aaha ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ na ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱, kyalo kya bukama bwa Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱ na kyalo kya bukama bwa Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani. Aabaha kyalo eki kyona, bibugha byakiyo na byalo ebyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye kyalo eki.
Bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ baakwela buhyaka kibugha kya Di̱bbooni̱, Atalooti̱, Alu̱weeli̱,
Atalooti̱-sofani̱, Yajeeli̱, Yogi̱bbeha,
Bbeti̱-nimula na Bbeti̱-halani̱ nga bibugha ebili na bigho bi̱gu̱mi̱ye kandi baakwela bigho bya bisolo byabo.
Bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ baakwela buhyaka kibugha kya Hesi̱bbooni̱, Eli̱yaale na Ki̱li̱yatahi̱mu̱.
Baakwela dhee kibugha kya Nebbo na Bbaali̱-meyoni̱ na Sibbuma. (Baaluka bibugha baakweye ebi mali̱i̱na ghanji.)
Baasukulu baa Maki̱li̱ mutabani̱ wa Manase baaghenda ku̱lu̱mba kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, baakikwata kandi baabhingamu Bamooli̱ abaabaagha baakaayemu.
Nahabweki Musa aaha bantu baa ntu̱la ya Maki̱li̱, baasukulu baa Manase kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ kandi baakalamu.
Yai̱li̱ muusukulu wa Manase, aaghenda aakwata mi̱bhi̱li̱ ya Bamooli̱ kandi aaghiluka li̱i̱na, “Mi̱bhi̱li̱ ya Yai̱li̱.”
Nobba aaghenda kandi aakwata kibugha kya Kenati̱ na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yakiyo kandi aabiluka li̱i̱na liye Nobba.
Bini niibiyo bi̱i̱kalo ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghooni̱yemu obu baalu̱ghagha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, bali mu ntu̱la syabo kandi Musa na Alooni̱ bali beebembeli̱ baabo.
Musa aahandiika bi̱i̱kalo ebi Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghendagha mbaghoonamu ngoku
aamulaghiiye. Bini niibiyo bi̱i̱kalo ebi baaghooni̱yemu.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha mu kibugha Lamu̱sesi̱ haa kilo kya eku̱mi̱ na bitaano kya kweli̱ kwʼoku̱du̱bha, haa kilo ekyalabhi̱ye kilo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo. Baatandika kughenda batoobahi̱ye kandi Banami̱si̱li̱ boona banabaloli̱ye.
Kilo eki Banami̱si̱li̱ baajiikagha baana baabo baabusaasa mi̱li̱ghaaso aba
aati̱ye.
akaba naatwi̱li̱i̱ye dhee musango baaluhanga baa Banami̱si̱li̱.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha Lamu̱sesi̱ kandi baaghoona Su̱kooti̱.
Baalu̱gha Su̱kooti̱ kandi baaghoona Etamu, haai na elungu.
Baalu̱gha Etamu, baakuuka Pihahi̱looti̱, bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Bbaali̱-jefoni̱ kandi baaghoona haai na Mi̱gi̱dooli̱.
Baalu̱gha Hahi̱looti̱, baakwamila haagati ya Nanja Mutuku kandi baaki̱dha mu elungu. Baamala bilo bisatu mbanalubhatanga mu elungu lya Etamu kandi baaghoona Maala.
Baalu̱gha Maala kandi baaki̱dha Eli̱mu̱, hambali aabaagha nsulo eku̱mi̱ nʼebili na biti nsanju̱ bya mba kandi baaghoona mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.
Baalu̱gha Eli̱mu̱ kandi baaghoona haai na Nanja Mutuku.
Baalu̱gha haa Nanja Mutuku kandi baaghoona mu elungu lya Si̱i̱ni̱.
Baalu̱gha mu elungu lya Si̱i̱ni̱ kandi baaghoona Dofi̱ka.
Baalu̱gha Dofi̱ka kandi baaghoona Alu̱si̱.
Baalu̱gha Alu̱si̱ kandi baaghoona Lefi̱di̱mu̱, hambali maasi ghatabaagha ghaa bantu aba kunuwa.
Baalu̱gha Lefi̱di̱mu̱ kandi baaghoona mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱.
Baalu̱gha mu elungu lya Si̱naai̱ kandi baaghoona Ki̱bbu̱loti̱-hatava.
Baalu̱gha Ki̱bbu̱loti̱-hatava kandi baaghoona Hajelooti̱.
Baalu̱gha Hajelooti̱ kandi baaghoona Li̱ti̱ma.
Baalu̱gha Li̱ti̱ma kandi baaghoona Li̱moni̱-peleeji̱.
Baalu̱gha Li̱moni̱-peleeji̱ kandi baaghoona Libbuna.
Baalu̱gha Libbuna kandi baaghoona Li̱sa.
Baalu̱gha Li̱sa kandi baaghoona Kehelaata.
Baalu̱gha Kehelaata kandi baaghoona haai na mwena Sefeli̱.
Baalu̱gha haa mwena Sefeli̱ kandi baaghoona Halada.
Baalu̱gha Halada kandi baaghoona Maki̱heloti̱.
Baalu̱gha Maki̱heloti̱ kandi baaghoona Tahati̱.
Baalu̱gha Tahati̱ kandi baaghoona Teela.
Baalu̱gha Teela kandi baaghoona Mi̱ti̱ka.
Baalu̱gha Mi̱ti̱ka kandi baaghoona Hasimona.
Baalu̱gha Hasimona kandi baaghoona Moseloti̱.
Baalu̱gha Moseloti̱ kandi baaghoona Bbeni̱-yakaani̱.
Baalu̱gha Bbeni̱-yakaani̱ kandi baaghoona Holu̱-hagi̱di̱gaadi̱.
Baalu̱gha Holu̱-hagi̱di̱gaadi̱ kandi baaghoona Yoti̱bbata.
Baalu̱gha Yoti̱bbata kandi baaghoona Abbulona.
Baalu̱gha Abbulona kandi baaghoona Eji̱yooni̱-gebbeli̱.
Baalu̱gha Eji̱yooni̱-gebbeli̱ kandi baaghoona mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱ mu elungu lya Ji̱i̱ni̱.
Baalu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱ kandi baaghoona mu nti̱na ya mwena Hooli̱, haa mutaano ghwa nsi ya Edomu.

aalaghila mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱ ku̱ni̱i̱na haa mwena Hooli̱. Bwile obu Alooni̱ akaba ali na myaka ki̱ku̱mi̱ na maku̱mi̱ abili nʼesatu kandi aakwi̱la haa mwena oghu, haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya kweli̱ kwakataano kwa mwaka ghwa maku̱mi̱ anaa haanu̱ma ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Alooni̱ aakwi̱la haa mwena Hooli̱. Akaba ali na myaka ki̱ku̱mi̱ na maku̱mi̱ abili nʼesatu ya bukulu.
Mukama wa kibugha kya Aladi̱ Munakanaani̱ oghu akaba aakaaye Negeebbu mu nsi ya Kanaani̱, aaghu̱wa ngoku Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakwete kwisa.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha haa nti̱na ya mwena Hooli̱ kandi baaghoona Jali̱mona.
Baalu̱gha Jali̱mona kandi baaghoona Pu̱nooni̱.
Baalu̱gha Pu̱nooni̱ kandi baaghoona Obboti̱.
Baalu̱gha Obboti̱ kandi baaghoona I̱ye-abbali̱mu̱, haa mutaano ghwa Mowaabu.
Baalu̱gha Iye-abbi̱li̱mu̱ kandi baaghoona Di̱bbooni̱-gaadi̱.
Baalu̱gha Di̱bbooni̱-gaadi̱ kandi baaghoona Alu̱mooni̱-di̱bbu̱latahi̱mu̱.
Baalu̱gha Alu̱mooni̱-di̱bbu̱latahi̱mu̱ kandi baaghoona haa myena Abbali̱mu̱ haai na mwena Nebbo.
Baalu̱gha mu myena ya Abbali̱mu̱ kandi baaghoona mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu haai na maasi Yolodaani̱ kandi kibugha kya Yeli̱ko kili luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi agha.
Baaghoona haai na maasi Yolodaani̱ ku̱lu̱gha Bbeti̱-yesi̱mooti̱ ku̱hi̱ka Abbeli̱-si̱ti̱mu̱ mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu.
aabu̱gha na Musa mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu haai na maasi Yolodaani̱. Kibugha kya Yeli̱ko kili luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi agha. Aaghila ati,
“Obu̱ghe na Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi obaghile oti, ‘Mukaakubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kandi nimwaki̱dha mu nsi ya Kanaani̱,

mubhinge bantu boona abaakaaye mu nsi eghi. Mu̱hwelekeeleli̱ye bisasani̱ bya mabaale bya baaluhanga baabo na bisasani̱ ebi̱koleeu̱we mu byoma. Mugenge hansi bi̱i̱kalo bya haagu̱u̱li̱ ya bwena bya kulami̱li̱yamu byabo.
Mutwale nsi eghi kandi mughiikalemu, nanga naaghihaaye enu̱we kuba yaanu.

Mukome buluulu kutambu̱li̱ya nsi eghi kusighikila haa ntu̱la syanu. Ntu̱la eghi eli na bantu bakani̱ye mughihe kyalo kikani̱ye nga bugwetuwa bwabo kandi ntu̱la eghi eli na bantu bakee mughihe kyalo kikee. Ntu̱la eghi kaluulu kakukwata mughihe kyalo eki. Mutambu̱li̱ye nsi eghi kusighikila haa ntu̱la sya baataata baanu.

“ ‘Bhaatu kaakuba mutabhinga Banakanaani̱ boona abaakaaye mu nsi eghi, aba mu̱ku̱si̱mi̱lani̱ya ku̱ti̱ghalamu, bakuba nga ndobhaani̱ syoghiiye si̱tu̱bhi̱ti̱ye enu̱we mu maaso kandi nga mahuwa mu mbalu̱ syanu. Bakuleka mube na bijibu mu nsi eghi mukughenda kuukalamu.
Kaakuba mutakola eki naabaghambiiye, nkukolʼo enu̱we ebi naabbalagha kukolʼo bantu aba.’ ”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Olaghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mukaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi ya Kanaani̱, eghi nkubaha nga bugwetuwa bwanu, eni aaniiyo yaaba mitaano ya nsi eghi.
“ ‘Mutaano ghwa eku̱wa ghukutandikila mu elungu lya Ji̱i̱ni̱ kandi ku̱hi̱ka haa mutaano ghwa Edomu. Haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, mutaano ghukutandikila eku̱wa haakumaliilila kwa Nanja ya Kisula.

Mutaano oghu ghukuukile eku̱wa mu kihanda kyʼomu mwena Akulabbi̱i̱mu̱, ghughulukani̱ye kandi ghu̱hi̱ke mu elungu lya Ji̱i̱ni̱ kandi ghu̱hi̱ke eku̱wa ya tau̱ni̱ ya Kadesi̱-bbaluneya. Du̱mbi̱ ghu̱hi̱ke Hajalaada kandi ghu̱hi̱ke Aji̱mooni̱.
Mutaano oghu ghu̱ku̱lu̱gha Aji̱mooni̱ ku̱hi̱ka haa maasi ghaa mutaano ghwa nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi ghukuukile haa Nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱.
“ ‘Mutaano ghwanu ghwa bughuwa ejooba ghukukuukila haa Nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱. Oghu niighuwo ghukuba mutaano ghwanu ghwa bughuwa ejooba.
“ ‘Mutaano ghwanu ghwa elughulu, ghukutandikila haa Nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱ ku̱hi̱ka haa mwena Hooli̱
kandi ghu̱ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena Hooli̱ ku̱hi̱ka Lebbo-hamati̱. Du̱mbi̱ mutaano oghu ghu̱ku̱hi̱ka Jedaadi̱,
ghweyongele ku̱hi̱ka Jefu̱looni̱ kandi ghukuukile Hajaleeni̱. Oghu niighuwo ghukuba mutaano ghwanu ghwa elughulu.
“ ‘Mutaano ghwanu ghwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, ghukutandikila Hajaleeni̱ ku̱hi̱ka Sefamu.
Mutaano oghu ghukuhona eku̱wa ku̱lu̱gha Sefamu ghu̱hi̱ke Li̱bbu̱la haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Ai̱ni̱ kandi ghweyongele ku̱hi̱ka haa ki̱si̱yo kya Nanja ya Ki̱neleti̱.
Du̱mbi̱ mutaano oghu ghukuhona eku̱wa ku̱hi̱ka haa maasi Yolodaani̱ kandi ghukuukile haa Nanja ya Kisula.
“ ‘Eghi niiyo ekuba nsi yaanu na mitaano yayo haa bu̱li̱ luhande.’ ”
Musa aalaghila Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Eghi niiyo nsi eghi mukutambulana nga bugwetuwa bwanu nimukoma buluulu, eghi
andaghiiye kuha ntu̱la mwenda sya Banai̱saaleeli̱ banji na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase,
nanga bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase baatu̱ngi̱ye nsi yabo nga bugwetuwa.
Ntu̱la ebili na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase baatu̱ngi̱ye nsi nga bugwetuwa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱, eghi elolaane na kibugha kya Yeli̱ko.”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa basaasa abakutambu̱li̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ nsi ya Kanaani̱ nga bugwetuwa bwabo: Mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja na Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱.
Mukome dhee mwebembeli̱ omui ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la kutambu̱li̱ya nsi eghi nga bugwetuwa.
“Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa basaasa aba baakomi̱ye: Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da.
Semweli̱ mutabani̱ wa Ami̱hu̱di̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱.
Elidaadi̱ mutabani̱ wa Ki̱si̱loni̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱.
Bbu̱ki̱ mutabani̱ wa Yogu̱li̱, mwebembeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Daani̱.
Hani̱eli̱ mutabani̱ wa Efodi̱, mwebembeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Manase mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱.
Kamweli̱ mutabani̱ wa Sifutani̱, mwebembeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱.
Elijafaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Palunaki, mwebembeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱.
Palati̱yeeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Ajaani̱, mwebembeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali.
Ahi̱hu̱di̱ mutabani̱ wa Selomi̱, mwebembeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Aseli̱.
Pedaheeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Ami̱hu̱di̱, mwebembeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Nafutaali.”
Aba niibo basaasa aba
aalaghiiye kutambu̱li̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ nsi ya Kanaani̱ nga bugwetuwa bwabo.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanabaagha mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu haai na maasi Yolodaani̱, kibugha kya Yeli̱ko kili luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi agha.
aaghila Musa ati,
“Olaghile Banai̱saaleeli̱ kuha Baleevi̱ bibugha bya kuukalamu ku̱lu̱gha haa bugwetuwa bwa nsi obu bakutunga. Babahe dhee byalo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu bisolo byabo ebyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye bibugha ebi.
Du̱mbi̱ Baleevi̱ aba bakuba na bibugha bya kuukalamu na byalo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu nte, ntaama, mbu̱li̱ na bisolo byabo binji.
“Byalo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu ebi bakuha Baleevi̱ kujamba kwabiyo kube fu̱u̱ti̱ lu̱ku̱mi̱ na bi̱ku̱mi̱ bitaano ku̱lu̱gha hanja ya lugho lwa kibugha eki.

Mu̱pi̱i̱maghe fu̱u̱ti̱ nku̱mi̱ esatu ku̱lu̱gha haagati ya kibugha kughenda hanja haa mpande syona, haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, lwa eku̱wa, lwa bughuwa ejooba kandi lwa elughulu. Kibugha eki kiikalaghe haagati kandi kyalo kya hanja ya kibugha eki kibe kya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu bisolo bya Baleevi̱.
“Bibugha ebi mukuha Baleevi̱, mukomemu bibugha mukaagha bya kuulukilamu ebi muntu oghu aati̱ye muunakiye akugubha kuulukila kujuna bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe. Mubahe dhee bibugha binji maku̱mi̱ anaa na bibili.
Muli na kuha Baleevi̱ bibugha maku̱mi̱ anaa na munaanaa na byalo byabiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu bisolo byabo.

Bibugha ebi mukuha Baleevi̱ mu nsi eghi Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakutunga nga bugwetuwa bwabo, bu̱li̱ ntu̱la eheyo kibugha eki nga mughabo. Ntu̱la eghi eli na bibugha bikani̱ye mughiiyʼo bibugha bikani̱ye kandi ntu̱la eghi eli na bibugha bikee, mughiiyʼo bibugha bikee.”
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mukaakubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kandi nimwaki̱dha mu nsi ya Kanaani̱,
mukome bibugha byanu kuulukilamu, hambali muntu oghu aati̱ye muunakiye atakighendeleeye akugubha kuulukila.

Bibugha ebi bibe byanu kuulukilamu, niikuwo oghu akubbala kuhoola ngi̱ghu̱ haabwa muntu wee baati̱ye, ataata oghu aati̱ye muntu oghu. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu banyegheleeye haabwa kwita muntu oghu ali na kwitibuwa batakamutwete mu ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱mu̱twi̱la musango.
Bibugha mukaagha ebi bibe bibugha byanu kuulukilamu.
Bibugha bisatu bibe bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱ kandi bibugha bisatu bibe mu nsi ya Kanaani̱. Bibugha ebi bibe byanu kuulukilamu.

Bibugha ebi bibe bya kuulukilamu haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱, banamahanga na bantu banji abaakaaye na Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba, niikuwo muntu oghu akwita muunakiye atakighendeleeye aalukilaghe mu kimui haa bibugha ebi.
“ ‘Kaakuba muntu ahuula muunakiye na kintu kya kyoma kandi aku̱wa, oghu aahuuye muunakiye ni mu̱ji̱ndi̱ kandi mu̱ji̱ndi̱ oghu ali na kwitibuwa.
Kaakuba muntu aba akwete ebaale mu ngalo yee elikugubha kwita kandi alihuula muunakiye aaku̱wa, muntu oghu ni mu̱ji̱ndi̱ kandi mu̱ji̱ndi̱ oghu ali na kwitibuwa.
Kaakuba amuhuula ki̱twi̱ke kya kiti kandi aku̱wa, oghu aahuuye muunakiye ni mu̱ji̱ndi̱ kandi mu̱ji̱ndi̱ oghu ali na kwitibuwa.
Muntu oghu akubbala kuhoola ngi̱ghu̱ haabwa muntu wee oghu baati̱ye, kaakuba asangaana mu̱ji̱ndi̱ oghu, ali na kumwita.
Kaakuba muntu ooha muunakiye, ati̱ngi̱ta oghu oohi̱ye kedha amukubila kintu kimuhuula aku̱wa,

kedha amuhuula kikonde kandi muntu oghu aku̱wa, oghu aamuhuuye ni mu̱ji̱ndi̱ kandi ali na kwitibuwa. Oghu akubbala kuhoola ngi̱ghu̱ haabwa muntu wee baati̱ye, kaakuba asangaana mu̱ji̱ndi̱ oghu ali na kumwita.

“ ‘Muntu akugubha kwita bwangu muunakiye atakighendeleeye. Akugubha ku̱mu̱ti̱ngi̱ta eegenge kedha kumuhuula kintu atakighendeleeye, kaakuba aba atali ngi̱ghu̱ ya muntu oghu aati̱ye, akuba aki̱koli̱ye atakighendeleeye.
Muntu oghu akugubha kukuba hansi ebaale elikugubha kwita, lihuule muunakiye kandi aku̱we, ngoku oghu aati̱ye ataabaagha ngi̱ghu̱ yee akuba atakighendeleeye.

Kaakuba eki kibʼo, ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kili na ku̱tu̱wamu haagati ya oghu aati̱ye muunakiye na mu̱ghenji̱ wa oghu baati̱ye kandi baatu̱wemu kusighikila haa bilaghilo oghu aati̱ye muunakiye akaakuba ali mu̱ji̱ndi̱.

Kaakuba ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ babona oghu aati̱ye muunakiye atali na musango, batasi̱i̱ma oghu akubbala kuhoola ngi̱ghu̱ naata muntu oghu, bhaatu bali na kumulindila mu kibugha eki aalukiiyemu kandi aakaleyo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona oghu baasi̱i̱ghi̱ye mafu̱ta aku̱u̱ye.
“ ‘Bhaatu kaakuba kilo kimui oghu aati̱ye muunakiye asaala haa mutaano ghwa kibugha kya kuulukilamu eki aalukiiyemu,
mu̱ghenji̱ wa muntu oghu aati̱ye amusangaana hanja ya mutaano ghwa kibugha kya kuulukilamu eki kandi oghu akwete kuhoola ngi̱ghu̱ amwita, muntu oghu taali na musango ghwa bu̱ji̱ndi̱.

Muntu oghu banyegheleeye haabwa kwita muunakiye ali na kuukala mu kibugha kya kuulukilamu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aku̱u̱ye. Muntu oghu akugubha kukuuka mu kibanja kiye haanu̱ma ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona ku̱ku̱wa.
“ ‘Ebi niibiyo bilaghilo ebi muli na kukwata mu mijo yaanu eghi ekwisa, hoona hambali mulabaagha muukaaye.

“ ‘Kaakuba muntu aata muunakiye, mu̱ji̱ndi̱ oghu ali na kwitibuwa haanu̱ma ya baakai̱so kubʼo abakughila bati aaki̱koli̱ye. Bhaatu taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akulaghiluwa kwitibuwa haabwa buukai̱so bwa muntu omui enkaha.
“ ‘Mutasi̱i̱magha kucungula mu̱ji̱ndi̱, muntu oghu abhonganuuwe ku̱ku̱wa. Majima mu̱ji̱ndi̱ oghu ali na kwitibuwa.
“ ‘Mutasi̱i̱magha kucungula muntu weena oghu aalukiiye mu kibugha kya kuulukilamu, niikuwo akuuke mu kibanja kiye mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona atakaku̱u̱ye.

“ ‘Kaakuba mukola eki, mu̱ku̱bhi̱i̱ya nsi eghi muukaayemu, nanga bu̱ji̱ndi̱ bu̱ku̱bhi̱i̱yagha nsi. Taaliyo mukolo ghwa kughaniluwa bibhi oghu mukugubha kukola kweli̱ya nsi hambali baajindiiye muntu, kuuyʼo oghu aamu̱ji̱ndi̱ye ali na kwitibuwa.
Mutabhi̱i̱ya nsi eghi muukaayemu kandi hambali nkuukalagha, nanga si̱ye
, nkuukalagha mu Banai̱saaleeli̱.’ ”
Beebembeli̱ bʼomu ntu̱la ya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, mutabani̱ wa Maki̱li̱ kandi muusukulu wa Manase, omui haa batabani̱ baa Yojeefu̱, baaghenda ewaa Musa na beebembeli̱ banji baa Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Baaghila bati, “

akalaghila uwe mukama waatu kuha Banai̱saaleeli̱ nsi ya Kanaani̱ nga bugwetuwa bwabo nookoma kaluulu. Aakulaghila kuha bahala baa Jelofehaadi̱ bugwetuwa bwa nsi obu mu̱ghenji̱ waatu oghu angu̱tu̱ngi̱ye.

Kaakuba basweluwa basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la sinji sya Banai̱saaleeli̱, du̱mbi̱ bugwetuwa bwa baataata baatu obu bukuleka kuba bwa ntu̱la yaatu kandi bukuba bwa ntu̱la sya bantu hambali basweuwe. Nahabweki ki̱twi̱ke kya bugwetuwa bwatu bantu banji bakukitwala.
Mwaka ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ kukola ki̱ghenu̱ kya bughabe
ghukaaku̱hi̱ka, bugwetuwa bwa bahala baa Jelofehaadi̱ bakubuuya haa bugwetuwa bwa baataata baatu babwongele haa bugwetuwa bwa ntu̱la hambali basweuwe.”
Musa aalaghila Banai̱saaleeli̱ eki
aabu̱ghi̱ye ati, “Eki bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yojeefu̱ bakwete ku̱bu̱gha ki̱hi̱ki̱ye.
Kini niikiyo
aalaghiiye kukolela bahala baa Jelofehaadi̱ naaghila ati, ‘Bakugubha kusweluwa basaasa aba babbali̱ye, bhaatu bali na kusweluwa mu ntu̱la ya taata wabo.
Taaliyo bugwetuwa bwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ obuli na ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la kughenda mu ntu̱la enji, nanga bu̱li̱ Munai̱saaleeli̱ ali na kuukala mu bugwetuwa bwa ntu̱la ya taata wee.
Bu̱li̱ mwana wabukali̱ Munai̱saaleeli̱ oghu akutunga nsi nga bugwetuwa, ali na kusweluwa mu emui haa ntu̱la sya taata wee, niikuwo bu̱li̱ Munai̱saaleeli̱ atunge haa bugwetuwa bwa taata wee.
Taaliyo bugwetuwa bwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ obuli na ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la kughenda mu ntu̱la enji, nanga bu̱li̱ ntu̱la ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ eli na kuukala mu nsi eghi baatu̱ngi̱ye nga bugwetuwa bwabo.’ ”
Nahabweki bahala baa Jelofehaadi̱ baakola ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Bahala baa bahala baa Jelofehaadi̱ bani: Tiluja, Hogu̱la, Milika na Nooha, baasweluwa batabani̱ baa baghenji̱ baa esebo.
Baasweluwa bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Manase mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱ kandi nsi eghi baabahaaye nga bugwetuwa yaakala enali mu ntu̱la ya taata wabo.
Ebi niibiyo bilaghilo na ndaghikiililo ebi
aaghambiiye Musa kuha Banai̱saaleeli̱ obu baabaagha mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu haai na maasi Yolodaani̱, ekilolaane na kibugha kya Yeli̱ko.
Deuteronomy: Bini niibiyo bighambo Musa aaghambiiye I̱saaleeli̱ yoona obu baabaagha mu elungu mu kighona kya Alaba
bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱. Baghooni̱ye mu kighona kyaghʼo haai na tau̱ni̱ ya Sufu, haagati ya Palaani̱, Tofeeli̱, Labbaani̱, Hajelooti̱ na Dijahaabbu.
Hakaba haliyo lughendo lwa bilo eku̱mi̱ na kimui ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena Holebbu ku̱ki̱dha Kadesi̱-bbaluneya, okwamiiye kihanda kyʼomu mwena ghwa Seyi̱li̱.
