Mu mwaka ghwa maku̱mi̱ anaa, haa kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha kya kweli̱ kwa eku̱mi̱ na kumui, Musa aaghambila Banai̱saaleeli̱ byona ebi
aamulaghiiye kubaghambila.
Eki kikabʼo obu aamali̱ye ku̱si̱ngu̱la Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱, oghu akaba alemi̱ye tau̱ni̱ ya Hesi̱bbooni̱, na Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani oghu akaba alemi̱ye maatau̱ni̱ Asi̱talooti̱ na Edeleeyi̱.
Musa aatandika kubasoboolola ebi
aamulaghikiliiye, obu baabaagha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱, mu ehanga lya Mowaabu.
Aaghila ati, “Obu twanabaagha haa mwena Holebbu,
Luhanga waatu akatughila ati, ‘Mwakaaye bwile bukani̱ye haa nti̱na ya mwena ghuni.

Mu̱lu̱ghe mu ki̱i̱kalo kini kandi mughende mu kyalo kya bwena kya Bamooli̱ na bi̱i̱kalo binji ebilabhaane nakiyo mu kighona kya Alaba. Mughende Negeebbu, nimukwamila haa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja, mu̱ki̱dhe mu nsi ya Banakanaani̱ na kyalo kya Lebbanooni̱. Mughende mu̱ki̱dhe haa maasi ghaanamu̱li̱to Efulaati̱.
Nsi eghi yoona, niiyo si̱ye
naalahiiye kuha baataata baanu, Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka, Yakobbo, na baasukulu baabo. Mughende kandi mughitwale.’ ”
Musa aaghila ati, “Obu twabaagha haa mwena Holebbu nkabaghila nti, ‘Tankugubha kubeebembela nenkaha.
Luhanga waanu aaleki̱ye mwakana, endindi mukani̱ye nga nsooli̱ya syʼomu mwanya.
Luhanga wa baataata baanu, aleke mukanile kimui milundi lu̱ku̱mi̱ kusaali̱ya ngoku muli endindi kandi abahe mu̱gi̱sa ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye!
Bhaatu si̱ye nenkaha tankugubha kumala bijibu byanu byona.
Mukome basaasa aba bahu̱ti̱i̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la, abali na magheji kandi abeetegheleei̱ye, nkubaha mulimo ghwa kuba beebembeli̱ baanu.’
“Mwankuukamu muti, ‘Waabu̱ghi̱ye kintu kisemeeye kya kukola.’

“Nahabweki basaasa baa magheji kandi abeetegheleei̱ye aba mwakomi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la syanu, bamui mu ebo naabaha mulimo ghwa kuba beebembeli̱ baa bantu lu̱ku̱mi̱-lu̱ku̱mi̱, banji baa bantu ki̱ku̱mi̱-ki̱ku̱mi̱, banji baa bantu maku̱mi̱ ataano-ataano na banji baa bantu eku̱mi̱-eku̱mi̱.

“Bwile obu naalaghila beebembeli̱ aba nti, ‘Mu̱tegheeleli̱yaghe misango ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanu, mu̱ghi̱tu̱waghe mu bwengani̱ja, mumalaghe nsonga ya muntu na muunakiye, kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye naanu.

Mutaba na kusoloola mu ntu̱wamu syanu. Mu̱tegheeleli̱yaghe aba bahu̱ti̱i̱ye nʼaba batahu̱ti̱i̱ye. Muntu weena ataboobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, nanga ntu̱wamu mukukola si̱lu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga. Musango ngwabasaghi̱ye ku̱tu̱wa, mughundeetele, nku̱ghu̱tegheeleli̱ya.’
“Bwile obu nkabalaghila byona ebi mubhonganuuwe kukola.
“Niibuwo twalu̱ghi̱ye mu nti̱na ya mwena Holebbu, twakwamila mu elungu liinamu̱li̱to kandi eli bantu boobaagha, eli mwaboone. Twaghenda mu kyalo kya bwena kya Bamooli̱, ngoku
Luhanga waatu aatulaghiiye, twaki̱dha Kadesi̱-bbaluneya.
Naabaghila nti, ‘Mwaki̱dhi̱ye endindi mu kyalo kya bwena kya Bamooli̱, eki
Luhanga waatu akutuha.
Olole,
Luhanga waawe aakuhaaye nsi eghi. Oghende kandi oghitwale ngoku
Luhanga wa baataata baawe aakughambiiye. Otoobaha kandi otahuwa maani̱.’
“Enu̱we boona mwasa hambali ndi kandi mwaghila muti, ‘Oleke tutume basaasa baghende batubegele nsi eghi kandi batughambile kihanda tukukwama na bibugha tu̱ku̱ki̱dhamu.’
“Naabona eki kisemeeye, naakoma basaasa eku̱mi̱ na babili, mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la naayamu musaasa omui.
Baamu̱ki̱ya kughenda mu ehanga lya keena, baaki̱dha mu kighona kya Esi̱kooli̱ kandi baakibega.
Baakobha bimui haa bi̱ghu̱ma byʼomu nsi eghi, baatuleetela biyo. Baatughila bati, ‘Nsi eghi
Luhanga waatu akutuha esemeeye.’
“Bhaatu mwajeema kughendayo kandi mwabhenga eki
Luhanga waanu aabalaghiiye.
Mwamu̱bu̱ghʼo mu weema syanu muti, ‘
kutwoha kyaleki̱ye aatuuya mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ kutuhaayʼo mu mikono ya Bamooli̱ ku̱tu̱hwelekeeleli̱ya.

Buuye tukughenda haa? Baghenji̱ baatu baatumali̱ye maani̱, abaatu̱ghi̱li̱ye bati, “Bibugha ebi bi̱li̱ndu̱u̱we kwonini kandi bisiika ebi̱byeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye bikangamiiye ku̱hi̱ka mu mwanya. Bantu abaakaayemu bakangami̱ye kandi bali na maani̱ kutusaali̱ya. Bamui mu bantu aba ni baasukulu baa musaasa wamaani̱ Anaki̱.” ’
“Bhaatu naaghila enu̱we nti, ‘Mutatukumila kandi mutoobaha bantu aba.
Luhanga waanu oghu akughendagha abahikiiye, akubalwanilila ngoku aakoli̱ye mu Mi̱si̱li̱ munaloli̱ye
kandi nʼomu elungu. Mukabona ngoku mu lughendo olu lwona ngoku
Luhanga waawe aku̱heeki̱ye, ngoku muntu akuheekagha mwana wee, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱ki̱dhi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kini.’
“Bhaatu nankabha naabakoleeye ebi byona, mwabhenga kwesigha
Luhanga waanu,
oghu aaghendagha abahikiiye kubatwala mu bi̱i̱kalo bya kughoonamu. Aaboolekagha kihanda mukukwama ali mu mpaghi ya mulilo mukilo kandi mu mpaghi ya kicu ntangaali̱.
“Obu
aaghu̱u̱ye ebi mukwete ku̱bu̱gha, aasaaliluwa kandi aalahila naaghila ati,
‘Taaliyo nʼomui mu mujo ghubhi ghuni oghu aku̱ki̱dha mu nsi esemeeye eghi naalahiiye kuha baataata baanu,
kuuyʼo Kelebbu mutabani̱ waa Yefune. Niiye aku̱ghi̱ki̱dhamu, nanga niiye akukolagha byona ebi
aalaghiiye, nahabweki nkumuha nsi eghi hamui na baasukulu be.’
aasaaliluwa dhee nanje haabwanu. Angila ati, ‘Nankabha uwe Musa, tooku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi.
Bhaatu ogu̱mi̱ye Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, oghu akwete kukukoonela haa mulimo oghu, nanga niiye akuhikila Banai̱saaleeli̱ kubaki̱dhi̱ya mu nsi eghi.
Baana baanu, aba mwaghi̱li̱ye muti ngi̱ghu̱ syanu si̱ku̱hu̱nga, abatamani̱ye kibhi na kilungi, niibo baku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi kandi baghitwale.
Bhaatu enu̱we mukuuke mu elungu, mukwame mu kihanda eki̱ghendi̱ye haa Nanja Mutuku.’
“Enu̱we mwakuukamu muti, ‘Twasi̱i̱si̱ye ewaa
. Tukughenda kulwana, ngoku
Luhanga waatu aatulaghiiye.’ Niibuwo bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we aakwete kyakulwani̱i̱si̱ya kiye, ni̱mweli̱li̱kana muti ki̱dhooti̱ye ku̱lu̱mba kyalo kya bwena.
“Bhaatu
angila ati mbaghile nti, ‘Mutaghendayo kulwana, nanga tankuba ndi naanu kandi ngi̱ghu̱ syanu sikubasi̱ngu̱la.’
“Naabaghambila, bhaatu mwabhenga ku̱u̱ghu̱wa. Mwabhenga eki
aabalaghiiye kandi haabwa myepanko yaanu, mwaghenda mu kyalo kya bwena.
Bamooli̱ abaakalagha mu kyalo kya bwena, baasa baabalu̱mba, baabaseesekela nga njoki sikani̱ye, baabahuma ku̱lu̱gha Seyi̱li̱ baabahi̱ki̱ya Holu̱ma.
Mwakuuka kandi mwasa mwaliliilila
, bhaatu aataafuwʼo kulila kwanu kandi aabhenga kubaaghu̱wa.
Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye mwakala Kadesi̱ haabwa bwile bukani̱ye.”
Niibuwo twaku̱u̱ki̱ye kandi twaghenda mu elungu, twakwamila kihanda eki̱ghendi̱ye haa Nanja Mutuku, ngoku
angambiiye. Twamala bwile bukani̱ye ntweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kyalo kya bwena kya Seyi̱li̱.
Niibuwo
angi̱li̱ye ati,
“Mwamali̱ye bwile bukani̱ye ni̱mu̱neeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya ehanga lyʼomu mwena lini, endindi mukuuke elughulu.
Olaghile bantu aba oti, ‘Muli haai kusaalila mu kyalo kya baghenji̱ baanu baasukulu baa Esau, abaakaaye mu Seyi̱li̱. Bakuboobaha, bhaatu mweghendeseleje.
Mutalwana nabo, nanga tankuha enu̱we haa nsi yabo, nankabha katwi̱ke kati̱i̱ kaaku̱kpeeti̱yʼo kighele kyanu. Kyalo kya bwena kya Seyi̱li̱ nkakiha Esau kuba kiye.
Mubaghulaghʼo byokuliya na maasi ghaa kunuwa.’ ”
Oosuke ngoku

Luhanga waawe aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa mu bu̱li̱ kintu kyona eki waakolagha. Akakuloleelela obu waabaagha mu elungu liinamu̱li̱to lini. Aakala naawe myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa eni kandi taabaayʼo eki weetaghi̱si̱bu̱u̱we.

Niibuwo tweyongeeye kughenda, twasaala kyalo kya baghenji̱ baatu baasukulu baa Esau, abaakaaye Seyi̱li̱. Twegaali̱ya elughulu, tutaakwama luguudhe lwa Alaba olu̱lu̱ghi̱ye Elati̱ kughenda Eji̱yooni̱-gebbeli̱, bhaatu twakwama luguudhe lwʼomu elungu olu̱ghendi̱ye Mowaabu.
angila ati, “Otatalibani̱ja Banamowaabu kedha kulwana nabo, nanga tankukuha ki̱twi̱ke na kimui haa nsi yabo, nanga naahaaye kibugha kya Aala baasukulu baa Looti̱ kuba kyabo.”
(Ntu̱la ya bantu baamaani̱ kandi bakani̱ye eghi baaghilaghamu Beemi̱mu̱ bakaba baakaaye mu kibugha kya Aala. Bakaba bali baamaani̱ kandi bakangami̱ye nga Banaki̱.
Balefahi̱mu̱ bantu banji baabaghilaghamu Banaki̱, bhaatu Banamowaabu, babaghilamu Beemi̱mu̱.
Bahooli̱ bakaba baakaaye mu kibugha Seyi̱li̱, bhaatu baasukulu baa Esau baababhingamu. Baahwelekeeleli̱ya Bahooli̱ aba kandi baakala mu ki̱i̱kalo kyabo, ngoku Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakoli̱ye mu nsi eghi
aabahaaye kuba yabo.)
Niibuwo
aatu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mughende kandi mubhasuke kighona kya Jeledi̱.” Nahabweki twabhasuka kighona eki.
Kikatutwalila myaka maku̱mi̱ asatu na munaanaa ku̱lu̱gha Kadesi̱-bbaluneya, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu twabhasu̱ki̱ye kighona Jeledi̱. Basaasa abaalwanagha baa mujo oghu boona bakaba mbahwelekeleeye ngoku
aalahiiye ewaabo.
aakalagha naabafubila kandi naabaata ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu bahwelekeleeye boona.
Obu basaasa abaalwanagha boona baaku̱u̱ye mbaahuwʼo,
angila ati,
“Obwalo oku̱lu̱gha mu ehanga lya Mowaabu, okwamile haa mutaano ghwa Aala.
Nuwaaki̱dhi̱ye mu nsi ya Bamooni̱ otabatalibani̱ja kedha kulwana nabo, nanga tankukuha nsi ya Bamooni̱ eghi, nkaghiha baana baa Looti̱ kuba yabo.”
(Nsi eghi ekaba eli ya Balefahi̱mu̱ niibo baaghikalaghamu, bhaatu Bamooni̱ baaghilaghamu bantu aba Bajamu̱ju̱u̱mu̱.
Bakaba bali bantu baamaani̱ kandi bakani̱ye, bakangami̱ye nga Banaki̱.
aahwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba. Bamooni̱ baasa baakala mu nsi eghi,
ngoku aakoli̱ye baasukulu baa Esau, abaabaagha baakaaye mu Seyi̱li̱. Aahwelekeeleli̱ya Bahooli̱, du̱mbi̱ baasukulu baa Esau baasa mu nsi eghi, baaghiikalamu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.
Kintu ngʼeki kikabʼo dhee obu Bakafu̱toli̱mu̱ ku̱lu̱gha Ku̱leete baalu̱mbi̱ye kandi baahwelekeeleli̱ya Bavi̱i̱mu̱, abaabaagha baakaaye mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ ya mu kyalo kya Gaja.)
Obu twamali̱ye kusaala Mowaabu,

angila ati, “Mughende mukwamile mu kighona kya maasi Alu̱nooni̱, nanga Si̱hooni̱ Munamooli̱, mukama wa Hesi̱bbooni̱, naamuhaayeyo nʼehanga liye mu mukono ghwawe. Omulwani̱i̱si̱ye kandi otwale ehanga liye.
Ku̱lu̱gha obwalo nkuleka bantu baa mu nsi yoona bakwobahe. Bantu balakaaghu̱wagha makulu aghakukwetʼo, batandikaghe kutukumila haabwa kwobaha.”
Obu twanabaagha mu elungu lya Kedemooti̱, naatumila Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Hesi̱bbooni̱ batumuwa niimusaba bu̱si̱nge nti,
“Onsi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye nsaalile mu kyalo kyawe. Tukukwama mu luguudhe lwonkaha, tankwegaali̱ya haa mukono ghwabuliyo kedha ghwabumesu.
Byokuliya ebi nkuliya na maasi agha nkunuwa nkubighula na sente. Onsi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye nsaalile mu kyalo kyawe,
ngoku baana baa Esau abaakaaye mu Seyi̱li̱ na Banamowaabu abaakaaye mu Aala baakoli̱ye, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mbhasu̱ki̱ye maasi Yolodaani̱ kandi nki̱dhi̱ye mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waatu akutuha.”
Bhaatu Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Hesi̱bbooni̱ aabhenga ku̱tu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kukwama mu kyalo kiye, nanga
Luhanga waawe akoomakakani̱ya mwoyo ghuwe na mutima ghuwe kandi aamufoola mu̱jeemi̱, niikuwo omu̱si̱ngu̱le ngoku kyabaaye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.
angila ati, “Naatandi̱ki̱ye kukuha Si̱hooni̱ na kyalo kiye, omu̱si̱ngu̱le kandi ookale mu kyalo eki.”
Mukama Si̱hooni̱ na baasilikale be boona baasa kulwana naatu haai na tau̱ni̱ ya Jahaaji̱.
Luhanga waatu aatuha Si̱hooni̱, twamu̱si̱ngu̱la kandi twamwita, twata baana be na baasilikale be boona.
Bwile obu twakwata bibugha biye byona, twata bantu boona, basaasa, bakali̱ na baana. Taaliyo nʼomui oghu akati̱ghalʼo.
Bisolo byona na bintu bya mughaso ebi twasangi̱ye mu bibugha ebi twakwete, twabitwala.

Ku̱lu̱gha Alu̱weeli̱, eghi eli haa kumaliilila kwa kighona kya maasi Alu̱nooni̱ kandi ku̱lu̱gha haa kibugha ekili mu kighona eki, ku̱ki̱dha Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, taabaayʼo kibugha na kimui ekyatusaaghi̱ye kukwata.
Luhanga waatu akatuha biyo byona.
Tawaahi̱ki̱ye haai na nsi ya Bamooni̱ kedha ki̱si̱yo kya maasi Yabboki̱ kedha bibugha byʼomu kyalo kya bwena kedha ki̱i̱kalo kyona eki
Luhanga waatu aatulaghiiye kutaghendamu.
Niibuwo twaku̱u̱ki̱ye kandi twakwama kihanda eki̱ghendi̱ye Bbasaani. Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani na baasilikale be baasa kulwana naatu mu tau̱ni̱ ya Edeleeyi̱.
Bhaatu
angila ati, “Otamwobaha, nanga naamali̱ye kukuha ye na baasilikale be boona kandi okutwala nsi yee yoona. Omukole ngoku waakoli̱ye Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱, oghu akaba alemi̱ye mu Hesi̱bbooni̱.”
Luhanga waatu, aaleka dhee twasi̱ngu̱la Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani na bantu be boona kandi twabaata. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akati̱ghalʼo ali mwomi̱i̱li̱.
Bwile obu twakwata bibugha biye byona kandi taaliyo na kimui haa bibugha nkaagha ebi tutaabahambi̱yʼo. Twatwala kyalo kyona kya Alu̱gobi̱ kya bukama bwa Ogi̱ mu nsi ya Bbasaani.
Bibugha ebi byona bikaba bili na bigho bikangami̱ye kandi maageeti̱ ghaa mitahimbuwa. Twakwata dhee mi̱bhi̱li̱ enji ekani̱ye eghi ekaba etali na bigho.
Twabahwelekeeleli̱ya kwonini, ngoku twakoli̱ye Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Hesi̱bbooni̱. Twahwelekeeleli̱ya basaasa, bakali̱ na baana, abaabaagha mu bibugha ebi byona.
Bisolo byona na bintu bya mughaso ebi twasangi̱ye mu bibugha ebi twakwete, twabitwala.

Bwile obu, twakwata kyalo kyona kya nsi ya bakama babili baa Bamooli̱, abaakalagha luhande lweli̱ bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu kighona kya maasi Alu̱nooni̱ ku̱hi̱ka haa mwena Helu̱mooni̱.
(Mwena Helu̱mooni̱, Basi̱dooni̱ baaghughilamu Si̱li̱yooni̱, Bamooli̱ baghughilamu Seni̱li̱.)
Twatwala bibugha byona byʼomu kiigbete kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ yoona na Bbasaani, ku̱hi̱ka Saleka na Edeleeyi̱, bibugha byʼomu bukama bwa Ogi̱ wa Bbasaani.

(Ogi̱ enkaha mukama wa Bbasaani niiye akati̱ghalʼo mu ntu̱la ya Balefahi̱mu̱. Bulili buwe bukaba bu̱koleeu̱we mu kyoma, kujamba kwabuwo mi̱ta enaa, kugbaatikana mi̱ta ebili. Bulili obu bunali mu tau̱ni̱ ya Labba ya Bamooni̱.)

Obu twakwete nsi eghi bwile obu, naaha ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na Gaadi̱ ki̱twi̱ke ekitandikiiye Alu̱weeli̱, ekili haakpengbu̱ ya maasi Alu̱nooni̱, na ki̱twi̱ke kya kyalo kya bwena kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ na maatau̱ni̱ ghaamu.

Ki̱twi̱ke kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ ekyati̱ghaayʼo, na Bbasaani yoona ebyabaagha mu bukama bwa Ogi̱, kyalo kyona kya Alu̱gobi̱, naakiha kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase. (Bbasaani yoona eghi baaghilaghamu nsi ya Balefahi̱mu̱.

Yai̱li̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Manase, aakwata kyalo kyona kya Alu̱gobi̱ eki baaghilaghamu Bbasaani, ku̱lu̱gha haa mutaano ghwa Bagesu̱li̱ na Bamaaka. Aaluka bibugha byamu li̱i̱na liye, endindi banabimani̱ye nga bibugha bya Yai̱li̱.)
Ntu̱la ya Maki̱li̱ naaghiha kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱.

Bhaatu naaha dhee ki̱twi̱ke kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na ya Gaadi̱. Kyalo nabahaaye kikaba kitandikiiye haagati ya kighona kya maasi Alu̱nooni̱ eku̱wa ku̱hi̱ka haa maasi Yabboki̱, haa mutaano ghwabo na Bamooni̱ elughulu.

Baatunga dhee kyalo kya mu kighona kya maasi Yolodaani̱, ku̱lu̱gha haa Nanja ya Ki̱neleti̱ kuhonela kimui haa Nanja ya Kisula. Maasi Yolodaani̱ ghwaba mutaano ghwa bughuwa ejooba kandi nti̱na ya mwena ghwa Pisiga ghwaba mutaano ghwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba.
Bwile obu naalaghila bantu baa ntu̱la esatu esi nti, “

Luhanga waanu aabahaaye nsi ya bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yolodaani̱. Baasilikale baanu bakwate byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya, babhasuke maasi Yolodaani̱ bahikiiye baghenji̱ baanu Banai̱saaleeli̱, kubakoonela kuukala mu nsi eghi.
Bakali̱ baanu, baana baanu na bisolo byanu bikani̱ye, mu̱bi̱ti̱ghe mu bibugha ebi naahaaye enu̱we.
Mukoonele baghenji̱ baanu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya baki̱dhi̱ye mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waanu akubaha eghi eli bughuwa ejooba bwa Yolodaani̱ kandi aleki̱ye batu̱ngi̱ye bu̱si̱nge ngoku aakoli̱ye enu̱we. Haanu̱ma ya kubakoonela, du̱mbi̱ mukuuke mu nsi eni eghi naabahaaye.”
Bwile obu naalaghila Yosuwa nti, “Waaboone weenini ebi
Luhanga waanu, aakoli̱yʼo bakama babili aba Si̱hooni̱ na Ogi̱. Akukola atiyo dhee makama ghoona agha mukughenda kulwana nagho.
Mutoobaha bakama aba, nanga
Luhanga waanu akulwanilila enu̱we.”
Bwile obu neesengeleli̱ya
nti,
“Ai̱

Luhanga, waatandi̱ki̱ye kwoleka mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe bukulu bwawe kandi mukono ghwawe ghwamaani̱. Taaliyo luhanga mu eghulu kedha mu nsi oghu akugubha kukola bintu byamaani̱ kandi byakuswekani̱ya okukolagha!
Gutu oleke mbhasuke mbone nsi esemeeye eghi eli luhande lweli̱ lwa Yolodaani̱, kyalo kya bwena kisemeeye eki na Lebbanooni̱.”
Bhaatu
akaba asaaluuwe nanje haabwanu, aabhenga ku̱ntegheeleli̱ya. Angila ati, “Olekele haala! Otatodha ku̱bu̱gha eki!

Oghende kandi oni̱i̱ne haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena ghwa Pisiga, okube maaso, olole bughuwa ejooba, haa mukono ghwabumesu na haa mukono ghwabuliyo. Olole bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, olole nsi eghi kusemeeye kandi oghyetegheeleli̱ye, nanga tookubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱.
Oghambile Yosuwa ebi akukola kandi omu̱gu̱mi̱ye, nanga niiye akuhikila bantu kubaki̱dhi̱ya mu nsi eghi okubona.”
Nahabweki twakala mu kighona haai na tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeti̱-peyola.
Enu̱we Banai̱saaleeli̱, mu̱tegheeleli̱ye bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi nku̱beegheesi̱ya. Mubikwate niikuwo mube boomi̱i̱li̱ kandi mutwale nsi eghi
Luhanga wa baataata baanu akuha enu̱we.
Mutongela haa bighambo ebi ndimabalaghila kandi mutaayʼo, bhaatu mukwate bilaghilo bya
Luhanga waanu ebi ndimabalaghila.
Mukeebonela na maaso ghaanu ebi
aakoli̱ye e Bbaali̱-peyola, obu
Luhanga waawe aabahwelekeeleei̱yemu bantu boona abalami̱i̱ye Bbaali̱.
Bhaatu enu̱we abaakaaye munagumiiyʼo
Luhanga waanu, munali boomi̱i̱li̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.
Nkabeegheesi̱ya bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ngoku
Luhanga wanje andaghiiye, niikuwo mubikwate mu nsi eghi mukughenda kutwala.

Mubikwate kandi mukole ebi bilaghiiye, eki kikwoleka mahanga ghanji ngoku muli na magheji kandi mwetegheleei̱ye. Bakaaku̱u̱ghu̱wa bilaghilo ebi byona, bakughila bati, “Majima bantu bʼehanga lyamaani̱ lya I̱saaleeli̱ bali na magheji kandi beetegheleei̱ye.”
Taaliyo ehanga lyamaani̱ elili na luhanga oghu akuliikalagha haai nga
Luhanga waatu, oghu tukubilikilagha kandi atukuukamu.
Taaliyo ehanga linji, nankabha lili lyamaani̱, elili na bilaghilo bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na ntu̱wamu si̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye nku̱beegheesi̱ya obwalo.
Bhaatu weeghendeseleje kandi weelinde, kitali eki okuubululuwa ebi waaboone na maaso ghaawe kandi bi̱ku̱lu̱ghe haa mutima mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe bwona. Obyegheesi̱ye baana baawe na baasukulu baawe.
Oosuke kilo weemiliiye mu maaso ghaa

Luhanga waawe haa mwena Holebbu, obu aaku̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Okumaani̱ye bantu baase hambali ndi, baaghu̱we bighambo ebi nkwete ku̱bu̱gha, niikuwo beeghe ku̱mpu̱ti̱ya banaakaaye mu nsi eghi kandi beegheesi̱ye baana baabo ku̱mpu̱ti̱ya.”
Mukaasa haai kandi mwemilila mu nti̱na ya mwena, obu ghwakaghʼo mulilo ngu̱ni̱iina mu mwanya, bicu bijilaghu̱li̱ na mweli̱ma ghwamaani̱ bikaba bi̱swi̱ki̱ye mwena oghu.
aabu̱gha naanu ku̱lu̱gha haagati ya mulilo oghu. Mwaghu̱wa elaka liye bhaatu mutaamubona, mwaghu̱wa elaka lyonkaha.
Aabaghambila ndaghaano yee, bilaghilo eku̱mi̱ ebi aabalaghiiye kukwata, du̱mbi̱ aabihandiika haa bihande bibili bya mabaale.
Bwile obu
andaghila ku̱beegheesi̱ya bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi muli na kukwata mu nsi eghi muli haai ku̱ki̱dhamu kandi kutwala.
Nahabweki mwelinde kwonini, nanga tamwaboone ngoku
asu̱si̱ye obu aabu̱ghi̱ye naanu haa mwena Holebbu ku̱lu̱gha mu mulilo.
Mwelinde, mu̱teebhi̱i̱ya kwekolela kisasani̱ kya mulingo ghwona, eki̱su̱si̱ye musaasa kedha mukali̱,
kedha kisolo kyona ekili hansi kedha noni̱ yoona yʼomu mwanya,
kedha kihanguwa kyona ekikwekuluulilagha haa etaka, kedha kya nsu̱i̱ yoona eghi eli mu maasi.
Nuwaaloli̱ye mu mwanya, obona musana, kweli̱ kedha nsooli̱ya na byona ebili mu mwanya, otabi̱teeleli̱ya kandi otabilami̱ya. Bintu ebi
Luhanga waawe abiteeleeyʼo bantu abali mu nsi.
Bhaatu enu̱we
akabakoma aabaaya mu Mi̱si̱li̱ hambali mwabona-bonagha kwonini nga bantu bali mu mulilo ghwamaani̱, kuba bantu abali bugwetuwa buwe, ngoku muli endindi.
aasaaliluwa nanje haabwanu, aalahila ati tankubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kughenda mu nsi esemeeye eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha nga bugwetuwa bwawe.
Si̱ye nku̱kwi̱la mu nsi eni, tankubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, bhaatu enu̱we mukubhasuka kutwala nsi esemeeye eghi.
Mwelinde, mutaabululuwa ndaghaano eghi
Luhanga waanu aakoli̱ye naanu. Mutalyekolela kisasani̱ kya mulingo ghwona eki
Luhanga waawe aabatangi̱ye.
Nanga
Luhanga waawe ali nga mulilo oghu̱ku̱hwelekeeleli̱yagha kandi ni Luhanga wʼetima.
Obu oli̱byala baana, nimwatunga baasukulu kandi mukaakulila mu nsi eghi, mutalyebhi̱i̱ya, kwekolela kisasani̱ ki̱su̱si̱ye kintu kyona. Eki nkibhi mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe kandi kikuleka asaaliluwe.

Obwalo ndimabilikila eghulu kandi nsi kuba baakai̱so ngoku mukuhwelekeelela bwangu mu nsi eghi muli haai kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kutwala. Tamukughiikalamu bwile bukani̱ye, bhaatu mukuhwelekeelela bwangu.
alibalalangi̱ya mu mahanga, hambali bakee mu enu̱we bakuukala banaakaaye.
Mu mahanga agha mulilami̱li̱yayo baaluhanga aba bantu bakoli̱ye na mikono yabo mu mbaau kandi mabaale, abataakubonagha, abataaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha, abataakuliyagha kandi abataakukaghagha.
Bhaatu munaliyeyo, mulibbala
Luhanga waawe. Okaakumubbala na mutima ghwawe ghwona kandi mwoyo ghwawe ghwona, olimubona.
Obu oliba noobona-bona mu milingo ekani̱ye, niibuwo oli̱tu̱wamu kukuuka ewaa
Luhanga waawe kandi ohu̱ti̱ye elaka liye.
Nanga
Luhanga waawe ali na kisa, taaku̱ku̱lu̱ghʼo kedha ku̱ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kedha kuubululuwa ndaghaano eghi aakoli̱ye na baataata baawe, eghi aagu̱mi̱i̱ye na kilahilo.

“Obu̱u̱li̱ye mu byafaayo, ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu Luhanga aahangi̱ye bantu mu nsi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi kandi obu̱u̱li̱ye ku̱lu̱gha haa nsondo syona sya eghulu. Haliyo kintu kyamaani̱ nga kini eki bantu baalaboone kedha baaghu̱wʼo?
Haliyo bantu abaalaaghu̱u̱ye Luhanga naabu̱ghi̱la mu mulilo, ngoku waaghu̱u̱ye kandi baakala bali boomi̱i̱li̱?

Haliyo luhanga onji oghu aalalengi̱yʼo kuuya bantu mu ehanga linji kandi abafoola ehanga liye, naakoleesi̱ya bilengeso, bubonelo, byakuswekani̱ya, bulemo, mukono ghwa bu̱toki̱ na maani̱ ghe kandi bikoluwa bya kwobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, ngʼebi
Luhanga waanu aakoli̱ye mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱, munaloli̱ye?
akakwoleka ebi niikuwo omanye ngu eye enkaha niiye Luhanga kandi taaliyo onji.
Akaleka waaghu̱wa elaka liye ku̱lu̱gha mu eghulu niikuwo agubhe ku̱kwegheesi̱ya. Mu nsi akaleka waabona mulilo ghuwe ghwamaani̱, waaghu̱wa bighambo ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha haagati ya mulilo oghu.
Akakunda baataata baawe, kyaleka aakomamu enu̱we baasukulu baabo kandi haabwa bu̱toki̱ buwe bwamaani̱, eye eenini aakuuya mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Aaghenda naabhinga bantu mu mahanga ghaanamu̱li̱to kandi ghaamaani̱ kusaali̱ya uwe, niikuwo akutwalemu kandi akuhe nsi yabo, kuba bugwetuwa bwawe, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ngoku kili endindi.
Obwalo omanye kini kandi okikwate haa mutima ngu,
niiye Luhanga mu eghulu na munsi. Taaliyo Luhanga onji.
Okwate bilaghilo byona ebi nkukulaghila obwalo, niikuwo uwe na baana baawe obe kusemeeye kandi ookale bwile bukani̱ye mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha kuba yaawe bwile bwona.”
Musa aakoma bibugha bisatu luhande lweli̱ lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱,
niikuwo muntu oghu akwita muunakiye atakighendeleeye kandi atali na bu̱ghi̱ghu̱ na muntu oghu, agubhe kuulukila mu kimui haa bibugha ebi kujuna bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe.

Aakoma kibugha kya Bbejeeli̱ ekili haa kiigbete mu elungu kuba kya ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, kibugha kya Lamoti̱ mu kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ kuba kya ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱, kibugha kya Golaani̱ mu kyalo kya Bbasaani kuba kya ntu̱la ya Manase.
Kini niikiyo kilaghilo eki Musa aahaaye Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Buni niibuwo buukai̱so, bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi Musa aaghambiiye Banai̱saaleeli̱ obu baalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱.

Bakaba baghooni̱ye mu kighona kya Yolodaani̱ ekilolaane na Bbeti̱-peyola, mu nsi ya Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱ oghu akaba aakaaye Hesi̱bbooni̱, oghu Musa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasi̱ngu̱u̱ye obu baalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱.
Baatwala dhee nsi ya Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani. Baasi̱ngu̱la bakama babili baa Bamooli̱ aba, abaabaagha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yolodaani̱.
Kyalo kyabo kyalu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la mu tau̱ni̱ ya Alu̱weeli̱ eku̱wa haa maasi Alu̱nooni̱, ku̱hi̱ka elughulu haa mwena Si̱li̱yooni̱, oghu banji bakughilaghamu mwena Helu̱mooni̱.
Baakwata dhee kyalo kyona kya Alaba ekili bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱, ku̱hi̱ka eku̱wa haa Nanja ya Kisula, mu nti̱na ya mwena ghwa Pisiga.
Musa aabilikila I̱saaleeli̱ yoona, aabaghila ati, “Ooghu̱we, uwe I̱saaleeli̱, bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi nkukughambila obwalo. Mubyeghe kandi mweghendeseleje kubikwata.
Luhanga waatu akakola ndaghaano naatu haa mwena Holebbu.
taakoli̱ye ndaghaano eni na baataata baatu bonkaha, bhaatu aghi̱koli̱ye naatu, etu̱we boona abanakaaye endindi.
eenini akabu̱gha naanu haa mwena, ali haagati ya mulilo.
Bwile obu neemilila haagati yaanu na
, kubaghambila bighambo ebi akwete ku̱bu̱gha, nanga mukoobaha mulilo oghu kandi mutaani̱i̱na haa mwena oghu.
aaghila ati,
“Ni̱i̱si̱ye
Luhanga waawe, oghu akakuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ hambali waabaagha mu̱syana.
“Otaliba na baaluhanga banji kuuyʼo si̱ye.
“Otalyekolela kisasani̱ kya mulingo ghwona, eki̱su̱si̱ye kintu kyona ekili mu mwanya, hansi, kedha mu maasi.
Otali̱bi̱teeleli̱ya kedha kubilami̱ya, nanga si̱ye
Luhanga waawe, ndi Luhanga wʼetima. Nkufubilagha baana haabwa bibhi bya beesebo ku̱hi̱ka haa buusukulu bwakasatu na bwakanaa bwa mujo ghwa bantu abanjoi̱ye.
Bhaatu nkwolekagha kukunda kwamaani̱ haa nku̱mi̱ na nku̱mi̱ sya baku̱ndi̱ye si̱ye kandi bahu̱ti̱ya bilaghilo byanje.
“Otalilahila busa li̱i̱na lya
Luhanga waawe, nanga
akufubila weena oghu aku̱koleesi̱ya kubhi li̱i̱na liye.
“Ohu̱ti̱yaghe kilo kya Sabhato kandi okilinde kili ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, ngoku
Luhanga waawe aakulaghiiye.
Oli na bilo mukaagha bya kukola milimo yaawe yoona,
bhaatu kilo kyamusanju̱ ni kilo kya Sabhato kya

Luhanga waawe. Haa kilo eki otalikola mulimo ghwona, uwe kedha mutabani̱ waawe, kedha muhala waawe, kedha mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱, nte yaawe, kedha ndogooi̱ yaawe, kedha kisolo kyawe kyona, kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye naawe, niikuwo uwe na mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱, muhuumulaghe haa kilo eki.
Oosukaghe ngoku waabaagha mu̱syana mu Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi
Luhanga waawe aakuuyayo na mukono ghwa bu̱toki̱ na maani̱ ghe. Nahabweki
Luhanga waawe aakulaghiiye ku̱hu̱ti̱ya kilo kya Sabhato.
“Ohu̱ti̱yaghe so waawe na njoko waawe, ngoku
Luhanga waawe aakulaghiiye, niikuwo omale bwile bukani̱ye kandi ookale kusemeeye mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha.
“Otaliita.
“Otali̱syana.
“Otaliibha.
“Otalihabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya muliilanuwa waawe.

“Otalyeghomba mukali̱ wa muliilanuwa waawe. Otalyeghomba numba ya muliilanuwa waawe, musili ghuwe, mu̱heeleli̱ya wee wabukali̱, kedha wabusaasa, nte yee kedha ndogooi̱ yee, kedha kintu kyona kya muliilanuwa waawe.”
Ebi niibiyo bilaghilo ebi

aabahaaye obu ki̱bbu̱la kyanu kyabaagha mu nti̱na ya mwena. Akabi̱bu̱gha nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ali haagati ya mulilo, mu kicu kandi mweli̱ma ghwamaani̱. Taaliyo kilaghilo kinji eki ongeeyʼo. Aabihandiika haa bihande bibili bya mabaale, aabimpa.
Obu mwaghu̱u̱ye elaka elikwete ku̱lu̱gha mu mweli̱ma, mulilo ngunaaka haa mwena, enu̱we na bakulu baa ntu̱la syanu boona na bengei̱ mwasa hambali ndi,
mwaghila muti, “

Luhanga waatu aatwoleki̱ye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kiye kandi bukulu buwe, twaghu̱u̱ye elaka liye ku̱lu̱gha mu mulilo. Obwalo twaboone ngoku Luhanga akugubha ku̱bu̱gha na muntu kandi muntu oghu aakale anali mwomi̱i̱li̱.
Buuye tu̱ku̱kwi̱la ki? Mulilo ghwamaani̱ ghuni ghu̱ku̱tu̱hwelekeeleli̱ya. Kaakuba tweyongela ku̱u̱ghu̱wa elaka lya
Luhanga waatu, tu̱ku̱ku̱wa.
Haliyo muntu weena oghu aalaaghu̱u̱ye Luhanga mwomi̱i̱li̱ naabu̱ghi̱la haagati ya mulilo, ngoku etu̱we twamu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye, aakala anali mwomi̱i̱li̱?
Uwe oghende weesu̱kane haai kandi otegheeleli̱ye ebi
Luhanga waatu akwete ku̱bu̱gha. Wiise kandi otughambile byona ebi
Luhanga waatu akukughambila. Tu̱ku̱bi̱i̱ghu̱wa kandi tubikole.”
akaaghu̱wa bighambo ebi mwabu̱ghi̱ye bwile obu kandi angila ati, “Naaghu̱u̱ye ebi bantu aba bakwete kukughambila, byona ebi baabu̱ghi̱ye bisemeeye.
Nguli bu̱li̱ muntu aabaagha na mutima oghu, ahu̱ti̱ya kandi akwata bilaghilo byanje, ebo na baana baabo bangubaaye kusemeeye bilo nʼebilo!
“Oghende, obaghambile oti, ‘Mukuuke mu weema syanu.’
Bhaatu uwe ookale hani nanje, niikuwo nkuhe byona ebi nkukulaghila, bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi oku̱beegheesi̱ya kukwata mu nsi eghi nkubaha kutwala.”
Nahabweki mweghendeseleje kukola ebi
Luhanga waanu aabalaghiiye, mutali̱tu̱wa kimui haa bilaghilo biye kandi mukola bintu binji.
Mukole byona ebi
Luhanga waanu aabalaghiiye, niikuwo muukale muli boomi̱i̱li̱, mube kusemeeye kandi mumale bwile bukani̱ye mu nsi eghi akubaha.
Bini niibiyo ebi nkubalaghila, bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi
Luhanga waanu andaghiiye ku̱beegheesi̱ya. Mukulaghiluwa kubikwata mu nsi eghi muli haai ku̱ki̱dhamu kandi kutwala.
Ohu̱ti̱yaghe
Luhanga waawe, uwe na mutabani̱ waawe, na muusukulu waawe. Okwataghe bilaghilo biye byona ebi nkukulaghila, niikuwo obe na bwomi̱i̱li̱ bukani̱ye.
Ooghu̱we, uwe I̱saaleeli̱ kandi weeghendeseleje kubikwata, niikuwo mube kusemeeye kandi mukanile kimui mu nsi eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki, ngoku
Luhanga wa baataata baawe, aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.
Ooghu̱we, uwe I̱saaleeli̱,
Luhanga waatu, niiye
enkaha.
Okundaghe
Luhanga waawe na mutima ghwawe ghwona, mwoyo ghwawe ghwona, na maani̱ ghaawe ghoona.
Bighambo ebi ndimakulaghila obwalo, obikwate haa mutima.
Obyegheesi̱yaghe baana baawe kandi obi̱bu̱ghaghʼo ositami̱ye e ka, noolubhatanga mu kihanda, olangaaye kandi oomu̱ki̱ye.
Obyebohaghe nga kabonelo haa mukono ghwawe kandi obi̱lu̱walaghe haa bhu̱u̱su̱.
Obihandiikaghe haa bi̱ji̱ngi̱li̱jo bya njighi sya manumba ghaawe kandi haa maageeti̱ ghaawe.
Luhanga waawe, akalahila ewaa baataata baawe, Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo, ati akukuha nsi eghi esangu̱u̱we elimu bibugha byamaani̱ kandi bisemeeye ebi mutaakweye.

Okusanga manumba ghaasuuyemu bintu bisemeeye ebi otaataayemu. Okunwela haa byahu̱dhu̱ ebi otaali̱mi̱ye kandi oliye bi̱ghu̱ma bya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ na biti oli̱va mu misili eghi otaakoli̱ye. Obu olaliyagha kandi nuwaakuta,
bhaatu weelinde niikuwo otaabululuwa
oghu akakuuya mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ hambali waabaagha mu̱syana.
Ohu̱ti̱yaghe
Luhanga waawe. Omu̱heeleli̱yaghe kandi olahilaghe mu li̱i̱na liye.
Mutalilami̱ya baaluhanga banji, baaluhanga baa bantu ababeeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye,
nanga
Luhanga waawe, oghu abaakaayemu, ni Luhanga wʼetima. Akukukwatiluwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha kikani̱ye kandi aku̱hwelekeeleli̱ye mu nsi.
Mutalengesa
Luhanga waanu ngoku mwakoli̱ye e Masa.
Mweghendeseleje kukwata buukai̱so, bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi
Luhanga waanu aabalaghiiye.
Okolaghe ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye kandi ebisemeeye mu maaso ghaa
, niikuwo obe kusemeeye kandi ogubhe kughenda kutwala nsi esemeeye eghi
aalahiiye kuha baataata baawe.
Okubhinga mu nsi eghi ngi̱ghu̱ syawe syona, ngoku
aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.
Bwile obuliisa, obu mwana waawe ali̱ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Buukai̱so, bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi
Luhanga waatu aabateeleeyʼo bikumani̱i̱si̱ya ki?”
Omukuukemu oti, “Tukaba tuli basyana baa Falaaho mu Mi̱si̱li̱, bhaatu
aatuuyayo na mukono ghuwe ghwa bu̱toki̱.
akakola byakuswekani̱ya byamaani̱ tunaloli̱ye na maaso ghaatu, aakolʼo bintu byakabhi Banami̱si̱li̱, Falaaho na bantu baa ka yee, ebyaleki̱ye boobaha.
Aatuuyayo, niikuwo atuleete kandi atuhe nsi eghi aalahiiye kuha baataata baatu.
Luhanga waatu aatulaghila kukwata bilaghilo biye byona kandi ku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya, niikuwo tuukale kusemeeye bwile bwona kandi atulinde tuli boomi̱i̱li̱ ngoku tuli endindi.
Obu tulyeghendeseleja kukwata bilaghilo byona ebi
Luhanga waatu aatulaghiiye, eki kilileka tubaluwe bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
Obu

Luhanga waawe akukutwala mu nsi eghi oli haai ku̱ki̱dhamu kandi kuukalamu, akukukoonela kubhingamu bantu baa mahanga ghani: Bahi̱ti̱, Bagi̱li̱gasi̱, Bamooli̱, Banakanaani̱, Bapeleeji̱, Bahi̱vi̱ na Bayebu̱si̱. Mahanga musanju̱ agha ghaneeti̱ye kandi ghali na maani̱ kusaali̱ya uwe.
Luhanga waawe obu alikuha bantu aba kandi nuwaabasi̱ngu̱la, obahwelekeeleli̱ye boona. Otakola nabo ndaghaano kandi otabaghilila kisa.
Otaswelangana nabo. Otasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya muhala waawe kusweluwa mutabani̱ wee kedha mutabani̱ waawe kuswela muhala wee,
nanga bakuleka mwana waawe aleke kunkwamilila kandi atandike ku̱heeleli̱ya baaluhanga banji.
akubakwatiluwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha kandi abahwelekeeleli̱ye bwangu.

Bini niibiyo muli na kubakolʼo: Mugenge byakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byabo, muhenange mpaghi sya baaluhanga baabo sya mabaale, mujombakake bwakulolelʼo bwa luhanga wabo Asela. Bisasani̱ byabo beekoleeye kulami̱ya mu̱byoki̱ye mu mulilo.
Nanga enu̱we muli bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Luhanga waawe. Akabakoma mu bantu baa mu nsi yoona kuba bantu be baa mbaghani̱ja.
akabakunda kandi aabakomamu etali haabwa kuba ngu mukaba mukani̱ye kusaali̱ya mahanga ghanji, ni̱i̱nu̱we mwabaagha bakee munu kusaali̱ya bantu bʼomu mahanga ghanji ghoona.
Bhaatu

akakunda enu̱we kandi aabbala kulinda ebi aalahiiye ewaa baataata baanu. Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye aabajuna na mukono ghuwe ghwa bu̱toki̱ kandi aabacungula ku̱lu̱gha hambali mwabaagha basyana, ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱toki̱ bwa Falaaho mukama wa Mi̱si̱li̱.
Nahabweki omanye ngu
Luhanga waawe niiye Luhanga enkaha kandi ni Luhanga mwesighibuwa. Akulindagha ndaghaano yee ya kukunda kwamaani̱ haa nku̱mi̱ sya mijo ya bantu abamu̱ku̱ndi̱ye kandi bahu̱ti̱ya bilaghilo biye.
Bhaatu abamwohi̱ye akubaha kifubilo kya ku̱bahwelekeeleli̱ya kandi akusasula bwangu mpeela ya kuhwelekeelela weena oghu amwohi̱ye.
Nahabweki weeghendeseleje kukwata ebi nkukulaghila, bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi ndimakuha obwalo.
Nuwaanaaghu̱u̱ye bilaghilo bini kandi weeghendeseleja kubikwata,
Luhanga waawe akweyongela kulinda ndaghaano yee ya kukunda kwamaani̱, ngoku aalahiiye ewaa baataata baawe.

Akukukunda, akuhe mu̱gi̱sa kandi akani̱ye muhendo ghwawe. Akuha mu̱gi̱sa baana baawe, bilimuwa byawe, bi̱ghu̱ma byawe, ebi okuuyamu vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka kandi magita, byana bya bisolo byawe bya nte na ntaama, mu nsi eghi aalahiiye kuha baataata baawe.
Okuba na mu̱gi̱sa kusaali̱ya bantu banji boona, mu enu̱we taakubaamu musaasa atali na mwana kedha mukali̱ ngumba, kedha kisolo ekitali na kyana.
akukulinda mu ndwala syona. Taakuleka olwale ndwala sya kabhi sya Mi̱si̱li̱ esi omani̱ye, bhaatu akusileetela bantu boona abakwohi̱ye.
Ohwelekeeleli̱ye bantu boona aba
Luhanga waawe akukuha ku̱si̱ngu̱la. Otabaghilila kisa kandi otaheeleli̱ya baaluhanga baabo, nanga eki kikukufookela nga ki̱ki̱ya.
Okugubha kweli̱li̱kana haa mutima oti, “Bantu bʼomu mahanga ghani bansaaye maani̱, buuye nkugubha kubabhinga nti̱ya?”
Otaboobaha. Oosuke eki
Luhanga waawe aakoli̱yʼo Falaaho nʼehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ lyona.
Okeebonela na maaso ghaawe bilengeso byamaani̱, bubonelo, byakuswekani̱ya, mukono ghwa bu̱toki̱ na maani̱ ghe, ebi
Luhanga waawe aakoleeseei̱ye kukuuya Mi̱si̱li̱, niikuwo akukola atiyo dhee bantu aba woobahi̱ye.
Bantu aba bangugubha kukuuluka kandi kwebi̱sa, bhaatu
Luhanga waawe akusindika mu bantu aba minkebe kandi akubahwelekeeleli̱ya boona.
Otaboobaha, nanga
Luhanga waawe, oghu abalimu, ni Luhanga wamaani̱ kandi oghu akulekagha bantu boobaha.
Luhanga waawe akubhinga bantu bʼomu mahanga agha bukee-buke. Taaku̱ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba haa mulundi ghumui, nanga binyama byʼomu kisaka bikana kukusaali̱ya.
Luhanga waawe akuleka oghasi̱ngu̱le kandi akubaleetamu butaaghu̱wana bwamaani̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bahwelekeleeye.
Akuleka osi̱ngu̱le bakama baabo, obaate boona kandi obahwelekeeleli̱ye mu nsi. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kukuhakani̱ya, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ohwelekeleei̱ye bantu aba boona.
Bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga baabo mu̱byoki̱ye na mulilo. Otalyeghomba kutwala siliva kedha feeja eghi eli haa bisasani̱ ebi. Nuwaakoli̱ye eki, kikukufookela ki̱ki̱ya, nanga
Luhanga waawe oohi̱ye bisasani̱ ebi.
Otalitwala kintu kyona eki Luhanga aki̱i̱ni̱ye mu numba yaawe. Nuwaaki̱koli̱ye, naawe okukiinuwa nga kintu eki. Okyohe kandi okibhengele kimui nanga kikakiinuwa.
Bilaghilo byona ebi ndimakulaghila obwalo, mweghendeseleje kubikwata niikuwo mube boomi̱i̱li̱, mukane kandi mughende mutwale nsi eghi
aalahiiye kuha baataata baanu.
Oosuke ngoku

Luhanga waawe aakuhikiiye mu lughendo lwa myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa eni mu elungu. Akakola eki ku̱ku̱dhooti̱ya kandi kukulengesa niikuwo agubhe kumanya ebikuli haa mutima, olaba nookwata bilaghilo biye kedha bbaa.

Akaku̱dhooti̱ya haabwa kuleka njala neekukwata, du̱mbi̱ aakuha byokuliya maanu, ebi nankabha uwe kedha baataata baawe mwabaagha mutamani̱ye. Aakola eki ku̱kwegheesi̱ya ngu muntu taakubaagha mwomi̱i̱li̱ haabwa byokuliya byonkaha, bhaatu haabwa kighambo kyona eki
aku̱bu̱ghagha mu kanu̱wa ke.
Ngoye syawe tasyakaakuuye kedha maghulu ku̱ku̱bhi̱mba, mu myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa eni.
Nahabweki okimanye haa mutima ngu, ngoku mubyaye akuhanagha mwana wee, niikuwo naawe
Luhanga waawe akukuhanagha atiyo.
Okwataghe bilaghilo bya
Luhanga waawe, okolaghe ebi abbali̱ye kandi omu̱hu̱ti̱yaghe.
Nanga
Luhanga waawe alimakutwala mu nsi esemeeye, eghi elimu maasi ghakusenda ku̱lu̱gha mu bighona na bwena,
elimu ngano, bbaale
, mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱, biti mi̱ti̱i̱ni̱, mikomamahanga, biti oli̱va na bwoki.
Nsi eghi elimu byokuliya bikani̱ye kandi taaliyo eki̱bu̱li̱yemu̱, elimu bwena obuli na bikuka ebi okugubha kulima kuuyamu byoma.
Olakaliyagha kandi nuwaakuta, osi̱i̱maghe
Luhanga waawe haabwa kukuha nsi eghi esemeeye.
Olole ngu tawaabululuwa
Luhanga waawe, osaaghuwa kukwata ebi akukulaghila, bilaghilo biye na ntu̱wamu siye ebi ndimakuha obwalo.
Obu olaliyaagha kandi nuwaakuta, nuwaakwela manumba ghasemeeye ghaa kuukalamu,
bitunguwa byawe bya nte na mbu̱li̱ mbyakana kandi nuwaatunga siliva na feeja, bintu byawe byona mbyeyongela kukana,
olyepanka kandi oobululuwe
Luhanga waawe oghu akakuuya Mi̱si̱li̱, hambali waabaagha mu̱syana.
Aakukwami̱li̱ya mu elungu lyamaani̱ kandi eli bantu boobaagha, kyalo kyomi̱ye kandi kitalimu maasi, ekyabaaghamu njoka na bunamuntakana. Aakuuhila maasi mu kikuka kyomiiye.
Mu elungu aakuha byokuliya maanu, ebi baataata baawe baabaagha batamani̱ye. Aakola eki ku̱ku̱dhooti̱ya kandi kukulengesa, niikuwo haa kumaliilila akukolele bintu bilungi.
Weelinde, oteeli̱li̱kana haa mutima oti, “Bu̱toki̱ bwanje na maani̱ ghanje niibiyo byaleki̱ye naaba na etungo lini.”
Oosuke
Luhanga waawe, nanga niiye akukuhaagha maani̱ ghaa kuba nʼetungo, niikuwo agu̱mi̱ye ndaghaano eghi aalahiiye ewaa baataata baawe.
Nuwaabuluuwe
Luhanga waawe, okwamilila baaluhanga banji, obaheeleli̱ya kandi obalami̱ya, nkubaghambila majima obwalo nti mulihwelekeelela.
Nga mahanga agha
aku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya naakoleesi̱ya enu̱we, niikuwo aku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya enu̱we nimwabhengi̱ye ku̱hu̱ti̱ya elaka lya
Luhanga waanu.

Ooghu̱we, uwe I̱saaleeli̱, obwalo mukughenda kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, kutaaha kandi kutwala nsi eghi elimu mahanga aghasaai̱ye lyanu kukana kandi maani̱, aghali na bibugha ebili na bigho bikangamiiye kimui ku̱hi̱ka mu mwanya.
Bantu bʼomu nsi eghi mbaamaani̱ kandi bakangami̱ye, baasukulu baa Anaki̱. Bantu aba obamani̱ye kandi waaghu̱u̱ye mbababu̱ghʼo bati, “Ni ani̱ akugubha ku̱si̱ngu̱la baasukulu baa Anaki̱?”
Bhaatu omanye ngu
Luhanga waawe akughenda akuhikiiye, nga mulilo oghu̱kwoki̱yagha bu̱li̱ kintu. Nahabweki okaaku̱lu̱mba ngi̱ghu̱ syawe, kikukudhootela ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba kandi kutwala nsi yabo ngoku
aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.
Luhanga waawe obu alimala kubhinga bantu aba mu nsi eghi nuwaatwete nsi yabo, otalighila haa mutima ghwawe oti, “
andeeti̱ye mu nsi eni kughitwala haabwa bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱le bwanje.” Bbaa,
akubhingamu bantu aba haabwa bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bakukolagha.
Tookutwala nsi eghi nanga uwe kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kedha kukola bintu bilungi, bhaatu bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi bantu aba bakukolagha, niibiyo bikuleka
Luhanga waawe naabhingamu bantu aba nuwaatwete nsi yabo, ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki aalahiiye ewaa baataata baawe, Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo.
Omanye ngu
Luhanga waawe, taakukuha nsi esemeeye eghi kughitwala haabwa bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱le bwawe, nanga muli ntaaghu̱wa.
Oosuke kandi otaabululuwa ngoku waaleki̱ye
Luhanga waawe aasaaliluwa mu elungu, ku̱lu̱gha kilo eki waalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱ki̱dhi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kini, mukuukalagha nimujeemela
Haa mwena Holebbu mukaleka
aasaaliluwa kwonini, aabbala kubahwelekeeleli̱ya.
Obu naani̱i̱ni̱ye haa mwena kutunga bihande bya mabaale ebihandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo ndaghaano eghi
aakoli̱ye naanu, nkamalayo bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa mukilo na ntangaali̱. Ntaakuliya byokuliya kedha kunuwa maasi.
ampa bihande bibili bya mabaale ebi aahandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo na mukono ghuwe eenini, bighambo ebi Luhanga aabu̱ghi̱ye naanu haa mwena ku̱lu̱gha haagati ya mulilo, haa kilo eki ki̱bbu̱la kyanu kyabaaghʼo.
Haa kumaliilila kwa bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa mukilo na ntangaali̱,
ampa bihande bibili bya mabaale. Bihande bihandi̱ki̱yʼo ndaghaano eghi.
Niibuwo
angi̱li̱ye ati, “Olu̱ghe hani okote bwangu, nanga bantu baawe waahi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱ beebhi̱hi̱i̱ye kwonini. Baalu̱ghi̱ye bwangu haa ebi naabalaghiiye kandi beekoleeye kisasani̱ kya kulami̱ya.”
aatodha angila ati, “Bantu aba naaboone, ni ntaaghu̱wa kwonini!
Ondeke, nkubbala kubahwelekeeleli̱ya boona kandi bababululuwe mu nsi. Nkufoola baasukulu baawe ehanga lyamaani̱ kandi elikani̱ye kusaali̱ya ebo.”
Niibuwo neegaai̱ye kandi naatandika kukota ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghu, mulilo ngunaakʼo. Nkaba nkwete bihande bibili bya mabaale bya ndaghaano eghi mu ngalo syanje.
Obu naaloli̱ye, naabona ngoku mwasi̱i̱si̱ye ewaa
Luhanga waanu. Mwekolela kisasani̱ kya kyana kya nte, mukaba nimwalu̱ghi̱yʼo bwangu ebi
aabalaghiiye.
Niibuwo naakwete bihande bibili bya mabaale ebi, naabikuba hansi kandi naabyatakaki̱ya munaloli̱ye.
Naalangaala makpu̱ngbu̱ mu maaso ghaa
ngoku naadu̱bhi̱ye kukola. Naamala bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa, mukilo na ntangaali̱ ntaakuliya byokuliya kedha kunuwa maasi, nanga mukakola kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye mu maaso ghaa
kandi mwaleka aasaaliluwa.
Nkoobaha ki̱i̱ni̱gha kandi kusaaliluwa kwa
, nanga akaba asaaluuwe kwonini naanu kubahwelekeeleli̱ya. Bhaatu aatodha anji̱ghu̱wa.
akaba asaaluuwe kwonini na Alooni̱ kandi naabbala kumwita, bhaatu bwile obu naasabila dhee Alooni̱.

Naakwata kintu ekyabalu̱ghi̱i̱yemu kibhi, kyana kya nte eki mwakoli̱ye, naakyoki̱ya mu mulilo. Naakikpeetaagula kandi naakisiya kyafooka tu̱u̱tu̱, naaseesa tu̱u̱tu̱ eghi mu maasi aghaasendagha ku̱lu̱gha mu myena.
Ebi mwakoli̱ye e Tabbela, Masa na Ki̱bbu̱loti̱-hatava, bikaleka dhee
aasaaliluwa.
Bwile obu
aabaghila ati, “Mu̱lu̱ghe Kadesi̱-bbaluneya, mughende mutwale nsi eghi naabahaaye.” Mwamujeemela, mwabhenga kumwesigha kandi ku̱hu̱ti̱ya elaka liye.
Mukuukalagha nimujeemela
, ku̱lu̱gha haa kilo eki naabamaniiyemu.
Naalangaala makpu̱ngbu̱ mu maaso ghaa
haabwa bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa mukilo na ntangaali̱, nanga
akaba naaghi̱li̱ye ati akubahwelekeeleli̱ya.
Naasaba
, nti, “Ai̱
Luhanga, otahwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba, abali bugwetuwa bwawe, aba waacunguuye ku̱lu̱gha Mi̱si̱li̱ haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwawe kandi mukono ghwawe ghwamaani̱.
Gutu otalola butalibani̱ja bwa bantu bani, bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱ye bakukolagha kandi kibhi kyabo, bhaatu oosuke eki waalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye baheeleli̱ya baawe, Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo.
Nuwahwelekeleei̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba, Banami̱si̱li̱ bakughila bati, ‘
taagu̱bhi̱ye kubatwala mu nsi eghi aabalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye. Akabooha kandi kyaleka aabatwala mu elungu kubaatilayo.’
Bhaatu ni bantu baawe, abali bugwetuwa bwawe aba waahi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱ haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwawe kandi mukono ghwawe ghwamaani̱.”
Bwile obu
angila ati, “Obhaake bihande bibili bya mabaale ebi̱su̱si̱ye ngʼebi waadu̱bhi̱ye kubhaaka kandi wiise nabiyo haa mwena hambali ndi. Okole dhee sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya mbaau.
Nkuhandiikʼo bighambo ngʼebi naadu̱bhi̱ye kuhandiika haa bihande bibili bya mabaale byʼoku̱du̱bha ebi waatakaki̱i̱ye. Ote bihande ebi mu sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi.”
Niibuwo naakoli̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ mu mbaau sya ki̱i̱lu̱mbo, naabhaaka bihande bya mabaale ebi̱su̱si̱ye nga byʼoku̱du̱bha. Naani̱i̱na haa mwena nkwete bihande bibili bya mabaale ebi mu ngalo syanje.
aahandiika haa bihande ebi bighambo ngʼebi aadu̱bhi̱ye kuhandiika, bilaghilo eku̱mi̱ ebi aabalaghiiye ali haagati ya mulilo, kilo eki ki̱bbu̱la kyanu kyabaagha mu nti̱na ya mwena oghu.
aabimpa.
Niibuwo naaku̱u̱ki̱ye ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghu, bihande ebi naabita mu sandu̱u̱ku̱ ngoku
andaghiiye kandi binalimu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.
(Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱gha mu kyalo kya byahu̱dhu̱ bya Banayakaani, baaki̱dha Mosela. Alooni̱ aakwi̱la Mosela kandi baamujiikayo. Mwana wee Eli̱yeeja aakuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye nga mu̱hongi̱.
Obu baalu̱ghi̱yʼo, baaghenda e Gu̱di̱goda, beeyongela kandi baaki̱dha Yoti̱bbota, nsi eghi elimu maasi ghakani̱ye ghakusenda.
Bwile obu
aakomamu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ kuheekagha sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
kandi kwemililagha mu maaso ghe ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya na kuha bantu mu̱gi̱sa mu li̱i̱na liye, ngoku kinaakukoluwa endindi.
Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ bataatunga mughabo kedha bugwetuwa bwa etaka nga baghenji̱ baabo,
niiye bugwetuwa bwabo, ngoku
Luhanga waawe aabaghambiiye.)
Naakala haa mwena mu maaso ghaa
bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa mukilo na ntangaali̱, ngoku naadu̱bhi̱ye kukola.
aatodha anji̱ghu̱wa kandi aasi̱i̱ma kutabahwelekeeleli̱ya.
Niibuwo
angi̱li̱ye ati, “Oomuke, oghende ohikile bantu aba, niikuwo baghende kandi batunge nsi eghi naalahiiye kuha baataata baabo.”
Uwe I̱saaleeli̱, bini niibiyo bintu
Luhanga waawe akubbala ati okole: ku̱hu̱ti̱ya
Luhanga waawe, kukola ebi abbali̱ye, kumukunda, ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya na mutima ghwawe ghwona na mwoyo ghwawe ghwona
kandi kukwata bilaghilo bya
byona ebi ndimaghenda kukuha obwalo niikuwo obe kulungi.
Omanye ngu mwanya nʼeghulu munu mbya
Luhanga waawe, nsi nʼebilimu byona mbiye dhee.
Bhaatu
akabbala munu baataata baawe kandi aabakunda. Aakomamu enu̱we baasukulu baabo, mu bantu baa mu nsi yoona kandi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi muli bantu be.
Nahabweki mube badhooti̱ kandi mutatodha kuba ntaaghu̱wa.
Nanga
Luhanga waanu ni Luhanga wa baaluhanga kandi Mukama wa bakama, ni Luhanga mukulu, oghu ali na bu̱toki̱ kandi oghu bantu boobahi̱ye. Taakusoloolagha bantu kandi taaku̱si̱i̱magha ngu̱ji̱.
Akulolagha ngu nku̱u̱bbi̱ na bakwi̱si̱ya baabatwalikani̱ya kusemeeye. Aku̱ndi̱ye banamahanga abaakaaye naanu. Akubahaagha byokuliya kandi byaku̱lu̱wala.
Nahabweki mukunde munamahanga, nanga naanu mukaba muli banamahanga mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Ohu̱ti̱yaghe
Luhanga waawe kandi omu̱heeleli̱yaghe. Omugumilʼo kandi olahilaghe nooku̱mi̱ya li̱i̱na liye.
Eye enkaha niiye Luhanga waawe, oghu oli na kusinda. Niiye akakola bintu byamaani̱ kandi bya kwobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya ebi waaboone na maaso ghaawe.
Baataata baawe abaaghendi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱ bakaba bali nsanju̱ bonkaha, bhaatu endindi
Luhanga waawe aaleki̱ye mwakana nga nsooli̱ya syʼomu mwanya.
Okunde
Luhanga waawe kandi okwataghe bwile bwona ebi akukughambila, ntu̱wamu siye kandi ebi akukulaghila.
Muusuke obwalo ngu baana baanu taaniibo baaboone kandi baamanya kuhana kwa
Luhanga waanu, bukulu buwe, mukono ghwa bu̱toki̱ na maani̱ ghe.
Tabaaboone bwakulolelʼo na bintu aakoli̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, naabikolʼo Falaaho mukama wa Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi na nsi yee yoona.
Obu mahe ghaa Banami̱si̱li̱ baabahumagha bali mu bigaali̱ byabo, mukabona ngoku
aaleki̱ye baadhikila na nkai̱na syabo mu Nanja Mutuku kandi baahwelekeela ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obwalo.
Baana baanu tabaaboone ngoku
, aaloleleeye enu̱we mu elungu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱ki̱dhi̱ye hani.
Mukabona ngoku

aaleki̱ye nsi yeesama haagati ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona, hansi ya weema sya Dataani̱ na Abbilaamu baana baa Eli̱yaabu, baasukulu baa Leu̱bbeeni̱. Nsi yaabamela na maka ghaabo, bisolo byabo na weema syabo.
Mwabona na maaso ghaanu, bintu byamaani̱ byona ebi
aakoli̱ye.
“Nahabweki mukwate bilaghilo byona ebi nkubaghambila obwalo, niikuwo mube na maani̱ ghaa ku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi mukubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kutwala.
Nimwabikwete, mukuukala bwile bukani̱ye mu nsi eghi
aalahiiye kuha baataata baanu, naanu baasukulu baabo, nsi eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki.

Nsi eghi mu̱ku̱ki̱dhamu kutwala, teeli nga nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ eghi mwabaagha muukaayemu, hambali mwahelagha ndimo yaanu kandi mukola na maani̱ kughiseesangila maasi, ngoku bakuseesangagha maasi mu musili ghwa bulaala.
Bhaatu nsi eghi mukubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kutwala, ni nsi eghi elimu bwena na bighona kandi eghi ekutoonaghamu mbu̱la ekani̱ye.
Nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akughiloleelelagha kandi aghilinda bwile bwona, ku̱lu̱gha haa ntandiko ya mwaka ku̱hi̱ka haa kumaliilila kwaghuwo.
“Nahabweki mukwataghe na bwesighibuwa bilaghilo ebi ndimabalaghila obwalo. Mukundaghe
Luhanga waanu kandi mu̱mu̱heeleli̱yaghe na mutima ghwanu ghwona na mwoyo ghwanu ghwona.
Kaakuba mukola eki, alatooni̱yagha mbu̱la mu nsi yaanu mu bwile bwa elobe na butali bwa elobe, niikuwo mube na byokuliya bikani̱ye, vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka kandi magita.
Mu mali̱i̱si̱li̱yo ghaanu alalekagha bi̱si̱ngo bikani̱ye bituwemu bya bisolo byanu kuliya kandi naanu mulaliyagha byokuliya kandi muukute.
Mweghendeseleje haa mitima yaanu kuteedimaaga ku̱lu̱ghʼo
, kulami̱ya kandi ku̱heeleli̱ya baaluhanga banji.
Nimwakoli̱ye eki,
akusaaliluwa naanu kandi atange mbu̱la kutoona mu nsi yaanu. Etaka lyanu tali̱kweli̱ya bilimuwa kandi mukuhwelekeelela bwangu mu nsi esemeeye eghi
akubaha.
“Bighambo byanje obikwate haa mitima ghwawe na byeli̱li̱kano byawe. Obyebohaghe nga kabonelo haa mukono ghwawe kandi obi̱lu̱walaghe haa bhu̱u̱su̱.
Obyegheesi̱yaghe baana baawe kandi obi̱bu̱ghaghʼo ositami̱ye e ka, noolubhatanga mu kihanda, olangaaye kandi oomu̱ki̱ye.
Obihandiikaghe haa bi̱ji̱ngi̱li̱jo bya njighi sya manumba ghaawe kandi haa maageeti̱ ghaawe,
niikuwo enu̱we na baana baanu muukale bwile bukani̱ye mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waanu aalahiiye kuha baataata baanu. Bakughiikalamu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya eghulu na nsi bihooyʼo.
Mukwate na bwesighibuwa byona ebi naabalaghiiye. Mukunde
Luhanga waanu, mukole byona ebi akubalaghila kandi mumubeele beesighibuwa.
akubhinga bantu bʼomu mahanga agha, nimwatwete nsi eghi, niikuwo mu̱si̱ngu̱le mahanga ghaanamu̱li̱to kandi aghabasaaye maani̱.

Ki̱i̱kalo kyona hambali mu̱ku̱kpeeti̱ya kighele kyanu, kikuba kyanu. Kyalo kyanu ki̱ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la mu elungu eku̱wa ku̱hi̱ka Lebbanooni̱ elughulu kandi ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la haa maasi Efulaati̱ bu̱lu̱gha ejooba ku̱hi̱ka haa Nanja ya bughuwa ejooba.
Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akubahakani̱ya.
Luhanga waanu ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye, hoona hambali mulakaghendagha alalekagha bantu baaboobahe.
“Obwalo ndimabaghambila bintu bibili mwekomelemu, mu̱gi̱sa kedha mukiino.
Mukutunga mu̱gi̱sa, nimwakwete bilaghilo bya
Luhanga waanu ebi ndimabalaghila obwalo,
bhaatu mukukiinuwa, mutaakwete bilaghilo bya
Luhanga waanu kandi mu̱lu̱ghʼo ebi nkubalaghila obwalo, mukwamilila baaluhanga banji, aba mutamani̱ye.
Luhanga waawe akaakukutwala mu nsi eghi oku̱ki̱dhamu kutwala, oli na kulangilila ngoku bantu bakutunga mu̱gi̱sa haa mwena Geli̱ji̱i̱mu̱ kandi batunge mukiino haa mwena Ebbali.
Myena ebili eghi eli luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱, mu nsi ya Banakanaani̱, abaakaaye mu kighona kya Yolodaani̱, ekilolaane na tau̱ni̱ ya Gi̱li̱gaali̱, haai na bi̱i̱looku̱ bya Moole.
Muli haai kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, kutwala nsi eghi
Luhanga waanu akubaha. Mukaakutwala nsi eghi kandi nimwaghiikalamu,
mweghendeseleje kukwata bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebi ndimabaha obwalo.”
Sini niisiyo ntu̱wamu na bilaghilo ebi muli na kweghendeseleja kukwata mu nsi eghi
Luhanga wa baataata baawe, akukuha kutwala. Muli na kubikwata bwile bwona mukuukala munsi.

Mu nsi eghi mukutwala, mu̱hwelekeeleli̱ye kwonini bi̱i̱kalo byona hambali bantu bakulami̱li̱yagha baaluhanga baabo, ebili haa myena ekangami̱ye, haa bwena kandi hansi ya bu̱li̱ kiti kya ki̱si̱ka kibisi.

Mugenge hansi byakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byabo, muhenange mpaghi syabo sya mabaale mu bi̱twi̱ka-twi̱ke. Mwoki̱ye mpaghi syabo sya luhanga wabo Asela mu mulilo, mujombakake bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga baabo kandi mubahwelekeeleli̱ye niikuwo batatodha kuusuka mali̱i̱na ghaabo mu bi̱i̱kalo ebi.
Mutalami̱ya
Luhanga waanu ngoku bantu aba bakulami̱yagha baaluhanga baabo.
Bhaatu
Luhanga waanu akukoma ki̱i̱kalo mu ntu̱la syanu hambali bakumulami̱li̱ya kandi akuukala. Mughendaghe mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.
Muhongelagheyo bihonguwa byanu byokeei̱ye na bihonguwa byanu binji, kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kyanu na bisembo binji, ebi mulahiiye kuha
, bisembo binji ebi mukubbala kuhaayo na bihonguwa bya mi̱li̱ghaaso ya bisolo byanu bya nte na ntaama.
Munali mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
akukoma, mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waanu, enu̱we na maka ghaanu, muliyaghe kandi mudheedhuwaghe haabwa byona ebi mwakoli̱ye na mikono yaanu kandi
Luhanga waawe aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa waatunga.
Bwile obu bukaaku̱hi̱ka, mutakola ngoku mukwete kukola. Enu̱we boona ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi mukulami̱yagha ngoku mubbali̱ye,
nanga tamukaki̱dhi̱ye mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waanu akubaha nga bugwetuwa, hambali mukugubha kuukala mpempa.
Mukaakubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, mu̱ku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waanu akubaha kandi mughiikalemu. Akubalinda mu ngi̱ghu̱ syanu syona kandi mukuukala mpempa.

Luhanga waanu akukoma ki̱i̱kalo hambali bakumulami̱li̱ya, mutwalagheyo bu̱li̱ kintu kyona eki nkubalaghila: bihonguwa byanu byokeei̱ye na bihonguwa byanu binji, kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kyanu na bihonguwa binji na bisembo ebi mulahiiye kuha
Munali mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, mudheedheluwaghe mu maaso ghaa

Luhanga waanu, enu̱we na batabani̱ baanu na bahala baanu, baheeleli̱ya baanu baabusaasa na baabukali̱ na Mu̱leevi̱ oghu ali mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaanu, muusuke ngu mu nsi yaanu eghi Mu̱leevi̱ taaliyo na bugwetuwa.
Weeghendeseleje kutahongela bihonguwa byawe mu ki̱i̱kalo kyona eki obbali̱ye.
Bhaatu ki̱i̱kalo eki
Luhanga waawe akukoma mu emui haa ntu̱la syawe, haaliiyo waahongelagha bihonguwa byawe byokeei̱ye kandi okolagheyo byona ebi nkukulaghila.
Bhaatu oli na bughabe kusala kandi kuliya bisolo byawe mu maatau̱ni̱ hambali ookaaye. Okugubha kuliya bisolo bikani̱ye ebi
Luhanga waawe akukuha. Enu̱we boona, abe oghu eeli̱ye kedha ateeli̱ye, akugubha kubiliya, ngoku anguliya mpala kedha ngabi.
Mutaliliya saghama ya bisolo ebi, bhaatu mughiseesaghe hansi nga maasi.
Otaliliila mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya bilimuwa byawe, vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka, magita kedha mi̱li̱ghaaso ya nte syawe kedha ntaama syawe kedha bisembo ebi olahiiye kuha
, bihonguwa binji okubbala kuhaayo kedha bihonguwa binji byona.
Uwe na batabani̱ baawe na bahala baawe, na baheeleli̱ya baawe, na Baleevi̱ abaakaaye mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe, oliile bihonguwa ebi mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe mu ki̱i̱kalo eki akukoma. Oli na kudheedheluwayo mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe haabwa byona waakoli̱ye na mikono yaawe.
Weeghendeseleje kutanaghi̱li̱ja Baleevi̱, bwile bwona okuukala mu nsi yaawe eghi.
Luhanga waawe akaakugbaatikani̱ya kyalo kyawe ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye, okugubha kuliya nyama bwile bwona obbali̱ye.
Ki̱i̱kalo eki
Luhanga waawe akukoma kumulami̱li̱yamu, nkyabaaye kiseleeye kimui naawe, oli na bughabe kusala simui haa nte kedha ntaama esi
aakuhaaye ngoku naakulaghiiye kandi kuliila nyama esi mu ka yaawe ngoku obbali̱ye.
Muntu weena oghu eeli̱ye na oghu ateeli̱ye akugubha kuliya nyama esi, ngoku anguliya nyama sya mpala kedha ngabi.
Otaliliya nyama esinalimu saghama, nanga bwomi̱i̱li̱ buli mu saghama, otaliya bwomi̱i̱li̱ na nyama.
Otaliliya saghama, bhaatu oghiseesaghe hansi nga maasi.
Nuwaahu̱ti̱i̱ye eki nkukulaghila eki,
akudheedhuwa kandi uwe na baasukulu baawe mukuba kulungi.
Bhaatu otwalaghe bihonguwa byawe na bisembo binji ebi waalahiiye kuha, mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
akukoma.
Ohongeleyo bihonguwa byawe byokeei̱ye haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
Luhanga waawe. Ohongaghe dhee bihonguwa ebi okuliya nyama syabiyo bhaatu saghama ya bisolo ebi oghiseesaghe haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa.
Weeghendeseleje kukwata bighambo bini byona ebi naakulaghiiye, okuba kulungi, uwe na baasukulu baawe bilo nʼebilo, nanga okuba nookola eki̱hi̱ki̱ye kandi eki̱dheedhi̱ye
Luhanga waawe.
Luhanga waawe aku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu bʼomu mahanga agha oli haai ku̱ki̱dhamu kandi kutwala. Okaakubhingamu bantu aba kandi nuwaakala mu nsi yabo,

weeghendeseleje kwegenga mu ki̱ki̱ya kya kukwamilila mi̱ghendi̱yo yabo kandi kulami̱ya baaluhanga baabo. Otabu̱u̱li̱ya ebikwetʼo baaluhanga baabo oti, “Bantu bani bakulami̱yagha bati̱ya baaluhanga baabo? Nanje nkubbala kulami̱ya nga bantu aba.”
Otalilami̱ya
Luhanga waawe ngoku ebo bakukolagha, nanga bakaakubaagha mbalami̱ya baaluhanga baabo, bakukolagha bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye byona ebi
oohi̱ye. Bakwoki̱yagha nankabha batabani̱ baabo na bahala baabo mu mulilo nga bihonguwa ewaa baaluhanga baabo.
Mulole ngu mwakoli̱ye byona ebi naabalaghiiye, mutalyongelʼo kedha kuuyʼo.
Kaakuba mulangi̱ kedha oghu akusoboololagha ndooti̱ aboneka mu enu̱we kandi alangilila ngu hakubʼo kabonelo kedha kyakuswekani̱ya
kandi kabonelo kedha kyakuswekani̱ya aabu̱ghi̱yʼo kibʼo. Kaakuba aghila ati, “Wiise tughende tulami̱ye baaluhanga banji,” baaluhanga aba otakalami̱yaghʼo,
otategheeleli̱ya mulangi̱ oghu.
Luhanga waanu akuba naakoleesi̱ya bantu aba kulengesa enu̱we kumanya mukaakuba mu̱mu̱ku̱ndi̱ye na mutima ghwanu ghwona na mwoyo ghwanu ghwona.
Muli na kukwamilila
Luhanga waanu, mu̱hu̱ti̱ye elaka liye, mukwate bilaghilo biye, mu̱mu̱u̱ghu̱we, mu̱mu̱heeleli̱ye kandi mumugumilʼo.
Bhaatu mwite mulangi̱ weena kedha oghu akusoboololagha ndooti̱ oghu akubaghambila kujeemela
Luhanga waanu, oghu akabacungula ku̱lu̱gha Mi̱si̱li̱ hambali mwabaagha basyana. Bantu aba bakuba mbakola bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kandi mbalengʼo kukuuya haa mulingo
Luhanga waawe aakulaghiiye kuukalamu. Obaate boona niikuwo weehiyemu kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki.

Kaakuba mwana wanjoko waawe, mutabani̱ waawe, muhala waawe, mukali̱ waawe oghu obbali̱ye, kedha bhootu̱ syawe eenini, akusoona-soona mu ki̱bi̱so naaghila ati, “Wiise tughende tulami̱ye baaluhanga banji,” aba nankabha uwe na baataata baawe mutamani̱ye,
baaluhanga baa bantu abali haai naawe na abaselaane naawe ku̱lu̱gha haa mpande syona,
otasi̱i̱ma muntu nʼomui mu ebo kukusoona-soona kandi otamu̱tegheeleli̱ya, otamughilila kisa kandi otabi̱sa ebi akwete kukola.
Bhaatu oli na kumwita, aanuuwe waadu̱bha kumuhuula mabaale, du̱mbi̱ bantu banji boona bamuhuule mabaale.
Omuhuule mabaale aku̱we, nanga akwete kulengʼo kukusoona-soona ku̱lu̱ghʼo
Luhanga waawe, oghu akakuuya Mi̱si̱li̱, hambali waabaagha mu̱syana.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baku̱u̱ghu̱wa ekyabaayʼo kandi bakwobaha. Taaliyo oghu akutodha kukola kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ngʼeki.
Mu emui mu maatau̱ni̱ agha
Luhanga waawe akukuha kuukalamu, wangu̱u̱ghu̱wa
ngu bantu babhi bʼomu ehanga lyawe bakwete kuhabi̱i̱si̱ya bantu aba baakaaye nabo mu tau̱ni̱ emui, mbaghila bati, “Muleke tughende tulami̱ye baaluhanga banji,” baaluhanga aba mutamani̱ye.
Nuwaaghu̱u̱ye makulu agha, obu̱u̱li̱lili̱ye bhyani. Kaakuba ghaba majima ngu kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki kyabaayʼo,
oote bantu boona abaakaaye mu tau̱ni̱ eghi na bitunguwa byabo byona. Ohwelekeeleli̱ye kimui tau̱ni̱ eghi.
Bintu byona bya bantu abaakaayemu obikumaani̱li̱ye hamui kandi obilunde haagati ya tau̱ni̱ eghi. Wooki̱ye tau̱ni̱ eghi na bu̱li̱ kintu kyona ekilimu nga kihonguwa kyokeei̱ye ewaa
Luhanga waawe. Tau̱ni̱ eghi ehwelekeelele bilo nʼebilo kandi etalitodha kukweluwa.
Otalyebiikila kintu kyona ekili kyakuhwelekeelela, niikuwo
aleke kusaaliluwa kuwe kukani̱ye kandi akughilile kisa. Akukughilila kisa kandi aleke okula-kulane ngoku aalahiiye ewaa baataata baawe,
kaakuba ohu̱ti̱ya elaka lya
Luhanga waawe, okwata bilaghilo biye byona ebi nkukuha obwalo kandi okola ebi
Luhanga waawe abbali̱ye.
Enu̱we muli baana baa
Luhanga waanu. Muteetalangagha kandi muteeghembagha esoke lya haa bhu̱u̱su̱ haabwa muntu oghu aaku̱u̱ye.
Enu̱we muli bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Luhanga waanu kandi
akabakoma kuba bantu be baa mbaghani̱ja ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu boona abali munsi.
Otaliliya kintu kyona eki̱teeli̱ye ewaa
Mukugubha kuliya bisolo bini: nte, ntaama, mbu̱li̱,
mpala, ngabi, kaabbudhe kandi nsama.
Mukugubha kuliya bisolo byona ebili na bikaato ebighabaane kandi ebikuliyaagha ebi byeku̱u̱mi̱ye.

Bhaatu taaliyo bisolo mukugubha kuliya kuuyʼo bili na bikaato ebighabaane kandi ebikutaku̱nagha ebi byeku̱u̱mi̱ye. Mutaliliya ngamila, kaawakame kedha nsi̱mba. Nankabha mbikuliyaagha ebi byeku̱u̱mi̱ye, tabili na bikaato ebighabaane, nahabweki tabyeli̱ye ewaanu.
Mpunu, nankabha eli na bikaato ebighabaane, teekuliyaagha ebi yeeku̱u̱mi̱ye, nahabweki tayeeli̱ye ewaanu. Mutaliliya nyama sya bisolo ebi kedha ku̱ku̱ma haa mi̱ku̱ yabiyo.
Mu nsu̱i̱ syona esili mu maasi, mukugubha kuliya esili na biisaabbiya kandi bi̱ku̱ku̱.
Bhaatu kihanguwa kyona ekili mu maasi ekitali na biisaabbiya kandi bi̱ku̱ku̱, mutalikiliya, nanga takyeli̱ye.
Noni̱ yoona eghi yeeli̱ye mughiliyaghe.
Bhaatu mutaliliya noni̱ sini: kibebe, bi̱noni̱ bya milingo yoona ebikuliyaagha mi̱ku̱,
ki̱i̱ku̱kwebe kiimutuku, ki̱i̱ku̱kwebe kinjilaghu̱li̱ kya mulingo ghwona,
kinamungoogha kya bu̱li̱ mulingo,
maaya, noni̱ esikubungagha mukilo, noni̱ syʼomu maasi na kahungu kaa bu̱li̱ mulingo.
Ki̱hu̱u̱ghu̱lu̱ kiinabwana, nseku̱me, ki̱hu̱u̱ghu̱lu̱ kinjelu,
ki̱hu̱u̱ghu̱lu̱ kyʼomu elungu, esamba, bi̱noni̱ bya nanja ebi bakughilaghamu nsekeeli̱,
biikalooli̱ bya bu̱li̱ mulingo, kaabhu̱coi̱ kaa bu̱li̱ mulingo, kiisigaila kandi kiikombe.
Bihuka byona ebili na mapapa tabyeli̱ye ewaanu kandi mutalibiliya.
Bhaatu mukugubha kuliya bihuka byona ebili na mapapa kandi ebyeli̱ye ewaanu.
Otaliliya kintu kyona ekyekwi̱li̱i̱ye, okihe munamahanga weena oghu ali mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe. Akugubha kukiliya, kedha oki̱ghu̱li̱ye banamahanga banji, nanga enu̱we muli bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Luhanga waawe kandi muli bantu be.
Kyana kya mbu̱li̱ otali̱ki̱teeki̱ya mati̱i̱ti̱ ghaa ni̱naakiyo.
Obiikaghe kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya ebi weeleei̱ye mu misili yaawe bu̱li̱ mwaka.
Okitwalaghe mu maaso ghaa

Luhanga waawe, mu ki̱i̱kalo eki akukoma kumulami̱li̱yamu. Oliilagheyo haa kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya bilimuwa byawe, vi̱i̱ni̱ yaawe, magita ghaawe, na mi̱li̱ghaaso ya bitunguwa byawe, niikuwo weeghe ku̱hu̱ti̱ya
Luhanga waawe bwile bwona.
Kaakuba lughendo luba lukuseleeye kandi otaakugubha kutwalayo kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kyʼebi
Luhanga waawe aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa waatunga, haabwa ki̱i̱kalo kukuselʼo, eki
Luhanga waawe akukoma kumulami̱li̱yamu.
Oghu̱li̱ye kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya ebi weeleei̱ye kandi oghende okwete sente mu ngalo ositwale mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
Luhanga waawe akukoma.
Okoleesi̱ye sente esi kughulamu byona ebi obbali̱ye: nte, mbu̱li̱, vi̱i̱ni̱, kyakunuwa kyamaani̱ kedha kintu kyona eki obbali̱ye. Uwe na bantu baa ka yaawe muliileyo mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe kandi odheedhuwe.
Otanaghi̱li̱ja Baleevi̱ abali mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe, nanga tabali na mughabo ghwa etaka nga bugwetuwa bwabo.
Haa kumaliilila kwa bu̱li̱ mwaka ghwakasatu, otwalaghe kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya bilimuwa byawe byona kandi okibiikaghe mu sitoowa mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe.
Byokuliya ebi ni bya Baleevi̱ abatali na mughabo kedha bugwetuwa bwabo kandi bya banamahanga, nku̱u̱bbi̱ na bakwi̱si̱ya abaakaaye mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe. Okole eki kandi
Luhanga waawe akukuha mu̱gi̱sa mu byona ebi okukola na mikono yaawe.
Haa kumaliilila kwa bu̱li̱ myaka musanju̱, oghanilaghe mabanja weeholeei̱ye bantu.
Kikoluwaghe mu mulingo ghuni: bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we oghu ahaaye ebanja Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakiye aleke ebanja eli. Atalengʼo ku̱mu̱tongi̱ya, nanga
alangiliiye ngoku ebanja eli litaliyo.
Oghu okugubha ku̱tongi̱ya ni munamahanga, bhaatu kintu kyawe eki Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe ali nakiyo, okileke.
Luhanga waawe akukuha mu̱gi̱sa mu nsi eghi akukuha kutwala nga bugwetuwa. Taaliyo nʼomui mu enu̱we oghu akuba munaku,
kaakuba weeghendeseleja ku̱hu̱ti̱ya elaka lya
Luhanga waawe kandi kukwata ebi nkukulaghila obwalo.
Luhanga waawe akukuha mu̱gi̱sa ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye. Olahaagha mabanja mahanga ghakani̱ye, bhaatu toolaghilagha oti ebo bakuhe ebanja. Olalemagha mahanga ghakani̱ye, bhaatu ebo tabalakulemagha.
Kaakuba mu emui mu maatau̱ni̱ mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha abamu Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe oghu ali munaku, otaba na mutima ghwomakakaane kandi obhenga kumukoonela.
Bhaatu obe mwenge kandi omweholi̱ye byona ebi akwetaghisibuwa.

Otabhenga ku̱mweholi̱ya, weeli̱li̱kana haa mutima oti, “Mwaka ghwamusanju̱ ghuli haai ku̱hi̱ka, oghu nkuleka mabanja neeholeei̱ye bantu.” Otaleka kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki nkikwisa mu byeli̱li̱kano byawe. Nuwaabhengi̱ye ku̱mweholi̱ya, akukuliliilila ewaa
kandi oku̱si̱ngu̱wa musango haabwa kibhi eki.
Omuheele busa na mutima ghumui kandi mamuha oleke kuba nʼeki okweli̱li̱kana.
Luhanga waawe akukuha mu̱gi̱sa mu byona ebi okukola kandi ebi okutegheka kukola.
Banaku bakuba mu nsi eghi bwile bwona, nahabweki ndimakulaghila kuba mwenge haa Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe munaku nʼoghu ali mu bwetaagho.
Kaakuba baku̱ghu̱li̱ya Muhebbulaayo muunakyawe wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱, ali na ku̱ku̱heeleli̱ya haabwa myaka mukaagha bhaatu mwaka ghwamusanju̱ omuleke aghende atakusasuuye kantu koona.
Mamuleka kughenda, otaleka naaghenda atali na kantu.
Omuhe na bwenge haa ebi
Luhanga waawe aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa waatunga, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntaama syawe, mbu̱li̱, bilimuwa byawe na vi̱i̱ni̱ yaawe.
Oosuke ngoku waabaagha mu̱syana mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi
Luhanga waawe aakucungula, niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye ninkulaghila kukola eki obwalo.
Bhaatu mu̱syana waawe oghu naanaku̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Tambali̱ye ku̱ku̱lu̱ghʼo,” nanga aku̱ku̱ndi̱ye na bantu baa ka yaawe kandi akubbala kuukala naawe,
du̱mbi̱ omutwale haa lwighi lwa numba yaawe, omutobhole kutui na ngilaghilo, afooke mu̱syana waawe bilo nʼebilo. Haaliikuwo waakola dhee mu̱syana waawe wabukali̱.
Kitatimbiikana kumuleka kughenda, nanga myaka mukaagha aaku̱heeleei̱ye yengaane na kimui kyakabili kya muhendo oghu wangusasuuye muntu oghu opangi̱si̱i̱ye ku̱ku̱heeleli̱ya. Nuwaamu̱leki̱ye aghenda,
Luhanga waawe akukuha mu̱gi̱sa mu byona ebi okukola.
Mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya nte, ntaama na mbu̱li̱ syawe, obihaagheyo ewaa
Luhanga waawe. Mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya nte otasi̱koleesi̱yagha milimo kandi mi̱li̱ghaaso yoona yabusaasa ya ntaama otasijombagha byoha.
Bu̱li̱ mwaka uwe na bantu baa ka yaawe muliilaghe mi̱li̱ghaaso eghi mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe, mu ki̱i̱kalo eki akukoma.
Kaakuba kisolo kiba kili na kamogo, kilamaaye, kiighaaye maaso kedha kili na kamogo kaa mulingo ghwona, otakihongela
Luhanga waawe.
Okugubha kuliila kisolo eki mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe. Enu̱we boona abeeli̱ye na abateeli̱ye mukugubha kukiliya, ngoku mwanguliya mpala kedha ngabi.
Bhaatu saghama ya kisolo eki otalighiliya, oghiseesaghe hansi nga maasi.
Ohu̱ti̱yaghe kweli̱ kwa Abi̱bu̱ kandi okolelaghemu Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo kya
Luhanga waawe, nanga kilo kimui mukilo mu kweli̱ oku niibuwo
Luhanga waawe aaku̱u̱hi̱ye mu Mi̱si̱li̱.
Ohongelaghe
Luhanga waawe kihonguwa kya Kusaaluwʼo, ku̱lu̱gha mu nte syawe na ntaama syawe, mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
akukoma kumulami̱li̱yamu.

Kihonguwa eki otakiliya na migaati̱ elimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so. Okiliyaghe na migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so haabwa bilo musanju̱. Migaati̱ eghi oghiliyaghe kuusuka ngoku waalu̱ghi̱ye bwangu mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi kuusuka ngoku waabona-bonagha, niikuwo mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe bwona oosukaghe kilo eki waalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱.
Mu bilo musanju̱ ebi atabʼo nʼomui mu nsi yaanu oghu ali na ki̱tu̱mbi̱so mu numba yee. Nyama sya kihonguwa waahongi̱ye lwagholo kilo kyʼoku̱du̱bha, musiliye sihuwʼo sitahi̱ki̱ya nkyambisi.
Otalihongela kihonguwa kya Kusaaluwʼo mu emui mu maatau̱ni̱ agha
Luhanga waawe akukuha,
bhaatu mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
Luhanga waawe akukoma kumulami̱li̱yamu. Mu ki̱i̱kalo eki haalimuwo waahongelagha kihonguwa kya Kusaaluwʼo lwagholo, musana ngukota, bwile obu waalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱.
Oteekaghe nyama esi kandi osiliilaghe mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
Luhanga waawe akukoma, du̱mbi̱ nkyambisi okuukaghe mu weema syawe.
Omalaghe bilo mukaagha noonaliya migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so. Haa kilo kyamusanju̱ kya ki̱ghenu̱ eki mwekumaani̱yaghe kulami̱ya
Luhanga waawe. Haa kilo eki otalikola mulimo ghwona.
Muli na kubala wi̱i̱ki̱ musanju̱ ku̱lu̱gha bwile mwatandikiiyemu kukesa bilimuwa byanu,
du̱mbi̱ mukolaghe Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kukesa kya
Luhanga waanu. Muhaagheyo kihonguwa ngoku mubbali̱ye kusighikila haa mu̱gi̱sa oghu
Luhanga waanu abahaaye.
Odheedheluwaghe mu maaso ghaa

Luhanga waawe mu ki̱i̱kalo eki akukoma kumulami̱li̱yamu, uwe na batabani̱ baawe na bahala baawe, baheeleli̱ya baawe baabusaasa na baabukali̱, Mu̱leevi̱ oghu ali mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe, munamahanga, nku̱u̱bbi̱, na mu̱kwi̱si̱ya abaakaaye naawe.
Oosuke ngoku waabaagha mu̱syana mu Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi okwate na kweghendeseleja bilaghilo bini.
Okolaghe Ki̱ghenu̱ kya kulaala mu Bujalaja haabwa bilo musanju̱ haanu̱ma ya kusiya ebi waakesi̱ye kandi kukama vi̱i̱ni̱ yaawe.
Odheedhuwaghe haa ki̱ghenu̱ eki, uwe na batabani̱ baawe na bahala baawe, baheeleli̱ya baawe baabusaasa na baabukali̱, Mu̱leevi̱, munamahanga, nku̱u̱bbi̱ na mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu ali mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe.
Ohu̱ti̱yaghe
Luhanga waawe haabwa kukola ki̱ghenu̱ eki kumala bilo musanju̱ mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
Luhanga waawe akukoma. Odheedhuwaghe nanga
aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa waakesa ebi waakoli̱ye na mikono yaawe.
Basaasa boona mu ehanga lyawe baasaghe mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe milundi esatu bu̱li̱ mwaka mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
akukoma. Baasaghe haa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kusaaluwʼo, Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kukesa na Ki̱ghenu̱ kya kulaala mu Bujalaja. Bataasa mu maaso ghaa
batali na kantu.
Bu̱li̱ omui abhonganuuwe kuhaayo ngoku akugubha kusighikila haa mu̱gi̱sa oghu
Luhanga waawe aamuhaaye.
Okome bacu̱ na balemi̱ banji mu bu̱li̱ tau̱ni̱ eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syawe kandi batwi̱laghe bantu misango mu bwengani̱ja.
Batasoloolagha bantu kandi batalengʼo kuliya ngu̱ji̱, nanga ngu̱ji̱ ekuughalagha maaso muntu wa magheji, oghu ali na bwengani̱ja kandi eleka atwi̱la kubhi muntu musango.
Obe na bwengani̱ja, niikuwo otwale nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha kandi weeyongele kughiikalamu.
Obu olakolagha kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
Luhanga waawe, otalita haakpengbu̱ ya kiyo kaakulolelʼo kaa luhanga wabukali̱ Asela
kandi otalikwela mpaghi ya mabaale ya kulami̱ya, nanga eki
Luhanga waawe akyohi̱ye.
Otalihongela
Luhanga waawe nte kedha ntaama eghi eli na kamogo, nanga eki
Luhanga waawe akyohi̱ye.
Obu olitandika kuukala mu maatau̱ni̱ agha
Luhanga waawe akukuha, mu enu̱we musaasa kedha mukali̱ angukola kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ewaa
Luhanga waawe kandi atu̱wa ndaghaano yee.
Angu̱heeleli̱ya baaluhanga banji kedha kulami̱ya musana, kweli̱ kedha nsooli̱ya syʼomu mwanya ebi
atangi̱ye.
Kaakuba ooghu̱wa makulu agha, obu̱u̱li̱li̱li̱ye bhyani, kaakuba ghaba majima ngu kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki kyabaayʼo mu I̱saaleeli̱,
musaasa kedha mukali̱ oghu aakoli̱ye kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki, omu̱twesi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ eghi kandi omuhuule mabaale aku̱we.
Bhaatu otaata muntu haabwa buukai̱so bwa muntu omui enkaha, hali na kubʼo baakai̱so babili kedha basatu.
Baakai̱so aba haaliibo baaba bʼoku̱du̱bha kumuhuula mabaale, du̱mbi̱ bantu banji boona bamuhuule mabaale. Nuwaakoli̱ye eki, okuuya kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki mu enu̱we.

Naanabaayʼo misango eghi etimbiikaane mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe uwe ku̱ghi̱tu̱wamu, misango nga ya bu̱ji̱ndi̱ kedha ya kutonganilana bintu kedha ya kuhutaalani̱ya kedha ya kwita muntu, oghende mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
Luhanga waawe akukoma.
Oghende mu bahongi̱ baasukulu baa Leevi̱, na mu̱cu̱ oghu akwete kukola mulimo bwile obu obeebu̱u̱li̱yʼo, bakwoleke ntu̱wamu ya misango eghi.
Bakukuha ntu̱wamu yabo kandi oli na kukola kwonini ngoku baakughambiiye mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
akukoma.
Okole kusighikila haa kilaghilo baakwegheeseei̱ye kandi ntu̱wamu baakuhaaye. Otalilengʼo ku̱lu̱gha haa ntu̱wamu eghi baakughambiiye, oghikwamilile kwonini.
Muntu weena oghu akulengʼo kutahu̱ti̱ya mu̱cu̱ kedha mu̱hongi̱ oghu akwete ku̱heeleli̱ya
Luhanga waawe bwile obu, ali na kwitibuwa. Nuwaakoli̱ye eki okuuya kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki mu I̱saaleeli̱.
Bantu boona abaku̱u̱ghu̱wa eki, bakwobaha kandi taaliyo oghu akutodha kulengʼo kwetwalikani̱ya mu mulingo oghu.
Okaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha, nuwaaghitwala kandi nuwaaghiikalamu, okugubha kughila oti, “Oleke neekomele mukama nga mahanga ghanji ghoona agheeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye si̱ye.”
Olole ngu musaasa oghu waakoma abe oghu
Luhanga waawe aakomi̱ye. Ali na ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu baawe. Otakoma munamahanga kukulema, oghu atali Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe.
Mukama oghu ataba na nkai̱na sikani̱ye kandi atatuma bantu mu Mi̱si̱li̱ kughulayo nkai̱na sinji, nanga
akabaghila ati, “Mutalitodha kukuuka mu Mi̱si̱li̱.”
Mukama oghu ataswela bakali̱ bakani̱ye, nanga eki kikuleka alu̱ghʼo
kandi taabhonganuuwe kutunga siliva na feeja ekani̱ye.
Akaakusitama haa ntebe ya bukama, ali na kuhandiika eenini kopi̱ ya kitabo kya bilaghilo eki bahongi̱ Baleevi̱ baabi̱i̱ki̱ye.
Ali na kuukala na kitabo eki haai naye kandi kukisoma mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe bwona, niikuwo eeghe ku̱hu̱ti̱ya
Luhanga wee kandi kukwamilila ntu̱wamu na bilaghilo ebili mu kitabo eki.
Eki kikumukoonela ku̱teeli̱li̱kana haa mutima ati asaai̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakiye kandi kutalu̱ghʼo bilaghilo bya
, niikuwo akole ebi eenini aabbali̱ye. Naakoli̱ye eki, akulema myaka ekani̱ye kandi baasukulu be baleme I̱saaleeli̱ haabwa bwile bukani̱ye.
Bahongi̱ Baleevi̱, bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ yoona, tabakuba na mughabo kedha bugwetuwa nga Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyabo. Balaliyagha haa bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye ebi bantu bahongeeye
nga mughabo ghwabo.
Tabakuba na bugwetuwa mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyabo,
niiye mughabo ghwabo, ngoku aabalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.
Bantu balakahongagha nte kedha ntaama, ohaaghe mu̱hongi̱ ebhango, nsaya syombi na byenda.
Oli na kubaha mughanulo ghwa bilimuwa byawe, vi̱i̱ni̱ yaawe, magita na byoha byʼoku̱du̱bha ojombi̱ye haa ntaama syawe.
Nanga
Luhanga waawe mu ntu̱la syawe syona akakoma ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya nga bahongi̱ bilo nʼebilo.
Mu̱leevi̱ weena oghu abbali̱ye akugubha ku̱lu̱gha mu emui mu maatau̱ni̱ ghʼomu I̱saaleeli̱ aghende mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
akukoma.
Akugubha ku̱heeleli̱yayo nga mu̱hongi̱ wa
Luhanga wee, nga Baleevi̱ baanakiye abakwete ku̱heeleli̱yayo
Ali na kutunga mughabo ghwa byokuliya oghwengaane na ghwa bahongi̱ banji kandi akugubha kubiika sente esi nganda siye simutumiiye ku̱lu̱gha mu ebi baaghu̱li̱i̱ye.
Okaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha, otakola bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ngʼebi bantu baa mahanga agha bakukolagha.
Mutahonga baana baanu mu mulilo haa byakuhongelʼo byanu, mu enu̱we atabamu mu̱ku̱mu̱ kedha oghu akubanduwa mi̱li̱mu̱
kedha oghu akukola maaje kedha oghu aku̱bu̱gha na mi̱li̱mu̱ ya abaaku̱u̱ye.
Luhanga waawe oohi̱ye bantu abakukolagha bintu ebi kandi eki niikiyo kikuleka naabhinga bantu bʼomu mahanga ghaa mu nsi eghi okughendamu.
Obe mwesighibuwa kwonini ewaa
Luhanga waawe.
Mu nsi eghi oli haai kutwala, bantu baayʼo bakughendagha mu baku̱mu̱ kandi mu bantu abakulaghulagha, bhaatu
Luhanga waawe taaku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye kukola ebi.
Bhaatu
Luhanga waawe akukutumila mulangi̱ ngʼanje ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu baawe kandi oli na ku̱mu̱u̱ghu̱wa.
Haa mwena Holebbu, kilo eki ki̱bbu̱la kyawe kyabaaghʼo, okasaba
Luhanga waawe oti, “Ntatodha ku̱u̱ghu̱wa elaka lya
Luhanga wanje kedha kutodha kubona mulilo ghwamaani̱ ghuni, nanga nku̱ku̱wa.”
Nahabweki
angila ati, “Eki baabu̱ghi̱ye ki̱hi̱ki̱ye.
Nkukoma mu baghenji̱ baawe mulangi̱ oghu ali ngʼawe. Nkumuha bighambo bya ku̱bu̱gha, niikuwo aghambile bantu byona ebi nkumulaghila.
Nkufubila weena oghu ataaku̱tegheeleli̱ya bighambo byanje ebi mulangi̱ oghu aku̱bu̱gha mu li̱i̱na lyanje.
Bhaatu mulangi̱ weena oghu akulanga butumuwa bwa bisubha mu li̱i̱na lyanje kedha ku̱bu̱gha mu li̱i̱na lya luhanga onji, aatibuwaghe.”
Nuwaanaghi̱li̱ye haa mutima ghwawe oti, “Nkumanya nti̱ya butumuwa obu bulaba bu̱lu̱ghi̱ye ewaa
Kaakuba mulangi̱ aabu̱gha mu li̱i̱na lya
kandi eki aabu̱ghi̱ye kitabʼo, obu tabuli butumuwa obu̱lu̱ghi̱ye ewaa
. Mulangi̱ oghu akuba naabu̱gha haabwa maani̱ ghe kandi otamwobaha.
Obu
Luhanga waawe aku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu bʼomu mahanga ghaa mu nsi eghi akukuha, okutwala nsi yabo eghi kandi ookale mu maatau̱ni̱ na manumba ghaabo.
Oli na kukoma bibugha bisatu bya kuulukilamu mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha.
Obungile mu kyalo eki kandi otu̱wemu bi̱twi̱ke bisatu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha. Mu bu̱li̱ ki̱twi̱ke habemu kibugha hambali muntu oghu aati̱ye muunakiye akugubha kuulukila kujuna bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe.
Kaakuba muntu aata muunakiye atakighendeleeye kandi muntu oghu atali ngi̱ghu̱ yee, akugubha kuulukila mu kimui haa bibugha ebi kujuna bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe.

Muntu angugubha kughenda na muunakiye mu ki̱bhi̱li̱ kuseena nkui, naanahi̱dha ndyankui kujomba kiti, ndyankui ekuulika mu muhini kandi ehuula muunakiye aku̱wa, muntu oghu akugubha kuulukila mu kimui haa bibugha ebi kuukalayo.

Nanga nkyabaaye kibugha kimui, lughendo lwa ku̱ki̱dhayo lukuselela bantu, ti̱ oghu asaaluuwe haabwa muntu wee baati̱ye, akugubha kukwama oghu aamwi̱ti̱ye, amusange mu kihanda kandi amwite, kuni taabaagha abhonganuuwe ku̱ku̱wa, nanga oghu aati̱ye taabaagha ngi̱ghu̱ yee.
Niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye ninkulaghila kukoma bibugha bisatu bya kuulukilamu.
Obu
Luhanga waawe aligbaatikani̱ya kyalo kyawe, ngoku aalahiiye ewaa baataata baawe kandi naakuha nsi yoona eghi aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kuha baataata baawe,
oli na kukoma bibugha binji bisatu. Akukuha nsi eghi kaakuba okwata bilaghilo biye byona ebi nkukulaghila obwalo, okunda
Luhanga waawe kandi okola ebi abbali̱ye.
Okole eki, niikuwo baleke kwitila bantu abatali na musango mu nsi yaawe, eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha nga bugwetuwa kandi otasi̱ngu̱wa musango ghwa kwita muntu.
Bhaatu kaakuba muntu ooha muliilanuwa wee, amwebisiilila, amu̱lu̱mba kandi amwita, du̱mbi̱ aalukila mu kimui haa bibugha ebi,
beebembeli̱ bʼomu kibugha kyʼewaabo batume bantu bamuuyeyo, bamuheyo ewaa oghu asaaluuwe haabwa kwita muntu wee, naye amwite.
Muntu ngʼoghu otamughilila kisa. Oli na kuuya mu I̱saaleeli̱ kibhi kya kwita muntu atali na musango, niikuwo obe kulungi.
Otali̱ku̱lu̱ki̱ya eki bantu baa hambale baataaye mu mutaano ghwawe na muliilanuwa waawe, mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha kutwala nga bugwetuwa bwawe.
Kai̱so omui taakumala kuleka mbasi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya muntu musango haabwa kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye aakoli̱ye, hakili ali na kubʼo baakai̱so babili kedha basatu abakughila bati aakoli̱ye kintu eki.
Kaakuba kai̱so wa bisubha aheela muunakiye buukai̱so bwa bisubha kandi amunyegheelela ati aatu̱u̱ye musango,
bantu babili aba oghu anyegheleeye nʼoghu banyegheleeye, bali na kwemilila mu maaso ghaa
, mu maaso ghaa bahongi̱ na bacu̱ abakwete kukola mulimo bwile obu.
Bacu̱ aba bali na ku̱bu̱u̱li̱li̱li̱ya bhyani, kaakuba babona ngu kai̱so oghu ni wa bisubha kandi niibuwo aahangilila muunakiye,
muli na kumuha kifubilo eki aabbalagha muunakiye kutunga. Nuwaakoli̱ye eki, okuuya kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki mu enu̱we.
Bantu banji bakaaku̱u̱ghu̱wa ekyabaayʼo, bakwobaha kandi taaliyo oghu akutodha kukola kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ngʼeki mu enu̱we.

Bantu ngʼaba otabaghilila kisa. Oghu akwita muunakiye, omwite, oghu akumuuyamu li̱i̱so, omuuyemu li̱i̱so, oghu akumukobha li̱i̱no, omukobhe li̱i̱no, oghu akumujombʼo mukono, omujombʼo mukono kandi oghu akumujombʼo kighele, omujombʼo kighele.
Obu olaghendagha kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syawe, nuwaabona bali na nkai̱na, bigaali̱ na mahe ghasaaye ghaawe, otaboobaha, nanga
Luhanga waawe, oghu akakuuya mu Mi̱si̱li̱ akuba ali hamui naawe.
Obu mulabaagha muli haai kughenda kulwana nabo, mu̱hongi̱ aasaghe mu maaso, abu̱ghi̱laghe mahe ghaanu.
Aghilaghe ati, “Ooghu̱we, uwe I̱saaleeli̱, obwalo mukughenda kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syanu, mitima yaanu etatuntula, mutaboobaha, mutahuwa maani̱ kandi mutatukumila.
Luhanga waanu akughenda naanu kulwani̱i̱si̱ya ngi̱ghu̱ syanu kandi akubaha bu̱si̱ngu̱li̱.”

Bakulu baa mahe baghile baasilikale baabo bati, “Buuye haliyo muntu weena mu enu̱we oghu akweye numba mpyaka oghu atakaghitaahi̱ye? Akuuke e ka, nanga angu̱kwi̱la haa bulemo kandi muntu onji aghitaaha.
Buuye haliyo muntu weena oghu akoli̱ye musili ghwa mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ bhaatu atakaliiye haa bi̱ghu̱ma ebi? Akuuke e ka, nanga angu̱kwi̱la haa bulemo kandi muntu onji aliya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ eghi.
Buuye haliyo muntu weena oghu alu̱ghi̱ye mukali̱ bhaatu atakamusweye? Akuuke e ka, nanga angu̱kwi̱la haa bulemo kandi muntu onji aswela mukali̱ oghu.”
Bakulu baa mahe beeyongele ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye haliyo oghu oobahi̱ye kandi atagu̱mi̱ye mutima? Akuuke e ka, nanga anguleka baanakiye bataguma mutima.”
Haanu̱ma ya bakulu baa baasilikale aba kumala ku̱bu̱gha na baasilikale baabo, bakomaghe abakudhuumila baasilikale aba.
Obu olaghendagha ku̱lu̱mba kibugha, odhu̱bhaghe osabe bantu bʼomu kibugha eki kwehaayo mu bu̱si̱nge.
Kaakuba basi̱i̱ma kandi bakuughulila maageeti̱ ghaabo, bantu abalimu balafookagha basyana baawe kandi balakukolelagha milimo yamaani̱.
Kaakuba babhenga bu̱si̱nge kandi batu̱wamu kulwana naawe, olu̱mbe kibugha eki.
Luhanga waawe naakuhaaye kibugha eki okikwata, okoleesi̱ye bihiyo kwita basaasa boona abalimu.
Bhaatu bakali̱, baana, bitunguwa na bintu binji byona byʼomu kibugha eki, obitwale. Odheedhuwe haabwa ebi waahu̱ngi̱yʼo ngi̱ghu̱ syawe, ebi
Luhanga waawe aakuhaaye.
Okolaghe otiyo maatau̱ni̱ aghaseleeye kimui naawe, etali maatau̱ni̱ ghʼomu mahanga ghʼomu nsi eghi oku̱ki̱dhamu.
Mu bibugha byʼomu mahanga agha
Luhanga waawe akukuha nga bugwetuwa bwawe, oote bu̱li̱ kintu kyona kyomi̱i̱li̱.
Ohwelekeeleli̱ye kwonini bantu bani boona: Bahi̱ti̱, Bamooli̱, Banakanaani̱, Bapeleeji̱, Bahi̱vi̱, na Bayebu̱si̱, ngoku
Luhanga waawe aakulaghiiye.
Mubaate boona, niikuwo batabeegheesi̱ya bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi bakukolagha mbalami̱ya baaluhanga baabo kandi mu̱si̱i̱sa ewaa
Luhanga waanu.
