Nuwaamali̱ye bwile bukani̱ye noolengʼo kukwata kibugha, otakonda biti byamu bya bi̱ghu̱ma ebikuliibuwagha. Oliyaghe bi̱ghu̱ma ebi, bhaatu biti otabijomba. Otajomba biti ebi nanga tabili bantu abali ngi̱ghu̱ syawe.
Okugubha kujomba biti binji ebitaakwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma bakuliyagha kandi obi̱koleesi̱ye ku̱lu̱mba kibugha eki ku̱hi̱ki̱ya okikwete.
Mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha, kaakuba basanga baji̱ndi̱ye muntu mu kisaka kandi otamanya oghu aamwi̱ti̱ye,
beebembeli̱ baawe na bacu̱ baghendaghe kandi bapi̱i̱maghe mwanya ku̱lu̱gha hambali mu̱ku̱ oghu ghuli ku̱hi̱ka mu maatau̱ni̱ aghali haai.
Beebembeli̱ baa tau̱ni̱ eghi eli haai hambali baasangi̱ye mu̱ku̱ oghu bali na kuhaayo kyana kya nte eki batakakoleeseei̱ye mulimo.
Bakitwalaghe mu kighona haai na maasi ghakusenda, hambali hali kisaka eki batakoli̱ye kedha kuhelamu kantu, bakihendeleyo bikiya.
Bahongi̱ baasukulu baa Leevi̱ baghendeyo dhee, nanga niibo bali na kumala nsonga esilimu butaaghu̱wana.
Luhanga waawe akabakoma ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya kandi kuha bantu mu̱gi̱sa mu li̱i̱na liye.
Beebembeli̱ boona bʼomu tau̱ni̱ eghi eli haai na mu̱ku̱ ghwa muntu oghu bantu baaji̱ndi̱ye, bali na kunaaba mu ngalo syabo haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mu̱ku̱ ghwa kyana kya nte eki,
mbanaghila bati, “Taani̱i̱tu̱we twati̱ye muntu oni kandi tatumani̱ye oghu aamwi̱ti̱ye.
Ai̱
, oghanile bantu baawe baa I̱saaleeli̱ aba waacunguuye, otasi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya bantu baawe musango ghwa kujinda muntu oni oghu atali na musango.” Du̱mbi̱ bantu aba bakughaniluwa musango oghu.
Nuwaakoli̱ye otiyo, okuba nookola eki̱hi̱ki̱ye mu maaso ghaa
kandi akuuyʼo bantu baawe musango ghwa kwita muntu atali na musango.
Obu olaghendagha haa bulemo kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syawe kandi
Luhanga waawe naaleka nuwaabasi̱ngu̱la kandi nuwaakwatayo bamui mu ebo nga banyankomo,
kaakuba obonamu mukali̱ asemeeye oghu obbali̱ye kandi weekumbula kumuswela,
omutwale ewaawe e ka, bamughembe esoke, eejombe bi̱ku̱lu̱
kandi alu̱waale ngoye sinji. Ali na kuukala e ka ewaawe kandi eeghungile babyaye be kumala kweli̱ kumui, haanu̱ma yʼeki, okugubha kulangaala naye, obe eba wee kandi abe mukali̱ waawe.
Bhaatu haanu̱ma, nu̱weehi̱ghu̱u̱ye otamubbali̱ye, omuleke aghende hambali abbali̱ye. Otamu̱ghu̱li̱ya kedha kumutwalikani̱ya nga mu̱syana, nanga nuuwe okamuhambi̱li̱ja kulangaala naawe.
Kaakuba musaasa aba ali na bakali̱ babili, oghu abbali̱ye nʼoghu atabbali̱ye, ti̱ bombi bamubyalila baana baabusaasa, bhaatu mu̱li̱ghaaso aba wa mukali̱ oghu atabbali̱ye.
Kilo eki akuba naagweta baana be, atafoola mwana wa mukali̱ oghu abbali̱ye kuba mugwetuwa mu ki̱i̱kalo kya mwana wa mukali̱ oghu atabbali̱ye, oghu ali mu̱li̱ghaaso.

Mwana oghu ali na kutunga mughabo ghusaayʼo, nankabha atali wa mukali̱ oghu abbali̱ye. Ali na kumanya ngu mwana wʼoku̱du̱bha oghu niiye mu̱li̱ghaaso ghuwe kandi oghu abyaye anali na maani̱, amuhe mughabo oghu abhonganuuwe kutunga.
Musaasa naabaaye ali na mutabani̱ wee mutalibani̱ja kandi mu̱jeemi̱, oghu atahu̱ti̱i̱ye ese wee kedha ni̱na wee kandi nankabha bamufubila, abhenga ku̱u̱ghu̱wa.
Babyaye be aba bamutwale mu lukulato lwa beebembeli̱ haa geeti̱ ya tau̱ni̱ eghi akuukalaghamu.
Baghile beebembeli̱ aba bati, “Mutabani̱ waatu oni ni mutalibani̱ja kandi mu̱jeemi̱. Taaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha ebi tukumughambila. Ali na mululu kandi ni mutami̱i̱li̱.”
Basaasa boona bʼomu tau̱ni̱ eghi bamuhuule mabaale aku̱we. Oli na kuuya kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki mu enu̱we. Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona bakaaku̱u̱ghu̱wa eki, bakwobaha.
Muntu naanatu̱u̱ye musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa, aatibuwa kandi odhodhooki̱ya mu̱ku̱ ghuwe haa kiti,
mu̱ku̱ oghu ghutalaala haa kiti haala. Oghujiike kilo eki kyonini, nanga muntu oghu badhodhookeei̱ye haa kiti aki̱i̱nu̱u̱we. Oghujiike niikuwo otabhi̱i̱ya nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha kutwala.
Kaakuba obona nte kedha ntaama ya Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe neeghenda kubula, otaghileka bhaatu oghikwate kandi omutwalileyo.
Naabaaye ataakaaye haai naawe kandi otamumani̱ye, kisolo eki okitwale kandi okibiike ewaawe ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aasi̱ye kukibbala, du̱mbi̱ omuhe kiyo.
Okolaghe otiyo kaakuba obona ndogooi̱, ngoye, kedha kintu kyona eki muunakyawe aabu̱li̱i̱ye. Otaba nga muntu atafuuyʼo.
Kaakuba obona ndogooi̱ kedha nte ya muunakyawe yeegengi̱ye mu kihanda, otaghighaya. Omukoonele oghi̱i̱mu̱ki̱ye.
Mukali̱ atali̱lu̱waala ki̱lu̱waalo kya musaasa kandi musaasa atali̱lu̱waala ki̱lu̱waalo kya mukali̱, nanga weena oghu akukola eki akuba akoli̱ye eki
Luhanga waawe oohi̱ye.
Kaakuba osanga kisui kya noni̱ mu kiti kedha hansi, kilimu byana kedha mahuli, ni̱naabiyo ebumbaatiiye byana kedha elaaliiye mahuli, otatwala byana ebi na ni̱naabiyo.
Okugubha kutwala byana, bhaatu oleke ni̱naabiyo eghende, niikuwo obe kulungi kandi obe na bwomi̱i̱li̱ bukani̱ye.
Kaakuba okwela numba mpyaka, oki̱ti̱i̱li̱le lusui lwayo na lugho lwa kisiika, muntu naalu̱ghi̱li̱i̱yʼo eegenga hansi, numba yaawe teekuba na musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa kwa muntu.
Musili ghwawe ghwa mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ otalighuhelamu nsigho enji, nuwaakoli̱ye otiyo, otangu̱u̱we ku̱koleesi̱ya nankabha mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ yʼomu musili ghwawe kedha kilimuwa kinji ekilimu.
Otaliboha hamui nte na ndogooi̱ ku̱si̱koleesi̱ya.
Otali̱lu̱waala ngoye esi̱koleeu̱we mu byoha bya ntaama na mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghanji.
Haa nsondo enaa sya ki̱lu̱waalo kyawe, obohaghe haa bu̱li̱ nsondo mughuwo ghwa mahu̱u̱ji̱ ghujambi̱ye.
Kaakuba musaasa aswela mukali̱, bhaatu haanu̱ma ya kulangaala naye, amubhenga,
amuhangilila naamu̱bu̱ghʼo bintu ebikumuhemula ati, “Nkaswela mukali̱ oni, bhaatu obu naalangaaye naye naasanga amani̱ye basaasa.”

Eki nkyabaayʼo, ese na ni̱na mwana wabukali̱ oghu batwale si̱i̱ti̱ eghi muhala wabo nʼeba wee baalangaayo, eghi eliyo saghama, baghitwale haa geeti̱ mu lukulato lwa beebembeli̱ baa tau̱ni̱ eghi, kwoleka ngoku mwana wabukali̱ oghu aabaagha atamani̱ye basaasa.
Ese mwana wabukali̱ oghu aghile beebembeli̱ aba ati, “Nkaha musaasa oghu muhala wanje kumuswela, bhaatu endindi taamubbali̱ye.

Musaasa oghu niibuwo aamu̱bu̱ghʼo bisubha ati, ‘Nkaswela muhala waawe, bhaatu obu naalangaaye naye, naasanga amani̱ye basaasa.’ Bhaatu ndi na buukai̱so obukwoleka ngoku muhala wanje aabaagha atamani̱ye basaasa.” Du̱mbi̱ babyaye baa mwana wabukali̱ oghu basambuule si̱i̱ti̱ eghi mu maaso ghaa beebembeli̱ baa tau̱ni̱ eghi.
Beebembeli̱ aba bali na kukwata musaasa oghu kandi bamuhuule bibbooko.

Bamu̱twi̱le dhee kifubilo kya kusasula bi̱twi̱ke ki̱ku̱mi̱ bya siliva kandi babihe ese mwana wabukali̱ oghu, nanga aabhi̱i̱hi̱i̱ye li̱i̱na lya Munai̱saaleeli̱ atamani̱ye basaasa. Mukali̱ oghu ali na kumusweluwa kandi tabhonganuuwe kumubhinga mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe bwona.
Bhaatu ebi eba mwana wabukali̱ oghu akwete ku̱bu̱gha ngabaaye majima, atabʼo buukai̱so obukwoleka ngoku aabaagha atamani̱ye basaasa,

bali na kutwala mwana wabukali̱ oghu haa lwighi lwa numba ya ese wee kandi basaasa bʼomu tau̱ni̱ yʼewaabo bamuhuule mabaale aku̱we. Akuba aakoli̱ye kintu kikuhemula mu I̱saaleeli̱ kulangaala na musaasa atakasweuwe kandi anali mu numba ya ese wee. Oli na kuuya kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki mu enu̱we.
Kaakuba bakwata musaasa alangaaye na mukali̱ wa baanini, bombi musaasa na mukali̱ oghu aalangaaye naye, bali na kwitibuwa. Oli na kuuya kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki mu I̱saaleeli̱.
Kaakuba mwana wabukali̱ atamani̱ye basaasa baba bamu̱lu̱ghi̱ye kandi musaasa onji amusangaana mu tau̱ni̱, alangaala naye,

bombi mubatwesi̱ye haa geeti̱ ya tau̱ni̱ eghi kandi mubahuule mabaale baku̱we. Mukali̱ musango ghu̱mu̱si̱ngi̱ye nanga taateeye nduulu kukooneluwa. Musaasa ali na ku̱ku̱wa nanga aabhi̱i̱hi̱i̱ye mukali̱ wa baanini. Oli na kuuya kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki mu enu̱we.
Kaakuba mwana wabukali̱ atamani̱ye basaasa baba bamu̱lu̱ghi̱ye kandi musaasa onji amusangaana mu kisaka, amuhamba, musaasa oghu enkaha aaniiye aatibuwa.
Mwana wabukali̱ mutamukolʼo kantu, nanga taali na musango aakoli̱ye oghwanguleka bamwita. Musango oghu ghuli nga ghwa muntu oghu alu̱mbi̱ye muliilanuwa wee kandi aamwi̱ta,
nanga musaasa oghu aamuhambiiye mu kisaka kandi mukali̱ oghu akugubha kuba naatakangaane, bhaatu ataabʼo muntu oghu akumukoonela.
Kaakuba musaasa asangaana mwana wabukali̱ atamani̱ye basaasa oghu batalu̱ghi̱ye, amukwata, alangaala naye kandi muntu amubona naakikola,
ali na kusasula ese mwana wabukali̱ oghu bi̱twi̱ke maku̱mi̱ ataano bya siliva kandi ali na kumuswela, nanga aamukwete, aalangaala naye. Atalimubhinga mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe bwona.
Musaasa atalihemula ese wee kulaala nʼomui haa bakali̱ baa ese wee.
Atalibʼo musaasa weena oghu ki̱twi̱ke kiye kya nsoni̱ ki̱kpeetu̱ki̱ye kedha oghu bajombi̱yʼo busaasa, ali na kuba mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu baa
Kaakuba mwana abyaluwa ali kitwekano eye na baasukulu be ku̱hi̱ka haa mujo ghwa eku̱mi̱, taaliyo oghu ali na kuba mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu baa
Hatalibʼo Munaamooni̱ kedha Munamowaabu oghu ali na kuba mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu baa
, ku̱hi̱ka haa mujo ghwa eku̱mi̱ ghwa baasukulu baabo.
Nanga obu mwalu̱ghagha Mi̱si̱li̱, bakabhenga kubaha byokuliya na maasi kandi baapangi̱i̱si̱ya Bbalaamu mutabani̱ wa Bbeyola ku̱lu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Petola mu kyalo kya Mesopotami̱ya kwisa kukukiina.
Bhaatu
Luhanga waawe aabhenga ku̱tegheeleli̱ya Bbalaamu oghu kandi aafoola mukiino oghu kuba mu̱gi̱sa ghwawe, nanga
Luhanga waawe aku̱ku̱ndi̱ye.
Mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe bwona, otalilengʼo kukoonela mahanga agha kedha kuleka mbakula-kulana.
Otalighaya Munʼedomu nanga ni lughanda lwawe. Otalighaya Munami̱si̱li̱, nanga okaakala mu ehanga liye.
Mujo ghwakasatu ghwa baasukulu baabo bakugubha kuba mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu baa
Obu olabaagha oghooni̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo noobbala kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syawe, weelindaghe kintu kyona ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
Kaakuba musaasa weena afooka ateeli̱ye haabwa kwelootelela, alu̱ghaghe hambali oghooneeye eesalaghe enja kilo kyona.
Bhaatu lwagholo anaabaghe kandi musana ngwakoti̱ye akuukaghe hambali oghooneeye.
Obaaghe na ki̱i̱kalo enja ya hambali oghooneeye hambali olaghendagha kweyamba.
Nga kimui haa byaku̱koleesi̱ya byawe obe na kyaku̱li̱mi̱i̱si̱ya, niikuwo nuwaaghendi̱ye kweyamba, olime ki̱i̱na kandi haanu̱ma ya kweyamba, oki̱swi̱ki̱le.
Nanga

Luhanga waawe, akusaalilagha haagati ya hambali oghooneeye, kukulinda kandi kuleka noosi̱ngu̱la ngi̱ghu̱ syawe. Nahabweki hambali oghooneeye hali na kuukala eeli̱ye, niikuwo atabonamu kintu kyona kitasemeeye kandi aku̱lu̱ghʼo.
Kaakuba mu̱syana aalukila ewaawe, otamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱ya ewaa mukama wee.
Oleke aakale naawe ngoku abbali̱ye kandi mu tau̱ni̱ eghi aku̱tu̱wamu kuukalamu. Otamubona-boniya.
Atalibʼo Munai̱saaleeli̱ nʼomui wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱ oghu akuba malaaya.
Obu olaleetagha kihonguwa kyawe ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki waalahiiye, otalileeta mu numba ya
Luhanga waawe kihonguwa kyona eki̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu ebi malaaya aatu̱ngi̱ye, abe wabusaasa kedha wabukali̱, nanga
waawe aboohi̱ye bombi.
Nuweeholeei̱ye Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe sente kedha byokuliya kedha kintu kyona, atakuteelʼo maghobo.
Okugubha kughila munamahanga oti akuteelʼo maghobo, bhaatu atali Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe, niikuwo
Luhanga waawe akuhe mu̱gi̱sa mu byona ebi okukola na mikono yaawe mu nsi eghi oli haai ku̱ki̱dhamu kandi kutwala.
Kaakuba olahila kuha kintu
Luhanga waawe, weekambe bwangu kukikola ngoku okugubha. Otaaki̱koli̱ye, oku̱si̱ngu̱wa musango kandi ni kibhi ewaa
Luhanga waawe, nanga abbali̱ye okole eki waalahiiye.
Bhaatu nuwaabaaye otalahiiye, tooku̱si̱ngu̱wa musango.
Weeghendeseleje kukola eki waabu̱ghi̱ye, nanga nuuwe waabbali̱ye kulahila ewaa
Luhanga waawe na kanu̱wa kaawe.
Kaakuba oghenda mu musili ghwa muliilanuwa waawe, oliye mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ yoona eghi obbali̱ye, bhaatu otaheeka na ghumui mu kikapa kyawe.
Kaakuba oghenda mu musili ghwa muliilanuwa waawe ghwa bilimuwa, oliyeyo ebi okugubha kukobha na mikono yaawe, bhaatu otajomba bilimuwa ebi.
Kaakuba musaasa aswela mukali̱, haanu̱ma aghila ati taabbali̱ye mukali̱ oghu, nanga ali nʼeki aamuboonʼo kitasemeeye, aahandiika bbaluwa ya kumubhinga, amuhayo kandi amubhinga mu ka yee.
Du̱mbi̱ mukali̱ oghu alu̱gha mu ka ya musaasa oghu, asweluwa musaasa onji.
Musaasa oghu naye dhee naaghi̱li̱ye ati taabbali̱ye mukali̱ oghu, amuhandiikila bbaluwa ya kumubhinga, amuhayo kandi amubhinga mu ka yee, kedha musaasa oghu aku̱wa,
bali̱i̱ wee wʼoku̱du̱bha oghu akamubhinga, taali na kutodha kumuswela. Mukali̱ oghu akuba amali̱ye kubhiiya ewaa musaasa oghu kandi eki
akyohi̱ye. Otaleeta kibhi mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha nga bugwetuwa.
Kaakuba musaasa aba aaniibuwo asweye, batamutwalagha haa bulemo kandi batamuhaagha mulimo ghunji ghwona. Amalaghe mwaka ghumui e ka naaneeghonja na mukali̱ wee oghu aasweye.
Nuwaahaaye muntu ebanja, otaghila oti akuhe lubengo na ebaale elikusihagha nga musimbo, nanga niibiyo aku̱koleesi̱yagha kutunga byokuliya kuba mwomi̱i̱li̱.
Kaakuba basanga muntu naabha Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakiye kughenda ku̱mu̱ghu̱li̱ya kedha naamutwalikani̱ya nga mu̱syana, musuma oghu ali na kwitibuwa. Oli na kuuya kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye eki mu enu̱we.
Mu enu̱we naanabaayemu oghu alwaye ntumbi, mweghendeseleje kwonini kukola ebi bahongi̱ Baleevi̱ bakubaghambila. Mukwate kwonini ndaghikiililo esi naahaaye bahongi̱ aba.
Oosuke eki
Luhanga waawe aakoli̱yʼo Mi̱li̱yamu obu mwalu̱ghagha mu Mi̱si̱li̱.
Kaakuba weeholi̱ya muliilanuwa waawe, otataaha mu numba yee kuuyayo eki aahaayeyo nga musimbo.
Weemilile enja, oleke oghu olimaha ebanja akuleetele musimbo oghu.
Kaakuba muntu oghu aba ali munaku, musimbo aakuhaaye ghutalaala ewaawe.
Omu̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱ye ghuwo lwagholo niikuwo atunge kya kulaalamu, akukusabila mu̱gi̱sa kandi okuba okoli̱ye kintu ki̱hi̱ki̱ye mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe.
Otalitwalikani̱ya kubhi mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe munaku kandi oghu ali mu bwetaagho, nankabha aba ali Munai̱saaleeli̱ muunakyawe kedha munamahanga oghu aakaaye mu emui mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe.
Omusasulaghe mpeela yee bu̱li̱ kilo musana ghutakakoti̱ye, nanga eye ni munaku kandi sente esi niisiyo eesighikiiyʼo. Otaamusasuuye, akugubha kuliliilila
kandi oku̱si̱ngu̱wa musango ghwa kibhi eki.
Babyaye tabali na kwitibuwa haabwa misango ya baana baabo, kedha baana kwitibuwa haabwa misango ya babyaye baabo, bu̱li̱ muntu ali na ku̱ku̱wa haabwa musango oghu eenini aakoli̱ye.
Otalibhenga kughilila munamahanga kedha nku̱u̱bbi̱ bwengani̱ja, kedha kutwala ki̱lu̱waalo kya mu̱kwi̱si̱ya nga musimbo haabwa ebanja.
Oosuke ngoku waabaagha mu̱syana mu Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi
Luhanga waawe aakucungulayo mu bu̱syana. Eki niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye ninkulaghila kukola kintu eki.
Obu olabaagha nookesa musili ghwawe kandi oobululuwayo kibha kya bilimuwa, otakuukaghayo kukyendela. Okilekelaghe munamahanga, nku̱u̱bbi̱ kandi mu̱kwi̱si̱ya, niikuwo
Luhanga waawe akuhaaghe mu̱gi̱sa mu byona ebi okukola na mikono yaawe.
Obu olabaagha nookobha bi̱ghu̱ma byawe bya biti oli̱va, otatodhagha kukuukililamu. Ebyati̱ghaayemu obilekelaghe munamahanga, nku̱u̱bbi̱ kandi mu̱kwi̱si̱ya.
Obu olabaagha nookobha bi̱ghu̱ma bya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ mu musili ghwawe, otatodhagha kukuukililamu. Eghi yaati̱ghaayemu oghilekelaghe munamahanga, nku̱u̱bbi̱ kandi mu̱kwi̱si̱ya.
Oosuke ngu okaba oli mu̱syana mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱. Eki niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye ninkulaghila kukola kintu eki.
Kaakuba habʼo mpaka haagati ya bantu babili, bali na kughenda mu kooti̱, bacu̱ baa misango kubatwi̱lamu, oghu atasobeei̱ye asi̱nge musango, oghu asobeei̱ye musango ghu̱mu̱si̱nge.
Oghu musango ghu̱si̱ngi̱ye naabaaye ali wa kuhuuluwa, mu̱cu̱ amulaghile kulangaala hansi kandi bamuhuule bibbooko ebyengaane na musango oghu aakoli̱ye,
bhaatu batamuhuula bibbooko bisaaye maku̱mi̱ anaa. Kaakuba bamuhuula ebisaayʼo, bakuba mbamuhemula mu bantu.
Otaliboha nte mu̱nu̱wa kughitanga kuliya haa ngano eghi ekwete kusiya.

Kaakuba baanaani̱na emui baba baakaaye hamui kandi omui aku̱wa atabyaye mwana wabusaasa, mu̱kwi̱si̱ya aati̱ghi̱ye atalu̱gha mu ka eghi kusweluwa hanji. Mwana waani̱na musaasa oghu aswele mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu kandi abe mukali̱ wee.
Mwana wabusaasa oghu mukali̱ oghu aku̱du̱bha ku̱byala bamuluke li̱i̱na lya mwana wa ni̱na musaasa oghu, oghu akaku̱wa, niikuwo li̱i̱na eli bataliibululuwa mu I̱saaleeli̱.

Bhaatu mwana waa ni̱na oghu akaku̱wa naabhengi̱ye kumuswela, mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu aghende haa geeti̱ ya tau̱ni̱ yabo, aghambile beebembeli̱ ati, “Naali syanje taabbali̱ye li̱i̱na lya mwana wa ni̱na wee kuukala mu I̱saaleeli̱, nanga aabhengi̱ye kunswela.”
Beebembeli̱ baa tau̱ni̱ eghi babilikile musaasa oghu babu̱ghe naye. Kaakuba abhenga kandi aghila ati, “Tambbali̱ye kuswela mukali̱ oghu,”

du̱mbi̱ mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu eebinge naali siye oghu mu maaso ghaa beebembeli̱ aba, amuuyemu nkai̱to, amu̱twi̱le matanta haali̱i̱so. Mukali̱ oghu aghile ati, “Haaliikuwo baakolagha batiyo musaasa oghu aabhengi̱ye ku̱byalila mwana waa ni̱na wee oghu aku̱u̱ye mwana ku̱u̱kali̱yʼo ka eghi.”
Ka ya musaasa oghu balaghighilaghamu mu I̱saaleeli̱ bati, “Ka ya musaasa oghu baahi̱yemu̱ nkai̱to.”
Basaasa babili mbabaaye mbalwana, mukali̱ wʼomui haa basaasa aba aasa ku̱li̱na eba wee musaasa oghu akwete kumuhuula, mukali̱ oghu naanahi̱dhi̱ye mukono kandi akwata byensoni̱ bya musaasa oghu,
omujombʼo mukono oghu kandi otamughilila kisa.
Otaliba mu kikapa kyawe na bya ku̱pi̱i̱mi̱i̱si̱ya bya milingo ebili kwibha bantu, eki̱lyoti̱ye nʼekiwaawaane.
Mu numba yaawe otalibaamu na bya ku̱pi̱i̱mi̱i̱si̱ya bibili, kiinamu̱li̱to na kiinabwana.
Obaaghe na bya ku̱pi̱i̱mi̱i̱si̱ya kandi minjaani̱ esi̱hi̱ki̱ye kandi esitaakunyagha bantu, niikuwo ookale bwile bukani̱ye mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha.
Nanga boona abakukolagha bintu ngʼebi, ebitalimu bwesighibuwa,
Luhanga waawe aboohi̱ye.
Oosuke eki Bameleeki̱ babakoli̱yʼo mu kihanda obu mwalu̱ghagha Mi̱si̱li̱,
ngoku baaku̱lu̱mbi̱ye mu kihanda obu waabaagha oluwakaki̱ye kandi otali na maani̱, baata bantu boona abaabaagha enu̱ma syawe, taboobahi̱ye Luhanga.
Nahabweki

Luhanga waawe akaakuleka nuwaatunga bu̱si̱nge ku̱lu̱gha mu ngi̱ghu̱ syawe syona esi̱kweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye mu nsi eghi akukuha kutwala nga bugwetuwa bwawe, ohwelekeeleli̱ye Bameleeki̱ boona babaabululuwe munsi. Eki otalikiibululuwa.
Okaaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha nga bugwetuwa, nuwaaghitwala kandi nuwaaghiikalamu,
otaaghe mu kighegha mughanulo ghwa bu̱li̱ kilimuwa eki weeleei̱ye mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha, du̱mbi̱ oghendaghe mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
Luhanga waawe akukoma kumulami̱li̱yamu.
Oghendaghe ewaa mu̱hongi̱ oghu akwete kukola mulimo bwile obu, omughile oti, “Obwalo naatula ewaa
Luhanga wanje ngoku naaki̱dhi̱ye mu nsi eghi aalahiiye ewaa baataata baatu ati akutuha.”
Mu̱hongi̱ oghu aaye kighegha eki mu ngalo syawe, aki̱su̱ndi̱ye hansi mu maaso ghaa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
Luhanga waawe.
Waatule ewaa
Luhanga waawe oti, “Taata akaba ali Munaalaamu oghu aalalangagha. Aaghenda Mi̱si̱li̱ na bantu bakee, aakalayo kandi aafooka ehanga liinamu̱li̱to kandi lyamaani̱.
Bhaatu Banami̱si̱li̱ baatutwalikani̱ya kubhi kandi baatubona-boni̱ya, ku̱tu̱koleesi̱ya milimo yamaani̱.
Niibuwo twatakangaane ewaa
Luhanga wa baataata baatu, aaghu̱wa elaka lyatu kandi aabona ngoku tukwete kubona-bona.
aatuuya mu Mi̱si̱li̱ naakoleesi̱ya mukono ghwa bu̱toki̱ na maani̱ ghe, bikoluwa bya kwobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, bubonelo na byakuswekani̱ya.
Aatuleeta mu ki̱i̱kalo kini kandi aatuha nsi eni, eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki.
Nahabweki
, naaleeti̱ye mughanulo ghwa ebi neeleei̱ye mu nsi eghi wampaaye.” Du̱mbi̱ osu̱ndi̱ye kighegha eki mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe kandi oteeli̱ye hansi mu maaso ghe kumulami̱ya.
Uwe na Mu̱leevi̱ kandi munamahanga oghu aakaaye naawe mudheedhuwe haabwa bintu bilungi byona ebi
Luhanga waawe aakuhaaye na baa ka yaawe.

Olakamalagha kuta haakpengbu̱ kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya byona ebi weeleei̱ye, mu mwaka ghwakasatu, mwaka ghwa kuha kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱, okihaaghe Mu̱leevi̱, munamahanga, nku̱u̱bbi̱ na mu̱kwi̱si̱ya, niikuwo baliilaghe mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe kandi baakutaghe.
Oghilaghe

Luhanga waawe oti, “Naahi̱ye mu numba yanje kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kyona eki naakubiikilagha kandi naakiha Mu̱leevi̱, munamahanga, nku̱u̱bbi̱ kandi mu̱kwi̱si̱ya, kusighikila ngoku waalaghiiye. Tanaaghai̱ye na kimui haa bilaghilo byawe byona kedha kukiibululuwa.
Tanaaliiye haa kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ obu naabaagha neeghu̱ngi̱ye haabwa muntu oghu aku̱u̱ye, kedha kuuyʼo ki̱twi̱ke kyakiyo obu naabaagha nteeli̱ye kedha kukihongela abaaku̱u̱ye. Nkahu̱ti̱ya elaka lya
Luhanga wanje kandi naakola byona ebi wandaghiiye.

olole hansi, onali mu eghulu, mu ki̱i̱kalo kyawe ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, ohe mu̱gi̱sa bantu baawe baa I̱saaleeli̱ na nsi eghi waatuhaaye ngoku waalahiiye ewaa baataata baatu, nsi eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki.”
Luhanga waawe alimakulaghila obwalo kukwata ntu̱wamu na bilaghilo biye. Weeghendeseleje kubikwata na mutima ghwawe ghwona na mwoyo ghwawe ghwona.
Obwalo waabu̱ghi̱ye ngoku
ali Luhanga waawe, ngoku okukola ebi abbali̱ye kandi ebi akulaghila, ngoku okukwata ntu̱wamu siye na bilaghilo biye kandi ngoku oku̱hu̱ti̱ya elaka liye.
naye obwalo aabu̱ghi̱ye ngoku muli bantu be baa mbaghani̱ja ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kandi ngoku muli na kukwata bilaghilo biye byona.
Nimwakoli̱ye eki, akubafoola baamaani̱ kusaali̱ya mahanga ghanji agha aahangi̱ye, akuleka babasinde, mumanuwe, babahu̱ti̱ye kandi mukuba bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa
Luhanga waawe ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.
Obu Musa aabaagha ali na bengei̱ baa I̱saaleeli̱ aalaghila bantu aba ati, “Mukwate bilaghilo byona ebi nkubalaghila obwalo.
Mukaakubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, nimwaki̱dha mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha, osimbemu mabaale ghaanamu̱li̱to kandi oghasiighe langi̱ njelu.
Nuwaabhasu̱ki̱ye kandi oki̱dha mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha, nsi eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki, ngoku
Luhanga wa baataata baawe aakulaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye, ohandiike haa mabaale agha bighambo byona ebili mu bilaghilo bini.
Mukaakubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, musimbe mabaale agha haa mwena Ebbali, ngoku nkubalaghila obwalo kandi mughasiighe langi̱ njelu.
Haa mwena haala okwelʼo kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
Luhanga waawe, kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya mabaale. Otakoleesi̱ya kyoma kyona kukikwela.
Okwele kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
Luhanga waawe na mabaale ghataati̱i̱ye kandi ohongelaghʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye bya
Luhanga waawe.
Ohongelaghʼo dhee bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge kandi oliilaghe mu ki̱i̱kalo eki odheedheeu̱we mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe.
Haa mabaale agha ohandiikʼo kulungi bighambo byona ebili mu bilaghilo bini.”
Obu Musa aabaagha ali na bahongi̱ Baleevi̱, aaghila I̱saaleeli̱ yoona ati, “Uwe I̱saaleeli̱, otegheeleli̱ye kandi ooghu̱we, obwalo mwafooki̱ye bantu baa
Luhanga waawe.
Ohu̱ti̱ye elaka lya
Luhanga waawe kandi okwate ntu̱wamu na bilaghilo ebi nkukuha obwalo.”
Kilo eki kyonini Musa aalaghila bantu aba ati:
Mukaakubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, bantu baa ntu̱la sini beemilile haa mwena Geli̱ji̱i̱mu̱ kuha bantu mu̱gi̱sa: ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱, ya Leevi̱, ya Yu̱da, ya I̱sakaali, ya Yojeefu̱ na ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱.
Bantu baa ntu̱la sini beemilile haa mwena Ebbali kukiina bantu: ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱, ya Aseli̱, ya Jabbu̱looni̱, ya Daani̱ na ya Nafutaali.
Baleevi̱ baghambile bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ boona bighambo bini nʼelaka lyamaani̱ bati:
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu akukola kisasani̱ kya mulingo ghwona eki
oohi̱ye kandi aki̱i̱mi̱li̱li̱ya mu ki̱bi̱so kukilami̱ya.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu akughaya ese wee kedha ni̱na wee.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu akwibha etaka lya muliilanuwa wee haabwa ku̱ku̱lu̱ki̱ya mutaano.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu akuhabi̱ya oghu maaso ghaaghaaye.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu ataakughilila bwengani̱ja munamahanga, nku̱u̱bbi̱ kedha mu̱kwi̱si̱ya.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na.”
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu akulangaala na mukali̱ wa ese wee, nanga akuba aaghai̱ye ese wee.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu akulangaala na kisolo kyona.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu akulangaala na mwani̱na wee, muhala wa ese wee kedha muhala wa ni̱na wee.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu akulangaala na mukuwe wee.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe muntu weena oghu akwita muliilanuwa wee mu ki̱bi̱so.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe weena oghu aku̱si̱i̱ma ngu̱ji̱ kwita muntu oghu atali na musango.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na!”
“Akiinuwe weena oghu ataakukwata bighambo ebili mu bilaghilo bini.” Bantu boona baghile bati, “Aami̱i̱na.”
Kaakuba ohu̱ti̱ya na bwesighibuwa elaka lya
Luhanga waawe kandi weeghendeseleja kukwata byona ebi nkukulaghila obwalo,
Luhanga waawe akukufoola wamaani̱ kusaali̱ya mahanga ghanji ghoona aghali munsi.
Mi̱gi̱sa eni yoona ekukwisʼo kandi oghitunge, kaakuba ohu̱ti̱ya elaka lya
Luhanga waawe.
Olabaagha na mu̱gi̱sa mu kibugha kandi olabaagha na mu̱gi̱sa mu musili.
Baana baawe bakutunga mu̱gi̱sa, bilimuwa byawe, byana bya bisolo byawe, nte syawe sikukana kandi ntaama syawe si̱ku̱byala kandi sikane.
akukuha mu̱gi̱sa ghwa kuba na bilimuwa bikumala kandi byokuliya bikani̱ye.
Olabaagha na mu̱gi̱sa nooki̱dha e ka kandi olabaagha na mu̱gi̱sa noolu̱gha e ka.
akuleka osi̱ngu̱le ngi̱ghu̱ syawe. Bakwisila haa luhande lumui maku̱lu̱mba, bhaatu bakukuuluka mbali̱gi̱ti̱la haa mpande musanju̱.
Luhanga waawe akuha mu̱gi̱sa byona ebi okukola kandi aku̱u̱su̱li̱ya nguli syawe.
Luhanga waawe akukuha mu̱gi̱sa mu nsi eghi alimakuha.
Kaakuba okwata ebi
Luhanga waawe akukulaghila kandi okola ebi abbali̱ye,
akukufoola ehanga liye li̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ngoku aalahiiye kukola.
Du̱mbi̱ bantu boona bʼomu nsi bakumanya ngoku muli bantu baa
kandi bakuboobaha.
akuleka okula-kulane kandi obyale baana bakani̱ye, bisolo byawe bi̱ku̱byala kandi bikane. Okweli̱ya bilimuwa bikani̱ye, mu nsi eghi
aalahiiye ewaa baataata baawe ati akukuha.

akukuughulilʼo sitoowa siye sisemeeye syʼomu mwanya hambali abiikiiye mbu̱la. Aku̱tooni̱ya mbu̱la mu nsi yaawe mu bwile bwa elobe. Akuha mu̱gi̱sa byona ebi okukola na mikono yaawe. Olahaagha mabanja mahanga ghakani̱ye, bhaatu toolaghilagha oti ebo bakuhe ebanja.
akukufoola mutuwe etali mukila, olaakalagha ohikiiye kandi otali enu̱ma, kaakuba okwata bilaghilo bya
Luhanga waawe ebi nkukuha obwalo kandi weeghendeseleja kukola ebi bilaghiiye.
Otali̱lu̱ghʼo na kimui haa bighambo ebi nkukulaghila obwalo, kukola ebi obbali̱ye kandi kughenda ku̱heeleli̱ya baaluhanga banji.
Kaakuba otahu̱ti̱ya elaka lya
Luhanga waawe kandi oteghendeseleja kukwata bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu si̱ye ebi nkukulaghila obwalo, mikiino eni yoona ekukwisʼo.
Okukiinuwa mu kibugha kandi okiinuwe mu musili.
akukiina bilimuwa kandi byokuliya byawe.
Akukiina baana baawe, bilimuwa byʼomu nsi yaawe, byana bya bisolo byawe, nte syawe na ntaama syawe.
Olakiinuwagha nooki̱dha e ka kandi okiinuwaghe noolu̱gha e ka.
Kaakuba okola bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kandi obhenga
, alaleetagha katabanguko, butaaghu̱wana na bijibu mu bu̱li̱ kintu eki olalengaghʼo kukola na mikono yaawe, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ohwelekeleeye kandi ohooyʼo bwangu.
akukuleetamu ndwala sya kabhi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aku̱hwelekeleei̱ye mu nsi eghi oli haai kutwala.

akuleka olwale ndwala sya kabhi: mu̱swi̱ja, kubhimbakaka na kituumo kyamaani̱. Akukusindikamu kyanda, kyegha kyamaani̱ na ntumbi ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bilimuwa byawe. Bintu bya kabhi ebi bikukuukalamu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ohwelekeleeye.
Mwanya eghulu yaawe ghukufooka nga kyoma kandi nsi efooke nga mitahimbuwa.
Mu ki̱i̱kalo kya mbu̱la,
akusindika mu nsi yaawe tu̱u̱tu̱ na musene ku̱lu̱gha mu mwanya ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ohwelekeleeye.

alalekagha ngi̱ghu̱ syawe si̱ku̱si̱ngu̱laghe. Olabalu̱mbagha noolu̱gha haa luhande lumui, bhaatu obaalukaghe nooli̱gi̱ti̱la haa mpande musanju̱. Bantu bʼomu mahanga ghoona ghʼomu nsi, bakaakubona ebikwete kukubʼo, bakwobaha.
Mu̱ku̱ ghwawe ghukuba byokuliya bya noni̱ syona syʼomu mwanya kandi binyama byʼomu kisaka, taakubʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akubitanga.
akuleka olwale bi̱hu̱te ngʼebi aaleki̱ye Banami̱si̱li̱ baalwala. Okulwala dhee na bibbodhe, ku̱bhi̱mbakaka mubili kandi kweyagha-yagha, ndwala esitaakugubha kutambiluwa.
akuleka olwale esi̱le, kuughala maaso kandi kubuluwa byeli̱li̱kano.

Olahabagha ntangaali̱ nga muntu oghu maaso ghaaghaaye. Toolatungagha mughaso mu byona ebi olakolagha. Bantu balaakalagha mbakubona-boni̱ya kandi mbaabha bintu byawe, taakubʼo nʼomui oghu akukukoonela.
Olalu̱ghagha mukali̱, bhaatu musaasa onji amuswele. Olakwelagha numba, bhaatu toolaghilaalaghamu. Olakolagha musili ghwa mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱, bhaatu toolaliyaagha bi̱ghu̱ma byamu.

Balasalagha nte yaawe onaloli̱ye, bhaatu toolaliyaaghʼo. Balakuuyaghʼo ndogooi̱ yaawe onaloli̱ye kandi tabalaghi̱ku̱u̱ki̱yagha. Ntaama syawe balasihaagha ngi̱ghu̱ syawe kandi taaliyo muntu oghu akukukoonela.
Batabani̱ baawe na bahala baawe bakuheebuwa mahanga ghanji kandi bu̱li̱ kilo olaakalagha ololi̱ye na maaso ghaawe, obalindiliiye kukuuka, bhaatu tooli nʼeki okugubha kukola.
Bantu aba otamani̱ye niibo bakuliya ebi okoli̱ye mu nsi yaawe na bintu binji ebi otalibaane kutunga, bhaatu uwe olaakalagha noobona-bona kandi mbakukola kubhi bwile bwona.
Bintu bya kabhi ebi okubona na maaso ghaawe bikuleka obe mu̱ghwesi̱le.
akuleka olwale bihute ebikukuleetela busaali̱ji̱ kandi ebitakutambiluwa, bikukutandikila haa kighele ku̱hi̱ka haa mutuwe.
akukutwala na mukama oghu waakomi̱ye kukulema mu ehanga eli uwe kedha baataata baawe mutaamani̱ye, hambali okulami̱ya baaluhanga banji, abakoleeu̱we mu mbaau kandi mabaale.
Mu mahanga hambali
akukutwala, bantu baayo bakwobaha haabwa ebikwete kukulehukanʼo, bakukuwaawaani̱ya kandi bakusekeelele.
Olahelagha nsigho ekani̱ye mu musili, bhaatu okesaghe bikee, nanga njighe silabiliyaagha.
Olahelagha misili ya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ kandi oghiloleelelaghe, bhaatu toolanuwaagha vi̱i̱ni̱ yayo kedha kuliya bi̱ghu̱ma ebi, nanga buhuka bulaliyaagha bi̱ghu̱ma ebi.
Biti oli̱va bikutuwa mu nsi yaawe yoona, bhaatu tookuba na magita aghaku̱lu̱ghamu, nanga bi̱ghu̱ma byabiyo bilalaghalikagha.
Okuba na batabani̱ kandi bahala baawe, bhaatu tookuukala nabo, nanga bakubahu̱nga haa bulemo kandi babatwale nga banyankomo.
Njighe sikani̱ye silaliyaagha biti na bi̱ghu̱ma byona byʼomu nsi yaawe.
Munamahanga oghu aakaaye naawe aleeyongelagha kuba wamaani̱, bhaatu uwe ookalaghe noohuwa maani̱.
Niiye alakuhaagha ebanja, bhaatu uwe toolamuhaagha ebanja. Niiye akuba mutuwe, uwe obe mukila.
Mikiino eghi yoona ekukukwamilila kandi eku̱hi̱kʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ohwelekeleeye, nanga tawaahu̱ti̱i̱ye elaka lya
Luhanga waawe kandi okwata ntu̱wamu na bilaghilo ebi aakuhaaye.
Mikiino eghi ekuba kabonelo kandi kyakuswekani̱ya kya ku̱twi̱lu̱wa musango ewaawe na baasukulu baawe bilo nʼebilo.
Luhanga waawe akakuha mu̱gi̱sa mu milingo ekani̱ye, bhaatu tawaamu̱heeleei̱ye odheedheeu̱we kandi osemeleeuwe haa mutima.
Nahabweki oku̱heeleli̱ya ngi̱ghu̱ esi
akukutumila ku̱ku̱lu̱mba. Njala ekukukwata, eliyo likukwate, obuluwe byaku̱lu̱waala kandi okuba na bwetaagho bwa bu̱li̱ kintu.
akukubona-boni̱ya kwonini ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ohwelekeleeye.
akukuleetela ehanga kukulwani̱i̱si̱ya ku̱lu̱gha mu nsi hambali haseleeye kimui, li̱ku̱ku̱lu̱mba nga kibebe ki̱ku̱su̱ndu̱ka hansi. Ehanga eli otakengi̱ye mu̱bu̱ghe ghwaliyo.
Bantu baa ehanga eli bakusaakala, tabaku̱hu̱ti̱ya bantu bakulu kandi kughilila kisa baana.

Bakuliya byana bya bisolo byawe byona kandi bilimuwa byawe, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ohwelekeleeye. Tabaku̱ti̱ghʼo kilimuwa kyona, vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka kedha magita kedha nte, ntaama haa bisolo byawe, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ohwelekeleeye.

Bakweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe ghoona ghaa mu nsi yaawe, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bagengi̱ye bisiika bikangami̱ye kandi bi̱gu̱mi̱ye, ebi weesi̱ghi̱ye, ebyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye maatau̱ni̱ agha. Bakweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya maatau̱ni̱ ghoona ghaa mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waawe akukuha.
Mulingo oghu ngi̱ghu̱ syawe esi sikukubona-boneli̱yamu mu bwile baku̱ku̱lu̱mba, ghukuleka oliye batabani̱ baawe na bahala baawe aba
Luhanga waawe akuhaaye.
Njala eghi ekuba ekwete musaasa mu̱dhooti̱ kandi wa kisa, ekuleka aliye baana be kandi haa kiihulo eki taakuhʼo mwana wa ni̱na wee, mukali̱ wee kedha baana be banji abati̱ghaayʼo.

Taakuha nʼomui haa bantu aba haa nyama sya baana be esi akwete kuliya. Ebi niibiyo byokuliya akuba ati̱ghaai̱ye byonkaha, haabwa kubona ngoku ngi̱ghu̱ syawe esi̱lu̱mbi̱ye maatau̱ni̱ ghaawe sikwete kukubona-boni̱ya.
Mukali̱ mu̱dhooti̱, oghu eetegheleei̱ye kandi oghu atakakpeeti̱yagha kighele hansi, taaliha byokuliya eba wee, mutabani̱ wee kedha muhala wee,
aliliya mu ki̱bi̱so kyenu̱ma na mwana oghu aakalu̱gha ku̱byala nanga alibuluwa kwonini byokuliya, haabwa kubona-bona oku ngi̱ghu̱ esyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye tau̱ni̱ yaawe sikwete kuleetamu.
Kaakuba obhenga ku̱hu̱ti̱ya njegheesi̱ya syona esihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kini kandi obhenga kwobaha li̱i̱na lya
Luhanga waawe lya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kandi eli bantu boobahi̱ye,
akukubona-boni̱ya kandi abona-boni̱ye baasukulu baawe naabaha bifubilo byamaani̱ ebitakabaaghʼo kandi ebitaakuhuwʼo. Akuleka olwale ndwala syamaani̱ kandi esitaakukila.
Akuleka olwale ndwala ngʼesi Banami̱si̱li̱ baalwalagha esi woobaagha, ndwala esitaakukilagha.
Akukutumila ndwala sya milingo yoona na bifubilo, nankabha ebitahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kya bilaghilo kini, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ohwelekeleeye.
Enu̱we abakani̱ye nga nsooli̱ya syʼomu mwanya, mu̱ku̱ti̱ghalʼo bakee, nanga kubhenga ku̱hu̱ti̱ya elaka lya
Luhanga waawe.
ngoku aadheedheeu̱we kubakolela bilungi na kuleka nimukana, niikuwo akudheedhuwa kubahwelekeeleli̱ya kandi kubamala mu nsi eghi oli haai kutwala.

akukulalangi̱ya mu mahanga ghoona, haa mpande syona sya nsi. Mu mahanga agha okulami̱li̱yayo baaluhanga banji aba nankabha uwe kedha baataata baawe mutamani̱ye, baaluhanga aba bakoli̱ye mu mbaau kandi mabaale.
Mu mahanga agha toolitungilayo mpempa kedha ki̱i̱kalo kya kuhuumulilamu,
akuleka ookale otuntuuye, otali na kunihila kandi otateekaane.
Bwile bwona olaakalagha woobahi̱ye ngi̱ghu̱ syawe kukwita. Olaakalagha woobahiiye kimui ntangaali̱ na mukilo, otamani̱ye ekikubʼo bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe.
Nkyambisi olaghilagha oti, “Nguli yaabaagha lwagholo!” Lwagholo olaghilagha oti, “Nguli yaabaagha nkyambisi!” Eki kilabaagha haabwa bwoba obuli haa mutima ghwawe, nʼebi oboone na maaso ghaawe.
alibaku̱u̱ki̱ya Mi̱si̱li̱ mu maati̱ ghaanamu̱li̱to nankabha naaghi̱li̱ye ati tamukutodha kukuukayo. Munaliyeyo mulilengʼo kweghu̱li̱ya mu ngi̱ghu̱ syanu nga basyana, bhaatu taaliyo oghu alibaghula.
Bini niibiyo bighambo bya ndaghaano ebi
aalaghiiye Musa kukola na bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ mu nsi ya Mowaabu, kubyongela haa ndaghaano eghi aakoli̱ye nabo haa mwena Holebbu.
Musa aabilikila hamui bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ boona, aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we boona mukabona na maaso ghaanu ebi
aakoli̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱, ebi aakoli̱yʼo Falaaho na baheeleli̱ya be boona, na nsi yee yoona,
bilengeso byamaani̱, bubonelo na byakuswekani̱ya byamaani̱.
Bhaatu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obwalo,
takabahaaye mutima ghwa kwetegheeleli̱ya, maaso ghaa kubona kedha matui ghaa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa.
Myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa eghi naabahikiiye mu elungu, ngoye syanu tasyakaakuuye kandi nkai̱to mu̱lu̱weete mu maghulu tasyatobhoki̱ye.
Tamwaliiye mugaati̱ kandi tamwanooye vi̱i̱ni̱ kedha kyakunuwa kyamaani̱,
akakola eki niikuwo mumanye ngu niiye
Luhanga waanu.
“Obu mwaki̱dhi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kini, Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Hesi̱bbooni̱ na Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani baasa kutulwani̱i̱si̱ya, bhaatu twabasi̱ngu̱la.
Twakwata nsi yabo kandi twaghiha ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱, na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase.
“Nahabweki mukwate bighambo ebili mu ndaghaano eni kandi mukole ebi bilaghiiye, niikuwo mukula-kulane mu byona ebi mukukola.
Obwalo enu̱we boona mwemiliiye mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waanu, bakulu baa ntu̱la syanu, bengei̱ baanu, na balemi̱ baanu, enu̱we bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ boona,
baana baanu, bakali̱ baanu, na munamahanga oghu aakaaye naanu, ku̱lu̱gha haa oghu akubaseenelagha nkui ku̱hi̱ka haa oghu akubatahilagha maasi.
Mwegumbani̱i̱ye hani niikuwo mube mu ndaghaano ya
Luhanga waawe, eghi
Luhanga waawe akukola naanu obwalo.
Obwalo aku̱gu̱mi̱ya ngu muli bantu be kandi eye ni Luhanga waanu ngoku aabalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kandi aalahiiye ewaa baataata baanu, Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo.
“Taali̱i̱nu̱we bonkaha ndimakola naanu ndaghaano eni,
bhaatu ndimaghikola na bu̱li̱ muntu weena oghu eemiliiye hani naatu obwalo mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waatu kandi na baasukulu baatu abatakabyahuwe.
“Mumani̱ye ngoku bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwatu bwabaagha mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi ngoku kyabaaye obu twakweme mu mahanga ghanji.
Mukabona bikoluwa byabo bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bya kulami̱ya bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga baabo, abakoleeu̱we mu mbaau kandi mabaale, mu siliva kandi feeja.
Mulole ngu atabʼo musaasa, mukali̱, ka, kedha ntu̱la eghi ekuba na mutima ghwa ku̱lu̱ghʼo
Luhanga waatu, kughenda kulami̱ya baaluhanga baa mahanga agha. Kaakuba mukola eki mukuba nga kiti kyani̱ye bi̱ghu̱ma ebili na butuwa kandi bisaaliiye.

“Mulole ngu taabaayʼo muntu nʼomui oghu ali hani obwalo kandi oghu aaghu̱u̱ye bighambo bini, oghu akughila haa mutima ghuwe ati, ‘Nkuba kulungi, nankabha nfooka mutalibani̱ja,’ nanga eki kikuleka enu̱we boona balungi na babhi muhwelekeelele.
taakughanila muntu oghu, bhaatu kusaaliluwa kuwe kwamaani̱ ku̱ku̱hi̱kʼo muntu oghu kandi mikiino yoona eghi ehandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kini ekumubʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya
amu̱hwelekeeleei̱ye kwonini.
akumufoola kyakulolelʼo kya kubona-bona mu ntu̱la syona sya I̱saaleeli̱, kusighikila haa mikiino yoona eghi eli mu ndaghaano eghi ehandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kya bilaghilo kini.
“Mu bwile obuliisa, mujo ghwa baasukulu baanu na bantu abalu̱ghi̱ye mu mahanga hambali haseli̱ye balibona bijibu na kubona-bona oku
aaleeti̱ye mu nsi yaanu.

Bakughila bati, ‘Nsi eghi yoona yabhi̱i̱hi̱ye nanga bughanga bwa mulilo na kisula. Taaliyo ekikutodha kuheluwamu kandi bi̱si̱ngo tabikutodha kutuwamu. Nsi eghi ekuba nga bibugha Sodomu na Gomola kandi Adama na Jebbohi̱mu̱ ebi
aahwelekeleei̱ye obu aabaagha asaaluuwe kwonini.’
“Mahanga ghoona ghakughila ghati, ‘Nkiki kyaleki̱ye
aakola atiyo nsi eghi? Aasaaluuwe atiyo nangaaki?’
“Kyakukuukamu kikuba ngu, ‘Nanga bantu aba bakatu̱wa ndaghaano ya
Luhanga wa baataata baabo, eghi aakoli̱ye nabo obu aabaahi̱ye mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱.
Baaghenda baaheeleli̱ya baaluhanga banji kandi baalami̱ya baaluhanga aba batamani̱ye kandi aba aabatangi̱ye kulami̱ya.
Nahabweki
aasaaliluwa kwonini na nsi eghi kandi aaghileetela mikiino yoona eghi ehandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kini.
akasaaliluwa kwonini kandi kusaaliluwa kwamaani̱ oku, kwaleka aabaaya mu nsi eghi kandi aabakuba mu nsi enji hambali bali ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.’ ”
Musa aaghila ati, “Haliyo bintu binji ebi
Luhanga waatu abi̱i̱ki̱ye nga nsi̱ta, bhaatu aatwoleka bighambo byona ebili mu kilaghilo kiye, eki etu̱we na baasukulu baatu tuli na ku̱ki̱hu̱ti̱ya bilo nʼebilo.”
Bintu ebi byona bikaakukubʼo, ebilimu mi̱gi̱sa na mikiino ebi naakughambiiye, okubiisuka mu mahanga ghoona hambali
Luhanga waawe akukukuba.
Kaakuba uwe na baasukulu baawe mukuukʼo
Luhanga waawe kandi ohu̱ti̱ya elaka liye na mutima ghwawe ghwona na mwoyo ghwawe ghwona,
du̱mbi̱
Luhanga waawe akukughilila kisa, akukumaani̱ye kandi aku̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu mahanga hambali
Luhanga waawe aaleki̱ye waalalangila kandi atodhe akukula-kulani̱ye.
Okaakuba nuwaalalangiiye mu bi̱twi̱ke biseleeye kimui munsi,
Luhanga waawe akukukumaani̱li̱yayo kandi atodhe aku̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye.
Luhanga waawe aku̱ku̱ku̱u̱ki̱ya mu nsi eghi baataata baawe baatu̱ngi̱ye, niikuwo naawe oghitwale. Akukukula-kulani̱ya kandi aleke okane kusaali̱ya baataata baawe.
Luhanga waawe aku̱dhooti̱ya mutima ghwawe na mutima ghwa baana baawe, niikuwo okunde
Luhanga waawe, na mutima ghwawe ghwona na mwoyo ghwawe ghwona kandi weeyongele kuukala mu nsi eghi.
Luhanga waawe akuta mikiino eghi yoona haa ngi̱ghu̱ syawe abakwohi̱ye kandi abakukubona-boni̱ya.
Okutodha ohu̱ti̱ye elaka lya
kandi okwate bilaghilo biye byona ebi nkukulaghila obwalo.
Luhanga waawe akukuha mu̱gi̱sa mu byona ebi okukola na mukono ghwawe, mu baana baawe, mu nte syawe kandi na mu bilimuwa byawe.
akudheedhuwa kutodha kukuha mu̱gi̱sa ngoku aakoli̱ye baataata baawe,
kaakuba ohu̱ti̱ya elaka lya
Luhanga waawe, okwata bilaghilo na ntu̱wamu ebihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kya bilaghilo kini kandi okuukʼo
Luhanga waawe na mutima ghwawe ghwona na mwoyo ghwawe ghwona.
Eki ndimakulaghila obwalo takitimbiikaane bhyani ku̱kyetegheeleli̱ya kedha kukikwata.
Takili mu eghulu, nanga oghila oti, “Ni ani̱ aku̱tu̱ni̱i̱ni̱la mu eghulu kutuuhilayo kiyo, niikuwo tu̱ki̱i̱ghu̱we kandi tukikwate?”
Takili luhande lweli̱ lwa nanja, nanga oghila oti, “Ni ani̱ akutubhasukila luhande lweli̱ lwa nanja kutuuhilayo kiyo, niikuwo tu̱ki̱i̱ghu̱we kandi tukikwate?”
Bhaatu kighambo eki kili haai munu naawe, kili mu kanu̱wa kaawe kandi haa mutima ghwawe, niikuwo ogubhe ku̱ki̱hu̱ti̱ya.
Otegheeleli̱ye! Obwalo ndimakuha kukomamu bwomi̱i̱li̱ na kukula-kulana kedha lu̱ku̱ na kuhwelekeelela.
Kaakuba okwata bilaghilo bya
Luhanga waawe ebi ndimakulaghila obwalo, kukunda
Luhanga waawe, kukola ebi abbali̱ye, kukwata bilaghilo biye, ebi aalaghiiye byona, na ntu̱wamu siye, du̱mbi̱ okuba mwomi̱i̱li̱, okula-kulane kandi
Luhanga waawe akukuha mu̱gi̱sa mu nsi eghi oli haai kutwala.
Bhaatu kaakuba mutima ghwawe ghu̱lu̱ghʼo
, obhenga ku̱mu̱u̱ghu̱wa kandi otwali̱li̱ji̱bu̱wa kulami̱ya baaluhanga banji kandi kubaheeleli̱ya,
obwalo ndimabaghambila majima ngoku mukuhwelekeelela. Tamukuukala bwile bukani̱ye mu nsi eghi mukughenda kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kutwala.

Obwalo ndimabilikila eghulu kandi nsi kuba baakai̱so. Naakuhaaye kwekomelamu, bwomi̱i̱li̱ kedha lu̱ku̱, mu̱gi̱sa kedha mukiino. Nahabweki okomemu bwomi̱i̱li̱, niikuwo uwe na baasukulu baawe mube boomi̱i̱li̱.
Okundaghe
Luhanga waawe, ohu̱ti̱yaghe elaka liye, omugumilaghʼo, nanga niiye akukuha bwomi̱i̱li̱ kandi aleke ookale bwile bukani̱ye mu nsi eghi
aalahiiye kuha baataata baawe Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo.
Musa eeyongela ku̱bu̱gha bighambo bini na I̱saaleeli̱ yoona.
Aaghila ati, “Endindi ndi na myaka ki̱ku̱mi̱ na maku̱mi̱ abili ya bukulu, tankugubha kweyongela kuba mwebembeli̱ waanu kandi
angambiiye ngoku ntaakubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱.
Bhaatu
Luhanga waawe akughenda akuhikiiye kandi aku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu bʼomu mahanga agha, niikuwo otwale nsi yabo. Yosuwa niiye akughenda akuhikiiye mabhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ ngoku
aabu̱ghi̱ye.
akukola bantu aba ngoku aakoli̱ye Si̱hooni̱ na Ogi̱, bakama baa Bamooli̱, na nsi yabo, aba aahwelekeleei̱ye.
akuleka mu̱si̱ngu̱le bantu aba kandi mubakole kusighikila haa bilaghilo byona ebi naabalaghiiye.
Mube baamaani̱ kandi mugume. Mutoobaha kandi mutatukumila, nanga
Luhanga waawe akughenda naawe. Taakukuleka kedha ku̱ku̱lu̱ghʼo.”
Du̱mbi̱ Musa aabilikila Yosuwa, aamughambila mu maaso ghaa Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona ati, “Obe wamaani̱ kandi ogume, nanga okughenda na bantu bani mu nsi eghi
aalahiiye kuha baataata baabo, nuuwe okubahikila kutwala nsi eghi.
eenini akughenda akuhikiiye, akuba ali naawe, taaku̱ku̱lu̱ghʼo kandi taakukuleka. Otoobaha kandi otahuwa maani̱.”
Musa aahandiika bilaghilo kandi aabiha bahongi̱ baasukulu baa Leevi̱ abaaheekagha sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
kandi aabiha dhee bengei̱ boona baa I̱saaleeli̱.
Musa aabalaghila ati, “Haa kumaliilila kwa bu̱li̱ myaka musanju̱, mu mwaka ghwa kughanila bantu mabanja, haa bwile bwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya kulaala mu Bujalaja,
Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona balaasagha mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waawe mu ki̱i̱kalo eki akukoma, musomelaghe I̱saaleeli̱ yoona bilaghilo bini banategheleei̱ye.
Mukumaani̱li̱yaghe hamui bantu boona, basaasa, bakali̱, baana, munamahanga oghu aakaaye mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaanu, niikuwo baaghu̱waghe kandi beeghe ku̱hu̱ti̱ya
Luhanga waanu kandi bakwate bighambo byona ebili mu bilaghilo bini.
Mukole kini niikuwo baana baanu abatabimani̱ye, bagubhe ku̱bi̱i̱ghu̱wa kandi beeghe ku̱hu̱ti̱ya
Luhanga waanu, munaakaaye mu nsi eghi mukubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kutwala.”

aaghila Musa ati, “Bwile bwawe bwa ku̱ku̱wa buli haai ku̱hi̱ka. Obilikile Yosuwa kandi wiise naye mu weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu, niikuwo nimuhe mulimo akukola.” Musa na Yosuwa baaghenda mu weema eghi.
aababonekela mu mpaghi ya kicu kandi mpaghi eghi yeemilila haa mulyango ghwa weema eghi.

aaghila Musa ati, “Oli haai ku̱ku̱wa kandi kukwama baataata baawe. Okaaku̱ku̱wa, bantu bani bakutandika kwefoola baamalaaya haabwa kulami̱ya baaluhanga baa bantu bʼomu nsi eghi bakughendamu, baku̱ndu̱ghʼo kandi batu̱we ndaghaano eghi naakoli̱ye nabo.

Bwile obu bakukola kintu eki nkusaaliluwa kwonini, nkubaleka, tankutodha kubakoonela kandi bakuhwelekeelela. Bintu bikani̱ye bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye na bijibu bikubabʼo kandi bwile obu bakughila bati, ‘Bintu bya kabhi bini bikwete kutubʼo nanga Luhanga taali naatu!’
Majima bwile obu tankubakoonela, nanga bakuba bakoli̱ye kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kulami̱ya baaluhanga banji.
“Nahabweki muhandiike kilimbo kini kandi mu̱kyegheesi̱ye bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱. Kilimbo kini baakalaghe mbakilimba niikuwo kibe buukai̱so bwanje haa bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱.

Nkaakutwala bantu aba mu nsi eghi ekusendamu mata na bwoki, eghi naalahiiye kuha baataata baabo, bakaakuliya, mbaakuta kandi mbaaneeta, bakukwamilila baaluhanga banji kandi babaheeleli̱ye. Bakungaya kandi batu̱we ndaghaano yanje.

Bintu bikani̱ye byakabhi kandi bijibu bikaakubabʼo, kilimbo kini kikuba buukai̱so ewaabo, nanga baasukulu baabo tabalikiibululuwa. Nimani̱ye ebi bakwete kweli̱li̱kana kukola ntakabatwete mu nsi eghi naalahiiye kubaha.”
Du̱mbi̱ kilo eki kyonini Musa aahandiika kilimbo eki kandi aakyegheesi̱ya bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱.
aalaghila Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ ati, “Obe wamaani̱ kandi ogume, nanga nuuwe okutwala bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ mu nsi eghi nalahiiye kubaha. Nkuba ndi naawe.”
Obu Musa aamali̱ye kuhandiika bighambo bya bilaghilo byona mu kitabo atati̱ghi̱ye na kimui,
aalaghila Baleevi̱ abaaheekagha sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
ati,
“Mutwale kitabo kya bilaghilo kini mukite haakpengbu̱ ya sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
Luhanga waanu. Kitabo kini kibe buukai̱so bwa ku̱twi̱la bantu be musango.
Nimani̱ye ngoku bali bajeemi̱ kandi batalibani̱ja. Olole, endindi ninaakaaye kandi ninali na bantu aba, bhaatu bakujeemelagha
. Nkaaku̱ku̱wa bakujeema kusaali̱yʼo!

Munkumaani̱li̱ye bengei̱ boona na balemi̱ baa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱, niikuwo mbaghambile bighambo bini babi̱i̱ghu̱we na matui ghaabo, nkubilikila eghulu kandi nsi kuba baakai̱so banje haa ku̱twi̱la bantu aba musango.
Nanga nkimani̱ye haanu̱ma yanje ku̱ku̱wa, bantu aba bakwebhi̱i̱ya kandi balu̱ghʼo ebi naabalaghiiye. Mu bwile obukwisa bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bikubahi̱kʼo, nanga bakuba baleki̱ye
asaaluuwe haabwa kukola ebi aabatangi̱ye.”
Musa aabeegheesi̱ya bighambo byona ebili mu kilimbo eki, ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ boona banategheleei̱ye na matui ghaabo.
Uwe mwanya, otegheeleli̱ye na kutui kwawe ebi nku̱bu̱gha,
uwe nsi, ooghu̱we bighambo bya kanu̱wa kanje.
Oleke ebi nkwegheesi̱ya bibe nga mbu̱la ekutoona,
ebi nku̱bu̱gha bibe nga ki̱me,
nga mbu̱la nkee ekutoona haa bu̱si̱ngo buunabwana
kandi nga bitonda-tondi̱ bikutoona haa bi̱si̱ngo.
Nkulangilila li̱i̱na lya
Musinde bukulu bwa Luhanga waatu!
Niiye Kikuka kyamaani̱ kandi akukolagha ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye,
bikoluwa biye byona bilimu bwengani̱ja.
Ni Luhanga mwesighibuwa kandi wamajima,
ali na bwengani̱ja kandi ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
Bhaatu bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ bakeebhi̱i̱ya ewaa
kandi haabwa nsobi̱ syabo tabakyali baana be,
ni mujo ghwa bantu babhi kandi batali beesighibuwa.
Enu̱we bantu badhoma kandi abateetegheleei̱ye,
niikuwo mukutwalikani̱yagha mutiyo
Taniiye so waawe oghu akakuhanga?
Taniiye muhangi̱ waawe oghu akaku̱gu̱mi̱ya kandi akufoola ehanga?
Muusuke ebyabaayʼo hambele
kandi mweli̱li̱kanʼo mijo ya bwile obwasaaye.
Mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ye babyaye baanu na bantu banji bakulu,
bakubaghambila ebyabaayʼo.
Obu wa Eghulu Munu aatambulani̱i̱ye nsi bantu bʼomu mahanga
nga bugwetuwa bwabo,
bantu aba aabateelʼo mitaano hambali bakuukala.
Aakola eki kusighikila haa muhendo ghwa bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱.
Bhaatu
aakomamu bantu be baa mbaghani̱ja,
aafoola Yakobbo kuba bugwetuwa buwe.
Aamusanga mu elungu lyomi̱ye
kandi elilimu mwegha ghwamaani̱.
Aamulinda kandi aamuloleelela,
nga mboni̱ ya li̱i̱so liye.
Aaba ngoku kibebe kikubungilagha eegu̱u̱li̱ ya kisui kyakiyo,
bwana bwakiyo mbwahalala
kibubhakila na mapapa ghaakiyo,
niikuwo aabali̱ndi̱ye atiyo kutaghuwa.
enkaha niiye akabahikila,
taaliyo luhanga onji oghu akamukoonela.
Aaleka baatwala bi̱i̱kalo bya haagu̱u̱li̱ ya bwena mu nsi eghi
kandi baaliya byokuliya ebyeli̱ye mu misili.
Baaliya bwoki obwalu̱ghagha mu bikuka
kandi baatunga magita ku̱lu̱gha mu bikuka byomiiye kwonini.
Baanuwa mati̱i̱ti̱ ghaa mbu̱li̱ kandi mata ghaa nte.
Baaliya nyama sya bisabu bya ntu̱u̱li̱ sya ntaama, nte na mbu̱li̱ sya Bbasaani.
Baaliya ngano esemeeye kwonini
kandi baanuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ ya mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱.
Bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ aba baafooka baguudha kandi baaba bajeemi̱.
Baaliya byokuliya bisemeeye kandi baaneeta,
du̱mbi̱ baalu̱ghʼo Luhanga oghu akabahanga.
Baabhenga oghu ali Kikuka kya kujunuwa kwabo.
Kulami̱ya baaluhanga banji kwaleka aabaghilila etima
kandi bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye baakolagha byaleka aasaaliluwa.
Baahongela bi̱li̱mu̱ ebitali baaluhanga,
na baaluhanga bahyaka aba batamani̱ye,
baaluhanga aba baataata baanu bataalami̱i̱ye.
Otaafuwʼo Kikuka oghu akakuhanga.
Waabululuwa Luhanga oghu ali ntandiko ya bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe.
Obu
aaboone eki aababhenga,
nanga batabani̱ be na bahala be aba bakaleka aasaaliluwa.
Aaghila ati, “Tankutodha kukoonela bantu aba,
niikuwo ndole ngoku bakuba,
nanga ni mujo ghwa bantu babhi
kandi tabali na bwesighibuwa.
Baaleki̱ye naaba nʼetima nanga ebo kulami̱ya ekitali Luhanga.
Naasaaluuwe nanga ebo ku̱heeleli̱ya bisasani̱.
Nkuleka babe nʼetima haabwa bantu abatali na mughaso.
Nkuleka basaaliluwe haabwa ehanga lya bantu badhoma.
Kusaaliluwa kwanje kukuba nga mulilo
oghu̱kwoki̱yagha ku̱hi̱ka eku̱li̱mu̱,
ghwoki̱ya bu̱li̱ kintu ekili mu nsi
kandi ghwoki̱ya na misingi ya myena.
Nkubaleetʼo kabhi kaa bu̱li̱ mulingo
kandi mbabhasuulile bimala byanje.
Nkuleka njala, mu̱swi̱ja kandi ndwala syamaani̱ sibaate.
Nkubatumila binyama byʼomu kisaka kubalu̱mba
kandi njoka sya buseguwe kubakonda.
Balabaatilagha haa bulemo mu nguudhe syʼomu tau̱ni̱
kandi kabhi kalababaaghʼo mu maka ghaabo.
Batabhana baabo na baana baabukali̱,
baana bato na bantu bakulu balabaatagha boona.
Nangubaaye mbu̱ghi̱ye ngoku nku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba boona
kandi babaabululuwe.
Bhaatu tambali̱ye ngi̱ghu̱ syabo kwempanka,
mbabu̱gha ngoku baasi̱ngu̱u̱ye bantu banje
kandi baghile bati, ‘
taaniiye aakoli̱ye ebi byona.’ ”
I̱saaleeli̱ ni ehanga elitali na kwetegheeleli̱ya
kandi tabali na magheji.
Nguli baabaagha bagheji, eki bangu̱ki̱kengi̱ye
kandi bamanya ekikughenda kubabʼo.
Muusilikale omui wa ngi̱ghu̱ sya I̱saaleeli̱,
akubhinga baasilikale baa I̱saaleeli̱ lu̱ku̱mi̱
kandi babili bahume baasilikale mutwalo ghumui,
nanga Luhanga, Kikuka kyabo akuba naababhi̱ngi̱ye
kandi
naabaleki̱ye.
Nanga kikuka kya ngi̱ghu̱ syatu takili nga Kikuka kyatu,
eki bakimani̱ye.
Ngi̱ghu̱ sya I̱saaleeli̱ si̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye nga bantu baa Sodomu na Gomola.
Bali nga mi̱jaabbi̱i̱bbu̱ eghi ekwanaghamu bi̱ghu̱ma bisaaliiye kandi ebili na buseguwe.
Vi̱i̱ni̱ yabo eli nga butuwa,
eli nga buseguwe bwa teekpe.
aaghila ati,
“Nimani̱ye ebi ngi̱ghu̱ esi sikubakolʼo.
Si̱ye neenini nkulinda bwile bu̱hi̱ki̱ye bwonini kufubila ngi̱ghu̱ esi.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye nkuhoolagha ngi̱ghu̱ kandi nsasula,
bwile bwabo bwa kughuwa buli haai ku̱hi̱ka.
Kilo kyabo kya kubona-bona kili haai
kandi kuhwelekeelela kukubahikʼo bwangu.”
aku̱twi̱la bantu be musango
kandi aghilile kisa baheeleli̱ya be,
akaakubona bahooye maani̱
kandi ataliyo nʼomui oghu ati̱ghaayʼo nga mu̱syana kedha wa bughabe.
Niibuwo aku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Baaluhanga aba mwesighagha
kandi mufoola kikuka kya buulukilo bwanu
abaaliyagha bisabu bya bihonguwa byanu
kandi banuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ mubahongeeye, bali haa?
Oleke baase babakoonele
kandi babalinde!”
“Mumanye ngu si̱ye nenkaha ni̱i̱si̱ye Luhanga!
Taaliyo luhanga onji kuuyʼo si̱ye.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye nkwitagha kandi ni̱i̱si̱ye nkuhaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye nku̱hu̱taali̱yagha kandi ni̱i̱si̱ye nkutambilagha.
Taaliyo ekikugubha kuntanga eki nkubbala kukola.
Nku̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya mukono ghwanje ningila nti,
‘Ngoku majima ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱ bilo byona,
nkutyali̱ya kihiyo kyanje kyoghiile
kandi nkolele mu bwengani̱ja.
Nkufubila ngi̱ghu̱ syanje
kandi nsasule abanjohi̱ye.
Bimala byanje bikutukula saghama yabo
kandi kihiyo kyanje kikwita boona abakumpakani̱ya.
Nkwita banyankomo na abahutaaye boona
kandi njombʼo mituwe ya beebembeli̱ baa ngi̱ghu̱ syanje.’ ”
Enu̱we mahanga ghanji, mudheedhuwe na bantu be,
nanga akufubila ngi̱ghu̱ syanu abakwitagha baheeleli̱ya be.
Akughanila bantu be bibhi byabo
kandi eeli̱ye nsi yabo.
Musa aasa na Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, eegheesi̱ya bighambo byona ebili mu kilimbo eki, bantu boona banategheleei̱ye.
Obu Musa aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha bighambo ebi byona na I̱saaleeli̱ yoona,
aabaghila ati, “Mukwate haa mutima ghwanu bighambo byona ebi naabaghambiiye obwalo kandi mu̱byegheesi̱ye baana baanu, niikuwo beeghendeseleje kukwata bighambo byona ebili mu bilaghilo bini.
Tabili bighambo kwonkaha ewaanu, bhaatu bikubaha bwomi̱i̱li̱ kandi bikuleka muukale bwile bukani̱ye mu nsi eghi mukughenda kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kutwala.”
Kilo eki kyonini,
aaghila Musa ati,
“Oghende mu myena ya Abbali̱i̱mu̱, mu ehanga lya Mowaabu, oni̱i̱ne haa mwena Nebbo oghulolaane na Yeli̱ko. Olole nsi ya Kanaani̱, eghi ndimaha bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ kutwala.
Oku̱kwi̱la haa mwena oghu kandi okwame baataata baawe, ngoku mu̱ghenji̱ waawe Alooni̱ aakwi̱li̱i̱ye haa mwena Hooli̱ kandi aakwama baataata be,

nanga enu̱we bombi tamwabaaye beesighibuwa ewanje mu maaso ghaa bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱. Obu mwabaagha haa maasi ghaa Meli̱ba mu Kadesi̱ mu elungu lya Ji̱i̱ni̱, mukangaya mu maaso ghaa bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱.
Nahabweki okubona nsi eghi nkuha bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱, bhaatu tooku̱ghi̱ki̱dhamu.”
Ghuni niighuwo mu̱gi̱sa oghu Musa muntu wa Luhanga aahaaye bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ atakaku̱u̱ye.
Aaghila ati,
aalu̱gha haa mwena Si̱naai̱.
Aatuwa nga musana haa mwena Seyi̱li̱
kandi aabbeneli̱ya bantu be ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena Palaani̱.
Aasa ali na mitwalo ya baamalai̱ka be
kandi mukono ghuwe ghwabuliyo ghwakaghʼo mulilo.
aku̱ndi̱ye bantu be bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye
kandi akulindagha bantu be aba.
Nahabweki tuli na ku̱teeli̱ya mu bighele biye
kandi ku̱hu̱ti̱ya ebi aalaghiiye.
Musa akatuha bilaghilo,
kuba kintu kya mughaso kya ki̱bbu̱la kya Yakobbo.
aafooka mukama wa bantu be baa I̱saaleeli̱,
obu ntu̱la syabo na beebembeli̱ beekumaani̱i̱ye hamui.”
Musa aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ ati,
“Leu̱bbeeni̱ abe mwomi̱i̱li̱,
nankabha bantu be bali bakee.”
Aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Yu̱da ati,
“Ai̱
ooghu̱we Yu̱da naakubilikiiye kumukoonela.
Otodhe omulungani̱ye na ntu̱la sinji.
omulwanilile kandi omukoonele
kulwani̱i̱si̱ya ngi̱ghu̱ siye.”
Aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ ati,
“Ai̱
, osu̱u̱ku̱le ntegheka yaawe
nookoleesi̱ya Tu̱mi̱i̱mu̱ yaawe na U̱li̱i̱mu̱
kukwama mu mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe mwesighibuwa, Leevi̱.
Okamulengesa e Masa
kandi waatongana naye haa maasi Meli̱ba,
oghu akabu̱ghʼo ese wee na ni̱na wee ati,
‘Tambafuuyʼo’
kandi aaghaya baana baani̱na wee
na baana be.
Nanga bakakwata kighambo kyawe
kandi baahu̱ti̱ya ndaghaano yaawe.
Bakwegheesi̱ya Yakobbo ntu̱wamu syawe
kandi I̱saaleeli̱ kilaghilo kyawe.
Balaku̱tu̱mi̱ki̱lagha bubbani̱
kandi bakuhongelaghe bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye
haa kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kyawe.
Ai̱
ohe mu̱gi̱sa mulimo ghwa Leevi̱
kandi byona ebi akukola na mikono yee bikudheedhe.
Ohwelekeeleli̱ye ngi̱ghu̱ siye syona
kandi otatodha ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya ngi̱ghu̱ siye kutodha kumulwani̱i̱si̱ya.”
Aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ ati,
“Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ oghu
aku̱ndi̱ye akuleka aakale kusemeeye.
Akumulinda bwile bwona
kandi aakale mu mikono ya
Aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Yojeefu̱ ati,
ahe nsi yee mu̱gi̱sa ghwa kutunga mbu̱la ku̱lu̱gha mu mwanya
kandi maasi ku̱lu̱gha hansi yʼetaka.
Nsi eghi ebemu bi̱ghu̱ma ebi musana ghu̱kweli̱yagha
kandi ebikwelelagha haa bwile bwabiyo.
Myena ya hambele yeelʼo bintu bisemeeye
kandi ebemu bwena obukuukalʼo bwile bwona.
Nsi eghi ebemu bisembo bilungi byona ebili munsi.
oghu akabu̱gha ali mu mulilo,
ahe mu̱gi̱sa nsi yee kweli̱ya bilimuwa bisemeeye.
Mi̱gi̱sa eghi yoona ebʼo Yojeefu̱
nanga niiye akaba ali mwebembeli̱ wa baana baani̱na wee.
Mitwalo yʼomu ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ na nku̱mi̱ syʼomu ntu̱la ya Manase,
bakani̱ye kandi bali na maani̱ nga ntu̱u̱li̱ ya nte.
Ngoku mbogho eku̱koleesi̱yagha mahembe ghaayo kuhuma ngi̱ghu̱ syayʼo,
niikuwo baku̱koleesi̱ya mati̱mu̱ ghaabo kuhuma ngi̱ghu̱ syabo kandi kubaseleli̱ya kimui.”
Aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱ ati,
“Jabbu̱looni̱, odheedhuwaghe mu ngendo syawe
kandi I̱sakaali, osemeleluwaghe mu weema syawe.
Balabilikilagha bantu kwisa haa mwena
kandi bahongelaghʼo bihonguwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye,
nanga buguudha bakutunga ku̱lu̱gha mu nanja
na bintu bya mughaso ebi babi̱si̱ye mu musene.”
Aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ ati,
“Musinde oghu akugbaatikani̱ya nsi ya Gaadi̱.
Gaadi̱ akulinda nga ntale kuhenanga mikono
kandi kukpeetaagula mituwe ya ngi̱ghu̱ siye.
Akeekomela nsi eghi esemeeye kwonini,
nanga niiye akaheebuwa mughabo ghwa mwebembeli̱.
Obu bakulu baa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱ beekumani̱li̱i̱ye hamui,
aakola ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye mu maaso ghaa
kandi aahu̱ti̱ya bilaghilo biye.”
Aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Daani̱ ati,
“Daani̱ ali nga kyana kya ntale,
ekikuhalala ku̱lu̱gha Bbasaani.”
Aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Nafutaali ati,
“Uwe Nafutaali oghu
aaghiliiye kisa kandi aakuha mi̱gi̱sa ekani̱ye.
Otunge nsi ya bughuwa ejooba na eku̱wa ya nanja ya Galilaaya.”
Aabu̱ghʼo ntu̱la ya Aseli̱ ati,
“Aseli̱ atunge mu̱gi̱sa kusaali̱ya ntu̱la sinji.
Baana baani̱na wee bamukunde,
nsi yee ebemu magita ghakani̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu biti oli̱va.
Milyango ya bibugha byawe baghiighalaghe na njighi sya byoma
kandi obe na maani̱ aghengaane na bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe.”
“Taaliyo nʼomui oghu ali nga Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱,
oghu akukwamagha mu mwanya haabwa bu̱toki̱ buwe
kwisa kumukoonela.
Luhanga wa bilo byona niiye buulukilo bwawe.
Mikono yee ya bilo nʼebilo ekukulelagha.
Niiye akubhingagha ngi̱ghu̱ syawe,
aabilikila ati, ‘Obahwelekeeleli̱ye!’
Nahabweki I̱saaleeli̱ aakala mu bu̱si̱nge,
Yakobbo aakala enkaha,
mu nsi eghi elimu bilimuwa na vi̱i̱ni̱,
hambali ki̱me kikutoonagha ku̱lu̱gha mu mwanya.
Oli na mu̱gi̱sa uwe I̱saaleeli̱!
Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu ali nga uwe,
ehanga eli
aaju̱ni̱ye.
eenini niiye ngabo yaawe kandi kihiyo kyawe,
kukulinda kandi kukuha bu̱si̱ngu̱li̱.
Ngi̱ghu̱ syawe balaasagha mbakwesengeleli̱ya kubaghilila kisa,
bhaatu olabakpeetagha haa mighongo.”
Musa aalu̱gha mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu, aaghenda mu myena ya Nebbo, aani̱i̱na haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena ghwa Pisiga oghulolaane na tau̱ni̱ ya Yeli̱ko.
aamwoleka nsi yoona ku̱lu̱gha Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu tau̱ni̱ ya Daani̱.
Aamwoleka nsi yoona ya Nafutaali, Efulahi̱mu̱, Manase na Yu̱da, ku̱hi̱ka haa nanja ya bughuwa ejooba.
Aamwoleka kyalo kya Negeebbu na kighona kya Yolodaani̱ ekilimu tau̱ni̱ ya Yeli̱ko eghi elimu mba, ku̱hi̱ka mu tau̱ni̱ ya Joola.
aaghila Musa ati, “Eni niiyo nsi eghi naalahiiye ewaa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo nti nkuha baasukulu baabo. Naaleki̱ye waaghibona, bhaatu tooku̱ghi̱ki̱dhamu.”
Nahabweki Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
, aakwi̱la mu nsi ya Mowaabu, kusighikila ngoku
aabu̱ghi̱ye,
aamujiika mu ehanga lya Mowaabu, mu kighona ekilolaane na tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeti̱-peyola, bhaatu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu amani̱ye hambali aamu̱ji̱i̱ki̱ye.
Musa akaku̱wa ali na myaka ki̱ku̱mi̱ nʼabili ya bukulu, bhaatu akaba anali na maani̱ kandi naanabona kusemeeye.
Bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ beeghungila Musa mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu haabwa bilo maku̱mi̱ asatu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu bwile bwa kumulila kandi kumweghungila bwahooyʼo.
Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ akaba aasuuyʼo mwoyo wa magheji nanga Musa akaba naamutaayʼo mikono yee. Nahabweki bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ baahu̱ti̱ya Yosuwa kandi baakola ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Taakabaaghʼo mulangi̱ mu I̱saaleeli̱ oghu ali nga Musa,
aabu̱ghagha naye baabonanganagha haali̱i̱so na haali̱i̱so.
Taaliyo mulangi̱ onji oghu aalakoli̱ye byakuswekani̱ya na bubonelo ngʼebi
aatu̱mi̱ye Musa kukola mu nsi ya Mi̱si̱li̱. Ebi aakoli̱yʼo Falaaho, baheeleli̱ya be boona, na nsi yee yoona.
Taaliyo mulangi̱ onji oghu akagubha kukola bintu byamaani̱ na bikoluwa byona bya kwobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya ebi Musa aakoli̱ye mu maaso ghaa I̱saaleeli̱ yoona.
Joshua: Haanu̱ma ya ku̱ku̱wa kwa Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
aaghila Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, oghu aakoonelagha Musa haa mulimo ati,
“Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje aaku̱u̱ye. Nahabweki uwe na Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba boona, mweteekani̱je kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, ku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi ndimabaha.
Ki̱i̱kalo kyona hambali mu̱ku̱kpeeti̱ya kighele kyanu, nkubaha kiyo ngoku naalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye Musa.

Mukutwala nsi yoona ku̱lu̱gha mu elungu eku̱wa ku̱hi̱ka mu myena ya Lebbanooni̱ elughulu. Nsi eghi etandikiiye haa maasi ghaanamu̱li̱to Efulaati̱, ku̱hi̱ka haa Nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱ ya bughuwa ejooba. Kyalo kya Bahi̱ti̱ eki kyona kikuba kyanu.
Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha ku̱ku̱si̱ngu̱la onaakaaye. Nkuba naawe ngoku naabaagha na Musa. Tankukuleka kedha ku̱ku̱lu̱ghʼo.
“Obe wamaani̱ kandi ogume, nanga nuuwe okuhikila bantu bani kugwetuwa nsi eghi naalahiiye kuha baataata baabo.
Obe wamaani̱ kandi ogume. Weeghendeseleje kukwata bilaghilo byona ebi mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje Musa aakulaghiiye. Otali̱bi̱lu̱ghʼo kukola bintu binji, niikuwo obe kulungi hoona hambali olaghendagha.
Kitabo kya bilaghilo kini, okisomelaghe bantu bwile bwona. Okyeli̱li̱kanaghʼo mukilo na ntangaali̱ kandi weeghendeseleje kukola byona ebihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱wemu, niikuwo okula-kulane kandi obe kulungi.
Ni̱i̱si̱ye naakulaghiiye. Obe wamaani̱ kandi ogume, otoobaha kedha kutukumila, nanga
Luhanga waawe ali naawe hambali olaghendagha.”
Yosuwa aalaghila beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati,
“Musaalile haagati mu bantu hambali baghooneeye kandi mubalaghile muti, ‘Muteekani̱je byokuliya bikumala, kilo ekikulabha munkiya mukubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kandi mu̱ki̱dhe mu nsi eghi
Luhanga waanu akubaha kutwala.’ ”
Yosuwa aaghila bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na ya Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase ati,
“Muusuke kighambo eki Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
aabalaghiiye ati, ‘
Luhanga waanu alimabaha nsi ya bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱ kuba ki̱i̱kalo kyanu kya kuhuumulilamu.’

Bakali̱ baanu, baana baanu na bisolo byanu bi̱ti̱ghale mu nsi eghi Musa ahaaye enu̱we luhande lweli̱ lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱. Bhaatu basaasa baanu baamaani̱ balwani̱ babhasuke maasi agha, bakwete byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya. Baghende bahikiiye Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyabo kandi babakoonele,
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya
ahaaye bu̱si̱nge Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanu aba ngoku aabuhaaye enu̱we kandi batwete nsi eghi
Luhanga waanu akubaha. Du̱mbi̱ mukuuke mu nsi yaanu mughitwale kandi muukalemu. Nsi ya luhande lweli̱ lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱, eghi Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
abahaaye.”
Baakuukamu Yosuwa bati, “Byona ebi okutulaghila tukubikola kandi hambali okututuma tukughendayo.
Tu̱ku̱ku̱hu̱ti̱ya ngoku twahu̱ti̱yagha Musa.
Luhanga waawe abe naawe ngoku aabaagha na Musa!
Muntu weena oghu alajeemagha kukola ebi waamulaghiiye kandi naaghaya bighambo byawe, alaatibuwagha. Bhaatu obe wamaani̱ kandi ogume!”

Niibuwo Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ aatu̱mi̱ye bambega babili mu ki̱bi̱so ku̱lu̱gha Si̱ti̱i̱mu̱. Aabaghila ati, “Mughende kandi mulole nsi ya Kanaani̱, kukilamunu kibugha kya Yeli̱ko.” Obu basaasa aba baaki̱dhi̱ye mu kibugha eki, baaghenda kandi baalaala mu numba ya mukali̱ malaaya li̱i̱na liye Lahaabbu.
Bantu baaghambila mukama wa Yeli̱ko bati, “Olole, bamui mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasi̱ye hani mukilo kubega nsi yaatu.”
Niibuwo mukama wa Yeli̱ko aatu̱mi̱ye bantu kughambila Lahaabbu bati, “Otwesi̱ye basaasa abaasi̱ye mukilo mu numba yaawe, nanga baasi̱ye kubega nsi yaatu yoona.”
Bhaatu Lahaabbu akaba naamali̱ye ku̱bi̱sa basaasa babili aba. Aakuukamu aba mukama aatu̱mi̱ye ati, “Majima basaasa aba baaki̱dhi̱ye hani, bhaatu tanimani̱ye hambali baalu̱ghi̱ye.
Lwagholo obu bwile bwa kuughala maageeti̱ ghaa kibugha bwabaagha buli haai ku̱hi̱ka, basaasa aba baatooye kandi tanimani̱ye hambali baaghendi̱ye. Mubakwame bwangu-bwangu, mukugubha kubakwata.”
Bhaatu Lahaabbu akaba naatwete basaasa aba haa lusui lwa numba yee kandi ababi̱si̱ye hansi ya bu̱goi̱go obu aabaagha haali̱yeyo.

Basaasa aba mukama aatu̱mi̱ye aba, baatuwa mu kibugha kya Yeli̱ko, du̱mbi̱ bali̱ndi̱ baaghala geeti̱ yakiyo. Basaasa aba baaghenda balabhi̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba ku̱hi̱ka hambali luguudhe lubhasukiiye maasi Yolodaani̱.
Obu bambega aba baabaagha batakalangaaye, Lahaabbu aaghenda haa lusui hambali bali.
Aabaghila ati, “Nimani̱ye ngoku
aahaaye enu̱we Banai̱saaleeli̱ nsi eni kandi etu̱we tuboobahi̱ye na bantu boona abaakaaye mu nsi eni mitima ebakangami̱ye munda haabwanu.
Tukaaghu̱wa ngoku

oomeei̱ye Nanja Mutuku munaloli̱ye obu mwalu̱ghagha Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi twaghu̱wa dhee ngoku mwati̱ye Si̱hooni̱ na Ogi̱, bakama babili baa Bamooli̱, baa luhande lweli̱ lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱, aba mwahwelekeleei̱ye.
Obu twaghu̱u̱ye ebi, mitima yaatukangama munda kandi bu̱li̱ muntu maani̱ ghaamuhuwa haabwa kwobaha enu̱we, nanga
Luhanga waanu ni Luhanga oghu alemi̱ye mu eghulu na munsi.
Nahabweki mulahile ewanje mu li̱i̱na lya
ngoku mukungilila kisa na ka ya tita ngoku naabaghiliiye kiyo. Mumpe kaakulolelʼo akakwoleka
ngoku mukujuna tita, maaha, baana baamaaha baabusaasa na baabukali̱, na bantu baabo boona kandi ngoku mukujuna bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwatu kutaku̱wa.”
Basaasa aba baamughila bati, “
atwite kaakuba tutakola ngoku twabu̱ghi̱ye! Kaakuba otaghambila muntu weena ngoku twabaagha hani, tulimakulaghani̱ja ngu, obu
akutuha nsi eni, tukukughilila kisa kandi bwesighibuwa.”
Lahaabbu aakwami̱li̱ya basaasa aba mu di̱li̱sa aabasu̱ndu̱ki̱li̱ya haa mughuwo enja ya kibugha eki, nanga numba ya Lahaabbu hambali aakalagha ekaba eli haa kisiika ekyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye kibugha eki.
Aabaghila ati, “Mughende kandi mwebi̱se mu bwena, niikuwo abakwete kubahuma batababona. Mumale bilo bisatu mu̱neebi̱si̱ye, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya abakwete kubahuma baaku̱u̱ki̱ye, niikuwo mughende.”
Basaasa aba baamughila bati, “Eki twalahiiye ewaawe tukukikola.

Kini niikiyo oli na kukola. Tukaakwisa ku̱lu̱mba nsi eni, obohe mughuwo ghuumutuku ghuni haa di̱li̱sa eli waaleki̱ye twaasu̱ndu̱ki̱lamu. Okumaani̱li̱ye mu numba yaawe eni, so waawe, njoko waawe, baana baa njoko waawe, na ka ya so waawe yoona.

Kaakuba muntu aatuwa mu numba yaawe aghenda mu luguudhe kandi bamwitilayo, oghu ni musango ghuwe, taghuli musango ghwatu. Bhaatu kabhi nkaahi̱ki̱yʼo muntu weena oghu ali mu numba yaawe, oghu ni musango ghwatu.
Kaakuba oghambila bantu ekyaleki̱ye twasa hani, naatu tatukukola eki twalahiiye ewaawe.”
Lahaabbu aabaghila ati, “Naasi̱i̱mi̱ye kukola eki mwabu̱ghi̱ye.” Aabalagha kandi baaghenda. Du̱mbi̱ aaboha mughuwo ghuumutuku oghu mu di̱li̱sa eli.

Basaasa aba baalu̱ghʼo kandi baaghenda beebi̱sa mu bwena, baakalayo haabwa bilo bisatu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya abaabahumagha baaku̱u̱ki̱ye. Abaabahumagha aba baabbala basaasa aba hoona mu luguudhe, bhaatu bataababona.
Du̱mbi̱ basaasa babili aba baakota ku̱lu̱gha mu bwena. Baabhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, baakuuka ewaa Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱. Baamughambila byona ebyababaayʼo.
Baaghila Yosuwa bati, “Majima
aatuhaaye nsi eghi, nanga bantu abaakaayemu boona, batwobahi̱ye kwonini.”

Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamuka nkyambisi cu̱i̱. Baalu̱gha Si̱ti̱i̱mu̱ hambali baghooneeye, baaghenda bughuwa ejooba haai na maasi Yolodaani̱. Baalaalʼo banalindiliiye kubhasuka maasi agha.
Haanu̱ma ya bilo bisatu beebembeli̱ baasaalila haagati mu bantu hambali baghooneeye.
Baalaghila bantu aba bati, “Nimwaboone bahongi̱ Baleevi̱ baheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
Luhanga waanu, mu̱lu̱ghe hambali muli kandi mughikwame.
Habʼo mwanya nga ghwa kimui kyakabili kya mailo haagati yaanu na sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi. Mutaghenda haai nayo, niikuwo mugubhe kumanya kihanda kya kukwama, nanga tamukakwamagha kihanda kini.”
Yosuwa aaghambila Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Mweyeli̱ye
nanga munkiya
akukola byakuswekani̱ya mu enu̱we.”
Yosuwa aaghila bahongi̱ ati, “Muheeke sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano kandi muhikile bantu aba.” Nahabweki baahimba sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano eghi kandi baaghenda bahikiiye bantu aba.
aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Eki nkukola obwalo kikuleka Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona batandike ku̱ku̱hu̱ti̱ya kandi bamanye ngu, ngoku naabaagha na Musa niikuwo ndi naawe.
Olaghile bahongi̱ abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano oti, ‘Nimwaki̱dhi̱ye haa ki̱si̱yo kya maasi Yolodaani̱ mughakotemu kandi mwemilile mu maasi agha.’ ”
Yosuwa aaghila Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Muneebinge kandi mu̱tegheeleli̱ye bighambo bya
Luhanga waanu.”

Yosuwa aaghila ati, “Kini niikiyo kikuleka nimumanya ngoku Luhanga mwomi̱i̱li̱ ali hamui naanu kandi ngoku ataakusaaghuwa kubhinga munaloli̱ye, Banakanaani̱, Bahi̱ti̱, Bahi̱vi̱, Bapeleeji̱, Bagi̱li̱gasi̱, Bamooli̱ na Bayebu̱si̱, mu nsi eghi mukutwala.
Mulole, sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
oghu alemi̱ye nsi yoona, ekubasaalilʼo ebahi̱ki̱i̱ye kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱.
Nahabweki mukome basaasa eku̱mi̱ na babili ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱, musaasa omui mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la.
Bahongi̱ abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
wa nsi yoona bakaaku̱kpeeti̱ya kighele kyabo mu maasi. Maasi ghaa Yolodaani̱ agha ghakuleka kusenda kandi maasi aghakwete kuhona ghakwemilila nga kisiika.”
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱ghi̱ye mu weema syabo kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, bahongi̱ abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano baaghenda bahikiiye bantu aba.

Bwile obu bukaba buli bwa kukesa kandi maasi ghaa Yolodaani̱ ghasuuye, ngaseesekeli̱ya haa bi̱si̱yo. Obu bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱ghi̱ye hambali baghooneeye kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱, bahongi̱ baaghenda babahikiiye baheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano. Bahongi̱ aba bakaba makakpeeti̱ya kighele mu maasi agha,

maasi aghaahonagha ghaaleka kusenda. Maasi agha gheemilila nga kisiika hambali haseli̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Adamu haai na Yali̱taani̱. Maasi aghaahonagha mu Nanja ya Kisula, ghaaleka kusenda. Bantu aba baabhasuka kandi beebinga Yeli̱ko.
Bahongi̱ abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
baakala beemiliiye haa etaka lyomi̱ye haagati ya maasi agha, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona bamali̱ye kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ haa etaka lyomi̱ye.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baamali̱ye kubhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱,
aaghila Yosuwa ati,
“Okome basaasa eku̱mi̱ na babili mu bantu aba, musaasa omui ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la.

Obalaghile oti, ‘Mughende kandi bu̱li̱ omui aheeke ebaale limui ku̱lu̱gha haagati ya maasi Yolodaani̱ hambali bahongi̱ beemiliiye. Mabaale eku̱mi̱ nʼabili agha mughate mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali mukulaala obwalo mukilo.’ ”
Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa aabilikila basaasa eku̱mi̱ na babili aba aakomi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱, musaasa omui ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la.
Yosuwa aabaghila ati, “Mughende haagati ya maasi Yolodaani̱ mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
Luhanga waanu. Bu̱li̱ omui aghende akome ebaale kandi aliheeke haa ebegha, kusighikila haa muhendo ghwa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱.
Mabaale agha ghalabaagha kaakulolelʼo kaanu haabwa ebi
aabakoleeye. Mu bwile obuliisa, obu baana baanu bali̱bu̱u̱li̱ya eki mabaale agha ghakumani̱i̱si̱ya,
mubaghambile muti, ‘Maasi ghaa Yolodaani̱ ghakeetambulani̱yamu mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
. Obu yaabhasukagha maasi Yolodaani̱, maasi agha gheetambulani̱yamu. Nahabweki mabaale ghani ni kya kuusukilʼo kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ bilo nʼebilo.’ ”
Du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakola ngoku Yosuwa aabalaghiiye. Baakoma mabaale eku̱mi̱ nʼabili ku̱lu̱gha haagati ya maasi Yolodaani̱, limui haabwa bu̱li̱ ntu̱la ya I̱saaleeli̱, kusighikila ngoku
aalaghiiye Yosuwa. Baaghaheeka kandi baaghatwala hambali bakulaala mukilo eghi kandi baaghakwelʼo nga kyakuusukilʼo.

Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa aatuuma mabaale ghanji eku̱mi̱ nʼabili haagati ya maasi Yolodaani̱ mu ki̱i̱kalo kyonini hambali bahongi̱ abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano beemiliiye. Mabaale agha ghanali mu ki̱i̱kalo eki ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.
Bahongi̱ abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano beemilila haagati ya maasi Yolodaani̱, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bintu byona bihooye ebi
aalaghiiye Yosuwa kughambila bantu aba kusighikila haa byona ebi Musa aalaghiiye Yosuwa. Bantu aba baabhasuka maasi agha bwangu-bwangu.
Obu bantu boona baamali̱ye kubhasuka, bahongi̱ abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
baabhasuka, bantu aba banabaloli̱ye.
Basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, na Gaadi̱ na bʼomu kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase, baahikila bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ bakwete byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya ngoku Musa aabaghambiiye.
Basaasa haai mitwalo enaa abeetekani̱i̱je kulwana baasaalila mu maaso ghaa
, baaghenda haa bulemo, mu kiigbete kya Yeli̱ko.
Kilo eki ebi
aakoli̱ye byaleka Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamanya ngoku Yosuwa ali mwebembeli̱ wamaani̱. Baamu̱hu̱ti̱ya bwile bwona anaakaaye ngoku baahu̱ti̱yagha Musa.
aaghila Yosuwa ati,
“Olaghile bahongi̱ abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ku̱lu̱gha mu maasi Yolodaani̱.”
Yosuwa aalaghila bahongi̱ aba ati, “Mu̱lu̱ghe mu maasi Yolodaani̱.”
Bahongi̱ abaheeki̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya

, obu baalu̱ghi̱ye haagati ya maasi Yolodaani̱, mbaakpeeti̱ya kighele kyabo haa etaka lyomi̱ye, maasi ghaa Yolodaani̱ ghatodha ghakuuka mu ki̱i̱kalo kyaghʼo. Ghaatandika kusenda kandi ghaaseesekeli̱ya haa bi̱si̱yo byaghʼo, ngoku ghaakolagha.
Bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ baabhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ haa kilo kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya kweli̱ kwʼoku̱du̱bha, baaghoona Gi̱li̱gaali̱ haa mutaano ghwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yeli̱ko.
Mabaale eku̱mi̱ nʼabili agha basaasa aba baahi̱ye mu maasi Yolodaani̱, Yosuwa aaghasimba e Gi̱li̱gaali̱.
Aaghila bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Mu bwile obuliisa, obu baana baanu bali̱bu̱u̱li̱ya beesebo eki mabaale agha ghakumani̱i̱si̱ya,
mubaghile muti, ‘Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakabhasukila hani maasi Yolodaani̱ haa etaka lyomi̱ye.’
Luhanga waanu akoomi̱ya maasi Yolodaani̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya enu̱we boona mubhasu̱ki̱ye, ngoku
Luhanga waanu aakoli̱ye haa Nanja Mutuku, eghi oomeei̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya etu̱we boona tubhasu̱ki̱ye.
Akakola eki niikuwo bantu baa munsi yoona bagubhe kumanya ngoku mukono ghwa
ghuli ghwa bu̱toki̱ kandi enu̱we mu̱hu̱ti̱ye
Luhanga waanu bilo nʼebilo.”
Bakama boona baa Bamooli̱ abaabaagha bughuwa ejooba bwa luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱, na bakama boona baa Banakanaani̱ abaabaagha haai na Nanja Medi̱teleni̱yani̱, baaghu̱wa ngoku
oomeei̱ye maasi Yolodaani̱. Baaghu̱wa dhee ngoku
aakaaye anoomeei̱ye maasi agha ku̱hi̱ki̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona babhasu̱ki̱ye luhande lweli̱. Du̱mbi̱ bakama aba mitima yaabakangama munda kandi maani̱ ghaabahuwa haabwa kwobaha Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba.
Bwile obu
aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Obhaake mihiyo yooghiiye ya mabaale kandi osale baana baabusaasa baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba batakasali̱ye.”
Nahabweki Yosuwa aakola mihiyo kandi aasala Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu ki̱i̱kalo baaghilaghamu Gi̱bbeyaati̱-halalooti̱.

Yosuwa aabasala nanga basaasa boona abaabaagha baku̱li̱ye kulwana bulemo bakaba mbaaku̱u̱ye obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalu̱ghagha Mi̱si̱li̱. Basaasa aba boona bakakwi̱la mu lughendo mu elungu, haanu̱ma ya ku̱lu̱gha Mi̱si̱li̱.
Basaasa boona abaalu̱ghi̱ye Mi̱si̱li̱ bakaba babasali̱ye. Bhaatu baana baabusaasa boona abaabyauwe buhyaka mu lughendo mu elungu haanu̱ma ya bantu aba ku̱lu̱gha Mi̱si̱li̱, bakaba batabasali̱ye.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakalubhatanga myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa mu elungu. Basaasa boona abaabaagha baku̱li̱ye kulwana bulemo obu bantu aba baalu̱ghagha Mi̱si̱li̱ bakaba mbaaku̱u̱ye. Eki kikabʼo nanga bakabhenga ku̱hu̱ti̱ya elaka lya
akaba naalahiiye ati tabaku̱ki̱dha mu nsi eghi aalahiiye kuha etu̱we, eghi ekwete kusendamu mata na bwoki.
Nahabweki Yosuwa aasala batabani̱ baa basaasa aba, abaabaagha baku̱li̱ye kutwala bi̱i̱kalo bya beesebo, nanga bakaba batakabasali̱ye mu kihanda mbanaghenda.
Obu baana baabusaasa boona baamali̱ye kusaluwa, bantu bʼomu ehanga lya I̱saaleeli̱ baakala hambali baghooneeye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aba baasali̱ye baki̱li̱ye.
aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Obwalo naabaahi̱yo nsoni̱ sya kuba basyana mu Mi̱si̱li̱.” Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye ki̱i̱kalo baabaaghamu eki, baakighilamu Gi̱li̱gaali̱
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabaagha banaghooni̱ye e Gi̱li̱gaali̱ mu kiigbete kya Yeli̱ko, baakola Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo lwagholo lwa kilo kya eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa kya kweli̱ oku.
Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo kyakahuwagha, kilo ekyalabhaghʼo baaliyagha byokuliya byʼomu nsi eghi, migaati̱ etalimu ki̱tu̱mbi̱so na ngano ekalangi̱ye.

Maanu yaaleka kulaghalika kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo haanu̱ma ya bantu aba kuliya byokuliya bya mu nsi eghi. Bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ tabaatodhi̱ye batunga maanu eghi, bhaatu baaliya byokuliya bya mu nsi ya Kanaani̱ mwaka oghu.

Obu Yosuwa aabaagha haai na kibugha kya Yeli̱ko, aahi̱dha maaso, aabona musaasa eemiliiye mu maaso ghe kandi akwete kihiyo. Yosuwa aaghenda hambali musaasa oghu ali, aamughila ati, “Oli muusilikale waatu kedha wa ngi̱ghu̱ syatu?”
Musaasa oghu aaghila ati, “Bbaa, si̱ye ndi mukulu wa mahe ghaa
, naasi̱ye hani kukukoonela.”
Yosuwa eegenga haali̱i̱so yee aaku̱ma hansi kandi aalami̱ya musaasa oghu. Aamughila ati, “Wai̱tu̱, si̱ye ndi mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe, buuye okubbala nkole ki?”
Du̱mbi̱ mukulu wa mahe ghaa
aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Ooyemu nkai̱to syawe mu bighele byawe, nanga weemiliiye hʼetaka li̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.” Yosuwa aayamu nkai̱to siye.
Maageeti̱ ghaa kibugha kya Yeli̱ko baaghaaghala haabwa kwobaha Banai̱saaleeli̱. Taaliyo muntu oghu aatuwaghamu kedha kutaahamu.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Yosuwa ati, “Olole, naakuhaaye kibugha kya Yeli̱ko mu mukono ghwawe, mukama wakiyo na balwani̱ baamu baamaani̱.
Uwe na baasilikale baawe mulubhatangaghe ni̱mweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ye kibugha eki mulundi ghumui bu̱li̱ kilo. Eki mukikole haabwa bilo mukaagha.

Bahongi̱ musanju̱ bu̱li̱ omui akwate ehembe lya ntaama kandi baghende bahikiiye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano. Haa kilo kyamusanju̱ mulubhatange kandi mweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ye kibugha eki milundi musanju̱, bahongi̱ mbanateela bi̱i̱di̱yo ebi.

Bakaakuteela bi̱i̱di̱yo bya mahembe ghaa ntaama, makaaghu̱wa muti elaka lyabiyo, bantu boona babu̱ghi̱le hamui nʼelaka lyamaani̱, bisiika bya kibugha eki bikwegenga hansi, du̱mbi̱ baasilikale na bantu boona bataahe mu kibugha eki kandi bakikwate.”
Nahabweki Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ aabilikila bahongi̱, aabaghila ati, “Muheeke sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
kandi bahongi̱ musanju̱ bakwate bi̱i̱di̱yo bya mahembe ghaa ntaama kandi baghende bahikiiye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
Yosuwa aaghila bantu aba ati, “Mulubhatange kandi mweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ye kibugha kya Yeli̱ko, bhaatu baasilikale haaliibo baaghenda bahikiiye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
Bahongi̱ musanju̱ abaabaagha bakwete bi̱i̱di̱yo musanju̱ baatandika kulubhatanga mu maaso ghaa
, mbanateela bi̱i̱di̱yo byabo, sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
yaaghenda ebalabhi̱ye, kusighikila ngoku Yosuwa aalaghiiye bantu aba.

Basaasa abaabaagha na byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya baaghenda bahikiiye bahongi̱ abaateelagha bi̱i̱di̱yo byabo, na baasilikale banji baaghenda bakweme sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano eghi. Bwile obu bwona bahongi̱ baanateelagha bi̱i̱di̱yo byabo.
Bhaatu Yosuwa aalaghila bantu aba ati, “Mutagugangana, mu̱holi̱ye kandi mutabu̱gha kighambo kyona, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya kilo eki nkubasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kugugangana, haaliibuwo mwagugangana.”
Yosuwa aalaghila bantu aba kutwala sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
kandi kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kibugha eki mulundi ghumui, du̱mbi̱ baakuuka hambali baghooneeye baalaalayo.
Yosuwa aamuka nkyambisi cu̱i̱ ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo kandi bahongi̱ baaheeka sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
Bahongi̱ musanju̱ abakwete bi̱i̱di̱yo byabo baaghenda bahikiiye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
mbanateela bi̱i̱di̱yo. Basaasa abakwete byakulwani̱i̱si̱ya baahikila kandi baasilikale banji baaghenda balabhi̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
, bahongi̱ mbanateela bi̱i̱di̱yo.
Haa kilo kyakabili baatodha baalubhatanga kandi beeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kibugha eki mulundi ghumui, du̱mbi̱ baakuuka hambali baabaagha baghooneeye. Eki baakikola haabwa bilo mukaagha.

Haa kilo kyamusanju̱, Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamuka nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱, baalubhatanga kandi beeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kibugha eki ngoku baakolagha. Bhaatu kilo eki beeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kibugha eki milundi musanju̱.
Mulundi ghwamusanju̱ oghu, obu bahongi̱ aba baateeye bi̱i̱di̱yo byabo, Yosuwa aalaghila bantu aba ati, “Mugugangane, nanga
aabahaaye kibugha eki!
Kibugha eki na bintu byona ebilimu mu̱bi̱hwelekeeleli̱ye nga kihonguwa ewaa
. Bhaatu Lahaabbu muumalaaya na bantu boona abali mu numba yee mubaleke bali boomi̱i̱li̱, nanga niiye akabi̱sa bambega aba twatu̱mi̱ye.
Mutatwala kintu kyona eki̱heebeu̱weyo kuhwelekeelela. Kaakuba mutwala haa bintu ebi, mukuleetela kijibu Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi kuhwelekeelela hambali baghooneeye.
Bintu byona ebi̱koleeu̱we mu siliva, feeja na byoma, ni bintu bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bya
, nahabweki mubileete mu sitoowa ya
