Obu bahongi̱ baateeye bi̱i̱di̱yo, bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ makaaghu̱wa elaka lyabiyo, baatandika kugugangana nʼelaka lyamaani̱, du̱mbi̱ bisiika bya kibugha eki byegenga, bantu aba boona baataaha mu kibugha eki kandi baakikwata.
Baahwelekeeleli̱ya na bihiyo byabo bintu byona ebyabaagha mu kibugha eki. Baata basaasa, bakali̱, baana, bantu bakulu, nte, ntaama, mbu̱li̱ na ndogooi̱.
Yosuwa aaghila basaasa babili abaabegi̱ye nsi eghi ati, “Mughende mu numba ya malaaya oghu kandi mumuuyeyo na bantu boona abali mu numba yee, ngoku mwalahiiye ewe.”

Basaasa abaabegi̱ye aba baaghenda baataaha mu numba eghi kandi baatwesi̱yamu Lahaabbu, ese wee, ni̱na wee, baana baani̱na wee na nganda siye syona esyabaagha naye, baabata enja ya hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye.
Du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ booki̱ya na mulilo kibugha eki na bintu byona ebyabaaghamu. Bintu ebi̱koleeu̱we mu siliva, feeja na byoma, baabitwala kandi baabibiika mu sitoowa ya numba ya

Bhaatu Yosuwa aajuna bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa Lahaabbu muumalaaya, ka ya ese wee, na bantu boona abaakalagha naye, nanga akabi̱sa basaasa aba Yosuwa aatu̱mi̱ye kubega kibugha kya Yeli̱ko. Baasukulu baa Lahaabbu banali mu I̱saaleeli̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.
Bwile obu Yosuwa aalahila ati, “Muntu weena oghu akutodha kulengʼo kukwela kibugha kya Yeli̱ko
akumukiina. Akaakutandika kukikwela mutabani̱ wee wa mu̱li̱ghaaso aku̱ku̱wa. Akaakutandika kukwela maageeti̱ ghaakiyo, mutabani̱ wee wʼobuto aku̱ku̱wa.”
Nahabweki
akaba ali na Yosuwa kandi Yosuwa baamumanya mu nsi ghi yoona.

aalaghila Banai̱saaleeli̱ kutatwala kintu kyona ku̱lu̱gha mu kibugha kya Yeli̱ko ekili kyakuhwelekeelela, bhaatu bataaba beesighibuwa. Omui mu bantu aba li̱i̱na liye Akaani mutabani̱ wa Kalami̱, Kalami̱ mutabani̱ wa Jabbu̱di̱, Jabbu̱di̱ mutabani̱ wa Jeela, wʼomu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da, aatwala bimui haa bintu ebili byakuhwelekeelela kandi
aasaaliluwa kwonini na Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba.

Yosuwa aatuma basaasa ku̱lu̱gha mu kibugha kya Yeli̱ko kughenda mu kibugha kya Aai̱, ekili haai na tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeti̱-aveni̱ bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Bbeteeli̱. Aabaghila ati, “Mughende kandi mubege nsi eghi.” Basaasa aba baaghenda kandi baabega kibugha kya Aai̱.

Obu baaku̱u̱ki̱ye hambali Yosuwa ali, baamughila bati, “Bantu boona bataghendayo, bhaatu oleke basaasa nga nku̱mi̱ ebili kedha esatu baghende kandi balu̱mbe kibugha kya Aai̱. Otatumayo mahe ghoona kughenda kulwana, nanga bantu baayo mbakee.”
Nahabweki basaasa nga nku̱mi̱ esatu ku̱lu̱gha mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghenda ku̱lu̱mba kibugha kya Aai̱. Bhaatu basaasa bʼomu kibugha kya Aai̱ baasi̱ngu̱la Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba.

Basaasa aba baahuma Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱lu̱gha haa geeti̱ ya kibugha kyabo kandi baata baasilikale baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ haai maku̱mi̱ asatu na mukaagha. Baabahuma kubakoti̱ya keena kandi baabahi̱ki̱ya Sebbali̱i̱mu̱. Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghu̱u̱ye eki, mitima yaabakangama munda kandi boobaha.
Yosuwa na beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatemula ngoye syabo, baata tu̱u̱tu̱ haa mituwe haabwa kutuntula kandi baalangaala haali̱i̱so yabo aaku̱ma hansi mu maaso ghaa sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano ya
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo.
Niibuwo Yosuwa aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Ai̱
Luhanga, waaleki̱ye twabhasuka maasi Yolodaani̱ kutuhaayo mu mikono ya Bamooli̱ ku̱tu̱hwelekeeleli̱ya nangaaki? Kyangubaaye kilungi etu̱we kuukala luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱!
Ai̱ Mukama, buuye mbu̱ghe ki, kubona Banai̱saaleeli̱ mbaaluka ngi̱ghu̱ syabo?
Banakanaani̱ na bantu abaakaaye mu nsi eni baku̱u̱ghu̱wa eki, baase batweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ye kandi batu̱hwelekeeleli̱ye munsi. Buuye okukola ki kwoleka bantu ngu li̱i̱na lyawe ndyamaani̱?”
aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Oomuke! Olangaaye haali̱i̱so yaawe aku̱mi̱ye hansi nangaaki?

Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasi̱i̱si̱ye kandi baatu̱wa ndaghaano yanje eghi naabalaghiiye kukwata. Baatwete bimui haa bintu ebili bya kuhwelekeelela. Baabhi̱ye bintu ebi, baabita mu bintu byabo kandi baaha bisubha bati tabali nabiyo.

Nahabweki bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ tabakugubha kutodha kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syabo. Baalu̱ki̱ye ngi̱ghu̱ syabo nanga Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba ni bantu baa kuhwelekeelela. Tankutodha kuukala naanu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱hwelekeleei̱ye bintu byona ebi muli nabiyo, ebili bya kuhwelekeelela.
“Oomuke! Weeli̱ye bantu aba kandi obateekani̱je kwisa mu maaso ghanje. Obaghambile kweteekani̱ja nanga munkiya, si̱ye

Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ nkubbala kubaghila nti, ‘Enu̱we Banai̱saaleeli̱, mu bintu byanu halimu bintu ebi naabalaghiiye ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya. Tamukutodha kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syanu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mwehiyʼo bintu ebi.’ ”
“Munkiya nkyambisi mukwisa mu maaso ghaa
ntu̱la haa ntu̱la. Ntu̱la eghi akukomamu na kaluulu ekwisa haai naye kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo. Ntu̱la eghi
akukomamu ekwisa haai naye kusighikila haa maka ghaabo. Ka eghi
akukomamu basaasa baamu bakwisa haai naye omui haa omui.
Musaasa oghu bakusanga na bintu ebyabaagha bili bya kuhwelekeelela bamwoki̱ye na mulilo na bintu byona ebi ali nabiyo, nanga aatu̱u̱ye ndaghaano ya
kandi aakola kintu kikuhemula mu I̱saaleeli̱.”
Nkyambisi cu̱i̱ ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo Yosuwa aaleeta haai Banai̱saaleeli̱ ntu̱la haa ntu̱la,
aakomamu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da.
Yosuwa aaleeta haai ntu̱la ya Yu̱da kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo,
aakomamu ntu̱la ya Bajelaahi̱. Du̱mbi̱ aaleeta mu maaso ntu̱la ya Bajelaahi̱ ka haa ka,
aakomamu ka ya Jabbu̱di̱.
Yosuwa aaleeta haai ka ya Jabbu̱di̱ musaasa omui haa omui,
aakomamu Akaani, mutabani̱ wa Kalami̱, Kalami̱ mutabani̱ wa Jabbu̱di̱, Jabbu̱di̱ mutabani̱ wa Jeela, wʼomu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da.
Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa aaghila Akaani ati, “Mutabani̱ wanje, ohe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ kandi omusinde. Ongambile endindi eki waakoli̱ye kandi otaki̱mbi̱sa.”
Akaani aakuukamu Yosuwa ati, “Ni majima! Naasi̱i̱si̱ye ewaa
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱. Kini niikiyo naakoli̱ye:
mu bintu ebi twahu̱ngi̱ye nkabonamu nkanji̱ esemeeye eghi bakoleeye Sinala,
ki̱lo ebili sya siliva na kimui kyakabili kya ki̱lo ya feeja. Bintu ebi byandheedha kandi naabitwala. Bintu ebi bili mu ki̱i̱na mu weema yanje kandi siliva niiyo eli hansi ya biyo.”
Niibuwo Yosuwa aatu̱mi̱ye batumuwa, baali̱gi̱ta kandi baataaha mu weema ya Akaani, baasangamu bintu ebi abi̱bi̱si̱ye mu weema yee kandi siliva eli hansi yabiyo.
Baasaasa aba baaya bintu ebi mu weema ya Akaani. Baabileetela Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona. Baabita byona hansi mu maaso ghaa

Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baakwata Akaani mutabani̱ wa Jeela, siliva, nkanji̱, feeja, batabani̱ be, bahala be, nte, ndogooi̱, ntaama, weema yee, na bintu byona ebi aabaagha nabiyo. Baamutwala mu kighona Akooli̱.
Yosuwa aaghila Akaani ati, “Waatuleeteeye kijibu eki nangaaki? Naawe dhee obwalo
akukuleetela kijibu.” Du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamuhuula mabaale na bantu baa ka yee boona. Booki̱ya mi̱ku̱ yabo na mulilo na bintu byona ebi aabaagha nabiyo.
Mu̱ku̱ ghwa Akaani baaghutʼo ntuumo yamaani̱ ya mabaale kandi ghanaliyo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi. Du̱mbi̱
aaleka kusaaliluwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba. Nahabweki ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu ki̱i̱kalo eki baatandika kukighilamu kighona Akooli̱.

aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Otoobaha kandi otahuwa maani̱. Otwale mahe ghaawe ghoona haa bulemo, mughende mu̱lu̱mbe kibugha kya Aai̱. Naataaye mu mukono ghwawe mukama wa Aai̱, bantu be, kibugha kiye na nsi yee.
Okole kibugha kya Aai̱ na mukama wakiyo ngoku waakoli̱ye kibugha kya Yeli̱ko na mukama wakiyo. Muuyeyo bisolo byamu nga mughabo ghwanu. Mwebi̱se haai na kibugha eki enu̱ma syakiyo.”
Nahabweki Yosuwa eeteekani̱ja na baasilikale be boona kughenda ku̱lu̱mba kibugha kya Aai̱. Aakomamu baasilikale be baamaani̱ mitwalo esatu aabatuma kughendayo mukilo.
Aabalaghila ati, “Mughende mwebi̱se haai na kibugha eki enu̱ma syakiyo. Mutaghenda haseli̱ye ku̱lu̱gha haa kibugha eki, bhaatu muukale mweteekani̱je ku̱ki̱lu̱mba.
Si̱ye hamui na bantu boona abali nanje, tukwebinga kibugha eki. Bantu baamu bakaakwisa kulwana naatu, tukubaaluka ngoku twadu̱bhi̱ye kukola.
Bakutuhuma ku̱hi̱ki̱ya tu̱leki̱ye boona bahooye mu kibugha eki. Bakughila bati, ‘Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakwete kutuuluka ngoku baadu̱bhi̱ye kukola.’ Nahabweki etu̱we tukuuluka bantu aba.
Du̱mbi̱ enu̱we mu̱lu̱ghe hambali mwebi̱si̱ye kandi mukwate kibugha eki.
Luhanga waanu akubaha kiyo mu mukono ghwanu.
Mukaakukwata kibugha eki, mu̱kyoki̱ye na mulilo. Mukikole kusighikila ngoku
aabalaghiiye. Mulole ngu mwakwete ebi naabalaghiiye.”

Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa aabatuma. Baaghenda mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali bakwebi̱sa, ekili haagati ya Bbeteeli̱ na kibugha kya Aai̱, ekili bughuwa ejooba bwa kibugha kya Aai̱. Bhaatu Yosuwa na baasilikale banji baalaala hambali baabaagha baghooneeye.
Yosuwa aamuka nkyambisi cu̱i̱ kandi aakumaani̱ya bantu be, baakoma kughenda mu kibugha kya Aai̱, bengei̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ babahikiiye.
Baasilikale boona abaabaagha na Yosuwa baakoma kandi beebinga kibugha eki. Baaghoona elughulu ya kibugha kya Aai̱ luhande lweli̱ lwa kighona.
Yosuwa aatwala basaasa nga nku̱mi̱ etaano, aababi̱sa haagati ya Bbeteeli̱ na Aai̱, bughuwa ejooba bwa kibugha eki.
Baateekani̱ja mahe mu bi̱i̱kalo byaghʼo, mahe ghaamaani̱ baaghata elughulu ya kibugha eki, ghanji ghoona baaghata bughuwa ejooba bwakiyo. Yosuwa aaghenda aalaala mu kighona.

Obu mukama wa kibugha kya Aai̱ aaboone Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba, eye na basaasa be boona bʼomu kibugha eki, baamuka nkyambisi cu̱i̱, baaghenda kulwana bulemo na Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu kighona kya maasi Yolodaani̱.
Bhaatu ataamanya ngoku haliyo abamwebi̱si̱li̱i̱ye enu̱ma sya kibugha eki.
Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba aabaagha nabo beefoola nga bantu baasaaghu̱u̱we kulwana kandi baaluka mbaghenda mu elungu.
Mukama oghu aabilikila basaasa boona abaabaagha bati̱ghaaye mu kibugha kya Aai̱ kughenda kuhuma mahe ghaa Yosuwa. Beeyongela kubahuma ku̱hi̱ki̱ya baseli̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu kibugha eki.
Taabaayʼo musaasa nʼomui oghu akati̱ghala mu kibugha kya Aai̱ kedha Bbeteeli̱ oghu ataaghendi̱ye kuhuma Banai̱saaleeli̱. Baati̱gha kibugha eki kiighuuye kandi baghenda kuhuma Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Yosuwa ati, “Oomu̱ki̱ye eti̱mu̱ okwete mu mukono ghwawe oli̱loli̱ye kibugha kya Aai̱, nanga nkukuhaakiyo mu mukono ghwawe.” Nahabweki Yosuwa ongota eti̱mu̱ liye kibugha kya Aai̱.
Yosuwa akaba makaamu̱ki̱ya mukono ghuwe, basaasa abaabaagha beebi̱si̱ye baamuka bwangu-bwangu, baali̱gi̱ta mu kibugha eki kandi baakikwata. Du̱mbi̱ baakyoki̱ya na mulilo.

Obu basaasa bʼomu kibugha kya Aai̱ baaloli̱ye enu̱ma, baabona mwi̱ka ngucuuka mu mwanya mu kibugha eki. Bhaatu baabuluwa haa kuulukila, nanga Banai̱saaleeli̱ abaabaalukagha kughenda mu elungu bakakuuka kandi baasa kulwana nabo.

Obu Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baaboone ngoku baanakyabo abaabaagha beebi̱si̱ye baamali̱ye kukwata kibugha eki kandi mwi̱ka ngucuukamu, baakuuka kandi baatandika kwita basaasa bʼomu kibugha kya Aai̱.

Baasilikale baa I̱saaleeli̱ abaabaagha mukati ya kibugha eki baatuwayo kwisa kandi kulwana na ngi̱ghu̱ syabo esi. Nahabweki basaasa bʼomu kibugha kya Aai̱ baaba hagaati ya bi̱bbu̱la bibili bya baasilikale baa I̱saaleeli̱. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baata bantu aba boona kandi taabaayʼo nʼomui oghu akagubha kukila kedha kuuluka.
Bhaatu mukama wa kibugha kya Aai̱ niiye baakwete anaakaaye kandi baamutwala ewaa Yosuwa.

Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamali̱ye kwita mu elungu bantu boona bʼomu kibugha kya Aai̱ abaaghendi̱ye babahumiye, mbaabaata boona na kihiyo, Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baakuuka mu kibugha kya Aai̱ kandi baata na kihiyo bantu boona abaabaaghamu.
Kilo eki baata bantu bʼomu kibugha kya Aai̱ mutwalo ghumui na nku̱mi̱ ebili basaasa na bakali̱.
Yosuwa ataasu̱ndu̱ki̱ya mukono oghu aabaagha aamu̱ki̱i̱ye oghukwete eti̱mu̱ elyongoti̱ye kibugha kya Aai̱ eki ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ahwelekeleei̱ye bantu abaakaayemu boona.
Bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatwala bintu bya mughaso na bisolo ebi baahu̱ngi̱ye mu kibugha eki, kusighikila ngoku
aalaghiiye Yosuwa.
Nahabweki Yosuwa na baasilikale be booki̱ya kibugha kya Aai̱ kandi kyabhiihila kimui bilo nʼebilo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya ngoku kili endindi.

Mukama wa kibugha kya Aai̱ oghu Yosuwa aamu̱dhodhooki̱ya haa mpaghi. Aamulekʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo. Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, aalaghila basaasa be kuuyʼo mu̱ku̱ oghu. Baaghukuba hanja ya geeti̱ ya kibugha eki kandi baaghu̱swi̱ki̱la na ntuumo yamaani̱ ya mabaale. Mabaale agha ghanaliyo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.
Bwile obu Yosuwa aakwelela
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa haa mwena Ebbali.
Aakikwela ngoku Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa

aalaghiiye Banai̱saaleeli̱, ngoku kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kya bilaghilo eki Musa aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ati, “Muli na kukwela kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa na mabaale ghataatakaki̱i̱ye kandi mutakoleesi̱ya kyoma kyona.” Baakihongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye bya
. Baahongelʼo dhee bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona banaloli̱ye, Yosuwa aahandiika haa mabaale ghanji kopi̱ ya bilaghilo ebi Musa aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona, banamahanga, bataka, bengei̱ baabo, balemi̱ na bacu̱ baabo, beemilila baloli̱ye sandu̱u̱ku̱ ya ndaghaano, mu maaso ghaa bahongi̱ Baleevi̱ abaaghiheekagha. Kimui kyakabili kya bantu kyemilila kihaaye mughongo mwena Geli̱ji̱i̱mu̱. Kimui kyakabili kinji kya bantu kyemilila kihaaye mughongo mwena Ebbali, kusighikila ngoku Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
aadu̱bhi̱ye kubalaghila, niikuwo bahe mu̱gi̱sa bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱.
Niibuwo Yosuwa aasomi̱ye bighambo byona ebili mu kilaghilo, ebilimu mi̱gi̱sa na mikiino, kusighikila ngoku byona bihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kya Bilaghilo.
Taabaayʼo kighambo na kimui haa ebi Musa aalaghiiye, eki Yosuwa ataasomeeye ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona, otaayemu bakali̱, baana na banamahanga abaakaaye na Banai̱saaleeli̱.

Bakama boona baa luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱ mu kyalo kya bwena, na mu kiigbete ku̱hi̱ka haa ki̱si̱yo kya Nanja Namu̱li̱to ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱ eghi elolaane na mwena ghwa Lebbanooni̱, bakama baa Bahi̱ti̱, Bamooli̱, Banakanaani̱, Bapeleeji̱, Bahi̱vi̱ na Bayebu̱si̱, baaghu̱wa ekyabaaye mu kibugha kya Aai̱.
Bakama aba boona baakumaani̱ya hamui mahe ghaabo nga muntu omui kulwana na Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Obu bantu bʼomu kibugha kya Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱ baaghu̱u̱ye eki Yosuwa aakoli̱ye mu kibugha kya Yeli̱ko na Aai̱,

baatu̱wamu kudimaaga Yosuwa. Bamui mu bantu aba baaleeta gu̱ni̱ya sikulu esi baataaghamu byokuliya. Baaleeta mpu sikulu esi baahi̱i̱si̱li̱yaghamu vi̱i̱ni̱ esi̱tobhoki̱ye. Bintu ebi baabi̱heeki̱ya ndogooi̱ syabo.
Basaasa aba baalu̱waala nkai̱to sikulu sibhandi̱ki̱ye na ngoye sikulu. Baatwala migaati̱ yoomi̱ye kandi eghi ehu̱mbi̱ye.
Baaghenda e Gi̱li̱gaali̱ hambali Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye. Baabaghila bati, “Tu̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu ehanga eliselaane na hani. Gutu mukole naatu ndaghaano ya bu̱si̱nge.”
Bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakuukamu Bahi̱vi̱ aba bati, “Mukugubha kuba muukaaye haai naatu, buuye tukukola naanu ndaghaano ya bu̱si̱nge nangaaki?”
Bantu aba baaghila Yosuwa bati, “Tuli baheeleli̱ya baawe.”
Bhaatu Yosuwa aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Muli baki kandi mu̱lu̱ghi̱ye haa?”
Baamughila bati, “Tuli baheeleli̱ya baawe, abaalu̱ghi̱ye mu ehanga hambali haseli̱ye. Twaghu̱u̱ye ngoku
Luhanga waawe ali wamaani̱ na byona ebi aakoli̱ye mu Mi̱si̱li̱.

Twaghu̱u̱ye ebi aakoli̱yʼo bakama babili baa Bamooli̱ luhande lweli̱ lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yolodaani̱. Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Hesi̱bbooni̱ na Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani, oghu akaba aakaaye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Asi̱talooti̱.

Beebembeli̱ baatu na bantu boona abaakaaye mu nsi yaatu baatughambiiye kuteekani̱ja byokuliya bya lughendo luni kandi kwisa kusanga-sangaana naanu, kubaghambila ngoku tuli baheeleli̱ya baanu kandi kusaba enu̱we kukola naatu ndaghaano ya bu̱si̱nge.
Mulole migaati̱ yaatu. Obu twalu̱ghi̱ye nayo mu ehanga lyatu kwisa kukusanga-sangaana naanu ekaba esemeeye. Bhaatu mulole! Endindi yoomi̱ye kandi ehu̱mbi̱ye.
Obu twataagha bintu mu mpu sini, sikaba sinali sihyaka, bhaatu olole, syatobhoki̱ye. Ngoye syatu na nkai̱to syatu syakaakuuye haabwa lughendo kusela.”
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaliya haa byokuliya bya bantu aba, bhaatu bataabu̱u̱li̱ya
eki bali na kukola.
Yosuwa aakola ndaghaano ya bu̱si̱nge na bantu baa Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱ kutabaata. Beebembeli̱ baa ki̱bbu̱la kya I̱saaleeli̱ baalahila kulinda ndaghaano eghi.
Haanu̱ma ya bilo bisatu bakoli̱ye ndaghaano eghi, Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghu̱wa ngoku bantu aba baakaaye haai nabo.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatandika lughendo, obu baamali̱ye bilo bisatu mbanaghenda, baaki̱dha mu bibugha bya bantu aba. Bibugha ebi niibiyo bini: Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱, Kefi̱i̱la, Bbelooti̱ na Ki̱li̱yaati̱-yali̱i̱mu̱.
Bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ bataalu̱mba bantu aba, nanga beebembeli̱ baa ki̱bbu̱la eki bakaba mbaalahiiye ewaa bantu aba mu li̱i̱na lya
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ kutabaata.
Bantu boona baasoghosa beebembeli̱ aba haabwa kukola ndaghaano eghi.
Bhaatu beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baaghila ki̱bbu̱la eki bati, “Twamali̱ye kulahila ewaabo mu li̱i̱na lya
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ kandi endindi tatukugubha kubalu̱mba.
Kini niikiyo tukukola. Tatukubaata, nanga Luhanga akusaaliluwa naatu kwonini kandi atufubila haabwa eki twalahiiye ewaa bantu aba.”

Beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabaghila bati, “Mubaleke bali boomi̱i̱li̱, balaseenelagha nkui kandi baheekelaghe maasi ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱.” Eki beebembeli̱ aba baatu̱u̱yemu niikiyo kyakoleeu̱we.
Yosuwa aabilikila Banagi̱bbi̱yooni̱ aba, aabaghila ati, “Mwatudimaagi̱ye nangaaki? Nkiki kyaleki̱ye mwaghila muti muukaaye mu nsi eghi eseleeye kimui kuni muukaaye haai naatu?
Nahabweki mwaki̱i̱nu̱u̱we, bantu baanu balaakalagha bali baheeleli̱ya baatu, balatuseenelagha nkui kandi baheekaghe maasi ghaa ku̱koleesi̱ya mu numba ya Luhanga wanje.”
Baakuukamu Yosuwa bati, “Ekyaleki̱ye twakola eki, tukamanya kwonini ngoku
Luhanga waawe aalaghiiye mu̱heeleli̱ya wee Musa kuha enu̱we nsi eni yoona kandi ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya bantu boona abaakaayemu. Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye twobaha tuti mukutwita.
Nahabweki tuli mu mikono yaawe, otukole eki oboone ki̱hi̱ki̱ye.”
Nahabweki Yosuwa aajuna bantu aba Banai̱saaleeli̱ kubaata.
Kilo eki kyonini Yosuwa aafoola Banagi̱bbi̱yooni̱ aba abalaseenelagha nkui kandi baheekelaghe maasi ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
, mu ki̱i̱kalo eki
akukoma. Oghu niighuwo mulimo banaakukola ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.

Mukama wa Yelusaalemu baamughilaghamu Adoni̱jedeeki̱. Aaghu̱wa ngoku Yosuwa aakwete kibugha kya Aai̱ kandi ngoku aakwete kibugha kya Yeli̱ko. Aaghu̱wa ngoku Yosuwa aahwelekeleei̱ye bibugha ebi na bakama baabiyo. Aaghu̱wa dhee ngoku Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakoli̱ye ndaghaano ya bu̱si̱nge na Banagi̱bbi̱yooni̱ kandi ngoku beelaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kutalu̱mba Banagi̱bbi̱yooni̱ aba. Aaghu̱wa ngoku Banagi̱bbi̱yooni̱ baakaaye haai na Banai̱saaleeli̱.

Mukama oghu na bantu baa Yelusaalemu boobahila kimui, nanga kibugha kya Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱ kikaba kili kiinamu̱li̱to nga bibugha binji byona bya bakama. Kibugha eki kikaba ki̱neeti̱ye kusaali̱ya kibugha kya Aai̱ kandi basaasa baamu boona bakaba bali balwani̱ baamaani̱.

Nahabweki Adoni̱jedeeki̱ mukama wa Yelusaalemu aatuma butumuwa ewaa Hohaamu mukama wa Hebbu̱looni̱, Pilaamu mukama wa Yalamu̱ti̱, Yafi̱ya mukama wa Laki̱si̱ na Debbi̱li̱ mukama wa Egu̱looni̱, naaghila ati,
“Mwise kandi munkoonele ku̱lu̱mba bantu bʼomu kibugha kya Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱, nanga baakoli̱ye ndaghaano ya bu̱si̱nge na Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱.”

Bakama bataano baa Bamooli̱: wa Yelusaalemu, wa Hebbu̱looni̱, wa Yalamu̱ti̱, wa Laki̱si̱, na wa Egu̱looni̱, baakumaani̱ya mahe ghaabo, baaghenda na mahe agha ghoona kandi beeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kibugha kya Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱, baatandika kulwana na bantu baamu.

Basaasa bʼomu kibugha kya Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱ baatuma butumuwa ewaa Yosuwa e Gi̱li̱gaali̱ hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghooneeye, baaghila bati, “Otatuleka etu̱we baheeleli̱ya baawe. Wiise bwangu otukoonele kandi otujune, nanga bakama baa Bamooli̱ boona bʼomu kyalo kya bwena baakumaani̱i̱ye mahe ghaabo kandi baasi̱ye ku̱tu̱lu̱mba.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa aatwala mahe ghe ghoona, baalu̱gha Gi̱li̱gaali̱, otaayemu basaasa be boona balwani̱ baamaani̱.
aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Otaboobaha, nanga naakuhaaye bantu aba mu mukono ghwawe. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui mu bantu aba oghu akugubha kukulwani̱i̱si̱ya kandi ku̱ku̱si̱ngu̱la.”
Yosuwa aalubhatanga mukilo yoona ku̱lu̱gha Gi̱li̱gaali̱ kandi aaki̱dhʼo mahe ghaa Bamooli̱ batamani̱ye.

aaleka Bamooli̱ boobaha obu baaboone mahe ghaa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baata bakani̱ye mu bantu aba e Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱. Baaghenda babahumiye mu luguudhe olu̱ghendi̱ye Bbeti̱-holooni̱. Beeyongela kwita Bamooli̱ aba ku̱hi̱ka Ajeka na Makeda.
Obu Bamooli̱ baanaalukagha Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu luguudhe olu̱honi̱ye Bbeti̱-holooni̱,

aatooni̱ya mbu̱la yamaani̱ ya lubaale ku̱lu̱gha mu mwanya, yaahuula Bamooli̱ aba ku̱hi̱ki̱ya baki̱dhi̱ye Ajeka. Mbu̱la ya lubaale eghi yaata bakani̱ye mu Bamooli̱ aba kusaali̱ya aba Banai̱saaleeli̱ baati̱ye na kihiyo.
Kilo eki
aagu̱bhi̱i̱si̱i̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱si̱ngu̱la Bamooli̱ aba, Yosuwa aasaba ewaa
mu maaso ghaa Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona ati,
“Uwe musana weemilile haa mwena Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱
kandi uwe kweli̱, weemilile mu kighona kya Aiyalooni̱.”
Musana ghwemilila kandi kweli̱ kwaleka kughenda,
ku̱hi̱ki̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ basi̱ngu̱u̱ye ngi̱ghu̱ syabo,
ngoku kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo eki Yasaali̱ aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye.
Musana ghwemilila mu mwanya kandi ghwamala kilo kyona ghutakakoti̱ye.
Ku̱lu̱gha hambele ku̱hi̱ka haa kilo eki kandi ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu, hakaba hatakabaaghʼo kilo ngʼeki. Kilo eki
aaghu̱u̱ye kusaba kwa muntu, nanga
aalwanililagha Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona, baakuuka e Gi̱li̱gaali̱ hambali baabaagha baghooneeye.
Bakama bataano baa Bamooli̱ aba baaluka kandi beebi̱sa mu ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale e Makeda.
Bantu baaghambila Yosuwa bati, “Twaboone bakama bataano baa Bamooli̱ beebi̱si̱ye mu ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale e Makeda.”
Yosuwa aaghila ati, “Mu̱hi̱li̱ngi̱ti̱ye mabaale ghaanamu̱li̱to, mughaswi̱ki̱le haa mu̱nu̱wa ghwa ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale eki kandi mutʼo bali̱ndi̱ kukilinda.
Bhaatu enu̱we mutaakalʼo. Muhume ngi̱ghu̱ syanu kandi mubaki̱dhi̱le enu̱ma kubalu̱mba. Mutabasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kuuluka kughenda mu bibugha byabo, nanga
Luhanga waanu aataaye bantu aba mu mukono ghwanu.”

Obu Yosuwa na bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ baati̱ye baasilikale baa ngi̱ghu̱ syabo bakani̱ye kandi mbabbala kubamalʼo boona, bakee abaati̱ghaayʼo baali̱gi̱ta kandi beebi̱sa mu bibugha byabo ebili na bigho bikangami̱ye.
Mahe ghaa Banai̱saaleeli̱ ghoona ghaakuuka kusemeeye ewaa Yosuwa hambali baabaagha baghooneeye e Makeda. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akagubha ku̱bu̱ghʼo kubhi bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱.
Yosuwa aaghila ati, “Muughule mu̱nu̱wa ghwa ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale eki kandi muuyemu bakama bataano aba mubandeetele.”
Baaghula ki̱i̱na eki kandi baayamu bakama bataano aba, mukama wa Yelusaalemu, wa Hebbu̱looni̱, wa Yalamu̱ti̱, wa Laki̱si̱ na wa Egu̱looni̱.

Obu baaleeti̱ye bakama aba hambali Yosuwa ali, aabilikila bakulu baa mahe baa I̱saaleeli̱ abaabaagha naye. Aabaghila ati, “Mwise hani mukpeete bakama bani bikiya.” Nahabweki baasa kandi baakpeeta bakama aba bikiya.
Yosuwa aabaghila ati, “Mutoobaha kandi mutahuwa maani̱, mube baamaani̱ kandi mugume.
niikuwo akukola atiyo ngi̱ghu̱ syanu syona aba mukulwana nabo.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa aata bakama bataano aba, mi̱ku̱ yabo aghi̱dhodhooki̱ya haa mpaghi etaano, bu̱li̱ mu̱ku̱ haa mpaghi yaghuwo, yaakala edhodhooki̱yʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya lwagholo.

Obu musana ghwaghendagha kukota, Yosuwa aalaghila bantu baaya mi̱ku̱ eghi haa mpaghi esi kandi baaghikuba mu ki̱i̱na kyʼebaale hambali bakama aba baabaagha beebi̱si̱ye. Baaghala mu̱nu̱wa ghwa ki̱i̱na eki na mabaale ghaanamu̱li̱to aghanaliyo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.

Kilo eki, Yosuwa aakwata kibugha kya Makeda na mukama wakiyo kandi aaki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya. Aata mukama wa kibugha eki na kihiyo. Bantu abaabaagha mu kibugha eki, boona aabaata kandi ataati̱ghʼo muntu nʼomui. Aata mukama oghu ngoku aati̱ye mukama wa kibugha kya Yeli̱ko.
Niibuwo Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona abaabaagha naye, baalu̱ghi̱ye Makeda baaghenda kandi baaki̱dha mu kibugha kya Libbuna kandi baalwana na bantu bʼomu kibugha eki.

aahaayo dhee kibugha eki na mukama wakiyo mu mukono ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Baata na kihiyo bantu boona abaabaaghamu, bataati̱ghʼo nʼomui. Yosuwa aata mukama wa kibugha kya Libbuna eki ngoku aati̱ye mukama wa kibugha kya Yeli̱ko.
Niibuwo Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona baalu̱ghi̱ye Libbuna kandi baaghenda Laki̱si̱, beeli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kibugha eki kandi baaki̱lu̱mba.

aaha kibugha kya Laki̱si̱ mu mukono ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Yosuwa aakwata kibugha eki haa kilo kyakabili. Aaki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya na kihiyo kandi aata bantu boona abaabaaghamu, ngoku aakoli̱ye mu kibugha kya Libbuna.
Niibuwo Holaamu mukama wa kibugha kya Gejeli̱, aasi̱ye kukoonela bantu bʼomu kibugha kya Laki̱si̱. Yosuwa aamwita na mahe ghe ghoona ataati̱ghʼo muntu nʼomui.
Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona abaabaagha naye baalu̱gha Laki̱si̱ baaghenda mu kibugha kya Egu̱looni̱, baakyeli̱ghi̱li̱li̱ya kandi baaki̱lu̱mba.
Baakwata kibugha eki kilo eki kyonini, baaki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya na kihiyo. Kilo eki aahwelekeeleli̱ya bantu boona abaabaagha mu kibugha eki, ngoku aakoli̱ye mu kibugha kya Laki̱si̱.
Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona abaabaagha naye baalu̱gha Egu̱looni̱, baaghenda mu kibugha kya Hebbu̱looni̱ kandi baaki̱lu̱mba.

Baakwata kibugha eki kandi baata na kihiyo mukama wakiyo na bantu boona abaabaaghamu na bantu abaabaagha mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaakiyo, ngoku baakoli̱ye mu kibugha kya Egu̱looni̱. Yosuwa aahwelekeeleli̱ya bantu aba boona kandi ataati̱ghʼo muntu nʼomui ali mwomi̱i̱li̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona abaabaagha naye, baakuuka mu kibugha kya Debbi̱li̱ kandi baaki̱lu̱mba.

Baakwata kibugha eki, mukama wakiyo na maatau̱ni̱ ghaamu ghoona. Baaki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kandi baata na kihiyo bantu abaabaaghamu boona, bataati̱ghʼo nʼomui. Baakola kibugha kya Debbi̱li̱ na mukama wakiyo ngoku baakoli̱ye kibugha kya Hebbu̱looni̱ na Libbuna na bakama baa bibugha ebi.

Nahabweki Yosuwa aakwata nsi eghi yoona, kyalo kya bwena, Negeebbu, kyalo kya kiigbete, byalo bya mu nti̱na ya bwena na bakama baa byalo ebi byona. Aata bantu boona abaabaagha mu nsi eghi, ataati̱ghʼo nʼomui, ngoku
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ aalaghiiye.
Yosuwa aakwata kyalo kya haagati ya kibugha kya Kadesi̱-bbaluneya na Gaja na kyalo kyona kya Goseeni̱, ku̱hi̱ka Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱.
Bwile obu Yosuwa aakwata bakama aba boona na nsi syabo, nanga
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ niiye aalwanililagha Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona abaabaagha naye, baakuuka hambali baabaagha baghooneeye e Gi̱li̱gaali̱.
Obu Yabbini mukama wa Hajooli̱ aaghu̱u̱ye eki, aatuma butumuwa ewaa bakama bani: Yobbaabbu mukama wa Madooni̱ na mukama wa Si̱mu̱looni̱ na mukama wa Akisaafu.
Aatodha aatuma butumuwa mu bakama bʼomu elughulu mu kyalo kya bwena, mu kighona kya Alaba eku̱wa ya Ki̱neleti̱.
Aatuma dhee butumuwa mu bantu bʼomu kiigbete kya Napu̱tooli̱-dooli̱ bughuwa ejooba.

Aatuma dhee butumuwa mu Banakanaani̱ abali bu̱lu̱gha ejooba na bughuwa ejooba, ewaa Bamooli̱, Bahi̱ti̱, Bapeleeji̱, na Bayebu̱si̱ abaabaagha baakaaye mu kyalo kya bwena. Hakaba halimu dhee Bahi̱vi̱ abaabaagha baakaaye mu nti̱na ya mwena Helu̱mooni̱ mu kyalo kya Mijipa.
Bakama aba baasa na mahe ghaabo ghakani̱ye nga musene ghwa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja. Baasa dhee na nkai̱na kandi na bigaali̱ bikaniiye kimui.
Bakama aba boona balungani̱ya mahe ghaabo kandi baasa baaghoona hamui haai na maasi ghaa Meloomu̱ kulwana na Banai̱saaleeli̱.
aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Otaboobaha, nanga munkiya bwile nga buni, boona nkubaha Banai̱saaleeli̱ kubaata. Nkai̱na syabo osijombakake bitolonsi kandi bigaali̱ byabo obyoki̱ye na mulilo.”
Du̱mbi̱ Yosuwa aasa na bantu be balwani̱, beedu̱ngi̱li̱sani̱ya bantu aba kandi baabalu̱mba haai na maasi ghaa Meloomu̱.

aahaayo bantu aba mu mukono ghwa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Baabasi̱ngu̱la kandi baabahuma, baabahi̱ki̱ya mu kibugha kikulu Si̱dooni̱ na kibugha kya Mi̱si̱lefooti̱-mayi̱mu̱ kandi bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa kighona kya Mijipa. Baabaata kandi baataati̱ghʼo muntu nʼomui.
Yosuwa aabakola ngoku
aamulaghiiye. Aajomba nkai̱na syabo bitolonsi kandi ooki̱ya bigaali̱ byabo na mulilo.
Bwile obu, Yosuwa aakuuka kandi aakwata kibugha kya Hajooli̱, aata mukama wakiyo na kihiyo. Hajooli̱ niibuwo bwabaagha bukama bukulu obwabaagha busaaye makama ghanji agha ghoona.
Baata na kihiyo bantu boona abaabaagha mu kibugha eki kandi baabahwelekeeleli̱ya, bataati̱ghʼo muntu nʼomui ali mwomi̱i̱li̱, booki̱ya kibugha kya Hajooli̱ eki na mulilo.
Yosuwa aakwata bibugha ebi byona na bakama baabiyo kandi aabaata na kihiyo. Aabahwelekeeleli̱ya kwonini, ngoku Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
aalaghiiye.
Bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ tabookeei̱ye bibugha byona ebyabaagha bikweuwe haa bwena, kuuyʼo kibugha kya Hajooli̱, niikiyo kyonkaha Yosuwa ookeei̱ye.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ baahu̱nga bisolo byona na bintu bisemeeye ebi baasangi̱ye mu bibugha ebi, baata bantu boona abaabaaghamu na kihiyo kandi baabahwelekeeleli̱ya. Bataati̱ghʼo muntu nʼomui ali mwomi̱i̱li̱.
ngoku aalaghiiye mu̱heeleli̱ya wee Musa, Musa naye niikuwo aalaghiiye Yosuwa. Yosuwa aakola eki Musa aamulaghiiye. Taaliyo kintu na kimui eki ataakoli̱ye, eki
aalaghiiye Musa.
Yosuwa aakwata nsi eghi yoona, ehanga lya keena, Negeebbu yoona, kyalo kya Goseeni̱, nsi ya kiigbete yoona, Alaba na kyalo kya bwena kya I̱saaleeli̱ na kiigbete kyakiyo.
Baakwata kyalo ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena Halaki̱ haai na Seyi̱li̱, ku̱hi̱ka Bbaali̱-gaadi̱ mu kighona kya Lebbanooni̱, eku̱wa ya mwena ghwa Helu̱mooni̱. Aakwata bakama boona baa byalo ebi kandi aabaata.
Yosuwa aalwana na bakama aba haabwa bwile bukani̱ye.

Taabaayʼo bantu bʼomu kibugha na kimui abaakoli̱ye ndaghaano ya bu̱si̱nge na Banai̱saaleeli̱ kuuyʼo Bahi̱vi̱ bʼomu kibugha kya Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baalwana bulemo na bantu bʼomu bibugha binji byona kubikwata.
niiye oomakakani̱yagha mitima ya bantu aba, niikuwo balwane na Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba babaate kandi batabaghilila kisa, bhaatu babahwelekeeleli̱ye, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.

Bwile obu Yosuwa aaghenda kandi aata Banaki̱ abaabaagha mu kyalo kya bwena, nʼomu Hebbu̱looni̱, Debbi̱li̱, Anaabbu na mu ehanga lyona lya keena lya Yu̱da nʼomu kyalo kya bwena kyona kya I̱saaleeli̱. Yosuwa aabahwelekeeleli̱ya boona na bibugha byabo.
Taabaayʼo Munaki̱ nʼomui oghu akati̱ghalʼo mu nsi ya bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱, bhaatu bakee munu niibo baati̱ghaaye mu Gaja, Gaati̱ na Asi̱doodi̱.
Yosuwa aakwata nsi eghi yoona, kusighikila haa byona ebi
aaghambiiye Musa. Yosuwa aaghiha Banai̱saaleeli̱ nga bugwetuwa bwabo kandi aabatambulani̱ya nsi eghi kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo. Nahabweki nsi eghi yaateekaana ku̱lu̱gha mu bulemo.

Bani niibo bakama baa nsi eghi Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasi̱ngu̱u̱ye kandi baatwala nsi yabo luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱ bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, ku̱lu̱gha mu kighona kya maasi Alu̱nooni̱ ku̱hi̱ka haa mwena Helu̱mooni̱, otaayemu Alaba yoona bu̱lu̱gha ejooba:

Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱ oghu aakalagha Hesi̱bbooni̱ kandi alemeeye Alu̱weeli̱, eghi eli haa kumaliilila kwa kighona kya maasi Alu̱nooni̱, ku̱lu̱gha haagati ya kighona eki ku̱hi̱ka haa maasi Yabboki̱ na kimui kyakabili kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, haa mutaano ghwabo na Bamooni̱.

Akaba alemi̱ye dhee kyalo kya bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Alaba, ku̱lu̱gha haa Nanja ya Ki̱neleti̱ ku̱hi̱ka haa nanja ya Alaba, eghi bakughilaghamu Nanja ya Kisula, ku̱hi̱ka Bbeti̱-yesi̱mooti̱ kandi ku̱hi̱ka mu nti̱na ya mwena ghwa Pisiga.
Baasi̱ngu̱la dhee Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani omui haa Balefahi̱mu̱ abaati̱ghaayʼo, oghu aakalagha Asi̱talooti̱ na Edeleeyi̱.

Akaba alemi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena ghwa Helu̱mooni̱, Saleka na Bbasaani yoona ku̱hi̱ka haa mutaano ghwa Bagesu̱li̱ na Bamaaka na kimui kyakabili kinji kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ haa mutaano na Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Hesi̱bbooni̱.
Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasi̱ngu̱la bakama babili aba. Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
aaha nsi eghi ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase kughitwala.

Yosuwa na Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasi̱ngu̱la bakama boona baa kyalo kya luhande lweli̱ lwa bughuwa ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱, ku̱lu̱gha Bbaali̱-gaadi̱ mu kighona kya Lebbanooni̱ ku̱hi̱ka haa mwena Halaki̱ oghulolaane na Seyi̱li̱. Yosuwa aatambulani̱ya nsi eghi ntu̱la sinji esyati̱ghaaye sya I̱saaleeli̱ kandi aabahaayo kughitwala.
Nsi eghi ekaba elimu kyalo kya bwena, kyalo kya kiigbete, Alaba, nti̱na ya bwena, elungu na Negeebbu, nsi ya Bahi̱ti̱, Bamooli̱, Banakanaani̱, Bapeleeji̱, Bahi̱vi̱ na Bayebu̱si̱.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baasi̱ngu̱la bakama baa bibugha bini: Yeli̱ko, Aai̱ ekilabhaane na Bbeteeli̱,
Yelusaalemu, Hebbu̱looni̱,
Yalamu̱ti̱, Laki̱si̱,
Egu̱looni̱, Gejeli̱,
Debbi̱li̱, Gedeli̱,
Holu̱ma, Aladi̱,
Libbuna, Adulaamu,
Makeda, Bbeteeli̱,
Tapuwa, Hefeli̱,
Afeki̱, Lasalooni̱,
Madooni̱, Hajooli̱,
Si̱mu̱looni̱-melooni̱, Akisaafu,
Tanaki̱, Mi̱gi̱do,
Kedesi̱, Yokinaamu eghi eli Kalameeli̱,
Dooli̱ eghi eli Nafi̱si̱-doola, Gohi̱mu̱ eghi eli Gi̱li̱gaali̱,
na Ti̱lu̱ja. Boona bakaba bali bakama maku̱mi̱ asatu nʼomui.
Yosuwa akaba naakaakuuye kandi ali na myaka ekani̱ye.
aamughila ati, “Waakaakuuye kandi hanaliyo nsi ekani̱ye eghi enati̱ghaaye kutwala.
Eni niiyo nsi eghi enati̱ghaaye: Byalo byona bya Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱ na Bagesu̱li̱,

ku̱lu̱gha haa maasi Si̱hooli̱ bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Mi̱si̱li̱ ku̱hi̱ka elughulu haa mutaano ghwa Eku̱looni̱, kyalo kyona eki bakughilaghamu kya Banakanaani̱. Ekyabaaghamu bakama bataano baa Bafi̱li̱si̱ti̱ bani: wa Gaja, wa Asi̱doodi̱, wa Asi̱kelooni̱, wa Gaati̱ na wa Eku̱looni̱. Nsi ya Bavi̱i̱mu̱
eghi eli eku̱wa. Nsi yoona ya Banakanaani̱ na Meyala ya Basi̱dooni̱, ku̱hi̱ka Afeki̱ haa mutaano ghwa Bamooli̱.
Mutwale nsi ya Bagebbaali̱ na Lebbanooni̱ yoona, bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, ku̱lu̱gha mu Bbaali̱-gaadi̱, mu nti̱na ya mwena ghwa Helu̱mooni̱ ku̱hi̱ka Lebbo-hamati̱.

Bantu boona abali mu kyalo kya bwena, ku̱lu̱gha Lebbanooni̱ ku̱hi̱ka Mi̱si̱lefooti̱-mayi̱mu̱ na Basi̱dooni̱ boona, nkubabhinga mu nsi eghi Banai̱saaleeli̱ banaloli̱ye. Nsi eghi oghihe Banai̱saaleeli̱ baghitwale nga bugwetuwa bwabo, ngoku naakulaghiiye.
Nahabweki nsi eghi oghitambule nga bugwetuwa ntu̱la mwenda sya I̱saaleeli̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase.”

Ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase, baatunga bugwetuwa bwabo, nsi eghi Musa aabahaaye luhande lweli̱ lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱, nanga Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
akaba naabahaaye nsi eghi.
Kyalo kyabo kikaba ki̱lu̱ghi̱ye Alu̱weeli̱ haakumaliilila kwa kighona kya maasi Alu̱nooni̱ na kibugha kya haagati ya kighona eki, otaayemu na kiigbete kyona ekitandikiiye Medeba ku̱hi̱ka Di̱bbooni̱.
Kyalo eki kikaba kilimu bibugha byona bya Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱, oghu akaba alemeeye mu Hesi̱bbooni̱ kandi ki̱hi̱ki̱ye haa mutaano na Bamooni̱.
Kyalo eki kikaba kilimu Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, kyalo kya Bagesu̱li̱ na Bamaaka, mwena ghwona ghwa Helu̱mooni̱ kandi kyalo kyona kya Bbasaani ku̱hi̱ka Saleka.

Kyalo eki kikaba kilimu bukama bwa Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani oghu akaba alemi̱ye Asi̱talooti̱ na Edeleeyi̱. Ogi̱ niiye enkaha hakaba ati̱ghaayʼo mu ntu̱la ya Balefahi̱mu̱, nanga Musa akaba naasi̱ngu̱u̱ye kandi naabhi̱ngi̱ye bantu mu nsi eghi.
Bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ tabaabhi̱ngi̱ye Bagesu̱li̱ na Bamaaka mu nsi eghi, banali mu I̱saaleeli̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.
Ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ yonkaha niiyo Musa ataahaaye nsi nga bugwetuwa bwabo, nanga bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye ebi bahongeeye
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱, niibiyo bugwetuwa bwabo, ngoku aabaghambiiye.
Musa aaha bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ bugwetuwa bwa nsi kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Kyalo kyabo kyalu̱gha Alu̱weeli̱ eghi eli haakumaliilila kwa kighona kya maasi Alu̱nooni̱ na kibugha ekili haagati ya kighona eki na kiigbete kyona ekili haai na kibugha kya Medeba.
Nsi eghi ekaba elimu kyalo kya Hesi̱bbooni̱ na bibugha byamu byona ebili mu kiigbete: Di̱bbooni̱, Bamoti̱-bbaali̱, Bbeti̱-bbaali̱-meyooni̱,
Jahaaji̱, Kedemooti̱, Mefaati,
Ki̱li̱yasahi̱mu̱, Sibbuma, Jeleti̱-sahaali̱, haa keena kʼomu kighona,
Bbeti̱-peyola, nti̱na ya mwena ghwa Pisiga na Bbeti̱-yesi̱mooti̱.

Nsi eghi ekaba elimu bibugha byona bya mu kiigbete na bukama bwona bwa Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Bamooli̱, oghu akaba alemeeye mu Hesi̱bbooni̱, Musa akaba naamu̱si̱ngu̱u̱ye kandi naasi̱ngu̱u̱ye dhee bakama baa Banami̱di̱yaani̱ bani: Evi̱, Lekeemu, Juula, Huula na Leba, abaabaagha banyolo baa mukama Si̱hooni̱ mu nsi eghi.
Bbalaamu oghu aalaghulagha, oghu akaba ali mutabani̱ wa Bbeyola, Banai̱saaleeli̱ baamwita na kihiyo mu bantu aba baati̱ye.

Mutaano ghwa bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ ghwaba maasi Yolodaani̱. Bibugha ebi na mi̱bhi̱li̱ eghi ebyeli̱ghi̱li̱li̱i̱ye baabiha ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ nga bugwetuwa bwabo, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Musa aaha dhee kimui kyakabili kya nsi eghi bantu baa ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Aabaha kyalo kya Yajeeli̱, bibugha byona byʼomu Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya nsi ya Bamooni̱, ku̱hi̱ka Alu̱weeli̱ eghi eli bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Labba.
Kyalo kyabo kyatandikila Hesi̱bbooni̱ ku̱hi̱ka Laama-mijipe na Bbetoni̱mu̱, ku̱lu̱gha Mahanahi̱mu̱ ku̱hi̱ka haa mutaano na Debbi̱li̱

kandi mu kighona kya Bbeti̱-halaamu, Bbeti̱-nimula, Su̱kooti̱, Jafooni̱, kimui kyakabili ekyabaagha ki̱ti̱ghaayʼo kya bukama bwa Si̱hooni̱ mukama wa Hesi̱bbooni̱, haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba ku̱hi̱ka haa maasi Yolodaani̱, haa mutaano ghwa nanja ya Ki̱neleti̱, luhande lweli̱ lwa Yolodaani̱.
Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa bwa nsi obu bantu baa ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ yaatu̱ngi̱ye, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo. Baatunga bibugha ebi na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Musa aaha bugwetuwa bwa nsi kimui kyakabili kya bantu baa ntu̱la ya Manase kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Kyalo kyabo kyatandikila Mahanahi̱mu̱ na Bbasaani yoona. Bukama bwona bwa Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani na bibugha byona bya Yai̱li̱ ebili mu Bbasaani, byona bikaba bili bibugha nkaagha.

Baabaha dhee kimui kyakabili kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, Asi̱talooti̱ na Edeleeyi̱, bibugha bya Ogi̱ mukama wa Bbasaani. Baaha bibugha ebi byona kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Maki̱li̱ mutabani̱ wa Manase kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa obu Musa aahaaye ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱ mu kiigbete kya Mowaabu, luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱, bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yeli̱ko.
Bhaatu Musa ataaha ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ nsi nga bugwetuwa bwabo. Aabaghila ati bugwetuwa bwabo ni kutunga haa bihonguwa ebi bantu bahongeeye
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ ngoku
aabaghambiiye.
Buni niibuwo bugwetuwa obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatu̱ngi̱ye mu nsi ya Kanaani̱, obu mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja, Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ na bakulu baa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱ baabahaaye kutwala.
Bugwetuwa bwabo baabutunga kusighikila haa kukoma buluulu, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa kuha nsi eghi ntu̱la mwenda na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la yʼeku̱mi̱.

Musa akaba naahaaye kimui kyakabili kya nsi luhande lweli̱ lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱ ntu̱la ebili na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la yaakasatu nga bugwetuwa bwabo. Bhaatu Baleevi̱ tabaatu̱ngi̱ye bugwetuwa bwabo nga ntu̱la sinji.

Baasukulu baa Yojeefu̱ bakaba bali ntu̱la ebili. Ntu̱la ya Manase na ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱. Taaliyo mughabo oghu baahaaye ntu̱la ya Leevi̱ mu nsi eghi, bhaatu baabaha bibugha bya kuukalamu byonkaha na hambali baku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱ya bisolo byabo kandi kutʼo bintu byabo binji.
Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatambulana nsi eghi ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Niibuwo bamui mu bantu bʼomu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da baaghendi̱ye ewaa Yosuwa e Gi̱li̱gaali̱. Omui mu bantu aba li̱i̱na liye Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune Munakeneeji̱, aaghila Yosuwa ati, “Majima omani̱ye ebi
aaghambiiye Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa Luhanga, e Kadesi̱-bbaluneya, ebikwetʼo uwe nanje.
Nkaba ndi na myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa ya bukulu obu Musa, mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
, antu̱mi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha Kadesi̱-bbaluneya kughenda kubega nsi ya Kanaani̱. Nkakuuka kandi naamughambila majima aghali haa mutima ghwanje.
Bhaatu baghenji̱ banje abaaghendi̱ye nanje, bakaleka bantu baatu mitima yaabakangama munda. Bhaatu si̱ye naakwamililagha
Luhanga wanje na mutima ghwanje ghwona.
Kilo eki, Musa aalahila naaghila ati, ‘Majima nsi eghi waakpeeti̱yʼo na kighele kyawe ekuba bugwetuwa bwawe na baasukulu baawe bilo nʼebilo, nanga waakwamiliiye
Luhanga wanje na mutima ghwawe ghwona.’
Olole,
andi̱ndi̱ye ninali mwomi̱i̱li̱ myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa nʼetaano ngoku aabu̱ghi̱ye, ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu
aabu̱ghi̱ye bighambo ebi na Musa, Banai̱saaleeli̱ mbanalubhatanga mu elungu. Bhaatu olole, endindi ndi na myaka kinaanaa nʼetaano ya bukulu.
Obwalo ninali na maani̱ agha naabaagha nagho obu Musa antu̱mi̱ye. Ninali na maani̱ ghaa kulwana bulemo kandi kukola kintu kinji kyona.
“Nahabweki ompe kyalo kya bwena eki
andaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye, bwile obu. Okaaghu̱wa bwile obu ngoku Banaki̱ baakaaye mu kyalo eki mu bibugha ebili na bigho byamaani̱ kandi bikangami̱ye. Bhaatu ngoku
ali nanje, nkubhinga mu nsi eghi bantu aba ngoku
aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye.”
Nahabweki Yosuwa aaha mu̱gi̱sa Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune kandi aamuha nsi ya Hebbu̱looni̱ kuba bugwetuwa buwe.
Hebbu̱looni̱ yaafooka bugwetuwa bwa Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune Munakeneeji̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi, nanga aakwamililagha
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ na mutima ghuwe ghwona.
Hebbu̱looni̱ baadu̱bhagha kughighilamu Ki̱li̱yaati̱-alaba. (Alaba akaba ali musaasa wamaani̱ mu ntu̱la ya Banaki̱.) Bulemo bwahuwa mu nsi eghi kandi yaateekaana.
Nsi eghi kaluulu kaahaaye bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, yaalu̱gha haa mutaano ghwa Edomu, kukuukila eku̱wa mu elungu lya Ji̱i̱ni̱.
Mutaano ghwabo ghwa eku̱wa ghwatandikila eku̱wa haa ki̱si̱yo kya Nanja ya Kisula,

ghwahonela kimui ku̱hi̱ka eku̱wa ya Akulabbi̱mu̱, ghwasaalila mu elungu lya Ji̱i̱ni̱, ghwakoma ku̱hi̱ka eku̱wa ya Kadesi̱-bbaluneya, ghwasaalila haai na Heji̱looni̱, ghwahi̱ka Adaali̱ kandi ghwahi̱ka Kaluka.
Mutaano oghu ghweyongela ku̱hi̱ka Aji̱mooni̱, ghwakota haa maasi ghaa mutaano na Mi̱si̱li̱, ghwakuukila haa Nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱. Oghu ghwaba mutaano ghwa eku̱wa ghwa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da.

Mutaano ghwabo ghwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba ghwatandikila haa Nanja ya Kisula, ku̱hi̱ka hambali maasi Yolodaani̱ gheehuuliiye mu Nanja eghi. Mutaano ghwabo ghwa elughulu ghwatandikila haa ki̱si̱yo hambali maasi Yolodaani̱ gheehuuliiye mu Nanja ya Kisula.
Mutaano oghu ghwakoma ku̱hi̱ka Bbeti̱-hogula kandi ghwakwama elughulu ya Bbeti̱-alaba. Mutaano oghu ghwakoma ku̱hi̱ka haa ebaale lya Bbohaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Leu̱bbeeni̱.

Mutaano oghu ghwatandikila mu kighona Akooli̱ ku̱hi̱ka Debbi̱li̱ kandi ghwakoma elughulu ya Gi̱li̱gaali̱ eghi elolaane na Adu̱mi̱i̱mu̱ eku̱wa ya kighona. Mutaano oghu ghweyongela kandi ghwahi̱ka haa maasi ghaa Eni̱-semeesi̱ kandi ghwakuukila Eni̱-logeeli̱.

Mutaano oghu ghwasaalila mu kighona kya mutabani̱ wa Hi̱noomu̱ eku̱wa ya kyalo kya Bayebu̱si̱ (niiyo Yelusaalemu). Mutaano oghu ghwaghendela kimui ku̱hi̱ka haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena oghulolaane na kighona kya Hi̱noomu̱, bughuwa ejooba kandi ghwahi̱ka elughulu haa kumaliilila kwa kighona kya Balefahi̱mu̱.

Mutaano oghu ghwatandikila haagu̱u̱li̱ ya mwena ghwahi̱ka haa nsulo ya Nefutowa, ghwalu̱ghʼo ghwahi̱ka mu bibugha bya mwena ghwa Efu̱looni̱ kandi ghwakota ghwahi̱ka Bbalaali̱ (eghi ni Ki̱li̱yaati̱-yali̱i̱mu̱.)

Du̱mbi̱ mutaano oghu ghweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya bughuwa ejooba bwa Bbalaali̱ ghwahi̱ka haa mwena ghwa Seyi̱li̱, ghwasaalila elughulu ya mwena ghwa Yali̱i̱mu̱ (eghi ni Kesalooni̱), ghwakota mu kibugha kya Bbeti̱-semesi̱ kandi ghwahi̱ka mu kibugha kya Timuna.

Ghwakoma elughulu mu nti̱na ya keena kaa Eku̱looni̱, ghwegaali̱ya kandi ghwaghenda Si̱kelooni̱, ghwasaalila haa mwena Bbalaali̱ kandi ghwahi̱ka Yabbi̱neeli̱. Mutaano oghu ghwahelela haa nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱.
Mutaano ghwa bughuwa ejooba ghwakuukila haa ki̱si̱yo kya Nanja Namu̱li̱to ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱. Eghi niiyo mitaano ya bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Yosuwa aaha Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune kimui kyakabili kya nsi ya Yu̱da, ngoku
aamulaghiiye. Aamuha kibugha kya Ki̱li̱yaati̱-alaba, niiyo Hebbu̱looni̱. Alaba likaba lili li̱i̱na lya ese wa Anaki̱.
Kelebbu aabhinga mu nsi eghi ntu̱la esatu sya baasukulu baa Anaki̱: ya Basesaai̱, ya Bahi̱maani̱ na ya Batalumaai̱.
Du̱mbi̱ Kelebbu aalu̱ghʼo kandi aaghenda kulwana na bantu abaakaaye mu kibugha kya Debbi̱li̱, (eki baaghilaghamu Ki̱li̱yaati̱-sefeeli̱.)
Kelebbu aaghila ati, “Muntu weena oghu akulwana kandi naakwata kibugha kya Ki̱li̱yaati̱-sefeeli̱, nkumuha muhala wanje Aki̱sa amuswele.”
Oti̱neeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Kenaji̱, mu̱ghenji̱ wa Kelebbu, aakwata kibugha eki. Du̱mbi̱ Kelebbu aamuha muhala wee Aki̱sa kumuswela.
Haa kilo baakwatagha mpete, Aki̱sa aaghila Oti̱neeli̱ ati asabe nkyame siye kumuha musili. Du̱mbi̱ Aki̱sa aasu̱ndu̱ka haa ndogooi̱ yee. Kelebbu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Okubbala biki?”
Aki̱sa aamukuukamu ati, “Gutu ompe mu̱gi̱sa nanga wampaaye nsi ya Negeebbu eghi yoomi̱ye, ompe nsulo sya maasi.” Nahabweki Kelebbu aamuha nsulo sya elughulu na nsulo sya eku̱wa.
Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa baahaaye bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Bibugha ebi baahaaye bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da abaabaagha eku̱wa hambali haseli̱ye, mu kyalo ekilolaane na mutaano ghwa Edomu niibiyo bini: Kabbu̱jeeli̱, Edeli, Yagula,
Kinaali̱, Dimona, Adada,
Kedesi̱, Hajooli̱, Yi̱tu̱naani̱,
Ji̱i̱fu̱, Teleemu̱, Bbeyalooti̱,
Hajooli̱-hadata, Keli̱yooti̱-heji̱looni̱ (niiyo Hajooli̱),
Amaamu, Seema, Molada,
Hajali̱-gaada, Hesi̱mooni̱, Bbeti̱-peleeti̱,
Hajala-suwali̱, Bbeli̱seba, Bbi̱ji̱yoti̱ya,
Bbaala, Yi̱i̱mu̱, Ejemu,
Elitolaadi̱, Kesi̱li̱, Holu̱ma,
Jikilagi̱, Madimaana, Sansana,
Lebbayooti̱, Si̱lu̱hi̱i̱mu̱, Ayi̱ni̱ na Li̱mooni̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha maku̱mi̱ abili na mwenda na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Mu kiigbete hakaba halimu bibugha bini: Esitawoli̱, Joola, Asi̱i̱na,
Janowa, Eni-gani̱i̱mu̱, Tapuwa, Enaamu,
Yalamu̱ti̱, Adulaamu, Sooko, Ajeka
Salahi̱i̱mu̱, Aditahi̱mu̱, Gedela, Gedelotahi̱mu̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Hakaba halimu dhee bibugha bini: Jenaani̱, Hadasa, Migidali-gaadi̱,
Dilaani, Mijipa, Yoki̱teeli̱,
Laki̱si̱, Bboji̱kaati̱, Egu̱looni̱,
Kabbooni̱, Lahamaasi, Ki̱ti̱li̱si̱,
Gedelooti̱, Bbeti̱-dagooni̱, Naama, na Makeda, byona bikaba bili bibugha eku̱mi̱ na mukaagha na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Hakaba halimu dhee Libbuna, Eteli̱, Asani̱,
I̱fu̱ta, Asi̱i̱na, Neji̱bbu̱,
Kei̱la, Aki̱ji̱bbu̱, na Malesa, byona bikaba bili bibugha mwenda na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Hakaba halimu dhee kibugha kya Eku̱looni̱ na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yakiyo.
Mutaano oghu ghwatandikila Eku̱looni̱ ghwaghenda bughuwa ejooba otaayemu maatau̱ni̱ aghali haai na kibugha kya Asi̱doodi̱ na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yakiyo.
Baatwala dhee kibugha kya Asi̱doodi̱ na Gaja, na maatau̱ni̱ kandi mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo, ku̱hi̱ka haa maasi ghaa mutaano ghwa Mi̱si̱li̱ na ki̱si̱yo kya Nanja Namu̱li̱to ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱.
Mu kyalo kya bwena hakaba halimu bibugha bini: Sami̱li̱, Yati̱li̱, Sooko,
Daana, Ki̱li̱yati̱-saana, (niiyo Debbi̱li̱),
Anaabbu, Esi̱temo, Ani̱i̱mu̱,
Goseeni̱, Holooni̱ na Gi̱lo, byona bikaba bili bibugha eku̱mi̱ na kimui na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Hakaba halimu dhee bibugha bini: Alabu, Duuma, Esaani̱,
Yani̱mu̱, Bbeti̱-tapuwa, Afeeka,
Humuta, Ki̱li̱yaati̱-alaba, (niiyo Hebbu̱looni̱) na Ji̱yooli̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha mwenda na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Baatunga dhee bibugha bini: Mayooni̱, Kalameeli̱, Ji̱i̱fu̱, Yu̱ta,
Yejeleeli̱, Yoki̱deyaamu, Janowa,
Kai̱ni̱, Gi̱bbeya na Timuna, byona bikaba bili bibugha eku̱mi̱ na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Baatunga dhee bibugha bini: Hali̱hu̱u̱li̱, Bbeti̱-juula, Gedola,
Malaati̱, Bbeti̱-anooti̱ na Eli̱tekooni̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha mukaagha na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Baatunga dhee bibugha bini: Ki̱li̱yaati̱-bbaali̱ (niiyo Ki̱li̱yaati̱-yali̱i̱mu̱) na Labba, byona bikaba bili bibugha bibili na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Mu elungu hakaba halimu bibugha bini: Bbeti̱-alaba, Mi̱di̱i̱ni̱, Sekaaka,
Nibbusaani̱, Kibugha kya Kisula na Eni̱geedi̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha mukaagha na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Bhaatu bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da tabaagu̱bhi̱ye kubhinga Bayebu̱si̱ abaabaagha baakaaye mu Yelusaalemu. Bayebu̱si̱ aba banaakaaye na bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da mu Yelusaalemu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi.

Nsi eghi kaluulu kaahaaye baasukulu baa Yojeefu̱, yaatandikila haa maasi Yolodaani̱ e Yeli̱ko, bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi ghaa nsulo sya Yeli̱ko. Mutaano ghwabo ghwalu̱gha Yeli̱ko, ghwakwamila mu elungu kandi ghwahi̱ka mu kyalo kya bwena kya Bbeteeli̱.
Ghwalu̱gha Bbeteeli̱ ghwahi̱ka Lu̱u̱ji̱, ghwasaalila Atalooti̱, mu kyalo kya Banʼaala.
Du̱mbi̱ ghwahona bughuwa ejooba mu kyalo kya Bayafu̱leeti̱, ghwaghendela kimui ghwahi̱ka eku̱wa ya Bbeti̱-holooni̱, ghwahi̱ka Gejeli̱ kandi ghwakuukila haa nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱.
Manase na Efulahi̱mu̱, batabani̱ baa Yojeefu̱, baatunga nsi yabo nga bugwetuwa bwabo.

Kini niikiyo kyalo eki bantu baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo baatu̱ngi̱ye nga bugwetuwa: mutaano ghwa nsi yabo ghwatandikila Atalooti̱-adaali̱ bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, ghwaghenda kandi ghwahi̱ka Bbeti̱-holooni̱ yʼelughulu,

ghwalu̱gha haala, ghwahi̱ka haa nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱. Elughulu ghwahi̱ka Mi̱ki̱metaati̱. Bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, mutaano oghu ghwegaali̱ya ghwahi̱ka Tanaati̱-si̱i̱lo, ghwasaala kandi ghwahi̱ka bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yanowa.
Du̱mbi̱ ghwahona ku̱lu̱gha Yanowa ghwahi̱ka Atalooti̱ na Naala, ghwahi̱ka Yeli̱ko kandi ghwahelela haa maasi Yolodaani̱.

Ku̱lu̱gha Tapuwa mutaano oghu ghwaghenda bughuwa ejooba ghwahi̱ka haa maasi ghaa Kana kandi ghwahelela haa nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱. Eghi niiyo nsi eghi baahaaye bantu baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ nga bugwetuwa kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo,
otaayemu bibugha bya mbaghani̱ja ebi baahaaye ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ nga bugwetuwa, ebyabaagha mu kyalo kya ntu̱la ya Manase, bibugha ebi byona na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.

Bhaatu bantu baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ bataabhinga Banakanaani̱ abaakalagha Gejeli̱. Bantu aba banaakaaye na bantu baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱, bhaatu bakukolelagha bantu baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ milimo yamaani̱ nga basyana.

Eni niiyo nsi eghi kaluulu kaahaaye bantu baa ntu̱la ya Manase, mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa Yojeefu̱. Kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ na Bbasaani baabiha Maki̱li̱, mu̱li̱ghaaso ghwa Manase ese wa Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, nanga Maki̱li̱ akaba ali musaasa mulwani̱.

Bantu banji abaati̱ghaayʼo baa ntu̱la ya Manase baabaha nsi kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo. Bantu aba niibo bani: Abyejeeli̱, Heleki̱, Asi̱li̱yeeli̱, Sekeemu, Hefeli̱, na Semi̱da. Aba niibo baasukulu baabusaasa baa Manase mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.

Bhaatu Jelofehaadi̱ mutabani̱ wa Hefeli̱, Hefeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ mutabani̱ wa Maki̱li̱, Maki̱li̱ mutabani̱ wa Manase, akaba atabyaye baana baabusaasa, bhaatu baabukali̱ bonkaha. Mali̱i̱na ghaabo ni Maahala, Nooha, Hogu̱la, Milika, Ti̱lu̱ja.
Baaghenda ewaa mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja, Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, na beebembeli̱ baa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Baabaghila bati, “
akalaghila Musa kutuha nsi nga bugwetuwa bwatu, hamui na baana baani̱naatu̱we baabusaasa.” Nahabweki kusighikila ngoku
aabu̱ghi̱ye, Yosuwa aabaha nsi mu baghenji̱ baa esebo.
Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye ntu̱la ya Manase yaatunga mighabo eku̱mi̱ kwongela haa kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ na Bbasaani, eghi eli luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱.
Baasukulu baabukali̱ baa Manase baatunga nsi nga bugwetuwa bwabo hamui na baasukulu be baabusaasa. Nsi ya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ baaghiha bantu banji baa ntu̱la ya Manase.
Kyalo kya ntu̱la ya Manase kyatandikila Aseli̱, kyahi̱ka Mi̱ki̱metaati̱ bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Sekeemu. Mutaano ghwabo ghwahona eku̱wa kandi ghwahi̱ka mu bantu abaakaaye Eni̱-tapuwa.
Nsi ya Eni̱-tapuwa yaaba ya Manase, bhaatu tau̱ni̱ ya Tapuwa haa mutaano ghwa ntu̱la ya Manase, yaaba ya ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱.

Mutaano oghu ghwahona haa maasi ghaa Kana. Bibugha ebyabaagha eku̱wa ya maasi agha byaba bya ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱, nankabha mbyabaagha mu kyalo kya Manase. Mutaano ghwa Manase ghweyongela elughulu ya maasi agha kandi ghwahelela haa Nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱.

Ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ yaakala mu kyalo kyʼeku̱wa kya maasi Kana kandi ntu̱la ya Manase yaakala mu kyalo kyʼelughulu ya maasi agha. Nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱ ghwaba mutaano ghwabo ghwa bughuwa ejooba. Aseli̱ ghwaba mutaano ghwa elughulu kandi I̱sakaali ghwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba.

Mu kyalo kya I̱sakaali na Aseli̱, Manase akaba halimu na bibugha bini: Bbeti̱-saani̱ na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yakiyo, I̱bbu̱li̱yaamu na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yakiyo, mi̱bhi̱li̱ ya Dooli̱ na bantu abaakaayemu, mi̱bhi̱li̱ ya Eni̱dooli̱ na bantu abaakaayemu, mi̱bhi̱li̱ ya Tanaki̱ na bantu abaakaayemu, mi̱bhi̱li̱ ya Mi̱gi̱do na bantu abaakaayemu na mi̱bhi̱li̱ eghi yeeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye bibugha ebi.
Bhaatu baa ntu̱la ya Manase bataagubha kukwata bibugha ebi kandi Banakanaani̱ beeyongela kuukala mu kyalo eki.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baafooki̱ye baamaani̱, baatandika kuhambi̱li̱ja Banakanaani̱ aba kubakolela milimo yamaani̱ nga basyana. Bhaatu bataabhinga Banakanaani̱ aba mu nsi eghi.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ na Manase baasukulu baa Yojeefu̱ baaghila Yosuwa bati, “Nkiki kyaleki̱ye waatuha ki̱twi̱ke kimui kyonkaha kya nsi nga bugwetuwa bwatu, kuni
aatuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa twakana?”

Yosuwa aabaghila ati, “Mukaakuba muli bantu bakani̱ye kandi kyalo kya bwena kya Efulahi̱mu̱ kikaakuba kibakeeheeye, mughende mu ki̱bhi̱li̱, mwesemeleli̱yeyo ki̱i̱kalo kya kuukalamu mu nsi ya Bapeleeji̱ na Balefahi̱mu̱.”

Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ na Manase baasukulu baa Yojeefu̱ baamughila bati, “Nsi ya kyalo kya bwena teekutumala. Bhaatu Banakanaani̱ abaakaaye mu kiigbete na Bbeti̱-saani̱, na mu kighona kya Yejeleeli̱ bali na bigaali̱ bya byoma.”
Yosuwa aaghila ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ na Manase, baasukulu baa Yojeefu̱ ati, “Mukani̱ye kandi muli baamaani̱. Tankubaha ki̱twi̱ke kimui kyonkaha kya nsi bbaa.

Bhaatu nkubaha kyalo kya bwena, nankabha kili na ki̱bhi̱li̱, mukiteme ku̱hi̱ka haa mutaano ghuseleeye kimui kandi mukitwale. Banakanaani̱ aba nankabha bali na bigaali̱ bya byoma kandi bali baamaani̱, mukubasi̱ngu̱la.”
Niibuwo ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyekumaani̱li̱i̱ye mu kibugha kya Si̱i̱lo kandi baatʼo weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Bwile obu nsi eghi ekaba eli hansi ya bu̱loleeleli̱ bwabo.
Mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba hakaba hati̱ghaayʼo ntu̱la musanju̱ esyabaagha sitakatu̱ngi̱ye nsi nga bugwetuwa bwabo.
Niibuwo Yosuwa aabu̱u̱i̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, “Mu̱ku̱hi̱ki̱ya dhi̱ kulindilila kutwala nsi eghi eti̱ghaayʼo, eghi
Luhanga wa baataata baanu aahaaye enu̱we?
Mukome basaasa basatu mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la, mbatume baghende basaalile mu nsi eghi kandi bateele maapu kwoleka kyalo eki bu̱li̱ ntu̱la ekutunga nga bugwetuwa bwabo, du̱mbi̱ bakuuke hambali ndi.
Nsi eghi baghitambulani̱yemu bi̱twi̱ke musanju̱. Ntu̱la ya Yu̱da eekale mu kyalo kyayʼo kya eku̱wa kandi ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱ na ya Manase baakale mu kyalo kyabo kyʼelughulu.
Muhandiike ngoku bi̱twi̱ke musanju̱ ebi bi̱su̱si̱ye kandi mundeetele ebi mwahandi̱i̱ki̱ye. Nkukoma buluulu mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga waatu kumanya nsi eghi nkuha bu̱li̱ ntu̱la.
Baleevi̱ tabali na mughabo bakutunga mu enu̱we, nanga mulimo ghwabo ghwa ku̱heeleli̱ya
nga bahongi̱ niibuwo bugwetuwa bwabo. Ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ na Leu̱bbeeni̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase bakamala kutunga mughabo ghwabo, oghu Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
aabahaaye luhande lweli̱ lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱.”
Basaasa aba baamu̱ki̱ya kughenda. Yosuwa aabalaghikiilila ati, “Mughende musaalile mu nsi eghi, muteele maapu yayo kandi mughindeetele. Nkubakomela buluulu hani mu kibugha kya Si̱i̱lo mu maaso ghaa

Nahabweki basaasa aba baaghenda kandi baasaalila mu nsi eghi. Baateela maapu yayo nibooleka ngoku baku̱ghi̱tu̱wamu bi̱twi̱ke musanju̱. Baahandiika mali̱i̱na ghaa bibugha byamu. Du̱mbi̱ baakuuka ewaa Yosuwa e Si̱i̱lo hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabaagha baghooneeye.
Yosuwa aakoma buluulu e Si̱i̱lo haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ mu maaso ghaa
. Nsi eghi aaghitambu̱li̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kandi bu̱li̱ ntu̱la aaghiha kimui kyakabili kyayo.
Kaluulu kʼoku̱du̱bha kaaba kaa bantu baa ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱. Kyalo kyabo kyaba haagati ya ntu̱la ya Yu̱da na ntu̱la ya Yojeefu̱.

Mutaano ghwa elughulu ghwa nsi eghi baahaaye ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ ghwatandikila haa maasi Yolodaani̱. Du̱mbi̱ ghwakoma elughulu ya Yeli̱ko, ghwakoma bughuwa ejooba bwa kyalo kya bwena, ghwahelela mu elungu lya Bbeti̱-aveni̱.
Mutaano oghu ghwasaalila eku̱wa ya tau̱ni̱ ya Lu̱u̱ji̱ (niiyo Bbeteeli̱), ghwahona ghwahi̱ka Atalooti̱-adaali̱, haa mwena eku̱wa ya Bbeti̱-holooni̱ yʼeku̱wa.

Mutaano oghu ghwaghenda haa luhande lunji, ghwegaali̱ya ku̱lu̱gha bughuwa ejooba kandi ghwahona eku̱wa ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghulolaane na Bbeti̱-holooni̱ kandi ghwakuukila Ki̱li̱yaati̱-bbaali̱ (niiyo Ki̱li̱yaati̱-yali̱i̱mu̱), kibugha kya bantu baa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da, oghu ghwaba mutaano ghwa bughuwa ejooba.
Mutaano ghwa eku̱wa ghwatandikila Ki̱li̱yaati̱-yali̱i̱mu̱ kandi ghwakuukila Efu̱looni̱ haa nsulo sya maasi ghaa Nefutowa.

Mutaano oghu ghwahona kandi ghwahi̱ka mu nti̱na ya mwena oghulolaane na kighona kya mutabani̱ wa Hi̱noomu̱, ekili elughulu ya kighona kya Balefahi̱mu̱. Mutaano oghu ghwahona mu kighona kya Hi̱noomu̱ ghwahi̱ka eku̱wa mu kyalo kya Bayebu̱si̱, du̱mbi̱ ghwahona kandi ghwahi̱ka Eni̱-logeeli̱.

Mutaano oghu ghwalu̱gha haala, ghwakoma elughulu mu tau̱ni̱ ya Eni̱-semeesi̱, ghwalu̱ghʼo kandi ghwaghenda Geli̱looti̱, eghi elolaane na kighona kya Adu̱mi̱i̱mu̱. Du̱mbi̱ ghwahona haa ebaale lya Bbohaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Leu̱bbeeni̱.
Du̱mbi̱ ghwalu̱gha haala kandi ghwakoma elughulu ya Bbeti̱-alaba, ghwahona mu kighona kya maasi Yolodaani̱.
Mutaano oghu ghwasaalila elughulu ya Bbeti̱-hogula, ghwahelela elughulu ya Nanja ya Kisula eku̱wa ya maasi Yolodaani̱. Oghu ghwaba mutaano ghwa eku̱wa.

Maasi Yolodaani̱ ghwaba mutaano ghwa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba. Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa bwa nsi obu ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ yaatu̱ngi̱ye kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, eghi niiyo ekaba eli mitaano eghi ebeeli̱ghi̱li̱li̱i̱ye.
Bini niibiyo bibugha ebi ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ yaatu̱ngi̱ye kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo: Yeli̱ko, Bbeti̱-hogula, Emeki̱-keji̱i̱ji̱,
Bbeti̱-alaba, Jemalahi̱mu̱, Bbeteeli̱,
Avi̱i̱mu̱, Pala, Ofula,
Kefalamooni̱, Ofu̱ni̱ na Gebba. Bibugha eku̱mi̱ na bibili na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱, Laama, Bbelooti̱,
Mijipa, Kefi̱i̱la, Mojaha,
Lekeemu, Yi̱lu̱peeli̱, Talala,

Jeela, Helefi̱, Yebu̱si̱ (niiyo Yelusaalemu), Gi̱bbeya na Ki̱li̱yaati̱-yali̱i̱mu̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha eku̱mi̱ na bbinaa na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo. Eghi niiyo nsi eghi ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ yaatu̱ngi̱ye nga bugwetuwa bwabo, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Kaluulu kaakabili kaaba kaa ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo. Kyalo baabahaaye nga bugwetuwa kikaba kili haagati ya kyalo eki baahaaye ntu̱la ya Yu̱da nga bugwetuwa.
Kyalo eki baabahaaye nga bugwetuwa kikaba kilimu: Bbeli̱seba, Sebba, Molada
Hajala-suwali̱, Bbaala, Ejemu,
Elitolaadi̱, Bbetu̱li̱, Holu̱ma,
Jikilagi̱, Bbeti̱-makabboti̱, Hajala-susa,
Bbeti̱-lebboyati̱ na Salu̱heni̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha eku̱mi̱ na bisatu na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Kikaba kilimu dhee Ayi̱ni̱, Li̱mooni̱, Eteli̱ na Asani̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha bbinaa na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.

Kikaba kilimu mi̱bhi̱li̱ yoona eghi yeeli̱ghi̱li̱li̱i̱ye bibugha ebi ku̱hi̱ka Bbalati̱-bbeeli̱, Laama mu kyalo kya Negeebbu. Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa obu baahaaye ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.

Kyalo eki baahaaye ntu̱la ya Yu̱da nga bugwetuwa kikaba kikaniiye kimui, nahabweki baayʼo ki̱twi̱ke kya kyalo eki, baakiha ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱. Nahabweki ntu̱la ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱ yaatunga kyalo nga bugwetuwa haagati ya kyalo kya ntu̱la ya Yu̱da.
Kaluulu kaakasatu kaaba kaa ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo. Mutaano ghwa kyalo baabahaaye nga bugwetuwa ghwahi̱ka Sali̱di̱.
Mutaano ghwabo ghwaghenda bughuwa ejooba, ghwasaalila Malala, ghwahi̱ka Dabbeseeti̱ kandi ghwahi̱ka mu kighona kya bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yokinaamu.

Mutaano oghu ghwalu̱gha Sali̱di̱ ghwaghenda haa luhande lunji lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, ghwahi̱ka haa mutaano ghwa Ki̱si̱looti̱-tabbola, ghwalu̱gha haala ghwaghenda Dabbelaati̱ ghwakoma kandi ghwahi̱ka Yafi̱ya.
Ku̱lu̱gha haala, ghwasaalila bu̱lu̱gha ejooba ghwahi̱ka Gati̱-hefeeli̱, ghwaghenda ghwahi̱ka Eti̱-kaji̱i̱ni̱, ghwahi̱ka Li̱mooni̱, ghwegaali̱ya ghwaghenda mu kibugha kya Neeya.
Mutaano ghwabo ghwa elughulu ghwasaalila haai na kibugha kya Hanatooni̱, ghwakuukila mu kighona kya I̱fu̱teeli̱.
Kyalo kyabo kikaba kilimu: Katati̱, Nahalaali̱, Si̱mu̱looni̱, I̱dala na Bbeteleheemu, byona bikaba bili bibugha eku̱mi̱ na bibili na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa bwa nsi eghi ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱ yaatu̱ngi̱ye, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, otaayemu bibugha ebi na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Kaluulu kaakanaa kaaba kaa ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Kyalo kyabo kikaba kilimu: Yejeleeli̱, Kesu̱looti̱, Suneemu,
Hafalahi̱mu̱, Si̱yooni̱, Anakalaati̱,
Labbi̱ti̱, Ki̱si̱yooni̱, Ebbeeji̱,
Lemeti̱, Eni-gani̱i̱mu̱, Eni̱-hada, Bbeti̱-pajeji̱.
Mutaano ghwabo ghwahi̱ka Tabbola, Sahajumaali̱, Bbeti̱-semesi̱ kandi ghwakuukila haa maasi Yolodaani̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha eku̱mi̱ na mukaagha na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa bwa nsi obu ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali yaatu̱ngi̱ye kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, otaayemu bibugha ebi na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Kaluulu kaakataano kaaba kaa ntu̱la ya Aseli̱, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Kyalo kyabo kikaba kili na maatau̱ni̱ ghani: Helukaati̱, Hali̱, Bbeteeni̱ na Akisaafu,
Alameleeki̱, Amaadi̱ na Misaali̱. Mutaano ghwa bughuwa ejooba ghwahi̱ka Kalameeli̱ na Si̱hooli̱-li̱bbu̱nati̱.

Du̱mbi̱ ghwegaali̱ya bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, ghwaghenda Bbeti̱-dagooni̱, ghwahi̱ka haai na nsi ya Jabbu̱looni̱, ghwahi̱ka mu kighona kya I̱fu̱taheeli̱, ghwakoma elughulu mu kibugha kya Bbeti̱-emeki̱ ku̱hi̱ka Neyeli̱. Du̱mbi̱ ghweyongela kukoma elughulu ghwahi̱ka Kabu̱lu̱,
Hebbu̱looni̱, Lehobbu̱, Hamooni̱, Kana ku̱hi̱ka Si̱dooni̱ namu̱li̱to.

Du̱mbi̱ mutaano oghu ghwegaali̱ya kandi ghwaghenda Laama, ghwahi̱ka mu kibugha ekili na bigho bi̱gu̱mi̱ye kya Ti̱lo. Mutaano oghu ghwegaali̱ya kandi ghwaghenda Hosa, ghwahelela haa nanja. Kyalo eki kikaba kilimu dhee Mahalaabu̱, Aki̱ji̱bu̱,
U̱ma, Afeki̱ na Lehobbu̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha maku̱mi̱ abili na bibili na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa bwa nsi obu ntu̱la ya Aseli̱ yaatu̱ngi̱ye, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, otaayemu bibugha ebi na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Kaluulu kaamukaagha kaaba kaa ntu̱la ya Nafutaali, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Mutaano ghwabo ghwatandikila Helefu̱, haa Ki̱i̱looku̱ kyʼomu kyalo kya Jaanani̱i̱mu̱, ghwahi̱ka Adami̱-nekeebbu̱, Yabbu̱neeli̱, Laku̱mu̱ kandi ghwakuukila haa maasi Yolodaani̱.

Mutaano oghu ghwegaali̱ya bughuwa ejooba ghwahi̱ka Ajonoti̱-tabbola, ghwalu̱ghʼo kandi ghwahi̱ka Hu̱koki̱, ghwahi̱ka eku̱wa ya ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱ na Aseli̱, bughuwa ejooba bwa ntu̱la ya Yu̱da haa luhande lwa bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yolodaani̱.
Bibugha ebyabaaghamu na bigho bikangami̱ye ni: Ji̱di̱mu̱, Jeela, Hamati̱, Lakati̱, Ki̱neleti̱,
Adama, Laama, Hajooli̱,
Kedesi̱, Edeleeyi̱, Eni-hajooli̱,
Yi̱looni̱, Migidati̱-eeli̱, Holemu, Bbeti̱-anati̱ na Bbeti̱-semesi̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha eku̱mi̱ na mwenda na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa bwa nsi eghi ntu̱la ya Nafutaali yaatu̱ngi̱ye, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, otaayemu bibugha ebi na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Kaluulu kaamusanju̱ kaaba kaa ntu̱la ya Daani̱, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo.
Kyalo kyabo kikaba kilimu: Joola, Esitawoli̱, I̱le-semeesi̱,
Saalabbi̱ni̱, Aiyalooni̱, I̱si̱la,
Elooni̱, Timuna, Eku̱looni̱,
Eli̱teke, Gi̱bbetooni̱, Bbaalati̱,
Jehu̱di̱, Bbene-bbelaaki̱, Gati̱-li̱mooni̱,
Meyalu̱kooni̱, Lakooni̱, na nsi eghi elolaane na kyalo ekilolaane na Yopa.

Obu bantu baa ntu̱la ya Daani̱ baasaaghu̱u̱we kuukala mu nsi yabo, baaghenda kulwana na bantu bʼomu kibugha kya Leseemu. Obu baamali̱ye kwita bantu bʼomu kibugha eki na kihiyo, baakitwala kandi baakalamu. Baakiluka li̱i̱na lya taata wabo Daani̱.
Obu niibuwo bugwetuwa bwa nsi obu ntu̱la ya Daani̱ yaatu̱ngi̱ye, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, otaayemu bibugha ebi na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yabiyo.
Obu baamali̱ye kutambu̱li̱ya nsi eghi ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱, baaha Yosuwa mutabani̱ waa Nu̱u̱ni̱ kyalo kukitwala.
Baaha Yosuwa eki aabasabi̱ye kusighikila ngoku
aabalaghiiye. Baamuha kibugha kya Timunati̱-seela, kyʼomu kyalo kya bwena kya Efulahi̱mu̱. Aakwela buhyaka kibugha eki kandi aakiikalamu.

Mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja, Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱ na beebembeli̱ baa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱, baaha nsi eghi nga bugwetuwa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱ mbakoma buluulu hambali baghooneeye e Si̱i̱lo mu maaso ghaa
, haa mulyango ghwa weema ya kusanga-sangaanamu. Bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ niikuwo baamali̱ye batiyo kutambulana nsi eghi.
Niibuwo
aaghi̱li̱ye Yosuwa ati,
“Oghambile Banai̱saaleeli̱ oti, ‘Mukome bibugha bya kuulukilamu, ngoku naalaghiiye Musa kubaghambila,

niikuwo oghu akwita muunakiye atakighendeleeye kandi ataabaagha abbali̱ye kumwita, aalukilaghe mu kimui haa bibugha ebi. Bibugha ebi bibaaghe byanu kuulukilamu kwelinda oghu baati̱ye muntu wee kuhoola ngi̱ghu̱.

Oghu aati̱ye muunakiye, aalukilaghe mu kimui haa bibugha ebi kandi eemililaghe haa mulyango ghwa geeti̱ ya kibugha eki, asoboololaghe beebembeli̱ baakiyo musango oghu aakoli̱ye. Du̱mbi̱ bamutwalaghe mu kibugha eki, bamuhe ki̱i̱kalo kya kuukalamu kandi aakalaghe nabo.
Kaakuba oghu akubbala kuhoola ngi̱ghu̱ aghenda amulabhi̱ye, batamuha muntu oghu aati̱ye muunakiye, nanga aati̱ye muunakiye atakighendeleeye kandi etali haabwa kwoha muntu oghu mu bwile obwasaaye.

Muntu oghu ali na kuukala mu kibugha eki ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aamiliiye mu maaso ghaa ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu ku̱mu̱twi̱la musango kandi mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona oghu aakolagha bwile obu aku̱u̱ye. Oghu aati̱ye muunakiye oghu niikuwo agubhe kukuuka mu kibugha kyʼewaabo eki aalu̱ki̱yemu.’ ”

Nahabweki Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakoma bibugha bini: Kedesi̱ eghi eli mu Galilaaya mu kyalo kya bwena kya Nafutaali, Sekeemu mu kyalo kya bwena kya Efulahi̱mu̱ na Ki̱li̱yaati̱-alaba (niiyo Hebbu̱looni̱) mu kyalo kya bwena kya Yu̱da.

Luhande lweli̱ lwa Yolodaani̱ bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa Yeli̱ko, baakomayo bibugha bini: Bbejeeli̱ ekili haa kiigbete kyʼomu elungu, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, Lamoti̱ mu kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱, Golaani̱ mu kyalo kya Bbasaani, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Manase.

Bini niibiyo bibugha baakomi̱ye haabwa Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona na munamahanga oghu aakaaye nabo, niikuwo muntu weena oghu akwita muunakiye atakighendeleeye, agubhe kuulukilayo, niikuwo oghu akubbala kuhoola ngi̱ghu̱ atamwita, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bamu̱twi̱li̱i̱ye musango mu maaso ghaa ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu.
Bakulu baa ntu̱la ya Leevi̱, baaghenda ewaa mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja, Yosuwa mutabani̱ wa Nu̱u̱ni̱, na bakulu baa ntu̱la sinji sya I̱saaleeli̱.
Baabaghambila e Si̱i̱lo mu nsi ya Kanaani̱ bati, “
akalaghila Musa kutuha bibugha bya kuukalamu na haa ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱ya bisolo byatu.”
Nahabweki kusighikila ngoku
aalaghiiye, Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaha Baleevi̱ bibugha na byalo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu bisolo byabo ku̱lu̱gha haa byalo baaheebeeu̱we nga bugwetuwa bwabo.

Kaluulu kʼoku̱du̱bha kaaba kaa Bakohaati̱, kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, bakaba bali Baleevi̱ kandi baasukulu baa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱. Baatunga bibugha eku̱mi̱ na bisatu ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da, Si̱mi̱yooni̱ na Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱.
Bakohati̱ banji abaati̱ghaayʼo baatunga bibugha eku̱mi̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱, Daani̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase.

Kaluulu kanji kaaba kaa baasukulu baa Geli̱sooni̱ kandi baatunga bibugha eku̱mi̱ na bisatu, ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali, ya Aseli̱, ya Nafutaali na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase mu kyalo kya Bbasaani.
Ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ kusighikila haa ntu̱la syabo, baatunga bibugha eku̱mi̱ na bibili ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na ya Jabbu̱looni̱.
Bibugha ebi na byalo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Banai̱saaleeli̱ baakoma buluulu kubiha Baleevi̱, ngoku
aalaghiiye Musa.
Ghani niigho mali̱i̱na ghaa bibugha byʼomu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da na Si̱mi̱yooni̱ ebi baahaaye
baasukulu baa Alooni̱. Baabiha ntu̱la ya Bakohaati̱, mu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱, nanga niibo kaluulu kaadu̱bhi̱ye kukwata.
Baabaha kibugha kya Ki̱li̱yaati̱-alaba (Alaba niiye akaba ali ese wa Anaki̱), niiyo Hebbu̱looni̱, mu kyalo kya bwena kya Yu̱da na kyalo kya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu ekyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye kibugha eki.
Bhaatu misili ya kibugha eki na mi̱bhi̱li̱ yakiyo, bakaba mbaabihaaye Kelebbu mutabani̱ wa Yefune kubitwala.
Basukulu baa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱, baabaha kibugha kya Hebbu̱looni̱, (kibugha eki muntu oghu aati̱ye muunakiye akuulukilamu), Libbuna na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Yati̱li̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Esi̱temoha na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Holooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Debbi̱li̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,

Ayi̱ni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Yu̱ta na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu na Bbeti̱-semesi̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha mwenda ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Yu̱da na ya Si̱mi̱yooni̱.
Ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱ baatunga bibugha bini: Gi̱bbi̱yooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Gebba na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Kibugha kya Anatooti̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu na Alu̱nooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu.
Bibugha bya baasukulu baa mu̱hongi̱ Alooni̱, byona byaba eku̱mi̱ na bisatu na byalo byabiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu.
Bantu banji baa mu ntu̱la kaa Bakohati̱ abaati̱ghaayʼo mu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱, baabaha bibugha bini na byalo byabiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Efulahi̱mu̱.
Baabaha Sekeemu, (kibugha eki muntu oghu aati̱ye muunakiye akuulukilamu), na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, mu kyalo kya bwena kya Efulahi̱mu̱, Gejeli̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Kibujahi̱mu̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Bbeti̱-holooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha bbinaa.
Ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Daani̱ baatunga bibugha bini: Eli̱teke na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Gi̱bbetooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Aiyalooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Gati̱-li̱mooni̱, byona bikaba bili bibugha bbinaa.

Ku̱lu̱gha mu kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la Manase baatunga bibugha bini: Tanaki̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Gati̱-li̱mooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha bibili.
Bibugha byona ebi baahaaye ntu̱la sinji sya Bakohati̱ abaati̱ghaayʼo, byona bikaba bili eku̱mi̱ na byalo byabiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu.

Bageli̱sooni̱, kamui haa ntu̱la sya Baleevi̱ baatunga bibugha bibili ku̱lu̱gha mu kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase, Golaani̱ mu kyalo kya Bbasaani na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, (kibugha eki muntu oghu aati̱ye muunakiye akuulukilamu), na Bbesi̱teela, na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha bibili.
Ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya I̱sakaali baatunga bibugha bini: Ki̱si̱yooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Dabbelaati̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Yalamu̱ti̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Eni-gani̱i̱mu̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha bbinaa.
Ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Aseli̱ baatunga bibugha bini: Misaali̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Abu̱dooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Helukaati̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu na Lehobbu̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha bbinaa.

Ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Nafutaali baatunga bibugha bini: Kedesi̱ mu kyalo kya Galilaaya na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, (kibugha eki muntu oghu aati̱ye muunakiye akuulukilamu), Hamati̱-dooli̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu na Kalataani̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha bisatu.
Bibugha byona ebi ntu̱la sya Bageli̱sooni̱ bwatu̱ngi̱ye byaba eku̱mi̱ na bisatu na byalo byabiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu.

Ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱, Baleevi̱ abaati̱ghaayʼo bʼomu ntu̱la ya Melaali̱ baatunga bibugha bini: Yokinaamu na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Kalata na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Dimuna na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Nahalaali̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha bbinaa.
Ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ baatunga bibugha bini: Bbejeeli̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Jahaaji̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Kedemooti̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu na Mefaati na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha bbinaa.

Ku̱lu̱gha mu ntu̱la ya Gaadi̱ baatunga bibugha bini: Lamoti̱ mu kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, (kibugha eki muntu oghu aati̱ye muunakiye akuulukilamu), Mahanahi̱mu̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu,
Hesi̱bbooni̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu, Yajeeli̱ na byalo byakiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu. Byona byaba bibugha bbinaa.
Bibugha ebi baahaaye ntu̱la sya Melaali̱ abaati̱ghaayʼo mu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱, byona byaba eku̱mi̱ na bibili.
Bibugha ebi Baleevi̱ baatu̱ngi̱ye mu nsi ya bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱, byona byaba bibugha maku̱mi̱ anaa ma munaanaa na byalo byabiyo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu.
Bibugha ebi byona bikaba bili na byalo bya ku̱li̱i̱si̱li̱yamu ebyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye bibugha ebi. Byona niikuwo byabaagha bitiyo.
niikuwo aahaaye atiyo Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona nsi eghi ngoku aalahiiye kughiha baataata baabo. Banai̱saaleeli̱ baatwala nsi eghi kandi baaghiikalamu.
aabaha bu̱si̱nge mu nsi yabo yoona ngoku aalahiiye ewaa baataata baabo. Taaliyo nʼomui haa ngi̱ghu̱ syabo oghu akagubha kubasi̱ngu̱la, nanga
akakoonela Banai̱saaleeli̱ ku̱si̱ngu̱la ngi̱ghu̱ syabo.
Taaliyo kintu kilungi na kimui eki
aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kukolela Banai̱saaleeli̱ eki ataakoli̱ye, byona bikabʼo.
Yosuwa aabilikila hamui ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase,
aabaghila ati, “Mwakoli̱ye byona ebi Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
aabalaghiiye kandi mwahu̱ti̱ya elaka lyanje haabwa kukola byona ebi naabalaghiiye.
Bwile bukani̱ye buni bwona tamukalu̱ghi̱yʼo baghenji̱ baanu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi, bhaatu mwakwete ebi
Luhanga waanu aabalaghiiye.
Luhanga waanu aahaaye Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanu bu̱si̱nge ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye. Nahabweki mukuuke mu maka ghaanu mu nsi eghi Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
aabahaaye kutwala, eghi eli luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱.
Bhaatu mweghendeseleje kukwata ndaghikiililo na bilaghilo ebi Musa mu̱heeleli̱ya wa
aabalaghiiye, kukunda
Luhanga waanu, kukola ebi abbali̱ye, kukwata bilaghilo biye, kumwebohelʼo kandi ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya na mutima ghwanu ghwona na mwoyo ghwanu ghwona.”
Nahabweki Yosuwa aabaha mu̱gi̱sa kandi aabalagha, baakuuka mu maka ghaabo.

Kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase Musa akaba naabahaaye kyalo mu nsi ya Bbasaani, kimui kyakabili kinji kya ntu̱la eghi akaba naabahaaye nsi ya luhande lweli̱ lwa bughuwa ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱ ekilabhaane na baghenji̱ baabo. Obu Yosuwa aalaghagha bantu aba kughenda mu maka ghaabo aabaha mu̱gi̱sa,

naaghila ati, “Mukuuke mu maka ghaanu na buguudha bukani̱ye, mutwale bisolo byanu byona, siliva, feeja, byoma na ngoye sikani̱ye, ebi mwahu̱ngi̱yʼo ngi̱ghu̱ syanu. Mutambulane bintu ebi na baghenji̱ baanu.”

Nahabweki basaasa bʼomu ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase, baati̱gha Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyabo e Si̱i̱lo mu nsi ya Kanaani̱, baaghenda ewaabo mu nsi ya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, mu kyalo kyabo eki Musa aabahaaye ngoku
aamulaghiiye.

Bhaatu obu baaki̱dhi̱ye Geli̱looti̱ haai na maasi Yolodaani̱ mu nsi ya Kanaani̱, bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase baakwela mu ki̱i̱kalo eki kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kiinamu̱li̱to haai na maasi Yolodaani̱.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghu̱wa ngoku bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase baakweye kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa mu kyalo kya Geli̱looti̱, haa mutaano ghwa nsi ya Kanaani̱, luhande lweli̱ lwa bughuwa ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱.
Obu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baaghu̱u̱ye kintu eki, ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ beekumaani̱li̱ya mu kibugha kya Si̱i̱lo kweteekani̱ja kughenda kulwana na bantu baa ntu̱la esi.

Du̱mbi̱ Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baatuma Fi̱nehaasi mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja, kughenda mu kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, ku̱bu̱gha na bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase.
Aaghenda na beebembeli̱ baa ntu̱la eku̱mi̱, esyabaagha si̱ti̱ghaaye mu kibugha kya Si̱i̱lo. Mwebembeli̱ omui ku̱lu̱gha mu bu̱li̱ ntu̱la ya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye mu bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la ya Manase, mu kyalo kya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱, baabaghila bati,
“Ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya bantu baa
niibuwo baaghila bati, ‘Mwakoli̱ye kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye mu maaso ghaa
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱ nangaaki? Mwajeemeeye
haabwa kwekwelela kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kini. Mwamu̱lu̱ghi̱yʼo kandi mwaleka kumukwamilila!
Kibhi ekyakoleeu̱we e Peyola takyatumali̱ye?
akafubila ki̱bbu̱la kyatu na ndwala yamaani̱ eghi ekatwitamu bantu bakani̱ye kandi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya endindi tunaakubona-bona haabwa kibhi eki.
Obwalo mukubbala kuleka kukwamilila
“ ‘Kaakuba mujeemela
obwalo, munkiya akusaaliluwa na ki̱bbu̱la kyona kya Banai̱saaleeli̱.
Bhaatu nsi mwatwete ekaakuba eteeli̱ye, mukuuke mu nsi ya
, hambali weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ya
eli, mwise muukale naatu. Bhaatu mutajeemela
kedha etu̱we, nimwekwelela kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kyanu, ekitali kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
Luhanga waatu.

Buuye tamu̱u̱su̱ki̱ye ngoku ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ kyafubihuwe, obu Akaani mutabani̱ wa Jeela ataabaaye mwesighibuwa haa kilaghilo ekyateebeeu̱wʼo haa bintu ebili bya kuhwelekeelela? Akaani taaniiye akaku̱wa enkaha haabwa kibhi kiye.’ ”
Niibuwo bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na kimui kyakabili kya ntu̱la Manase baaku̱u̱ki̱yemu beebembeli̱ baa ntu̱la sya I̱saaleeli̱ bati,
wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona ni Luhanga!
wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona ni Luhanga! Amani̱ye ekyaleki̱ye twakola eki. Nahabweki tukubbala naanu Banai̱saaleeli̱ mukimanye dhee! Tukaakuba ntwakoli̱ye eki haabwa bu̱jeemi̱ kedha kughaya
, obwalo mutwite.
Tukaakuba twekweleeye kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa ntubbala ku̱lu̱ghʼo
kandi kuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye, bya bilimuwa kedha bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge,
eenini atufubile.
“Tukakola eki haabwa kwobaha tuti mu bwile obuliisa baasukulu baanu bangughila baasukulu baatu bati, ‘Muli na nkolangana ki na
Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱?
Tamuli na bugwetuwa obu
aahaaye enu̱we, nanga
aafooye maasi Yolodaani̱ kuba mutaano haagati yaatu naanu bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na ya Gaadi̱.’ Nanga baana baanu mbaabu̱ghi̱ye batiyo, banguleka baana baatu baleka kulami̱ya
“Niibuwo twatu̱u̱yemu tuti, ‘Oleke twekwelele kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa, bhaatu kitali kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye kedha bihonguwa binji.’
Bhaatu kyakuhongelʼo eki kikuba buukai̱so haagati yaatu naanu kandi haagati ya mijo eghi ekulabha etu̱we. Kyakuhongelʼo eki kikwoleka ngoku tuli na bughabe bwa kulami̱ya

haa weema yee ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi kumuhongela bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye, bisembo na bihonguwa bya bu̱si̱nge, niikuwo baasukulu baanu mu bwile obuliisa batagubha kughila baasukulu baatu bati, ‘Tamuli na bughabe bwa kulami̱ya
“Twaghila tuti, ‘Kaakuba batu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya eki kedha baasukulu baatu, tukubooleka kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa eki baataata baatu baakweye eki̱su̱si̱ye nga kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
. Ekitali kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye kedha bihonguwa binji, bhaatu kuba kaakulolelʼo haagati yaatu naanu.’
“Majima, tatukujeemela

, kedha kuleka kumukwamilila haabwa kwekwelela kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa byona byokeei̱ye, bya bilimuwa kedha bihonguwa binji. Bbaa, tatukukwela kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kinji ekitali kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kya
Luhanga waatu, ekili mu maaso ghaa weema ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ya kulami̱li̱yamu!”

Obu mu̱hongi̱ Fi̱nehaasi, beebembeli̱ na bakulu baa ntu̱la sya ki̱bbu̱la kya Banai̱saaleeli̱ abaaghendi̱ye naye, baaghu̱u̱ye ebi bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, ya Gaadi̱ na Manase baabu̱ghi̱ye bighambo ebi, baadheedhuwa.
Fi̱nehaasi mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja, aaghila bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, Gaadi̱ na Manase ati, “Obwalo twamani̱ye ngoku
ali naatu, nanga tamwamujeemeeye kandi mwaju̱ni̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ boona kifubilo kya

Fi̱nehaasi mutabani̱ wa mu̱hongi̱ Eli̱yeeja na beebembeli̱ aba, baalu̱gha mu nsi ya Gi̱li̱yaadi̱ mu bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na ya Gaadi̱ baakuuka hambali Banai̱saaleeli̱ bali mu nsi ya Kanaani̱, baabaghambila byona ebyabaayʼo.

Banai̱saaleeli̱ baadheedhuwa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa makulu agha kandi baasinda Luhanga. Banai̱saaleeli̱ aba baasinda Luhanga kandi bataatodha ku̱bu̱ghʼo kya kulwana kandi ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya nsi hambali bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱, na Gaadi̱ baabaagha baakaaye.
Bantu baa ntu̱la ya Leu̱bbeeni̱ na Gaadi̱ baaluka li̱i̱na kyakuhongelʼo bihonguwa kyabo bati, “Buukai̱so obukutwoleka ngu
ni Luhanga.”
